meta.description: Ǝlinjil ǝn Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix Itawann-as deɣ Arkawal wa Aynayan

Matthew: Ǝntanay da esmawan n aljadan ǝn Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix, ahaya n ǝnnǝbi Dawǝd, d ǝnnǝbi Ibrahim:
Ibrahim eraw Isǝhaq.
Isǝhaq eraw Yaqub.
Yaqub eraw Yahuda ǝd mǝdrayan-net.
Yahuda eraw Farǝs ǝd Zarax,
anna-nasan esǝm-net Tamar.
Farǝs eraw Xasrun.
Xasrun eraw Ram.
Ram eraw Ɣaminadab.
Ɣaminadab eraw Našon.
Našon eraw Salmuna.
Salmuna eraw Boxaz was anna-net Rahab.
Boxaz eraw Ɣubayd was anna-net Rut.
Ɣubayd eraw Yasay.
Yasay eraw Dawǝd wa n ǝmǝnokal.
Dawǝd eraw Suliman was anna-net tantut n Urǝyya.
Suliman eraw Roxoboham.
Roxoboham eraw Abǝya.
Abǝya eraw Aza.
Aza eraw Yahušafat.
Yahušafat eraw Yuram.
Yuram eraw Ɣuzǝyas.
Ɣuzǝyas eraw Yutam.
Yutam eraw Axaz.
Axaz eraw Xizqǝyyas.
Xizqǝyyas eraw Manašša.
Manašša eraw Amun.
Amun eraw Yušǝya.
Yušǝya eraw Yakunǝya ǝd mǝdrayan-net.
Azzaman win den ǝntanay
a daɣ tawaɣan Kǝl-Israyil
ǝmmewayan s akal ǝn Babǝylon
ǝqqalan daɣ-as ikefǝlan.
Dǝffǝr adi, eraw Yakunǝya Šalatǝyel.
Šalatǝyel eraw Zǝrubabil.
Zǝrubabil eraw Abihud.
Abihud eraw Alyaqim.
Alyaqim eraw Yazur.
Yazur eraw Saduq.
Saduq eraw Xakim.
Xakim eraw Elǝyud.
Elǝyud eraw Elyazar.
Elyazar eraw Mattan.
Mattan eraw Yaqub.
Yaqub ǝnta a erawan Yusǝf
wa izlafan Maryama ta terawat Ɣaysa
was itawannu Ǝlmǝsix.

Daɣ adi maraw meddan d ǝkkoz a ǝllanen gǝr Dawǝd d ǝmaraw-net Ibrahim. Ǝllân-tu maraw d ǝkkoz gǝr Dawǝd d azzaman win ǝtǝwǝkfal ǝn Kǝl-Israyil ǝs Babǝylon, ǝllân-tu deɣ maraw d ǝkkoz gǝr ǝtǝwǝkfal ǝn Kǝl-Israyil ǝs Babǝylon ǝd tǝhǝwt ǝn Ɣaysa.
Ǝnta da ǝmmǝk was d-iggaz Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix ǝddǝnet: Maryama ta n anna ǝn Ɣaysa, imirakan dǝr-ǝs Yusǝf azalaf. Mišan harwa da wǝr tǝzlay ǝs Yusǝf, as tǝga tadist, ǝs tarna n Infas wa Zǝddigan.
Yusǝf, imosan alǝs oɣadan, wǝr ira ǝsǝkkǝrukǝd ǝn Maryama daɣ aytedan. Awen daɣ a fǝl isammarkas daɣ man-net as a dǝr-ǝs iɣrǝd da wǝr t-illa i ǝhan salan-nasan.

Isamadran daɣ awen da as t-in-ibaz etǝs inafalal-as-du angalos n Ǝmǝli daɣ targǝt, inn-as: «Yusǝf, ahaya ǝn Dawǝd, a kay-wǝr-tǝggǝz tasa n azalaf ǝn Maryama, fǝlas barar wa ihan tadist-net, Infas wa Zǝddigan a d-ifal.
Ad tǝgrǝw barar amaran kay ag-as esǝm Ɣaysa fǝlas ǝnta a zʼassafsin tamattay-net daɣ bakkadan.»
Arat wa kul iga fǝl ad andu awal wa d-imal Mǝššina ǝs tarrayt n ǝnnǝbi Isayas as inna:
«Ad tagu tǝmawat tadist da wǝr tǝzday meddan, tǝgrǝw barar. Barar wǝdi a das-itǝwǝggu esǝm Emanǝwel, almaɣna: Mǝššina illâ ɣur-na.»
As d-inkar Yusǝf daɣ etǝs, immozal s arat was t-omar angalos n Ǝmǝli, izlaf Maryama.
Mišan wǝr kala a dǝr-ǝs inamansa har ihǝw barar. As ihǝw, ig-as Yusǝf esǝm Ɣaysa.
Azzaman n Ǝmǝnokal Herod a daɣ ihǝw Ɣaysa, daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Betalxam, daɣ amaḍal ǝn Yahudǝyya. Ǝglan-du musanan ǝn manayan a d-ǝfalnen dǝnnǝg har d-osan Yerusalam.
Ǝnnan: «Ma iga ǝmǝnokal ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud wa ihǝwan da sǝket? Atri-net a nǝnay daɣ dǝnnǝg, amaran nǝkk-ay-du y a das-nǝssǝjǝd.»
Arat wa as t-isla ǝmǝnokal Herod, iga aššawaša zǝwwǝran, ǝnta harkid Kǝl-Yerusalam kul.
Iššedaw-du imuzaran ǝn limaman, ǝd musanan n Ǝttawret, issǝstǝn-tan d adag wa daɣ zʼihǝw Ǝlmǝsix.
Ǝnnan-as: «Aɣrǝm ǝn Betalxam a daɣ zʼihǝw daɣ amaḍal ǝn Yahudǝyya, fǝlas ǝnnǝbi Mika iktâb âs:
"Kam amaran Betalxam, ta n amaḍal ǝn Yahudǝyya, tǝheɣ iɣǝrman win aɣaf daɣ akal ǝn Yahudǝyya, fǝlas kam a du-z-igmǝd ǝmuzar wa zʼagin i tamattay-nin Israyil tizart ta itaggu amadan y aharay-net."»
Tǝzzar isassaɣra-du ǝmǝnokal Herod imusanan win manayan en, imos awen arat igân daɣ ǝssir, issǝstan-tan ǝd tamert tas igmad aššak as ǝnta daɣ d-inafalal ǝtri wa ǝmalan den.
Dǝffǝr awen issok-en Betalxam inn-asan: «Agliwat, taknim asawad i dad illa barar wa ihǝwan da, as tu-tǝgrawam, tǝmmǝram-i-du tǝmǝlam-i dad illa, fǝl ad t-akka ǝssǝjǝdaɣ-as nak da.»

As dasan-iɣrad ǝmǝnokal awal, ǝglan. Tǝzzar oggan atri wa dasan-inafalalan daɣ jǝnnawan dat awen daɣ dǝnnǝg. Wǝr immǝzzay ǝtri en ad illa dat-san, azzar-asan, as imal dǝnnǝg adag wa iha barar, izzǝkkat.
As ǝnayan atri as izzǝkkat, ǝknan tǝfalawist,

ǝggazan-in ehan, ǝnayan barar d anna-net Maryama, ǝgaraffen ǝssǝjadan i barar. Dǝffǝr adi, oran ilalan-nasan, ǝkkasan-as-du daɣ-san šibǝddar ǝganen daɣ urǝɣ, d ǝššin sǝqqidan ǝzodnen, ǝmosnen ǝzzǝnǝf ǝn taɣǝlbast.
Dǝffǝr awen isannafalal-asan-du Mǝššina daɣ targǝt as ad wǝr ǝqqǝlan Herod. Awen da a fǝl obazan tarrayt iyyat ǝqqalan akal-nasan.

Dǝffǝr as ǝglân, inafalal-du angalos n Ǝmǝli i Yusǝf daɣ targǝt, inn-as: «Ǝnkǝr, tidawaɣ ǝd barar d anna-net, takka tarmad akal ǝn Masar taqqama daɣ-as har dak-ǝmǝlaɣ assaɣa wa du-za-tǝqqǝla, fǝlas barar di ad igmǝy Herod ǝd tanaɣay-net.»
Inkar Yusǝf, iddew ǝd barar d anna-net, eway ehad, obaz tarrayt ikka Masar.
Ǝqqiman daɣ Masar den da har aba Herod. Arat wa iga fǝl ad andu awal wa d-iga Ǝmǝli ǝs tarrayt n ǝnnǝbi Osay a daɣ inna:
«Ǝɣre-du barar-in ǝssǝrdaɣaq-q-idu Masar.»

As issan Herod as imusanan win manayan ǝmmizrayan batu-net ǝɣlayan-tu, iɣašašat, omar s ad tǝwǝnɣin bararan ǝn yayyan kul win ǝhǝwnen daɣ aɣrǝm ǝn Betalxam, ǝd ɣǝlǝyɣǝlayan-net, a d-obazan ɣur ǝššin elan har azzaman win den, imos as tamert ten da as das-ǝnnan musanan win ǝnta daɣ d-inafalal ǝtri.
Den daɣ ad inda awal wa d-iga Ǝmǝli ǝs tarrayt n ǝnnǝbi Irmǝya a daɣ innâ:

«Tǝga-du tǝkurayt daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Rama, imos awen tala n aytedan fǝl tǝga tǝfǝyyawt. Awen Raxil ta n tǝmarawt ǝn Kǝl-Israyil tǝhallit fǝl bararan-net. Wǝr tǝra i das-igan ǝlmaɣiza, fǝlas bararan ǝjwaran aba-tan.»
Dǝffǝr tǝmattant ǝn Herod, inafalal angalos n Ǝmǝli i Yusǝf daɣ targǝt, daɣ akal ǝn Masar.
Inn-as angalos: «Ǝnkǝr, tidawaɣ ǝd barar di d anna-net, tǝqqǝlaɣ akal n Israyil, fǝlas aytedan win ǝranen tenaɣay-net, aba-tan.»
Inkar Yusǝf, iddew ǝd barar d anna-net, iqqal akal n Israyil.

Mišan igraw isalan as Arkalawǝs, a imosan ǝmǝnokal n akal ǝn Yahudǝyya, daɣ adag n abba-net Herod. Tǝzzar tǝggaz tasa Yusǝf, ab-as ihal iki ǝn Yahudǝyya, ikka akal ǝn Galilaya id Mǝššina a das-d-isannafalalan awen daɣ targǝt.
Igla iɣsar daɣ ǝɣrǝm as itawannu Nazaret. Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as ǝgan aratan win, fǝl ad andu awal wa d-iga Ǝmǝli ǝs tarrayt n ǝnnǝbitan as ǝnnan:
«Itawagg-as esǝm aw Nazaret.»
Elan dǝffǝr awen, issǝnta Yaxya wa isalmaɣan daɣ aman igi ǝn tǝlxutbat daɣ taneray ǝn Yahudǝyya.
Igannu: «Utabat! Illikan as, Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan tahôz!»
Yaxya en daɣ a fǝl immǝgrad ǝnnǝbi Isayas assaɣa wad inna:
«Alǝs iyyan idkâl ǝmǝsli-net daɣ ǝsuf igannu: "Sǝmmutǝgat abaraqqa y Ǝmǝli! Tǝsǝssiɣǝdam tarrayen dat-ǝs!"»
Yaxya ilsa tabdoq tǝgât daɣ anzadan n ǝmnǝs, otâb s ǝsatǝb n agašek. Iddâr s ǝjwalan ǝd turawat.
A t-in-tasin aytedan, ǝgmâdan-du Yerusalam, d akal ketnet wa n Yahudǝyya, d amaḍal kul wa n ɣǝlǝyɣǝlayan n agarew wa n Yordan,
tutaban daɣ bakkadan-nasan dat tamattay, isalmaq-qan Yaxya daɣ aman daɣ agarew wen.
Osan-du Farisaytan aggotnen, ǝd Sadusaytan, y a tan-issǝlmǝɣ Yaxya daɣ aman. As inay Yaxya arat wen inn-asan: «Xa taššolen šin! Ma kawan-issosanan ǝdǝrrǝg y attadib wa d-izayan ǝn Mǝššina?
Daɣ adi taggiwat imazalan olaɣnen tǝsǝttǝddim sǝr-san tǝtubt-nawan!

Wǝr igda ad tǝgannim daɣ man-nawan: "Nakkanay ǝzzurrǝyya n ǝnnǝbi Ibrahim a nǝmos," fǝlas silakanaɣ-awan as Mǝššina ifrâg ad isǝmmǝttǝy šihun šin tǝhannayam da, ixlǝk-du daɣ-asnat ǝzzurrǝyya y Ibrahim!
Agat ǝnnǝyat! Tazǝft harwa ǝmǝrǝdda da tǝmmotag y a du-tǝsǝddǝngǝr y eškan. Daɣ adi ašǝk kul wa wǝr nǝtirǝw aratan olaɣnen, ad itǝwǝɣtǝs, itǝwǝgǝr-in daɣ tǝmsay!

Nak, aman a daq qawan-salmaɣa, fǝl ad sǝnnǝfilǝlaɣ s awen tǝtubt-nawan. Mišan wa du-z-asin dǝffǝr-i, awa di-iga daɣ šigrat, wǝr eweda wala arra ǝn suɣan ǝn ɣateman-net. Ǝnta Infas Wa Zǝddigan ǝd tǝmsay a daq qawan-z-issǝlmǝɣ.
Iha ǝlmital n awedan ittâfan tesayt y ad izzǝzǝr alkama-net. Išadaw alkama daɣ tadangawt-net, šiɣal amaran ag-enat daɣ tǝmsay tǝbilaglagat faw.»
Adan en da daɣ d-osa Ɣaysa, igmâd-du akal ǝn Galilaya, ikka-du agarew wa n Yordan, y ad t-issǝlmǝɣ Yaxya daɣ aman.
Mišan igmay Yaxya d a daɣ-as ikkǝs awen. Inn-as Yaxya: «Nak a iddǝraran s a di-tǝssǝlmǝɣa daɣ aman, amaran kay iman-nak a di-d-ikkan?»
Ijjǝwwab-as Ɣaysa inn-as: «Ǝmǝrǝdda ardu s arat wǝdi da, fǝlas ilzam-anaɣ ad nassandu arat kul wa ira Mǝššina.» Tǝzzar irda Yaxya s ǝsǝlmǝɣ ǝn Ɣaysa.
Itawasalmaɣ Ɣaysa ɣas, igmad-du aman, ǝnnolaman jǝnnawan daɣ amazay wen da, ogga Infas ǝn Mǝššina as d-igmad ijǝnnawan, iha šaššelan ǝn tǝdabert, iwar-tu.
Igmad-du ǝmǝsli ijǝnnawan inna: «Ǝnta ǝddi Barar-in ǝkne tara, amaran ǝnta a d-issǝndan agna-nin.»
Tǝzzar issoka Infas wa Zǝddigan Ɣaysa taneray y a daɣ-as t-ajjarrab Iblis.
As iga Ɣaysa ǝkkozat tǝmǝrwen n ǝzǝl d ǝkkozat tǝmǝrwen n ahad izûm, iggaz-tu gǝlǝk.
Ihoz-t-idu Iblis a n ǝnǝjjerrǝb inn-as: «Kud kay Barar ǝn Mǝššina, tamǝra šihun a s ad ǝqqǝlnat amensay.»
Mišan inn-as Ɣaysa: «Wǝrgeɣ ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban:
"Aggadǝm wǝrgeɣ imensewan ɣas as itaddar, kalar isuddur-tu ad ilkâm y awal ketnet wa d-ifalan Mǝššina."»
Ikka dǝr-ǝs Iblis aɣrǝm wa zǝddigan ǝn Yerusalam, issǝbdad-tu fǝl afalla n Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada,
inn-as: «Kud kay Barar ǝn Mǝššina, tǝtǝrǝgge, fǝlas ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban:
"Ad amǝr Mǝššina angalosan daɣ talɣa-nak, ǝkbǝlan-kay daɣ fassan-nasan, fǝl a dak-wǝr-tǝnkǝf tǝhunt."»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Wǝrgeɣ za Ǝlkǝttaban di ǝnnân:
"Ad wǝr tǝtajjarraba Ǝmǝli-nak Mǝššina."»
Dǝffǝr awen ikka dǝr-ǝs Iblis afalla n ǝdɣaɣ iknan tǝzzǝgrǝt, issǝswad-tu daɣ taɣmaren kul n ǝddǝnet ǝd tǝhussay-nasnat,
inn-as: «Awa togge den kul ǝkfeɣ-ak-ku as di-tǝssǝjada tǝɣbadaɣ-i.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Ugag-i, Aššaytan! Wǝrgeɣ ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban:
"Ǝmǝli-nak Mǝššina as za tǝssǝjǝda, ǝnta ɣas a za tǝɣbǝda."»
Amaran oyy-ay Iblis. Ǝhinan-in angalosan ǝkkân-du Ɣaysa ǝssanan daɣ-as.
As isla Ɣaysa ǝtǝrmǝs ǝn Yaxya, iqqal akal ǝn Galilaya.
Mišan wǝr iqqim daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Nazaret. Kalar igla iɣsar daɣ tǝɣrǝmt tǝgât Kafarnahum, tǝwârat tǝgadamayt n agaraw wa n Galilaya daɣ amaḍal ǝn Zǝbulun ǝd wa n Naftali.
Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as inda awal wa d-iga Ǝmǝli ǝs tarrayt n ǝnnǝbi Isayas a daɣ innâ:
«Akal ǝn Zǝbulun ǝd wa n Naftali, ǝhanen ǝsǝlim n agaraw wa n Galilaya, fǝl tǝgadamayt ta n ataram ǝn Yordan, almaɣna Galilaya, ǝnta a daɣ ǝɣsaran aytedan win Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝd win tan-wǝr-nǝmos!
Tamattay ta tǝhat šiyyay, tǝnay ǝnnur zǝwwǝran as imalawlaw, aytedan deɣ win ǝhanen akal wa tǝlsa telay ǝn tǝmattant, ǝntanay da ibalazlaz fall-asan ǝnnur.»
Azzaman en da a daɣ iggaz Ɣaysa šin igi ǝn tǝlxutbat igannu: «Utabat, fǝlas Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan tǝhôz!»

Ǝzǝl iyyan ijiwankat Ɣaysa fǝl tǝgadamayt n agaraw wa n Galilaya as inay ǝššin mǝdrayan, s iyyan esǝm-net Simɣon was itawannu Butros, d amadray-net Andrawǝs. Meddan win inabazan ǝn kifitan a ǝmosan. As tan-inay fattawan daɣ agaraw sangaytan-nasan win abbaz ǝn kifitan.
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝlkǝmat-i, a kawan-aga meddan sǝr-i du-za-tawaynen aytedan y a tan-assafsa daɣ bakkadan-nasan.»
Oyyan sangaytan-nasan daɣ tamazayt ten da, əlkaman-as.

As iga Ɣaysa arat ǝn teklay dǝffǝr awen, inay ǝššin mǝdrayan wiyyad, ǝmosnen Yaqub d amadray-net Yaxya win maddanǝs ǝn Zabaday. As tan-inay nimahan aɣlal n aman d abba-nasan Zabaday, kannin sangaytan-nasan win as tabazan kifitan. Iɣr-en Ɣaysa.
Amazay wen daɣ ad oyyan aɣlal-nasan, ǝfalan abba-nasan, ǝlkaman i Ɣaysa.
Issǝwal Ɣaysa akal ǝn Galilaya ketnet, isasaɣru daɣ nan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud. Immâl Ǝlinjil, imosan isalan ǝn Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan, izuzǝy aytedan daɣ ǝkkulluk ǝn tǝwǝrna, d ǝkkulluk n ǝlɣib.

Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as itawasla Ɣaysa daɣ amaḍal ǝn Surǝya kul. A das-du-tamawayan aytedan kul win ǝrinnen, ǝd win t-ǝllanen d ǝlɣiban a ǝqqalan, ǝd win ǝssǝranan kǝlǝsuf, ǝd win ǝlanen ikǝrǝkkitan ǝd nǝbdan, izuzǝy-tan.
Ǝlkâmnat-as tǝmattiwen aggotnen a d-ǝfalnen Galilaya, d akal was itawannu «Wa-n-Maraw-Ɣǝrman», ǝd Yerusalam, d akal ǝn Yahudǝyya, d amaḍal wa ihan dǝnnǝg ǝn Yordan.
As inay Ɣaysa šimattiwen šin t-id-osanen den, iwar adɣaɣ. Iqqim den da, ǝhozan-tu nǝttulab-net.
Issǝnta ǝsǝssǝɣri n aytedan win ǝllanen den. Inn-asan:
«Ǝbbilalan aytedan win ǝllǝqqawnen daɣ man-nasan,
ǝqbâlan as ǝddiraran ǝs Mǝššina
fǝlas Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan šin-nasan.
Ǝbbilalan win hallinen,
fǝlas a tan-isǝddǝwǝt Mǝššina.
Ǝbbilalan win ǝssǝrasnen iman-nasan,
fǝlas ad ǝgrǝwan akal wa dasan-issǝnsa Mǝššina.
Ǝbbilalan win ǝknanen deran n awa oɣadan,
fǝlas ad t-ǝgrǝwan.
Ǝbbilalan win hanattatnen i naragan-nasan,
fǝlas ǝntanay da a dasan-ihǝnǝttǝt Mǝššina.
Ǝbbilalan win as zaddogan wallan-nasan,
fǝlas ad ǝnǝyan Mǝššina.
Ǝbbilalan win tagginen alxer,
fǝlas a dasan-agu Mǝššina esǝm bararan-net.
Ǝbbilalan win tawadgaznen fǝl igi n awa oɣadan,
fǝlas Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan šin-nasan.
Tǝbbilalam kawanay a rabbadan aytedan, ǝdgâzan-kawan, wǝr t-illa ǝzzǝnǝf n ǝzgǝn a kawan-wǝr-ǝssǝwaran, fǝl ǝddǝlil-in.
Awalla, dawatat, tǝfǝliwǝsam, fǝlas tǝlâm arozan aggotnen daɣ jǝnnawan. Ǝnnǝbitan win dat-wan, da ǝmmǝk wǝdi daɣ as tawadgazan.»

Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Kawanay tesǝmt a tǝmosam y ǝddǝnet. Amaran as imos as tesǝmt ta, ab-as tǝla tembay, mǝni ǝmmǝk was tat-du-za-tǝtǝwǝsuɣǝl tembay-net? Tesǝmt ta, ab-as tǝnfa wala: wǝr tǝhor ar d a din-tǝtǝwǝgǝr sǝdi, a tat-dayyazan aytedan.
Ǝnnur n ǝddǝnet a tǝmosam. Aɣrǝm ikrâsan fǝl afalla n ǝdɣaɣ, wǝr t-illa awedan a tu-wǝr-za-nǝnǝy.
Ǝmmǝk en daɣ a tǝga fǝtǝla: As tǝrɣa, wǝr za tǝtǝwǝggu daw ǝɣǝzu! Kalar ǝtǝwǝgga a za tagu daɣ adag iknan ahaku fǝl ad tǝsǝmmǝlǝwlǝw aytedan kul win ǝhanen ehan.
Ǝmmǝk di daɣ as imǝlǝwlǝwet ǝnnur-nawan, dat aytedan kul, fǝl ad ǝnǝyan aratan olaɣnen win tǝtaggim, awǝy-du sǝr-san awen ad ǝmmâlan tanaya n Abba-nawan di ihan ijǝnnawan.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ad wǝr tǝɣilam assa a d-ǝge y a din-ǝkkǝsaɣ awa iktaban daɣ Ǝttawret, madeɣ Ǝlkǝttaban n Ǝnnǝbitan. Wǝrgeɣ adi a d-ǝkke, kalar assa a d-ǝgeɣ y a tan-assanda.
Ǝggiyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as: Iket ǝllan-tu jǝnnawan d amaḍal, Ǝttawret wǝr t-in-za-tǝgmǝd wala tǝtǝbǝqqet, amaran wala ɣas ǝsakkal wǝr t-in-z-igmǝd iket wǝr inda arat kul wa daɣ-as iktaban.

Awen daɣ a fǝlas awedan wa immǝzrayan wala ɣas alwajib wa ogaran tǝmmǝdrǝyt, omar aytedan s ad agin awen da, awedan wǝdi ǝnta a zʼagǝran eres daɣ Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan. Mišan as imos as ibbirdag awedan y alwajiban win, isasaɣr-en y aytedan, wǝdi ad igrǝw adkul daɣ Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan.
Awalla, ǝmâlaɣ-awan âs as wǝr tǝgem i Mǝššina ǝbǝrdǝg ogaran wa das-ǝgan musanan n Ǝttawret, ǝd Farisaytan, wǝdi wǝr za tǝggǝzam Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan.
Tǝslâm as itiwanna y aljadan-nana daɣ Ǝttawret:
"ad wǝr tagaɣ iman."
As iga awedan iman, ad t-ibǝz ǝššǝriɣa awwaddab.

Nak za ǝnneɣ-awan, awedan kul wa iggaz alham n iyyan, wǝdi ad t-ibǝz ǝššǝriɣa awwaddab. Awedan deɣ kul wa innan y iyyan: "Anafnoz!" Wǝdi ad itǝwǝsǝbdǝd dat Asaggawar wa Zǝwwǝran as itawannu Sanhedrin fǝl ad itǝwǝšrǝɣ, amaran awedan wa innan y iyyan: "Kay amaros!" Wǝdi ǝššǝriɣa-net Jahannama.
Daɣ adi as du-tǝkteɣ as iššak-kay awedan daɣ amazay wa daɣ du-tewaya tǝkutay-nak s adag wa n ǝsǝqqǝd ǝn tǝkutawen,
tayya takutay-nak ǝddi da, tagla har tǝnǝmǝsurǝfa d awedan wǝdi, dǝffǝr adi amaran tǝqqǝla taga takutay-nak.

As kay-issǝwar awedan lahan, takna dǝr-ǝs tarmad iket di ad tǝhâm tarrayt. As wǝr iga adi, awedan wǝdi, ad išǝššiwǝd batu tǝdi ǝlqali. Tǝzzar inkǝr ǝlqali ag-ik daɣ fassan ǝn soji a kay-z-agin daɣ kasaw.
As iga adi amaran ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-ak as wǝr du-za-tǝgmǝdaɣ iket wǝr tǝɣreda arazam n arat kul was kay-ǝwaran ǝrruzmatan-net. Wala tamma iyyadda wǝr din-za-taqqam.
Tǝslâm as itiwanna:
"ad wǝr tagaɣ ǝzzǝna."
Nak za ǝnneɣ-awan awedan kul wa igan daɣ tǝntut asawad daɣ isidaran ǝnǝmǝnsa-net, wǝdi igâ dǝr-ǝs ǝzzǝna daɣ ǝwǝl-net.
Kud šat-nak ta n ǝɣil a tǝbukat a dak-tǝqqǝl ǝssǝbab n igi n abakkad, tǝkǝkkǝreq-qat-du tǝgǝraq-qat-in, id of-ak tǝgmad-kay tǝslǝt-nak iyyadda, y ad tǝtǝwǝgǝr tǝɣǝssa-nak kul daɣ Jahannama.
Amaran kud ǝfus-nak wa n ǝɣil a ibukan a dak-iqqǝl ǝssǝbab n igi abakkad, tǝfrǝsaq-qin tǝgǝraq-q-in, id of-ak tǝgmad-kay tǝslǝt-nak iyyadda, y ad tǝggǝz tǝɣǝssa-nak ketnet Jahannama.»
Igla Ɣaysa iššewal, inn-asan: «Itiwanna deɣ:
"I izammazzayan tantut-net, akfet-tat širawt n ǝmǝzzǝy."
Nak za silakanaɣ-awan as i izammazzayan tantut-net fǝl a wǝr nǝmos igi ǝn meddan, wǝdi ǝsǝssugi a tat-iga ǝzzǝna, amaran as izlaf alǝs iyyan tantut ta tǝmmǝzzayat da, wǝdi ǝzzǝna a iga ǝnta da.
Tǝslâm deɣ as itawanna y aljadan-nana:
"Ad wǝr tǝhhadam fǝl arat, taqqamim wǝr tu-tǝmmozalam. Kalar sabdadat arkawalan win fǝl tǝhadam s esǝm n Ǝmǝli."
Nak za ǝnneɣ-awan, ad wǝr tǝhhadam fǝl arat waliyyan fadda: Gǝr za ǝs jǝnnawan, fǝlas edag n ǝlxǝkum ǝn Mǝššina a mosan,
wala deɣ tǝhǝdam s amaḍal, fǝlas ǝnta a illan daw daran-net, wala deɣ tǝhǝdam ǝs Yerusalam, fǝlas ǝnta a tǝmosat aɣrǝm n Ǝmǝnokal wa Zǝwwǝran, a t-imosan Mǝššina.
Ad wǝr tǝhhadaɣ ǝnta da s aɣaf-nak, fǝlas wǝr tǝfregaɣ ǝsǝmlǝl n anzad-net waliyyan da, wala deɣ ǝsǝkwǝl-net.
Ganniwat ɣas: "Ayew" y awa imosan tidǝt, madeɣ "kala" y awa imosan bahu. Batu a du-tǝššotam fǝl adi kul Aššaytan as du-tǝha.
Tǝslâm as itiwanna:
"I d-ikkasan šat n iyyan a du-tǝtǝwǝkkǝs šat-net ǝnta da, i d-irzan ešen n iyyan a d-itǝwǝrzu ašen-net."
Nak za ǝnneɣ-awan ad wǝr tǝtagazam iman-nawan daɣ amaksan. Kalar as dak-iqqas fǝl ǝmdǝd-nak wa n ǝɣil, takfaq-qu amdǝd-nak wa hadan.
As ira awedan a kay-ibǝz s ǝššǝriɣa fǝl ad igrǝw alɣaššaba-nak, takfaq-qu ǝbǝrnuz-nak da.
As kay-išahhaššal awedan aggay ǝn lalan-net har ǝgim ǝn takkolt, tawǝyaɣ-as-tan har ǝššin gim ǝn takkolt.
I kay-onsayan takfaq-qu, i daɣ-ak igmayan ǝmarwas, a das-tu-wǝr-tǝgdǝla.
Tǝslâm as itiwanna:
"Iru anammaray-nak, tǝgzǝraɣ azangaw-nak."
Nak za ǝnneɣ-awan: Iriwat izǝnga-nawan, ad tǝtaggim šiwatriwen olaɣnen y aytedan win kawan-ǝsasnen,
fǝl ad tǝqqǝlam ǝs tidǝt da bararan n Abba-nawan wa ihan ijǝnnawan. Ǝnta a d-isagmadan tǝfuk-net fǝl aytedan win maksanan ǝd win olaɣnen, isawat akonak-net fǝl win oɣadnen ǝd win nǝmmǝzray.
Kud wǝr tarem âr aytedan win kawan-ǝranen, awak ma imos aroz wa za tǝgrǝwam daɣ awen? Wǝrgeɣ aytedan win zarzamnen takǝsen a ǝmosnen imaksanan da awen daɣ a ǝgan?
As imos as imǝdrayan-nak ɣas a tareɣ tǝsaslamaq-qan, awak ma imos arat immittayan wa tǝgeɣ? Wǝrgeɣ aytedan win wǝr nǝssen Mǝššina da adi daɣ a taggin?
Daɣ adi kawanay, ǝqqǝlat aytedan ǝkmâlnen šilat n Abba-nawan wa ihan ijǝnnawan.»
Igla Ɣaysa iššewal, inn-asan: «Ǝnkǝdat d igi n ǝlɣibada imosan sokni. As wǝr iga adi wǝr za tǝgrǝwam arozan ɣur Abba-nawan wa ihan ijǝnnawan.»

«As tǝtagga takutay y amaddarar, ad wǝr iqqǝl adi arat tǝsinafalala, zun awa taggin ǝlmunafiqan daɣ nan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, ǝd tarrayen, fǝl tara n ad ǝgrǝwan adkul ɣur aytedan. Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as ǝlmunafiqan win di arozan-nasan ǝgrâwan-tan.
Kay amaran, as tǝtagga takutay, ad wǝr issǝn ǝfus-nak wa n zalgat awa itaggu wa n ǝɣil,
fǝl ad tǝqqǝl tǝkutay-nak ǝssir. Abba-nak s ǝnta a ihannayan ǝssiran, a dak-z-irzǝman.»

«As tǝtattaram, ad wǝr tǝtaggim awa taggin ǝlmunafiqan ǝrânen ad tattaran ǝbdadan daɣ nan n ǝlɣibada, ǝd sammanayan, ǝgmâyan s awen a tan-ǝnǝyan aytedan. Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as arozan-nasan ǝgrâwan-tan.

Kay amaran as tǝtagga šiwatriwen, tǝggǝzaɣ daɣ ahan-nak edag wa ogaran ǝnǝmǝggag d aytedan, tǝxfǝlaq-q-in fǝl man-nak, tǝttǝra daɣ ǝssir s Abba-nak id illa ǝddi. Abba-nak s ǝnta a ihannayan ǝssiran, a kay-z-akfin arozan.
As tǝtattaram, ad wǝr tǝtaggam awal aggen tǝgannam arat iyyanda zun awa taggin aytedan win wǝr nǝssen Mǝššina, ǝɣilnen wǝr dasan-z-aslu Mǝššina ar s ad taggin awal aggen.
A tan-wǝr-tattalalam, fǝlas Abba-nawan, issân awas tǝddǝraram da harwa wǝr daɣ-as tu-tǝgmayam.
Tǝwatray da tas ihor a tat-tǝtaggim kawanay:
"Abba-nana wa ihan ijǝnnawan,
Itǝwǝsǝɣmǝret esǝm-nak di zǝddigan,
taset-du Taɣmar-nak.
Tǝtǝwǝmizǝlet tara-nak fǝl amaḍal
s ǝmmǝk was tǝtâwamazal daɣ jǝnnawan.
Akf-anaɣ isudar-nana win azalada;
tǝssurǝfaɣ-ana tadlǝmt ta nǝga
zund ǝmmǝk as nakkanay da
nǝssoraf i win danaɣ-ǝdlamnen.
A dana-wǝr-taga daɣ alɣarar ǝn jarrabatan,
kalar agǝz-ana daɣ Iblis,
[fǝlas taɣmar, ǝd tarna, ǝd tanaya ši-nak har faw.
Amin."»]
«As tǝsurufam y aytedan arak mazalan win dawan-ǝgan, kawanay da a dawan-issurǝf Abba-nawan wa ihan ijǝnnawan.
Mišan as wǝr tǝsurufam y aytedan, wǝdi Abba-nawan wa ihan ijǝnnawan wǝr dawan-z-issurǝf arak mazalan win tǝgam.»

«As tǝzumam ad wǝr tǝsǝnnǝfilǝlam tǝkenzert zun awa taggin ǝlmunafiqan, ǝntanay a samattaynen udmawan-nasan fǝl ad ǝssusǝnan aytedan kul as ǝzuman. Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as aytedan win di, arozan-nasan ǝgrâwan-tan harwa ǝmǝrǝdda.
Kay amaran, as tǝzumaɣ, tǝšširǝdaɣ udǝm-nak, taga alwardi,
fǝl ad wǝr ǝssǝnan aytedan as tǝzumaɣ. Abba-nak ɣas a zʼissǝnan daɣ adi, fǝlas illa ǝddi daɣ ǝssir, ihannay awa itaggin, amaran ǝnta a dak-z-irzǝman.»
«Ad wǝr tǝšadawam tǝgǝrgist daɣ ǝddǝnet, a daq-qat za tǝhlǝk tamaday ǝd tǝnik, razzan deɣ baydagan inan takaran.
Kalar šidǝwat i man-nawan tǝgǝrgist daɣ jǝnnawan, a daq-qat wǝr za tǝhlǝk tamaday za wala tǝnik, wala deɣ assin-tat-in baydagan win razzinen inan takaran.
Fǝlas edag wa tǝha tǝgǝrgist-nak, ǝnta a zʼiggǝz ǝwǝl-nak.»
«Šittawen šilat ǝn fǝtǝla a ǝmosnat i tǝɣǝssa-nak. As imos as šittawen-nak ǝhannaynat s ǝlluɣ, wǝdi taɣǝssa-nak ketnet tǝha ǝnnur.
Mišan as imos as šittawen-nak wǝr ǝhǝnnǝynat s ǝlluɣ, wǝdi taɣǝssa-nak ketnet tǝha šiyyay. Daɣ adi as imos as wala ǝnnur wa ihan taɣǝssa-nak da imos šiyyay, wǝdi ad tǝggǝza šiyyay wǝr nǝmmǝkkan!
Wǝr t-illa i ifrâgan ǝššǝɣǝl y ǝššin muzaran. Wa ɣas ikyad iyyan daɣ-san, iru wa hadan, madeɣ abbardag y iyyan, alku wa hadan. Wǝr tǝfregaɣ ad tǝɣbǝda Mǝššina, tagla deɣ tozâla dǝffǝr ǝddǝnet.»
«Daɣ adi ǝnneɣ-awan a kawan wǝr tǝššǝwǝš tǝmǝddurt, gǝr awa za tatšim, wala awa za tašwim, wala awa za talsim. Iman-nawan wǝrgeɣ ogaran imensewan, taɣǝssa-nawan deɣ togar isǝlsa?

Ǝswǝdat daɣ gǝḍad a taggadnen daɣ alhawa, wǝrmad nabbalan za wǝr tilǝyan, wǝr šidiwan wala daɣ tǝdangawen, mišan issodar-tan Abba-nawan wa ihan ijǝnnawan. Kawanay wǝrgeɣ togaram-tan almaqam sen ɣur Mǝššina?
Mǝni daɣ-wan wa ifragan s aššawaša-net ǝšitǝy ǝn tǝɣrǝst-net ǝs wala ellaf ǝn šat?
Mafel as kawan-tǝššǝwaš talɣa ǝn sǝlsa? Ǝnẓǝrat-in daɣ ǝmmǝk was du-daggalnat tǝjigawen daɣ ǝsuf. Wǝrmad šaqqalnat wala zattinat isǝlsa,
mišan ǝnneɣ-awan, wala Ǝmǝnokal Suliman harkid tǝgǝrgist-net kul, wǝr kala ad ewad wala iyyadda daɣ-asnat daɣ tǝhussay ǝn talassay.
Dad isalsu Mǝššina yel ǝs tǝmǝwit tǝdi, s azalada ibdâd, tufat ad itǝwǝsǝrɣu daɣ tǝjǝngǝrert; manǝmmǝk as kawan-wǝr-z-assalsu, kǝl ǝzǝgzan ǝndǝrran!»
«Daɣ adi ad wǝr tǝššǝwǝšam tǝgannim: "Ma za natšu?" Madeɣ: "Ma za našǝw?" Madeɣ: "Ma za nalsu?"
Aratan win kul aytedan win wǝr nǝssen Mǝššina a ozalnen daɣ agamay-nasan, amaran kawanay Abba-nawan wa ihan ijǝnnawan, issân as tǝddiraram sǝr-san.
Ǝgmǝyat tǝzzar Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina d aqqad dat-ǝs, as iga adi aratan win di kul a kawan-tawǝkfin ǝntanay da.
Daɣ adi a kay-wǝr-iššǝwǝš arat wa d-izayan tufat, fǝlas tufat ad tǝššǝwǝš ǝd tǝmǝɣutar-net. Ǝzǝl kul ila šimǝɣutar-net a das-ǝgdânen.»
Igla Ɣaysa iššewal-asan, inna: «Ad wǝr tannim ark arat s awedan fǝl a sǝr-wan wǝr itǝwǝnnu kawanay da.
Fǝlas ǝmmǝk was tǝxkamam, ǝnta as za tǝtǝwǝxkǝmam kawanay da, amaran tǝsǝkǝt tas tǝkkatam y aytedan, ǝnta as dawan-z-ikǝt Mǝššina.
Mafel tahannaya tezawt ta tǝhat šat n amadray-nak, kay amaran wǝr din-tǝgreɣ šilǝlt ta tǝhat šat ta-nak.
Manǝmmǝk as za tanna y amadray-nak, "ayy-i a dak-ǝkkǝsa tezawt ta daɣ šat-nak", kay amaran šilǝlt a tǝhat šat ta-nak?
Ǝlmunafiq, ǝkkǝs tǝzzar šilǝlt ta tǝhat šat-nak, ǝddi ad za tannaflaya daɣ tazawt ta tǝhat šat n amadray-nak tǝkkǝsaɣ-as-tat!
A din-wǝr-tǝggaraɣ arat zǝddigan madeɣ arat ilân almaqam i maksanan fǝlas wǝr ǝzlayan ǝd dan a kawan-du-milallaynen y a kawan-ǝdǝdan, madeɣ iladayan hallaknen aratan win ǝlanen almaqam.
Ansǝyat Mǝššina, a kawan-akfu; ǝgmǝyat, ad tǝgrǝwam; aɣriwat-tu a dawan-akkawan;
fǝlas i onsayan, ad itǝwǝkfu, i igmayan ad igrǝw, i iɣran deɣ Mǝššina a das-akkawan.
Mǝni daɣ-wan wa daɣ zʼigmǝy barar-net tagǝlla akf-ay tǝhunt?
Wala igmǝy daɣ-as isan akf-ay taššolt?
Dad zammas wala kawanay an nǝllubas da tǝssânam tehakkay n awa olaɣan i bararan-nawan, manǝmmǝk as kawan-wǝr-z-akfu Abba-nawan wa ihan ijǝnnawan awa tu-tonsayam?
Taggiwat y aytedan arat kul was tǝram a dawan-t-agin. Ǝnta da da arat wa ihan ǝššǝriɣa wa n Ǝttawret, d Ǝlkǝttaban n Ǝnnǝbitan.

Ǝggǝzat s ǝmi wa kǝruzan s ǝnta a itawayan ǝs taɣmar ta n Mǝššina! Iket ilwi ig-ay ǝmi wa itawayan s ǝhluk, iket ǝsǝnnǝflǝy tǝg-ay tarrayt ta tǝtawayat s ǝhluk, amaran ǝggǝtan aytedan win as ǝnta as taggazan.
Mišan iket takrazt ig-et ǝmi wa itawayan ǝs tǝmǝddurt, iket deɣ ǝsǝmǝɣitǝr tǝg-ay tarrayt ta tǝtawayat ǝs tǝmǝddurt, amaran wǝr ǝggǝtan aytedan win tan-garrawnen.
Ǝnkǝdat y ǝnnǝbitan win bahu. As kawan-du-tasin ǝmosan zun ayfǝd, mišan ǝs tidǝt iridalan a ǝmosan ǝknanen aššar.
Arat wa du-saxsalan as tan-za-tǝzdǝyam. Awak alɣanab itâwankad-du daɣ tazzayt? Wala itâwankad-du fig daɣ tǝgaroft?
Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as ašǝk isxân a d-itarawan âratăn olaɣnen, amaran ašǝk wǝr nǝsxa itaraw-du win wǝr noleɣ.
Ašǝk isxân wǝr ifreg ara n âratăn wǝr noleɣ wala deɣ ifrag ašǝk wǝr nǝsxa ara n âratăn olaɣnen.
Ašǝk kul wa wǝr nǝtirǝw âratăn olaɣnen, wǝdi ǝtǝwǝxtas a itawaggu, itǝwǝgǝr daɣ tǝmsay.
Daɣ adi illikan as ǝnnǝbitan win bahu awa du-saxsalan as tan-za-tǝzdǝyam.»
«Wǝr igda i di-igannin: "Ǝmǝli, Ǝmǝli!" Wǝr izzogaz awen awedan Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan, kalar kundaba i itamazal ǝs tara n Abba-nin ihân ijǝnnawan.

Ǝzǝl wa ilkaman aytedan aggotnen a di-annin: "Ǝmǝli, Ǝmǝli! Awak wǝrgeɣ esǝm-nak as nǝmal y aytedan isalan win fall-ana du-tǝzazzabbe? Awak wǝrgeɣ ǝnta ǝs nǝstaɣ kǝlǝsuf? Nǝga sǝr-ǝs tǝlmǝɣjujaten aggotnen?"
Ǝddi a dasan-anna: "Wǝr kala a kawan-ǝzdayaɣ. Ugagat-i inǝmmǝzray ǝn Mǝššina!"»
«Daɣ adi awedan kul wa issǝsaman y awal-in wa, immozal-tu, wǝdi iha ǝlmital n alǝs n ǝmǝli ǝn tayttay ikrasan ehan-net fǝl tǝsǝlit.
Iwat akonak, ǝgan ǝngǝytan ǝssohatnen, ǝgarnat-du tǝzǝkwen, ǝstaban y ahan en, mišan wǝr uda fǝlas tǝsǝlit a fǝl ibna.
Amaran awedan kul wa issǝsaman y awal wa ǝge da, iqqim wǝr t-immozal, wǝdi iha ǝlmital n alǝs wǝr nǝla tayttay, ikrasan ehan-net fǝl ǝzazǝl.
Iwat akonak, ǝgan ǝngǝytan ǝssohatnen, ǝgarnat-du tǝzǝkwen, istab awen y ahan wa nad, ibarajjat, ilyam-in ketnet.»
As iɣrad Ɣaysa alfaydaten šin, tǝqqim tamattay isimaklal sǝr-ǝs ǝmmǝk was itaggu ǝsǝssǝɣri-net.
Fǝlas ig-asan ǝsǝssǝɣri n awedan ilân tanaya wǝr ǝlen musanan-nasan win Ǝttawret.
As d-izzǝbbat Ɣaysa adɣaɣ wen, tǝlkâm-as tamattay tagget.
Ihin-in Ihoz-t-idu awedan tǝgrâw tǝwǝrna ǝn kǝtru, issǝjad dat-ǝs, inna: «Ǝmǝli, as tareɣ adi tǝfrâgaɣ a di-tǝzzuzǝyaɣ, izdaga.»
Izzal-in Ɣaysa ǝfus-net, idas-tu inna: «Areɣ adi ǝzzǝy tizdaga!» Amazay wen da daɣ izzay alǝs wen daɣ kǝtru, zǝddig.

Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Ǝnǝy za, ad wǝr tǝmǝla y awedan waliyyan arat wa igan da, amaran aglu tassaknaɣ iman-nak y ǝlimam, taga takutay ta kay-issǝwar ǝššǝriɣa n ǝnnǝbi Musa, ad iqqəl adi y aytedan tǝgǝyya ən təməzzəyt-nak.»
Amazay wa da daɣ in-itaggaz Ɣaysa taɣrǝmt ǝn Kafarnahum, ǝnta daɣ t-in-ikka kabtan iyyan ǝn sojitan n Ǝrrum, onsay-tu,
inn-as: «Ǝmǝli, amaššaɣal-in a din-oyye isrâd daɣ aɣaywan, ibdân, idgâz wǝllen.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Nak iman-in a tu-z-akkin ǝzzuzǝyaq-qu.»
Inn-as kabtan en: «Ǝmǝli, nak wǝr ǝwedaɣ ad tǝggǝzaɣ ehan-in. Annu arat ɣas ad izzǝy amaššaɣal-in.

Ǝssâna daɣ adi fǝlas awedan a ǝmosaɣ a daɣ ǝttafan wiyyad tanat, ǝttâfaq-qat nak iman-in daɣ sojitan win daw-i ǝllanen. As ǝnneɣ y iyyan: "Aglu", ad aglu, as ǝnneɣ y iyyan: "Iyyaw", a di-d-asu. As ǝnneɣ y ǝkli-nin: "agu awa", ad t-agu.»
As isla Ɣaysa y awa inna kabtan en, isammaklal sǝr-ǝs, inna y aytedan win das-ǝlkamnen: «Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as: wǝr ǝnayaɣ awedan waliyyan daɣ Kǝl-Israyil igân ǝzǝgzan ewâdan wa iga alǝs a.»
«Ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as aytedan aggotnen a d-ǝfǝlan dǝnnǝg d ataram, nǝɣimin d Ibrahim, d Isǝhaq, ǝd Yaqub, ǝdrǝwan dǝr-san imǝgura daɣ Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan.
Mišan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud aggotnen s ǝntanay as tǝtawasamatag Taɣmar ta, win di a din-tǝwǝbdǝɣan sǝdi daɣ šiyyay, ad hallin ǝddadan idǝdwan-nasan fǝl tǝmagraz.»
Amaran inna Ɣaysa i kabtan wa nad: «Ǝqqǝl aɣaywan-nak, aget-ak Mǝššina arat wa daɣ-as tǝgmaya fǝl ǝzǝgzan-nak.» Tǝzzar izzay amaššaɣal ǝn kabtan wen daɣ amazay wen da.
Dǝffǝr adi ikka Ɣaysa ehan ǝn Butros. Inay tǝdaggalt ǝn Butros tǝsrâd, tǝnnid,
idas ǝfus-net, təwat fall-as tanaday, tǝnkar-du a tu-tǝsimǝgurit.
As tuda tǝfuk, ǝmmewayan-as-du aytedan aggotnen ǝssiranan kǝlǝsuf. Iɣrad Ɣaysa asataɣ ǝn kǝlǝsuf winad ǝs tǝfert iyyadda. Izzozay deɣ imiranan kul win ǝllanen den.
Ǝmmǝk wen daɣ as inda awal wa d-iga Ǝmǝli ǝs tarrayt n ǝnnǝbi Isayas a daɣ innâ: «Ǝnta a idkalan ǝlɣiban-nana, idkal fǝl iri-net šiwǝrnawen-nana.»
As inay Ɣaysa tamattay tǝɣilayɣalay-tu, omar inǝttulab-net s a dǝr-ǝs idawan ǝɣrǝsan ǝs tagadamayt ta hadat n agaraw.
Ikk-ay-du ǝmusan n Ǝttawret iyyan inn-as: «Ǝššex, a dak-ǝlkǝmaɣ s adag kul wa tǝkkeɣ.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Izagazan ǝlân enwan, igǝḍad deɣ ǝlân šisǝllula, mišan nak Ag Aggadǝm wǝr ǝleɣ wala edag a daɣ ǝssǝnsaɣ eɣaf-in.»
Inn-as ǝnalkim-net iyyan: «Ǝmǝli, akf-i turagat n ad agla har din-ǝnbǝlaɣ abba-nin tǝzzar.»
Mišan inn-as Ɣaysa: «Ǝlkǝm-i tayyaɣ inǝmmǝttan ad ǝnbǝlan inǝmmǝttan-nasan.»
Dǝffǝr adi iggaz Ɣaysa aɣlal n aman, ǝnta ǝd nǝttulab-net, ǝglan.
Wala a ihogan tǝgar-du tazafa labasat fǝl agaraw, ad ǝggatnat tǝnazzamaren aɣlal. As itaggu awen Ɣaysa ǝnta insâ.
Ǝhozan-t-in nǝttulab-net, a tu-sankaran daɣ etǝs gannin-as: «Ǝmǝli, agǝz-ana! Nakkanay nǝjwâr nǝhlâk!»
Inn-asan: «Mafel tǝh-iwan tasa togdat d awa, kǝl ǝzǝgzan irkaman?» Inkar-du Ɣaysa, isannarɣam y aḍu d agaraw, ǝɣradan adrur d ǝsǝssǝmmi.
Arat wa iqqan iɣafawan-nasan, ad gannin: «Ma imos wa daɣ awedan, as wala aḍu d agaraw da ittâf daɣ-san tanat.»

As iwar Ɣaysa aganna wa hadan n agaraw, daɣ akal ǝn Gadaratan, ǝssǝlkadan-as-du ǝššin aytedan ǝssiranan kǝlǝsuf, ǝgmadan-du sǝr-ǝs izǝkwan. Aytedan win awa ǝgan daɣ tallabǝst, wǝr t-illa i ihalan a d-akǝy daɣ adag wen.
Saɣaren-as-du gannin: «Ma daɣ-na tare, Barar ǝn Mǝššina? Awak assa du-tǝge y a dana-tǝsǝkkǝrure da wǝr du-tewed tǝmastant?»
Ǝnta illât-tu ǝsǝgǝn aggen ǝn ladayan ǝdânnen daɣ igǝg-nasan dên,
onsayan kǝlǝsuf win Ɣaysa ǝnnan-as: «As dana-tǝstaɣa, tǝssukaɣ-anaɣ ǝsǝgǝn en ǝn ladayan en.»

Inn-asan: «Aglat!» Tǝzzar ǝgmadan kǝlǝsuf meddan win ǝššin en, ǝkkan iladayan ǝggazan-tan. Amazay wen da daɣ d-ǝwafan ladayan win den kul fǝl azadaga ǝn təkašwart, ɣartattawan ad tifataqqen daɣ agaraw, ǝlammazan-tan aman.
Tǝzzar ozalan madanan ǝn ladayan winad s ǝɣrǝm, ǝssoɣalan arat kul wa igan den y aytedan, d awa igan fǝl meddan win ǝssǝranan kǝlǝsuf en.
Den daɣ a d-ǝɣradan kǝl ǝɣrǝm wen agamad, ǝssǝlkadan-du i Ɣaysa, onsayan-tu ad igmǝd akal-nasan.
Tǝzzar iggaz Ɣaysa aɣlal n aman, iɣras agaraw, ikka taɣrǝmt-net Kafarnahum.
Ewayan-as-du aytedan anabdon ihân tǝssut-net. As inay Ɣaysa ǝzǝgzan-nasan, inna y anabdon: «A kay wǝr iššǝwǝš wala barar-in! Ibakkadan-nak tiwasarafan-ak!»
Tǝzzar ǝnnan arat daɣ musanan n Ǝttawret wiyyad daɣ man-nasan: «Alǝs wa ǝmadraw a itaggu!»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa issânan daɣ awa samadranan: «Mafel tǝtaggim arak medranan win daɣ wallan-nawan?
Awak ma ogaran tǝrɣǝsay gǝr i innan: "Ibakkadan-nak tiwasarafan-ak", meɣ ak i innan: "Ǝbdǝd jǝwǝnkǝt?"
Amaran areɣ ad tǝssǝnam as nak Ag Aggadǝm, ǝleɣ daɣ ǝddǝnet tanaya a di-tǝšišawadat ad ǝssurǝfa y awedan ibakkadan-net.» Tǝzzar inna Ɣaysa y anabdon: «Ǝbdǝd, tǝdkǝla tǝssut-nak takkaɣ aɣaywan-nak.»
Ibdad alǝs wen ikka aɣaywan-net.
As ǝnayat tamattiwen arat wen, tǝɣrad-tanat tasa iguz, ad tagginat tǝmmalen i Mǝššina a ikfan tarna togdat d awen y aggadǝm.
Ifal Ɣaysa edag wen, illam-du dagma n alǝs iyyan igân esǝm Matta, iqqiman daɣ adag wa n ǝzǝrzǝm n ǝzrǝf wa n takǝs, inn-as: «Ǝlkǝm-i!» Tǝzzar ibdad Matta ilkam-as.
Ǝzǝl iyyan, iha Ɣaysa aɣaywan ǝn Matta, ǝnta d aytedan aggotnen ǝn nǝzzǝrzam ǝn takǝsen ǝd nasbakkadan, idrâw dǝr-san imensewan ǝnta ǝd nǝttulab-net.
Ǝnayan Farisaytan arat wa, ǝnnan i nǝttulab-net: «Mafel idrâw ǝššex-nawan ǝd nǝzzǝrzam ǝn takǝsen ǝd nasbakkadan?»
Isl-asan Ɣaysa, inna: «Aytedan win wǝr nǝla ǝɣǝli, wǝr ǝddǝraran s anasmagal, imiranan a sǝr-ǝs ǝddǝrarnen.

Agliwat tǝssǝnam almaɣna ǝn batu ta iga Mǝššina as inna: "Tǝhanint a are, wǝrgeɣ šikutawen." Wǝr d-oseɣ fǝl a d-aɣraɣ aytedan win ɣur iga as oɣâdan, kalar inasbakkadan as d-ǝmmozala y a tan-d-aɣra ǝqqǝlan inalkiman-in.»
Tǝzzar ǝkkan-in nǝttulab ǝn Yaxya Ɣaysa ǝnnan-as: «Mafel nakkanay ǝd Farisaytan nǝtuzam faw, amaran kay inǝttulab-nak wǝr tuzaman?»
Ijjǝwwab-asan Ɣaysa inn-asan: «Ak ilagatan a ɣur illa amazlay zakanzaran? Mišan ǝlkâman adan a ɣur-san zʼammadkal ǝmazlay: ǝddi amaran ad zʼuzaman.
Wǝr t-illa i zʼiwǝtan šikǝst taynayat daɣ tabdoq waššarat, fǝlas ǝddi šikǝst ta din-tǝttǝwatat, a du-tǝzǝkkǝwǝnzǝz tabdoq ta waššarat, tǝzzar tǝššit-as azarru wǝllen.

Wǝr t-illa deɣ i zʼagin esmad n alɣanab aynayan daɣ gǝdad, fǝlas as iga adi, ad abbaqqen gǝdad win, tǝzzar affatu daɣ esmad ǝd gǝdad. Kalar arat wa ihoran, ad itǝwǝggu esmad wa aynayan daɣ bǝyaɣ aynaynen, ǝmmǝk wǝdi daɣ as zʼiɣlǝs esmad harkid bǝyaɣ.»
Iššewal-asan Ɣaysa den daɣ as d-osa iyyan daɣ muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, issǝjad dat-ǝs, inn-as: «Tǝbarart-in a aba ǝmǝrǝdda, mišan ya, ǝssanaɣ âs as du-tose tǝssǝwǝraq-qat ǝfus-nak, a du-tǝnkǝr.»
Tǝzzar inkar-du Ɣaysa, ilkam-as, ǝddewan dǝr-ǝs nǝttulab-net.
Tǝllat-tu tǝntut tǝgat maraw elan d ǝššin igammad-tat ǝzni, tǝhoz-du Ɣaysa sa sǝr tǝɣǝrden, tǝdas tǝbǝnik ǝn tǝkadkat-net,
fǝlas tǝnna a tǝga daɣ man-net: «Igda ɣas ad ǝdǝsa tǝkadkat-net, ad ǝzzǝya.»
Imalallay-in Ɣaysa inay-tat, inn-as: «Ad wǝr tǝɣšǝda tǝbarart-in! Ǝzǝgzan-nam sǝr-i a kam-izzozayan.» Amazay wen da daɣ tǝzzay tǝntut ten.
Dǝffǝr awen ikka Ɣaysa ehan n ǝmuzar ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud wanad. As din-ewad Ɣaysa, inay imawatan ǝn tǝsǝnsaɣ šin tǝfǝyyawt, d aytedan nijarwaynen, ǝgân tǝrmuq.
Inna: «Awedan kul irdǝɣet! Tǝbarart di wǝr tat-aba, etǝs ɣas a tǝga!» Tǝzzar ǝgan-tu ajjab.
As tǝtawasardaɣ tamattay ten, iggaz Ɣaysa ehan wa tǝha tǝbarart ta aba, obaz ǝfus-net, issǝnkar-tat-du.
Wazawazan salan n awa igan den, daɣ akal ketnet.
As ifal Ɣaysa edag wen, ǝlkâman-as ǝššin mǝddǝrɣal, saɣaren gannin: «Ya Ag ǝnnǝbi Dawǝd! Hǝnǝttǝt-ana!»
As din-ewad aɣaywan, iggaz ehan, ǝhozan-t-in mǝddǝrɣal win den, inn-asan: «Tǝzzigzanam as ǝfragaɣ igi n arat wa tǝram ǝddi?» Ǝnnan-as: «Awalla, Ǝmǝli.»
Tǝzzar idas šittawen-nasan, igannu: «Itǝwǝggiwet-awan arat wa inamannakan d ǝzǝgzan-nawan.»
Den daɣ ad ǝgrawan asawad-nasan. Ig-asan Ɣaysa tarɣǝmt tǝssohet, inn-asan: «Ǝnkǝdat y ad issǝn a imosan awedan daɣ awa dawan-ǝge da.»
Mišan as ǝglan, ǝzǝwwazawazan isalan-net daɣ akal ketnet.
Ǝfalan Ɣaysa ɣas immeway-du sǝr-ǝs awedan as immidad ǝmi-net, id aggǝsuf a t-izdaɣan.
Ikkas Ɣaysa aggǝsuf wen ɣas, iggaz awedan was immǝdad ǝmi-net den šin awal. Isimaklal awen ǝs tamattay, ad tǝgannu: «Arat wa wǝr kala tǝtawanay tulat-net daɣ Israyil!»
Farisaytan amaran ǝntanay gannin: «Ǝmǝnokal ǝn kǝlǝsuf a t-ikfan fǝrregat n ikus ǝn kǝlǝsuf daɣ aytedan.»

Illil Ɣaysa iɣǝrman ǝd tǝɣarmaten kul, isasaɣru daɣ nan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, itaggu isalan n Ǝlinjil imosan isalan ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina, izuzǝy deɣ aytedan daɣ ǝzzǝnǝfan kul ǝn tǝwǝrnawen d ǝlɣiban.
As inay tamattay, tǝggaz-tu tǝhanint-net, fǝlas arkanay a ǝnnayan, tiwayyan ǝd man-nasan, ǝmosan zun ayfǝd wǝr nǝla amadan.
Tǝzzar inna i nǝttulab-net: «Ɣarat tǝggǝt, mišan wǝr ǝggǝtan maššaɣalan win tat-z-alǝynen.
Daɣ adi ǝttǝrat s esǝm ǝn mǝššis ǝn ɣarat ta, a d-assaglu imaššaɣalan a tat-olaynen.»
Iɣra-du Ɣaysa ǝs man-net inǝttulab-net win maraw d ǝššin, ikf-en tarna n ikus ǝn kǝlǝsuf daɣ aytedan, d ǝzuzǝy n a tǝqqal tǝwǝrna, d a iqqal ǝlɣib.
Ǝntanay da esmawan ǝn nǝmmuzal win maraw d ǝššin: Wa azzaran esǝm-net Simɣon, itawann-as Butros, d Andrawǝs wa n amadray-net, ǝd Yaqub wa n ag Zabaday, ǝd Yaxya wa n amadray-net,
ǝd Filibus, ǝd Bartulamawǝs, ǝd Tuma, ǝd Matta wa izarzaman takǝsen, ǝd Yaqub wa n ag Alfay, ǝd Tadday,
ǝd Simɣon was itawannu wa Isaggatakken, ǝd Yahuza was itawannu Isxarǝyuti s ǝnta a zʼagin Ɣaysa daɣ fassan.
Ǝntanay da da maraw nǝttulab d ǝššin win izammazal Ɣaysa dǝffǝr as tan-omâr inn-asan: «Ad wǝr tǝtakkim aytedan win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, wala deɣ tǝggǝzam aɣrǝm waliyyan ǝn Kǝl-Samarǝya.
Kalar akkiwat Kǝl-Israyil, win ǝmosnen zun ayfǝd ǝssiggalnen.
Agliwat a dasan-tǝtaggim isalan n âs Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan tǝhôz-du.
Zuzǝyat imiranan, a du-tǝsankaram inǝmmǝttan, tǝzzuzǝyam aytedan win igraw kǝtru, tǝzzǝzdǝgam-tan, ad tǝtâkkasam kǝlǝsuf daɣ aytedan. Bannan as tǝtawakfam, daɣ adi kawanay da hakkiwat bannan.
Ad wǝr tǝtawayam urǝɣ, wala azrǝf, wala deɣ a tǝqqǝl tafelt daɣ nǝfdan-nawan,

wala deɣ aɣrǝg daɣ ǝšikǝl-nawan, wala tǝkadkat ta n sanatat, wala tǝsǝsǝlt ta n sanatat, wala tallaq. Ǝssǝnat as edag tosam ad tǝtǝwǝsǝmǝgurem fǝlas imaššaɣalan-in a tǝmosam, amaran amaššaɣal kul ila alxaq n ad igrǝw a itša.
As du-tǝggazam aɣrǝm, madeɣ taɣrǝmt, tǝgmǝyam awedan wa inahaggan d a ɣur-ǝs tǝssǝgǝnam, taqqamim ɣur awedan wǝdi da har assaɣa a daɣ tǝgmadam aɣrǝm wǝdi.
As du-tǝggazam ehan tannim: "Alxer fall-awan!"

Kud aytedan n ahan wǝdi nihaggan d a ɣur-san tǝssǝgǝnam, wǝdi tǝwatray n alxer ta dasan-tǝgam a fall-asan tǝqbǝl, mišan as wǝr nahaggan d a ɣur-san tǝssǝganam, wǝdi tǝwatray ten wǝr za tǝqbel fall-asan.
As wǝr tǝtawaqbalam, wǝr itawasasam deɣ i batu-nawan daɣ ǝɣrǝm wǝdi, made daɣ aɣaywan wǝdi, tǝgmadam-tu, tabbakbakam-in ǝgodrar-net wa iwaran idaran-nawan.
Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as, ǝzǝl wa n tabadday, aytedan n ǝɣrǝm wǝdi, ad agin alɣazab ogaran wa zʼagin win amaḍal ǝn Sǝdom ǝd Gamora.»
«Ǝssǝnat as zimazalaq-qawan tǝmosam zun ayfǝd ǝhânen ammas ǝn ridalan, daɣ adi iliwat tayttay tagim ǝnnǝyat zun awa tagginat taššolen, talim ǝd tǝdǝbren a wǝr iwer a imosan lahan.
Ǝnkǝdat y aytedan, fǝlas a kawan-ǝssǝbdǝdan dat saggawaran n ǝššǝriɣa, a kawan-ǝggatan ǝs lǝkkad daɣ nan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.
Ad tǝtǝwǝsǝbdǝdam dat naxkiman ǝd mǝnokalan fǝlas kawan-iwar esǝm-in, tǝqqǝlam šiggǝyyawen-in y-asan ǝntanay d aytedan win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.
Mišan assaɣa wad za tǝtǝwǝggim daɣ fassan, a kawan-wǝr-iššǝwǝš ǝmmǝk was za tǝššiwǝlam, wala deɣ awa za tannim, fǝlas arat wa za tannim a fall-awan d-azzabbat daɣ amazay wa da daɣ tǝram tǝnna-net,
id wǝrge kawanay a zʼiššǝwǝlnen, kalar Infas wa Zǝddigan n Abba-nawan, a daɣ-wan išawalan.
Ad sǝttǝrmǝsan aytedan imǝdrayan-nasan sǝssugin iman-nasan, sǝttǝrmasan abbatan bararan-nasan sǝssugin iman-nasan, affallagan bararan fǝl marwan-nasan sǝssugin iman-nasan.
Awedan kul a kawan-igzǝr fǝlas kawan-iwar esǝm-in, mišan wa daɣ-wan izmaran har tǝzǝrǝst, wǝdi ad iɣlǝs.
As tǝtawasasam daɣ ǝɣrǝm taddarragam s iyyan. Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as wǝr du-za-tǝɣrǝdam iɣǝrman n Israyil harwa da as du-z-ǝqqǝla nak Ag Aggadǝm.»
«Attalami wǝr oger ǝššex-net, wala deɣ ogar ǝkli mǝššis.
Igda y attalami ad agdu d ǝššex-net, akli deɣ igd-as ad agdu ǝd mǝššis. Dad zamas ǝmuzar n aɣaywan ǝgan-as esǝm Aššaytan ǝn Baɣalzabul, manǝmmǝk as wǝr zʼagin arak batuten i kǝl aɣaywan-net?»
«Daɣ adi a tan-wǝr-tiksadam. Arat kul wa iɣbaran ad itǝwǝsǝnǝfilǝl, amaran ǝssir kul ad affaggu.
Arat wa dawan-ǝnne daɣ šiyyay, anniwat-tu ezal a mallan. Amaran arat kul wa dawan-itawasataktakan anniwat-tu s afalla.
Ad wǝr tiksadam win naqqinen taɣǝssa n awedan ɣas, amaran wǝr ǝfregan aɣšud ǝn wala i man-net. Kalar iksadat Mǝššina a ifragan ahluk ǝn tǝɣǝssa harkid man, aggadl-en daɣ Jahannama.
Awak wǝrgeɣ ǝššin gǝḍad tefelt iyyadda a nazzan? Dǝr iga awen da za, wǝr tan-iha i zʼǝgmǝdan man ar ǝs turagat n Abba-nawan Mǝššina.
Kawanay amaran wala anzadan ǝn ɣafawan-nawan da kul ǝḍḍunan.
Daɣ adi ad wǝr tiksadam wala, fǝlas ɣur Mǝššina togaram igǝḍad ǝlqimat!»
«Awedan kul wa iggǝyyen dat aytedan as nak a t-ilan, wǝdi nak da a fall-as aggayyeɣ dat Abba-nin ihan ijǝnnawan.
Mišan wa di-inkuran dat aytedan, wǝdi nak da ad t-unkaraɣ dat Abba-nin ihan ijǝnnawan.»
«Ad wǝr tǝɣilam assa a d-ǝgeɣ ewâya-du alxer s ǝddǝnet: kala kala wǝr d-ewayaɣ alxer, ǝmǝgǝr a d-ewaya.
Ose-du y ad zǝnnǝmǝzrǝyaɣ alǝs d abba-net, zǝnnǝmǝzrǝya tǝbarart d anna-net, zǝnnǝmǝzrǝya deɣ tǝdaggalt ǝd tǝntut ǝn barar-net,
ǝqqǝlan kǝl aɣaywan n awedan izǝnga-net.
I igan y abba-net madeɣ anna-net tara togarat ta di-iga, wǝdi wǝr ihor ǝd tišit n ǝnalkim-in. I igan i barar-net madeɣ tǝbarart-net tara togarat ta di-iga, wǝdi wǝr ihor ǝd tišit n ǝnalkim-in.
I wǝr nǝdkel tǝgǝttawt-net, agu imateran-net, ilkǝm-i, wǝdi wǝr ihor ǝd tišit n ǝnalkim-in.
Awedan wa wǝr nǝkǝttǝw ar iman-net daɣ ǝddǝnet ta, wǝdi ad affatu daɣ alaxirat. Amaran wa iqbalan ad isaffatu iman-net daɣ ǝddǝnet ta fǝl ǝddǝlil-in, wǝdi a tan-igrǝw.»
«I dawan-igan isǝxlak, wǝdi nak as tan-iga, amaran i di-tan-igan, wǝdi wa di-d-izammazalan as tan-iga.

I igan isǝxlak y ǝnnǝbi ǝn Mǝššina fǝl tišit-net ǝnnǝbi, wǝdi ad igrǝw arozan win igarraw ǝnnǝbi. Amaran i igan isǝxlak y alɣadil ǝn Mǝššina, fǝl ǝddǝlil ǝn tǝlɣudǝla-net, wǝdi ad igrǝw arozan win igarraw alɣadil.
Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as, i iššǝšwan wala ablu n aman sammodnen y iyyan daɣ nalkiman-in win ogarnen tǝmmǝdrǝyt, fǝlas imos ǝnalkim-in, wǝdi illikan as ad igrǝw arozan-net.»
As iɣrad Ɣaysa ammar ǝn nǝttulab-net win maraw d ǝššin, ifal edag wen, ad isasaɣru itaggu tǝlxutbat daɣ ɣǝrman win ǝhanen akal wen.
Yaxya wa isalmaɣan aytedan daɣ aman, iha kasaw as isla awa itaggu Ǝlmǝsix, izammazal-du sǝr-ǝs arat daɣ attalamitan-net,
y ad t-ǝssǝstǝnan annin-as: «Ak kay a imosan was nǝqqǝl y a d-asu, meɣ ak ad nǝqqǝl y iyyan?»
Ijjǝwwab-asan Ɣaysa inn-asan: «Ǝqqǝlat Yaxya tǝssuɣǝlam-as awas tǝsallim, d awa tǝhannayam, tannim-as:
Imǝddǝrɣal ǝhannayan, inǝbdan jawanken, aytedan win igraw kǝtru ǝzzayan zaddogan, imzagan ǝgrawan tesalay, inǝmmǝttan nakkaran-du daɣ tǝmattant, šilǝqqawen deɣ sallanat y Ǝlinjil.
Ibbilal awedan wa wǝr igmed ǝzǝgzan-net fǝlas wǝr iga aššak daɣ awa ǝmosa.»
As ǝglan attalamitan ǝn Yaxya, issǝnta Ɣaysa amagrad i tamattay daɣ batu ǝn Yaxya, inn-asan: «Ma imos arat was tǝkkam ǝsuf y a tu-tǝnǝyam? Awak telant isiwǝliwil aḍu? Kala!
Daɣ adi ma imos wa tǝkkam y a t-id-tǝnǝyam? Awak alǝs ilsân tabdoq tǝknat šihussay? Kala! Ǝnǝyat za, aytedan win ǝqqannen šibǝddaɣ šin hossaynen, win di inan ǝn mǝnokalan a ǝhan.
Adi za ma tǝkkam y a t-id-tǝnǝyam? Awak ǝnnǝbi? Wǝllen zʼâs ǝnnǝbi. Amaran Yaxya ogar tišit n ǝnnǝbi fadda.
Fǝlas Yaxya ǝnta a fǝl ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban:
"Ǝnǝy za nak a dat-ǝk assaglaɣ anammazul-in a zʼaknin tarrayt-nak."
Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as wǝr kala a d-ihǝw awedan ogaran Yaxya wa isalmaɣan daɣ aman. Dǝr iga awen da wala ɣas wa ogaran tǝmmǝdrǝyt daɣ Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan, da ogar Yaxya.
A d-obazan ɣur adan win daɣ itaggu Yaxya wa isalmaɣan daɣ aman tǝlxutbat, har harwa da, Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan tǝmiqqas ǝd tallabǝst tǝssohet, gammayan kǝl ǝššur d abbaz-net.
Amaran Ǝlkǝttaban n Ǝnnǝbitan kul d Ǝttawret, ǝmâlan Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina, har azzaman ǝn Yaxya.
Kud tǝqbâlam awa dawan-ǝnneɣ ǝddi, wǝdi ǝssǝnat as Yaxya, ǝnta a imosan Ilyas was ittǝmal assa-net.
Wa isallin, issǝsǝmet!»
«Mas zʼammattalaɣ aytedan n azzaman win nǝha da? Olân ǝd bararan ǝqqimnen daɣ ǝssuk, saɣaren i midawan-nasan,
gannin-asan: Nǝwat-awan tende, mišan wǝr tǝweɣam! Nǝg-awan isakkan ǝn tǝfǝyyawt, mišan wǝr tǝlem!
Ǝnneɣ-awan adi fǝlas Yaxya osa-du, wǝrmad itattu za wǝr isǝssu, tǝzzar ǝnnan aytedan: Aljayn a t-izdaɣan.

Amaran, nak Ag Aggadǝm, ose-du ǝtatta ǝsassa, mišan ǝnnan aytedan: "Ǝnawat alǝs wen n amawwalay en, isassin esmad s igǝt, imos ǝmidi ǝn nabazan ǝn takǝsen d ark aytedan!" Masnat ta du-tǝfalat Mǝššina amaran, imazalan n aytedan win ǝhanen tarrayt ta n Mǝššina a sataddinen aqqad-net.»
Tǝzzar issoɣal Ɣaysa tǝgna labasat i ɣǝrman win daɣ ǝganat taššam ǝn tǝlmǝɣjujaten, id tǝtubt a wǝr ǝgen.

Inna: «Iket alɣazab iqqâl-awan kǝl-aɣrǝm ǝn Koradzin! Iket alɣazab iqqâl-awan kǝl-ǝɣrǝm ǝn Betsayda! Fǝlas tǝlmǝɣjujaten šin ɣur-wan ǝganen ǝnnar ǝgânat daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Tir ǝd wa n Sidon, wǝdi irǝw as ǝqqanan isǝlsa ǝn bǝhu ǝqqiman daɣ eẓǝd, imos awen ǝsǝnnǝfilǝl n as ǝhdăn.
Awen daɣ a fǝlas ǝnneɣ-awan: Alɣazab wa za tagim ǝzǝl wa n tabadday ad agǝr wa zʼagin aytedan n ǝɣrǝm ǝn Tir ǝd wa n Sidon.

Kawanay aytedan n ǝɣrǝm wa n Kafarnahum, adis ad tammadkalam s aljannat? Kalar Jahannama a daɣ za tǝtǝwǝgaram, fǝlas tǝlmǝɣjujaten šin ɣur-wan ǝganen âs ǝnnar ǝgânat daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Sǝdom, wǝdi har azalada ill-ay.
Awen daɣ a fǝlas ǝnneɣ-awan: Alɣazab wa za tagim ǝzǝl wa n tabadday ad agǝr wa zʼagin aytedan n akal ǝn Sǝdom.»
Igla Ɣaysa iššêwal inna: «Ǝgeɣ-ak tǝmmalen ya Abba, Ǝmǝli ǝn jǝnnawan d amaḍal fǝl aɣabar wa tǝgeɣ aratan win i musanan, ǝd malan ǝn tayttay, tǝsannafalalaq-qan y aytedan win wǝr nǝzlay ǝd bararan;
id adi da a imosan agna-nak ya Abba!»
«Arat kul ig-ay Abba-nin daɣ ǝfus-in, wǝr t-illa i issanan awa ǝmosa ar Abba, wǝr t-illa deɣ i issanan awa imos Abba ar nak an Barar-net d awedan was areɣ a das-tu-sǝnnǝfilǝla.
Akkiwat-i-du ketnawan win ǝddaznen, ewayan ǝzuk, a kawan-akfa tǝsanfawt.
Bardagat-i tǝlkamam i tara-nin, tabǝzam fall-i masnat, id nak mǝššis ǝn talmat a mosa, ǝwǝl-in deɣ wǝr t-iha zazwar ǝn man. Ǝddi ad za tǝgrǝwam tǝsanfawt i man-nawan,
fǝlas lǝkkum i tara-nin isinaflay, ǝgǝggi-nin deɣ i fǝsusan.»
Azzaman en da, ǝzǝl iyyan ǝn tǝsanfawt ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, issiwal Ɣaysa šiwǝgas n alkama ǝnta ǝd nǝttulab-net. Iggaz gǝlǝk inǝttulab-net, a du-rassaban šiɣaɣanen, tattin-tanat.
As ǝnayan Farisaytan awen, ǝnnan i Ɣaysa: «Ǝnǝy! Inǝttulab-nak taggin arat xarâman daɣ ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ak teɣaray a wǝr tǝgem awa iga ǝnnǝbi Dawǝd assaɣa wad t-iggaz gǝlǝk, ǝnta ǝd midawan-net?

Awak wǝrgeɣ iguz a ǝgan ehan ǝn Mǝššina, ǝtšan šigǝlwen šin ǝmosnen takutay tǝskâtat i Mǝššina, imos awen arat fall-asan xaraman? Šigǝlwen šin den ilimaman ɣas as tǝxalal tattay-nasnat. Awak teɣaray a wǝr tǝgem adi?

Meɣ ak teɣaray a wǝr tǝgem daɣ Ǝttawret as ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt, ilimaman wǝr ǝssǝfraran ǝššǝrǝdan n ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt id ǝzǝl wǝdi šaqqalan daɣ Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, mišan wǝr fall-asan imos awen lahan?
Ǝggǝyeɣ-awan as wa illan da, ogar Ehan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada.
Ǝnnar tǝgrâm almaɣna ǝn batu ta tǝnnat: "Nak tǝhanint a areɣ, wǝrge takutay." Wǝdi wǝr za tǝbǝzam s ǝššǝriɣa aytedan wǝr iwer lahan.
Ǝnneɣ-awan adi fǝlas nak Ag Aggadǝm a ixkaman fǝl ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt.»
Ifal Ɣaysa edag wen, ikka ehan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud n ǝɣrǝm wen da.
Ehan wen ih-ay alǝs as immût ǝfus-net. Ǝnnan Farisaytan i Ɣaysa: «Ak xalal ǝzuzǝy n awedan daɣ ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt?» Arat wen imos tǝnagmayt a das-ǝgân fǝl ad t-ǝbǝzan s ǝššǝriɣa.
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Mǝni daɣ-wan wa zʼilân tilay iyyadda, amaran tǝqqǝl anu daɣ ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt, aqqam wǝr daɣ-as tat-d-ikkes?
Awedan za, ogar tilay almaqam wǝllen! Daɣ adi xalal igi ǝn tǝnfa y awedan daɣ ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt.»
Tǝzzar inna Ɣaysa y alǝs wa: «Ǝzzǝl ǝfus-nak.» Izzal-tu, izzay, ola ǝd wa hadan.
Ǝglan Farisaytan, ad timǝšǝwwiran fǝl tǝmǝwit tas zʼagin iman ǝn Ɣaysa.
As isla Ɣaysa awen, igmad edag wen. Tǝlkam-as tamattay tǝgget. Izzozay imiranan kul.
Mišan irɣam-asan fǝl amel y awedan waliyyan awa imos.
Arat wen iga fǝl ad andu awal wa iga ǝnnǝbi Isayas as inna:
Ǝnta da ǝnaɣbid-in wa sannafrana, s ǝnta a ǝkneɣ tara, isifalawas iman-in. A fall-as du-zǝzzǝbbe Infas-in di Zǝddigan, ad immal i tǝmattiwen n ǝddǝnet kul ǝššǝriɣa wa-nin.
Wǝr zʼammastan d awedan waliyyan, za wǝr fall-as zʼisǝɣǝrǝt, wala aslin-as aytedan išawal daɣ tarrayen.
Wǝr zʼarzu alawag ǝn telant illigwen, za wǝr zʼanɣu fǝtǝla tǝbukat i tǝmattant; almaɣna as wǝr zʼagu tǝkma waliyyat i nǝrkam. Awen daɣ a zʼitaggu iket wǝr issǝbdad ǝššǝriɣa;
aginat daɣ-as tamattiwen n ǝddǝnet kul attama-nasnat.
Tǝzzar immeway-du alǝs iyyan ǝs Ɣaysa, as immidad ǝmi-net, imos deɣ ǝmǝdderɣǝl, fǝlas aggǝsuf a t-izdaɣan. Izzozay Ɣaysa alǝs wen, iššewal iswad deɣ.
Isimaklal awen wǝllen ǝs tamattay ketnet, ad tǝgannu: «Ma iqqal ak Ag ǝnnǝbi Dawǝd wa ǝttǝmalan awa?»
Mišan as ǝslan Farisaytan y awen, ǝnnan: «Alǝs en Aššaytan Baɣalzabul wa n ǝmǝnokal ǝn kǝlǝsuf a t-ikfan fǝrregat n ikus ǝn kǝlǝsuf daɣ aytedan.»

Mišan ya issan Ɣaysa daɣ awa samadranan, inn-asan: «Taɣmar kul tas ǝmmǝgaran mǝssawǝs gar-essan, tǝdi ǝbǝrǝjji a za tagu. Wǝr t-illa ǝɣrǝm, wala deɣ aɣaywan, as zʼammazrayan mǝssawǝs, aqqam wǝr ibarajjat.
As imos as Aššaytan isattaɣ iman-net, wǝdi iman-net a dǝr immǝgar. Daɣ adi manǝmmǝk as za tihag taɣmar-net?
Amaran kud nak tarna ǝn Baɣalzabul as takkasaɣ kǝlǝsuf daɣ aytedan, inalkiman-nawan za, ma ilan tarna tas tan-takkasan? Adi da fǝlas ǝntanay iman-nasan as kawan-z-ǝbǝzan s ǝššǝriɣa.
Mišan as imos as Infas ǝn Mǝššina as takkasaɣ kǝlǝsuf daɣ aytedan, wǝdi Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina tos-iwan-du.
Wǝr t-illa i ifrâgan iguz n ahan n alǝs n ǝmǝqqerǝd, iɣrǝd aqqa ǝn tǝla-net, ar s ad t-ikrâd təzzar. Dǝffǝr as t-ikrâd amaran ad zʼifrəg aqqa ǝn tǝla-net.
Wa dǝr-i wǝr nǝddew, wǝdi azangaw-nin a imos, wa di-wǝr-nǝllil deɣ s ǝšidǝw, wǝdi ǝzǝwwǝziwǝz a itaggu.»
«Awen da fǝl dawan-ǝnneɣ: A iqqal abakkad, wala alfawaxiš, kul ad tǝwǝsurǝfan y awedan, mišan ikus ǝn tarna y Infas wa Zǝddigan, ǝnta wǝr zʼitǝwǝsurǝf y awedan.
As di-ibyak awedan nak Ag Aggadǝm, ifrâg ad igrǝw tǝsureft, mišan as ibǝyak awedan Infas wa Zǝddigan, wǝrmad zʼigrǝw tǝsureft daɣ ǝddǝnet, za wǝr tat-z-igrǝw daɣ alaxirat.»
«As tǝlam ašǝk isxân, a daɣ-as tǝgrǝwam âratăn olaɣnen, as tǝlam ašǝk wǝr nǝsxa, a daɣ-as tǝgrǝwam âratăn ǝbrarnen; fǝlas âratăn win itaraw ašǝk, ǝntanay as itawazday.
Xa taššolen šin da! Manǝmmǝk as za tannim a olaɣan, ǝnta kawanay tǝknâm tallabast? Wǝrgeɣ awa idkaran ǝwǝl n awedan, ǝnta a d-igammadan imi-net?
Awedan wa olaɣan, ǝlluɣ wa ihan ǝwǝl-net a daɣ d-itakkas awa olaɣan, mišan anallabus ǝnta, talbast ta tǝhat ǝwǝl-net a daɣ d-itakkas awa labasan.
Amaran nak ǝnneɣ-awan ǝzǝl wa n tabadday awedan kul kundaba ibdad fǝl batuten ǝn bannan šin iga.
Fǝlas awalan-nak a kay-tagaznen daɣ ǝššǝriɣa, amaran ǝntanatay harwa da a kay-tabaznen s ǝššǝriɣa.»
Ǝnnan arat daɣ musanan n Ǝttawret ǝd Farisaytan: «Ǝššex, nǝra daɣ-ak a dana-tassakna tǝlmǝɣjujat tǝmosat alɣalamat.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Aytedan n azzaman win, inǝllubas, wǝr nǝksud Mǝššina, amaran gammayan tǝlmǝɣjujat! Kala! Tǝlmǝɣjujat ta dasan-tǝtawaggat iyyadda ɣas, a tat-imosan ta n ǝnnǝbi Yunǝs.
Ǝnta ǝmmǝk wa daɣ as iga Yunǝs karad jilan, ǝd karad hadan daɣ tǝdist ǝn kifi wa zǝwwǝran, ǝmmǝk wen daɣ as nak da Ag Aggadǝm ad aga karad adan gǝr mawetan n amaḍal.

Ǝzǝl wa n tabadday, ad d-ǝnkǝran aytedan n ǝɣrǝm ǝn Ninif, ǝzzǝbǝzan aytedan n azzaman win y ǝššǝriɣa fǝlas ǝntanay ǝhǝddi a ǝgan ǝzǝl wa dasan-iga Yunǝs tǝlxutbat, imal-asan awal ǝn Mǝššina. Ǝssǝnat za as, wa illan da ǝmǝrǝdda, ogar Yunǝs mišan tugayam ǝs tǝtubt.

Ǝzǝl wa n tabadday, a du-tǝnkǝr tǝmǝnokalt tas kala tǝxkam fall akal n agala igân esǝm Šeba, taggayyat fǝl aytedan n azzaman win, tǝzzǝbǝz-tan y ǝššǝriɣa fǝlas d ad iraz amaḍal a du-tǝgmad fǝl ad tǝssǝsǝm y awal ǝn tǝla n ǝgǝrri wa itaggu ǝmǝnokal Suliman. Ǝssǝnat za as, wa illan da ǝmǝrǝdda, ogar ǝnnǝbi Suliman mišan tugayam s a das-tǝssǝsǝmam.»
«As igmad aggǝsuf awedan, iras aggǝsuf wen idaggan ǝqqurnen igammay id imal, iqqim wǝr t-igrew,
ad annu daɣ man-net: "Nak a za, ad ǝqqǝlaɣ ehan-in wa d-ǝgmada." As t-id-iqqal a t-id-asu wǝr itawaggaz, ifrâd, iɣrad amaknaw.

Tǝzzar aglu idaw-du d ǝssa kǝlǝsuf wiyyad a t-ogarnen tallabǝst, ǝggǝzan awedan wanâd, ǝzdǝɣan-tu. Tagu taɣara n awedan wen aɣšud ogaran was kala tu-tǝga. Awen da a zʼigrǝwan inǝllubas n azzaman win.»
A iššewal Ɣaysa i tamattay den da, tǝlla anna-net den ǝd mǝdrayan-net. Ǝbdâdan sǝdi dat ahan, ǝrân a das-annin arat.
Inna awedan iyyan i Ɣaysa: «Ǝnǝy, anna-nak ǝd mǝdrayan-nak, ǝbdâdan-ak dat ahan ǝrân a dak-annin arat.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Ma imosan anna-nin? Ma imosan imǝdrayan-in?»
Tǝzzar izzal Ɣaysa ifassan dǝnnǝg nǝttulab-net, inna: «Ǝnǝyat, anna-nin ǝd mǝdrayan-in ǝntanay da,
id awedan kul wa itamazalan tara n Abba-nin ihan ijǝnnawan, ǝnta a imosan amadray-nin, madeɣ tǝmadrayt-in, madeɣ anna-nin.»
Ǝzǝl wen, igmad Ɣaysa ehan, igla, iqqim daɣ tǝgadamayt n agaraw.
Tǝddew-du fall-as tamattay tagget, har as iggaz aɣlal n aman iqqim daɣ-as, tǝbdad tamattay ketnet daɣ tǝgadamayt n agaraw.
Immǝgrad-asan daɣ aratan aggotnen s ǝlmitalan. Inn-asan: «Kala ad ikka ǝmagyak iyyan tawagost-net, y a tat-inbǝl.
Daɣ anabal wa itaggu den imosan anabas n amasa, ǝrtaknat tǝblalen šiyyad fǝl tama ǝn tarrayt, osan-du gǝḍad, ǝtšan-tanat.
Šiyyad ǝrtaknat daɣ adag ǝhanat tǝhun, amaran wǝr t-iha amaḍal igdân. Idwal-du amasa wen tarmad, fǝlas wǝr daw-ǝs illa amaḍal aggen.
As tǝggǝzzay tǝfuk, tǝssǝqqad awa d-idwalan daɣ amasa wen. Iqqur fǝlas ikewan-net a wǝr nǝggug daɣ amaḍal.
Šiblalen šiyyad ǝrtaknat daɣ tǝfǝssaɣ. Ǝdwalnat tǝfǝssaɣ šin, ǝlmaznat amasa wa d-idwalan den.
Mišan ya arat daɣ təblalen en irtak daɣ amaḍal olaɣan. Igmad-du, idwal, iga šiɣaɣanen. Šiblalen šin den akkiyyat teraw temeday ǝn tablalt, šiyyad sǝdisat tǝmǝrwen, šiyyad karadat tǝmǝrwen.
Wa isallin, isǝsǝmet!»
Dǝffǝr awen ǝhozan-t-in nǝttulab-net ǝnnan-as: «Mafǝl tǝtamagrada y aytedan win s ǝlmitalan?»
Ijjawwab-asan Ɣaysa inn-asan: «Taggaɣ-asan ǝlmitalan win, id kawanay tǝgrâwam masnat daɣ ǝssiran ǝn Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan, ǝntanay amaran wǝr tat-ǝgrewan.
Fǝlas wa ilan, a das-itǝwǝšitu awa ila, annaflay. Wa wǝr nǝla amaran, arat n awa ila da a daɣ-as attarmas.
Awen da a fǝl dasan-tamagrada s ǝlmitalan, id ǝswâdan mišan wǝr hǝnnǝyan, ǝssisaman mišan wǝr sallin, za wǝr gǝrrin.
Ǝntanay a fǝl tǝnda batu ta iga ǝnnǝbi Isayas assaɣa wad inna:
"Ad taknim ǝsǝsǝm, mišan wǝr za tagrim wala. Taknim asawad mišan wǝr za tǝnǝyam wala.

Fǝlas iwallan ǝn tamattay ta abʼas ǝlan tafrǝyt, ǝngǝm agrin. Ǝgan iman-nasan imzagan, šittawen-nasan deɣ ǝɣmasan-tanat, fǝl ad ibʼas hannayan ǝs šittawen-nasan, ib-as sallin ǝs tǝmǝzzugen-nasan, ibʼas garrin ǝs wallan-nasan. Ugayan ǝs tǝtubt, ǝngǝm ǝzzuzǝyaq-qan."»
«Kawanay amaran tǝbbilalam id šittawen-nawan ǝhannaynat, tǝbbilalam id šimǝzzugen-nawan sallinat.
Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as sidaranan ǝnnǝbitan aggotnen d aytedan win oɣadnen aggotnen anay n awa tǝhannayam, mišan wǝr t-ǝnayan, sidaranan deɣ tesalay y awas tǝsallim, mišan wǝr das-ǝslen.»
«Daɣ adi kawanay sǝsǝmat y almaɣna n ǝlmital wa n ǝnabal n amasa.
Amasa wa irtakan fǝl tama ǝn tarrayt, ǝlmital a imos n awedan wa islan i salan ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina wǝr tan-igra, asa-du Iblis ikkǝs awa itawanbalan daɣ ǝwǝl-net.
Amasa wa irtakan daɣ amaḍal ǝhânat tǝhun, ǝlmital a imos n awedan wa islan y awal ǝn Mǝššina, iqbal-tu ǝddi da ǝs man filawasnen,
mišan wǝr ila awen ekay. Awedan wa wǝr imos ar mǝššis ǝn tǝmazayen. Igda ɣas a tu-tǝmǝl tǝssust, madeɣ tǝddǝguzt tǝgât fǝl ǝddǝlil n Awal ǝn Mǝššina, ad ayyu ǝzǝgzan ǝddi da.

Amasa wa irtakan daɣ tǝfǝssaɣ, ǝlmital a imos n awedan wa islan y Awal ǝn Mǝššina, mišan aššawašatan n ǝddǝnet, d adakal wa tǝga tǝgǝrgist n ǝddǝnet tayttay-net, ǝssǝfalan-du dǝnnǝg Awal wen, igdal-as awen a d-awǝy tǝnfa.

Amasa amaran wa irtakan daɣ amaḍal olaɣan, ǝlmital a imos n awedan wa islan y Awal ǝn Mǝššina, igr-ay. Awedan wǝdi a d-awǝy tǝnfa tǝmosat temeday n ǝnǝtfus, iyyat tǝqqǝl sǝdisat tǝmǝrwen, iyyat amaran tǝqqǝl karadat tǝmǝrwen.»
Iga Ɣaysa i tamattay ǝlmital iyyan. Inna: «Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan tǝha ǝlmital n alǝs inbalan amasa olaɣan daɣ tawagost-net.
As ǝnsan aytedan osa-du azangaw-net, inbas ark amasa daɣ tǝwagost ten, ijawankat.
As tǝdwal tawagost, tǝga šiɣaɣanen, inafalal-du ǝnta da ark amasa wanad.
Osan-du eklan n alǝs wa ilan tawagost ten, ǝnnan-as: "Mǝššikkana, wǝrgeɣ amasa wa olaɣan a tǝnbala daɣ tawagost-nak? Ǝnnǝs za taɣara n arak yel wa daɣ-as d-idwalan den?"
Inn-asan alǝs wen: "Adi azangaw-nin iyyan a t-igan." Ǝnnan-as eklan: "Meqqal tareɣ ad naglu nǝɣrǝd-du alabay ǝn yel wa wǝr noleɣ en?"
Inn-asan: "Kala! Fǝlas tǝksǝda a ǝgeɣ a tu-tǝnakkadam har ammarsal alkama iman-net.

Ayyiwat-tan ad ǝdwǝlan kul har du-tawǝd ɣarat. As inta ǝmilǝy ǝn tǝwǝgas, ad annaɣ i maššaɣalan win talaynen, ad izaran s arak yel wa, har t-ǝɣrǝdan tewaɣnay iqqǝl šibolasen, itǝwǝsǝqqǝd, alkama amaran agin-tu daɣ tǝdangawt-in."»
Ig-asan Ɣaysa ǝlmital iyyan, inn-asan: «Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan tola d amasa n annabat igân esǝm mutard inbal awedan daɣ tawagost-net.
Amasa wa n mutard ǝnta a ogaran imasan kul tǝmmǝdrǝyt. Mišan as idwal, ad agǝr annabatan kul win fǝrgan, iqqǝl ašǝk, har as a d-asin gǝḍad ad taggin šisǝllula daɣ zǝlan-net.»
Ig-asan ǝlmital iyyan, inn-asan: «Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan tola ǝd xamira tǝrway tǝntut daɣ karadat annafaɣaten n agel n alkama har ikuf agel ketnet.»
Aratan win den kul igann-en Ɣaysa i tamattay s ǝlmitalan. Wǝr dasan-inna arat waliyyan wǝr nǝmos ǝlmital,
fǝl ad andu awal ǝn Mǝššina wa imal ǝnnǝbi assaɣa wad inna:
«Ad araɣ imi-nin, ǝššiwǝla s ǝlmitalan, ǝmǝlaɣ aratan win ǝɣbarnen harwa ɣur ǝnǝtti n ǝddǝnet.»
Dǝffǝr awen ifal Ɣaysa tamattay, igla ikka ehan. Ǝhozan-t-in nǝttulab-net ǝnnan-as: «Sassagr-anaɣ ǝlmital wa n arak yel wa d-idwalan daɣ tawagost.»
Inn-asan: «Wa inbalan amasa wa olaɣan, adi Ag Aggadǝm.
Tawagost, adi ǝddǝnet, amasa wa olaɣan amaran immittal aytedan win ǝbbǝrdagnen i Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina, arak yel immittal aytedan win ǝlkamnen i tarrayt ta n Iblis.
Azangaw wa inbalan ark amasa, adi Iblis, ɣarat amaran adi ǝzǝl wa n tabadday. Aytedan win talaynen, adi angalosan.
Ǝnta ǝmmǝk wa daɣ as d-itawankad arak yel daɣ tawagost, itǝwǝsǝqqǝd, ǝmmǝk wǝdi daɣ a zʼitǝwǝggin ǝzǝl wa tabadday y aytedan.
A d-assagla nak Ag Aggadǝm angalosan-in a zʼǝkkǝsnen daɣ Taɣmar-in aratan kul win takkasnen ǝzǝgzan daɣ aytedan, d aytedan win nǝmmǝzray ǝn Mǝššina.
Tǝzzar ǝgǝran-tan daɣ amahander ǝn tǝmsay, ad hallin ǝddadan idǝdwan-nasan fǝl tǝmagraz.
Ǝddi daɣ ad zʼagin aytedan win oɣadnen ǝmǝlǝwlǝw wa n tǝfuk, daɣ Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina di n Abba-nasan. I isallin aslet!»
«Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan tola harwa da d ǝrrǝzǝɣ iɣbâran daɣ tawagost, isaffagg-ay d awedan iyyan, ilas-tu aɣabar. Awa iga daɣ tǝfalawist, igla izzǝnz-in awa ila kul, izzǝnza tawagost ten.»
«Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan tola harwa da d amassatag igammayan ǝljuhǝr wa ihossayan.
As igraw ǝljuhǝr iyyan ihossayan, wa n ǝlǝsǝl, igla izzǝnz-in awa ila kul izzǝnz-ay.»
«Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan tola harwa da ǝd sangay zǝwwǝran n abbaz ǝn kifitan itiwagaran daɣ agaraw, obaz-du kifitan ǝmosnen ǝzzǝnǝfan.
As idnay, ǝrkaban-t-idu nabazan ǝn kifitan ǝs tǝgadamayt, ǝqqiman, ǝdkalan-du izmaman a daɣ-san taggin kifitan win olaɣnen, ǝggaran-in win wǝr nǝnfa wala.
Awen daɣ a zʼagin ǝzǝl wa n tabadday. A d-asin angalosan, ǝskǝtan-in inǝmmǝzray ǝn Mǝššina, zǝmmǝzǝyan-tan d aytedan win oɣadnen,
ǝgǝran-tan daɣ amahander ǝn tǝmsay, ad hallin ǝddadan idǝdwan-nasan fǝl tǝmagraz.»
Igla Ɣaysa iššêwal inn-asan: «Ak tǝgrâm awa ǝnne da kul?» Ǝnnan-as: «Awalla.»

Tǝzzar inn-asan: «Daɣ adi, ǝmusan n Ǝttawret kul wa itawasasaɣran y ad iqqǝl ǝnalkim ǝn Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan, ola ǝd mǝššis n aɣaywan, a d-itakkasan daɣ tǝla-net aratan win aynaynen ǝd win waššarnen isataɣmal-tan.»
As iɣrad Ɣaysa ǝsǝssǝɣri wa igan s ǝlmitalan en, igmad akal wa ihozan agaraw, igla.

As d-osa aɣrǝm wa daɣ idwal ad isasaɣru aytedan daɣ ahan-nasan wa n ǝlɣibada. Awa sǝr-san iga awen daɣ ǝsǝmmǝklǝl, har ǝqqiman gannin: «Mǝnis t-idu-tǝggaz masnat togdat d awa, ǝd tǝlmǝɣjujaten šin itaggu da?»
«Ak awa wǝrgeɣ ag alǝs wa ikarrasan inan? Wǝrgeɣ anna-net esǝm-net Maryama, imǝdrayan-net iyyan Yaqub, iyyan Yusǝf, iyyan Simɣon, iyyan Yahuza?
Wǝrgeɣ šimǝdrayen-net kul ǝllanat ɣur-na? Daɣ adi mǝni iguz wa das-d-ǝgan aratan win da kul?»
Awen daɣ a dasan-igdalan ǝzǝgzan sǝr-ǝs. Mišan inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝnnǝbi wǝr itǝwǝlku ar daɣ aɣrǝm wa daɣ idwal d aɣaywan-nasan.»
Amaran iqqim da wǝr iga tǝlmǝɣjujaten aggotnen daɣ adag wen, fǝlas ǝzǝgzan a sǝr-ǝs wǝr ǝgen aytedan win den.
Azzaman en da a daɣ isla Herod Antifas wa n ǝmuzar n akal ǝn Galilaya, isalan ǝn Ɣaysa.
Tǝzzar inna Herod y aytedan-net: «A igan da Yaxya wa isalmaɣan aytedan daɣ aman, a d-inkaran den daɣ tǝmattant! Awen da fǝl ila tarna n igi ǝn tǝlmǝɣjujaten.»
Arat wen inn-ay Herod fǝlas azzaman dat awen omâr s ǝtǝrmǝs ǝn Yaxya, itawakrad itawagga daɣ kasaw, fǝl ǝddǝlil ǝn Herodǝyas tǝmosat taɣur Filibus imosan amadray ǝn Herod a da,
fǝlas Yaxya a igannin i Herod: «Xaram fall-ak azalaf ǝn tǝntut di.»
Eway-du awen ǝs Herod as ira ikus ǝn man ǝn Yaxya, mišan iksud tamattay tǝgât i Yaxya iduf n as ǝnnǝbi a imos.
As d-iɣlay ǝzǝl wa n tǝhǝwt ǝn Herod, isassaga saksas, tǝga elles ǝn Herodǝyas eweɣ iknan šihussay dat naftaɣan. Tǝzzar oggăm-tat Herod
har as ihad-as âs, a das-agu arat kul wa daɣ-as tǝgmay.
As tǝššǝwwar anna-net tǝnn-as ad tannu i Herod eɣaf ǝn Yaxya a tǝra. Tǝnkar tǝbarart tǝnn-i Herod: «Akf-i attabla da da iha aɣaf ǝn Yaxya wa isalmaɣan aytedan daɣ aman.»
Arat wa tǝgmay tǝbarart ten eway-du s ǝmǝnokal Herod as ǝɣšadan man-net. Mišan omar s a das-itǝwǝggu arat wa tǝgmay den, fəl əddəlil ən təhuday ta das-iga d əddəlil ən naftaɣan-net.
Issǝgla awedan y a d-ifrǝs eɣaf ǝn Yaxya daɣ kasaw.
Immeway-du aɣaf n ǝnnǝbi en daɣ attabla, itawakfa i tǝbarart, tǝzzar tǝkf-ay y anna-net.
Osan-du nalkiman ǝn Yaxya ǝdkalan taɣǝssa-net, ǝnbalan-tat-in. Ǝglan ǝmalan i Ɣaysa.
As isla Ɣaysa isalan win, igmad edag wen, iha aɣlal n aman. Igla ɣas-net ikka edag issufan a din-ikitayyen. Tǝsla tamattay ta tǝhat šiɣarmaten šin ɣǝlǝyɣǝlayan awen, tǝlkam-as idaran-net.
As d-izzǝbbat aɣlal inay tamattay tagget, tǝggaz-tu tǝhanint-net, ad izuzǝy imiranan-nasan.
As tǝga takǝst, ǝhozan-t-idu nǝttulab-net ǝnnan-as: «Edag issufan awa, amaran ǝzǝl igla, daɣ adi suɣǝl tamattay a, ad tǝgmǝy id tǝzzǝnza a tǝtša daɣ tǝɣarmaten.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Wǝr tǝga addararat s ad aglin, šatšat-tan kawanay iman-nawan da!»
Ǝnnan-as: «Nakkanay ya wǝr nǝla da ar sǝmmosat tǝgǝlwen d ǝššin kifitan.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Awǝyat-i-tan-du.»

Omar tamattay s ad taqqam daɣ yel illan den, tǝzzar idkal sǝmmosat tǝgǝlwen šin den d ǝššin kifitan win, iggǝzzay ijǝnnawan, iga igodan i Mǝššina. Ikaramkaram šigǝlwen šin den, ikf-enat i nǝttulab, a tanat-tuzanan i tamattay.
Ǝtšan aytedan en ketnasan har əyyəwanan. Ǝššedawan-du nǝttulab ikarammutan win du-tawaglaznen, ǝdnayan maraw ǝzmaman d ǝššin.
Aytedan win ǝtšanen den ǝmosan edag ǝn sǝmmos gim n alǝs, ǝllanat deɣ tǝdoden den ǝd bararan.
Wala a ihogan omar Ɣaysa inǝttulab-net s ad ǝggǝzan aɣlal n aman izaran-as-in ǝs tǝgadamayt ta hadat n agaraw iket di ad itasallam tamattay.
As ǝɣradan aytedan teklay, iggǝzzay Ɣaysa adɣaɣ y ad agu šiwatriwen daɣ adag ikitayyan. Illa den da ɣas-net har iga ahad.
As itaggu awen da aɣlal iggug-in daɣ agaraw, ǝbbatnat-tu tǝnazzamaren sa ǝd sa fǝlas aḍu issohen a dǝr immǝqqas.
As tǝga tilkamat n ahad, ikka-du Ɣaysa inǝttulab-net ijiwankat fǝl aman.
As t-oggan ijiwankat-du fǝl aman, ǝrmaɣan. Ǝnnan: «Awen aggǝsuf!» Sakkarayan fǝl awa ǝgan daɣ tǝrǝmmeq.
Mišan tamazayt ten da a dasan-iššewal Ɣaysa inn-asan: «Ad wǝr tǝɣšǝdam, nak awa! Tǝgmǝdet-kawan tasa!»
Den daɣ a das-inna Butros: «Kud kay adi Ǝmǝli, tamǝraɣ-i s a din-jǝwǝnkeɣ fǝl aman ǝssǝlkadaɣ-ak-in.»
«Iyyaw!» Inn-as Ɣaysa. Izzǝbbat Butros aɣlal, ijawankat fǝl aman innǝmad Ɣaysa.
Mišan as din-igra assahat n aḍu wa igaran den, tǝggaz-tu tasa, ǝggazan-tu aman šin alamaz. Isaɣɣarat inna: «Ǝmǝli agǝz-i!»
Tarmad as das-in-izzal Ɣaysa ǝfus-net, ibaz-t-idu. Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Ǝzǝgzan-nak irkam wǝllen, ma daɣ-ak igan aššak?»
Ǝggazan aɣlal ɣas, idrar aḍu.
Ǝssǝjadan-as aytedan win ǝhanen aɣlal en, gannin: «Illikan as kay a imosan Barar ǝn Mǝššina.»
As ǝɣrasan agaraw, ewadan akal ǝn Ganazaret.
As ǝssanan kǝl akal en as Ɣaysa awen, ǝmalan y aytedan ǝn kallan win ɣǝlǝyɣǝlayan n edag wen, a sǝr-ǝs du-tamawayan miranan kul.
Ad itawansay ad ayyu aytedan ǝdǝsan kuddeɣ tǝbǝnik ǝn tǝkadkat-net, amaran i tat-idasan ad izzǝy.
Dǝffǝr awen ǝfalan-du Farisaytan ǝd musanan n Ǝttawret Yerusalam, ǝkkan Ɣaysa, ǝnnan-as:
«Mafǝl wǝr ǝlkeman nǝttulab-nak y alɣadaten šin dana-d-oyyan marawan-nana, wǝr ǝširidan ifassan-nasan dat tattay?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Kawanay za, mafǝl tǝtamazrayam alwajiban ǝn Mǝššina, fǝl lǝkkum y alɣadaten-nawan?
Wǝrge Mǝššina a inna: "Sǝɣmǝr abba-nak d anna-nak"? Inna deɣ: "Awedan wa išaffaraššen abba-net, madeɣ anna-net, wǝdi a daɣ-as tǝwǝkkǝsan man"?
Mišan kawanay tǝgannim y aytedan, as inna awedan y abba-net madeɣ anna-net: "Arat wa kay-z-akfaɣ imos tadhǝlt-nak, ǝssinsaq-qu y ad t-aga takutay,"
ǝddi ab-as ihhǝššal y awedan wǝdi saɣmar n abba-net wala anna-net. Ǝmmǝk di da as təgam alɣadat-nawan daɣ adag n Awal ən Məššina.
Ǝlmunafiqan! Tidǝt a imos awal wa iga Mǝššina daɣ batu-nawan ǝs tarrayt n ǝnnǝbi Isayas as inna:
"Tamattay ta, ilǝs ɣas as di-tǝssǝɣmar, mišan iwallan-nasan ǝggugan-i wǝllen.
Ǝlɣibada wa di-taggin, ibbinnan, fǝlas wǝr sǝsǝɣrin ar alwajiban a d-ǝnzaman aytedan daɣ ɣafawan-nasan."»
Iɣra Ɣaysa tamattay inn-as: «Sǝsǝmat-i, tagrim awa dawan-z-anna da:
Wǝrgeɣ awa itaggazan s ǝmi n aggadǝm a t-isamadasan, kalar awa d-igammadan imi-net.»
Dǝffǝr awen ǝhozan-t-in nǝttulab-net, ǝnnan-as: «Ak tǝgreɣ-in as batuten-nak, ǝššakan-tanat Farisaytan wǝllen.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Annabat kul wa wǝr inbel Abba-nin ihân ijǝnnawan, wǝdi a d-itǝwǝlbǝy.
Ayyat-tan ɣas! Awen imǝddǝrɣal ǝlwaynen wiyyad. Ǝmǝdderɣǝl ilwâyan iyyan amaran, agadal a taggin ketnasan daɣ anu.»
Iššewal Butros inn-as: «Sassagr-anaɣ ǝlmital wǝdi.»
Inna Ɣaysa: «Awak kawanay da harwa da wǝr tǝlem ǝgǝrri?
Awak wǝr tǝgrem as arat kul wa iggazan s ǝmi n aggadǝm, akkay a zʼagu ǝs tǝdist, dǝffǝr adi inɣǝl-in daɣ ǝsuf?
Mišan wa d-igammadan imi, wǝdi ǝwǝl a d-ifal, amaran ǝnta a isamadasan aggadǝm.
Ǝssǝnat as ǝwǝl ǝnta a du-gammadnat arak ǝnnǝyaten, d igi ǝn man, d igi n ǝzzǝna, d igi ǝn tǝdoden madeɣ igi ǝn meddan, ǝd šikra, ǝd tǝgǝyya ǝn bahu, ǝd šizmit.
Aratan win di ǝntanay a samadasnen aggadǝm. Mišan tettay ǝs fassan wǝr nǝrrud, wǝr tǝsammadas aggadǝm.»
As ifal Ɣaysa edag wen, ikka amaḍal ǝn Tir ǝd Sidon.
Tǝhin-in tǝntut n iyyat daɣ Kananitatan tǝzdaɣat akal en da, tǝkkâ-du Ɣaysa tǝsikaray tǝgann-as: «Ya Ǝmǝli, Ag ǝmǝnokal Dawǝd, hǝnǝttǝt-i! Tǝbarart-in a izdaɣ aggǝsuf a tat-izaɣazzaban wǝllen.»
Mišan wǝr inna Ɣaysa i tǝntut en wala. Idgaz awen inǝttulab ǝhozan-t-in onsayan-tu ǝnnan-as: «Suɣǝl tantut ta dana-tǝlkamat da tǝsikaray.»
Inna Ɣaysa: «Nak wǝr du-tawazammazalaɣ ar ǝs Kǝl-Israyil, ǝmosnen zun ayfǝd ǝssiggalnen.»
Dǝr iga awen da ya tǝkk-ay-du tǝntut en, tǝssǝjad-as tǝnn-as: «Ǝmǝli, ǝssǝn daɣ-i!»
Inna Ɣaysa: «Wǝr oleɣ i idkalan amensay ǝn bararan, igǝr-t-in i dan!»
Tǝnn-as tǝntut en: «Tidǝt-nak Ǝmǝli, dǝr iga awen da ya iḍan ǝkǝmmi a taggin awa d-irattakan daɣ adag wa daɣ tattin mǝssawsan, tattin-tu.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Ya tantut! Ǝzǝgzan-nam i zǝwwǝran! Itǝwǝgget-am awa tareɣ!» Amazay en da a daɣ tǝzzay elles ǝn tǝntut en.
Dǝffǝr awen igmad Ɣaysa edag wen, ikka tǝgadamayt n agaraw wa n Galilaya, tǝzzar iwar adɣaɣ, iqqim.
Tǝkk-ay-du tamattay tagget, a sǝr-ǝs du-tewayat imǝggudal, ǝd mǝddǝrɣal, ǝd nǝbdan, d aytedan as ǝmmidadan mawan-nasan, ǝd miranan wiyyad aggotnen. Aytedan win, tawasansin dat Ɣaysa, izuzǝy-tan.

Isammaklal ǝs tamattay anay wa tǝga aytedan as ǝmmidadan mawan-nasan ǝššewalan, tǝnay inǝbdan ǝgrâwan šiɣurad-nasan, tǝnay imǝggudal jiwanken s ǝlluɣ, tǝnay imǝddǝrɣal hannayan. Ad taggin aytedan tǝmmalen y Ǝmǝli n Israyil.

Iɣra-du Ɣaysa inǝttulab-net inn-asan: «Tǝh-i tǝhanint ǝn tamattay a. Karad adan a ɣur-i ǝgan, amaran abʼas t-illa a ǝtšan. Wǝr areɣ a tan-ayya aglin wǝr ǝreman arat, fǝlas ǝddi mijas a tan-aggadlu gǝlǝk daɣ tarrayt.»
Ǝnnan-as nǝttulab-net: «Mǝni du-za-nǝgrǝw za daɣ ǝsuf a šigǝlwen siyyawannen tamattay togdât d awa?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Mǝnǝket tǝgǝlwen tǝlam?» Ǝnnan-as: «Ǝssayat tǝgǝlwen a nǝla d arat ǝn kifitan win madrornen.»
Omar tamattay s ad tǝɣrǝd tǝɣimit.
Idkal-du ǝssayat tǝgǝlwen en ǝd kifitan win den, iga igodan i Mǝššina, amaran ikaramkaram-tan ikf-en i nǝttulab, ǝzunan-tan i tamattay.
Aytedan en ketnasan ǝyyǝwanan ǝglazan-du, har as ǝssa ǝzmaman win zawwarnen a du-tawatkarnen daɣ karammutan win d-ǝglazan.
Aytedan win ǝtšanen den, ǝmosan ǝkkoz gim n alǝs as wǝr ǝhenat tǝdoden ǝd bararan.
Dǝffǝr awen issǝllam Ɣaysa tamattay, iggaz aɣlal n aman, ikka akal ǝn Magadan.
Ǝkkan-du Farisaytan, ǝd Sadusaytan Ɣaysa ǝrân ad t-ajjarraban, gammayan daɣ-as a dasan-agu tǝlmǝɣjujat tǝmosat alɣalamat a du-tǝfâlat Mǝššina.
Inn-asan: «As iga ǝlmǝz, tǝnayam ijǝnnawan zaggaɣan ad tannim: "Tufat za ad agu ǝzǝl ihossayan."

As affaw amaran, tǝnayam ijǝnnawan zaggaɣan ǝhânat-tan šiyyay ad tannim: "Azalada ad agu ǝzǝl ibrâran." As tǝswadam daɣ jǝnnawan, ad tǝssǝnam awa dǝr zʼalu alhawa dǝffǝr awen, mišan awa itaggin daɣ azzaman win wǝr tǝssenam almaɣna-net!
Aytedan n azzaman win, inǝllubas, wǝr nǝksud Mǝššina, amaran gammayan tǝlmǝɣjujat! Kala! Tǝlmǝɣjujat ta dasan-tǝtawaggat iyyadda ɣas, a tat-imosan ta n ǝnnǝbi Yunǝs.» Den da a tan-ifal Ɣaysa, igla.
Ǝkkan nǝttulab tagadamayt ta hadat n agaraw. As ewadan, ǝgran-in âs ǝttǝwan-in igi n allaw ǝn tǝgǝlla.
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝnkǝdat wǝllen i xamira ǝn Farisaytan, ǝd wa n Sadusaytan.»
Tǝzzar ad gannin nǝttulab gar-essan: «Awa wǝr t-inna ar fǝlas wǝr neway tagǝlla.»
Issan Ɣaysa daɣ awen inn-asan: «Mafǝl tǝššewalam gar-ewwan fǝlas wǝr tǝlem tagǝlla, kǝl ǝzǝgzan ǝndarran?
Awak ǝgǝrri a wǝr tǝgem harwa da? Wǝr tǝkǝttǝwam sǝmmosat tǝgǝlwen šin ǝtšan sǝmmos gim n alǝs, d ǝket n ǝzmaman win du-tǝdnayam daɣ gǝlzan-nasan?
Meɣ ak tǝttǝwam-in ǝssayat tǝgǝlwen šin ǝššǝtšanen ǝkkoz gim n alǝs! Mǝnǝket ǝzmaman win zawwarnen a du-tǝdnayam ǝzǝl wen?
Nak a dawan-ǝnneɣ: "Ǝnkǝdat i xamira ǝn Farisaytan, ǝd wa n Sadusaytan". Manǝmmǝk as wǝr tǝgrem as wǝrgeɣ tagǝlla as dawan-ǝheɣ batu-net?»
Den daɣ ad ǝgran as wǝrgeɣ xamira ǝn Farisaytan, ǝd wa n Sadusaytan a fǝl dasan-immǝgrad den, kalar ǝsǝssǝɣri-nasan as dasan-inna a das-ǝnkǝdan.
Ikkâ Ɣaysa amaḍal ǝn Qaysarǝya wa n ǝmuzar Filibus as issǝstan Ɣaysa i nǝttulab-net, inn-asan: «Ak daɣ iduf n aytedan, ma ǝmosa nak Ag Aggadǝm?»
Ǝnnan-as: «Wiyyad za gannin kay Yaxya wa isalmaɣan aytedan daɣ aman. Wiyyad gannin kay ǝnnǝbi Ilyas. Wiyyad amaran a gannin kay ǝnnǝbi Irmǝya a tǝmosa, madeɣ iyyan daɣ ǝnnǝbitan win hadatnen.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Kawanay za, ma tǝnnam ma mosa?»
Inn-as Simɣon Butros: «Ǝlmǝsix a tǝmosa, barar ǝn Mǝššina di n Amaɣlol.»
Inna Ɣaysa i Simɣon Butros: «Tǝbbilala ya Simɣon, ag Yunǝs, fǝlas arat wǝdi wǝrgeɣ kay a daɣ-as issosanan iman-nak, kalar Abba-nin di ihan ijǝnnawan a dak-isannafalalan.
Nak amaran ǝnneɣ-ak: Kay Butros tǝhunt a tǝmosa, amaran tǝhunt ta, ǝnta a fǝl zʼǝkrǝsaɣ Ǝlkǝnisat-in. Ǝlkǝnisat ta, tarna ǝn tǝmattant da wǝr tǝfreg a das-tǝɣšǝd wala.
A kay-akfa tǝsassarut ǝn Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan. Arat kul wa tǝssǝxrama daɣ ǝddǝnet dada, ijǝnnawan da a daɣ-san ixram, arat deɣ wa tǝssǝxlala daɣ ǝddǝnet dada, ijǝnnawan da a daɣ-san ixlal.»
Tǝzzar iga i nǝttulab-net ammar a daɣ idgâz, s ad wǝr ǝmelan y awedan waliyyan as ǝnta a imosan Ǝlmǝsix.

A obazan ɣur ǝzǝl wen, ǝnta ad iggaz Ɣaysa šin ǝsǝssǝgri ǝn nǝttulab-net as iwâr-tu iki ǝn Yerusalam, y ad agu alɣazab aggen, a das-z-agin muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, ǝd muzaran ǝn limaman, ǝd musanan n Ǝttawret, tǝwǝggin man-net, inkǝr-du deɣ daɣ tǝmattant ǝzǝl wa n karad.
Tǝzzar iwat-tu Butros s ahal, iššewal fall-as, inn-as: «Ǝmǝli, ihǝnǝttǝtet-ak Mǝššina daɣ arat wa tǝmalaɣ ǝddi! Kala wǝr kay-z-igrǝw adi!»

Mišan imalallay-in Ɣaysa Butros, inn-as: «Ǝfǝl dǝffǝr-i Aššaytan! Tǝqqalaɣ-i tǝsǝnkǝft daɣ ǝššǝɣǝl wa di-d-ewayan s ǝddǝnet, fǝlas imedranan-nak, wǝrgeɣ Mǝššina a d-ǝfalan, kalar imedranan n aggadǝm ɣas a ǝmosan.»
Dǝffǝr awen inna Ɣaysa i nǝttulab-net: «Wa iran a di-ilkǝm, wǝdi igmǝdet tara ən man-net, agu imateran-net, idkǝl tǝgǝttawt-net, ilkəm-i.
Ǝssǝnat as awedan wa wǝr nǝgǝmmǝy ar aggaz ǝn man-net, wədi ad t-ǝgmǝdan, mišan wa iqbalan ad t-ǝgmǝdan fǝl ǝddǝlil-in, wǝdi a tan-igrǝw.
Ma zʼaknu y awedan ad igrəw əddənet ketnet, ənta amaran temsay a ikka? Awak mas ifrag awedan tehakkay-net y a sər-əs agəz iman-net daɣ təmsay?
Ǝssǝnat as nak Ag Aggadǝm a d-asa ǝleɣ tanaya n Abba-nin, ǝddewa d angalosan-net, ǝddi amaran, awedan kul ad t-akfu maruzat n awa ewadan mazalan-net.
Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as wiyyad daɣ aytedan win ǝbdadnen da wǝr tan-z-iba iket wǝr ǝnayan assa-nin nak Ag Aggadǝm ǝmosaɣ ǝmǝnokal.»
As ǝgan sǝdis adan dǝffǝr awen, iddew Ɣaysa ǝd Butros, ǝd Yaqub, ǝd Yaxya imosan amadray ǝn Yaqub en da, ikka dǝr-san adɣaɣ zagren ɣas-nasan.
Den da ad immǝttay azzahir-net dat-san, imalawlaw udǝm-net s ǝnnur olan ǝd wa n tǝfuk, ǝgan sǝlsa-net tǝmǝllay tǝsiraqqet wǝllen, tǝkna ǝsǝmǝɣmǝɣ.
Ǝhinan-in oggân ǝnnǝbi Musa, d ǝnnǝbi Ilyas as du-nafalalan, mišawalan ǝd Ɣaysa.
Iggad-du Butros inna i Ɣaysa: «Ǝmǝli, olaɣ as nǝlla da! Kud tareɣ adi, ad ǝkrǝsa karad hǝktan daɣ adag wa. Iyyan i-nak, iyyan in Musa, iyyan in Ilyas.»
Harwada iššewal Butros as tan-tǝlsa tǝgarak tǝmilawlawat, təqqal-asan zun telay. Igmad ǝmǝsli tagarak ten, inna: «Awa Barar-in wa ǝkneɣ tara; ǝnta a d-issǝndan agna-nin. Sǝsǝmat-as!»
As ǝslan nǝttulab i batu ten, ǝrmaɣan wǝllen, fataqqen ǝssǝjadan.
Ihoz-tan-in Ɣaysa, idas-tan, inn-asan: «Ǝnkǝrat, tǝgmǝdet-kawan tasa!»
Ǝdkalan-du nǝttulab isawadan-nasan wǝr hǝnnǝyan ar Ɣaysa.
Tazabben-du adɣaɣ en da, as tan-omar Ɣaysa, inn-asan: «Ad wǝr tǝmǝlam y awedan waliyyan awa tǝnayam da, iket wǝr d-ǝnkera nak Ag Aggadǝm daɣ tǝmattant.»
Ǝssǝstanan nǝttulab Ɣaysa, ǝnnan-as: «Mafel za gannin musanan n Ǝttawret: "Kundaba osa-du Ilyas tǝzzar as du-z-asu Ǝlmǝsix?"»
Ijjǝwwab-asan Ɣaysa inn-asan: «Awalla za ar a d-asu Ilyas, annazzam aratan kul.
Amaran ǝssosanaq-qawan as Ilyas, osâ-du, mišan wǝr t-ǝqbelan aytedan, kalar ǝgan-as awas ǝran. Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as illikan as a di-zǝɣɣǝzzǝban nak Ag Aggadǝm.»
Ǝgran nǝttulab as Yaxya wa isalmaɣan aytedan daɣ aman, as iha Ɣaysa batu-net den.
As d-izzabbat Ɣaysa ǝd nǝttulab-net win karad en adɣaɣ, ǝhozan-du tamattay, ikk-ay-du alǝs iyyan igaraffat dat-ǝs,
inn-as: «Ǝmǝli, hǝnǝttǝt i barar-in, tazakarkarat a tu-tǝgrawat, amaran iɣɣizzab wǝllen fǝlas faw da itudu daɣ tǝmsay, madeɣ aman.
Ewayaq-qu ǝs nǝttulab-nak y ad t-ǝzzuzǝyan, mišan indar-asan.»
Inna Ɣaysa: «Xa! Iket iba n ǝzǝgzan, iket ǝššur daɣ aytedan n azzaman a! Awak har ǝmmay ǝddewa dǝr-wan, ǝzizaydara dǝr-wan? Awǝyat-i-du barar sa da!»
Iharaššat Ɣaysa aggǝsuf wa ihan barar en, tǝzzar igmad-tu. Izzay barar daɣ amazay wen da.
Ǝhozan-in nǝttulab Ɣaysa ǝnnan-as: «Mafel nakkanay indâr-anaɣ ikus n aggǝsuf wen?»

Inn-asan: «Adi za aššaddat ǝn rǝkkǝm n ǝzǝgzan-nawan! Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as ǝnnar tǝlâm daɣ ǝzǝgzan a ogdân ǝd wala imi ǝn tǝzuɣay n ǝšǝnnan, har tǝnnam y ǝdɣaɣ en: "Ǝgmǝd edag di takka wen", ad ammazal s adi. Ǝddi wǝr t-illa arat as dawan-z-indǝr igi-net.
[Amaran ǝzzǝnǝf n aggǝsuf wen, wǝr igǝmmǝd awedan ar ǝs tǝwatriwen, d ǝzum.»]
Ǝzǝl iyyan ǝddewan nǝttulab ǝn Ɣaysa daɣ akal ǝn Galilaya as dasan-inna: «Nak Ag Aggadǝm ǝjwâra ad ǝggâzaɣ ifassan n aytedan,
agin iman-nin, tǝzzar ǝnkǝra-du daɣ tǝmattant ǝzǝl wa n karad.» Tǝɣšad batu ten iman-nasan wǝllen.

Igla Ɣaysa ǝd nǝttulab-net har ewadan Kafarnahum. Ǝnkaran aytedan win zarzamnen amana y Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, ǝhozan-in Butros, ǝssǝstanan-tu ǝnnan-as: «Awak ǝššex-nawan arazam a wǝr itǝggu amana y Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada?»

Inn-asan Butros: «Awalla za ar irazzam-tu». Iggaz Butros ehan, azzar-as Ɣaysa awal issǝstan-tu inn-as: «Ma tǝnne kay Simɣon, ma irazzaman takǝsen d amana i mǝnokalan n ǝddǝnet? Awak maddanǝsan a dasan-tan-razzamnen, meɣ aytedan sa hadan?»
Inn-as Simɣon: «Aytedan sa hadan a dasan-tan-razzamnen.» Inn-as Ɣaysa amaran: «Daɣ adi maddanǝs ǝn mǝnokalan wǝr tan-iwer arazam ǝn wala.

Mišan ya fǝl ad wǝr nǝqqǝl tǝsǝnkǝft y ǝzǝgzan n aytedan win zarzamnen, aglu akku agaraw, tǝgǝra daɣ-as azabzab wa n abbaz ǝn kifitan. Kifi wa tobazaɣ ǝstizarat, aru imi-net, a daɣ-as in-tagǝza tefelt n ǝzrǝf wa mallan. Tefelt ten ǝkkǝs-tat-du, tagla takfaɣ-asan-tat, ad tǝqqal ǝrruzmatan n amana wa-nin, ǝd wa-nak.»
Amazay wen daɣ a daɣ din-ǝhozan nǝttulab Ɣaysa, ǝnnan-as: «Ma imos za wa ogaran daɣ Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan?»
Tǝzzar iɣra-du Ɣaysa arat ǝn barar, issǝbdad-tu gar-essan,
inna: «Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan âs as wǝr tǝsammattayam alxal, tǝqqǝlam zun bararan, wǝdi wǝr ilkem a tǝggâzam Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan.
Awen daɣ a fǝlas awedan kul wa issǝrasan iman-net, zun arat ǝn barar wa, wǝdi illikan as ǝnta ogaran daɣ Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan.»
«Amaran i iqbalan barar šilan wa fəl əddəlil-in, wǝdi nak iman-nin as di-iqbal.

Mišan i iqqalan ǝssǝbab n abakkad y iyyan daɣ aytedan win sǝr-i ǝzzǝgzannen, ǝmosnen zun bararan madrornen, wǝdi of-as ad itǝwǝqqǝn ǝzǝzǝd zǝwwǝran ǝn tǝhunt daɣ iri-net, itǝwǝgǝr daɣ ammas n agaraw ǝmazal wa iga ǝddi.

Iket alɣazab ill-ay y aytedan n ǝddǝnet! Ǝddǝlilan aggotnen a t-ǝllanen tan-sisuginen ibakkadan! Illikan as ad t-ǝmǝlan ǝddǝlilan win den har faw, mišan iket alɣazab ill-ay y awedan wa dasan-d-iqqalan ǝssǝbab!

Kud ǝfus-nak madeɣ adar-nak a kay-sisuginen ibakkadan, wǝdi ǝfrǝs-tan-in, tǝgǝraq-qan-in sǝdi. Id of-ak tǝggaza aljannat tǝgeɣ ǝfus, madeɣ tǝgeɣ adar y ad tǝleɣ ǝššin fassan, d ǝššin daran, tǝtǝwǝgǝra dǝr-san daɣ Jahannama.

Amaran kud šat-nak a təbukat a dak-təqqəl əssəbab n igi n abakkad, wǝdi kǝkkǝrǝt-tat-du, tǝgǝraq-qat-in sǝdi, id of-ak ad tǝgeɣ šat daɣ aljannat, y ad tǝleɣ sanatat šittawen tǝtǝwǝgǝra dǝr-ǝsnat daɣ tǝmsay an Jahannama.»
«Ǝnkǝdat! Ad wǝr talkim iyyan daɣ aytedan win madrornen di, fǝlas silakanaɣ-awan as angalosan-nasan ǝhân ijǝnnawan, faw ǝllan ɣur Abba-nin.
[Nak Ag Aggadǝm oseɣ-du gammayaɣ aytedan win ǝxraknen y a tan-ǝɣlǝsa.»]
«Ma tǝnnam kawanay y awen? Awak amadan ilân temeday ǝn tilay, har daɣ-asnat tǝssǝggal iyyadda, wǝrgeɣ ad ayyu tazayat tǝmǝrwen ǝd tazayat šin hadatnen ǝdânnat, tǝzzar azǝl iswǝd i ta tǝssaggalat?
Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan âs as d-igraw tilay ta n iyyadda en, ogar tǝdǝwit ta zʼagu fǝl ǝddǝlil-net, i ta zʼagu fǝl ǝddǝlil ǝn tazayat tǝmǝrwen ǝd tazayat šin wǝr nǝssǝgǝl.
Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as abba-nawan ihân ijǝnnawan, wǝr ira ad ihlǝk waliyyan daɣ aytedan win madrornen di.»
Igla Ɣaysa iššewal inna: «As kay-idlam amadray-nak, takkaq-qu daɣ adag a daɣ tǝmosam ɣas-nawan, tǝsassagraq-qin lahan-net. Kud za issǝsam-ak itub, wǝdi zun as amadray-nak a du-tǝgrawaɣ a kay-igmâdan.
Mišan as ugay s a dak-issǝsam, tiddawa d awedan iyyanda, madeɣ ǝššin, tǝqqǝlaq-qu. Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as "batu kul ad taknu ǝqqimnat-as sanatat tǝgǝyyawen madeɣ karadat."

Amaran as ugay s ad ilkǝm y awal wa das-ǝgan aytedan win di, tǝmǝlaɣ almasalat tǝdi y Ǝlkǝnisat. As ugay s ad ilkǝm y awa das-tǝnna Ǝlkǝnisat, wǝdi ag-as iduf wa tǝgeɣ y aytedan win wǝr nǝssen Mǝššina, madeɣ tagaɣ-as iduf wa tǝgeɣ y aytedan win zarzamnen takǝsen.
Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as arat kul wa tǝssǝxramam daɣ ǝddǝnet ta, wǝdi ijǝnnawan da a daɣ-san ixram. Amaran wa tǝssǝxlalam daɣ ǝddǝnet ta, wǝdi ijǝnnawan da a daɣ-san ixlal.
Ǝsilakanaɣ-awan deɣ âs as namardan ǝššin daɣ-wan daɣ ǝddǝnet da da ǝttaran s esǝm n Abba-nin ihân ijǝnnawan, wǝdi arat kul wa daɣ-as ǝgmayan, a dasan-t-akfu.
Fǝlas edag wa daɣ ǝmmǝnayan ǝššin, madeɣ karad daɣ-wan s esǝm-in, wǝdi ǝssǝnat as ǝlle gar-essan ǝddi da.»
Tǝzzar ihoz-in Butros Ɣaysa issǝstan-tu inn-as: «Ǝmǝli, har mǝnǝket tăklaten as di-iwar ad ǝssurǝfa y amadray-nin a di-idlâman? Awak har ǝssayat tăklaten?»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Wǝr dak-ǝnne har ǝssayat tăklaten, kalar a dak-ǝnne surǝf-as ǝssayat tǝmǝrwen ǝn tăklat har ǝssa.
Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as Taɣmar ta n jǝnnawan, tǝha ǝlmital n ǝmǝnokal ad iɣrân eklan-net, irâ ad issǝɣrǝd ǝrrǝzǝɣan-net.
As issǝnta, itawaɣra-du iyyan daɣ eklan en, a ɣur ila igiman ǝn giman ǝn tafelt.
Mišan akli wen wǝr ifreg ǝrruzmatan n ǝzrǝf en. Awen daɣ a fǝl omar mǝššis s a din-itǝwǝzǝnzu ǝnta ǝd taɣurǝs ǝd maddanǝs d awa ila kul, ǝqqǝlan ǝrruzmatan n ǝrrǝzǝɣan win ɣur-ǝs ila.
Tǝzzar ifataqqad ǝkli en issǝjad dat mǝššis, inn-as: "Ag-i tǝzaydart, mǝšši, a dak-ǝrzǝmaɣ awa ɣur-i tǝleɣ kul."
Arat wen eway-du ǝs mǝššis as tu-tǝggaz tǝhanint-net. Tǝzzar issoraf-as awa ɣur-ǝs ila, oyy-ay.
Azzama a din-igmâd ǝkli wen, ifâl-in mǝššis, immǝnay d iyyan daɣ midawan-net daɣ ǝššǝɣǝl wǝr irwes ar temeday ǝn tafelt n ǝzrǝf. Tǝzzar obaz-as tarzam, inn-as: "Ǝrzǝm-i azrǝf wa daɣ-ak ǝleɣ!"
Tǝzzar ifataqqad ǝmidi-net wen, onsay-tu inn-as: "Ag-i tǝzaydart, a dak-ǝrzǝma."
Mišan ugay ǝkli wen, isassaga fadda ǝmidi-net en daɣ kasaw y ad t-izzǝrzǝm ǝmarwas wa t-iga.
As ǝnayan midawan-net daɣ ǝššǝɣǝl awa igan den, ǝɣšadan man-nasan wǝllen, ǝglan ǝgan isalan win kul i mǝššis.
Tǝzzar isassaɣr-ay-du mǝššis inn-as: "Illikan as kay amaksan! Nak ǝssorafaɣ-ak awa ɣur-ǝk ǝle kul fǝlas di-tonsayaɣ awen.
Kay da, iwâr-kay a kay-tǝggǝz tǝhanint n ǝmidi-nak, tagaɣ-as ǝhǝnǝtta zun wa dak-ǝgeɣ nak."
Tǝzzar iggaz alham mǝššis, isassaga akli en daɣ kasaw. Itawattaf har iɣrad arazam n awa ɣur-ǝs ila ketnet.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as Abba-nin ihân ijǝnnawan wǝr dawan-z-issurǝf as imos âs akkiyyan daɣ-wan wǝr isurif s ǝwǝl iyyanda i mǝdrayan-net daɣ ǝzǝgzan.»
Dǝffǝr as iɣrâd Ɣaysa alfaydaten šin, ifal akal ǝn Galilaya, ikka akal ǝn Yahudǝyya ihân aganna wa hadan n agarew wa n Yordan.
Ǝlkamnat-as tamattiwen aggotnen, a tanat-izuzǝy den da.
Ǝhozan-t-in Farisaytan ǝgan-as ǝsǝstan imosan tǝnagmayt, ǝnnan-as: «Awak xalal y alǝs ǝzǝmǝzzǝy ǝn tǝntut-net fǝl a iqqal ǝddǝlil?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Wǝrgeɣ tǝɣrâm as ǝstizarat as d-ixlak Ǝmaxlak ǝddǝnet,
