Agat ǝnnǝyat! Tazǝft harwa ǝmǝrǝdda da tǝmmotag y a du-tǝsǝddǝngǝr y eškan. Daɣ adi ašǝk kul wa wǝr nǝtirǝw aratan olaɣnen ad itǝwǝɣtǝs, itǝwǝgǝr-in daɣ tǝmsay.»
A tu-sastanan aytedan, gannin-as: «Daɣ adi mas danaɣ-iwar a tu-nagu?»
Inn-asan: «Awedan wa ilan ǝššin sǝlsa, akf-et iyyan i wa tu-wǝr-nǝla; wa ilan a itša, akfet daɣ-as wa tu-wǝr-nǝla.»
Inabazan n amana ǝntanay da, tasin-du Yaxya fǝl a tan-issǝlmǝɣ daɣ aman, ǝnnan-as: «Ǝššex, mas danaɣ-iwar a tu-nagu?»
Inn-asan: «Ad wǝr tǝzzǝrzǝmam a ogaran awa dawan-itawannan.»
Ǝssǝstanan-tu deɣ sojitan, ǝnnan-as: «Nakkanay za, mas danaɣ-iwar a tu-nagu?» Inn-asan: «Ad wǝr tǝrkǝbam daɣ awedan waliyyan azrǝf-net, wala deɣ tǝssǝwǝram-tu bahu. Agdat s alxaq-nawan.»
Aytedan kul win ǝslanen y awa igannu Yaxya, ǝgân attama; akk awedan isamadranan daɣ ǝwǝl-net kud Yaxya en da a imosan Ǝlmǝsix wala.

Awen da fǝl dasan-inna Yaxya ketnasan: «Nak, aman a daq qawan-salmaɣa, mišan izay-du alǝs s awa di-iga daɣ šigrat, wǝr eweda wala arra ǝn suɣan ǝn ɣateman-net. Ǝnta Infas Wa Zǝddigan ǝd tǝmsay a daq qawan-z-issǝlmǝɣ.
Iha ǝlmital n awedan ittâfan tesayt y ad izzǝzǝr alkama-net. Išadaw alkama daɣ tadangawt-net, šiɣal amaran ag-enat daɣ tǝmsay tǝbilaglagat faw.»
Igla Yaxya daɣ amel n Ǝlinjil, itaggu y aytedan ǝnnǝsixatan wiyyad aggotnen.

Herod amaran wa n ǝmǝnokal n akal ǝn Galilaya ǝruɣmatan a das-iga daɣ batu ǝn Herodǝyas tǝmosat taɣur amadray ǝn Herod en da igân esǝm Filibus, ig-âs deɣ wiyyad ǝruɣmatan fǝl arak mazalan labasnen kul win hadatnen iga.
Iššota Herod fǝl arak mazalan win den kul igi ǝn Yaxya daɣ kasaw.
As tawasalmaɣan aytedan kul daɣ aman, itawasalmaɣ daɣ-san Ɣaysa ǝnta da. Itattar alwaq wen da as ǝnnolaman jǝnnawan,
izzǝbbat-du fall-as Infas wa Zǝddigan iha šaššelan ǝn tǝdabert, igmad-du ǝmǝsli ijǝnnawan, inna:
«Kay a imosan Barar-in ǝkneɣ tara,
tǝssinda-du agna-nin.»
Ila Ɣaysa edag ǝn karadat tǝmǝrwen n awatay as issǝnta ǝššǝɣǝl-net.
Ǝttâfan aytedan as ag Yusǝf wa n ag Heli.
Heli ǝnta ag Mâtat, Mâtat ag Lebi,
Lebi ag Malki, Malki ag Yannay, Yannay ag Yusǝf,
Yusǝf ag Matasiyas, Matasiyas ag Amos,
Amos ag Nahum, Nahum ag Xasli, Xasli ag Naggay.
Naggay ag Matti, Matti ag Matasiyas,
Matasiyas ag Samɣi, Samɣi ag Yosax, Yosax ag Yoda,
Yoda ag Yohanan, Yohanan ag Ɣaysa,
Ɣaysa ag Zǝrubabil, Zǝrubabil ag Assalat, Assalat ag Nayri,
Nayri ag Malxi, Malxi ag Addi, Addi ag Kosam,
Kosam ag Almadama, Almadama ag Er,
Er ag Ɣaysa, Ɣaysa ag Alyazar, Alyazar ag Yorim,
Yorim ag Mâtat, Mâtat ag Lebi,
Lebi ag Simɣon, Simɣon ag Yahuda,
Yahuda ag Yusǝf, Yusǝf ag Yunam, Yunam ag Ilyakim,
Ilyakim ag Malaya, Malaya ag Mayna,
Mayna ag Mâtat, Mâtat ag Natan, Natan ag Dawǝd,
Dawǝd ag Yasay, Yasay ag Ɣubayd,
Ɣubayd ag Boxaz, Boxaz ag Sala, Sala ag Nasun,
Nasun ag Ɣaminadab, Ɣaminadab ag Admin,
Admin ag Arni, Arni ag Xasrun, Xasrun ag Farǝs, Farǝs ag Yahuda,
Yahuda ag Yaqub, Yaqub ag Isǝhaq,
Isǝhaq ag Ibrahim, Ibrahim ag Terax, Terax ag Naxur,
Naxur ag Sarux, Sarux ag Raggaw,
Raggaw ag Falax, Falax ag Ɣabbir, Ɣabbir ag Salax,
Salax ag Kaynam, Kaynam ag Arfakšad,
Arfakšad ag Sam, Sam ag Nux, Nux ag Lamax,
Lamax ag Matusala, Matusala ag Henox,
Henox ag Yarit, Yarit ag Malelyal, Malelyal ag Kaynam,
Kaynam ag Enus, Enus ag Set, Set ag Adǝm,
Adǝm ǝnta Mǝššina t-id-ixlakan.
Igmad Ɣaysa tamawen n agarew wa n Yordan idkâr-tu Infas wa Zǝddigan. Infas wa da a t-issokan teneray.
Iga daɣ-as ǝkkozat tǝmǝrwen n ǝzǝl itajarrab-tu Iblis. Adan win kul ig-en wǝr itša wala, as ǝɣradan ih-ay laz.
Inn-as Iblis: «Kud kay Barar ǝn Mǝššina, tamǝra tǝhunt ta s ad tǝqqǝl amensay.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Wǝrgeɣ ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban:
"Awedan wǝr itǝddǝr ǝs mensewan ɣas."»
Ikka dǝr-ǝs Iblis edag iknan ǝhuki, issǝswad-tu daɣ taɣmaren kul n ǝddǝnet daɣ ellaf ǝn šat.
Amaran inn-as: «A kay-akfa taɣmaren en kul ǝd tǝhussay-nasnat fǝlas tiwakfanat-i hakkaq-qanat deɣ i was tanat-ǝreɣ.
Daɣ adi as di-tǝssǝjada ad tǝgrǝwaɣ awen kul.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Wǝrgeɣ ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban:
"Ǝmǝli-nak Mǝššina as za tǝssǝjǝda, ǝnta ɣas a za tǝɣbǝda."»
Tǝzzar ikka dǝr-ǝs Iblis Yerusalam, issǝbdad-tu fǝl afalla n Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, inn-as: «Kud kay Barar ǝn Mǝššina tǝtǝrǝgge,
fǝlas ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban:
"Ad amǝr angalosan-net a kay agǝzan daɣ ǝššur,"
iktâb deɣ as:
"A kay-ǝkbǝlan daɣ fassan-nasan fǝl a dak-wǝr-tǝnkǝf tǝhunt."»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Wǝrgeɣ za Ǝlkǝttaban di ǝnnân:
"Ad wǝr tǝtajjarraba Ǝmǝli-nak Mǝššina."»
As t-iɣrad Iblis ǝjǝrrǝb, igla oyy-ay har sǝr-ǝs ilǝs agaraw ǝn tarrayt.
Dǝffǝr awen, iqqal Ɣaysa akal ǝn Galilaya, tǝh-ay tarna n Infas wa Zǝddigan. Tǝffǝzzat sallat-net daɣ akal en ketnet.
Isasaɣru aytedan daɣ nan win ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, ketnasan ǝssiɣmaran-tu.
Osa deɣ Ɣaysa Nazaret, aɣrǝm wa daɣ idwal. As ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt iggaz ehan wa n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud imos awen arat itaggu faw. Ibdad y ad aɣru awal ǝn Mǝššina.
Itawakf-ay-in ǝlkǝttab wa n ǝnnǝbi Isayas. Ikkas y ǝlkǝttab aḍḍa wa iga, olam fǝl adag a daɣ iktab as:

«Iwâr-i Infas n Ǝmǝli, fǝlas isinafran-i y ad ǝmǝlaɣ isalan n Ǝlinjil i tǝlǝqqawen. Izimazal-i-du y ad agaɣ isalan i win tawattafnen, ǝgrǝwan iman-nasan, ǝzzuzǝyaɣ imǝddǝrɣal, aytedan win tawadgaznen deɣ agaq-qan daɣ tara ǝn man-nasan,
ǝmǝlaɣ awatay taha arraxmat n Ǝmǝli.»
As iɣrad Ɣaysa teɣaray ihar ǝlkǝttab, issoɣal-tu y amaššaɣal n ahan wa n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, iqqim. Ǝgaran daɣ-as aytedan kul win ǝllanen den šittawen.
Amaran inn-asan: «Azalada awal ǝn Mǝššina was tǝslam da, inda.»
Ketnasan ǝmmâlan-tu. Simaklalnat sǝr-san batuten olaɣnen šin du-gammadnen imi-net, ad gannin: «Ak awa wǝrgeɣ ag Yusǝf?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Illikan as a di-du-tassaktim iggi wa innan: "Anasmagal, zuzǝy iman-nak," tǝzzar tannim-i: "Agu daɣ akal-nak da da awas nǝsla as tǝgêq-qu daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Kafarnahum."»
Inn-asan deɣ: «Ǝggǝyyaɣ silakanaɣ-awan as wǝr t-illa ǝnnǝbi itiwaqbalan daɣ aɣrǝm wa daɣ idwal.

Amaran a dawan-ǝmǝla tidǝt: Daɣ elan n ǝnnǝbi Ilyas akal n Israyil ǝhânat-tu tǝdoden aggotnen ǝs wǝr ǝdderan meddan-nasnat. Elan en da a daɣ iga akonak karad elan d aganna wǝr iwet, iga laz labasan daɣ akal ketnet.
Dǝr iga awen da ya, wǝr izammazal Mǝššina ǝnnǝbi Ilyas ǝs waliyyat daɣ tǝdoden en. Kalar izammazal-tu s iyyat tǝxsârat daɣ tǝɣrǝmt ta n Sarǝfta tǝhât akal ǝn Sidon.
Ǝhân deɣ kǝtrutan aggotnen akal n Israyil daɣ elan n ǝnnǝbi Elisayas, mišan wǝr tan-iha i itawazozayan ar Naɣman wa n akal ǝn Surǝya.»
As ǝslan aytedan win ǝhanen ehan n ǝlɣibada y awen, iggaz-tan alham labasan.
Ǝbdadan, ǝgan ifassan da Ɣaysa, ǝkkasan-tu daɣ ǝɣrǝm, ewayan-tu s afalla n ǝdɣaɣ wa fǝl ikras ǝɣrǝm y ad t-ǝgǝran daɣ ǝɣǝɣi, iba-tu.
Mišan illam Ɣaysa gar-essan igla.
Dǝffǝr awen iras Ɣaysa ǝs tǝɣrǝmt tǝgât Kafarnahum tǝhât ǝnta da akal wa n Galilaya, ad isasaɣru aytedan daɣ ahan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud daɣ jilan win tǝsanfawt.
Isimaklal sǝr-san ǝmmǝk was isasaɣru, fǝlas ǝsǝssǝɣri-net in awedan ilân tanaya.
Ehan n ǝlɣibada wen, ih-ay alǝs iha aggǝsuf. Idkal alǝs wen ǝmǝsli-net, ad igannu:
«Xa! Ɣaysa wa n Nazaret, ma daɣ-na tareɣ? Ǝngǝm assa a du-tǝgeɣ y a dana-tǝhlǝka? Ǝssanaɣ awa tǝmosa: Ǝmizdag wa d-izammazal Mǝššina.»
Iharaššat-tu Ɣaysa, inn-as: «Fastu, tǝgmǝdaɣ alǝs di!» Tǝzzar iggǝdla aggǝsuf alǝs en gǝr aytedan, amaran igmad-tu wǝr das-ixšed arat.
Ǝhagan aytedan ketnasan, ad tinǝmǝnnin gar-essan: «Ma imos almaɣna n awal n alǝs wa? Kǝlǝsuf da ittâf daɣ-san tanat, itamar-tan ǝs tanaya, gammadan aytedan.»
Tǝwazawaz sallat ǝn Ɣaysa daɣ id t-illa adag daɣ akal en kul.
As igmad Ɣaysa ehan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, ikka ehan ǝn Simɣon. As itaggu awen tǝdaggalt ǝn Simɣon tǝfrâyat, tǝnnid wǝllen, tǝzzar ǝgmayan daɣ-as aytedan a tat-izzuzǝy.
Inaz-in fall-as Ɣaysa, isannarɣam i tanaday, tǝzzar tǝwat fall-as. Tǝnkar daɣ tǝmazayt ten da a tan-tǝsimǝgurit.
As tuda tǝfuk, ewayan-du sǝr-ǝs aytedan imiranan-nasan ǝgânen šiwǝrnawen ǝmosnen ǝzzǝnǝfan. Akk iyyan issǝwar-tu ifassan-net, izzozay-tu.
Gammadan deɣ kǝlǝsuf aytedan aggotnen, saɣaren kǝlǝsuf en, gannin: «Kay Barar ǝn Mǝššina», mišan isannarɣam-asan, igdal-asan awal, id masnat a ǝgan as ǝnta a imosan Ǝlmǝsix.
As affaw, igmad Ɣaysa aɣrǝm, ikka edag issufan. A das-tǝsaggad tamattay har t-in-tosa. Ad gammayan tǝmǝwit tas das-z-ǝgdǝlan a tan-ifǝl.
Mišan inn-asan: «Iwâr-i ad ǝmǝla Ǝlinjil, imosan isalan ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina, i ɣǝrman win hadatnen ǝntanay da, fǝlas adi da a fǝl d-ǝmmozala.»
Tǝzzar igla Ɣaysa, itaggu tǝlxutbat daɣ nan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win n akal ǝn Yahudǝyya.
Ǝzǝl iyyan ibdâd Ɣaysa daɣ tǝšǝšwit n agaraw wa n Ganazaret, tǝtanabdaɣ fall-as tamattay fǝl ad aslin y awal ǝn Mǝššina wa immal.
Inay Ɣaysa ǝššin ǝɣlalan n aman daɣ tǝšǝšwit n agaraw. Iɣlalan win ǝgmâdan-tan mǝssawsan, takkasan tǝjjǝrgǝnt daɣ sangaytan-nasan win as tabazan kifitan.
Tǝzzar iggaz daɣ-san wa n Simɣon, igmay daɣ-as a din-izzǝnkǝz fǝl tǝšǝšwit, amaran iqqim ad isasaɣru tamattay.
As iraz daɣ ǝsǝssǝɣri inna i Simɣon: «Akku kay ǝd midawan-nak dad zagrotan aman, tǝgǝram sangaytan-nawan, tabǝzam kifitan.»
Inn-as Simɣon: «Ǝššex, ahad iɣrâdan a nǝga nǝšɣâl eges wǝr nǝbez wala, mišan ya zama adi a tǝnneɣ, adi za ad ǝgǝra sangaytan daɣ aman.»
Ǝgan awa dasan-inna Ɣaysa, tǝzzar ǝbazan kifitan s awa ǝgan daɣ igǝt har ǝbukan sangaytan-nasan y azarru.
Ad tallafan i midawan-nasan win ǝhanen aɣlal n aman wa hadan y a d-aglin a dasan-ilalan. Osan-du, ǝdnayan ǝššin ǝɣlalan win den har ǝbukan y ǝdǝkǝyyi.
As inay Simɣon Butros awen, issǝjad i Ɣaysa, inn-as: «Ya Ǝmǝli, nǝmǝggǝg dǝr-i fǝlas anasbakkad a ǝmosa.»
Innâ awen fǝlas ǝnta ǝd midawan-net ketnasan as ǝhagan ɣur anay-nasan igǝt ǝn kifitan win ǝbazan.

Eheg wa iga Simɣon den, ǝnta a iga Yaqub ǝd Yaxya win maddanǝs ǝn Zabaday dǝr idrâw ǝššǝɣǝl. Tǝzzar inna Ɣaysa i Simɣon: «Ad wǝr tǝrmǝɣa, a obazan ɣur ǝmǝrǝdda, tǝqqalam meddan a sər-i du-za-tawaynen aytedan y a tan-assafsa daɣ bakkadan-nasan.»
Amaran ǝssoɣalan iɣlalan-nasan tǝgadamayt n agaraw, oyyan arat kul ǝlkaman-as.
Iha Ɣaysa aɣrǝm iyyan, as t-inay alǝs as tǝlsa tǝwǝrna ǝn kǝtru elam-net ketnet. Ikk-ay-du issǝjad dat-ǝs, onsay-tu, inn-as: «Ǝmǝli, as tareɣ adi, tǝfrâgaɣ a di-tǝzzuzǝyaɣ, izdaga.»
Izzal-in Ɣaysa ǝfus-net, idas-tu, inn-as: «Areɣ adi, ǝzzǝy tizdaga!» Amazay wen daɣ ad izzay daɣ kǝtru.

Tǝzzar issǝnkad-tu Ɣaysa, inn-as: «Ǝnǝy za, ad wǝr tǝmǝla y awedan waliyyan awa igan da, amaran aglu tassaknaɣ iman-nak y ǝlimam, taga takutay ǝn tazdak ta kay-issǝwar ǝššǝriɣa n ǝnnǝbi Musa, ad iqqǝl adi y aytedan tǝgǝyya ǝn tǝmǝzzǝyt-nak.»
Dǝr iga awen da ya, tǝgla sallat ǝn Ɣaysa tǝtittǝy, tǝttiddaw fall-as tamattay tagget fǝl a das-tǝssǝsǝm, izzuzǝy deɣ šiwǝrnawen-nasan.
Mišan ǝnta, itakku idaggan ǝssufnen y a daɣ-san iɣbǝd Mǝššina.

Ǝzǝl iyyan isasaɣru Ɣaysa, ǝqqiman Farisaytan ǝd musanan n Ǝttawret a d-ǝgmâdnen šiɣarmaten kul šin n akal ǝn Galilaya ǝd wa n Yahudǝyya ǝd Yerusalam. As itaggu awen Ɣaysa igrâw ɣur Ǝmǝli tarna n ǝzuzǝy n aytedan.
Har d-osan meddan wiyyad misawaynen alǝs n anabdon daɣ tǝssut. Ad gammayan a dǝr-ǝs ǝggǝzan, assansin-tu dat Ɣaysa.
As dasan-aba tǝmǝwit as dǝr-ǝs ǝggazan fǝl igǝt n aytedan, ǝwaran afalla ǝn taɣazamt, olaman ǝsǝfǝl-net, ǝssǝrasan-tu daɣ-as iha tǝssut-net har tǝssǝnsan daɣ ammas ǝn tamattay, dat Ɣaysa.
As inay Ɣaysa ǝzǝgzan-nasan, inna y anabdon wen: «Ibakkadan-nak tiwasarafan-ak.»
Ǝslan musanan n Ǝttawret ǝd Farisaytan y awen ɣas, ad gannin daɣ man-nasan: «Ma imos alǝs wa itaggin amadraw da? Ma ifragan ǝsurǝf ǝn bakkadan ar Mǝššina ɣas?»
Issan Ɣaysa awa samadranan, inn-asan: «Mafǝl tətihənzəmmem adi daɣ wallan-nawan?
Ma ogaran tǝrɣǝsay gǝr i innan: "Tiwasarafan-ak bakkadan-nak" meɣ ak i innan: "Ǝbdǝd jǝwǝnkǝt?"
Amaran areɣ a tǝssǝnam as nak Ag Aggadǝm ǝleɣ daɣ ǝddǝnet tanaya a di-tǝšišawadat ad ǝssurǝfa y awedan ibakkadan-net.» Tǝzzar inna Ɣaysa y anabdon: «Ǝbdǝd, tǝdkǝla tǝssut-nak, takkaɣ aɣaywan-nak.»
Ibdad alǝs wen tamazayt ten da dat aytedan kul, idkal tǝssut-net, iqqal ehan-net, immâl Mǝššina.
Aytedan kul isimaklal sǝr-san awen wǝllen. Ǝmmâlan Mǝššina, tǝh-en tasa gannin: «Azalada nǝnây aratan as wǝr kala ǝtawanayan!»
Igmad Ɣaysa edag en, ogga alǝs iyyan igân esǝm Lebi iqqim daɣ adag wa n ǝzǝrzǝm n ǝzrǝf ǝn takǝs, inn-as: «Ǝlkǝm-i.»
Ibdad Lebi, oyya awa iha kul, ilkam i Ɣaysa.
Dǝffǝr awen iga Lebi i Ɣaysa imǝgura zawwarnen daɣ ahan-net. Ǝdrawan d aytedan aggotnen ǝn nǝzzǝrzam ǝn takǝsen d aytedan wiyyad.
Ǝnayan Farisaytan ǝd musanan-nasan win Ǝttawret awen ɣas gatantanan, ad gannin i nǝttulab ǝn Ɣaysa: «Mafel tǝdrâwam ǝd nǝzzǝrzam ǝn takǝsen ǝd nasbakkadan?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Aytedan wǝr nǝfray, wǝr ǝddǝraran s anasmagal, imiranan a sǝr-ǝs ǝddǝrarnen.
Nak wǝr d-oseɣ fǝl ǝddǝlil n aytedan win ɣur iga as oɣadân, kalar ǝmazal ad-ǝgeɣ fǝl a d-aɣraɣ inasbakkadan ǝs tǝtubt.»
Dǝffǝr awen ǝnnan-as Farisaytan ǝd musanan n Ǝttawret: «Inǝttulab ǝn Yaxya ǝd win Farisaytan tuzaman faw, tattaran, win-nak amaran tattin sassin.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Awak tǝfrâgam ad tǝzzuzǝmam ilagatan a ɣur illa ǝmazlay?
Mišan ǝlkâman adan a ɣur-san zʼammadkal ǝmazlay. Adan win di, ad uzaman.»

Ig-asan Ɣaysa tangalt iyyat, inn-asan: «Wǝr t-illa i du-z-ikkǝsan šikǝst daɣ tabdoq taynayat y a tat-iwǝt daɣ iyyat waššarat, fǝlas as iga adi, ad iɣšǝd tabdoq ta taynayat, šikǝst deɣ ta daɣ-as d-ikkas wǝr tǝnnǝha ǝd tabdoq ta waššarat.
Wǝr t-illa deɣ i zʼagin esmad n alɣanab aynayan daɣ gǝdad. I igan adi ad abbaqqen gǝdad win, tǝzzar affatu daɣ esmad ǝd gǝdad.
Kalar esmad n alɣanab aynayan, ibǝyaɣ aynaynen a daɣ itawaggu.
Awedan išwân esmad n alɣanab waššaran, wǝr zʼiru dǝffǝr adi tessay ǝn wa aynayan, fǝlas ad annu: "Wa waššaran a izodan."»
Ǝzǝl iyyan imosan ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, ijiwankat Ɣaysa daɣ tǝwǝgas n alkama, rassaban-du nǝttulab-net šiɣaɣanen, tifǝffǝren-tanat gǝr fassan-nasan, tattin-tanat.
Tǝzzar ǝnnan-asan arat daɣ Farisaytan: «Mafǝl tǝtaggim arat xarâman daɣ ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt?»
Ijjǝwwab-asan Ɣaysa, inn-asan: «Ak teɣaray a wǝr tǝgem awa iga ǝnnǝbi Dawǝd ǝzǝl wa t-iggaz gǝlǝk ǝnta ǝd midawan-net?
Awak wǝrgeɣ iguz a iga ehan ǝn Mǝššina, idkal šigǝlwen šin ǝmosnen takutay tǝskâtat i Mǝššina ǝs limaman ɣas as təxalal tattay-nasnat, itša daɣ-asnat, ikfa daɣ-asnat deɣ aytedan-net?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa deɣ: «Nak Ag Aggadǝm a ixkaman fǝl ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt.»
Ǝzǝl iyyan ǝn tǝsanfawt ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, iggaz Ɣaysa ehan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ad isasaɣru. Ehan-en ih-ay alǝs as immût ǝfus-net wa n ǝɣil.
Ǝgaran daɣ-as musanan n Ǝttawret ǝd Farisaytan šittawen fǝl ad ǝssǝnan kud ad izzuzǝy awedan daɣ ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt wala, fǝl tara n ad ǝgrǝwan ǝddǝlil ǝs tǝxtǝst-net.
Ɣaysa ǝnta issân awa ihan iman-nasan. Inna y alǝs was immût ǝfus-net: «Ǝnkǝr, ǝbdǝd daɣ ammas n ǝljǝmaɣat.» Inkar alǝs, ibdad.
Tǝzzar inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝssistanaq-qawan, awak xalal daɣ ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt igi n arat olâɣan meɣ igi n a labasan, ereg n awedan daɣ tǝmattant meɣ awak šiyyit-net iba-tu?»
Issǝlal-tan Ɣaysa asawad-net ketnasan, amaran inna y alǝs was immût ǝfus-net: «Ǝzzǝl ǝfus-nak» Iga awa das-inna, izzay ǝfus-net.
Arat wen iga daɣ-san alham labasan, ad tinǝmǝšiwwiran gar-essan fǝl awa zʼagin i Ɣaysa.
Adan en da a daɣ ikka Ɣaysa adɣaɣ iyyan y a fall-as agu šiwatriwen. Iga fall-as ahad iɣrâdan itattar.
As affaw iɣra-du inǝttulab-net, isannafran daɣ-san maraw d ǝššin, ig-asan esǝm inǝmmuzal.
Ismawan-nasan da: Simɣon was iga esǝm Butros d amadray-net Andrawǝs; Yaqub, Yaxya, Filibus, Bartulamawǝs,
Matta, Tuma, Yaqub wa n ag Alfay, Simɣon was itawannu wa Isaggatakken,
Yahuz wa n ag Yaqub ǝd Yahuza Isxarǝyuti wa zʼakkaddalan Ɣaysa.

Dǝffǝr awen izzǝbbat dǝr-san Ɣaysa adɣaɣ, ibdad daɣ ataɣas iyyan a daɣ tǝbdâd tamattay tagget ǝn nalkiman-net ǝd tamattay tagget a du-tǝfâlat akal ǝn Yahudǝyya ǝd Yerusalam ǝd ɣǝrman win Tir ǝd Sidon ǝhanen tagadamayt n agaraw wa zǝwwǝran.
Aytedan en osân-du fǝl ad ǝssǝsǝman y awa isasaɣru Ɣaysa, tǝwǝzuzǝyan deɣ daɣ tǝwǝrnawen-nasan. Izzozay daɣ-san deɣ win ǝhan kǝlǝsuf.
Tamattay en ketnet tǝgammay d ades ǝn Ɣaysa fǝlas tarna t-id-tǝgammadat tǝzuzǝy-tan ketnasan.
Iswad Ɣaysa daɣ nǝttulab-net, inna:
«Tǝbbilalam kawanay
win sallaqqawnen iman-nawan dat Mǝššina
fǝlas Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina ši-nawan.
Tǝbbilalam kawanay
win iha laz ǝmǝrǝdda
fǝlas ad tayyawanam.
Tǝbbilalam kawanay
win hallinen ǝmǝrǝdda
fǝlas ad tadzim.
Tǝbbilalam kawanay
win ǝkyadan aytedan,
ǝkkâsan-kawan daɣ ammas-nasan,
rabbadan-kawan, ɣaššadan ismawan-nawan
fǝlas di-tǝlkǝmam nak Ag Aggadǝm.
Dawatat, tǝfǝliwǝsam ǝzǝl wǝdi,
fǝlas tǝlâm arozan aggotnen daɣ jǝnnawan.
Arat wa dawan-ǝgan ǝddi
ǝnta iman-net a ǝgan marawan-nasan y ǝnnǝbitan.
Mišan kawanay imǝggǝrgas
iket alɣazab iqqâl-awan,
fǝlas awa ǝran man-nawan iha ifassan-nawan.
Iket alɣazab iqqâl-awan
kawanay win ǝyyǝwannen ǝmǝrǝdda,
fǝlas ad tullazam.
Iket alɣazab iqqâl-awan
kawanay win dazzinen ǝmǝrǝdda,
fǝlas a daɣ-wan tagu tǝfǝyyawt, talim.
Iket alɣazab iqqâl-awan
kawanay win ǝmmalan aytedan;
a dida a ǝgan marawan-nasan y ǝnnǝbitan win bahu.»
«Kawanay win di-ǝssǝsamnen amaran, ǝnneɣ-awan: "Iriwat izǝnga-nawan, ad tǝtamazalam ǝlluɣ i win kawan-ǝkyadnen.
Tattarat a igan arraxmat i win kawan-sawarnen allaɣanat, tansǝyam Mǝššina a igan alxer i win dawan-tagginen taršǝxšad.
As dak-iqqas awedan, takfaq-qu amdǝd-nak wa hadan. As daɣ-ak irkab awedan ǝbǝrnuz-nak, alɣaššaba-nak da ayy-as-tu.
I kay-onsayan takfaq-qu. Ad wǝr tǝgmǝya daɣ awedan a kay-d-issuɣǝl awa daɣ-ak irkab."»
«Arat was tǝram a dawan-t-agin aytedan, agat-asan-tu kawanay da.
Kud wǝr tarem ar aytedan win kawan-ǝranen, awak ma imos aroz wa za tǝgrǝwam? Wala ark aytedan da ǝrân aytedan win tan-ǝranen.
Kud wǝr tǝtǝggim a olaɣan ar i win dawan-tu-tagginen, awak ma imos aroz wa za tǝgrǝwam? Wala arak aytedan taggin adi.

Kud deɣ wǝr tǝsǝmǝrwisam ar aytedan win as tordam as a dawan-ǝrzǝman, awak ma imos aroz wa za tǝgrǝwam? Ark aytedan da tinǝmǝkfin imarwasan gar-essan fǝlas ǝssânan as a tan-d-iqqǝl awa sammarwasan ketnet.»

«Kalar iriwat izǝnga-nawan, ad tǝtaggim y aytedan awa olaɣan, tǝtizǝbǝnem i win daɣ-wan ǝgmaynen ǝzǝbǝna. Tagim adi ketnet da wǝr tǝgem attama n a dawan-itǝwǝggu. Ǝddi ad igat aroz-nawan, tǝqqǝlam bararan ǝn Mǝššina di n Amadkol fǝlas ǝnta itaggu ǝlluɣ y aytedan win wǝr iha agoda ǝd win maksanan.
Tǝggǝzet-kawan tǝhanint ta tǝhat Abba-nawan.»
«Ad wǝr tannim ark arat s awedan fǝl a sǝr-wan wǝr itǝwǝnnu. Ad wǝr tǝssǝwǝram awedan lahan fǝl a kawan-wǝr-itǝwǝsǝwǝr kawanay da. Sirufat, ad tǝgrǝwam tǝsureft.
Hakkat, ad tǝtǝwakfim. Tǝsǝkǝt tolâɣat, tǝdkârat, tǝssiksakat har tǝfǝtǝnɣǝl a dawan-z-itǝwǝggin daɣ sǝbbǝtǝran-nawan. Tǝsǝkǝt tas tǝkkatam y aytedan ǝnta as dawan-z-ikǝt Mǝššina.»
Ig-asan deɣ Ɣaysa tangalt, inn-asan: «Awak ǝmǝdderɣǝl ifrâg alaway n iyyan ǝmǝdderɣǝl? As iga adi wǝrgeɣ ketnasan as zʼuden daɣ anu?
Attalami wǝr oger ǝššex-net, mišan attalami kul wa issǝxtaman, ad agdu d ǝššex-net.
Mafǝl tǝhannaya tezawt ta tǝhat šat n amadray-nak, kay amaran wǝr din-tǝgreɣ šilǝlt ta tǝhat šat ta-nak?

Manǝmmǝk as tǝganna y amadray-nak: "Ayy-i a dak-ǝkkǝsaɣ tezawt ta tǝhat šat-nak?" As iga awen, kay iman-nak wǝr tǝhǝnnǝya šilǝlt ta tǝhat šat ta-nak. Ǝmunafiq, ǝkkǝs tǝzzar šilǝlt ta tǝhat šat-nak, ǝddi ad za tannaflayaɣ daɣ tazawt ta tǝhat šat n amadray-nak, tǝkkǝsaɣ-as-tat!»
«Wǝr t-illa ašǝk isxân itârawan âratăn ǝbrarnen, wala iyyan wǝr nǝsxa itârawan âratăn olaɣnen.
Ǝkkulluk n ašǝk âratăn-net as itawazday. Wǝr tǝnimidan aratan ǝn fig daɣ tazzayt, wala deɣ itanamad alɣanab daɣ tamat.
Awedan wa olaɣan, ǝlluɣ wa ihan ǝwǝl-net a daɣ d-itakkas awa olaɣan, mišan anallabus ǝnta, talbast ta tǝhat ǝwǝl-net a daɣ d-itakkas awa labasan. Awa idkaran ǝwǝl n awedan a d-igammadan imi-net.»
«Ma fel as di-tǝgannim: "Ǝmǝli, Ǝmǝli!" Mišan wǝr tǝtǝggim awa dawan-ganna?»
«Awedan kul wa di-d-itasin isasam y awal-in, itamazal s awa ǝnneɣ, a dawan-ǝmǝla awedan wa s tu-z-ammattala.
Immittalaq-qu s awedan ikarrasan ehan. Iɣaz wǝllen har ewad tǝsǝlit, ikras-du fall-as ehan-net. Dǝffǝr awen osa-du ǝngǝy issohen, irzak-ku mišan wǝr t-isammatakway fǝlas tǝsǝlit a fǝl d-ikras.»
«Amaran awedan wa isasaman y awal-in mišan wǝr sǝr-ǝs itǝmizil, iha ǝlmital n awedan ikrasan ehan-net da wǝr t-iɣez. Osa-du ǝngǝy, istab-as. Ibarajjat, iɣrad ahluk.»
As iɣrad Ɣaysa emel ǝn salan win den kul i tamattay en, iggaz taɣrǝmt ǝn Kafarnahum.
Taɣrǝmt ten ih-et kabtan iyyan ǝn sojitan n Ǝrrum ilân akli-net ikna tara irinan, ibuk y iba.
As isla kabtan en isalan ǝn Ɣaysa, izammazal sǝr-ǝs arat daɣ muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud fǝl a t-ansǝyan a d-asu izzuzǝy akli-net.
Osan-in Ɣaysa, onsayan-tu, ǝnnan-as: «Alǝs a, ihôr a das-tagaɣ tǝnǝfust ta,
fǝlas irâ tamattay-nana, ǝnta fadda a danaɣ-issǝkrasan ehan-nana wa n ǝlɣibada.»
Tǝzzar iddew dǝr-san Ɣaysa. As din-ihoz Ɣaysa ehan, izammazal-du sǝr-ǝs kabtan en imidawan-net y a das-annin: «Ǝmǝli, ad wǝr tǝsǝlliyǝɣaɣ iman-nak, nak wǝr ǝwedaɣ ad tǝggǝzaɣ ehan-in.
Adi da fǝl kay-in-wǝr-oseɣ nak iman-in. Annu arat ɣas ad izzǝy amaššaɣal-in.

Ǝssâna daɣ adi fǝlas awedan a ǝmosaɣ a daɣ ǝttafan wiyyad tanat, ǝttâfaq-qat nak iman-in daɣ sojitan win daw-i ǝllanen. As ǝnneɣ y iyyan: "Aglu", ad aglu, as ǝnneɣ y iyyan: "Iyyaw", a di-d-asu. As ǝnneɣ y ǝkli-nin: "agu awa", ad t-agu.»
As isla Ɣaysa y awen, isammaklal sǝr-ǝs, imalallay-in aytedan win das-ǝlkamnen, inna: «Ǝnneɣ-awan, wala Kǝl-Israyil wǝr daɣ-san ǝnayaɣ awedan igân ǝzǝgzan ewâdan wa iga alǝs a.»
As din-ǝqqalan meddan win ǝmmozalnen ehan, osan-in akli wa irinan izzây.
Dǝffǝr awen ikka Ɣaysa aɣrǝm iyyan igân esǝm Nayn, ǝddewan dǝr-ǝs nǝttulab-net ǝd tamattay tagget.
As din-ihoz imi n ǝɣrǝm immǝnay d aytedan aggotnen ewaynen ǝnǝmmettǝn y a t-in-ǝnbǝlan. Alǝs wa n ǝnǝmmettǝn en, wǝr tǝla anna-net ar ǝnta, abba-net deɣ wǝr idder.
As tat-inay Ǝmǝli tǝsahhanatat-tu, inn-as: «Ayyu tala.»
Ikka-du ǝnǝmmettǝn, idas tǝssut ta daɣ immeway, ǝbdadan aytedan win t-ewaynen, tǝzzar inna: «Ǝmawad ǝnneɣ-ak: Ǝnkǝr!»
Iqqim-du alǝs wa aba, iššewal, issoɣal-tu Ɣaysa y anna-net.
Ǝrmaɣan aytedan kul, ad ǝmmalan Mǝššina gannin: «Ǝnnǝbi zǝwwǝran a d-inafalalan daɣ-na, Mǝššina osa-du tamattay-net fǝl a daɣ-as issǝn.»
Tǝzzar tǝffǝzzat sallat ǝn Ɣaysa daɣ akal ǝn Yahudǝyya ketnet, ǝd kallan win tu-ɣalayɣalaynen.
Igraw Yaxya isalan win den kul ɣur attalamitan-net. Iɣra-du ǝššin daɣ-san,
izammazal-tan s Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa y a das-annin: «Awak kay da was nǝqqǝl y a d-asu, meɣ ak ad nǝssǝgǝd y iyyan?»
As din-osan Ɣaysa, ǝnnan-as: «Yaxya wa isalmaɣan daɣ aman a dana-d-izammazalan sǝr-ǝk, inn-ak: "Awak kay da was nǝqqǝl y a d-asu, meɣ ak ad nǝssǝgǝd y iyyan?"»
Assaɣat ten da iman-net, izozay daɣ-as Ɣaysa aytedan aggotnen daɣ tǝwǝrnawen ǝd tǝlawayyen ǝd kǝlǝsuf, issǝswad deɣ imǝddǝrɣal aggotnen.

Ijjǝwwab Ɣaysa i meddan win sǝr-ǝs d-ǝmmozalnen, inn-asan: «Ǝqqǝlat Yaxya tǝssuɣǝlam-as awa tǝnayam d awas tǝslam, tannim-as: Imǝddǝrɣal ǝhannayan, inǝbdan jawanken, aytedan win igraw kǝtru ǝzzayan zaddogan, imzagan ǝgrawan tesalay, inǝmmǝttan nakkaran-du daɣ tǝmattant, šilǝqqawen deɣ sallanat y Ǝlinjil.
Ibbilal awedan wa wǝr igmed ǝzǝgzan-net fǝlas wǝr iga aššak daɣ awa ǝmosa.»
As ǝglan meddan win d-izammazal Yaxya, issǝnta Ɣaysa amagrad i tamattay daɣ batu ǝn Yaxya, inna: «Ma imos arat was tǝkkam ǝsuf y a tu-tǝnǝyam? Awak telant isiwǝliwil aḍu? Kala!
Daɣ adi ma tǝkkam y a t-id-tǝnǝyam? Awak alǝs ilsân tabdoq tǝknat šihussay? Kala! Ǝnǝyat za aytedan win ǝlsanen tabdoq ta tǝhossayat, ǝgân deɣ tǝmǝddurt daɣ ǝnniflayan, inan ǝn mǝnokalan a ǝhan.
Adi za ma tǝkkam y a t-id-tǝnǝyam? Awak ǝnnǝbi? Wǝllen zʼâs ǝnnǝbi. Amaran Yaxya ogar tišit n ǝnnǝbi fadda.
Fǝlas Yaxya ǝnta a fǝl ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban:
"Ǝnǝy za a dat-ǝk assaglaɣ anammazul-in a zʼaknin tarrayt-nak."
Ǝnneɣ-awan, wǝr kala a d-ihǝw awedan ogaran Yaxya; dǝr iga awen da wala ɣas wa ogaran tǝmmǝdrǝyt daɣ Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina, da ogar Yaxya.»
Aytedan win ǝslanen y awal ǝn Yaxya, harkid nabazan n amana, kul ǝqbalan as tarrayt ta n Mǝššina ǝnta a toɣadat, adi a fǝl ǝrḍan issǝlmaq-qan Yaxya daɣ aman.
Mišan Farisaytan ǝd musanan n Ǝttawret, ǝntanay ǝssǝknan ǝs tugǝyt ta ǝgan s a tan-issǝlmǝɣ Yaxya daɣ aman, iba ǝn tǝrǝddawt-nasan s awa ixtas Mǝššina.
Inna Ɣaysa: «Mas zʼammattalaɣ aytedan n azzaman win nǝha da? Awak ma dǝr olan?
Olân ǝd bararan ǝqqimnen daɣ ǝssuk tinǝmǝɣrin gannin:
"Nǝwat-awan tende,
mišan wǝr tǝweɣam!
Nǝg-awan isakkan ǝn tǝfǝyyawt,
mišan wǝr tǝlem!"»
«Ǝnneɣ-awan adi fǝlas Yaxya wa isalmaɣan aytedan daɣ aman as d-osa, issigat ǝzum wǝr isǝssu deɣ esmad n alɣanab, tǝnnam aggǝsuf a t-izdaɣan.
Amaran, nak Ag Aggadǝm ose-du, ǝtatta ǝsassa, mišan tǝnnam: "Ǝnawat alǝs wen n amawwalay en, isassin esmad s igǝt, imos ǝmidi ǝn nabazan ǝn takǝsen d ark aytedan!"»
Masnat ta du-tǝfalat Mǝššina amaran, aytedan kul win ǝhanen tarrayt ta n Mǝššina, ǝntanay a sataddinen aqqad-net.
Igmay Farisay iyyan daɣ Ɣaysa a ɣur-ǝs atšu. Tǝzzar ika Ɣaysa ehan ǝn Farisay wen, saɣɣamaran ad tamansawan.
Wala a ihogan tǝraz-du tǝntut iyyat ǝn tanasbakkadt tǝhât aɣrǝm en da, tǝslât as Ɣaysa imigarat i Farisay wen. As du-tosa tewây butalay n alwardi.
Tǝmal-du dǝffǝr Ɣaysa, ɣur daran-net ad tǝhallu har tǝssǝbdag idaran ǝn Ɣaysa ǝs mǝttawan-net, tǝmmas-tan ǝs jǝkkad-net. A dasan-tǝtamallat tǝnaqqal fall-asan alwardi.
As inay Farisay wa isimuguren Ɣaysa awen, inna daɣ man-net: «Ǝnnar imos alǝs a ǝnnǝbi, issǝn as tǝntut ta tu-tǝddasat da, tanasbakkadt.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Simɣon, a dak-annaɣ arat.» Inn-as Simɣon: «Šiwǝl, Ǝššex!»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Kala a t-illa alǝs iyyan irwâsan ǝššin meddan. Iyyan irwâs-tu sǝmmosat tǝmad ǝn tamma n ǝzrǝf, wa hadan irwâs-tu sǝmmosat tǝmǝrwen.
Dad wǝr ǝlen as ǝrzaman, oyy-asan awa tan-irwas. Awak ma tǝnneɣ mǝni daɣ-san wa tu-z-iren wǝllen?»
Inn-as Simɣon: «Ordeɣ as was oyya ǝmarwas wa aggen.» Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Tidǝt-nak.»

Amaran imalallay-in tantut tǝzzar inna i Simɣon: «Tahannayaɣ tantut ta? As d-ǝggazaɣ ehan-nak wǝr di-tǝkfeɣ aman ǝs ǝššorada idaran-in, mišan ǝnta tǝssǝbdak-kan ǝs mǝttawan-net tǝmas-tan ǝs jǝkkad-net.
As d-oseɣ ehan-nak wǝr di-du-tǝssǝlkada, mišan ǝnta a d-oseɣ tǝtamallat i daran-in fǝl saɣmar a di-tǝga.
Kay wǝr tǝzwayaɣ eɣaf-in, mišan ǝnta idaran-in a fǝl tǝnɣal alwardi.
Adi a fǝl dak-ǝnneɣ: tara zǝwwǝrat ta di-tǝssǝkna tǝsitadda as ibakkadan-net tiwasarafan-as kul kuddeɣ ǝggǝtan; mišan awedan wa igrawan tǝsureft n a ǝndǝrran, ǝnta tara-net ši ǝndǝrrat.»
Tǝzzar inna Ɣaysa i tǝntut ten: «Ibakkadan-nam tiwasarafan-am.»
Ad gannin aytedan win dǝr-ǝs ǝdrawnen imensewan daɣ man-nasan: «Ma imos wa daɣ awedan as wala ibakkadan isuruf-tan y aytedan?»
Amaran inna Ɣaysa i tǝntut ten: «Ǝzǝgzan-nam a kam-iɣlasan, aglu daɣ alxer.»
Dǝffǝr awen illil Ɣaysa iɣǝrman ǝd tǝɣarmaten immâl y aytedan Ǝlinjil, imosan isalan ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina. Ǝddewan dǝr-ǝs nǝttulab-net win maraw d ǝššin.
Iddew deɣ ǝd tǝdoden as šiyyad kǝlǝsuf a daɣ-asnat ikkas, šiyyad šiwǝrnawen a daq-qanat izzozay. Ǝmosnat Maryama Madǝl, s ǝnta a d-ǝgmadan ǝssa kǝlǝsuf,
ǝd Jannata ta n tǝntut ǝn Xuza wa innǝttafan ǝd taɣawšiwen n ǝmǝnokal Herod, ǝd Suzana ǝd šiyyad šidoden aggotnen. Ketnasnat ǝdhâlnat Ɣaysa ǝd nǝttulab-net s awa ǝlanat.
Wǝr t-illa ǝɣrǝm a du-wǝr-gǝmmǝdan aytedan takkin-du Ɣaysa, tǝzzar tǝga fall-as tiddawat tagget, ig-asan ǝlmital wa:
«Kala ad igla ǝmagyak iyyan y ad inbǝl amasa-net. Daɣ anabal wa itaggu den imosan anabas n amasa, ərtaknat tǝblalen šiyyad fǝl tama ǝn tarrayt, tǝzzar ǝkkokalan daɣ-asnat aytedan, ǝtšan-tanat gǝḍad.
Šiyyad ǝrtaknat daɣ adag ǝhanat tǝhun. As d-ǝgmadnat, ǝqqurnat fǝl iba ǝn bǝddug.
Šiyyad ǝrtaknat daɣ tǝfǝssaɣ, ǝdwalnat dǝr-ǝsnat, ǝlmaznat-tanat.
Šiyyad ǝrtaknat daɣ amaḍal olâɣan, tǝzzar ǝdwalnat. Ǝkkulluk ǝn tǝblalt terâw temeday n iyyat.» As inna Ɣaysa awen idkal ǝmǝsli-net inna: «Wa isallin, isǝsǝmet!»
Dǝffǝr awen ǝssǝstanan-tu nǝttulab-net d almaɣna n ǝlmital wa iga den.
Inn-asan: «Kawanay tǝgrâwam masnat daɣ ǝssiran ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina, mišan aytedan win hadatnen tangalen as dasan-ittǝmal ǝssir wa, fǝl ad iqqǝl as
"ǝswâdan, mišan wǝr hǝnnǝyan; ǝssisaman mišan wǝr gǝrrin."»
Igla Ɣaysa iššewal, inn-asan: «Ǝlmital wǝdi almaɣna-net da: amasa ǝlmital a imos n Awal ǝn Mǝššina.
Amasa wa irtakan fǝl tama ǝn tarrayt, ǝlmital a imos n aytedan win ǝslanen y awal ǝn Mǝššina, mišan ad d-asu Iblis ikkǝs-tu daɣ wallan-nasan fǝl ad wǝr ǝzzǝgzǝnan, ǝgrǝwan efsan.
Amasa wa irtakan daɣ tǝhun, ǝlmital a imos n aytedan win ǝslanen y Awal ǝn Mǝššina, ǝqbalan-tu ǝs man filawasnen, mišan wǝr ila awen ekay, ǝzǝgzan-nasan wǝr itihag. As tawajarraban, a tan-igmǝd.

Amasa wa irtakan daɣ tǝfǝssaɣ, ǝlmital a imos n aytedan win ǝslanen y awal ǝn Mǝššina ǝqbalan-tu, mišan as tan-ǝdgǝzan aššawašatan n ǝddǝnet ǝd tara n ǝddǝnet d arak deranan, ǝssǝfalan-du dǝnnǝg awal wen, ad igdǝl awen y ǝzǝgzan-nasan alkamalat.

Amasa wa irtakan amaran daɣ amaḍal olaɣan, ǝlmital a imos n aytedan win ǝslanen y awal ǝn Mǝššina ǝlân iwallan olaɣnen lammodnen, tǝzzar ǝqbǝlan-tu, ǝttǝfan-tu s ǝlluɣ, tǝgmad-tan-du tǝnfa fǝlas ǝzmâran y arat kul.»

Inn-asan Ɣaysa deɣ: «Wǝr t-illa awedan isarɣin fǝtǝla tǝzzar isǝbbǝnbǝy fall-as ǝɣǝzu madeɣ ag-et daw tessat. Kalar ǝšilǝy a tat-itaggu tǝšǝššilǝyt-net fǝl ad ǝnǝyan aytedan win du-taggaznen ehan s ǝnnur-net.
Wǝr t-illa a iɣbâran ǝs wǝrgeɣ ad affaggu, wala iyyan istâran ǝs wǝrgeɣ a d-inǝnǝfilǝl, itǝwǝssǝn ezal a mallan.
Daɣ adi ǝnkǝdat y ǝmmǝk was tǝsasamam. Awedan wa ilan, a das-itǝwǝšitu awa ila; wa wǝr nǝla amaran, arat n awas iɣîl il-ay da a daɣ-as attarmas.»
Tosa-du anna ǝn Ɣaysa ǝd mǝdrayan-net, mišan orn-en a t-in-awǝdan fǝl igǝt ǝn tamattay.
Itawann-as: «Anna-nak ǝd mǝdrayan-nak ǝbdâdan-ak, ǝrân anay-nak.»
Mišan inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Anna-nin ǝd mǝdrayan-in aytedan win sasamnen y awal ǝn Mǝššina, tamazalan s awa inna.»
Ǝzǝl iyyan iggaz Ɣaysa aɣlal n aman ǝnta ǝd nǝttulab-net. Inn-asan: «Nǝɣrǝset agaraw ǝs tagadamayt-net ta hadat.» Tǝzzar ǝglan.
Ǝglân fǝl aman as din-ibaz etǝs Ɣaysa. Wala a ihogan igar-du aḍu issohen fǝl agaraw, ad idakkar ǝɣlal aman, ǝggazan zega n a tan-atšin aman.
Ǝhozan-du nǝttulab Ɣaysa, a tu-sankaran daɣ etǝs, gannin as: «Ǝššex, Ǝššex, nǝhlak.» Inkar-du Ɣaysa isannarɣam y aḍu ǝd tanazzamaren takkinen ijǝnnawan, tǝzzar ibdad aḍu, idrar arat kul.
Amaran inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ma iga ǝzǝgzan-nawan?» Issirmaq-qan awen, isimaklal sǝr-san. Ad tinǝmǝnnin: «Ma imos wa daɣ awedan as wala aḍu d aman ittâf daɣ-san tanat?»
Dǝffǝr awen ewadan-in akal ǝn Garassenatan inimaɣlayan agaraw d akal wa n Galilaya.
Da da ɣas a d-izzǝbbat Ɣaysa aɣlal n aman ǝnta a das-d-issǝlkad alǝs iyyan ǝhân kǝlǝsuf. Alǝs wen in ǝɣrǝm ihan akal en da. Irǝw as issǝnsa isǝlsa, igmad aɣaywan, ixsar daɣ zǝkwan.
Inay Ɣaysa ɣas, ad itakkas imaslan labasnen, tǝzzar issǝjad i Ɣaysa, idkal ǝmǝsli-net wǝllen inna: «Ya Ɣaysa wa n Barar ǝn Mǝššina di n Amadkol ma daɣ-i tareɣ? Onsâyaq-qay a di-wǝr-tǝzǝɣɣǝba.»
Innâ awen fǝlas Ɣaysa a omaran aggǝsuf wa t-ihan s a t-id-igmǝd. Iyyǝwan-du sǝr-ǝs aggǝsuf en ǝsǝnkǝr, karradan-tu aytedan ǝs sassaran ǝd tǝzabagawen mišan ad iɣtǝs awen kul, awǝy-tu aggǝsuf s ǝsuf.
Issǝstan-tu Ɣaysa, inn-as: «Ma esǝm-nak?» Ijjiwwab-as inn-as: «Esǝm-in Egan.» Inn-as alǝs en awen fǝlas kǝlǝsuf aggotnen a t-ǝhanen.
Ad tansayan kǝlǝsuf win t-ǝhanen Ɣaysa a tan-wǝr-issuku anu wa wǝr nǝla eder.
Illât-tu ǝsǝgǝn aggen ǝn ladayan ǝdânnen fǝl tasaga ǝn tǝkašwart. Onsayan kǝlǝsuf Ɣaysa y a tan-akfu turagat n ad ǝggǝzan iladayan en, ikf-asan-tat.
Ǝgmadan kǝlǝsuf alǝs en, ǝggazan iladayan. Tǝzzar ozalan-du ladayan fǝl azagada ǝn təkašwart ad titǝrǝgtǝrigan daɣ agaraw, tattan-tan aman.
As ǝnayan madanan ǝn layadayan awa igan den, ozalan, ǝgan isalan n awen daɣ ǝɣrǝm en ǝd ɣǝlǝyɣǝlayan-net.
Ǝglan aytedan y ad ǝnǝyan awa igan. As din-osan Ɣaysa ogazan-in ɣur-ǝs alǝs wa ǝgmadan kǝlǝsuf, iqqim ɣur daran-net, ilsâ, tǝqqâl-t-idu deɣ tayttay-net, tǝzzar tǝggaz-tan tasa.
Ǝgan daɣ-san aytedan win ǝgǝyyatnen y awen isalan n ǝmmǝk was itawasafsa alǝs wa daɣ tawakkasan kǝlǝsuf.
Mišan ǝnkaran-du aytedan kul win akal ǝn Garassenatan ad gammayan daɣ Ɣaysa a tan-ugag fǝlas tasa a tan-tǝggazat zǝwwǝrat. Iggaz Ɣaysa aɣlal n aman iqqal.
Onsay-tu alǝs wa ǝgmadan kǝlǝsuf ad t-ayyu a dǝr-ǝs idaw, mišan issoɣal-tu Ɣaysa inn-as:
«Ǝqqǝl ehan-nak, tǝmǝla y aytedan iket n arraxmat ta dak-iga Mǝššina da.» Tǝzzar igla ad immal daɣ ǝɣrǝm en ketnet arat kul wa das-iga Ɣaysa.
As iqqal Ɣaysa ǝsǝlim wa hadan n agaraw, tǝssǝlkad-as-du tamattay as ketnet tǝqqâl-as.
Alwaq wen da a d-osa alǝs iyyan igân esǝm Jayɣus imosan iyyan daɣ muzaran n ahan n ǝlɣibada wa n Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝn tǝɣrǝmt ten. Issǝjad dat Ɣaysa, ad t-itansay ad idawan s ahan-net,
fǝlas elles tǝmosat wǝlǝt maraw elan d ǝššin, s ǝnta ɣas a ila, a tǝbukat y iba.
Iddew dǝr-ǝs Ɣaysa, tǝtanabdaɣ fall-as tamattay.
Tamattay en tah-et təntut təgât maraw elan d əššin igammad-tat əzni. Tǝnɣa tǝla-net kul daɣ nasmagalan, mišan wǝr t-illa awedan ifrâgan ǝzuzǝy-net.
Tǝhoz-du Ɣaysa sa sǝr tǝɣǝrden, tǝdas tǝbǝnik ǝn tǝkadkat-net, izzǝkkat ǝzni wa tat-igammadan tamazayt ten da. Tǝzzay.
Tǝzzar inna Ɣaysa: «Ma di-idasan?» Iggad awedan kul as t-idâs, amaran inn-as Butros: «Ǝššex, tamattay a ketnet as kay-taɣalayɣalay, tǝsâs-kay.»
Mišan ya inna Ɣaysa: «Awedan iyyan idâs-i fǝlas ǝfrâya i tarna iyyat as di-tǝgmad.»
As tǝssan tǝntut ten as tǝffigga, tǝkka-du Ɣaysa tǝndaw-tat taysǝst, tǝssǝjad dat-ǝs, tǝmal-as dat aytedan kul ǝddǝlil wa fǝl tu-tǝdas ǝd tǝmǝzzǝyt ta tǝga tamazayt ten da.
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Tabarart-in, ǝzǝgzan-nam sǝr-i a kam-izzozayan, aglu daɣ alxer.»
Harwada iššewal Ɣaysa as d-osa awedan iyyan a d-ifalan aɣaywan ǝn Jayɣus wa n ǝmuzar n ahan wa n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, inn-as: «Allek aba-tat, mazzay d ǝddaguz n Ǝššex.»
Isla Ɣaysa y awen, inna i Jayɣus: «Ad wǝr tǝrmǝɣa, zǝgzǝn ɣas, allek ad tǝzzǝy.»
As din-ewad Ɣaysa ehan ǝn Jayɣus, igdal y aytedan ad t-ǝggǝzan, wǝr oyya ar Butros ǝd Yaxya ǝd Yaqub d abba ǝn tǝbarart d anna-net.
Aytedan kul win ǝllanen den, hallan, sikalalan fǝl tǝbarart mišan inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ayyiwat tala, tǝbarart wǝr tat-aba, etǝs ɣas a tǝga.»
A daɣ-as tajaban fǝlas ǝssânan as wǝr tǝdder.
Tǝzzar iggaz Ɣaysa fǝl tǝbarart, ibaz ǝfus-net, iɣr-et, inn-as: «Tabarart ǝnkǝr-du!»
Ǝqqalan-tat-du man-net tǝbdad-du daɣ tamazayt ten da, tǝzzar omar-tan Ɣaysa s a tat-akfin a tǝtša.
Ǝhagan marwan ǝn tǝbarart, mišan irɣam-asan Ɣaysa fǝl amel n awen y awedan waliyyan.
Iɣra-du Ɣaysa inǝttulab-net win maraw d ǝššin, ikf-en tarna d ǝlxǝkum fǝl kǝlǝsuf kul, ikf-en deɣ fǝrregat n ǝzuzǝy ǝn tǝwarnawen.
Izammazal-tan y ad agin isalan ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina, ǝzzuzǝyan deɣ imiranan.
Inn-asan: «Ad wǝr tawǝyam wala daɣ ǝšikǝl, gǝr zʼiqqal tallaq wala aɣrǝg, wala allaw, wala azrǝf, wala deɣ a okâyan tǝkadkat iyyadda.
As din-tosam aɣrǝm, ehan wa tǝggazam isammagarat-kawan, zabbatat daɣ-as har tǝgmǝdam aɣrǝm wǝdi.
Aɣrǝm tǝggazam wǝr kawan-ǝqbelan aytedan-net, as tu-tǝgammadam tǝbbikbakam-in ǝgodrar-net wa iwaran idaran-nawan, ilkâm ad aggayyat awen fall-asan.»
Ǝglan nǝttulab, ǝllilan šiɣarmaten, ad ǝmmâlan Ǝlinjil daɣ adag kul, zuzǝyan daɣ-as deɣ imiranan.

Isla Herod wa n amuzar n akal ǝn Galilaya aratan kul win itaggu Ɣaysa ǝd nǝttulab-net, iqqan awen eɣaf-net fǝlas ǝllan-tu aytedan ganninen ǝs Ɣaysa: «Awen Yaxya wa isalmaɣan aytedan daɣ aman a d-inkaran daɣ tǝmattant.»
Wiyyad gannin: «Awen ǝnnǝbi Ilyas a d-izzǝbben.» Wiyyad deɣ gannin: «Awen iyyan daɣ ǝnnǝbitan win ǝrǝwnen a d-inkâran daɣ tǝmattant.»
Inna Herod: «Yaxya, nak iman-in a d-issǝfrasan eɣaf-net, daɣ adi ma imos alǝs wa fǝl sallaɣ aratan win?» Ad igammay Herod d anay ǝn Ɣaysa.
Ǝqqalan-du nǝmmuzal, ǝssoɣalan i Ɣaysa awa ǝgan kul. Tǝzzar igmad dǝr-san aytedan s adag issufan a din-ikitayyen, ihan anamod ǝn tǝɣrǝmt ta n Betsayda.
Mišan tǝsla tamattay awen, tǝlkam-as. Ig-asan Ɣaysa marxaba, tǝzzar iššewal-asan daɣ salan ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina, izzozay daɣ-san win ǝddǝrarnen s awen.
As tǝbuk tǝfuk y agadal, ǝhozan-t-idu nǝttulab-net win maraw d ǝššin, ǝnnan-as: «Suɣǝl tamattay a, ad takku šiɣarmaten ǝd ɣawnatan win ǝhoznen, ad tǝgmǝy id tǝnsa d a tǝtša fǝlas edag issufan awa.»
Inn-asan: «Satšat-tan kawanay iman-nawan da!» Ǝnnan-as: «Nakkanay wǝr nǝttef ar sǝmmosat tǝgǝlwen d ǝššin kifitan, kundaba za ad nǝglâ nazzanza-du imensewan i tǝxlǝk a kul.»
Edag ǝn sǝmmos gim n alǝs a ǝllanen den. Inna Ɣaysa i nǝttulab-net: «Saɣɣamiwat aytedan kul, tagim-tan šiɣimten ǝn sǝmmosat sǝmmosat tǝmǝrwen n awedan.»
Ǝgan nǝttulab awen da, saɣɣaman aytedan kul.

Tǝzzar idkal Ɣaysa sǝmmosat tǝgǝlwen šin den d ǝššin kifitan win, iggǝzzay ijǝnnawan, iga igodan i Mǝššina amaran ikaramkaram šigǝlwen šin, iga awen da i kifitan, ikf-en i nǝttulab-net y a tan-uzanan i tamattay.
Ǝtšan aytedan en ketnasan har əyyəwanan. Tawašadawan-du karammutan win du-tawaglaznen, tawadnayan daɣ-san maraw ǝzmaman d ǝššin.
Ǝzǝl iyyan itattar Ɣaysa ɣas-net, wǝr ɣur-ǝs illa ar inǝttulab-net, dǝffǝr awen issǝstan-tan, inn-asan: «Awak daɣ iduf n aytedan, ma ǝmosa?»
Ǝnnan-as: «Wiyyad a gannin Yaxya wa isalmaɣan aytedan daɣ aman a tǝmosa, wiyyad a gannin: ǝnnǝbi Ilyas, wiyyad deɣ a gannin iyyan daɣ ǝnnǝbitan win ǝrǝwnen a d-inkâran daɣ tǝmattant.»
Tǝzzar inn-asan: «Kawanay za ma tǝnnam ma ǝmosa?» Inn-as Butros: «Ǝlmǝsix ǝn Mǝššina a tǝmosa.»
Issənkad Ɣaysa nǝttulab-net, omar-tan s ad wǝr ǝmǝlan y awedan waliyyan isalan win den.
Inn-asan: «Nak Ag Aggadǝm ilzâm-i ad ǝnǝyaɣ arkanay aggen, unkaran-i muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝd muzaran ǝn limaman ǝd musanan n Ǝttawret, tǝwǝggin man-in, ǝnkǝra-du deɣ daɣ tǝmattant ǝzǝl wa n karad.»
Dǝffǝr awen inn-asan ketnasan: «Wa iran a di-ilkǝm, wǝdi igmǝdet tara ən man-net, agu imateran-net idkǝl tǝgǝttawt-net akk ǝzǝl, ilkəm-i.
Ǝssǝnat as awedan wa wǝr nǝgǝmmǝy ar aggaz ǝn man-net, wədi ad t-ǝgmǝdan, mišan wa iqbalan ad t-ǝgmǝdan fəl əddǝlil-in, wǝdi ad iɣlǝs.
Ma zʼaknu y awedan ad igrǝw ǝddǝnet ketnet, ǝnta issixrak iman-net, iffota daɣ alaxirat?

Awedan kul wa isakkarakad ləkkum y-i, madeɣ isikarakad-tu əsuɣəl n awal-in, wǝdi nak da, Ag Aggadǝm, a di-isəkkərukəd ǝlqǝbulat-net ǝzǝl wa du-z-ǝqqǝla aheɣ tanaya-nin, tǝmosat tanaya ta n Abba, tǝmos deɣ ta n angalosan a zaddognen.
Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as, wiyyad daɣ-wan ǝbdâdnen da da, wǝr tan-z-iba wǝr ǝnayan Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina.»
Edag n ǝttam adan dǝffǝr igi wa dasan-iga Ɣaysa batuten šin den, inkar iddew ǝd Butros ǝd Yaxya ǝd Yaqub s ǝdɣaɣ iyyan fǝl a fall-as ansǝy Mǝššina.
Itattar den da as immǝttay udǝm-net, tǝzzar ǝgan sǝlsa-net tǝmǝllay tǝtassamat.
Ǝhinan-in oggân ǝnnǝbi Musa d ǝnnǝbi Ilyas daɣ tanaya ǝn Mǝššina, mišawalan ǝd Ɣaysa daɣ batu n agamad wa zʼagu ǝddǝnet a zʼattaddin daɣ Yerusalam ǝs tǝmattant-net.
Ǝhinan-in oggân ǝnnǝbi Musa d ǝnnǝbi Ilyas daɣ tanaya ǝn Mǝššina, mišawalan ǝd Ɣaysa daɣ batu n agamad wa zʼagu ǝddǝnet a zʼattaddin daɣ Yerusalam ǝs tǝmattant-net.
As itaggu awen Butros ǝd midawan-net ibâz-tan-in etǝs. As d-ǝnkaran ǝnayan tanaya ǝn Ɣaysa, ǝnayan deɣ ǝššin meddan win dǝr innǝbdad.
As iggaz ǝnnǝbi Musa d Ilyas šin ǝgǝlli, inna Butros i Ɣaysa: «Ǝššex, olâɣ as nǝlla da. Ǝndawat ad nǝkrǝs karad hǝktan: iyyan i-nak, iyyan in Musa, iyyan in Ilyas.» Wǝr issen Butros a igannu den.
Igannu Butros awen da as du-tǝnafalal tǝgarak iyyat, tǝlsa Ɣaysa d ǝnnǝbitan ǝššin win dǝr innǝbdad. As tǝlsa Butros ǝd midawan-net, tǝggaz-tan tasa.
Igmad-du ǝmǝsli tǝgarak ten, inna:
«Awa Barar-in
wa sannafranaɣ,
sǝsǝmat-as.»
As tǝnda batu ten, wǝr hǝnnǝyan nǝttulab ar Ɣaysa. Ǝffǝstan fǝl awen, wǝr t-illa awedan ǝs t-ǝmâlan daɣ adan en.
As ǝzǝl wa ilkaman i wen, izzǝbbat-du Ɣaysa ǝd nǝttulab-net win karad en adɣaɣ, tǝzzar tǝssǝlkad-as-in tamattay tǝgget.
Wala a ihogan idkal alǝs iyyan daɣ ammas ǝn tamattay en ǝmǝsli-net, inna: «Ya Ǝššex, onsayaq-qay a di-tǝhǝnǝtteɣ i barar-in, ǝnta ɣas a ǝleɣ.
Aljayn a t-itabazan, tǝzzar ad izayyak, itizǝbǝrdil, isakafkaf. Gǝrrid as t-itayyu, issikn-ay alɣazab.
Onsâyaɣ inǝttulab-nak a daɣ-as t-ǝkkǝsan, indar-asan.»
Tǝzzar inna Ɣaysa: «Xa! Iket iba n ǝzǝgzan d ǝššur daɣ aytedan n azzaman a! Awak har ǝmmay ǝddewa dǝr-wan, ǝzmâraɣ-awan? Awǝy-du barar-nak.»
As d-ihoz barar Ɣaysa, iggǝdl-ay aggǝsuf, ad itizǝbǝrdil. Iharaššat Ɣaysa aggǝsuf, ikkas-tu daɣ barar, izzay, issoɣal-tu y abba-net.
Aytedan kul tǝsimaklal sǝr-san tǝzzǝwwǝrt ǝn tarna ǝn Mǝššina.
Harwada isimaklal s aytedan arat kul wa iga Ɣaysa den, as inna i nǝttulab-net:
«Tǝggǝzet batu ta šimǝzzugen-nawan, tǝttafam-tat: "Nak Ag Aggadǝm ǝjwâra ad ǝggâzaɣ ifassan n aytedan."»
Mišan wǝr ǝgren batu ta dasan-iga den, ittinkal-asan almaɣna-net fǝl a tat-wǝr-agrin, amaran tah-en tasa n ǝsǝstan-net.
Tǝnkar tamazaq gǝr nǝttulab ǝn Ɣaysa daɣ batu ǝn wa daɣ-san ogaran almaqam.
Issân Ɣaysa awa samadranan, a di fǝl d-idkal arat ǝn barar iyyan issǝbdad-tu dǝgma-net,
amaran inn-asan: «I iqbalan barar a, fǝl ǝddǝlil-in, nak a iqbal. I di-iqbalan deɣ, wa di-d-izammazalan a iqbal. Wa daɣ-wan wǝr nǝmos arat, ǝnta a zǝwwǝran.»
Inna Yaxya i Yaysa: «Ǝššex, nǝnây alǝs iyyan itakkasan kǝlǝsuf daɣ aytedan s esǝm-nak, nǝnn-as ad wǝr ilǝs igi n awen, fǝlas wǝr danaɣ-iha ǝs lǝkkum y-ak.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «A das-tu-wǝr-tǝgdǝlam, fǝlas i wər nəgəmməy təkma-nawan, wədi əmidi-nawan.»
As d-ǝhozan adan win daɣ zʼassandu Ɣaysa arat wa ixtas Mǝššina, a t-imosan ǝmǝdkǝl-net ǝs jǝnnawan, isaggatakkat y iki n ǝɣrǝm ǝn Yerusalam.
Issǝgla inammazalan dat-ǝs, ǝkkan taɣrǝmt iyyat n akal ǝn Samarǝya y a das-aknin edag n ǝzǝbbi.
Mišan ugayan aytedan ǝn tǝɣrǝmt ten s a dasan-imǝgurǝt fǝlas ikkâ Yerusalam.
As inay Yaqub ǝd Yaxya win nǝttulab-net awen, ǝnnan: «Ǝmǝli, tareɣ ad nannu i tǝmsay a fall-asan du-tazzabbat, tǝsǝrrǝkǝmmǝt-tan?»
Imalallay-tan-in Ɣaysa, isannarɣam-asan,
tǝzzar okayan ǝs tǝɣrǝmt iyyat.
Jiwanken as inna alǝs iyyan i Ɣaysa: «A dak-ǝlkǝma s adag kul wa tǝkke.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Izagazan ǝlân enwan, igǝḍad deɣ ǝlân šisǝllula, mišan nak Ag Aggadǝm wǝr ǝleɣ wala edag daɣ ǝssǝnsa eɣaf-in.»
Inna Ɣaysa y iyyan alǝs: «Ǝlkǝm-i.» Tǝzzar inn-as: «Ǝmǝli, akf-i turagat n ad agla har din-ǝnbǝlaɣ abba-nin tǝzzar.»
Mišan inn-as Ɣaysa: «Ayyu inǝmmǝttan ad ǝnbǝlan inǝmmǝttan-nasan, kay amaran, aglu taga y aytedan isalan ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina.»
Inn-as iyyan alǝs: «Ǝmǝli, areɣ a dak-ǝlkǝma, mišan akf-i turagat n ad nǝmǝgga d aytedan-in šiwatriwen tǝzzar.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Awedan wa issǝntan daɣ lǝkkum y-i, mišan wǝr iga awen s ǝwǝl iyyanda, wǝdi wǝr ihor ǝd Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina.»
Dǝffǝr awen isannafran Ǝmǝli wiyyad inǝttulab ǝmosnen ǝssayat tǝmǝrwen d ǝššin, izammazal-tan s ǝššin ǝššin y a das-in-izaran ǝs ɣǝrman ǝd daggan win as ibuk y a tan-immǝr.
Inn-asan: «Ɣarat tǝggǝt, mišan wǝr ǝggǝtan maššaɣalan win tat-z-alǝynen. Daɣ adi ǝttǝrat s esǝm ǝn mǝššis ǝn ɣarat ta, a d-assaglu imaššaɣalan a tat-olaynen.
Aglat! Zimazalaq-qawan tǝmosam zun jamaran ǝhanen ammas ǝn ridalan.
Ad wǝr tawǝyam azrǝf wala aɣrǝg wala tǝsǝsǝl ta n sanatat. A kawan-wǝr-sǝllulen assalaman daɣ tarrayt.»
«Ehan tǝggazam, tǝgǝram fall-as assalam tǝzzar.
Kud ih-ay awedan n alxer, wǝdi a kawan-iqbǝl, igrǝw alxer-nawan. Kud deɣ wǝr t-iha, wǝdi takǝyam d alxer-nawan.
As tǝgrawam ehan n awedan n alxer, tǝxsǝram daɣ-as. Tatšim, tašwim awa kawan-itawakfan, fǝlas amaššaɣal kul ihor d alxaq-net. Ad wǝr tilalam inan.»
«Aɣrǝm a din-tosam deɣ ǝqbalan-kawan mǝssawǝs, tatšim arat was kawan-sammagaren,
tǝzzuzǝyam imiranan win t-ǝhanen, tǝzzar tannim y aytedan-net: "Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina tǝhôz-kawan-du."
Mišan aɣrǝm a din-tosam wǝr kawan-ǝqbelan mǝssawǝs, ilalat tarrayen-net tǝgannim:
"Tǝggiyem as wala aboqqa n ǝɣrǝm-nawan wa iwaran idaran-nana da nǝbbikbakk-in, mišan ǝssǝnat as Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina tǝhôz."
Ǝnneɣ-awan, ǝzǝl wa n tabadday, aytedan n ǝɣrǝm wǝdi, ad agin alɣazab ogaran wa zʼagin win ǝɣrǝm wa n Sǝdom.»

«Iket alɣazab iqqâl-awan kǝl-aɣrǝm ǝn Koradzin! Iket alɣazab iqqâl-awan kǝl-ǝɣrǝm ǝn Betsayda! Fǝlas tǝlmǝɣjujaten šin ɣur-wan ǝganen ǝnnar ǝgânat daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Tir ǝd wa n Sidon, wǝdi irǝw as ǝqqanan isǝlsa ǝn bǝhu ǝqqiman daɣ eẓǝd, imos awen ǝsǝnnǝfilǝl n as ǝhdăn.
Awen daɣ a fǝlas, alɣazab wa za tagim ǝzǝl wa n tabadday ad agǝr wa zʼagin aytedan n ǝɣrǝm ǝn Tir ǝd wa n Sidon.
Kawanay aytedan n ǝɣrǝm wa n Kafarnahum, adis ad tammadkalam s aljannat? Kalar Jahannama a daɣ za tǝtǝwǝgaram.»
Inna Ɣaysa deɣ i nǝttulab-net: «Awedan wa dawan-issǝsaman, nak as issǝsam; wa kawan-inkuran deɣ, nak a inkur. Amaran wa di-inkuran, wǝdi wa di-d-izammazalan a inkur.»
As d-ǝqqalan nǝttulab win ǝssayat tǝmǝrwen d ǝššin, ǝknân tǝfalawist, gannin i Ɣaysa: «Ǝmǝli, wala kǝlǝsuf ǝttâfan tǝnna-nana as dasan-nǝɣra esǝm-nak!»
Tǝzzar inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Hannayaɣ Aššaytan as d-ifataqqat daɣ jǝnnawan zun essam.
Ǝssǝnat as ǝkfeq-qawan tarna fǝl taššolen ǝd tǝzurdam d awa ila azangaw-nana Iblis kul daɣ tarna. Wǝr t-illa a ifrâgan a dawan-agu tǝkma.
Mišan a kawan-wǝr-isǝfǝliwǝs as ǝttâfan kǝlǝsuf tǝnna-nawan, kalar isǝffǝliwǝset-kawan akatab wa ǝgan ǝsmawan-nawan daɣ aljannat.»

Assaɣat ten da ad ikna Infas wa Zǝddigan ǝsǝddǝwi ǝn Ɣaysa, tǝzzar inna: «Ǝgeɣ-ak tǝmmalen ya Abba, Ǝmǝli ǝn jǝnnawan d amaḍal fǝl aɣabar wa tǝgeɣ aratan win i musanan, ǝd malan ǝn tayttay, tǝsannafalalaq-qan y aytedan win wǝr nǝzlay ǝd bararan; id adi da a imosan agna-nak ya Abba.
Arat kul ig-ay Abba-nin daɣ ǝfus-in, wǝr t-illa i issanan awa ǝmosa ar Abba, wǝr t-illa deɣ i issanan awa imos Abba ar nak an Barar-net d awedan was areɣ a das-tu-sǝnnǝfilǝla.»
Imalallay-in Ɣaysa inǝttulab-net, iššewal-asan ǝntanay ɣas, inn-asan: «Ǝbbilalnat šittawen šin hannaynen awa tǝhannayam!
Silakanaɣ-awan as sidaranan ǝnnǝbitan aggotnen ǝd mǝnokalan anay n awa tǝhannayam, mišan wǝr t-ǝnayan, sidaranan deɣ tesalay y awas tǝsallim, mišan wǝr das-ǝslen.»
Dǝffǝr awen inkar-du ǝmusan n ǝššǝriɣa iyyan iga i Ɣaysa ǝsǝstan imosan tǝnagmayt, inn-as: «Ǝššex, mas di-ilzam igi-net, y ad ǝgrǝwa tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat?»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Ma iktaban daɣ Ǝttawret? Ma daɣ-as tǝɣreɣ?»
Ijjǝwwab-as, inn-as: «Iktâb daɣ-as as:
"Ad tireɣ Ǝmǝli-nak Mǝššina s ǝwǝl iyyanda, ǝd man ǝrdânen, tireq-qu ǝs tǝɣurad-nak kul ǝd tayttay-nak kul, tireɣ deɣ ǝšǝqqaɣ-nak ǝs tǝmǝwit tas tareɣ iman-nak."»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Aljawab-nak oɣâd, taggu adi da ad tǝddǝra.»
Mišan dad ira ǝmusan wen ad aknu batu-net, inna i Ɣaysa: «Ma imosan za ǝšǝqqaɣ-in?»

Ijjǝwwab-as Ɣaysa s ǝlmital wa, inn-as: «Alǝs iyyan a d-igmadan aɣrǝm ǝn Yerusalam, iras ikka wa n Yerikaw har t-ǝgrawan baydagan. Ǝbazan daɣ-as awa ila, ǝggâtan-tu, as t-oyyan illa gǝr tǝmǝddurt d iba.
Imazayyat d awen d as d-iga ǝlimam iyyan tarrayt ten. Inay alǝs wen, iɣlay-tu.
Illam-du iyyan daɣ Kǝl-Lebi ǝnta da den, inay-tu, iɣlay-tu.
Mišan as d-illam aw Samarǝya iyyan den iššokalan, inay-tu, tǝggaz-tu tǝhanint-net.
Ikk-ay-du, iššorad ibusan-net s azzayt d esmad n alɣanab, ittal-tan, tǝzzar issǝwan-tu tǝsǝnǝyt-net, eway-tu s azazzabbaw, issan daɣ-as.
As affaw, idkal-du ǝššin dinaran n ǝzrǝf ikf-en y alǝs wa innǝttafan d azazzabbaw, inn-as: "Ǝssǝn daɣ alǝs di, as d-ǝqqala, nak a dak-z-irzǝman arat kul wa fall-as tǝnɣeɣ, kud ǝnta ogar adi."»
Amaran inna Ɣaysa y ǝmusan n Ǝttawret wen: «Mǝni daɣ meddan win karad a, was tordeɣ as ǝnta a igan y alǝs wa ǝnɣan baydagan a amazal wa itaggu awedan y ǝšǝqqaɣ-net?»
Inn-as: «Wa das-ihanatten.» Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Adi za aglu, taga kay da zun d awen daɣ.»
Igla Ɣaysa daɣ ǝšikǝl-net ǝnta ǝd nǝttulab-net har iggaz taɣrǝmt iyyat innǝftaɣ i tǝntut tǝgât esǝm Marta.
Tantut ta tǝla tǝmadrayt-net tǝgât esǝm Maryama. Tǝqqim Maryama ɣur daran n Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa, tǝssisam y awa igannu.
Marta amaran, išimašan-tat ǝššǝɣǝl n ǝsǝmmǝguri ǝn Ɣaysa.
Wala ihogan tǝhoz-du Ɣaysa, tǝnn-as: «Ǝmǝli, awak zǝlǝyat a wǝr tǝgeɣ daɣ as di-toyya tamadrayt-in d ǝššǝɣǝl ketnet ɣas-in? Ann-as a di-tilal.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Marta, Marta! Ǝššiwašan-kam aratan aggotnen, ǝssiggadan tayttay-nam.
Ǝnta arat iyyanda as tǝga addararat olâɣ a t-imosan ǝsǝsǝm y awal-in, ǝnta a tǝsannafran Maryama, amaran wǝr daɣ-as zʼǝttǝrmas.»
Ǝzǝl iyyan itattar Ɣaysa daɣ adag iyyan. As issǝnda, inn-as iyyan daɣ nǝttulab-net: «Ǝmǝli, susǝn-ana tǝwatray zun awa iga Yaxya i nǝttulab-net.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «As tǝtattaram, tannim:
"Abba,
Itǝwǝsǝɣmǝret esǝm-nak di zǝddigan,
taset-du taɣmar-nak.
Akf-anaɣ akk ǝzǝl isudar-nana,
tǝssurǝfaɣ-anaɣ ibakkadan-nana,
zund ǝmmǝk as nakkanay da
nǝsuruf i win danaɣ-ǝganen ark mazalan.
A dana-wǝr-taga daɣ alɣarar ǝn jarrabatan n Iblis."»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa deɣ: «Mǝni daɣ-wan wa zʼilen ǝmidi, as-ay-du adawannay n ahad ann-as: "Zǝbǝnat-i-du karadat tǝgǝlwen,
fǝlas iyyan daɣ midawan-in a di-d-innǝftaɣan, wǝr ǝleɣ a t-ǝššǝtša."
Tǝzzar ann-as-du daɣ ammas n ahan: "A di-wǝr-tǝdgǝza, ehan-in ǝmǝrǝdda ixfâl, nak ǝd bararan-in nǝqqâl s etǝs, wǝr ǝfrega a din-ǝbdǝdaɣ akfaq-qay arat."
Ǝnneɣ-awan, kud wǝr d-inker akf-as-tanat fǝlas imos ǝmidi-net, da ad d-inkǝr akf-ay arat kul was iddǝrar fǝlas wǝr t-isakkarakad mansay wa t-iga den.»
Amaran nak ǝnneɣ-awan: «Ansǝyat Mǝššina a kawan-akfu; ǝgmǝyat, ad tǝgrǝwam. Kawkawat tǝsǝhǝrt a dawan-tannalam; aɣrat-tu, a dawan-akkawan.
Awalla i onsayan ad itǝwǝkfu; i igmayan, ad igrǝw, i iɣran deɣ Mǝššina, a das-akkawan.
Mǝni daɣ-wan wa daɣ zʼigmǝy barar-net isan, akf-ay taššolt?
Wala igmǝy daɣ-as tǝkǝkit akf-ay tǝzardǝmt?
Kud kawanay an nǝllubas tǝssânam tehakkay n awa olaɣan i bararan-nawan, manǝmmǝk as kawan-wǝr-z-akfu Abba-nawan wa ihan ijǝnnawan Infas wa Zǝddigan as das-tu-tonsayam?»
Dǝffǝr awen ikkas Ɣaysa daɣ alǝs iyyan aggǝsuf a das-igaddalan awal. Igmad-tu aggǝsuf ɣas iššewal, isammaklal awen ǝs tamattay.
Mišan ad gannin wiyyad daɣ-san: «Awen Aššaytan Baɣalzabul, wa n ǝmǝnokal ǝn kǝlǝsuf a t-ikfan fǝrregat n ikus ǝn kǝlǝsuf daɣ aytedan.»
Wiyyad deɣ arân ad t-ajjarraban, gammayan daɣ-as a dasan-agu tǝlmǝɣjujat tǝmosat alɣalamat a du-tǝfâlat Mǝššina.
Ɣaysa ǝnta issân awa samadranan, adi a fǝl dasan-inna: «Taɣmar kul tas ǝmmǝgaran mǝssawǝs gar-essan, ǝbǝrǝjji a za tagu, tǝzzar ǝbǝrǝjjen ɣawnatan-net s iyyan iyyan.
Tǝgannim nak Aššaytan Baɣalzabul a di-ikfan fǝrregat n ikus ǝn kǝlǝsuf daɣ aytedan; kud adi a igan wǝdi manǝmmǝk as za tihag taɣmar-net ǝnta imǝggar ǝd man-net?
Amaran kud nak tarna ǝn Baɣalzabul as takkasaɣ kǝlǝsuf daɣ aytedan, inalkiman-nawan za ma ilan tarna tas tan-takkasan? Adi da fǝlas ǝntanay iman-nasan as kawan-z-ǝbǝzan s ǝššǝriɣa.
Kud amaran nak tarna ǝn Mǝššina as takkasaɣ kǝlǝsuf, daɣ adi Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina tos-iwan-du.
Alǝs n ǝmǝqqerǝd otâban fǝl tǝzoli, ogâz ehan-net, wǝdi tǝla-net wǝr tat-in-ikka wala.
Mišan as t-id-ibag iyyan a t-ogaran assahat, orn-ay; a daɣ-as ibǝz tǝzoli-net ta fǝl iffǝlla, irkǝb daɣ-as tǝla-net, uzan-tat.
Wa dǝr-i wǝr nǝddew, azangaw-nin a imos; wa di-wǝr-nǝllil deɣ s ǝšidǝw, wǝdi ǝzǝwwǝziwǝz a itaggu.»
«As igmad aggǝsuf awedan, ad irǝs aggǝsuf wen idaggan ǝqqurnen, igammay id imal, iqqim wǝr t-igrew, ad annu daɣ man-net: "Nak a za, ad ǝqqǝlaɣ ehan-in wa d-ǝgmada."
As t-id-iqqal, a t-id-asu ifrâd, immotag.
Tǝzzar aglu idaw-du d ǝssa kǝlǝsuf wiyyad a t-ogarnen tallabǝst, ǝggǝzan awedan wanâd, ǝzdǝɣan-tu. Tagu taɣara n awedan wen aɣšud ogaran was kala tu-tǝga.»
Iššewal Ɣaysa den da as tǝdkal tǝntut iyyat ǝmǝsli-net, tǝnn-as: «Tǝbbilal tǝntut ta kay-terawat, ǝd fǝfan win tǝnkasaɣ.»
Mišan inn-as Ɣaysa: «Aytedan win ogarnen ǝbbǝlǝl da ǝssǝsamnen y awal ǝn Mǝššina, tamazalan awa inna.»
As inay Ɣaysa aytedan tiddawan fall-as, inn-asan: «Aytedan n azzaman win, inǝllubas; gammayan tǝlmǝɣjujat! Kala! Tǝlmǝɣjujat ta dasan-tǝtawaggat iyyadda ɣas, a tat-imosan ta n ǝnnǝbi Yunǝs.
Ǝmmǝk was kala ad iqqal Yunǝs alɣalamat y aytedan n ǝɣrǝm ǝn Ninif, ǝmmǝk en da as zʼǝqqǝla nak Ag Aggadǝm alɣalamat y aytedan n azzaman win.

Ǝzǝl wa n tabadday, a du-tǝnkǝr tǝmǝnokalt tas kala tǝxkam fall akal n agala igân esǝm Šeba, taggayyat fǝl aytedan n azzaman win, tǝzzǝbǝz-tan y ǝššǝriɣa fǝlas d ad iraz amaḍal a du-tǝgmad fǝl ad tǝssǝsǝm y awal ǝn tǝla n ǝgǝrri wa itaggu ǝmǝnokal Suliman. Ǝssǝnat za as, wa illan da ǝmǝrǝdda, ogar ǝnnǝbi Suliman mišan tugayam s a das-tǝssǝsǝmam.

Ǝzǝl wa n tabadday, ad d-ǝnkǝran aytedan n ǝɣrǝm wa n Ninif, ǝzzǝbǝzan aytedan n azzaman win y ǝššǝriɣa fǝlas tǝtubt a ǝgan ǝzǝl wa dasan-iga Yunǝs tǝlxutbat, imal-asan awal ǝn Mǝššina. Ǝssǝnat za as, wa illan da ǝmǝrǝdda, ogar Yunǝs mišan tugayam ǝs tǝtubt.
Wǝr t-illa awedan isarɣin fǝtǝla tǝzzar iɣbǝr-tat, madeɣ ag-et daw ǝɣǝzu, kalar ǝsǝwǝr a tat-itaggu edag ihhoken fǝl ad ǝnǝyan aytedan win du-taggaznen ehan s ǝnnur-net.

Šat, šilat ǝn fǝtǝla a tǝmos i tǝɣǝssa-nak. As imos as šat-nak tǝhannay s ǝlluɣ, wǝdi taɣǝssa-nak ketnet tǝha ǝnnur; mišan as imos as šat-nak wǝr tǝhǝnnǝy s ǝlluɣ, wǝdi taɣǝssa-nak ketnet tǝha šiyyay.
Daɣ adi agu ǝnnǝyat ǝd man-nak, ǝnnur wa kay ihan a tu-wǝr-alsinat šiyyay.
Amaran kud taɣǝssa-nak ketnet tǝha ǝnnur, wǝr tat-iha adag ihân šiyyay; wǝdi ad tǝmǝlǝwlǝw ketnet, zun tǝheɣ edag tǝsimalawlaw fǝtǝla.»
Iɣrad Ɣaysa awal ɣas igmay daɣ-as Farisay iyyan a ɣur-ǝs ammansaw. Os-in Ɣaysa ehan ǝn Farisay wen, iggaz edag wa daɣ ǝskaran mensewan, isaɣɣamar, ad itattu.
Isammaklal ǝs Farisay en awas issǝnta Ɣaysa tettay wǝr iššorad ifassan-net awa tǝnna alɣadat-nasan.
Tǝzzar inn-as Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa: «Kawanay Farisaytan, tǝzazdagam afalla n ǝsǝlkǝw d ǝɣǝzu, as iga awen, ammas ǝn wallan-nawan wǝr ǝdnayan ar tarkǝbt ǝd talbast.
Aljahilan! Wǝrgeɣ wa d-igan afalla ǝn tǝɣǝssa, ǝnta a d-igan ammas-net da?
Daɣ adi ǝkǝtat i tǝlaqqawen awa ihan ikassan-nawan, ǝddi arat kul a dawan-izdag.

Iket alɣazab iqqâl-awan ya Farisaytan, fǝlas tǝhakkam awa imosan tǝmǝssǝdǝk-nawan daɣ ǝnniɣnaɣ d ǝzzǝnǝfan ǝn yelatan kul win fǝrgan, as iga awen, tǝtamazrayam ǝššǝriɣa ǝn Mǝššina ǝd tara-net, s ǝntanay ǝs kawan-iwar lǝkkum y-asan, da wǝr din-tǝglemam win hadatnen!
Iket alɣazab iqqâl-awan kawanay Farisaytan, fǝlas tǝrâm tǝɣimit daɣ adag wa ilan almaqam daɣ nan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, d a kawan-saslaman aytedan daɣ sammanayan.
Iket alɣazab iqqâl-awan, fǝlas tolâm ǝd zǝkwan wǝr nǝmmun, fǝl itijǝwǝnkit awedan wǝr issen, samadasan-tu.»
Inna iyyan daɣ musanan n Ǝttawret i Ɣaysa: «Ǝššex, daɣ awa tǝnneɣ ǝddi, nakkanay da, tǝgeɣ-ana arak batu.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Iket alɣazab iqqâl-awan kawanay da, imusanan n Ǝttawret, fǝlas tǝsawaram aytedan ǝzuk as izzǝwat aggay-net; kawanay amaran wǝr tu-za-tǝdǝsam ǝs wala idǝdwan-nawan.
Iket alɣazab iqqâl-awan fǝlas tǝkarrasam izǝkwan hossaynen y ǝnnǝbitan as imarawan-nawan a tan-ǝnɣanen.
Ǝmmǝk wǝdi as tǝggiyyem fǝl awa ǝgan, tǝrḍam sǝr-ǝs fǝlas ǝntanay za ǝnɣan-tan, kawanay amaran tǝkrasam izǝkwan-nasan.
Awen daɣ a fǝl inna Mǝššina daɣ masnat-net wǝr nǝla tǝzǝrǝst: "A sǝr-san zǝmmizǝlaɣ ǝnnǝbitan ǝd nǝmmuzal, ad agin iman ǝn wiyyad daɣ-san, zǝɣɣǝzzǝban win hadatnen."
Adi as, aytedan n azzaman win, ǝhân-tan man n ǝnnǝbitan kul win tanwanɣanen, wa n ǝnǝtti n ǝddǝnet har azalada.

Awalla, illikan as, aytedan n azzaman win, ǝhân-tan man n aytedan di kul, a d-ibazan ɣur man win Habila har win Zakarayya, wa ǝnɣan daɣ Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, gǝr majmar wa zǝwwǝran n ǝsǝqqǝd ǝn tǝkutawen d adag wa zǝddigan.
Iket alɣazab iqqâl-awan ya imusanan n Ǝttawret, fǝlas tǝharam tarrayt ta tǝtawayat awedan ǝs masnat ǝn Mǝššina; kawanay iman-nawan wǝr-tat-tǝggezam, tǝgdalam deɣ iguz-net i win t-ǝranen.»
As ifal Ɣaysa ehan wen, ǝssintan musanan n Ǝttawret ǝd Farisaytan daɣ ǝddǝguz-net wǝllen, taggin-as isǝstanan aggotnen,
daɣ gammayan a tu-sassannin arat a tan-z-akfin tarrayt ǝs tǝxtǝst-net.
As itaggu awen tǝddew tamattay tǝknât igǝt fǝl Ɣaysa, har ǝqqiman aytedan tinǝmǝkukulan. Iššewal Ɣaysa, azzar ǝs nǝttulab-net, inn-asan: «Ǝnkǝdat i xamira wa n Farisaytan a t-imosan tǝlmǝnufǝqa.
Arat kul wa iɣbaran ad itǝwǝsǝnǝfilǝl, amaran ǝssir kul ad affaggu.
Daɣ adi, a tǝnnam daɣ šiyyay, ad itǝwǝslu ezal a mallan. A tǝsammataktakam deɣ daɣ ammas ǝn nan-nawan, ad attamal fǝl fallatan-nasan.
Kawanay imidawan-in, ǝnneɣ-awan: Ad wǝr tiksadam aggadǝm ǝs fǝrregat-net wǝr t-okay ikus ǝn man daɣ tǝɣǝssa.
A dawan-ǝmǝlaɣ wa za tiksadam: Iksadat Mǝššina a inaqqin, ila deɣ tarna n a kawan-igǝr daɣ Jahannama. Awalla, ǝnneɣ-awan ǝnta en da as kawan-iwar a tu-tiksadam.
Wǝrgeɣ sǝmmos gǝḍad a din-nazzinen sanatat tǝfelen? Dǝr iga awen da za, wǝr tan-iha i din-itataw Mǝššina.
Kawanay amaran wala anzadan ǝn ɣafawan-nawan da kul ǝddunan. Daɣ adi ad wǝr tiksadam wala, togaram igǝḍad aggotnen ǝlqimat.
Ǝnneɣ-awan, awedan kul wa iggǝyyen dat aytedan as nak Ag Aggadǝm a t-ilan, nak da, ad ǝggǝyyeɣ dat angalosan ǝn Mǝššina as nak a t-ilan.
Mišan wa di-inkuran dat aytedan, wǝdi nak da ad t-unkaraɣ dat angalosan ǝn Mǝššina.
Awedan deɣ wa di-ibyakan nak Ag Aggadǝm, ifrâg ad igrǝw tǝsureft; mišan awedan wa ikkasan tarna y Infas wa Zǝddigan, wǝdi wǝr zʼigrǝw tǝsureft.
As tǝmmewayam ǝs nan n ǝlɣibada win Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, madeɣ ǝs mǝnokalan madeɣ ǝs muzaran y ad tǝtǝwǝšrǝɣam; a kawan-wǝr-iššǝwǝš ǝmmǝk was za tǝkkǝsam iman-nawan, wala awa za tannim,
Infas wa Zǝddigan a kawan-z-issusǝnan daɣ assaɣat tǝdi da awas inahagga a tu-tannim.»
Inna-du awedan iyyan i Ɣaysa daɣ ammas ǝn tamattay: «Ǝššex, annu y ǝmaqqar-in a dǝr-i uzan tǝkasit-nana.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Alǝs, ma di-igan ǝlqali-nawan, wala tuzanaɣ-awan tǝkasit?»
Tǝzzar inna Ɣaysa i tamattay: «He kawanay! Agǝzat iman-nawan daɣ a imosan ǝwwǝli fǝlas kud iggǝrgas awedan, da tǝmǝddurt-net wǝr tǝqqen daɣ ǝrrǝzǝɣ-net.»
Tǝzzar ig-asan ǝlmital wa, inna: «Šiwǝgas n ǝmǝggergǝs iyyan a ǝganen igi olâɣan.
Ad isamadran gar-es ǝd man-net, igannu: "Awak ma zʼagaɣ? Nak abʼas ǝleɣ edag a daɣ ǝgeɣ attaɣam-in."
Tǝzzar inna: "Ǝssanaɣ awa zʼaga. Ad arzaɣ šidangawen-in, ǝkrǝsaɣ šin tanat-ogarnen, ǝššidǝwaɣ daɣ-asnat attaɣam-in kul d awa ǝleɣ."
Amaran annaɣ i man-in: "Ya mandam, tǝleɣ ǝrrǝzǝɣ aggen a dak-igân elan aggotnen, sanfu, tatša, tašwa, tannaflaya."
Mišan inn-as Mǝššina: "Ameskel! Ahad a da a kay-z-ǝgmǝdan man-nak. Ma zʼigrǝwan awa tǝššedawaɣ?
Awen daɣ a igarrawan awedan wa išadawan ǝddǝnet fǝl man-net amaran wǝr iššedaw wala daɣ talɣa ta gar-es ǝd Mǝššina."»
Dǝffǝr awen inna Ɣaysa i nǝttulab-net: «Awen da fǝl dawan-ǝnneɣ: A kawan-wǝr-tǝššǝwǝš tǝmǝddurt gǝr awa za tatšim, wala awa za talsim,
fǝlas iman-nawan ogaran imensewan almaqam, taɣǝssa-nawan deɣ togar isǝlsa almaqam.
Ǝnẓǝrat daɣ ǝɣrutan, wǝrmad nabbalan za wǝr tilǝyan, wǝrmad ǝlân isǝɣbar za wala šidangawen mišan issodar-tan Mǝššina. Tofâm-tan za s aggen.
Mǝni daɣ-wan wa ifragan s aššawaša-net ǝšitǝy ǝn tǝɣrǝst-net ǝs wala ellaf ǝn šat?
Dad zama as wǝr tǝfregam igi n a ogdân d awa tǝmmǝdrǝyt, ma fel as kawan iššǝwaš awa hadan?

Ǝnẓǝrat daɣ ǝmmǝk was du-daggalnat tǝjigawen: wǝrmad šaqqalnat wala zattinat isǝlsa, mišan ǝnneɣ-awan wala Ǝmǝnokal Suliman harkid tǝgǝrgist-net kul wǝr kala ad ewad wala iyyadda daɣ-asnat šihussay ǝn talassay.
Dad isalsu Mǝššina yel ǝs tǝmǝwit tǝdi, s azalada ibdâd, tufat ad itǝwǝsǝrɣu daɣ tǝjǝngǝrert; manǝmmǝk as kawan-wǝr-z-assalsu, kǝl ǝzǝgzan ǝndǝrran!
Daɣ adi a kawan-wǝr-ǝdgǝzan medranan n awa za tatšim, wala awa za tašwim, wala deɣ iššǝwǝšan-kawan.

Aratan win di kul aytedan win wǝr nǝssen Mǝššina, a ozalnen daɣ agamay-nasan. Mišan kawanay, ǝdgǝzat daɣ agamay ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina. Aratan win di kul a kawan-tawakfin ǝntanay da, fǝlas Abba-nawan issân as tǝddiraram sǝr-san.

Aratan win di kul aytedan win wǝr nǝssen Mǝššina, a ozalnen daɣ agamay-nasan. Mišan kawanay, ǝdgǝzat daɣ agamay ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina. Aratan win di kul a kawan-tawakfin ǝntanay da, fǝlas Abba-nawan issân as tǝddiraram sǝr-san.
Tǝsǝgǝrt n ayfad-in a kamat-wǝr-tǝggǝz tasa, fǝlas Abba-nakmat igrâz-as wǝllen a kamat-akfu taɣmar-net.
Zanzat-in awa tǝlam, tǝkǝtam-tu i tǝlaqqawen, tagim i man-nawan fartamanitan wǝr nǝtǝmǝndu, tǝššidǝwam daɣ jǝnnawan ǝrrǝzǝɣ wa wǝr nǝɣǝrrǝd, wǝr mad t-in-z-ihazan baydagan wala deɣ tǝɣšǝd-tu tamaday.
Edag wa tǝggaz tǝgǝrgist-nawan, ǝnta a zʼǝggǝzan wallan-nawan.»
«Ǝqqǝlat aytedan otâbnen, ǝs ǝrɣânat fǝtǝlaten-nasan.
Talim d eklan ǝqqâlnen y ad d-ifǝl mǝššissan takrǝst fǝl a sǝr-ǝs in-ǝbdǝdan da da ad d-izzǝkkat daɣ ǝmi n ahan.
Ǝbbilalan eklan win d-ogaz mǝššissan okâyan. Silakanaɣ-awan as, ad atǝb ǝnta iman-net, isǝɣɣimen, isǝmmǝnsǝw-tan.
Gǝr zʼiqqâl-du adawannay n ahad wala deɣ ammas n ahad, eklan win d-ogaz mǝššissan okâyan ǝbbilalan.
Wǝrgeɣ kawanay iman-nawan tǝssânam as, ǝnnâr issân mǝššis n aɣaywan amazay wa daɣ du-z-idǝl abaydag, akǝy isǝmmutǝg y a das-igdǝl terazay n ahan-net?
Sǝmmutǝgat za kawanay da, fǝlas nak Ag Aggadǝm ad d-asa daɣ assaɣat tas wǝr tordem a daɣ-as d-asa.»
Tǝzzar inn-as Butros: «Ǝmǝli, nakkanay ɣas a fǝl tǝgeɣ tangalt tǝdi, meɣ aytedan kul?»

Ijjǝwwab-as ǝmǝli Ɣaysa inn-as: «Ǝmaššaɣal wa iɣdalan ila deɣ ǝgǝrri ǝnta a isannafran mǝššis izzuzǝr-tu i maššaɣalan-net win hadatnen fǝl a tan-ihakku idǝgran-nasan daɣ sudar daɣ alwaq wa igmadan y awen.
Ibbilal ǝkli wen as d-iqqal mǝššis, ogaz-t-id iha ǝššǝɣǝl wa daq q-id-oyya den.
Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as, ad t-izzuzǝr mǝššis i tǝla-net kul.
Mišan ǝnnar inna ǝkli wǝdi daɣ man-net: "Mǝšši illolat-in," tǝzzar ad iggat imaššaɣalan ǝd tǝmaššaɣalen win hadatnen, itattu, issasu esmad har ammaswad,
akli wǝdi, ilkâm a t-id-iɣdǝr mǝššis daɣ ǝzǝl d amazay wǝr orda, tǝzzar ad t-iggât har t-iksǝn, ag-ay dad tawaggin aytedan win wǝr nǝɣdel.
Amaran akli wa issanan awa ira mǝššis, iqqim wǝr t-iga madeɣ wǝr iga ǝnnǝyat n igi-net, a das-tǝwǝgginat tǝwit aggotnen.

Mišan akli wa wǝr nǝssen awa ira mǝššis, amaran iga arat ihoran d ǝwǝddǝb, a das-tǝwǝgginat tǝwit wǝr nǝggǝt. Awedan igrawan a aggen, a daɣ-as itǝwǝgmǝy a aggen. I itawasaɣlafan a aggen, a daɣ-as itǝwǝgmǝy a ogaran awa itawasaɣlaf.»
Dǝffǝr awen inna Ɣaysa: «Oseɣ-du fǝl ad assarɣa temsay daɣ ǝddǝnet. Sidaranaɣ ad imos as tǝrɣâ.
Amaran ilkâm daɣ-i ǝtǝwǝsǝlmaɣ, s iket wǝr t-ǝgeɣ ǝknan-i man-in ǝddǝguz.
Tordâm as, assa a d-ǝgeɣ fǝl a d-awǝyaɣ alxer s ǝddǝnet? Kala kala, ǝnǝmǝzray a sǝr-ǝs d-ewaya.
Id a ibazan ɣur ǝmǝrǝdda, sǝmmos aytedan n ahan iyyanda ad nǝmǝzrǝyan, ǝwaran karad aganna fǝl ǝššin, ǝššin deɣ ǝwǝran aganna fǝl karad.

Ad inǝmǝzrǝy alǝs ǝd barar-net, barar deɣ inǝmǝzrǝy d abba-net, tǝnǝmǝzrǝy tǝntut ǝd tabarart-net, tabarart deɣ tǝnǝmǝzrǝy d anna-net, tǝnǝmǝzrǝy tǝdaggalt ǝd tǝntut ǝn barar-net, tǝnǝmǝzrǝy deɣ tǝntut ǝd tǝdaggalt-net.»
Inna Ɣaysa deɣ i tamattay: «Wǝrgeɣ as tǝnayam tagarak as du-tǝgmad daɣ ataram ad tannim ǝddi da: "Akonak izay-du." Tǝzzar agu adi da.
As tǝnayam deɣ ǝhud as d-igar, ad tannim: "Ad tagu tuksay." Tǝzzar agu adi da.
Ǝlmunafiqan, tǝssânam emel n alɣalamaten šin ǝganen fǝl amaḍal ǝd šin ǝganen daɣ jǝnnawan, mišan adis wǝr tǝgrem azzaman win fall-awan ǝganen da?
Mafel za wǝr tǝgrem kawanay iman-nawan awa oɣadan?

Masalan as kay-iɣra awedan s adag n ǝššǝriɣa, tǝgmǝya tǝmǝwit ǝs tǝnamaknam daɣ tarrayt. As wǝr tǝgeɣ adi, a kay-ilwǝy har kay-issǝbdǝd dat ǝlqali. Ǝlqali amaran a kay-agu daɣ fassan ǝn soji wa kay-z-igǝran daɣ kasaw.
Ǝsilakanaɣ-ak âs: Wǝr du-za-tǝgmǝda iket wǝr tǝrzema. Wala tamma iyyadda wǝr din-za-taqqam.»

Harwada iššewal Ɣaysa as d-ǝnkaran aytedan ǝllanen den, ǝssoɣalan-as isalan ǝn meddan wiyyad ǝn Galilaya as isisaga ǝnaxkim Bilatǝs iman-nasan alwaq a daɣ taggin šikutawen daɣ Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada daɣ Yerusalam.
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Awak tordâm as, Kǝl-Galilaya win di ogaran Kǝl-Galilaya kul win hadatnen tišit ǝn nǝsbakkadan fǝl as ǝgan arak tǝmattant tǝdi?
Ǝnneɣ-awan, kala! Amaran kawanay da, as wǝr tǝtubam, ad tǝhlǝkam ketnawan.
Ma tǝnnam za s aytedan win maraw d ǝttam win fǝl ibarajjat suru was itawannu Silowam daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Yerusalam, inɣ-en? Tordâm as, ogaran Kǝl-Yerusalam kul win hadatnen tišit ǝn nǝsbakkadan?
Ǝnneɣ-awan, kala! Amaran, kawanay da, as wǝr tǝtubam, ad tǝhlǝkam ketnawan.»
Ig-asan Ɣaysa tangalt iyyat, inn-asan: «Kala inbal alǝs iyyan ašǝk as itawannu fig daɣ afarag-net n alɣanab. As tǝga tamert n ara-net, os-ay-du y ad d-inkǝd aratan-net, mišan wǝr daɣ-as igrew wala.

Tǝzzar inna y amaššaɣal wa innǝttafan d afarag: "Ǝnǝy! Ǝmǝrǝdda karad elan a ǝgeɣ tasa-du, gammaya-du aratan n ašǝk wa, mišan wǝr kala daɣ-as ǝgrawa wala. Daɣ adi ǝɣtǝs-t-in! Ma ikannu daɣ amaḍal wǝr t-idu-tǝgǝmmǝd tǝnfa."
Inn-as amaššaɣal wen: "Mǝšši, are daɣ-ak a tu-tayya tenewa da ɣas, ad ǝɣǝzaɣ amaḍal wa t-iɣlayan, ǝnɣǝla daɣ-as tamaqqost.
Iha mijas awatay wa d-izayan ad arǝw, as wǝr erew, tǝssǝɣtǝsaq-q-in."»
Ǝzǝl iyyan ǝn tǝsanfawt isasaɣru Ɣaysa daɣ ahan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.
Tǝlla tǝntut iyyat den tǝlât maraw elan d ǝttam issirantat aggǝsuf, imos ǝruru-net tǝganzay, wǝr tǝfreg aqqad ǝn tabadday-net.
As tat-inay Ɣaysa, iɣr-et-du, tǝzzar inn-as: «Tantut, tǝwǝrna-nam tǝzzayaɣ daɣ-as!»
Issǝwar-tat ifassan-net, toɣad tebadday-net alwaq wen da, ad tǝmmâl Mǝššina.

Mišan iggaz alham ǝmuzar n ahan n ǝlɣibada wen fǝlas izzozay Ɣaysa awedan daɣ ǝzǝl ǝn tǝsanfawt, inna ǝmuzar en i tamattay: «Wǝrgeɣ sǝdis adan as immǝkkan a daɣ-san itǝwǝggu ǝššǝɣǝl? Asiwat-du daɣ-san tǝgmǝyam tǝmǝzzǝyt, wǝrgeɣ ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt!»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Ǝlmunafiqan, mǝni daɣ-wan wa wǝr nǝtǝkkǝs tewaɣnay y azgar-net madeɣ itrǝg ajad-net daɣ ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt y a t-id-aššašǝw?
Tahayawt n ǝnnǝbi Ibrahim ta amaran, ikrâd Iblis a ilân maraw elan d ǝttam, adis wǝr immǝkkan ad tǝtǝwǝzuzǝy daɣ ǝzǝl ǝn tǝsanfawt?»
As inna Ɣaysa awen, tǝbaz tǝkarakit aytedan kul win nǝmmǝzray-net, aytedan sa hadan amaran, ketnasan sidawen-tan mazalan ǝknanen šihussay win itaggu.
Inna Ɣaysa: «Ma dǝr tola Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina? Mas tat-z-ammattala?
Tolâ d amasa n annabat igân esǝm mutard, idkal awedan inbal-tu daɣ afarag-net, idwal, iqqal ašǝk, ad taggin gǝḍad šisǝllula daɣ zǝlan-net.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa deɣ: «Mas zʼammattala Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina?
Tola ǝd xamira tǝrwây tǝntut ǝd karad annafaɣaten n agel n alkama har ikuf agel ketnet.»
Igla Ɣaysa, illil iɣǝrman ǝd tǝɣarmaten, isassaɣru aytedan, idâg sa sǝr Yerusalam.
Inn-as awedan iyyan: «Ǝmǝli, awak aytedan wǝr nǝggǝt ɣas a zʼassafsu Mǝššina?» Tǝzzar inna Ɣaysa i tamattay:
«Imi ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina i kǝruzan, daɣ adi ballanat tǝgmǝyam d iguz-net. Ǝnneɣ-awan aytedan aggotnen a zʼǝgmǝynen d iguz-net, mišan a dasan-indǝr.

As ijwar mǝššis n aɣaywan iɣfal-in fǝl man-net tǝsǝhǝrt n ahan, kawanay tǝbdâdam dat-ǝs, ad tǝggǝzam šin ǝkukǝw, tǝgannim: "Mandam, alǝm-anaɣ!" Ann-awan: "Wǝr kawan-ǝzdayaɣ za wǝr ǝssena da du-tǝfalam."
Alwaq wǝdi a das-tannim: "Wǝrgeɣ nǝdraw dǝr-ǝk tettay ǝd tassay, tǝsisaɣra deɣ daɣ ɣǝrman-nana?"
Mišan a dawan-annu: "Nak wǝr kawan-ǝzdayaɣ. Ketnawan imaggan ǝn talbast a tǝmosam, ugagat-i."
As tǝnayam Ibrahim d Isǝhaq ǝd Yaqub d ǝnnǝbitan kul ǝqqiman daɣ Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina, ǝnta kawanay iman-nawan tǝtawastaɣam daɣ-as, ad talim, ad tǝdaddam idǝdwan-nawan fǝl tǝmagraz.
Ad d-ǝgmǝdan aytedan dǝnnǝg d ataram ǝd tamasna d agala, tǝzzar nǝɣimin ǝdrǝwan imǝgura daɣ Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina.
Ǝnǝyat za! Aytedan win ǝhanen ǝlǝqqam ǝmǝrǝdda ad izaran, win azzarnen deɣ ǝmǝrǝdda ad ǝggǝzan ǝlǝqqam.»
Alwaq wen da t-id-ǝhozan arat daɣ Farisaytan, ǝnnan-as: «Ǝgmǝd edag a, fǝlas ǝmǝnokal Herod ira igi ǝn man-nak.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Aglat tannin y awaqqas wa igan Herod: "Takkasaɣ kǝlǝsuf daɣ aytedan, zuzǝyaɣ imiranan azalada ǝd tufat, amaran ǝzǝl wa n karad ad assanda ǝššǝɣǝl-in."
Dǝr iga awen da ya, ǝššil a imos ad agla daɣ ǝšikǝl-in, azalada ǝd tufat ǝd tufat ten, fǝlas wǝr immǝkkan ad iba ǝnnǝbi daɣ adag wǝr nǝmos Yerusalam.»

Inna Ɣaysa: «Xa aytedan ǝn Yerusalam, iket tǝgam iman n ǝnnǝbitan, tǝnɣam deɣ ǝs tǝgur ǝn tǝhun win sǝr-wan d-izammazal Mǝššina! Awak har mǝnǝket taklaten, gammaya d a kawan-d-ǝššidǝwa s ǝmmǝk as du-tǝšadaw tǝkǝjit ikǝrǝtan-net daw ǝfrutan-net, mišan tugayam s awen!
Ǝnǝyat za, Mǝššina a daɣ-wan idkǝl ifassan-net, iqqǝl ahan-nawan ǝmǝjir. Amaran ǝnneɣ-awan, wǝr di-za-tǝlǝsam anay iket wǝr d-osa ǝzǝl wa daɣ za tannim: "Wa d-osan s esǝm n Ǝmǝli, igrâw arraxmat."»
Ǝzǝl iyyan ǝn tǝsanfawt, iggaz Ɣaysa ehan n iyyan daɣ muzaran n Farisaytan fǝl a ɣur-ǝs atšu. Ǝgaran daɣ-as Farisaytan ǝllânen den šittawen.
Illa alǝs iyyan den as ibǝyaɣat alam-net ketnet, iqqîm dat Ɣaysa.
Issǝstan Ɣaysa imusanan n Ǝttawret ǝd Farisaytan, inn-asan: «Awak ǝzuzǝy n awedan daɣ ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt xalâl, meɣ wǝr xalal?»
Mišan wǝr das-ǝnnen wala. Amaran idas Ɣaysa ǝmiran en, izzozay-tu, issǝgl-ay.
Tǝzzar inn-asan: «Mǝni daɣ-wan was zʼihannayan barar-net madeɣ azgar-net har iqqǝl daɣ anu ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt, aqqam wǝr t-id-ikkes daɣ-as tamazayt tǝdi da?»
Wǝr ǝssenan a das-ǝnnan daɣ batuten šin iga da.
Igr-in Ɣaysa ǝsǝnnǝfran wa ǝgan naftaɣan idaggan win taggazan aytedan win tawasaɣmarnen tǝzzar ig-asan ahol, inn-asan:
«As daɣ-ak igmay awedan izazlayan a das-in-tǝmǝgureɣ, ad wǝr tǝsǝnnǝfrǝnaɣ edag wa taggazan aytedan win tawasaɣmarnen fǝlas mijas igmây daɣ awedan iyyan a kay-ogaran almaqam a das-in-imǝgurǝt,
tǝzzar as-ik-du mǝššis n ahan wa kawan-d-iɣran ǝs mǝgura-net, ann-ak: "Ǝgmǝd edag y alǝs wa." Tǝbǝz-kay tǝkarakit, takkaɣ dǝffǝr aytedan taqqama.

Kalar as daɣ-ak itawagmay a din-tasaɣ imǝgura, takka dǝffǝr aytedan taqqama. Ǝddi, as d-osa mǝššis n ahan, a dak-annu: "Ǝmidi-nin, zǝnkǝz-du s adag ofân wǝdi." Akf-ik adi ǝtǝwǝsǝɣmar ɣur naftaɣan kul win hadatnen.
Fǝlas awedan kul wa idkalan iman-net, ad itǝwǝsǝrǝs, wa issǝrǝsan iman-net deɣ ad itǝwǝdkǝl.»

Dǝffǝr awen inna Ɣaysa i Farisay was innǝftaɣ: «As du-tǝɣarraɣ aytedan y a tan-taššatšaɣ ezal madeɣ ehad, a du-wǝr-taɣra imidawan-nak, wala imǝdrayan-nak wala išǝqqaɣan-nak wala imahharagan-nak ǝn mǝggǝrgas, fǝl a kay-du-wǝr-aɣrin ǝntanay da, ǝzǝl iyyan, ǝrzǝman-ak awa dasan-tǝgeɣ.
Kalar as iqqal as tǝšatšaɣ aytedan, šatšu šilǝqqawen ǝd nǝbdan ǝd mǝggudal ǝd mǝddǝrɣal.
Tǝbbilalaɣ as tǝgeɣ adi, fǝlas ǝntanay wǝr ǝfregan a dak-ǝrzaman. Ǝrruzmatan-nak a tan-tǝgrǝwa ǝzǝl wa n tanakra n alɣadilan.»
As isla iyyan daɣ naftaɣan i batu ten, inna i Ɣaysa: «Ibbilal awedan wa zʼatšin daɣ mǝgura win zʼaginen daɣ Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Alǝs iyyan a itaggan imǝgura zawwarnen, igmay daɣ aytedan aggotnen a t-id-asin.
As d-ǝmmǝgnen mensewan, izammazal akli-net y ad annu i naftaɣan: "Asiwat-du, imensewan ǝmǝrǝdda ǝmmotagan."»
«Mišan ǝggazan-tu ketnasan s iyyan iyyan ǝd sur. Inn-as wa azzaran: "Sǝket ǝzzǝnza tawagost, kundaba oseq-qat ǝnǝyaq-qat. A di-wǝr-tǝššǝkaɣ."
Inn-as-du iyyan: "Sǝket d-ǝzzanza maraw zǝgran y agayak, amaran areɣ a tan-ǝrǝma. A di-wǝr-tǝššǝka."
Inn-as-du iyyan: "Sǝket ǝzlafa, daɣ adi wǝr ǝfrega a kay-in-asaɣ."»
«As d-iqqal ǝkli, iga i mǝššis isalan kul win den. Iggaz alham labasan mǝššis n aɣaywan, amaran inn-as: "Aglu tarmad, tilalaɣ aɣrǝm, tidawa-du ǝd tǝlǝqqawen ǝd nǝbdan ǝd mǝddǝrɣal ǝd mǝggudal."»
«As d-iqqal ǝkli, inna i mǝššis: "Mǝšši, ǝgeɣ awa di-tǝnneɣ, mišan ehan harwa da ih-ay adag."
Inn-as mǝššis: "Ǝgmǝd aɣrǝm, tilalaɣ ǝd tarrayen ǝd tamawen ǝn fǝrgan, tǝšǝhhǝššǝlaɣ aytedan a d-asin fǝl ad idnǝy ahan-in.
Illikan as aytedan win as ǝzzara ǝgmaya daɣ-san a di-d-asin, wǝr tan-iha i zʼirǝman imensewan-in."»
Imalallay-in Ɣaysa tamattay tǝknat igǝt ta dǝr-ǝs tǝddewat, inn-asan:

«Awedan wa iran a di-ilkǝm, ǝnta wǝr di-iga tara togarat ta iga y abba-net, d anna-net ǝd tǝntut-net ǝd bararan-net ǝd mǝdrayan-net ǝd tǝmǝdrayen-net d ǝnta iman-net, wǝdi wǝr ifreg ad iqqǝl anattalib-in.
I wǝr nǝger iri y ad idkǝl tǝgǝttawt-net, agu imateran-net ilkǝm-i, wǝdi wǝr ifreg ad iqqǝl ǝnalkim-in.
Id nǝnna masalan ad ira iyyan daɣ-wan ad ikrǝs ehan imosan suru. Wǝrgeɣ tǝɣimit a itaggu, ixsǝb awa t-ikrasan tǝzzar, issǝn kud ila azrǝf a t-issindan wala?
As wǝr iga awen, as t-issǝnta akaras har t-orna ǝsǝndi-net, a daɣ-as agin aytedan kul win t-ǝnaynen tamakkakkayt,
annin: "Awedan wa, issǝnta akaras n ahan, orn-ay ad t-isǝkkǝsǝw."

Madeɣ nǝnna masalan, ǝmǝnokal iyyan as inkar ǝmǝgǝr gar-es d iyyan. Wǝrgeɣ tǝɣimit a zʼagu tǝzzar, isǝmmǝdrǝn, issǝn kud ǝnta wa ilan maraw ǝgim n alǝs, ifrâg terazay n ǝmǝnokal wa hadan ilân ǝnta sanatat tǝmǝrwen n ǝgim n alǝs?
As inay as wǝr t-ifreg, harwa da iggug ǝmǝnokal wa hadan as tu-z-issuku inǝmmuzal, igmǝy daɣ-as alxer.
Kawanay da za ǝmmǝk di da, i daɣ-wan wǝr nǝmmǝzzay d awa ila kul, wǝr ifreg ad iqqǝl anattalib-in.
Tesǝmt arat olâɣan a tǝmos, mišan as tat-tǝgmǝd tembay-net, mǝni tǝmǝwit tas tat-za-tǝtǝwǝsuɣǝl?
Ab-as tat-tǝha tǝnfa waliyyat y amaḍal wala deɣ tah-et tǝnfa i tamaqqost. Tanaɣla ɣas a din-za-tǝtǝwǝggu. Wa isallin, aslet!»
Osan-du nabazan n amana ǝd nasbakkadan kul Ɣaysa y a das-ǝssǝsǝman.
Ǝggazan Farisaytan ǝd musanan n Ǝttawret šin ǝgǝtǝntǝn, gannin ǝs Ɣaysa: «Awedan wa iqbâl inasbakkadan, idarraw deɣ dǝr-san imensewan.»
Tǝzzar ig-asan Ɣaysa ǝlmital wa, inna:
«As ila iyyan daɣ-wan temeday ǝn tilay har daɣ-asnat tǝssǝggal iyyadda, awak wǝrgeɣ ad ayyu tazayat tǝmǝrwen ǝd tazayat šin hadatnen ǝdânnat, tǝzzar azǝl iswǝd i ta tǝssǝggalat har tat-d-igrǝw?
As tat-d-igraw, a tat-issǝwǝr izeran-net fǝl awa iga daɣ tǝdǝwit,
as d-iqqal aɣaywan a d-aɣru imidawan-net ǝd mahharagan-net, ann-asan: "Ayewat, tagim tǝdǝwit ta ǝgeɣ, fǝlas agaraw a d-ǝgeɣ tilay-nin ta tǝssǝggalat."

Ǝnneɣ-awan zund ǝmmǝk di daɣ as, tǝfalawist ta zʼagin win ǝhanen ijǝnnawan fǝl tǝtubt n anasbakkad iyyanda, togar ta tan-za-tǝsǝssugu tazayat tǝmǝrwen n alɣadil ǝd taza as ɣur iga as wǝr ǝddǝraran ǝs tǝtubt.»
«Madeɣ nǝnna masalan, tǝntut iyyat a tǝlat marawat tammaten n ǝzrǝf har daɣ-as aba iyyat. Wǝrgeɣ ad tassarɣu fǝtǝla, tǝfrǝd ehan-net ketnet, tǝswǝd-as s ǝlluɣ iket wǝr tat-tǝgrew?
As tat-tǝgraw, a du-taɣru šimidawen-net ǝd tamahharagen-net, tann-asnat: "Agimat tǝdǝwit ta ǝgeɣ, fǝlas agaraw a d-ǝgeɣ tamma-nin ta daɣ-i aba."
Ǝnneɣ-awan zund ǝmmǝk di daɣ as, tǝtubt n anasbakkad iyyanda tǝsifǝliwis angalosan ǝn Mǝššina.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa deɣ: «Alǝs iyyan a ilan ǝššin bararan.
As ǝzǝl iyyan inna wa mǝdrǝyan y abba-net: "Abba, akf-i adagar-in daɣ tǝkasit." Izun-asan abba-nasan tǝla-net.
Arat n adan dǝffǝr awen, inkar barar wa ǝndarran iššedaw awa ila kul, ikka akal iyyan iggugan. Ilkam i tara ǝn man-net, ad iɣaššad awa ila.
As inɣa awa ila kul, osa-du laz labasan akal wa iha, tǝzzar iggaz šin tǝmaɣatirt.
Igla, išɣal y awedan iyyan n akal en da. Issok-ay šiwǝgas-net y a das-idǝn daɣ-asnat iladayan-net.
Awa das-iga laz daɣ iguz, isidaran tettay ǝn šǝtša win tattin ladayan, mišan wǝr t-illa i das-tan-ikfân.
Amaran isammadran daɣ man-net, inna: "Awak wǝrgeɣ imaššaɣalan n abba-nin ǝggǝtan mišan ketnasan ǝlân a ǝtšan har t-id-ǝglǝzan, ǝnta nak inaqq-i laz da!
Ad ǝnkǝraɣ, ǝqqǝla abba-nin, annaɣ-as: 'Abba, ǝmmizrayaɣ Mǝššina, kay deɣ ǝbbodaraq-qay,
ab-as ǝhora d a di-itǝwǝnnu barar-nak, ag-i iyyan daɣ maššaɣalan-nak.'"
Tǝzzar inkar iqqal abba-net. Izây-in ehan daɣ igǝg as t-ogga abba-net, tǝggaz-tu tǝhanint-net, ozal sǝr-ǝs, izalammat-tu, a das-itamallat.
Tǝzzar inna barar y abba-net: "Abba, ǝmmizrayaɣ Mǝššina, kay deɣ ǝbboraq-qay, ab-as ǝhora d a di-itǝwǝnnu barar-nak."
Mišan inna abba-net y eklan-net: "Tarmâd awǝyat-du takatkat ta tǝhossayat, tǝzzǝzlǝgam-as-tat, tagim tǝsǝndǝrt daɣ adad-net, tǝssǝsǝlam-tu.
Tabǝzam-du ǝhǝri wa iddǝren, tǝgzǝmam-tu, ad natšu, nagu saksas,
fǝlas barar-in wa, šilat n as t-aba, amaran ǝmǝrǝdda idar-du; kala ixrak, amaran ǝmǝrǝdda igraw-du." Amaran ǝssǝntan daɣ saksas.
As itaggu awen, barar-net wa n aɣafadday iha šiwǝgas. As d-iqqal, ihoz-du aɣaywan, isla i sǝwat d aweɣ.
Iɣra-du iyyan daɣ eklan-nasan, issǝstan-tu d awa itaggan den?
Inn-as ǝkli: "Amadray-nak a d-iqqalan, igzam abba-nak ǝhǝri wa iddǝren, fǝlas tewaɣlay a t-id-iga barar-net wǝr ila malad."
Iggaz-tu alham, ugay s iguz n ahan. Iqqab-du abba-net ad t-itansay.
Eges inna y abba-net: "Wǝrgeɣ a ilan elan ǝšɣâlaɣ-ak, wǝr kala ǝmmǝzrayaɣ tǝnna-nak, harkid awen, wǝr kala di-tǝkfeɣ wala ɣas eɣayd ǝgzama aga fall-as saksas nak ǝd midawan-in.
Rurek amaran wa iɣšadan eharay-nak daɣ tǝkarwaten ǝnta, osa-du ɣas tǝgazamaɣ-as ǝhǝri wa iddǝren."
Inn-as abba-net: "Barar-in, kay fawda tǝlleɣ ɣur-i, awa ǝleɣ ketnet i-nak.
Mišan immikkan ad naddawat nagu saksas, fǝlas amadray-nak, šilat n as t-aba, amaran ǝmǝrǝdda idar-du; kala ixrak, amaran ǝmǝrǝdda igraw-du."»
Inna Ɣaysa i nǝttulab-net: «Kala a t-illa alǝs iyyan n ǝmǝggergǝs ilân amaššaɣal isinattaf d ǝrrǝzǝɣ-net, amaran itawann-as iɣaššat-tu.
Tǝzzar isassaɣr-ay-du, inn-as: "Ma imos awa fall-ak sallaɣ? Ǝmǝl-i awa tǝgeɣ y ǝrrǝzǝɣ-in, nak ab-as areɣ ǝššǝɣǝl-nak."
Inna amaššaɣal wa gar-es ǝd man-net: "Awak ǝmǝrǝdda ma zʼaga as di-ikkas amuzar-in daɣ ǝššǝɣǝl? Nak, wǝr ǝfregaɣ agayak, mansay deɣ isikarakad-i.
Ǝssânaɣ awa zʼaga as kud tawakkasa daɣ ǝššǝɣǝl-in da, a di-ǝqbǝlan aytedan daɣ nan-nasan."
Tǝzzar isassaɣra-du aytedan win irwas alǝs was išɣal s iyyan iyyan. Inna i wa azzaran: "Ma kay irwas ǝmuzar-in?"
Inn-as: "Temeday ǝn tanaw ǝn wǝdi wa n azzayt." Inn-as amaššaɣal: "Ɣam, tǝdkǝla širawt-nak ta n ǝmarwas, tǝktǝbaɣ fall-as tarmâd sǝmmosat tǝmǝrwen ǝn tanaw."
Dǝffǝr awen inna y iyyan: "Kay za ma tǝtawarwasaɣ?" Inn-as: "Temeday ǝn bǝhu n alkama." Inn-as: "Ǝdkǝl širawt-nak ta n ǝmarwas, tǝktǝbaɣ fall-as ǝttamat tǝmǝrwen."

Tǝmǝrkest ten, isl-et alǝs wa iššǝšɣalan ark amaššaɣal wen, tǝzzar ad t-immâl fǝl tǝla-net tayttay. Tidǝt a imos as aytedan win wǝr nǝksud Mǝššina, ogaran win t-ǝksudnen tǝla ǝn tayttay daɣ taɣawšiwen šin ǝllanen gar-essan.
Nak za ǝnneɣ-awan: Agiwat imidawan s ǝrrǝzǝɣan ǝn bannan win n ǝddǝnet ta; ǝddi as kawan-ǝgmadan, ad tǝtǝwǝqbalam daɣ adag ǝn tǝmǝxsurt iɣlâlan.
Awedan wa tǝha tǝflǝst daɣ arat ǝndǝrran, wa zǝwwǝran da tǝh-ay daɣ-as. Wa wǝr tǝha tǝflǝst daɣ a ǝndǝrran, wa zǝwwǝran da, wǝr daɣ-as tu-tǝha.
Daɣ adi, da kawan-wǝr-tǝha tǝflǝst daɣ ǝrrǝzǝɣ ǝn bannan wa n ǝddǝnet ta, ma kawan-z-izǝzzigǝzan ǝrrǝzǝɣ wa n tidǝt, wa ihan alaxirat.
Amaran kud wǝr kawan-tǝha tǝflǝst daɣ arat wa wǝr tǝlem, ma kawan-z-akfin arat wa tǝlam daɣ alaxirat?
Wǝr t-illa amaššaɣal ifrâgan ad išɣǝl y ǝššin muzaran. Wa ɣas ikyad iyyan, iru wa hadan; madeɣ abbardag y iyyan, alku wa hadan. Wǝr tǝfregam ad tǝɣbǝdam Mǝššina, taglim deɣ tozâlam dǝffǝr ǝddǝnet.»
Ǝssisaman Farisaytan y awa inna Ɣaysa den kul, taggin daɣ-as tamakkakkayt fǝlas imaran n ǝzrǝf a ǝmosan.
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Kawanay tǝsaknim dat aytedan as alɣadilan a tǝmosam, Mǝššina amaran issân awa ihan iwallan-nawan; fǝlas arat wa ǝzzǝzwaran aytedan, Mǝššina ǝnta tagǝlfat a t-iga.»

«Ǝttawret d Ǝlkǝttaban win Ǝnnǝbitan ǝntanay ɣas a tawasasaɣrinen har ǝzǝl wa d-osa Yaxya wa isalmaɣan aytedan daɣ aman. Ǝddi amaran ad ǝggazan salan win Ǝlinjil šin ǝtǝwǝgga, ǝmosnen isalan n assa ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina, amaran ad igammay awedan kul iguz-net s assahat ǝd tallabǝst.
Dǝr iga awen da za, ogar tǝrɣasay ta iga ad iba ijǝnnawan d amaḍal, ta iga ad iba wala ɣas ǝsakkal iyyanda n Ǝttawret.
Adi a fǝlas, alǝs kul wa izammazzayan tantut-net, izlaf iyyat, wǝdi iga ǝzzǝna. Alǝs deɣ wa izlafan tantut tǝmmizzayat, ǝnta da igâ ǝzzǝna.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa deɣ: «Kala ad t-illa alǝs iyyan n ǝmǝggergǝs n amayyawan ǝs faw izlâg isǝlsa win hossaynen, ǝzzǝwatnen, faw deɣ inniflay issiksas.
As itaggu awen, dat ǝmi n ahan-net, isrâd alǝs iyyan ǝn tǝlaqqay igân Lazarǝs, ǝs ǝlsânat šiqqas elam-net.
Isidaran tettay ǝn kǝrǝmraman win du-rattaknen daɣ mensewan n ǝmǝggergǝs en. Wala iḍan, tasin-t-idu tallaɣan šiqqas-net.
Har ǝzǝl wad aba talǝqqay ten, tǝzzar ewayan-tu angalosan s ǝnnǝbi Ibrahim daɣ aljannat. Ǝmǝggergǝs ǝnta da, aba-tu itawanbal-in.
Iha Jahannama, itaɣazzab daɣ-as as idkal asawad-net, ogga Ibrahim daɣ igǝg, illâ ɣur-ǝs Lazarǝs.
Ad iɣarru Ibrahim, igann-as: "Ya Abba Ibrahim, hǝnǝttǝt-i, tǝzǝmmizǝla-du sǝr-i Lazarǝs y ad issǝlmǝɣ kuddeɣ imi n adad-net daɣ aman, issǝsmǝd-i sǝr-ǝs ilǝs-in, fǝlas alɣazab a tagga daɣ tǝmsay ta."
Mišan inn-as Ibrahim: "Barar-in, Akta-du as kay tǝgrâwaɣ arat kul wa tareɣ daɣ tǝmǝddurt-nak, as iga awen, Lazarǝs ǝnta wǝr inay ar alɣazab. Amaran ǝmǝrǝdda ǝnta as tawaknan man, kay tǝtaɣazzaba.
Wa dǝffǝr adi as, illâ ǝɣǝɣi wǝr nǝla eder gar-ena dǝr-wan, fǝl ad wǝr iru waliyyan daɣ-na a kawan-in-akku, ifrǝg adi, wala deɣ ifrǝg waliyyan daɣ-wan a dana-d-akku."
Inna ǝmǝggergǝs: "Daɣ adi Abba, ǝgmâya daɣ-ak ad tǝzǝmmizǝla Lazarǝs s aɣaywan n abba-nin,
fǝlas ǝleɣ sǝmmos mǝdrayan, y a dasan-irɣǝm fǝl a du-wǝr-ǝggǝzan ǝntanay da edag n alɣazab wa."
Mišan inn-as Ibrahim: "Imǝdrayan-nak ǝttâfan ǝlkǝttab wa n Ǝttawret d Ǝlkǝttaban n ǝnnǝbitan win hadatnen, ǝlkǝmanet-asan."
Inna y Ibrahim: "Kala kala Abba-nin Ibrahim, adi wǝr igda, mišan as tan-in-iqqal awedan a d-inkâran daɣ nǝmmǝttan, ad utaban."
Mišan inn-as ǝnnǝbi Ibrahim: "As wǝr ǝssǝsǝman y ǝnnǝbi Musa d ǝnnǝbitan win hadatnen, wǝr zʼutaban kuddeɣ ig-asan awedan a d-inkâran daɣ nǝmmǝttan isalan."»
Ǝzǝl iyyan inna Ɣaysa i nǝttulab-net: «Wǝr t-illa a tu-wǝr-ǝmelan aratan as za sǝssuginen aytedan ibakkadan, mišan iket alɣazab ill-ay y awedan wa dasan-d-igan ǝssǝbab.
A das-afu ad itǝwǝqqǝn ǝzǝzǝd zǝwwǝran ǝn tǝhunt daɣ iri-net itǝwǝgǝr-in daɣ agarew, tišit n ǝssǝbab n abakkad i wala iyyanda daɣ aytedan win madrornen di.
Agat ǝnnǝyat ǝd man-nawan!
As kay-idlam amadray-nak, tǝrɣǝmaɣ-as. Kud immǝgraz, tǝssurǝfaɣ-as.
Kud imos as ig-ak ǝssayat tadlamen daɣ ǝzǝl, ig-ak-du ǝssa assatan igammay tǝsureft daɣ ǝzǝl wen da, da surǝf-as.»
Ǝnnan nǝmmuzal y Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa: «Šitu ǝzǝgzan-nana.»
Inn-asan Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa: «As tǝlam ǝzǝgzan ogdân ǝd wala imi ǝn tǝzuɣay n ǝšǝnnan ad tǝfrǝgam ad tannim y ašǝk wa: "Ǝlbǝy-du iman-nak, taɣta daɣ agaraw en", agu awa tǝnnam.»
«Mǝni daɣ-wan wa du-z-adǝw akli-net iddânan madeɣ igayyakan, ann-as: "Ayo tarmad tammansawaɣ!"
Wǝrgeɣ tǝnna a das-za-tagim: "Saŋŋ-i a ǝtšeɣ tǝzzar, tawǝyaɣ-i-t-id, tǝšɣǝla har atša, ašwaɣ, dǝffǝr adi amaran tatša tašwa kay."
