Awak alǝs en ad iggudǝy y ǝkli-net fǝlas iga awas t-omar?
Kawanay da za, as tǝgam arat kul was tǝtawamaram, tannim: "Nakkanay wǝr nǝmos ar eklan, wǝr nǝga ar awas danaɣ-iwar igi-net."»
Ɣur iki ǝn Ɣaysa Yerusalam, illam gǝr akal wa n Samarǝya ǝd wa n Galilaya.
As d-iggaz taɣrǝmt iyyat, ǝssǝlkǝdan-as-du maraw meddan igrâw kǝtru, ǝbdadan-as-in daɣ igǝg.
Ǝdkalan imaslan-nasan, ǝnnan-as: «Ya Ɣaysa, Ǝššex-nana, hǝnǝttǝt-ana!»
Iswad daɣ-san, inn-asan: «Aglat saknat iman-nawan i limaman.» Ǝglân ǝkkân ilimaman y a dasan-ǝmǝlan, as ǝzzayan zaddogan.
As din-igra iyyan daɣ-san tǝmǝzzǝyt ta iga den, iqqal Ɣaysa, idkâl ǝmǝsli-net, immâl Mǝššina.
As t-in-osa issǝjad dat-ǝs, a das-itigudǝy. Alǝs en in akal ǝn Samarǝya.
Inna Ɣaysa: «Wǝrgeɣ marawessan as ǝzzayan, zaddogan, ma ǝgan taza win hadatnen?
Adis wǝr tan-iha i d-iqqâlan iggudǝy i Mǝššina ar ǝnaftaɣ wa?»
Amaran inna Ɣaysa y alǝs wen: «Ǝbdǝd, aglu, ǝzǝgzan-nak a kay-iɣlasan.»
Ɣaysa, as t-ǝssǝstanan Farisaytan d alwaq wa du-za-tasu Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina, inn-asan: «Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina wǝr du-tǝtǝggu assa ilân anay.
Wǝr mad zʼitǝwǝnnu: "Ǝnta da", wala "Ǝnta den". Ǝssǝnat as, Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina tǝlla gar-ewwan.»
Dǝffǝr awen inna Ɣaysa i nǝttulab-net: «Ǝlkâman adan a daɣ za tǝsǝddirǝnam anay ǝn tawaɣlay-nin nak Ag Aggadǝm, kuddeɣ anay n ǝzǝl iyyanda, mišan wǝr di-za-tǝnǝyam.
Amaran a dawan-itǝwǝnnu: "Ǝnta den" madeɣ "Ǝnta da". Ad wǝr taglim, wala tǝlkǝmam y awen.
Ǝbǝlǝzlǝz a itaggu essam daɣ jǝnnawan, isǝmmǝlǝwlǝw tama n amaḍal ta har ta, a dǝr zʼalu assa-nin nak Ag Aggadǝm daɣ ǝzǝl-in.
Mišan dat adi, ilzâm-i nak Ag Aggadǝm anay n alɣazab aggen, unkaran-i deɣ aytedan n azzaman win.
Awa igan daɣ azzaman n ǝnnǝbi Nux, a zʼagin daɣ adan win daɣ du-z-asa nak Ag Aggadǝm.
Azzaman win den, aytedan tattin, sassin, zallafan, zâzlafan har ǝzǝl wa d-iggaz Nux aɣlal n aman, tǝzzar osa-du alwabil, ihlak-kan ketnasan.
Zun d awen da deɣ a igan daɣ azzaman ǝn Lot. Aytedan tattin, sassin, zanzan, satagan, nabbalan, gayyakan, karrasan,
har ǝzǝl wad igmad Lot aɣrǝm ǝn Sǝdom, tǝzzar issofay-du Mǝššina fǝl ǝɣrǝm en adaɣas-ǝn-tahart ibilaglagan, ihlak aytedan-net ketnasan.
Zun d adi da a zʼagin ǝzǝl wa du-za-tǝwǝsǝnǝfilǝla nak Ag Aggadǝm.
Ǝzǝl wǝdi, awedan wa iqqiman daɣ adag wa n afalla n ahan-net, amaran ǝhân lalan-net ehan-net, a du-wǝr-azzabbat y a tan-in-idkǝl. Wa ihan tawagost-net deɣ, ad wǝr iqqǝl aɣaywan.
Aktiwat-du awa igrawan taɣur Lot.
Id awedan wa wǝr nǝgǝmmǝy ar aggaz ǝn man-net daɣ ǝddǝnet ta, ad affatu daɣ alaxirat; mišan wa isaffatan iman-net daɣ ǝddǝnet ta, ad iɣlǝs.
Ǝnneɣ-awan ahad wǝdi, ad ǝnsân ǝššin aytedan daɣ tessat iyyadda, ammadkal iyyan, itǝwǝyyad-du wa hadan.
Ad taddinat sanatat tǝdoden daɣ adag iyyanda, tammadkal iyyat, tǝtǝwǝyyad-du ta hadat.
Ad ǝhân ǝššin meddan tawagost iyyadda, ammadkal iyyan, itǝwǝyyad-du wa hadan.»
Ǝssǝstǝnan nǝttulab Ɣaysa ǝnnan-as: «Ǝmǝli, wǝdi arat mǝnid zʼagu?» Inn-asan: «Edag tǝggaz tǝmaxsayt, a daɣ-as iddawan jadaran.»
Iga Ɣaysa i nǝttulab-net ǝlmital iyyan a daɣ ira a tan-issusǝn as, ihor ad tansayan Mǝššina faw, a daɣ-as wǝr ǝkkǝsan attama.
Inn-asan: «Aɣrǝm iyyan a iha ǝmašraɣ wǝr nǝksud Mǝššina, wǝr issǝɣmar deɣ awedan waliyyan.
Amaran aɣrǝm en, tǝh-ay tǝntut as wǝr idder alǝs-net a du-tǝtasit amašraɣ en, tǝgann-as: "Akf-i alxaq-in daɣ amakkarad-in."
As iga tamert itugǝy-as, inna gar-es ǝd man-net: "Kud wǝr ǝksudaɣ Mǝššina, wala ǝssiɣmaraɣ awedan waliyyan,
da tantut ta, tǝdgaz-i. A tat-akfa alxaq-net fǝl a daɣ-as ǝgrǝwaɣ iman-in."»
Tǝzzar inna Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa: «Tǝsallam y awa inna arak amašraɣ wa?
Tordâm as Mǝššina wǝr zʼakfu aytedan win isannafran alxaq-nasan, tu-tansaynen hallan ehad ezal? Tordâm as a fall-asan-in isahhagu tadhǝlt-net?
Ǝnneɣ-awan, a tan-akfu alxaq-nasan tarmad. Mišan harkid adi, ǝzǝl wa du-z-ǝqqǝla nak Ag Aggadǝm, awak a d-agǝzaɣ daɣ ǝddǝnet aytedan ǝzzigzannen?»
Dǝffǝr awen, iga Ɣaysa ǝlmital y aytedan ǝttâfnen iman-nasan daɣ tišit n alɣadilan, as iga awen olkân aytedan, inn-asan:
«Kala ad ǝggǝzzayan meddan ǝššin s Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada fǝl ad agin šiwatriwen. Iyyan Farisay, wa hadan anabaz n amana.
Farisay za, ibdad ad itattar, igannu daɣ man-net: "Ya Mǝššina, ǝggodayaɣ-ak as wǝr oleɣ d aytedan win hadatnen ǝmosnen inarkaban ǝd nǝmmǝzray ǝd maggan n ǝzzǝna, wala deɣ oleɣ d anabaz n amana wa.
Ǝssa adan kul, tuzama daɣ-san ǝššin. Takkasaɣ tǝmǝssǝdǝk daɣ awa garrawa kul."

Mišan anabaz n amana ǝnta, ibdad-in daɣ igǝg, wǝr ihel wala adakal n asawad-net sa sǝr jǝnnawan, iggât idmaran-net fǝl awa ǝgan man-net daɣ ǝɣšud, igannu: "Ya Mǝššina tǝggǝzet-kay tǝhanint-in nak n anasbakkad."

Ǝnneɣ-awan, anabaz n amawan wa, iqqal ehan-net igrâw taqqat dat Mǝššina, mišan Farisay wen ǝnta wǝr igrew taqqat dat Mǝššina; fǝlas i idkalan iman-net, ad t-issǝrǝs Mǝššina, i issǝrasan iman-net ad t-idkǝl Mǝššina.»
Harkid bararan win janɣayan tawayan-tan-du aytedan ǝs Ɣaysa fǝl a tan-issǝwǝr ifassan-net, ittǝr-asan. Ǝnayan nǝttulab-net awen, ǝššewalan fǝl aytedan win den.
Mišan iɣr-en-du Ɣaysa ǝs man-net, inna i nǝttulab-net: «Ayyat bararan a di-d-akkin, a tan-in-wǝr-tǝwǝɣam; Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina, šin aytedan win šilaten-nasan.
Ǝggǝyeɣ silakanaɣ-awan as, awedan wǝr nǝga i Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina ǝlqǝbulat šilat ǝn ta das-iga barar, wədi wər das-ilkem a tat-iggaz.»
Issǝstan ǝmuzar iyyan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud Ɣaysa, inn-as: «Ǝššex olâɣan, mas di-iwar igi-net y ad əgrəwa tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat?»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Mafel as di-tǝganna Ǝššex olaɣan? Wǝr t-illa i olâɣan ar Mǝššina.
Tǝssânaɣ alwajiban-net: Ad wǝr tagaɣ ǝzzǝna, ad wǝr tagaɣ iman, ad wǝr takǝra, ad wǝr tagaɣ tǝgǝyya ǝn bahu, sǝɣmǝr abba-nak d anna-nak.»
Inn-as alǝs wen: «Aratan win di kul harwa da mədrəya as tan-əssəbdada.»

As isla Ɣaysa y awen, inn-as: «Arat iyyanda a dak-in-iqqiman ǝmǝrǝdda: Aglu zanz-in awa tǝleɣ kul, tuzanaɣ inazzan-net i tǝlǝqqawen ad tǝgrǝwaɣ ǝrrǝzǝɣ a dak-z-ansin daɣ alaxirat. Dǝffǝr adi amaran tagla-du təlkəmaɣ-i.»
As isla y awen, ǝɣšadan man-net wǝllen fǝlas tǝgǝrgist tagget a iga.
As inay Ɣaysa as, ǝɣšâdan man n alǝs en wǝllen, inna: «Iket ǝzzǝwi ig-ay iguz ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina fǝl win əggərgasnen.
Ogar tǝrɣasay ta iga fǝl aḷam aradaɣ daɣ tǝbuday n ǝnazmay, i ta iga fǝl ǝmǝggergǝs iguz ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina.»
Tǝzzar ǝnnan-as aytedan win das-ǝssǝsamnen: «Adi za ma ifragan ad iɣlǝs daɣ tǝmsay?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Awa imosan muxal ɣur aytedan, Mǝššina ifrâk-ku.»
Inn-as Butros: «Nakkanay za, a oyyanen awa nǝla kul, nǝlkam-ak?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝggǝyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as, wǝr t-illa i din-z-ayyin ehan-net madeɣ tantut-net, madeɣ imǝdrayan-net, madeɣ imarwan-net madeɣ bararan-net fǝl ǝddǝlil ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina,
ǝs wǝrgeɣ ad igrǝw inǝdfusan-nasan daɣ harwa ǝmǝrǝdda, igrǝw deɣ tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat daɣ azzaman win ǝlkamnen.»

Ikkas Ɣaysa inǝttulab-net win maraw d ǝššin daɣ aytedan, inn-asan: «Sǝsǝmat: nakkanay da ǝggǝzzaynen ǝs Yerusalam da, amaran den da ad zʼandu arat kul wa ǝktaban ǝnnǝbitan daɣ salan-in nak Ag Aggadǝm.
Ad tawagga daɣ fassan n aytedan wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, agin daɣ-i tamakkakkayt, agin-i šisǝssǝlka, ǝssutǝfan fall-i,
ayyawanan-i šiwwit, agin iman-in, tǝzzar ǝnkara-du daɣ tǝmattant ǝzǝl wa n karad.»
Mišan wǝr t-illa a ǝgrân nǝttulab-net daɣ awa inna den, ittinkal-asan almaɣna-net, wǝr ǝgren awa daɣ dasan-iššewal.
As d-ihoz Ɣaysa aɣrǝm wa n Yerikaw, okay fǝl ǝmǝdderɣǝl iyyan iqqiman fǝl afay ǝn tarrayt, itansay.
As isla amǝdderɣǝl i tamattay ta fall-as tǝtakayat da, issǝstan d awa imos awen.
Itawann-as: «Ɣaysa wa n ǝɣrǝm ǝn Nazaret a itakayan.»
Amaran idkal ǝmǝsli-net, igannu: «Ya Ɣaysa wa n Ag ǝnnǝbi Dawǝd, hǝnǝttǝt-i!»
Sannarɣaman-as aytedan win azzarnen y ad affastu, mišan idkal ǝmǝsli-net wǝllen, igannu: «Ya Ag Dawǝd, hǝnǝttǝt-i!»
Tǝzzar izzǝkkat Ɣaysa, omar s a das-d-attalway. As t-id-osa, issǝstan-tu, inn-as:
«Mas tareɣ a dak-k-aga?» Inn-as ǝmǝdderɣǝl: «Ǝmǝli, a ǝreɣ a di-d-iqqǝl asawad-nin.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Iqqǝlet-kay-du asawad-nak, ǝzǝgzan-nak a kay-iɣlasan.»
Iqqal-du asawad amǝdderɣǝl tamazayt ten da, igla ilkam i Ɣaysa, immâl Mǝššina. Aytedan kul win ǝnaynen awa igan den, ǝntanay da ǝmmâlan Mǝššina.
Iggaz Ɣaysa aɣrǝm ǝn Yerikaw, okay daɣ ammas-net y ad t-irdǝɣ.
Aɣrǝm en ih-ay alǝs igân esǝm Zakkǝyas imosan ǝmuzar ǝn nabazan n amana n ǝmǝggergǝs.
Ad igammay d anay ǝn Ɣaysa, mišan tǝgdal-as-tu tamattay fǝlas tǝgzǝlay a iga.
Tǝzzar ozal, azzar i tamattay, iftan ašǝk igân esǝm sikamor fǝl ad inǝy Ɣaysa fǝlas den da a du-z-akǝy.
As d-ewad Ɣaysa edag wen, idkal asawad-net, inn-as: «Zakkǝyas, zabbat-du tarmâd, azalada kundaba ǝzzǝbbeɣ daɣ aɣaywan-nak.»
Izzǝbbat-du Zakkǝyas tarmâd, iqbal awen, ifilawas.
As ǝnayan aytedan awen, gatantanan ketnasan, gannin: «Izzǝbbat ɣur alǝs n anasbakkad.»
Amaran ibdad Zakkǝyas dat Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa, inn-as: «Ya Ǝmǝli, ad akfaɣ tǝzunt ǝn tǝla-nin i tǝlǝqqawen, kud deɣ ill-ay i daɣ ǝtšeɣ arat, a das-t-ǝssuɣǝla imos ǝkkoz nǝdfusan.»
Tǝzzar inna Ɣaysa: «Azalada, ehan wa iggaz-t-id ǝlɣillas, fǝlas alǝs wa, ǝnta da ahaya n ǝnnǝbi Ibrahim a imos.
Nak Ag Aggadǝm oseɣ-du gammayaɣ aytedan win ǝxraknen y a tan-ǝɣlǝsa.»
Ǝssisaman aytedan y awa igannu Ɣaysa ketnet. Ig-asan Ɣaysa tangalt iyyat fǝlas ihoz Yerusalam amaran ǝɣilan alwaq wad za tǝnǝfilǝl Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina ewad-du.
Inn-asan: «Kala ikka alǝs iyyan n ag ǝket akal iyyan iggugan y a daɣ-as d-igrǝw tǝmǝnukǝla, iqqǝl-du.
Dat teklay-net, iɣra-du maraw daɣ eklan-net. Akk iyyan daɣ-san ikf-ay tamma inn-asan: "Agiwat daɣ-asnat jola har d-ǝqqǝla."
Amaran alǝs en, wǝr t-ǝren aytedan n akal-net. As igla, ǝssǝglan inǝmmuzal s ǝmǝnokal wa zǝwwǝran y a das-annin: "Alǝs di, wǝr nǝra ad iqqǝl ǝmǝnokal-nana."
Mišan igraw taɣmar, iqqal-du akal-net. Isassaɣra-du eklan-net winâd ikfa tamatten da, fǝl ad issǝn awa sǝr-san d-iggazan daɣ jola-nasan.
Os-ay-du wa azzaran, inn-as: "Mǝšši, tamma ta di-tǝkfeɣ ǝgrawa-du fall-as marawat šiyyad."
Inn-as mǝššis: "Alafǝyet! Illikan as akli olâɣan a tǝmosa. Zamas tǝh-ik tǝflǝst daɣ awa wǝr nǝggǝt, adi za a kay-ǝzzuzǝraɣ i maraw ɣǝrman."
Os-ay-du wa n ǝššin, inn-as: "Mǝšši, tamma ta di-tǝkfeɣ ǝgrawa-du fall-as sǝmmosat šiyyad."
Inna i wa: "Kay, ad tizaraɣ i sǝmmos ɣǝrman."
Os-ay-du wa n karad, inna: "Mǝšši, tamma ta di-tǝkfeɣ ǝnta da. Akamas a tat-ǝgeɣ daɣ ǝlkǝšifa-nin, ogazaq-qat.
Tǝksǝda a kay-ǝgeɣ, fǝlas ǝssânaɣ as alǝs labasan a tǝmosa. Tǝdakkalaɣ a wǝr tǝssǝnsa, tǝtalaya deɣ tawagost wǝr tǝnbela."
Inn-as mǝššis: "Kay, ark ǝkli a tǝmosa, awa d-igmadan imi-nak as kay-z-abǝzaɣ. Dad tǝssanaɣ as ǝmôsaɣ awedan labasan, idakkalan a wǝr issǝnsa, italay deɣ tawagost wǝr inbel,
ma fel as wǝr tǝgeɣ azrǝf-in daɣ bank, ǝddi as du-z-ǝqqǝla ǝgrâwa fall-as tǝttǝyt."
Tǝzzar inna y aytedan win ǝllanen den: "Abǝzat daɣ-as tamma ta ittaf, takfim-tat i wa ilan marawat."
Ǝnnan-as: "Mǝššikkana, wǝrgeɣ ilâ marawat?"
Ijjǝwwab-asan, inna: "Silakanaɣ-awan as, wa ilan, wǝdi a das-itǝwǝšitu awa ila; amaran wa wǝr nǝla, arat n arat wa ila da, a daɣ-as attarmas."
Amaran aytedan win zǝnga-nin, wǝr nǝra ad ǝqqǝla ǝmǝnokal-nasan, awǝyat-tan-du, tǝgzǝmam-tan dat-i.»
As inna awen, iggaz eɣaf ǝn nǝttulab-net, iggǝzzay ǝs Yerusalam.
As din-ihoz taɣrǝmt ta n Betfajay ǝd ta n Betanǝy, dǝgma n ǝdɣaɣ was itawannu wa n "Eškan ǝn Zaytun", izammazal ǝššin daɣ nǝttulab-net.
Inn-asan: «Akkiwat taɣrəmt ten dat-wan den. As tat-in-tǝggazam, ad tǝnǝyam ǝhulel n ǝzdan iqqânan ǝs kala wǝr ittǝwan. Ariwat-t-id, tǝlwǝyam-t-idu.
As kawan-issǝstan awedan, inn-awan: "Xa, ma tǝtaggim ǝddi?" Tannim-as: "Ǝmǝli a sǝr-ǝs iddǝraran."»
Ǝglan nǝttulab win den, ǝnayan arat kul s ǝmmǝk wa daɣ as dasan-t-inna Ɣaysa.
Târan ǝhulel, as dasan-ǝnnan mǝssawǝs: «Xa, ma tǝtaggim ǝddi?»
Ǝnnan-asan nǝttulab win ǝššin en: «Ǝmǝli a sǝr-ǝs iddǝraran.»
Ǝlwayan-t-id i Ɣaysa. Ǝdfaran-as fall-as isǝlsa-nasan, ǝssǝwanan-as-tu.
Imatakway, a das-tissǝwan aytedan isǝlsa-nasan daɣ tarrayt-net.

As d-ewad Ɣaysa edag wa daɣ tǝzagaday tarrayt adɣaɣ wa n Eškan ǝn Zaytun, daɣ ǝnǝmihaz ǝn Yerusalam, ǝdkalan nalkiman-net ketnasan imaslan-nasan, ǝssǝggadan daɣ tǝmmalen i Mǝššina daɣ batu ǝn tǝlmǝɣjujaten kul šin ǝnayan.
Gannin:
«Iga Mǝššina albaraka y ǝmǝnokal
wa d-osan s esǝm n Ǝmǝli.
Attadet alxer ǝd tanaya
daɣ jǝnnawan win ǝdkalnen!»
Tǝzzar ǝnnan Farisaytan ǝhanen tamattay en i Ɣaysa: «Ǝššex, ǝrɣǝm i nalkiman-nak!»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝnneɣ-awan, as ǝffǝstan, šihun a, a za sǝɣɣǝrǝtnen.»
As din-ihoz Ɣaysa aɣrǝm ǝn Yerusalam, ogg-ay, iggaz fall-as šin tala;
igannu: «Ya Yerusalam, ǝnnar kam dâ, tǝssânaɣ ǝmmǝk was za tǝgrǝwaɣ alxer azalada; mišan wǝr tu-tǝssena, fǝlas aɣabar a dam-iga.
Ǝlkâman adan a daɣ kam-za-ɣǝliɣǝlǝyan zǝnga-nam, agin-am afarag issohen n ǝmǝgǝr, ǝdgǝzan-kam fǝl gannatan kul.
Addagdagan-kam, kam d aytedan-nam. Wǝr daɣ-am du-z-ayyin tǝhunt tǝwârat iyyat, fǝlas tugayaɣ s ad tagraɣ assa wa dam-d-iga Mǝššina y dam-agu arraxmat-net.»
Dǝffǝr awen, iggaz Ɣaysa aɣalla wa iɣlayan Ehan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, a daɣ-as isattaɣ imassatagan.
Igann-asan: «Wǝrgeɣ iktâb as, inna Mǝššina:
"Ehan-in ad iqqǝl ehan ǝn tǝwatriwen."
Kawanay amaran tǝgâm-tu
"ǝsǝlɣǝs ǝn baydagan"?»
Akk ǝzǝl isassaɣru Ɣaysa daɣ Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada. Ad gammayan muzaran ǝn limaman ǝd musanan n Ǝttawret ǝd muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud d igi ǝn man-net,
mišan ab-asan tǝmǝwit tas zʼagin awen, fǝlas aytedan kul ǝknân-as ǝsǝsam.
Ǝzǝl iyyan isassaɣru Ɣaysa aytedan daɣ Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, immal-asan Ǝlinjil as t-id-osan muzaran ǝn limaman ǝddewan ǝd musanan n Ǝttawret ǝd muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud,
ǝnnan-as: «Ǝmǝl-ana da du-tǝgrawa tarna n igi n aratan win tǝtagga da? Ma dak-kat-ikfan?»
Inn-asan: «Nak da a dawan-agaɣ ǝsǝstan iyyan, amaran ǝmǝlat-i:
Awak ǝsǝlmǝɣ wa iga Yaxya aytedan daɣ aman, Mǝššina a ɣur d-ifal awen meɣ aggadǝm?»
Tǝzzar namašawwaran gar-essan, ǝnnan: «As das-nǝnna "Mǝššina a ɣur d-ifal" a danaɣ-annu: "Mafel za wǝr tǝzzǝgzǝnam s awa inna?"
As das-nǝnna "Aggadǝm a ɣur d-ifal", tamattay ta, ketnet as dana-za-tanɣu ǝs zabaw ǝn tǝgur, fǝlas tǝkkâs aššak as Yaxya ǝnnǝbi a imos.»
Ǝnnan-as amaran: «Wǝr nǝssen wa ɣur d-ifal.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Nak da za, wǝr dawan-z-ǝmǝlaɣ dad d-ǝgrawaɣ tarna n igi n aratan win.»
Amaran imalallay-in Ɣaysa tamattay ig-as ǝlmital wa, inna: «Kala ad ila alǝs iyyan afarag n alɣanab. Tǝzzar issǝɣfar afarag-net en i magyakan wiyyad, iššokal, ig-in tamert tagget.
As du-tewad tamert ta n ǝmilǝy n alɣanab, izammazal sǝr-san iyyan daɣ eklan-net y a t-id-akfin adagar-net daɣ awa d-eraw afarag, mišan ǝgan-as šiwwit, ǝssoɣalan-tu mǝššis isikarayray ifassan.
Izammazal sǝr-san iyyan akli. Ǝnta da, ǝgan-as šiwwit, saffallasan-tu, ǝssoɣalan-tu wǝr eway wala.
As taklat ta n karadat, izammazal sǝr-san iyyan akli. Ǝnta da sabbasan-tu, ǝstaɣan-tu.
Dǝffǝr awen inna mǝššis n afarag: "Awak ma zʼaga? A sǝr-san zǝmmizǝla ruray wa ǝkneɣ tara, mijas ǝnta a t-ǝssǝɣmǝran."
Mišan as ǝnayan magyakan win ǝɣfarnen afarag barar-net izay-tan-du, namannan gar-essan: "Ǝnta ǝddi amakkasu n afarag. Anɣiwatanaq-qu kǝrǝz, fǝl ad tǝqqǝl tǝkasit šin-nana."
Ǝkkasan-tu daɣ afarag, ǝnɣan-tu kǝrǝz.» Amaran inna Ɣaysa i tamattay: «Ǝmǝrǝdda ma tordam ma zʼagu mǝššis n afarag i win den meddan?
Adi za ad aglu ǝnta iman-net, agu iman ǝn magyakan win, issǝɣfǝr afarag-net i magyakan wiyyad.» Ǝslan aytedan y awen ɣas, ǝnnan: «Mǝššina ya wǝr tǝgeɣ adi!»
Tǝzzar idak-kan Ɣaysa s asawad, inn-asan: «Daɣ adi ma imos almaɣna ǝn batu ta tǝnnat daɣ Ǝlkǝttaban:
"Tǝhunt ta din-ǝgaran makrasan, ǝnta a tǝqqalat tǝhunt ta tǝkbalat ehan"?
Awedan kul wa udan fǝl tǝhunt ta, ad addagdag, wa fǝl tuda deɣ a tu-tǝlkǝš.»
Ǝgran musanan n Ǝttawret ǝd muzaran n limaman as ǝntanay a fǝl iga Ɣaysa ǝlmital wen, tǝzzar ǝgmayan d abbaz-net amazay wen da, mišan wǝr ǝgen awen, fǝlas tamattay a ǝksudan.

Adi a fǝl ewalan Ɣaysa, ǝnkâdan-as. Ǝssokan-t-idu meddan ǝgânen iman-nasan almat alɣadilan, fǝl a tu-šǝššiwǝlan sassannin-tu arat wǝr nǝtǝwǝnnu, abǝzǝn-tu sǝr-ǝs, agin-tu daɣ fassan n ǝmuzar n akal d ǝlxǝkum-net.
Ǝssǝstanan Ɣaysa, ǝnnan-as: «Ǝššex, nǝssân as awa tǝganna d awa tǝsassaɣra oɣâd; wǝr tǝtǝgga tǝmǝrit gǝr aytedan. Tǝsasaɣra ǝs tidǝt awas danaɣ-iwar igi-net daɣ tarrayt ta n Mǝššina.
Amaran ǝmǝl-ana, awak xalal-ana arazam n amana y ǝmǝnokal wa zǝwwǝran Qaysara meɣ?»
Igra Ɣaysa tǝnagmayt-nasan, inn-asan:
«Saknat-i tefelt n ǝzrǝf. Ma ilan udǝm d esǝm win t-ǝwarnen?» Ǝnnan-as: «In Qaysara.»
Inn-asan: «Adi za agiwat i Qaysara awa kawan-issǝwar, tagim deɣ i Mǝššina awa kawan-issǝwar.»
Indar-asan a tu-sǝssugin ark awal dat aytedan. Isammaklal sǝr-san aljawab wa dasan-iga den, ǝffǝstan.
Dǝffǝr awen osan-t-id arat daɣ aytedan ǝn taggayt ta n Sadusaytan. Sadusaytan ǝttâfan as wǝr tu-tǝlla tanakra dǝffǝr tǝmattant. Ǝssǝstanan-tu,
ǝnnan-as: «Ǝššex, inna ǝnnǝbi Musa daɣ Ǝttawret: "As aba alǝs, oyya-du tantut dǝr wǝr ila barar, a tat-izlǝf amadray-net fǝl ad agu ǝzzurrǝyya y ǝmidi-net wa aba den."
Amaran kala a t-ǝllan ǝssa mǝdrayan. Izlaf wa dasan-waššaran ketnasan, aba-tu wǝr ila barar.
Izlaf wa n ǝššin tantut ta d-oyya ǝmaqqar-net, ǝnta da aba-tu wǝr d-oyya ara.
Wa n karad deɣ awen da. Ǝssa mǝdrayan en ketnasan igraw-tan awen da, wǝr tan-iha i d-oyyan ara.
Dǝffǝr awen, aba tantut ǝnta da.
Awak ǝzǝl wa n tabadday, ma imos daɣ ǝssa mǝdrayan win den was za tǝqqǝl tǝntut ten taɣurǝs, dad zamas ketnasan ǝzlâfan-tat?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Daɣ ǝddǝnet ta nǝha da, zallafan meddan, tawazlafnat tǝdoden,
mišan aytedan win isannaha Mǝššina ǝd tanakra daɣ tǝmattant fǝl ad ǝggǝzan aljannat, win di wǝr dasan-t-illa azalaf gǝr za meddan wala šidoden.
Id ab-as daɣ-san tǝlkam tǝmattant, olân d angalosan, ǝqqalan bararan ǝn Mǝššina id tanakra a d-ǝgan daɣ tǝmattant.
Amaran daɣ awa iqqalan tanakra ǝn nǝmmǝttan, ǝnnǝbi Musa ǝnta iman-net as isattadda awen daɣ Ǝttawret, daɣ batu ǝn tǝfsǝq, assaɣa wad inna Mǝššina imos "Ǝmǝli n Ibrahim, d Isǝhaq ǝd Yaqub."
Daɣ adi Mǝššina wər imos Ǝməli ən təməxsa, kalar Ǝmǝli ǝn win ǝddarnen a imos, fǝlas ɣur-ǝs aytedan kul ǝddâran.»
Ǝnnan wiyyad daɣ musanan n Ǝttawret i Ɣaysa: «Ǝššex, tǝgêɣ awal olâɣan.»
Dǝffǝr adi ab-as ǝhalan ǝsǝstan-net d arat waliyyan.
Dǝffǝr awen issǝstan-tan Ɣaysa inn-asan: «Manǝmmǝk as itawannu Ǝlmǝsix Ag ǝmǝnokal ǝnnǝbi Dawǝd a imos?
Ǝnta Dawǝd iman-net as sǝr-ǝs inna daɣ ǝlkǝttab wa n Azzabur:
"Inna Ǝmǝli y Ǝmǝli-nin: 'Qamu daɣ ǝɣil-in,
har aga izǝnga-nak daw daran-nak.'"
Daɣ adi dad zamas Dawǝd iman-net iɣra Ǝlmǝsix s esǝm wa n Ǝmǝli, manǝmmǝk as zʼiqqǝl barar-net?»
Harwada ǝssîsaman aytedan kul, as inna Ɣaysa i nǝttulab-net:

«Ǝnkǝdat i musanan n Ǝttawret, ǝrân ǝsǝɣlǝy ǝzlâgan šikadkaden zagrotnen, d ǝtǝwǝsǝslam igân ǝs saɣmar daɣ sammanayan, ǝrân tǝɣimit daɣ daggan win ǝlanen almaqam daɣ nan win ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, ǝd daggan n aytedan win tawasaɣmarnen daɣ mǝgura.
Tattan eharay ǝn tǝdoden šin as aba meddan-nasnat, as iga awen, taggin imaddan tahaginen wǝr nǝmos ar sokni. Ilkâm a dasan-itǝwǝxkǝm attadib labasan.»
Idkal Ɣaysa asawad-net, inay imǝggǝrgas taggin azrǝf wa ǝkkatan daɣ ǝssǝnduq wa daɣ itiddaw ǝrrǝzǝɣ n Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada.
Inay deɣ tantut iyyat ǝn tǝlǝqqay as wǝr idder alǝs-net as tǝga daɣ ǝssǝnduq en sanatat tǝfelen.
Tǝzzar inna: «Ǝggǝyyeɣ silakanaɣ-awan as, tantut ten ǝn tǝlaqqay en as wǝr idder alǝs-net en, togar aytedan a ketnasan tehakkay.
Fǝlas ketnasan awas wǝr ǝddǝraran a ǝkfan, ǝnta amaran, addararat-net a daɣ tǝdkal awa tǝla kul tǝkat-tu.»
Ǝššewalan aytedan wiyyad daɣ batu n Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, ǝmmâlan adalag wa iga ǝs tǝhun hossaynen d aratan win ǝkfan aytedan daɣ tǝkutawen-nasan. Inna Ɣaysa:
«A wa tǝhannayam da, ǝlkâman adan a daɣ-as du-wǝr-za-taqqam tǝhunt tǝwârat tǝmidit-net, ketnet ad itǝwǝjǝbbǝrǝjjǝt.»
Tǝzzar ǝssǝstanan-tu, ǝnnan-as: «Ǝššex, ǝmmay ad zʼagu wǝdi arat? Ma za tǝqqǝl alɣalamat ta za tassaknit as ibuk y igi?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝnkǝdat ad wǝr tǝtǝwǝsǝxrǝkam, id aytedan aggotnen a du-z-asinen ǝttafan esǝm-in. Akkiyyan daɣ-san igannu: "Nak a imosan Ǝlmǝsix", "Taqqan tewad." A dasan-wǝr-tǝlkǝmam.
As tǝslam i tǝrmuq ǝn mǝgiran d ǝlfǝllagatan, ad wǝr tǝššǝwǝšam fǝlas, aratan di kundaba izâran-du, mišan wǝr dasan-za-tǝlkǝm tǝzǝrǝst n ǝddǝnet ǝddi da.»
Inn-asan deɣ: «Ad ǝknǝsnat addawlaten gar-essanat, ǝknǝsnat taɣmaren gar-essanat,
ǝmǝlan-tu nǝgǝynǝgǝyan n amaḍal labasnen; imǝl-tu laz ǝd tǝwǝrnawen ǝssiksadnen daɣ daggan aggotnen, ǝmǝlan-tu deɣ aratan ǝssiksadnen d alɣalamaten ǝsimaklalnen daɣ jǝnnawan.

Mišan dat adi kul, ad tattarmasam, tǝtǝwǝzǝɣǝzzǝbam, tammawayam ǝs nan win ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, tǝtǝwǝggim da kasaw, tǝtǝwǝsǝbdǝdam dat mǝnokalan ǝd naxkiman, tǝtǝwǝsǝstǝnam fǝlas kawan-iwar esǝm-in.
A kawan-akfu adi tarrayt n a fall-i taggayyem.
Daɣ adi sansiwat taytwen-nawan, ad wǝr tǝsǝmmutǝgam awa za tannim y ad tǝkkǝsam iman-nawan,
fǝlas a kawan-akfa masnat n awal ǝd tǝla n ǝgǝrri as tu-wǝr-illa azangaw-nawan a dasan-z-ifrǝgan wala deɣ ifrǝg isǝbbǝhǝw-nawan.
Wala imarwan-nawan a kawan-sǝttǝrmǝsan, sǝttǝrmǝsan-kawan mǝdrayan-nawan ǝd šǝqqaɣan-nawan ǝd midawan-nawan, tǝwǝnɣin wiyyad daɣ-wan kǝrǝz.
A kawan-ǝgzǝran aytedan kul fǝlas kawan-iwar esǝm-in,
mišan wǝr dawan-z-iɣšǝd adi wala a odgan ǝd tǝzuɣay n ǝmi n ǝššǝnnan.
Zǝmmerat-nawan as za tagǝzam iman-nawan.
As tǝnayam aɣrǝm ǝn Yerusalam ɣilayɣalayan-tu gǝnan ǝn sojitan, tǝssǝnam as ijwâr itiwadagdag.
Ǝddi, aytedan win ahanen akal ǝn Yahudǝyya, win di addaggaganet s ǝdɣaɣan. Win ǝhanen aɣrǝm ǝn Yerusalam, ǝgmǝdanet-tu, win t-ǝgmadnen ǝs saffan-net, a t-idu-wǝr-ǝqqǝlan,
fǝlas adan win di, ad ǝqqǝlan adan a daɣ zʼawwaddab Mǝššina aytedan, fǝl ad andin aratan kul win ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban.
Iket alɣazab ad t-aginat tǝdoden šin ǝganen šidusen ǝd šin sankasnen daɣ adan win den, fǝlas ad tagu tǝssust labasat daɣ akal, azzabbat-du attadib ǝn Mǝššina fǝl tamattay ta.
Arat daɣ tamattay ta ad itǝwǝnɣu ǝs takoba, awa hadan ikfǝl ǝs kallan kul, ǝggǝznat tǝmattiwen wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud aɣrǝm ǝn Yerusalam, a tu-tataftafnat har tandu tǝmastant ta tanat-ikfa Mǝššina.

Ad tǝwǝnǝyan aratan saksodnen ǝmosnen alɣalamaten as zʼaginen da tǝfuk ǝd tǝllit d etran. Ad ǝššǝwǝšnat tǝmattiwen n ǝddǝnet wǝllen, iqqǝn ǝmǝsli labasan wa tagginat tanazzamaren n aman ǝn gǝrwan iɣafawan-nasan.
Aytedan a tan-tanɣu tasa n aratan win hannayan ǝzayan-du ǝddǝnet fǝlas ad tǝwǝsǝnǝgǝynǝgǝynat tǝxǝllak šin ǝlânen tarna daɣ jǝnnawan.
Alwaq wǝdi, a di-ǝnǝyan aytedan nak Ag Aggadǝm as du-z-asa, ǝheɣ tagarak, ǝleɣ tarna ǝd tanaya tagget.
As ǝntan aratan win di, tǝsǝmmutǝgam, annalamanet man-nawan, fǝlas alwaq ǝn tǝdarfit-nawan ihôz.»
Ig-asan Ɣaysa ǝlmital, inn-asan: «Ǝnẓǝrat-in daɣ ašǝk ǝn fig d eškan win hadatnen.
As ǝggazan šin tanazra, ad tǝssǝnam kawanay iman-nawan as tamert ta n akasa tǝhôz.
Zund ǝmmǝk en daɣ âs as tǝnayam aratan win dawan-ǝmalaɣ ǝddi, tǝssǝnam as Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina tǝhôz.
Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as tamattay ta da n azzaman win nǝha da, ad tǝnǝy ǝnǝtti n aratan kul win dawan-ǝmala da.
Ijǝnnawan d amaḍal ilkâm ad ibʼas t-ǝllan, mišan batuten-in ǝllanat-tu har faw.»
«Ǝnkǝdat fǝl man-nawan! Ad wǝr iɣšǝd igǝt ǝn tattay ǝd tassay n esmad ǝd medranan n ǝddǝnet ǝnnǝyaten-nawan, ag-awan ǝzǝl wǝdi aɣadar,
zun wa tǝtaggu taftaw y awedan. Arat wǝdi ad agu fǝl aytedan kul win ǝwarnen tesayt n amaḍal.
Daɣ adi agat ǝnnǝyat, ad tǝtansayam Mǝššina alwaq kul a kawan-issǝfragan ikus ǝn man-nawan daɣ awa d-izayan ketnet, tǝfrǝgam a dat-i tǝbdǝdam nak Ag Aggadǝm.»
Faw isasaɣru Ɣaysa aytedan daɣ Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, amaran as iga ahad, ad adǝw adɣaɣ igân esǝm wa n Eškan ǝn Zaytun.
Id affaw, a d-ǝnzǝyan aytedan kul s Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada y a das-ǝssǝsǝman.
Amud wa daɣ tattin aytedan šigǝlwen šin wǝr iha xamira, was itawannu wa n Akkay, ihôz.
Imuzaran ǝn limaman ǝd musanan n Ǝttawret gammayan tǝmǝrkest tas zʼagin iman ǝn Ɣaysa, mišan ǝksudan ad t-anɣin ijǝnnǝjǝrwǝy awen tamattay.
Iggaz Aššaytan Yahuza was itawannu Isxarǝyuti imosan iyyan daɣ nǝttulab ǝn Ɣaysa win maraw d ǝššin.
Igla, ikka imuzaran ǝn limaman ǝd muzaran n aytedan win ogaznen Ehan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, imašawal dǝr-san daɣ batu n ǝmmǝk was zʼagu Ɣaysa daɣ fassan-nasan.
Isaddawat-tan awen; ǝrḍan s ad t-akfin azrǝf.
Ird-asan, tǝzzar ad igammay tǝmǝwit tas zʼagu Ɣaysa daɣ fassan daɣ amazay a ɣur-ǝs wǝr tǝlla tamattay.
As d-ewad ǝzǝl n ǝmud wa n tǝgǝlwen šin wǝr iha xamira, wa daɣ tawagzaman jǝɣal win ǝmud wa n Akkay,
izammazal Ɣaysa Butros ǝd Yaxya, inn-asan: «Aglat tǝsǝmmutǝgam-anaɣ imensewan win ǝmud wa n Akkay.»
Ǝnnan-as: «Mǝnid tareɣ a tan-nǝsǝmmutǝg?»
Inn-asan: «As din-tǝggazam aɣrǝm, ad tammanayam d alǝs a d-iktâran ǝtǝkin-net. Ǝlkǝmat-as s ahan wa zʼiggǝz,
tannim i mǝššis n ahan wǝdi: "Inn-ak Ǝššex: 'Mǝni tu daɣ ahan-nak edag wa n naftaɣan, wa daɣ za nammansaw nak ǝd nǝttulab-in daɣ ǝmud wa n Akkay?'"
A kawan-assaknu daɣ suru-net, ehan wa n afalla, elwân, ǝhân-tu mutag kul. Ǝddi da ad za tǝsǝmmutǝgam imensewan.»
Ǝglan, ǝnayan arat kul s ǝmmǝk was dasan-t-inna Ɣaysa; tǝzzar ad simutugan imensewan win Akkay.
As iga alwaq ǝn tattay, inaɣama Ɣaysa ǝd nǝmmuzal-net, ǝggazan šin tattay.
Tǝzzar inn-asan: «Ǝkneɣ deran ǝn tǝdrǝwt ta dǝr-wan ǝgeɣ imensewan n ǝmud wa, harwa wǝr ǝɣɣǝzzaba.
Silakanaɣ-awan as, wǝr di-ilkem a tan-ǝlasa tettay iket wǝr d-osa ǝzǝl wa daɣ zʼandu almaɣna-nasan daɣ Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina.»
Tǝzzar idkal-du Ɣaysa tǝkabart iha esmad n alɣanab, iggoday i Mǝššina, inna: «Abǝzat tǝkabart ta, tǝnǝmǝglǝzam awa tat-ihan,
fǝlas ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as, wǝr ilkem ad ǝšweɣ esmad n alɣanab, iket wǝr du-tosa Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina.»
Dǝffǝr awen idkal Ɣaysa tagǝlla, iga igodan i Mǝššina, irz-et izun-asan-tat, inn-asan: «taɣǝssa-nin adi, tǝtiwakfat fǝl ǝddǝlil-nawan. Tuzanat-tat ǝs tǝmǝwit ta da, imos adi isaktan-in.»

Zund ǝmmǝk en da âs as ǝtšan, idkal tǝkabart, inn-asan: «Tǝkabart ta, arkawal wa aynayan ǝn tassaq a tǝmos gǝr Mǝššina ǝd tamattay-net. Arkawal wa, azni-nin a zʼinɣǝlan fǝl tǝnfa-nawan a t-isattaddan.»
«Fadda ǝnǝyat, alǝs wa di-z-aggin daɣ fassan, illa da da, idrâw dǝr-i.
Illikan as nak Ag Aggadǝm a di-iba ǝs tǝmǝwit ta d-ixkam Mǝššina harwa dat alwaq, mišan iket alɣazab ad t-inǝy awedan wa di-igan daɣ fassan.»
Tǝzzar ad tinǝmǝsǝstinan nǝmmuzal-net gar-essan ǝd wa daɣ-san zʼagin wen daɣ arat.
Dǝffǝr awen tǝnkar tamazaq gar-essan tǝgât daɣ batu ǝn was ǝttafan as ǝnta a daɣ-san ogaran.
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Imǝnokalan ǝn tǝmattiwen n ǝddǝnet saknin tarna y aytedan win as azzaran, zamazalan fall-asan deɣ ǝlxǝkum-nasan; mišan dǝr iga awen da ǝttâfan as imadhalan n aytedan a ǝmosan.
Mišan kawanay, ad wǝr tagim awen. Kalar, wa daɣ-wan ogaran almaqam, iqqǝlet zun wa daɣ-wan mǝdrǝyan. Wa daɣ-wan azzaran, iqqǝlet zun amaššaɣal.
Awak ma ogaran awedan wa iqqiman itattu ǝd wa das-išɣalan? Wǝrgeɣ wa iqqiman itattu? Mišan nak imosan ǝmuzar-nawan aheq-qawan ǝmosa zun amaššaɣal-nawan.»
«Kawanay win da, a d-ǝqqimnen tǝlkâmam-i daɣ jarrabatan win ǝnaya.
Adi as, tehakkay ta di-iga Abba-nin taɣmar, ǝnta a dawan-z-aga y-as nak ǝmǝrǝdda.
Fǝl a dǝr-i tǝdrǝwam tettay ǝd tassay daɣ taɣmar-in, taqqamim fǝl tǝsǝqqima ǝn tǝmǝnukǝla y ad tǝšrǝɣam i tawšeten marawat ǝd sanatat šin Israyil.»
«Simɣon, Simɣon! Ǝnkǝd! Aššaytan igmây turagat n a dawan-agu ǝsǝkǝnsǝki wa itawaggin y alkama.
Mišan nak onsâyaɣ-ak Mǝššina fǝl a kay-wǝr-igmǝd ǝzǝgzan wa sǝr-i tǝgeɣ. Amaran as di-du-tǝqqala, tǝsǝssuheɣ ǝzǝgzan ǝn mǝdrayan-nak.»
Inn-as Simɣon Butros: «Ǝmǝli, nak simataga s a dǝr-ǝk idawa kuddeɣ ǝs kasaw, ǝd tǝmattant.»
Mišan inn-as Ɣaysa: «Butros, silakanaɣ-ak as, wǝr zʼaɣru ǝkǝji aɣora ahada da wǝr di-tǝggeda har karadat tăklaten.»
Dǝffǝr awen inna Ɣaysa i nǝmmuzal-net ketnasan: «Alwaq wa kawan-zammazala wǝr tewayam azrǝf, wala aɣrǝg, wala tǝsǝsǝlt ta n sanatat, awak ill-ay arat a din-todânam?» Ǝnnan-as: «Kala.»
Inn-asan: «Ǝmǝrǝdda za, wa ilan azrǝf awǝyet-tu, wa ilan aɣrǝg awǝyet-tu. Wa wǝr nǝla takoba, azzanzet-in ǝbǝrnuz-net, azzanzet-du.
Silakanaɣ-awan as, awa fall-i itawannan daɣ Ǝlkǝttab ǝn Mǝššina n as "iddun daɣ maggan ǝn tǝkma." Kundaba inda. Awalla, arat kul wa fall-i itawannan ad andu.»
Ǝnnan-as: «Ǝmǝli, sanatat tǝkabiwen da.» Inn-asan: «Ayyat batu di, wǝr di-tǝgrem.»
Igmad Ɣaysa, iddêw ǝd nǝttulab-net, ikka adɣaɣ wa n Eškan ǝn Zaytun, imos awen arat itaggu faw.
As din-ewadan, inn-asan: «Ansǝyat Mǝššina a kawan-ogazan daɣ jarrabatan n Iblis.»
Ǝnta amaran izzǝnkaz-in fall-asan, ǝddukad ǝn taggor ǝn tǝhunt, igaraffat ad itattar,
igannu: «Abba, kud immikkan adi, tǝssǝgǝgaɣ-i tǝkabart ta n alɣazab di! Dǝr iga awen da ya, taget tara ta-nak wǝrgeɣ ta-nin.»
Amaran inafalal-as angalos y ad t-isǝssuhǝt.
Tǝzzar ǝdgazan man Ɣaysa, idgaz wǝllen daɣ tǝwatriwen, har tǝqqal tarraft-net šilat n ǝzni, ad tǝtattab daɣ amaḍal.
As iɣrad šiwatriwen, ibdad, iqqal-du inǝttulab-net, os-en-du issins-en ǝɣšud ǝn man.
Inn-asan: «Mafel tǝnsâm? Ǝnkǝrat tansǝyam Mǝššina a kawan-ogazan daɣ jarrabatan n Iblis.»
Harwada iššewal-asan as tan-tǝggaz tamattay tǝgget as azzar Yahuza wa n iyyan daɣ nǝttulab-net win maraw d ǝššin. Ihoz-du Yahuza Ɣaysa y ad t-izǝlǝmmǝt.
Mišan inn-as Ɣaysa: «Adis kay Yahuza, tǝzǝlǝmmet as di-za-tǝsǝssuga daɣ fassan, nak Ag Aggadǝm?»
As ǝnayan nǝttulab win hadatnen awa ibukan y igi da, ǝnnan: «Ǝmǝli, ma iqqal nǝššǝšɣǝl šikabiwen-nana?»
Tǝzzar iwat iyyan daɣ-san akli n Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran, ifras-du tǝmǝzzuk-net ta n ǝɣil.
Mišan iharaššat-tan Ɣaysa, inn-asan: «Ayyat adi!» Tǝzzar idas tǝmǝzzuk n ǝkli wen, izzozay-tat, tǝqqǝl ǝmmǝk-net.

Amaran inna i muzaran ǝn limaman ǝd muzaran n aytedan win tagaznen Ehan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada ǝd muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, ǝs ketnasan osân-du y ad t-ǝbǝzan: «Awak ǝjajǝb iyyan n abaydag a ǝmosa as sǝr-i du-tewayam šikabiwen ǝd tǝburǝgen?
Wǝrgeɣ ǝzǝl kul ǝrtâya dǝr-wan daɣ Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada mišan wǝr di-tobezam? Ǝmǝrǝdda za alwaq-nawan a d-ewadan, kawanay ǝd taɣmar ta n Iblis ǝd šiyyay-net.»
Tǝzzar obazan Ɣaysa, ewayan-tu s aɣaywan n Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran. Ig-asan Butros lǝkkum zagren.
As din-osan, tǝtawasarɣa tǝmsay daɣ ammas n aɣalla, ǝqqiman sǝr-ǝs aytedan. Iggaz-tan-in Butros.
Tǝnay-tu tǝmaššaɣalt iyyat iqqim ǝs tǝmsay, tǝzaggazd-ay wǝllen, amaran tǝnna: «Alǝs wa, ǝnta da, iddew ǝd Ɣaysa.»
Mišan iggad Butros awen, inna: «Tantut, wǝr t-ǝzdaya.»
Arat n amazay dǝffǝr awen, inay-tu iyyan awedan, inn-as: «Kay da, iyyan daɣ-san.» Mišan inn-as Butros: «Xa alǝs wa, kala wǝr t-ǝmosa.»
As iga adag n alwaq dǝffǝr awen, inna alǝs iyyan s assahat: «Illikan as alǝs wa iddew dǝr-ǝs, fǝlas ǝnta da in akal ǝn Galilaya.»
Inn-as Butros: «Xa alǝs, wǝr ǝssenaɣ awa daɣ-i tǝššewalaɣ.» Harwa da iššewal Butros alwaq wen da as iɣra ǝkǝji aɣora.
Tǝzzar imalallay-in Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa iswad daɣ Butros. Den da a d-ikta Butros awal wa das-iga Ǝmǝli, as das-inna: «Wǝr zʼaɣru ǝkǝji aɣora azalada wǝr di-tǝkkesaɣ tazdǝyt har karadat tăklaten.»
Tǝzzar Igmad Butros, ad ihallu fǝl awa ǝgan man-net daɣ ǝɣšud.
Alwaq wen, meddan win ǝttafnen Ɣaysa, ǝgân daɣ-as tamakkakkayt, ǝggâtan-tu.
Ǝgan-as abanaban, a das-gannin: «Kay ya ǝlǝwli! Ǝmǝl wa kay-iwatan.»
A das-taggin batuten šiyyad aggotnen labasnen.
As affaw aɣôra, immǝnay Asaggawar wa Zǝwwǝran ǝn muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, ǝhân-tu ǝmuzaran ǝn limaman ǝd musanan n Ǝttawret, itawasabdad dat-san Ɣaysa.
Ǝnnan-as: «Kud kay Ǝlmǝsix, tǝmǝlaɣ-ana?» Tǝzzar inn-asan: «Kud dawan-ǝmala da wǝr di-za-tǝzzǝgzǝnam,
kud kawan-ǝssǝstana deɣ wǝr di-za-tajjawwabam.
Mišan a obazan ɣur ǝmǝrǝdda, Nak Ag Aggadǝm ad aqqama daɣ ǝɣil ǝn Mǝššina di n Ǝmǝli ǝn Tarna.»
Ǝnnan-as ketnasan: «Daɣ adi kay Barar ǝn Mǝššina?» Inn-asan: «Kawanay iman-nawan as tǝnnam ǝmosaq-qu.»
Tǝzzar ǝnnan: «Ma nǝkka y iyyat tǝgǝyya? Wǝrgeɣ nakkanay iman-nana nǝslâ y awa d-igmadan imi-net?»
Tǝnkar aljamaɣat ketnet, teway Ɣaysa ǝs Bilatǝs wa n ǝnaxkim.
A ɣur-ǝs tu-ɣattasan gannin: «Alǝs wa, as t-in-nosa isaxrak tamattay-nana. Igaddal deɣ y aytedan ad ǝrzǝman amana i Qaysara wa n ǝmǝnokal wa zǝwwǝran, harwa igannu ǝnta a imosan Ǝlmǝsix, ǝmǝnokal.»
Awen da a fǝl t-issǝstan Bilatǝs, inn-as: «Awak kay daɣ a imosan ǝmǝnokal ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud?» Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Kay iman-nak as tǝnneɣ adi.»
Inna Bilatǝs i limaman win zawwarnen ǝd tamattay: «Wǝr hǝnnǝyaɣ ǝddǝlil waliyyan a fǝl obazaɣ alǝs a.»
Mišan ǝdgazan wǝllen daɣ tǝɣǝttas-net, gannin: «Ijinǝjǝrwǝy aytedan ǝs sǝssǝɣritan-net daɣ akal ǝn Yahudǝyya ketnet. Issǝnta-du awen daɣ Galilaya har awas d-ewad Yerusalam da.»
Isla Bilatǝs y esǝm wa n Galilaya ɣas, issǝstan kud Ɣaysa in akal ǝn Galilaya wala.
As issan as taɣmar ta n Herod a das-tazzarat, issok-as-tu fǝlas iha Yerusalam daɣ adan en.
Herod isidawat-tu wǝllen anay ǝn Ɣaysa, irǝw ira anay-net fǝl ǝddǝlil n aratan win sǝr-ǝs isallu. Igâ deɣ attama n a dat-ǝs agu Ɣaysa tǝlmǝɣjujat.
Ig-as isǝstanan aggotnen, mišan wǝr das-inna Ɣaysa wala.
As itaggu awen, imuzaran ǝn limaman ǝd musanan n Ǝttawret ǝllân den, siɣaren da tǝɣǝttas ǝn Ɣaysa.
A das-itaggu Herod ǝd sojitan-net šisǝssǝlka, taggin daɣ-as tamakkakkayt; ǝzzǝzlagan-tu takatkat tǝknât ǝbǝlǝzlǝz, amaran issoɣal-tu Herod i Bilatǝs.
Eway-du awen ǝzǝl wen da as immedaw Bilatǝs ǝd Herod, id dat awen nimagzaran.
Iššedaw-du Bilatǝs ilimaman win zawwarnen ǝd muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win hadatnen ǝd tamattay,
inn-asan: «Tewayam-du sǝr-i alǝs a, tǝnnam isafallag aytedan. Ǝšraɣaɣ-as dat-wan, mišan wǝr ǝnaya ǝddǝlil waliyyan a fǝl t-ǝbaza daɣ aratan win tu-tǝssǝwaram.
Wala deɣ inay-tu daɣ-as Herod, fǝlas issoɣal-anaq-q-id. Amaran ǝnǝyat! Alǝs wa, wǝr iga arat waliyyan a t-issiwaran tǝmattant.
Daɣ adi a das-sǝssuga šiwwit, amaran ayyaq-qu.»
Tǝll-ay alɣadat tǝmosat as i d-iɣlay ǝmud wa n Akkay, iwâr Bilatǝs a dasan-ikkǝs awedan iyyan daɣ kasaw.
Jajjayen adakal ǝn maslan-nasan ketnasan daɣ jǝnnawan gannin: «Agu iman n alǝs di, tǝkkǝsaɣ-ana-du Barɣabbas.»
Barɣabbas wen, ǝnǝjǝrway as kala ad t-ǝgan aytedan daɣ ǝɣrǝm n Yerusalam d igi ǝn man n awedan a fǝl iggaz kasaw.
Ilas-asan Bilatǝs awal fǝlas tara a iga ad ayyu Ɣaysa.
Mišan ǝglan siɣaren daɣ jǝnnawan, gannin: «Taytay-tu fǝl tǝgǝttawt! Taytay-tu fǝl tǝgǝttawt!»
Ig-asan Bilatǝs tǝnna ta n karadat: «Mafel za? Ma iɣšad? Wǝr hǝnnǝyaɣ ǝddǝlil waliyyan a t-issiwaran tǝmattant. Daɣ adi a das-sǝssuga šiwwit ɣas, ayyaq-qu.»
Mišan ǝššotan šiɣaraten wǝllen, gammayan daɣ-as ad itǝwǝtǝytǝy Ɣaysa fǝl tǝgǝttawt. Ǝɣlaban Bilatǝs ǝs takat.
Tǝzzar ixtas Bilatǝs i Ɣaysa ǝššǝriɣa wa daɣ-as tǝgmay tamattay ten.
Ikkas alǝs wa daɣ-as gammayan, iggâzan kasaw fǝl ǝnǝjǝrway n aytedan d igi n man n awedan. Ɣaysa amaran, ig-ay daɣ fassan-nasan, y a daɣ-as itǝwǝxkǝm awas ǝran.

Ǝzzǝrgazan sojitan Ɣaysa. Ǝglân dǝr-ǝs as ǝmmǝnayan d alǝs iyyan n ǝɣrǝm ǝn Qǝrwan igân esǝm Simɣon a d-ifâlan šiwǝgas, tǝzzar ǝbazan-tu, sassawayan-tu tǝgǝttawt ta fǝl zʼitǝwǝtǝytǝy Ɣaysa, ilkam-as dǝr-ǝs.
Tǝlkâm-as tamattay tagget, ǝhânat tǝdoden aggotnen a fall-as hallinen, sikalalnat.
Iswad-in daɣ-asnat Ɣaysa, inn-asnat: «Aššet Yerusalam, ayyimat fall-i tala. Kalar alimat fǝl man-nakmat, ǝd maddannǝkmat,
fǝlas ǝlkâman adan a daɣ zʼitǝwǝnnu: "Ǝbbilalnat tǝdoden šin wǝr nǝtilu bararan, ǝd šin ǝs kala wǝr tan-ǝlenat, ǝd šin ǝs kala wǝr ǝsǝnkasnat."
Adan win-di ad annin aytedan y ǝdɣaɣan: "Bǝrǝjjǝtat fall-ana", annin i kašwaran: "Alsiwat-ana";
fǝlas dad itawagga ǝmazal wa y ašǝk wa ibdagan, wǝdi ma d-innayan wa iqquran?»
Ǝllan meddan den ǝššin ǝn nǝsgufa labasnen s ǝntanay da tiwazargazan s adag ǝn tǝmattant.
As ewadan sojitan edag igân esǝm Tǝkǝyya, ǝttǝytayan Ɣaysa fǝl tǝgǝttawt, ǝssǝɣtan-tat dǝr-ǝs. Ǝgan awen da i meddan win ǝššin en. Iyyan ǝgan-tu daɣ ǝɣil ǝn Ɣaysa, wa hadan ǝgan-tu daɣ zalgat-net.
Inna Ɣaysa: «Ya Abba, surǝf-asan; wǝr ǝssenan awa taggin.»
Ǝzunan tabdoq ǝn Ɣaysa ǝs tǝšaɣeren.
Tamattay tǝbdâd den tǝswâd. Imuzaran amaran ǝgân tamakkakkayt daɣ Ɣaysa, gannin: «Ǝnta wa issǝfsan aytedan, assafset iman-net kud ǝnta a imosan Ǝlmǝsix, Tafrǝnt ǝn Mǝššina.»
Sojitan da, ǝgân daɣ-as tamakkakkayt. Tihazan-t-in, tazzalan-as-in bǝnegǝr.
Gannin-as: «Kud kay ǝmǝnokal ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud a tǝmosaɣ, tassafsaɣ iman-nak.»
Ǝttǝytayan deɣ dǝnnǝg-ǝs ǝsǝllum a fǝl iktâb as:
A das-itaggu iyyan daɣ meddan ǝn jujab ǝn baydagan win dǝgman-ǝs tawataytaynen ark batuten, igann-as: «Wǝrgeɣ kay Ǝlmǝsix? Safsu za iman-nak, tassafsaɣ-ana.»
Isannarɣam-as wa hadan, inn-as: «Kay tǝksǝda a wǝr tǝge Mǝššina, kay wa obaz ǝššǝriɣa imosan tǝmattant wa t-ibazan?
Nakkanay ǝššǝriɣa wa danaɣ-itawaggan oɣâd, awa dǝr ǝhoran mazalan-nana a danaɣ-itawaxkaman, mišan alǝs wa, ǝnta wǝr iga ark amazal waliyyan.»
Tǝzzar inna i Ɣaysa: «Ɣaysa, aktǝw-i-du as du-tǝqqala taheɣ taɣmar-nak.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Ǝggǝyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-ak as, azalada ad nǝnǝmǝgǝz aljannat nak dǝr-ǝk.»
Awen itaggu attayan n ammasnazal. Tǝzzar ǝlsanat šiyyay amaḍal ketnet har tǝga tazzar,
fǝlas tǝfuk a igmad ǝnnur. Afǝr deɣ wa izammazzayan edag wa zǝddigan ǝd wa ogaran tazdak daɣ Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, izzǝrrat daɣ ammas.
Tǝzzar ikkas Ɣaysa ǝmǝsli issohen, inna: «Abba, ǝgeɣ iman-in gǝr fassan-nak.» Inna awen ɣas ǝgmadan-tu man.
As inay kabtan ǝn sojitan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝrrum win ǝttǝytaynen Ɣaysa awa igan den, iga tǝmmal i Mǝššina, amaran inna: «Illikan as alǝs wa alɣadil.»
Ǝddêwan aytedan aggotnen den y ad ǝnǝyan awa zʼagin. As t-ǝnayan, ǝqqalan ǝggâtan idmaran-nasan fǝl awa ǝgan man-nasan daɣ ǝɣšud.
As itaggu awen, imidawan ǝn Ɣaysa kul, ǝhânat tǝdoden šin das-d-ǝlkamnen harwa daɣ akal ǝn Galilaya, ǝbdâdan sǝdi, ǝswâdan.
Ill-ay alǝs igân Yusǝf ihân Asaggawar wa Zǝwwǝran ǝn muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, imosan awedan olâɣan n alɣadil.
Ǝnta wǝr irda ǝs tanat ta ǝgan muzaran win, wala deɣ s arat wa igan. Yusǝf wa, in ǝɣrǝm ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud igân esǝm Arimatay, amaran igâ attama-net daɣ assa ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina.
Ikka Yusǝf Bilatǝs wa n ǝnaxkim n akal, igraw-du ɣur-ǝs turagat n ad itkǝl taɣǝssa ǝn Ɣaysa.
Tǝzzar ikkas-tat-du fǝl tǝgǝttawt, ig-et daɣ šifit, ig-et daɣ ǝzǝkka imosan akazam ǝs wǝr kala a daɣ-as itawagga ǝnǝmmettǝn.
Awen itaggu daɣ ǝzǝl wa daɣ simutugan aytedan y ǝmud wa n tǝsanfawt, ibukan y ǝnǝtti.
Šidoden šin d-ǝddewnen ǝd Ɣaysa harwa daɣ Galilaya, ǝlkâmnat i Yusǝf. Ǝnaynat ǝzǝkka d ǝmmǝk was daɣ-as tǝtawagga tǝɣǝssa ǝn Ɣaysa.
Ǝqqalnat aɣaywan, tǝzzar ad simutugnat aḍutan ǝzodnen d alwarditan win za tǝwǝnɣǝlnen fǝl tǝɣǝssa-net. As d-ewad ǝzǝl wa n ǝssǝbǝt ǝssǝnfanat, imos awen alwajib n ǝššǝriɣa wa n Ǝttawret.
As ǝzǝl wa n alxad, ǝnzaynat tǝdoden šin den s ǝzǝkka ǝn Ɣaysa, ewâynat aḍutan win sammatagnat.
Osanat-in tǝhunt ta tǝharat ǝzǝkka, tǝtiwasaɣararad, tǝlla den y ǝzǝkka.
Ǝggaznat ǝzzǝka mišan wǝr daɣ-as ǝnaynat taɣǝssa ǝn Ɣaysa.
Ǝqqanan ɣafawan-nasnat y awen. Wala a ihogan ǝbdadan-du ǝššin meddan dǝgma-nasnat ǝlsânen isǝlsa bilazlaznen.
Ǝrmaɣnat, oyyanat idmaran s amaḍal, tǝzzar ǝnnan-asnat meddan win ǝššin en: «Mas tǝsaggadmat y i iddâran daɣ nǝmmǝttan?
Abʼas illa da, inkar-du daɣ tǝmattant. Aktimat-du awa inna harwa iha akal ǝn Galilaya,
as inna: "Ag Aggadǝm ilzâm-tu ad itǝwǝggu daɣ fassan ǝn nasbakkadan, itǝwǝtǝytǝy fǝl tǝgǝttawt, iba-tu, tǝzzar inkǝr-du daɣ tǝmattant ǝzǝl wa n karad."»
Amaran ǝktanat-du awa inna Ɣaysa.
Ǝfalnat ǝzǝkka, ǝqqalnat ǝssoɣalnat awen kul i nǝmmuzal ǝn Ɣaysa win maraw d iyyan ǝd nalkiman kul win hadatnen.
Šidoden šin ǝmosnat Maryama Madǝl ǝd Taxya ǝd Maryama ta n anna ǝn Yaqub ǝd tǝdoden šiyyad dǝr-ǝsnat ǝddawnen. Ǝntanatay a ǝssoɣalnen aratan win i nǝmmuzal.
Mišan wǝr sǝr-san ǝlen aratan en almaɣna; adi a fǝl dasnat-wǝr-ǝzzǝgzanan.
Dǝr iga awen da ya, igga-du Butros, ozal s ǝzǝkka. As t-in-osa, iššǝgga daɣ-as, wǝr daɣ-as inay ar šifit, tǝzzar iqqal, iqqân awen eɣaf-net.
Ǝzǝl wen da iman-net ad ǝkkan nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa ǝššin taɣrǝmt iyyat tǝgât Emayos as tǝlla teklay n ǝššin alwaqan gar-es ǝd Yerusalam.
Mišawalan daɣ batu n aratan win ǝganen den kul.
Mišawalan den da as tan-d-ewad Ɣaysa ǝnta iman-net, iddew dǝr-san.
Hannayan-tu mišan wǝr t-ǝzdayan.
Inn-asan: «Ma daɣ tǝmašawalam da?» Ǝbdadan, tǝwâr tǝkenzert udmawan-nasan.
Inn-as wa daɣ-san igan esǝm Klǝyubas: «Adis kay ɣas daɣ aytedan win ǝhanen Yerusalam a wǝr ǝhen salan n awa daɣ-as igan daɣ adan win?»
Inn-asan: «Ma daɣ-as igan?» Ǝnnan-as: «Arat wa igrawan Ɣaysa wa n Nazaret, imosan ǝnnǝbi itaggan imazalan d awalan ǝn tǝla tarna dat Mǝššina d aytedan kul.
Sattarmasan-tu limaman win zawwarnen ǝd muzaran-nana, tǝtawaxkam-as tǝmattant, sattaytayan-tu fǝl tǝgǝttawt.
Nakkanay dat awen, nǝgâ attama n as ǝnta a zʼisǝddǝrfen tamattay n Israyil. Mišan azalada, ǝzǝl n aratan en wa n karad d igi.
Dǝr iga awen da ya, ǝqqânnat tǝdoden-nana šiyyad iɣafawan-nana, ǝnzaynen s ǝzǝkka,
mišan wǝr daɣ-as ǝnaynat taɣǝssa-net. Ǝqqalnat-du, ǝnnanat nifalalan-asnat angalosan, ǝnnan-asnat iddâr.
Tǝzzar ǝkkan wiyyad daɣ-na ǝzǝkka, osan-in, ǝnayan arat kul wa ǝnnanat tǝdoden en, mišan ǝnta wǝr t-ǝnayan.»
Amaran inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Xa kawanay za aljahilan! Izzǝwwat fall-awan ǝzǝgzan s arat kul wa ǝnnan ǝnnǝbitan daɣ Ǝlkǝttaban.
Wǝrgeɣ Ǝlmǝsix ilzâm âs ad inǝy alɣazab tǝzzar, amaran igrǝw tanaya-net?»
Tǝzzar a tan-isasagru Ɣaysa awa sǝr-ǝs ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban kul. Ibaz-du ɣur Ǝlkǝttaban win ǝnnǝbi Musa har win ǝnnǝbitan kul win hadatnen.
As din-ǝhozan taɣrǝmt ta ǝkkan, issǝkna Ɣaysa as okây.
Mišan ǝwaɣan-tu, ǝnnan-as: «Ɣam ɣur-na fǝlas ǝzǝl igla, ehad ibuk y igi», tǝzzar izzǝbbat ɣur-san.
As ǝggazan šin tattay, idkal Ɣaysa tagǝlla, iggoday i Mǝššina, irz-et ikf-asan-tat.
Ǝmmoranat šittawen-nasan alwaq wen da, ǝzdayan-tu, mišan iggaz-asan ǝtǝnkul tamazayt ten da.
Tǝzzar namannan gar-essan: «Zaɣnin awen da fǝl ǝknan man-nana tǝfalawist alwaq wa danaɣ-iššewal daɣ tarrayt, isasagr-ana Ǝlkǝttaban n ǝnnǝbitan.»
Ǝbdadan tamazayt ten da, ǝqqalan Yerusalam. Osan-in inǝmmuzal win maraw d iyyan ǝd nalkiman win hadatnen ǝddewan daɣ adag iyyanda,
gannin: «Tidǝt daɣ a imos as Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa inkâr-du daɣ tǝmattant, amaran inifalal i Simɣon.»
Ǝssoɣalan-asan meddan win ǝššin ǝntanay da awa ǝnayan daɣ tarrayt, d ǝmmǝk was t-ǝzdayan alwaq wad irza tagǝlla.
Harwada ǝššewalan daɣ awen as d-ibdad Ɣaysa iman-net gar-essan, inn-asan: «Alxer fall-awan.»
Ǝgan tǝrǝmmeq zǝwwǝrat, tǝggaz-tan tasa fǝlas ǝɣilan aggǝsuf a hannayan den.
Tǝzzar inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ma fel tǝššiwašam? Ma fel deɣ tǝgâm aššak?
Ǝnǝyat ifassan-in ǝd daran-in, nak iman-in awa. Ǝdǝsat-i ad tǝnǝyam, fǝlas aggǝsuf wǝr ila taɣǝssa wala iɣasan win as di-tǝhannayam da ǝleq-qan.»
As dasan-inna awen, isakn-en ifassan-net ǝd daran-net,
mišan ǝglan wǝr daɣ-as ǝkkesan aššak fǝl awa ǝgan daɣ tǝfalawist, ikna deɣ sǝr-san awen ǝsǝmmǝklǝl. Adi a fǝl a dasan-inna: «Awak tǝlâm a itamatšan da?»
Ǝkfan-tu tablalt ǝn kifi tǝŋŋât.
Ibaz-tat, itš-et dat-san.
Dǝffǝr awen inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝntanay da aratan win dawan-ǝnne harwa kawan-ǝheɣ: Aratan kul win fall-i ǝktabnen daɣ Ǝttawret n ǝnnǝbi Musa d Ǝlkǝttaban win hadatnen d Azzabur ǝššil ad andin.»
Amaran ora iɣafawan-nasan alwaq wen da y ad agrin Ǝlkǝttaban.
Inn-asan: «Wǝrgeɣ iktâb as, Ǝlmǝsix ad inǝy alɣazab, iba-tu, inkǝr-du daɣ tǝmattant ǝzǝl wa n karad,
tǝzzar tǝwǝggin salan ǝn tǝtubt s esǝm-net i tǝmattiwen kul fǝl ad ǝgrǝwnat tǝsureft ǝn bakkadan, antu awen daɣ Yerusalam.
Kawanay tǝmôsam šigǝyyawen n aratan win.
Amaran nak a fall-awan du-zǝzzǝbbeɣ Infas wa Zǝddigan s Abba-nin a igan arkawal-net. Daɣ adi ad wǝr tǝgmǝdam aɣrǝm wa da har d-azzabbat Infas wa Zǝddigan, akf-iwan tarna ta du-tǝfalat Mǝššina.»
Dǝffǝr awen, iddew dǝr-san, ǝgmadan aɣrǝm, har din-ǝhozan taɣrǝmt ta n Betanǝy, tǝzzar idkal ifassan-net, ittar-asan a tan-ikfan albaraka.
Itattar-asan harwa da as dǝr-san immǝzzay, immǝdkal ǝs jǝnnawan.
Ǝntanay amaran, as das-ǝssǝjadan, ǝqqalan Yerusalam ǝknân tǝfalawist.
Faw ǝhân Ehan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, ǝmmâlan Mǝššina.
John: Ǝstizarat as d-ixlak Mǝššina ǝddǝnet da Awal ill-ay. Awal illa ɣur Mǝššina, amaran Awal wa imos Mǝššina.
Awal ǝstizarat illa ɣur Mǝššina.
Ixlak-du sǝr-ǝs Mǝššina arat kul; wǝr t-illa arat daɣ ǝddǝnet wa sǝr-ǝs du-wǝr-nǝxlek fǝlas Awal wa ǝnta a ihakkin tǝmǝddurt ta tǝmosat ǝnnur y aytedan.
Ixlak-du sǝr-ǝs Mǝššina arat kul; wǝr t-illa arat daɣ ǝddǝnet wa sǝr-ǝs du-wǝr-nǝxlek fǝlas Awal wa ǝnta a ihakkin tǝmǝddurt ta tǝmosat ǝnnur y aytedan.
Imilawlaw daɣ šiyyay mišan wǝr t-ǝqbelnat.
Osa-du alǝs iyyan igân esǝm Yaxya, a d-izimazal Mǝššina;
imos tǝgǝyya fǝl ad ammagrad s ǝnnur wa, ǝzzǝgzǝnan aytedan kul s aratan win igannu.
Ǝnta iman-net wǝr imos ǝnnur, ǝtǝwǝsǝgla ɣas a d-iga imos tǝgǝyya fǝl ad ammagrad s ǝnnur wa.
Awal wa ǝnta a imosan ǝnnur wa n tidǝt, wa d-ikkan ǝddǝnet isimǝlǝwlǝw aytedan kul.
Ǝnta a ihan ǝddǝnet, ixlak-kat-du sǝr-ǝs Mǝššina, mišan wǝr tu-tǝqbel ǝddǝnet.
Osa-du akal-net eges wǝr t-ǝqbelan aytedan-net.
Amaran aytedan kul win t-ǝqbalnen, ǝzzǝgzanan sǝr-ǝs, win di ikf-en almaqam ǝn tišit ǝn bararan ǝn Mǝššina.
Bararan en ǝlâsan tǝhǝwt. Mišan tǝhǝwt en wǝr tola ǝd ta tǝtawazdayat. Wǝr tǝga ǝs lǝkkum i deran n aggadǝm, wala tanat-net. Kala kalar Mǝššina iman-net as tan-iga bararan-net.
Wa imosan Awal, iqqal awedan ixsar ɣur-na, ikna tǝla n ǝlxurma, imos mǝššis ǝn tidǝt. Nǝsinagra tanaya-net, tanaya ta igarraw Barar a n iyyanda ɣur Abba-net.
Iggǝyyat-as Yaxya, iššewal s afalla ad igannu: «Wa daɣ as ǝhe batu-net, assaɣa wa dawan-ganna: "A d-asu dǝffǝr-i mišan ogar-i, fǝlas dat-i da ill-ay."»
Awalla ketnana nǝgraw albaraka wǝr nǝla ǝddukad s ǝlxurma-net ikmâlan.
Fǝlas Mǝššina ikf-anaɣ ǝššǝriɣa daɣ ǝfus ǝn Musa, ǝlxurma ǝd tidǝt amaran osa-du dǝr-san Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix.
Wǝr t-illa awedan inâyan Mǝššina, mišan Barar a n iyyanda imosan Mǝššina, illa ɣur Abba, ǝnta a danaq-q-issosanan.
Ǝnta da tǝgǝyya ta iga Yaxya y arat daɣ limaman ǝd Kǝl-Lebi win d-ǝfalnen Yerusalam assaɣa wa tan-du-zammazalan muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud y ad t-ǝssǝstǝnan d awa imos.
Wǝr ugay s a dasan-ajjawwab. Kala kalar idkal ǝmǝsli-net s afalla inn-asan: «Nak wǝr ǝmosaɣ Ǝlmǝsix.»
Ǝnnan-as: «Ma tǝmosa za? Ilyas a tǝmosa?» «Kala kala» inn-asan, «wǝr t-ǝmosa.» «Ǝnnǝbi wa ittǝmalan a tǝmosa?» «Kala kala» inn-asan, «wǝr t-ǝmosa.»
Tǝzzar ǝnnan-as: «Daɣ adi ma tǝmosa? Ihor a din-nasu aytedan win dana-d-ǝssǝglanen newây-asan aljawab n awa tǝmosa. Daɣ adi ǝmǝl-anaq-qu.»
Inn-asan arat wa inna ǝnnǝbi Isayas irǝw, as inna: «Nak, a imosan wa isaɣaren daɣ ǝsuf igannu: "Sǝssiɣǝdat abaraqqa y Ǝmǝli."»
Aytedan win d-ǝmmozalnen ǝs Yaxya da, ǝhân-tan kǝl taggayt ta n Farisaytan.
Ǝlasan-tu ǝsǝstan ǝnnan-as: «Ma fǝl tǝsalmaɣaɣ aytedan daɣ aman, kay tǝnne wǝr tǝmosaɣ Ǝlmǝsix, wǝr tǝmosaɣ deɣ ǝnnǝbi wa ittǝmalan?»
Inn-asan: «Nak, aman a daɣ salmaɣa, mišan illa gar-ewwan awedan wǝr tǝzdayam,
s ǝnta a du-z-asin dǝffǝr-i, amaran awa di-iga daɣ šigrat, wǝr eweda wala arra ǝn suɣan ǝn ɣateman-net.»
Aratan win kul amaḍal ǝn Betanǝy a daɣ taggan fǝl tagadamayt ta hadat n agarew wa n Yordan s ǝnta a daɣ isalmaɣ Yaxya aytedan.
As iga ǝzǝl wa hadan ogga Yaxya Ɣaysa izay-t-idu, tǝzzar inna: «Ǝnta den ajaɣol ǝn Mǝššina wa itakkasan ibakkadan daɣ ǝddǝnet.
Ǝnta as ǝhe batu-net as dawan-ganna: "Alǝs iyyan a d-asu dǝffǝr-i, mišan ogar-i fǝlas dat-i da ill-ay."
Nak iman-in wǝr t-ǝzdaya mišan ose-du ad salmaɣaɣ aytedan daɣ aman, fǝl a d-inǝfilǝl i Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.»
Ilas Yaxya tǝgǝyya inna: «Ǝswâda daɣ Infas wa Zǝddigan as d-igmad jǝnnawan, iha šaššelan ǝn tǝdabert, iwar-tu.

Dat awen wǝr t-ǝzdaya, mišan Mǝššina, s ǝnta di-d-izammazalan y ad ǝsalmaɣaɣ aytedan daɣ aman, inn-i: "Alǝs was tǝnayaɣ Infas wa Zǝddigan as fall-as d-izzǝbbat, alǝs wǝdi ǝnta a zʼisalmaɣan aytedan daɣ Infas wa Zǝddigan."
Ǝmǝrǝdda arat wa ǝnayaq-qu ǝs šittawen-in; amaran ǝggǝyye silakanaɣ as alǝs wa ǝnta Barar ǝn Mǝššina.»
As iga ǝzǝl wa hadan, iha Yaxya edag wa harwa da, ǝnta ǝd nǝttulab-net ǝššin,
ogga Ɣaysa as dagma-nasan d-illam, inna: «Ǝnta den, Ajaɣol ǝn Mǝššina.»
Ǝslan nǝttulab win ǝššin a i batu ta iga da, tǝzzar ǝlkaman i Ɣaysa.
Iswad-in Ɣaysa dǝffǝr-ǝs ogg-en ǝlkâman-as, inn-asan: «Mas tǝsaggadam?» Ǝnnan-as «Mǝnid tǝɣsara Ǝššex?»
Inn-asan «Agliwat-du a tu-tǝnǝyam». Itaggu awen takǝst zagret. Ǝglan ǝddewan dǝr-ǝs, ǝnayan dad illa, tǝzzar ǝssǝndan ɣur-ǝs ǝzǝl.
Meddan win ǝššin ǝlkamnen i Ɣaysa dǝffǝr tasalay ta ǝgan y awal ǝn Yaxya, esǝm n iyyan daɣ-san Andrawǝs, amadray ǝn Simɣon Butros.
Immǝnay Andrawǝs d ǝmaqqar-net Simɣon ǝstizarat, inn-as: «Nakkanay nǝmminay d Ǝlmǝsix.» (Almaɣna Kristos.)
Amaran ilway-tu ǝs Ɣaysa. Iswad Ɣaysa daɣ Simɣon ɣas inn-as: «Kay Simɣon ag Yaxya, ad tagaɣ esǝm Qayfas.» (Esǝm wa ola ǝd wa n Butros, almaɣna-net tǝhunt.)
As affaw ira Ɣaysa iki n amaḍal ǝn Galilaya. Immǝnay ǝd Filibus inn-as: «Ǝlkǝm-i.»
(Filibus d Andrawǝs ǝd Butros aɣrǝm-nasan iyyanda, esǝm-net Betsayda.)
Immǝnay Filibus ǝd Natanǝyel inn-as: «Nakkanay nǝmminay ǝd was immǝgrad ǝnnǝbi Musa daɣ Ǝttawret, ǝmmigradan sǝr-ǝs deɣ Ǝlkǝttaban n ǝnnǝbitan, a t-imosan Ɣaysa wa n ag Yusǝf wa n ǝɣrǝm ǝn Nazaret.»
Tǝzzar inn-as Natanǝyel: «Immikkan aɣrǝm ǝn Nazaret a t-id-ǝgmǝd arat ihossayan?» Inn-as Filibus: «Ayaw tǝnǝya.»
Ogga Ɣaysa Natanǝyel izay-t-idu, inna: «Ǝnta den awedan n Israyil wa n tidǝt, wa wǝr iha a imosan tǝlmǝnufǝqa.»
Inn-as Natanǝyel: «Mǝni awas di-tǝzdaya?» Ijjǝwwab-as Ɣaysa inn-as: «Harwa kay du-wǝr-iɣra Filibus, assaɣa wad tǝlle daw ašǝk wa n fig, da ǝhannayaq-qay.»
Inn-as Natanǝyel: «Ǝššex, kay a imosan Barar ǝn Mǝššina, tǝmosaɣ ǝmǝnokal n Israyil.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Tǝzzǝgzana fǝl as dak-ǝnneɣ ǝhannayaq-qay daw ašǝk ǝn fig. Ad tǝnǝyaɣ aratan wiyyad zawwarnen ogarnen wǝdi.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa deɣ: «Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as dǝffǝr awa ad tǝnǝyam ijǝnnawan ǝnnolaman tagazzayan sǝr-san angalosan, tazabben-du fall-i nak Ag Aggadǝm.»
Ǝzǝl wa n karad tǝmal-tu tǝkrǝst daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Kâna daɣ amaḍal ǝn Galilaya, tǝh-et anna ǝn Ɣaysa,
tǝzzar itawaɣra-du Ɣaysa ǝnta da, iddew-du ǝd nǝttulab-net ǝs tǝkrǝst en.
As abʼas d-iqqim wala daɣ esmad n alɣanab, tǝnna anna ǝn Ɣaysa y as: «Esmad n alɣanab iɣrad.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Anna, tǝdi a kam-wǝr-tǝdgǝz. Alwaq-in wǝr d-ewed.»
Tǝnna anna-net i maššaɣalan: «Agat awas dawan-inna kul.»
Ǝskâran den sǝdis tǝkan taggazan aman as taggin Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝzǝzdǝg imosan alɣadat-nasan. Ǝkkulluk n iyyan itaggaz-tu ǝddukad ǝn temeday ǝn litǝr.
Inna Ɣaysa i maššaɣalan en: «Ǝdnǝyat itǝkan di aman.» Ǝntanay deɣ ǝdnayan-tan har fayyan.
Inn-asan amaran: «Ǝlkǝwat daɣ-san ǝmǝrǝdda y ǝmaway ǝn saksas.» Ǝgan awen da.
As iram ǝmaway ǝn saksas aman win ǝmmǝttaynen da, ǝqqalan esmad n alɣanab, as wǝr issen iguz wa d-iga, mišan imaššaɣalan win tan-d-ǝlkawnen da ǝssânan, iɣra amazlay,
inn-as: «Imǝssǝksas kul esmad n alɣanab wa izodan a garrawan, amaran dǝffǝr as filawasan ad garrawan wa isammakkanan. Eges kay tǝɣbara wa izodan har ǝmǝrǝdda!»
Ǝnta ǝddi tǝlmǝɣjujat tǝmosat alɣalamat ta tazzarat immozal Ɣaysa. Ig-et daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Kâna ta n Galilaya. Isannafalal sǝr-ǝs tanaya-net, tǝzzar ǝzzǝgzanan sǝr-ǝs nǝttulab-net.
Dǝffǝr awen izagaday Ɣaysa, ikka taɣrǝmt ǝn Kafarnahum, ǝnta d anna-net, ǝd mǝdrayan-net, ǝd nǝttulab-net. Wǝr daɣ-as ǝgen ar arat n adan.
As d-ihoz ǝmud wa n Akkay imosan amud maqqaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, iggǝzzay Ɣaysa ikka Yerusalam.
Ogaz-in Ɣaysa daɣ aɣalla wa iɣlayan Ehan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, imassatagan ǝn zǝgran, d ayfǝd, ǝd tǝdǝbren, ǝd tǝɣimiten ǝn kǝl sanji.
Iga ǝlǝkkud ǝs ɣunan istaq-qan daɣ afarag en ketnasan, ǝntanay d ayfǝd, ǝd zǝgran, infaz daɣ amaḍal izǝrfan ǝn kǝl sanji, isabbanbay tebǝren-nasan.
Imassatagan ǝn tǝdǝbren ǝntanay inn-asan: «Ǝkkǝsat awa daɣ adag a, ad wǝr tagim ehan n Abba-nin ǝssuk.»
Ǝktan-du nǝttulab akatab n ǝnnǝbi Dawǝd wa innan: «Tara-nin ehan-nak tǝrɣa daɣ-i šilat ǝn tǝmsay.»
Ǝssǝstanan-tu muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝnnan-as: «Ma tǝmos tǝlmǝɣjujat tas tǝfragaɣ igi-net tǝmosat alɣalamat, tǝsitaddat as tǝleɣ tarrayt n igi n adi?»
Ijjǝwwab-asan Ɣaysa inn-asan: «Jǝbbǝrǝjjǝtat Ehan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada di, ad t-ǝssǝbdǝda daɣ karad adan.»
Ǝnnan-as: «Ehan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada di ǝkkozat tǝmǝrwen n awatay ǝd sǝdis a fǝl itawakras. Kay mas tu-za-tǝssǝbdǝda daɣ karad adan?»
Ehan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada wa immal Ɣaysa da, taɣǝssa-net a sǝr-ǝs issoka.
As d-inkar daɣ tǝmattant ǝktan-du nǝttulab-net tǝnna ta iga adi. Ǝzzǝgzanan s Awal ǝn Mǝššina, d awal wa iga Ɣaysa da.
Aytedan aggotnen ǝzzigzanan ǝs Ɣaysa ɣur anay ǝn tǝlmǝɣjujaten šin immozal ǝmosnen alɣalamaten, daɣ adan win iga daɣ Yerusalam ɣur ǝmud wa n Akkay.
Mišan ya Ɣaysa wǝr tan-ifles fǝlas izdây-tan ketnasan, ǝnta
wǝr iddǝrar s i das-igan isalan n awedan id wǝr das-iɣber awa ihan ǝwǝl-net.
Ill-ay alǝs iyyan igan esǝm Nikodemos, ihân taggayt ǝn Farisaytan, imos iyyan daɣ muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.

Osa-du Ɣaysa ahad iyyan inn-as: «Ǝššex-in, nakkanay nǝssân as Mǝššina kay d-izammazalan sǝr-na, a dana-tǝsassaɣra, id wǝr t-illa i zʼagin tǝlmǝɣjujaten šin tǝge ǝmosnen alɣalamaten, ar ǝs tǝdhǝlt ǝn Mǝššina.»
Ɣaysa deɣ inn-as: «Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-ak as: Wǝr t-illa awedan ifrâgan anay ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina ar s ad ilas tǝhǝwt.»
Issǝstan-tu Nikodemos inn-as: «Mas zʼilǝs awedan waššaran tǝhǝwt? Ši tǝgat da wǝr ifreg ad ilǝs tewaɣlay ǝn tǝdist n anna-net.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-ak as: awedan wǝr ifreg iguz ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina ar s ad ihǝw s aman d Infas wa Zǝddigan.
Ǝlǝsǝl n aggadǝm iyyan aggadǝm, amaran awedan wa d-igmadan Infas wa Zǝddigan, Infas wa Zǝddigan a daɣ-as innodan.
Daɣ adi a dak-wǝr-iqqǝn eɣaf as dak-ǝnneɣ: Iwâr-kawan ad tǝlǝsam tǝhǝwt.
Aḍu iggâr sas ira, tǝsalla y ǝmǝsli-net, mišan wǝr tǝssena da d-ifal wala dad ikka. Samal di da a iha awedan wa ihǝwan s Infas wa Zǝddigan.»
Issǝstan-tu Nikodemos inn-as: «Mǝni tat tǝmǝwit tas zʼagin aratan win di?»
Ijjǝwwab-as Ɣaysa inn-as: «Tǝmosaɣ ǝmusan zǝwwǝran daɣ Israyil eges wǝr tǝssenaɣ aratan win!
Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-ak as: Nǝtamagrad s awa nǝssan, nǝtagayyat deɣ fǝl awa nǝnay, eges tugayam s ad tǝqbǝlam tǝgǝyya-nana.
Dad wǝr tǝzzǝgzanam s awa dawan-ganna s ǝddǝnet mas za tǝzzǝgzǝnam awa dawan-ganna s alaxirat?
Wǝr t-illa is kala ad inay ijǝnnawan, ar nak Ag Aggadǝm a tan-d-igmadan.
Ǝmmǝk was issǝrgag ǝnnǝbi Musa taššolt fǝl ǝgǝt daɣ taneray, ǝmmǝk wen daɣ as kundaba tawasahake nak Ag Aggadǝm,
fǝl ad iqqǝl as i sǝr-i izzǝgzanan, ad igrǝw tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat.
Fǝlas, Mǝššina awa iga y ǝddǝnet daɣ tara ikfa Barar-net a n iyyanda fǝl ad iqqǝl as i sǝr-ǝs izzǝgzanan wǝr zʼihlǝk, kalar ad igrǝw tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat.
Mǝššina wǝr d-issoka Barar-net ǝddǝnet fǝl a tat-ihlǝk kalar issok-as-tat-du fǝl a sǝr-ǝs tafsu.
I sǝr-ǝs izzǝgzanan wǝr ihlek, mišan wa sǝr-ǝs wǝr nǝzzǝgzan ihlâk fǝlas wǝr izzǝgzan s esǝm ǝn Barar a n iyyanda ǝn Mǝššina.
Ǝddǝlil da wa d-ewayan ahluk: Ǝnnur a d-osan ǝddǝnet, mišan ǝssofan-tu aytedan šiyyay id arak mazalan a taggin.
Amaran i itaggan tǝkma wǝdi oglaf ǝnnur, wǝr t-id-z-akku fǝlas iksud ad nǝfilǝlan arak mazalan-net ezal a mallan.
Mišan wa itaggan arat wa imosan tidǝt, wǝdi itakka-du ǝnnur, fǝl ad itǝwǝnǝy as ǝmazal-net issind-ay daɣ lǝkkum i Mǝššina.»
Dǝffǝr awen ikka Ɣaysa ǝd nǝttulab-net amaḍal ǝn Yahudǝyya. Iqqim daɣ-as har iga arat n azzaman ǝnta dǝr-san, isalmaɣ Ɣaysa aytedan daɣ aman.
Yaxya ǝnta da isalmaɣ aytedan daɣ aman daɣ tǝsǝssǝngǝyt ta n Aynon, dagma ǝn Salim, fǝlas ǝllan-tu aman den aggotnen. Tasin-t-idu aytedan isalmaq-qan.
Arat wa as itaggu Yaxya harwa da wǝr iggez kasaw.
Tǝnkar tǝmazaq gǝr nǝttulab ǝn Yaxya d iyyan daɣ Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, daɣ batu ǝn tǝmǝwiten šin as itaggu zazdag.
Ǝkkan Yaxya ǝnnan-as: «Ǝššex-nana, tǝkittǝwa alǝs wa dǝr tǝddewa fǝl afay ǝn Yordan wen sen, s ǝnta as dana-tǝmmǝgrada? Tahannaya! Ǝmǝrǝdda isalmaɣ aytedan daɣ aman amaran ketnasan takkin-tu!»
Inn-asan Yaxya: «Awedan wǝr zʼigrǝw ar awa t-ikfa Mǝššina.
Kawanay iman-nawan tǝggǝyyem-i as ǝnneɣ: "Wǝr ǝmosaɣ Ǝlmǝsix, ǝtǝwǝzǝmizal ɣas a d-ǝge dat-ǝs."

Ǝmazlay da ilan tǝmazlayt, amaran ǝmidi-net wa n ǝnaflis-net, ǝnta a innǝttafan ǝd zǝzlay, issigad den da iqqâl-as. As isla y ǝmǝsli n ǝmazlay igmây-du tǝmazlayt, ad aknu tǝdǝwit. Tǝdǝwit tǝdi za ǝnta a ǝgeɣ, amaran ǝmǝrǝdda tǝnda.
Ittǝyet ǝtǝwǝsǝɣmar-net ifnǝz wa-nin.
Wa d-igmadan afalla, ǝnta a idkalan dǝnnǝg awedan kul, wa ihan ǝddǝnet in ǝddǝnet amaran aratan n ǝddǝnet as itamagrad. Wa d-igmadan ijǝnnawan, idkâl dǝnnǝg awedan kul,
iggǝyyat s awa inay d awas isla mišan wǝr t-illa i iqbâlan tǝgǝyya-net.
Wa iqbalan tǝgǝyya-net, isilakan awa inna Mǝššina,
fǝlas wa d-izammazal Mǝššina, awal ǝn Mǝššina a immal, id Mǝššina a das-igan y Infas wa Zǝddigan tehakkay wǝr nǝla ǝddukad.
Abba ira Barar-net amaran aratan kul ig-en daɣ ǝfus-net.
Wa izzǝgzanan ǝs Barar ǝn Mǝššina wǝdi igraw tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlâlat, amaran wa ugayan s a sǝr-ǝs izzǝgzǝn wǝdi eway-du ǝs man-net alham ǝn Mǝššina.»

Ǝslan Farisaytan as itawannu Ɣaysa igarraw inǝttulab ogarnen win Yaxya isalmaq-qan daɣ aman. (Arat wa imosan tidǝt as Ɣaysa iman-net wǝr isǝlmiɣ awedan waliyyan daɣ aman, inǝttulab-net a salmaɣnen aytedan daɣ aman.) As isla Ɣaysa y awa itaqqalan, igmad amaḍal wa n Yahudǝyya, iqqal Galilaya.

Ǝslan Farisaytan as itawannu Ɣaysa igarraw inǝttulab ogarnen win Yaxya isalmaq-qan daɣ aman. (Arat wa imosan tidǝt as Ɣaysa iman-net wǝr isǝlmiɣ awedan waliyyan daɣ aman, inǝttulab-net a salmaɣnen aytedan daɣ aman.) As isla Ɣaysa y awa itaqqalan, igmad amaḍal wa n Yahudǝyya, iqqal Galilaya.

Ǝslan Farisaytan as itawannu Ɣaysa igarraw inǝttulab ogarnen win Yaxya isalmaq-qan daɣ aman. (Arat wa imosan tidǝt as Ɣaysa iman-net wǝr isǝlmiɣ awedan waliyyan daɣ aman, inǝttulab-net a salmaɣnen aytedan daɣ aman.) As isla Ɣaysa y awa itaqqalan, igmad amaḍal wa n Yahudǝyya, iqqal Galilaya.
Dad t-ilzam imur n amaḍal wa n Samarǝya,
iššokal har ewad aɣrǝm iyyan ǝn Samarǝya igân esǝm Šixar, dagma ǝn tawagost ta ikfa Yaqub barar-net Yusǝf.
Edag wen ǝnta a iha ǝɣarus ǝn Yaqub. As t-id-ewad Ɣaysa, iddâz ǝšikǝl, tǝzzar iqqim fǝl ǝmi n ǝɣarus, itaggu awen ammasnazal.
As ǝkkan nǝttulab-net aɣrǝm y ad d-azzanzin imensewan, tǝwar-du tǝntut ǝn Kǝl-Samarǝya a du-tǝzrâgat anu en. Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Šašw-i-du.»
As ǝkkan nǝttulab-net aɣrǝm y ad d-azzanzin imensewan, tǝwar-du tǝntut ǝn Kǝl-Samarǝya a du-tǝzrâgat anu en. Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Šašw-i-du.»
Tǝnn-as: «Kay tǝmosaɣ iyyan daɣ Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud tǝgammaya daɣ-i aman, nak tǝmosat iyyat daɣ Kǝl-Samarǝya?»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Ǝnnar tǝssânaɣ arat wa ihakku Mǝššina, tǝssânaɣ deɣ awa ǝmosa nak wa kam-itansayan aman ǝn tassay, tansiyaɣ-i-tan kam, akfaɣ-am-tan deɣ ǝmosan win sidurnen.»
Tǝnn-as tǝntut: «Ǝššex-in, anu i zagren amaran kay wǝr tǝleɣ aga, daɣ adi mǝni du-za-tǝgrǝwaɣ aman win sidurnen di?
Šigrat a tǝgeɣ ǝmaraw-nana Yaqub a danaɣ-ikfan anu a, išwa aman-net, ǝšwan-tan maddanǝs d aharay-net?»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «I išwan aman di, ad t-ilǝs fad iguz,
mišan i išwan aman win tu-z-akfa wǝdi immizzay ǝd fad, fǝlas a daɣ-as ǝqqǝlan adri ingayan s aman win hakkinen tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat.»
Tǝnn-as tǝntut: «Šašw-i-du daɣ aman win di, fǝl a di-igmǝd fad, ammazzaya d azarog n anu a.»
«Aglu», inn-as Ɣaysa. «Aɣra-du alǝs-nam tǝqqǝlaɣ-i-du da da.»
Tǝnn-as: «Wǝr ǝleɣ alǝs.» Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Tidǝt-nam as tǝnne wǝr tǝleɣ alǝs,
fǝlas sǝmmos as kala tan-tǝle, amaran wa ɣur tǝlleɣ ǝmǝrǝdda wǝrgeɣ alǝs-nam. Tidǝt a di-tǝge.»
Tǝzzar tǝnn-as: «Ǝhannayaɣ as kay ǝnnǝbi a tǝmosa.
Imarwan-nana adɣaɣ a da a fǝl ǝɣbadan Mǝššina, mišan kawanay Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud tǝnnam Yerusalam a iha adag wa daɣ itawaɣbad Mǝššina.»
«Tantut», inn-as Ɣaysa, «Zǝgzǝn-i, alwaq izay-du a daɣ wǝr za tǝɣabbadam Abba gǝr za fǝl ǝdɣaɣ wa, wala deɣ Yerusalam.
Kawanay Kǝl-Samarǝya wǝr tǝzdayam wa tǝɣbadam, nakkanay Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud nǝzdây wa nǝɣbad, fǝlas efsan iguz wa n Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud a d-ǝgan.
Mišan alwaq izay-du – amaran osa-du – was inaɣbidan win tidǝt ad ǝɣbǝdan Abba s Infas wa Zǝddigan ǝd tidǝt, fǝlas Abba inaɣbidan win t-ǝɣbadnen ǝs tǝmǝwit tǝdi, ǝntanay a ira.
Mǝššina Infas wa Zǝddigan a imos, amaran inaɣbidan-net ilzâm-tan ad t-ǝɣbǝdan s Infas wa Zǝddigan ǝd tidǝt.»
Tǝnn-as tǝntut: «Ǝssânaɣ as Ǝlmǝsix, itawann-as Kristos, a d-asu. As d-osa a danaɣ-isassagru aratan kul.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Nak a t-imosan, nak wa dam-iššewalan da.»
Assaɣat ten da a d-ǝqqalan nǝttulab, iqqan-asan eɣaf ǝmǝšiwal wa iga Ɣaysa ǝd tǝntut. Mišan wǝr tan-iha i ihalan ad t-issǝstǝn, ann-as: «Ma daɣ-as tare?» Madeɣ: «Mas dǝr-ǝs tǝmašawala?»
Tǝzzar toyya-du tǝntut ǝtǝkin-net tǝqqal aɣrǝm tǝnna y aytedan:
«Ayewat ad tǝnǝyam awedan a di-imâlan arat kul was kala ad t-ǝge, ifrâg as ǝnta a imosan Ǝlmǝsix!»
Tǝzzar ǝgmadan-du aytedan aɣrǝm ǝkkan Ɣaysa.
As itaggu awen inǝttulab gammayan daɣ Ɣaysa ad atšu, gannan-as: «Ǝššex, atšu arat iyyan.»
Inn-asan: «Imensewan win zʼatša wǝr tan-tǝzdayam.»
Ad tǝnǝmǝnnin nǝttulab gar-essan: «Ǝngǝm ɣas wǝrgeɣ awedan iyyan a das-d-ewayan imensewan?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Imensewan-in wǝr tan-imos ar ad ammazala tara ǝn wa di-d-izammazalan, ǝɣrǝdaɣ ǝššǝɣǝl wa daɣ-i iga.
Awak kawanay wǝr tǝgǝnnim: "Ǝqqimnat-in ǝkkozat tǝlil y ad tagu ɣarat?" Nak za ǝnneɣ-awan akniwat ǝzǝggǝzdi ǝn tǝwǝgas ad tǝnǝyam as šiɣaɣanen ǝŋŋanat, wǝr ǝrenat ar ǝmilǝy.
Awedan wa italayan, wǝdi igraw ǝrruzmatan-net. Šiɣaɣanen šin tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat a išadaw, fǝl ad ajjayat wa inabbalan ǝd wa italayan tǝdǝwit.
Fǝlas tidǝt ǝn tǝmajǝq ta tǝnnat: "Alǝs iyyan inabbal, iyyan italay."
Ǝssǝglaq-qawan fǝl ad talǝyam tawagost a daɣ wǝr tǝšɣelam, aytedan wiyyad a daɣ-as ǝšɣalnen, mišan tǝgrawam tǝnfa daɣ ǝššǝɣǝl wa ǝgan den.»
Ǝzzǝgzanan aytedan aggotnen ǝn Kǝl-Samarǝya ǝs Ɣaysa fǝlas tantut a dasan-tǝnnat: «Imâl-i aratan win as kala tan-ǝge.»
Awen da a fǝlas osan-t-idu ɣas ǝgmayan daɣ-as a ɣur-san aqqam. Iqqim ɣur-san Ɣaysa har iga ǝššin adan.
Ǝslan aytedan y awal-net, ǝzzǝgzanan sǝr-ǝs wiyyad ogarnen winad igǝt.
Tǝzzar ǝnnan i tǝntut: «Nakkanay sǝket nǝkna ǝzǝgzan fǝlas ǝstizarat kam ɣas a danaɣ-igan isalan, ǝmǝrǝdda iman-nana as das-nǝsla, amaran nǝssân as tidǝt as ǝnta a imosan Ǝnǝssefsi n ǝddǝnet.»
As ǝndan ǝššin adan win den, ikka Ɣaysa amaḍal ǝn Galilaya,
fǝlas ǝnta iman-net as inna, ǝnnǝbi wǝr itǝwǝsǝɣmir daɣ aɣrǝm wa daɣ idwal.
As din-osa Galilaya ǝqbalan-tu Kǝl-Galilaya id ǝnâyan imazalan kul win iga daɣ Yerusalam ɣur ǝmud wa n Akkay fǝlas ǝntanay da osân-in amud en.
Ilas-du Ɣaysa assa ǝn tǝɣrǝmt ǝn Kâna ta n Galilaya, ta daɣ isammattay aman ig-en esmad n alɣanab. Ill-ay alǝs imosan amaššaɣal n ǝmǝnokal daɣ tǝɣrǝmt ǝn Kafarnahum. Alǝs a ila barar-net irinan.
As isla as Ɣaysa igmâd-du amaḍal ǝn Yahudǝyya iha Galilaya, os-ay-du onsay-tu ad idawan, a das-izzuzǝy barar-net a ɣur tǝlla tǝmattant.
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «As wǝrgeɣ ad tǝnâyam alɣalamaten ǝmmittaynen ǝd tǝlmǝɣjujaten, wǝr za tǝzzǝgzǝnam fadda.»
Inn-as amaššaɣal n ǝmǝnokal: «Ǝmǝli, ǝrǝs-anaɣ ǝs Kafarnahum tarmad harwa ad wǝr aba barar-in.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Aglu, barar-nak izzay.» Alǝs deɣ izzǝgzan s awal ǝn Ɣaysa, igla.
Iha tarrayt iqqâl as immǝnay ǝd maššaɣalan-net das-d-ǝlkamnen. Ǝnnan-as: «Barar-nak izzay.»
Issǝstan-tan inn-asan: «Ma imos alwaq wa daɣ igraw iman-net?» Ǝnnan-as: «Ǝndazǝl iggi ǝn tazzar a fall-as tǝwat tanaday.»
Ikta-du alǝs as alwaq wen da iman-net a daɣ-as inna Ɣaysa: «Barar-nak izzay.» Izzǝgzan sǝr-ǝs ǝnta d aɣaywan-net kul.
Ǝnta da da tǝlmǝɣjujat tǝmosat alɣalamat ta n sanatat immozal Ɣaysa daɣ Galilaya dǝffǝr agamad-net Yahudǝyya.
Dǝffǝr adi ewad-du ǝmud iyyan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, tǝzzar ikka Ɣaysa Yerusalam.
Aɣrǝm wa n Yerusalam tǝh-ay tǝɣazart tǝhozat edag was itawannu tǝsǝhǝrt ta n Ayfǝd. Tǝɣazart ta esǝm-net Betsada, daɣ tǝlɣibrit, amaran tǝlla gǝr sǝmmosat taliwen.
Taliwen šin ǝsrâdan daw-ǝsnat miranan ǝgânen daɣ mǝddǝrɣal, ǝd mǝggudal, ǝd nǝbdan. Ǝssigadan y ad ǝggǝzan aman šin ǝmǝtǝkwǝy,

fǝlas immal-tu alwaq a daɣ d-itazabbat angalos iyyan n Ǝmǝli ijǝnnǝjǝrwǝy aman ǝn tǝɣazart ten. Ǝmiran kul wa azzaran iguz-net dǝffǝr ǝnǝjǝrway wa tǝga da, wǝdi ad izzǝy daɣ tǝwǝrna ta tu-tǝgrawat, a tǝqqal.
Edag en ih-ay alǝs igân karadat tǝmǝrwen n awatay d ǝttam irin.
Ogg-ay Ɣaysa isrâd, amaran issan as iga tǝwǝrna tǝrǝwat, issǝstan-tu inn-as: «Awak tǝre tǝmǝzzǝyt?»
Inn-as ǝmiran wa: «Ǝššex, nak wǝr ǝleɣ awedan a di-igan daɣ tǝɣazart ta daɣ amazay wa daɣ tinǝjǝrwǝyan aman-net, amaran id ǝgmaya d iguz-net, a di-izar sǝr-ǝs awedan iyyan.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Ǝbdǝd, tǝdkǝla tǝssut-nak tǝjǝwǝnke»
Izzay alǝs wen daɣ tamazayt ten da, idkal tǝssut-net ijawankat.
Ǝnta arat wa itaggu daɣ ǝzǝl ǝn tǝsanfawt ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.
Ǝnnan muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud y alǝs wa izzayan da: «Kay ak masnat a wǝr tǝgeɣ as azalada ǝzǝl ǝn tǝsanfawt a daɣ-ak wǝr xalal aggay ǝn tǝsalat-nak?»
Eges ya inn-asan alǝs wen: «Alǝs wa di-izzozayan, ǝnta a di-innan: "Ǝdkǝl tǝsalat-nak tǝjǝwǝnke".»
Ǝnnan-as: «Ma imos za alǝs wa dak-innan: "Ǝdkǝl tǝsalat-nak tǝjǝwǝnke"?»
Ǝnta alǝs wa izzayan da, wǝr t-ǝhen salan n awa imos awedan wa t-izzozayan den, fǝlas aytedan ǝknanen igǝt a ǝhanen edag wa daq-q izzozay Ɣaysa den, iras-tan Ɣaysa, ijawankat.
Dǝffǝr awen ogaz-t-in Ɣaysa daɣ Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada inn-as: «Sǝsǝm. Kay da izzayan da ǝmǝrǝdda. Ǝɣrǝd d igi ǝn bakkadan, a kay wǝr igrǝw arat ogaran wanad tallabǝst.»
Ijawankat alǝs wen tǝzzar imal i muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud as Ɣaysa a t-izzozayan.
Arat wa eway-du sǝr-san as ǝknan gezzar ǝn Ɣaysa fǝlas ǝzǝl ǝn tǝsanfawt a daɣ iga awen.
Mišan inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Abba-nin faw da išɣâl, daɣ adi nak da ǝšɣâla.»

Batu ta, teway-du ǝs muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud as ǝššotan daɣ agamay ǝn tanaɣay ǝn Ɣaysa, fǝlas wǝrgeɣ ǝlqanun n ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt ɣas a immǝzray, kalar iššota-du fall-as as inna imos Mǝššina abba-net. Daɣ adi išaššagda iman-net ǝd Mǝššina.

Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as Barar wǝr ifreg igi n arat waliyyan gar-es ǝd man-net. Wǝr itǝggu ar arat was ihannay Abba-net itagg-ay. Amaran arat kul wa itaggu Abba, Barar da itagg-ay s asaway wen da.
Fǝlas Abba ira Barar, amaran isakn-ay arat kul wa itaggu; ad t-assaknu aratan ogarnen win da tǝla n almaɣna y a tan-agu, fǝl ad taɣjim.
Ǝmmǝk wa daɣ-as d-isankar Abba inǝmmǝttan itaggu daɣ-san iman, ǝmmǝk wǝdi da as ihakku Barar ǝnta da tǝmǝddurt i was tat-ira.
Wa dǝffǝr adi as Abba wǝr ixǝkkǝm y awedan waliyyan, kalar ǝššǝriɣa kul ig-ay daɣ ǝfus ǝn Barar
fǝl ad ǝzzǝzwǝran aytedan kul Barar s ǝmmǝk was ǝzzǝzwaran Abba. Awedan kul wa wǝr nǝzzǝzwar Barar, wǝdi wǝr izzǝzwar Abba wa t-id-izammazalan.»
«Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as awedan kul wa issǝsaman i batuten-in, izzǝgzan ǝs wa di-d-izammazalan, wǝdi igrâw tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat. Wǝr zʼawwaddab, kalar tǝmattant a d-igmad ǝs tǝmǝddurt.»

«Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as izay-du alwaq – s ǝnta da da nǝha da ǝmǝrǝdda – as aytedan win sǝr-i wǝr nǝzzǝgzan ad aslin y ǝmǝsli ǝn Barar ǝn Mǝššina, amaran win das-ǝslanen ǝkkǝwanan-as ad ǝgrǝwan tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat.
Fǝlas ǝmmǝk wa daɣ as ihakku Abba tǝmǝddurt, ǝmmǝk wǝdi daɣ as ikfa Barar fǝrregat n a tat-ihakku ǝnta da.
Ikf-i deɣ turagat n ǝššǝriɣa y aytedan, fǝlas nak Ag Aggadǝm a mosa.
Ad wǝr ǝqqǝnan ɣafawan-nawan y arat wa: ilkâm a d-awǝd alwaq a daɣ zʼaslin nǝmmǝttan kul daɣ zǝkwan-nasan, y ǝmǝsli-nin nak Ag Aggadǝm
ǝgmǝdan-du izǝkwan-nasan ǝddi da. Win ǝganen aratan olaɣnen, a d-ǝgmǝdan izǝkwan y a d-ǝnkǝran daɣ tǝmattant ǝgrǝwan tǝmǝddurt, win ǝganen tǝkma amaran a d-ǝgmǝdan izǝkwan y ad awwaddaban.

Wǝr t-illa arat as ǝfragaɣ igi-net gǝr-i ǝd man-in. Ǝššǝriɣa wa tagga, ǝlkama daɣ-as y awa di-igannu Mǝššina, amaran ǝššǝriɣa-nin oɣâd, fǝlas wǝr ǝlkema y arat wa ǝre nak iman-in, kalar arat wa ira wa di-d-izammazalan as ǝlkama.»
«As imos as nak ɣas-in as ǝggǝyyeɣ i man-in, wǝdi tǝgǝyya-nin wǝr tǝmos tidǝt.
Illat-tu wa di-imosan iyyat tǝgǝyya, amaran ǝssânaɣ as arat wa igannu daɣ talɣa-nin, tidǝt a imos.
Tǝssǝglam inammazalan ǝs Yaxya, iggǝyyat-asan fǝl arat wa imosan tidǝt.
Nak wǝr ǝddǝraraɣ ǝs tǝgǝyya n awedan. Arat wa, wǝr tu-gǝnnaɣ ar fǝl ad tǝgrǝwam tǝsureft.
Yaxya zun fǝtǝla tǝrɣât tǝbilazlaz a imos, amaran tǝqbalam ad tagim arat n assaɣat ǝn tǝdǝwit daɣ ǝnnur-net.
Nak amaran ǝle tǝgǝyya togarat ta n Yaxya assahat: Ǝššǝɣǝlan win tagga, a tan-imosan win as di-issǝwar Abba igi-nasan, ǝntanay a ǝmosnen tǝgǝyya-nin, sitaddan as Abba di-d-izammazalan.
Abba iman-net s ǝnta a di-d-izammazalan, ǝnta da iggiyyat-i. Wǝr kala ad tǝslam y ǝmǝsli-net wala deɣ tǝnâyam azzat-net.
Amaran wǝr iha awal-net iwallan-nawan, arat wǝdi isitadd-ay iba n ǝzǝgzan-nawan ǝs wa d-izammazal.
Tǝtaggam y Awal ǝn Mǝššina teɣaray tǝgat s ǝnnǝzǝr fǝlas tǝɣilam a sǝr-ǝs tǝgrǝwam tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat. Awal wa tǝɣarrim da, ǝnta iman-net as fall-i iggǝyyat,
eges wǝr tǝrem a di-du-takkim y ad tǝgrǝwam tǝmǝddurt.»
«Nak wǝr gǝmmǝyaɣ ǝtǝwǝsǝɣmar ɣur aytedan.
Ǝzdâyaq-qawan: ǝssânaɣ as iman-nawan wǝr tan-tǝha tara i Mǝššina.
Nak Abba-nin a di-d-issǝglan mišan wǝr tǝrem ǝlqǝbulat-in. Amaran as kawan d-osa awedan iyyan a d-iglân gar-es ǝd man-net, a tu-tǝqbǝlam!
Tǝrâm ad tǝtinǝmǝsǝɣmiram gar-ewwan, eges wǝr tǝrem saɣmar wa d-ifalan Mǝššina di n iyyan. Daɣ adi manǝmmǝk as za tǝzzǝgzǝnam?
Ad wǝr tǝɣilam a kawan-ǝssǝwǝra lahan ɣur Abba-nin. Ǝnnǝbi Musa ǝnta kawan zʼissǝwǝran lahan, ǝnta wa daɣ tǝgam attama-nawan.
Ǝnnar tǝzzigzanam ǝs Musa, tǝzzǝgzǝnam sǝr-i nak da, fǝlas immigrad sǝr-i daɣ Ǝlkǝttaban-net.
Mišan dad imos as wǝr tǝzzǝgzanam s Ǝlkǝttaban-net, manǝmmǝk as za tǝzzǝgzǝnam awa ganna?»
Dǝffǝr adi ikka Ɣaysa tǝgadamayt ta hadat n agaraw wa n Galilaya, itâwann-as deɣ agaraw wa n Tiberǝyad.
Tǝlkâm-as tamattay tagget, fǝlas ǝhannayan aytedan alɣalamaten šin as itamazal ǝmosnen ǝmmǝk was izuzǝy imiranan.
Iggǝzzay Ɣaysa adɣaɣ, tǝzzar iqqim den da ǝnta ǝd nǝttulab-net.
As itaggu awen amud wa n Akkay ihoz-du.
Iswad Ɣaysa inay tamattay tagget tǝzây-t-idu, inna i Filibus: «Mǝni du-za-nazzanzu tagǝlla ǝtšan aytedan en kul?»
Ǝsǝstan wa as t-iga Ɣaysa da issân arat was otas igi-net. A ira ɣas ad issǝn awa das-z-annu Filibus.
Inna Filibus i Ɣaysa: «Kud du-nǝzzǝnza tagǝlla ǝn sanatat tǝmad ǝn tafelt, almaɣna alxaq ǝn sanatat tǝmad n ǝzǝl n ǝššǝɣǝl, da wǝr dasan-tǝkna arat.»
Inn-as ǝnattalib-net igân Andrawǝs wa n amadray ǝn Simɣon Butros:
«Illa barar da ilân sǝmmosat tǝgǝlwen n ǝššǝɣir d ǝššin kifitan, mišan ya ma za aknin y aytedan ogdânen d awa?»
Inna Ɣaysa: «Saɣɣamiwat tamattay kul.» Tǝzzar ǝqqiman aytedan kul daɣ yel aggen illân den. Sǝmmos gim n alǝs a ǝhanen tamattay en.
Idkal-du Ɣaysa šigǝlwen šin den. As iga igodan i Mǝššina, izun-tanat i tamattay. Iga awen da i kifitan. Igraw awedan kul awa das-igdan.
As ǝyyǝwanan aytedan inna Ɣaysa i nǝttulab-net: «Šidǝwat-du ikarammutan win du-tawaglaznen, fǝl a daɣ-as wǝr iɣšǝd wala.»
Ǝɣradan-du ǝkǝmmi ǝn karammutan win d-ǝglazan aytedan daɣ tǝgǝlwen n ǝššǝɣir šinad ǝn sǝmmosat a. Maraw ǝzmaman d ǝššin a d-ǝdnayan daɣ gǝlzan en.
As ǝnayan aytedan win alɣalamat tas immozal Ɣaysa da, ad gannin: «Igmâd aššak as alǝs wa ǝnta a imosan ǝnnǝbi wa du-z-asin ǝddǝnet!»
Issan Ɣaysa as aytedan win abbaz a tu-z-agin šǝhhǝšǝlan-tu tišit n ǝmǝnokal, ilas-tan efel, ikka edag iyyan daɣ ǝdɣaɣ en da, ɣas-net.
As tǝga takǝst zagadayan nǝttulab-net s agaraw,
ǝggazan aɣlal ǝssǝwalan agaraw y ad ǝɣrǝsan ǝs taɣrǝmt ta n Kafarnahum. Itaggu awen ehad, Ɣaysa amaran wǝr tan-in-ewed harwa da.
Igar-du aḍu issohen ad tanastaban aman n agaraw.
As ǝgan nǝttulab ǝn Ɣaysa edag ǝn sǝmmos kilawtan madeɣ sǝdis n ǝšikǝl, oggan Ɣaysa daɣ ihǝz ijiwankat-du fǝl aman izay-du aɣlal wa han, tǝzzar tǝggaz-tan tasa.
Mišan inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Tǝgmǝdet-kawan tasa, nak awa!»
Gammayan d a t-id-ǝzzugǝzan aɣlal den da, as dǝr-san ewad ǝɣlal edag wa ǝkkan.

As ǝzǝl wa hadan tǝgr-in tamattay ta tǝwarat efay n agaraw wen sen as aɣlal iyyanda ɣas a illan den ǝndazǝl, amaran ǝssanan as Ɣaysa wǝr inamaggaz aɣlal wa ǝd nǝttulab-net. Ǝssânan ǝnta da as inǝttulab-net ɣas-nasan as ǝglan.
Ǝnzayan-du wiyyad a d-ǝfalnen aɣrǝm ǝn Tiberǝyad. Osan-du dagma n adag wa daɣ tǝtša tamattay tagǝlla dǝffǝr godan win iga Ɣaysa y Ǝmǝli.
As tǝnay tamattay as Ɣaysa wǝr illa den ǝnta wala inǝttulab-net, tǝggaz iɣlalan win den ǝgmayan Ɣaysa ǝs Kafarnahum.
Osan-t-in fǝl afay n agaraw wa hadan, tǝzzar ǝnnan-as: «Ya Ǝššex, Ǝmmay du-tose da?»

Ig-asan Ɣaysa aljawab wa, inna: «Ǝggǝyye silakanaɣ-awan as wǝr di-tǝsǝggǝdam ar fǝl as tǝtšam tagǝlla har daɣ-as tǝyyǝwanam, wǝrgeɣ aššaddat n ǝgǝrri n almaɣna n alɣalamaten šin ǝmmozala a fǝl di-tǝlkamam.

Ayyat ǝššǝɣǝl daɣ agamay ǝn mensewan win ɣaššadnen, gammayat imensewan win wǝr nǝɣǝššǝd, hakkin tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat. Imensewan win nak Ag Aggadǝm a dawan-tan-z-akfin fǝlas nak a issǝwar Mǝššina di n Abba ejwal wa n taɣmar-net.»
Ǝssǝstanan-tu ǝnnan-as: «Mǝni za arat was danaɣ-iwar a tu-nagu y ad naknu ǝššǝɣǝlan win ira Mǝššina?»
Ijjǝwwab-asan Ɣaysa inn-asan: «Ǝššǝɣǝl wa daɣ-wan ira Mǝššina, wǝr t-imos ar ad tǝzzǝgzǝnam ǝs wa d-issǝgla.»
Ǝlasan-tu ǝsǝstan ǝnnan-as: «Ma tǝmos za alɣalamat ta dana-za-tammazala fǝl a sǝr-ǝk nǝzzǝgzǝn? Ma za taga?
Imarawan-nanaɣ ǝtšan daɣ taneray amensay wa n Manna. Ǝnta da awa ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban daɣ batu tǝdi:
"Iššǝtš-en amensay wa d-ifalan ijǝnnawan."»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝggǝyyeɣ silakanaɣ-awan as wǝrge ǝnnǝbi Musa a kawan-ikfan amensay wa d-ifalan ijǝnnawan. Abba-nin ǝnta kawan-ikfan amensay wa d-ifalan ijǝnnawan, imos amensay wa n tidǝt.
Fǝlas amensay wa d-ifalan Mǝššina ǝnta a d-igmadan ijǝnnawan, amaran ǝnta a ihakkin tǝmǝddurt y ǝddǝnet.»
Ǝnnan-as: «Ǝmǝli, amensay wǝdi hakk-anaq-qu faw.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Nak a imosan amensay wa ihakkin tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat. Wa di-d-ikkan wǝr das-ilkem ad t-iggaz gǝlǝk, amaran wa sǝr-i izzǝgzanan wǝr daɣ-as ilkem ad t-iggaz fad.
Mišan ǝnneɣ-awan: tǝnayam-i eges wǝr tǝzzǝgzanam.
Awedan kul wa di-ikfa Abba a di-d-asu, amaran wǝr za mǝlǝllǝya fǝl i di-d-ikkan,
fǝlas ǝzǝbbi a d-ǝge daɣ ijǝnnawan fǝl ad ammazala s arat wa ira wa di-d-issǝglan, wǝrgeɣ arat wa ǝre nak iman-in.
Ǝnta wa di-d-izammazalan wǝr ira ad ixrǝk awedan waliyyan daɣ win di-ikfa, kalar a ira a tan-d-ǝssǝnkǝra daɣ tǝmattant ǝzǝl a ilkaman.
Awalla, ǝnta da awa ira Abba-nin: Aytedan kul win di-ǝnaynen nak Barar-net, ǝzzǝgzanan sǝr-i, ǝntanay a zʼǝgrǝwnen tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat, ǝssǝnkǝraq-qan-du daɣ tǝmattant, ǝzǝl wa ilkaman.»
Tǝzzar ad tigǝtǝntinan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝhân batu-net fǝl as inna: «Nak a imosan amensay wa d-igmadan jǝnnawan.»
Gannin: «Awak awen wǝrge Ɣaysa wa n ag Yusǝf, nǝkna tǝmǝzdǝyt n abba-net d anna-net, manǝmmǝk as du-z-inkǝr ǝmǝrǝdda ad igannu ijǝnnawan a d-igmad?»
Ijjǝwwab-asan Ɣaysa inn-asan: «Ayyiwat ǝgǝtǝntǝn gar-ewwan.
Wǝr t-illa i di-du-z-akkin ar s a t-id-ewây sǝr-i Abba a di-d-issǝglan, nak amaran ǝssǝnkǝraq-q-idu daɣ tǝmattant ǝzǝl wa ilkaman.
Ǝlkǝttaban n ǝnnǝbitan ih-en as:
"Ketnasan a tan-isassaɣru Mǝššina."
Awedan kul wa islan y Abba, iqbal ǝsǝssǝɣri-net wǝdi a di-d-akku.
Wǝr t-illa is kala ad inay Mǝššina di n Abba ar wa t-id-ifalan. Ǝnta ɣas a t-inayan.
Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as i izzǝgzanan ad igrǝw tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat.
Nak a imosan amensay wa ihakkin tǝmǝddurt.
Imarawan-nawan ǝtšan Manna daɣ taneray mišan wǝr dasan-igdel awen tǝmattant.
As iga awen amensay was ganna nak, ijǝnnawan a daɣ d-igmad. I t-itšan wǝr tu-z-iba.
Nak a imosan amensay wa d-igmadan jǝnnawan ihakku tǝmǝddurt. Awedan kul wa itšan amensay wa ad iddǝr har faw. Amaran taɣǝssa-nin a tǝmosat imensewan win zʼakfa fǝl ad tǝgrǝw ǝddǝnet tǝmǝddurt.»
Tǝnkar tamazaq tǝssohet gǝr Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ad gannan: «Manǝmmǝk as dana-z-akfu awedan wa taɣǝssa-net natš-et?»
Tǝzzar inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Awalla, ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan âs as wǝr tǝtšem taɣǝssa-nin nak Ag Aggadǝm, tašwim deɣ azni-nin, wǝr dawan-tu-tǝlla tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat.
Awedan wa itšan taɣǝssa-nin išwa ǝnta da azni-nin, wǝdi igrâw tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat, ǝssǝnkǝraq-q-idu deɣ daɣ tǝmattant ǝzǝl a ilkaman.
Fǝlas taɣǝssa-nin amensay wa n tidǝt a tǝmos, azni-nin deɣ aman ǝn tassay win tidǝt a imos.
Awedan wa itšan taɣǝssa-nin, išwa deɣ azni-nin, wǝdi irtay dǝr-i, nak deɣ ǝheɣ ǝwǝl-net.
Abba wa di-d-izammazalan ǝnta ɣur tǝlla tǝmǝddurt, amaran ǝnta a di-tat-ikfan, daɣ adi wa itšan taɣǝssa-nin ad t-ǝssudǝra nak da.
Ǝnta ǝddi da amensay wa d-igmadan ijǝnnawan. Wǝr ola ǝd wa ǝtšan marawan-nawan fǝlas wǝr dasan-igdel adi tǝmattant. Awedan wa t-itšan, wǝdi ad igrǝw tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat.»
Arat da da wa inna Ɣaysa daɣ ahan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud daɣ ǝɣrǝm wa n Kafarnahum.
As ǝslan nǝttulab-net aggotnen y arat wa inna da, ǝnnan: «Batu ta ši labasat, izzǝwat ǝzǝgzan-net. Ma ifragan ǝlqǝbulat-net?»
Issan Ɣaysa daɣ man-net as gitantanan nǝttulab-net gar-essan daɣ talɣa ten, inn-asan: «Ǝngǝm ǝzǝgzan-nawan a tǝdas batu di?
Ma za tagim za as di-toggam nak Ag Aggadǝm tagazzaya s adag wa ǝheɣ ǝstizarat?
Infas wa Zǝddigan a ihakkin tǝmǝddurt. Awedan ǝs tǝɣǝssa-net, wǝr imos wala. Awalan win dawan-ǝgeɣ, Infas a mosan, hakkin deɣ tǝmǝddurt.
Mišan ǝhân-kawan aytedan wǝr nǝzzǝgzan.» Ɣaysa harwa ɣur tizarat da issân win wǝr nǝzzǝgzan, issân deɣ wa tu-z-agin daɣ fassan.
Ilas inn-asan: «Adi da a fǝl dawan-ǝnne: "Wǝr t-illa i ifragan a di-d-akku ar s ad t-ikfa Abba fǝrregat n adi."»
Den da dǝffǝr-ǝs ifal a ǝggen daɣ nǝttulab-net, ǝɣradan ǝd tidawt-net.
Tǝzzar inna Ɣaysa i nǝttulab win maraw d ǝššin: «Meqqal kawanay da tǝram teklay?»
Inn-as Simɣon Butros: «Ǝmǝli, ma imos wa za nakku? Kay a itaggan awalan win ǝhakkanen tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat.
Nakkanay nǝzzigzan sǝr-ǝk, nǝssân as kay Ǝmizdag a d-ifâlan Mǝššina.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ak wǝrgeɣ ǝsǝnnǝfrǝn a kawan-ǝge ketnawan, fǝl marawewwan d ǝššin, kuddeɣ âs iyyan daɣ-wan Iblis.»
Batu ta Yahuza wa n ag Simɣon Isxarǝyuti a fǝl tat-iga Ɣaysa. Fǝlas Yahuza a tu-z-agin daɣ fassan kuddeɣ âs iyyan daɣ nǝttulab win maraw d ǝššin a imos.
Dǝffǝr adi issǝwal Ɣaysa d akal ǝn Galilaya, fǝlas wǝr ira ǝsǝwǝl ǝn wa n Yahudǝyya, id imuzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud a gammaynen ǝd tanaɣay-net.
As itaggu awen ǝmud ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud was itawannu wa n Tǝkarbanen ihoz-du.
Ǝnnan-as mǝdrayan-net: «Ǝfǝl da takka akal wa n Yahudǝyya fǝl ad ǝnǝyan nǝttulab-nak ǝššǝɣǝlan win tǝtagga.
Awedan as ira fall-as tagu masnat wǝr išǝqqǝl daɣ ǝssir. Dad zama as tǝtaggaɣ aratan ogdanen d awa, wǝdi agu tǝmǝwit ta fǝl tan-z-inǝy awedan kul.»
As das-gannin mǝdrayan-net awen da wǝr sǝr-ǝs ǝzzǝgzanan.
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Assaɣat ta-nin harwa da wǝr du-tewed. Kawanay amaran wǝr tǝzlayam assaɣaten.
Wǝr t-illa ǝddǝlil a fǝl kawan-za-tǝgzǝr ǝddǝnet. Nak amaran ǝddǝnet tǝgzâr-i fǝlas tǝgǝyya a ǝmosa y arak mazalan win daɣ-as tagginen.
Akkiwat amud wen kawanay. Nak wǝr t-ǝkke fǝlas assaɣat-in harwa da wǝr du-tewed.»
As dasan-iɣrad tǝnna n aratan win, iqqim-du daɣ Galilaya.
Dǝr iga awen da ya as ǝkkan mǝdrayan-net amud, ikk-ay Ɣaysa ǝnta da, eges iki wa zun as iga daɣ ǝssir, fǝlas wǝr issǝkna iman-net y aytedan.
Itaggu ǝmud den da gammayan-tu muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud gannan: «Ma iga alǝs a?»
As itaggu awen tǝnkâr tǝmazaq gǝr aytedan daɣ talɣa ǝn Ɣaysa. Wiyyad za gannan: «Alǝs di olâɣ.» Wiyyad amaran gannan: «Kalar ǝsǝxrǝk fadda a itaggu tamattay.»
Mišan wǝr t-illa awedan ihalan amagrad dat aytedan daɣ talɣa-net, fǝl tǝksǝda ǝn muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.
As isaggaraygaray ǝmud ikka Ɣaysa Ehan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada a daɣ-as isasaɣru.
Ǝsǝssǝɣri wa iqqan iɣafawan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud wǝllen har ǝqqiman gannin: «Wa ak awedan ma t-issosanan aratan win, ǝnta wǝr iɣra?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝsǝssǝɣri-nin wǝrge nak a d-ifal, kalar wa di-d-izammazalan a d-ifal.
Awedan kul wa iran ad ammazal tara ǝn Mǝššina, wǝdi ad issǝn kud ǝsǝssǝɣri-nin ǝnta Mǝššina a d-ifal wala deɣ arat a imos a d-ǝnzama gǝr-i ǝd man-in.

Awedan wa iššewalan s aratan a d-inzâm gar-es ǝd man-net, wǝdi iman-net as igammay tanaya. Mišan awedan wa išɣalan daɣ ǝsǝnnǝfilǝl ǝn tanaya ǝn wa t-id-izammazalan, wǝdi tidǝt a immal, wǝr daɣ-as t-illa a imosan lahan.
Wǝrgeɣ ikf-iwan ǝnnǝbi Musa Ǝlqanun? Wǝr kawan-iha za i das-ilkâman. Mafel as tǝram a di-tanɣim?»
Ǝnnan-as aytedan: «Kay aggǝsuf a kay-ihan. Ma iran tenaɣay-nak?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Nak tǝlmǝɣjujat iyyadda ɣas a ǝge daɣ ǝzǝl ǝn tǝsanfawt, mišan ǝqqanan-as ɣafawan-nawan.

Kawanay wǝrgeɣ tǝšaqqalam daɣ ǝzǝl ǝn tǝsanfawt fǝlas bararan-nawan a daɣ-as tǝsamankadam? Amaran wǝr fall-awan imos awen lahan, fǝlas ǝnnǝbi Musa a dawan-t-innan – as iga awen imarawan-nana a t-id-ǝssǝntanen, wǝrge Musa.
Ǝnǝyat za, dad imos as itawasamankad barar daɣ ǝzǝl ǝn tǝsanfawt fǝl lǝkkum y ǝššǝriɣa wa n ǝnnǝbi Musa, mafel as kawan-iha alham-in fǝlas ǝgeɣ y awedan ǝzuzǝy ikmâlan daɣ ǝzǝl ǝn tǝsanfawt?
Ad wǝr tǝxakkamam awedan s azzahir-net. Kalar xakkamat ǝs tidǝt.»
As t-oggan arat daɣ aytedan win Yerusalam ad gannin: «Awak alǝs wen, wǝrgeɣ ǝnta as ǝran muzaran-nana tenaɣay-net?
Amaran ǝnta den ǝmǝrǝdda iššewalan den dat awedan kul, wǝr t-illa i das-igannin wala! Awak immikkan imuzaran-nanaɣ a sallakannen as ǝnta a imosan Ǝlmǝsix?
As iga awen da za alǝs wa nǝssân akal wa d-igmad, Ǝlmǝsix amaran assaɣa wa du-z-asu ǝnǝfilal ɣas a du-z-agu, wǝr t-illa awedan a issânan da d-igmad.»

Harwa da isasaɣru Ɣaysa daɣ Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada as idkal ǝmǝsli-net wǝllen inna: «Tǝzdâyam-i tǝssânam sas d-ǝhe! As iga awen da ya wǝr d-ose gǝr-i ǝd man-in, kalar wa imosan tidǝt a di-d-izammazalan; amaran wǝr tu-tǝzdayam.
Nak ǝzdayaq-qu, fǝlas ǝnta sǝr-wan d-ǝfala, amaran ǝnta di-d-izammazalan.»
Den da ad ǝgmayan muzaran ǝn tamattay d abbaz-net mišan wǝr tan-iha i t-idasan, fǝlas alwaq-net a du-wǝr-newed harwa da.
Aytedan aggotnen a ǝzzǝgzannen ǝs Ɣaysa daɣ tamattay en, gannin: «Tordâm as kud d-osa Ǝlmǝsix ifrâg ǝsǝkni n alɣalamaten ogarnen šin issǝkna alǝs wa?»
Arat wa simǝtǝktikan aytedan daɣ tamattay ta, ǝslan-tu Farisaytan. Ǝnkaran limaman win zawwarnen, ǝd Farisaytan ǝssǝglan-du imagazan n Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada y ad abǝzan Ɣaysa.
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Nak ad agaɣ arat ǝn tamert ǝddewa dǝr-wan, dǝffǝr adi amaran ad zʼakka wa di-d-izammazalan.
