A di-tǝgmǝyam mišan wǝr di-za-tǝgrǝwam fǝlas edag wa zʼakka wǝr tǝfregam iki-net.»

Ad tinǝmǝsǝstinan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, gannin: «Ma imos za adag wa zʼakku daq-qu wǝr za nǝgrǝw? Meqqal Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win wazawaznen daɣ kallan win tama a zʼakku iggǝz-tan? Meɣ ak aytedan win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud a zʼisasaɣru?
Ma imos almaɣna ǝn batu ta iga da, as inna: "A di-tǝgmǝyam mišan wǝr di-za-tǝgrǝwam, fǝlas wǝr tǝfregam iki n adag wa zʼakka"?»
As d-ewad ǝzǝl wa ilkaman n ǝmud wa n Tǝkarbanen, s ǝnta a imosan ǝzǝl wa zǝwwǝran daɣ ǝmud en, ibdad Ɣaysa dat tamattay idkal ǝmǝsli-net inna: «Awedan kul wa iffudan akkiwet-i-du ad ašǝw.
Awedan kul wa sǝr-i izzǝgzanan "ad ǝngǝyan gǝrwan n aman win sidurnen daɣ ǝwǝl-net", s ǝmmǝk was iktab awen daɣ Ǝlkǝttaban.»
Batu ta iga Ɣaysa den, Infas wa Zǝddigan a sǝr-ǝs issoka, a zʼǝgrǝwan aytedan win sǝr-ǝs ǝzzǝgzannen. Ǝnta azzaman en Infas wa Zǝddigan wǝr itawakfa harwa da fǝlas Ɣaysa a wǝr nǝggez tanaya-net.
As isla ades ǝn tamattay en i batuten šin iga Ɣaysa da ǝnnan: «Illikan as alǝs wa ǝnta a imosan Ǝnnǝbi wa ittǝmalan!»
Ǝnnan wiyyad: «Ǝlmǝsix awa!» Ǝnnan-asan wiyyad: «Manǝmmǝk as du-z-igmǝd Ǝlmǝsix Galilaya?
Awak Ǝlkǝttaban wǝrgeɣ a ǝnnan:
"Ǝzzurrǝyya ǝn Dawǝd, ǝd tǝɣrǝmt ǝn Betalxam s ǝnta as kala daɣ-as iɣsar Dawǝd, a du-z-igmǝd Ǝlmǝsix."»
Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as tǝmmǝzray tamattay daɣ talɣa ǝn Ɣaysa.
Wiyyad daɣ-san ǝrân abbaz-net, mišan wǝr tan-iha is t-idas ǝfus-net.
Ǝglan magazan n Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada ǝqqalan ilimaman win zawwarnen, ǝd Farisaytan. Osan-in ɣas ǝnnan-asan: «Mafel wǝr t-idu-tewayam?»
Ǝnnan-asan magazan: «Wǝr kala itawanay awedan igan awal wa iga alǝs en.»
Ǝnnan-asan Farisaytan: «Daɣ adi kawanay da toyyam iman-nawan tǝtawasaxrakam?
Ǝssǝnat ill-ay i sǝr-ǝs izzigzanan daɣ-na?
Wǝr sǝr-ǝs izzǝgzan ar tamattay n aljahilan wǝr nǝssen wala daɣ awa ihan ǝššǝriɣa n Ǝttawret, as ketnasan tǝwâr-tan tulɣant.»
Inn-asan Nikodemos imosan iyyan daɣ Farisaytan s ǝnta din-osan Ɣaysa dat awen:
«Ǝššǝriɣa-nana wǝr t-iha ad itǝwǝxkǝm awedan iket wǝr iššewal, itǝwǝssǝn awa daɣ iššokal.»
Ǝnnan-as: «Galilaya kay tǝlat kay da? Aknu teɣaray n Ǝlkǝttaban ad tǝnǝya kay iman-nak as wǝr t-illa ǝnnǝbi a du-z-igmǝdan Galilaya.»
Tǝzzar ikka awedan kul ehan-net.
Ikka Ɣaysa adɣaɣ as itawannu wa n Eškan ǝn Zaytun.
As affaw aɣôra iqqal Ehan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, tǝzzar tǝkk-ay-du tamattay ketnet. Iqqim a tan-isasaɣru.
Iššewal den da as d-osan musanan n Ǝttawret ǝd Farisaytan ewâyan tantut a d-ǝɣdaran tǝtaggu ǝzzǝna. Ǝssǝbdadan-tat dat awedan kul,
ǝnnan i Ɣaysa: «Ya Ǝššex-nana, tantut a ǝzzǝna a tǝga, amaran tǝtiwanay tǝtagg-ay.
Daɣ Ǝttawret za a inna Musa: "Tantut zun ta, ilzâm a tat-ǝggaran aytedan ǝs tǝhun har tat-iba." Amaran kay ma tǝnne?»
Arat wa tǝmǝrkest a imos a das-ǝgân fǝl ad t-ǝssǝwǝran lahan. Edag ân a dasan-ajjawwab Ɣaysa, inaz ad ikattab s adad-net fǝl amaḍal.
Ǝqqiman ǝdgâzan-tu s ǝsǝstan, as ihog ibdad-du inn-asan: «Inkǝret-du daɣ-wan was kala wǝr iga abakkad izaret ǝs taggor-net.»
Ilas enez ad ikattab s adad-net fǝl amaḍal.
Ǝslan i batu ta ɣas, mazazaran ǝglan, azzaran-asan win waššarnen. Iqqim-du Ɣaysa ɣas-net ǝnta ǝd tǝntut ta nad, tǝbdâd dat-ǝs.
Ibdad-du inn-as: «Tantut, ma ǝgan aytedan win kam-ǝbaznen? Wǝr tan-iha i kam-ibâzan s ǝššǝriɣa?»
Tǝnn-as: «Waliyyan daɣ-san, Ǝmǝli-nin». Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Nak da za wǝr kam-z-abǝza s ǝššǝriɣa. Aglu tǝjǝwǝnke, mišan ad wǝr tǝlǝsaɣ igi ǝn bakkadan.»
Ilas Ɣaysa awal i tamattay inna: «Nak a imosan ǝnnur n ǝddǝnet. Daɣ adi wa di-ilkaman ad igrǝw ǝnnur wa isiduran, amaran iɣrâd d ad ijiwankat daɣ šiyyay.»
Ǝnnan-as Farisaytan: «Tǝgǝyya ǝn man-nak a tǝmosa, arat wa tǝgannaɣ ǝddi irkam wǝllen.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Kud imos as tǝgǝyya ǝn man-in a mosa da tǝgǝyya-nin tidǝt a tǝmos fǝlas ǝssâna sas d-ǝhe, ǝd sas ǝdaga. Kawanay amaran wǝr tǝssenam sas d-ǝhe, wala sas ǝdaga.
Kawanay azzahir ɣas as tǝšarraɣam aytedan, nak amaran wǝr šǝrrǝɣa waliyyan.
As iga awen da as fall-i d-osa adi, ad šarraɣa, amaran ǝššǝriɣa-nin issohat, fǝlas iddew dǝr-i Abba wa di-d-izammazalan.
Ǝššǝriɣa-nawan iktâb daɣ-as âs tǝgǝyya n ǝššin meddan a tǝmosat tidǝt.
Nak za tǝgǝyya iyyadda a mosaɣ i man-in, tǝgǝyya-nin ta n sanatat amaran Abba s ǝnta di-d-izammazalan a tat-imosan.»
Tǝzzar ǝnnan-as: «Mǝnid illa za Abba-nak?» Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Wǝrmad di-tǝzdâyam za wǝr tǝzdayam Abba-nin. Ǝnnar di-tǝzdâyam tǝzdǝyam Abba-nin.»

Batuten šin itagg-enat Ɣaysa assaɣa wa daɣ isasaɣru daɣ Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada dagma n adag wa iha ǝssǝnduq wa daɣ tiddawnat tǝkutawen. Mišan wǝr t-illa i igmâyan d abbaz-net fǝlas alwaq-net a du-wǝr-newed harwa da.
Ilas Ɣaysa inn-asan: «Nak teklay a zʼaga. A di-tǝgmǝyam amaran a kawan-iba daɣ tišit ǝn nasbakkadan. Wǝr tǝfregam a din-tawǝdam edag wa ǝkke.»
Ad tinǝmǝnnin arat daɣ Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud gar-essan: «Meqqal iman-net a zʼanɣu, fǝlas a inna wǝr nǝfreg a din-nawǝd edag wa ikka.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Kawanay aytedan n ares a tǝmosam, nak in afalla. Kawanay kǝl ǝddǝnet a da a tǝmosam, nak wǝr di-tǝla ǝddǝnet a.
A di da a fǝl dawan-ǝnne a kawan-iba daɣ tišit ǝn nasbakkadan. As wǝr tǝzzǝgzanam as nak a imosan "Wa Illan da", wǝdi a kawan-iba ǝd tišit ǝn bakkadan.»
Ǝnnan-as: «Ak ma tǝmosaɣ?» Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Awa dawan-ǝmala ɣur tizarat har ǝmǝrǝdda ǝnta a mosa.

Ǝllân-tu aratan aggotnen as ǝfrâgaɣ a tan-anna daɣ talɣa-nawan, ǝllân-tu deɣ aratan aggotnen as ǝfrâgaɣ a kawan-awwaddaba fall-asan. Mišan wa di-d-izammazalan mǝššis ǝn tidǝt a imos, amaran arat wa di-d-inna, ɣas a ǝmmala y ǝddǝnet.»
Wǝr ǝgren as batu n Abba a daɣ dasan-immǝgrad.

Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «As tǝgam iman-in nak Ag Aggadǝm s ǝsǝhhuki wa di-za-tagim fǝl tǝgǝttawt, ad tǝssǝnam as nak da a imosan "Wa Illan da", tǝssǝnam deɣ as wǝr t-illa a tagga gǝr-i ǝd man-in, arat wa di-isassaɣra Abba ɣas a ganna.
Wa di-d-izammazalan iddew dǝr-i. Wǝr di-oyya ɣas-in fǝlas faw da arat wa das-igrazan ɣas a tagga.»
Ǝslan aytedan aggotnen y awa inna Ɣaysa den ǝzzǝgzanan sǝr-ǝs.
Inna Ɣaysa i Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win sǝr-ǝs ǝzzǝgzannen: «As tǝbbǝrdagam y awa kawan-sassaɣra, ad tǝqqǝlam inǝttulab-in win tidǝt,
tǝssǝnam tidǝt, tidǝt amaran ǝnta kawan-za-tǝsaddarfit.»
Ǝnnan-as: «Nakkanay ya ǝzzurrǝyya n ǝnnǝbi Ibrahim a nǝmos, wǝr kala daɣ ǝddǝnet ad nǝqqal eklan ǝn waliyyan, mafel tǝganna: "Ad taddarfem"?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as awedan kul wa itaggin ibakkadan, wǝdi akli ǝn bakkadan a imos.
Akli amaran wǝr das-t-illa adag ǝn faw daɣ aɣaywan, mišan Barar wa eraw aɣaywan wǝdi edag-net ill-ay har faw.
Daɣ adi as kawan-isaddarfat Barar, wǝdi ad taddarfem ǝs tidǝt.
Ǝssânaɣ as ǝzzurrǝyya n Ibrahim a tǝmosam, mišan tǝgammayam d ad tagim iman-in fǝlas awal-in a wǝr nǝdes iwallan-nawan.
Nak arat wa ǝnaya ɣur Abba-nin a ǝmmala, amaran kawanay tǝtaggim awas tǝslam ɣur abba-nawan Iblis.»
Ǝnnan-as: «Abba-nana ya ǝnnǝbi Ibrahim a t-imosan.» Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝnnar tidǝt âs tǝmosam bararan n Ibrahim ad tǝtaggim imazalan win iga Ibrahim.
Kawanay amaran ǝmǝrǝdda tǝgammayam ǝd tanaɣay-nin, nak imosan awedan a dawan-immalan tidǝt s ǝmmǝk was di-tat-d-inna Mǝššina. Arat wǝdi wǝr t-iga Ibrahim.
Imazalan win iga abba-nawan a tǝtaggam.» Ǝnnan-as: «Nakkanay wǝr nǝmos iniba; wǝr nǝla ar abba iyyanda a t-imosan Mǝššina.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝnnar Mǝššina a imosan Abba-nawan tarim-i, fǝlas Mǝššina a d-ǝgmada, ǝnta a d-ǝfala, wǝrge gǝr-i ǝd man-in as d-ose, kalar ǝnta di-d-izammazalan.
Mafel wǝr tǝgrem awal-in? Wǝr dawan-igdel ǝgǝrri-net ar as wǝr tǝfregam ǝsǝsǝm y as.

Wǝr tǝlem daɣ abbatan ar Iblis, amaran tǝrâm ad tassandim deranan n abba-nawan. Harwa ɣur ǝnǝtti ad iqqal ǝmǝggi ǝn man, amaran wǝr ibded daɣ tidǝt, fǝlas wǝr tǝha tidǝt ǝwǝl-net. Igi ǝn bahu a imosan ǝttǝbiɣat-net fǝlas anasbahu a imos, imos deɣ abba ǝn bahu.
Nak amaran tidǝt as tamagrada, adi da fǝl di-wǝr-tǝzzǝgzanam.
Mǝni daɣ-wan wa ifragan ad aggayyat as kala ad ǝgeɣ abakkad? Kud tidǝt a ǝmmala mafel wǝr di-tǝzzǝgzanam?
Awedan imosan arat daɣ tamattay ǝn Mǝššina, ǝsǝsǝm a itaggu y awa inna Mǝššina. Kawanay amaran wǝr das-tǝsǝsimam, fǝlas wǝr tǝmosam tamattay ǝn Mǝššina.»
Tǝzzar ǝnnan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud i Ɣaysa: «Wǝrgeɣ kala ad nǝnna kay iyyan daɣ Kǝl-Samarǝya a tǝmosaɣ amaran ih-ik aggǝsuf?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Wǝr di-iha aggǝsuf, Abba-nin ɣas a ǝssǝɣmara, kawanay amaran wǝr di-tǝssǝɣmaram.
Wǝr gǝmmǝyaɣ tanaya i man-in. Ill-ay wa di-igammayan tanaya, amaran ǝnta a ixakkaman.
Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as awedan wa ittafan awal-in, wǝr ilkem ad inay tǝmattant.»

Ǝnnan-as arat daɣ Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud: «Ǝmǝrǝdda ad nǝkkas aššak as ih-ik aggǝsuf! Ibrahim da aba-tu ǝnta harkid ǝnnǝbitan kul, kay amaran tǝganna: "Awedan kul wa ittafan awal-in, wǝr ilkem ad inay tǝmattant."
Abba-nanaɣ Ibrahim dâ aba-tu: tordeɣ as togaraq-qu almaqam? Ǝnnǝbitan dâ aba-tan. Kay ma tǝxsabaɣ iman-nak?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «As imos as iman-in a fǝl sanamala, wǝdi tanaya-nin wǝr tǝnfa wala. Abba-nin s ǝnta as tǝgannim imos Ǝmǝli-nawan, ǝnta a di-ihakkan tanaya,
amaran wǝr tu-tǝzdayam, mišan nak ǝzdâyaq-qu. As ǝnne wǝr t-ǝzdaya, wǝdi ad ǝqqǝlaɣ anasbahu ǝn šilat-nawan. Kalar ǝzdâyaq-qu, amaran ǝttâfaɣ awal-net.
Abba-nawan Ibrahim imâl-tu ǝd tǝdǝwit fǝl as das-igmad aššak as ad inǝy assa-nin, amaran inay-tu, ikn-ay awen ǝsǝffǝliwǝs.»
Ǝnnan-as Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud: «Kay wǝr teweda wala sǝmmosat tǝmǝrwen n awatay eges tǝnne tǝnâyaɣ Ibrahim?»
Inn-asan: «Ǝggǝyye silakanaɣ-awan as dat tǝhǝwt n ǝnnǝbi Ibrahim da nak ǝmosa "Wa Illan da".»
Tǝzzar ad takammen šihun y a das-agin zabaw, mišan ya igmad-tan daɣ tamattay, irdaɣ afarag n Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada.
Ijiwankat Ɣaysa as inay alǝs s as d-ihǝw da iddirɣal.
Ǝssǝstanan-tu nǝttulab-net ǝnnan-as: «Ǝššex, mafǝl d-ihǝw alǝs a ǝd taddarɣalt? Awak ǝddǝlil n abakkad-net, meɣ ak abakkad ǝn marwan-net?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Wǝrmad iddirɣal fǝl ǝddǝlil n abakkad-net, wala deɣ abakkad ǝn marwan-net. Wǝr d-ihǝw ǝd taddarɣalt ar y a sǝr-ǝs tǝwǝnǝyan igitan ǝn Mǝššina.
Iwâr-anaɣ ad naknu ǝššǝɣǝlan ǝn wa di-d-izammazalan iket di ad iga azal, fǝlas ehad izay-du, amaran wǝr t-illa i daɣ-as ifragan ǝššǝɣǝl.
Iket ǝheɣ ǝddǝnet ǝmosaɣ ǝnnur n ǝddǝnet.»
As iga batu ta, issotaf daɣ amaḍal, iga arat ǝn talaq ǝs mǝtman-net, issǝlal-tat i šittawen n ǝmǝdderɣǝl en,
inn-as: «Aglu takka tǝɣazart ta n Siloxam tǝšširǝda daɣ-as udǝm-nak.» (Siloxam almaɣna-net anammazal.) Igla ǝmǝdderɣǝl iššorad udǝm-net, as d-iqqal da ihannay.
Ad gannin mahharagan-net, d aytedan win t-ǝnaynen dat awen imos ǝmǝdderɣǝl itansayan: «Ak awen wǝrgeɣ alǝs was faw iqqim itansay?»
Wiyyad gannin: «Ǝnta daɣ awen.» Wiyyad ǝnta da gannin: «Kala, tulat ɣas a dǝr-ǝs iga.» Ǝnta amaran igannu: «Nak daɣ awa.»
A tu-sastanan gannan-as: «Mǝni tǝmǝwit tas tǝgrawaɣ asawad-nak?»
Igann-asan: «Alǝs as gannin Ɣaysa, a igan arat ǝn talaq, tǝzzar issǝlal-tat i šittawen-in, inn-i ad aglaɣ ǝšširǝdaɣ udǝm-in daɣ tǝɣazart ta n Siloxam. Ǝgleɣ ǝššoradaq-qu ɣas, ǝgrawaɣ asawad-in.»
Ǝnnan-as: «Ma iga za alǝs wǝdi?» Inn-asan: «Wǝr ǝssena».
Ǝlwayan aytedan win alǝs was kala ad imos ǝmǝdderɣǝl da ǝs Farisaytan.
Ǝnta ǝzǝl ǝn tǝsanfawt ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud a daɣ iga Ɣaysa talaq, issǝswad ǝmǝdderɣǝl wen.
A tu-sastanan Farisaytan ǝntanay da ǝd tǝmǝwit tas igraw asawad-net. Inn-asan: «Arat ǝn talaq a issǝlal šittawen-in, ǝššoradaɣ udǝm-in, ǝswada.»

Ad gannin arat daɣ Farisaytan: «Alǝs wa igan arat wa, wǝr d-ifel Mǝššina fǝlas wǝr isassahat ǝzǝl ǝn tǝsanfawt-nana.» Ǝnnan wiyyad: «Alɣalamaten šin, manǝmmǝk as tanat-z-agu awedan imosan anasbakkad?» Tǝzzar iga ǝmǝzrǝy gar-essan.
Ǝlasan ǝsǝstan n alǝs was kala ad iddǝrɣal ǝnnan-as: «Kay a innan izzozay-kay alǝs daɣ taddarɣalt, ǝmǝl-anaɣ was tordeɣ as imos-tu.» Inn-asan: «Ǝnnǝbi a imos.»
Ǝglan Farisaytan wǝr ǝzzǝgzanan as alǝs wa kala ad iddǝrɣal har du-sassaɣran imarwan-net.
Ǝnnan-asan: «Ak ǝnta da da barar-nawan was tǝnnam as d-ihǝw da iddirɣal? Mǝni tǝmǝwit tas igraw asawad-net ǝmǝrǝdda?»
Ǝnnan-asan marwan n alǝs: «Nǝssân as barar-nanaɣ a imos, nǝssân ǝnta da âs as d-ihǝw da iddirɣal,
mišan wǝrmad nǝssân tǝmǝwit tas igraw asawad-net, za wala deɣ awedan wa t-issǝswadan. Sǝstǝnat-tu iman-net, fǝlas alǝs waššaran a imos ifragan ad ammagrad daɣ talɣa ta tu-tǝqqalat.»

Batu ta wǝr tat-ǝgen marwan-net ar fǝl tǝksǝda ǝn muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud fǝlas tǝnna a gan awedan kul wa iggǝyyen as Ɣaysa a imosan Ǝlmǝsix, wǝdi ad t-ǝkkǝsan daɣ ǝljǝmaɣat n ahan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.
Awen da fǝl ǝnnan marwan-net: «Tušaray-net tǝšišawad-tu a dawan-ammagrad daɣ talɣa ta tu-tǝqqalat, sǝstǝnat-tu.»
Ǝlasan-du Farisaytan teɣaray n alǝs was kala ad iddǝrɣal ǝnnan-as: «Iksad Mǝššina tǝmǝla tidǝt. Nakkanay nǝssân as alǝs di anasbakkad.»
Inn-asan alǝs wa: «Nak wǝr ǝssena kud anasbakkad a imos wala. Arat iyyanda ɣas a daɣ ǝssana, as kala ad ǝddǝrɣala, ǝmǝrǝdda ǝhannaya.»
Dǝffǝr awen ǝnnan-as: «Ma imos arat wa dak-iga? Mǝni tǝmǝwit tas kay-issǝswad?»
Inn-asan: «Arat wǝdi ya ǝmâlaɣ-awan-tu mišan wǝr di-tǝzzǝgzanam. Mafǝl tǝram a dawan-t-ǝlǝsaɣ emel? Meqqal ak kawanay da a tǝram ad tǝqqǝlam inalkiman-net ketnawan?»
Ǝgan-as ǝrrǝbdan ǝnnan-as: «Kay a imosan ǝnalkim-net, nakkanay inalkiman n ǝnnǝbi Musa a nǝmos.
Musa nǝssân as iššewal-as Mǝššina, amaran alǝs wǝdi wǝr nǝssen sas d-iha fadda.»
Inn-asan: «Alǝs wa wǝr tǝssenam wala sas d-iha mišan izzozay-i daɣ taddarɣalt! Arat ya wa ǝnta a isammaklalan wǝllen!
Tǝssânam as Mǝššina wǝr iqǝbbǝl šiwatriwen ǝn nasbakkadan. Awedan wa das-ibbǝrdagan itamazal tara-net, ǝnta as iqqabbal šiwatriwen-net.
Wǝr kala ad itawasla awedan issiswadan iyyan a d-ihǝwan ǝd taddarɣalt.
Ǝnnar du-wǝr-ifel alǝs di Mǝššina, wǝr zʼifrǝg igi ǝn wala.»
Haraššen-tu ǝnnan-as: «Ko! Adis kay was as du-tǝhǝwa da tǝmosa tǝbǝlulǝq n abakkad, kay a iran a dana-takfaɣ alfaydaten?» Tǝzzar ǝstaɣan-tu.
As isla Ɣaysa ǝmazal wa igan da, iswad y alǝs wen har t-igraw inn-as: «Awak tǝzzigzanaɣ sǝr-i Ag Aggadǝm?»
Inna alǝs i Ɣaysa: «Ǝmǝl-i awa imos, Ǝmǝli-nin, fǝlas areɣ a sǝr-ǝs ǝzzǝgzǝna.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Tǝnayaq-qu, amaran ǝnta da da dak-immǝgradan da.»
Inn-as alǝs: «Daɣ adi ǝzzigzanaɣ Ǝmǝli-nin.» Tǝzzar issǝjad-as.
Amaran inna Ɣaysa: «Nak assa a d-ǝgeɣ ǝddǝnet y ad ammazalaɣ ǝššǝriɣa, ǝswǝdan win wǝr nǝhǝnnǝy, addarɣalan win hannaynen.»
Ǝslan arat daɣ Farisaytan win dǝr iddew y awa inna da ǝnnan-as: «Daɣ adi nakkanay da imǝddǝrɣal a nǝmos?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝnnar tǝmosam imǝddǝrɣal wǝdi wǝr kawan-iwer abakkad, mišan dad imos as tǝgannim: "Nakkanay nǝhannay", wǝdi iwâr-kawan abakkad.»
«Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as: Awedan wa wǝr nǝggez afarag n ayfǝd s ǝmi was itawaggaz, itaraggat-t-idu, wǝdi abaydag a imos n ǝnarkab.
Amaran wa d-iggazan s ǝmi n afarag, wǝdi ǝnta a imosan amadan n ayfǝd.
Ǝnaɣlif n afarag a das-z-alǝman imi, aslinat ayfǝd y ǝmǝsli-net, ad iɣarru šin-net s esmawan-nasnat isardaq-qanat afarag.
As d-iɣrad ikus ǝn šin-net, a dasnat-izar, ǝlkǝmnat-as, fǝlas ǝzdâynat ǝmǝsli-net.
As iga awen awedan wa dasnat-imosan ǝnaftaɣ, wǝr das-z-ǝlkǝmnat, ewef fadda a tu-z-aginat fǝlas wǝr ǝzdaynat ǝmǝsli-net.»
Ǝlmital wa da, a dasan-iga Ɣaysa, mišan wǝr ǝgren almaɣna n awa daɣ-san immǝgrad da.
Ilas Ɣaysa inn-asan: «Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as nak a imosan imi was raddaɣnat ayfǝd.
Win dat-i d-osanen kul ibaydagan ǝn narkaban a mosan, amaran wǝr dasan-ǝssǝsamnat ayfǝd.
Nak a imosan imi n afarag. Wa sǝr-i d-iggazan ad afsu. Ifrâg ad itaggaz iraddaɣ, igrǝw ǝntada imensewan-net.
Abaydag wǝr d-itisu ar fǝl šikra, d igi ǝn man d ǝhluk. Nak amaran ose-du fǝl ad ǝgrǝwan aytedan tǝmǝddurt, ǝgrǝwan-tat da za ǝs tǝmǝwit wǝr nǝla ǝddukad.
Nak a imosan amadan wa olaɣan. Amadan wa olaɣan iman-net a ihakku fǝl ayfǝd-net.
Mišan awedan wâs ayfǝd wǝrgeɣ šin-net, ǝtǝwǝɣfar ɣas a itawagga y a tanat-idǝn, wǝdi as ogga ǝridal izay-tanat-du, ad addaggag ayy-enat-in, abǝz daɣ-asnat ǝridal awa ira, izǝwwǝziwǝz-tanat.
Arat wa itagg-ay alǝs wa fǝlas ǝtǝwǝɣfar ɣas a iga y ǝššǝɣǝl wa, wǝr izlay a ǝganat ayfǝd.
Nak a imosan amadan wa olaɣan. Ǝzdâyaɣ ayfǝd-in, ayfǝd-in deɣ ǝzdaynat-i,
ǝs tǝmǝwit ta daɣ as di-izday Abba-nin, nak deɣ ǝzdâyaq-qu. Ǝkfeɣ iman-in fǝl ayfǝd-in.
Ǝleɣ ayfǝd šiyyad wǝr nǝha afarag wa. Ǝntanatay da kundaba azzaraɣ-asnat, aslinat y ǝmǝsli-nin. Ayfǝd-in kul ad ǝrtǝynat ǝqqǝlnat ǝsǝgǝn iyyanda, ilân amadan iyyanda.
Abba ir-i fǝlas iman-in a ǝkfe fǝl a tan-ǝlǝsaɣ agaraw.
Wǝr t-illa i daɣ-i zʼabǝzan iman, kalar iman-in a ǝkfeɣ ǝs tǝradawt-in. Ǝleɣ fǝrregat ǝn tahakkay-nasan, ǝleɣ da fǝrregat n ǝsuɣǝl-nasan. Ǝnta da daɣ arat was di-omar Abba-nin s igi-net.»
Ǝlasan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝmǝzrǝy daɣ talɣa n aratan win igannu Ɣaysa da.
A daɣ-san aggen gannin: «Alǝs wa aggǝsuf a t-ihan! Awa ǝmeskel! Mafel tǝssisamam-as?»
Wiyyad gannin: «Awedan iha aggǝsuf wǝr itǝggu awal wa. Tordam as ill-ay aggǝsuf ifrâgan ǝsǝswǝd ǝn mǝddǝrɣal?»
Azzaman en tagrǝst. Ewad-du ǝmud imosan isaktan n ǝtǝwǝzǝzdag wa iga Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada daɣ Yerusalam.
Itijǝwǝnkit Ɣaysa daɣ Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada issiwal ǝd tarrayt tǝfâlat as itawannu «ta n Suliman.»
Ɣilayɣalayan-tu Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win ǝllanen den gannin-as: «Kay ak har ǝmmay wǝr dana-tore daɣ aɣaf? Kud kay Ǝlmǝsix a tǝmosa, tǝzǝlulǝɣa-du da da tannaɣ-anaq-qu.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝmâlaɣ-awan, mišan wǝr di-tǝzzǝgzanam. Imazalan win ǝge s esǝm n Abba-nin, ǝggǝyyen-i,
mišan wǝr di-tǝzzǝgzanam fǝlas wǝr tǝtabaqqem daɣ ayfǝd-in.
Ayfǝd-in ǝsallinat y ǝmǝsli-nin, ǝzdâyaq-qanat, amaran ǝlkâmnat-i.
Ǝkfeq-qanat tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat, wǝr daɣ-asnat tǝlkem tǝmattant, amaran wǝr t-illa i daɣ-i tanat-z-irkǝban.
Abba-nin a di-tanat-ikfan, wǝr t-illa i wǝr oger. Amaran wǝr t-illa i tanat-z-irkǝban daɣ ǝfus-net.
Nak d Abba arat iyyanda a nǝmos.»
Ǝlasan-du sǝr-ǝs adakal ǝn tǝhun y ad t-anɣin.
Ilas Ɣaysa inn-asan: «Ǝssiknaq-qawan imazalan aggotnen olaɣnen a d-ǝfalnen Abba. Mǝni daɣ-san wa fǝl taram a di-tanɣim?»
Ǝnnan-as: «Nakkanay wǝr nǝra tenaɣay-nak fǝl as tǝgeɣ ǝmazal olaɣan, kalar ǝmadraw wa tǝgeɣ ǝddi a fǝl kay-za-nanɣu. Kay wǝr tǝmosaɣ ar aggadǝm amaran tareɣ ad tagaɣ iman-nak Mǝššina.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Awak wǝrgeɣ iktâb daɣ Ǝttawret as inna Mǝššina:
"Kawanay tǝmosam imalan"?
Wǝr nǝfreg a din-nǝgǝr arat wa ihan Ǝlkǝttaban. Esǝm wa n malan, iɣra sǝr-ǝs Mǝššina aytedan win ikka awal-net.
Nak Mǝššina a di-isannafranan izammazal-i-du s ǝddǝnet. Manǝmmǝk daɣ adi as za tannim taggaɣ ǝmadraw fǝlas ǝnne: "Ǝmosa Barar ǝn Mǝššina"?
As imos as wǝr tǝggaɣ imazalan win as di-d-issǝgla Abba-nin y a tan-aga, a di-wǝr-tǝzzǝgzǝnam.
Mišan dad imos as taggaq-qan, wǝdi kud sǝr-i wǝr tǝzzǝgzanam da, zǝgzǝnat kuddeɣ ǝs mazalan win tagga, fǝl ad tǝssǝnam, tassantim deɣ daɣ ǝgǝrri n as Abba irtây dǝr-i, nak deɣ ǝrtâya d Abba.»
Ǝlasan agamay d abbaz-net, mišan igmad-tan.
Ilas Ɣaysa iki ǝn tǝgadamayt ta hadat ǝn Yordan, daɣ adag wa daɣ issǝnta Yaxya ǝsǝlmǝɣ n aytedan daɣ aman, iqqim den da.
Osan-t-in aytedan aggotnen, gannin: «Yaxya wǝr iga alɣalamat waliyyat, mišan aratan kul win danaɣ-inna s alǝs wa, tidǝt a mosan.»
Den daɣ ad ǝzzǝgzanan aytedan aggotnen ǝs Ɣaysa.
Ill-ay alǝs irinan igan esǝm Lazarǝs, ihan tǝɣrǝmt ǝn Betanǝy s ǝnta a daɣ tǝɣsar Maryama ǝd Marta ǝmosnen šimǝdrayen.
Maryama ta da a tǝnɣalat alwardi fǝl Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa, tǝmas idaran-net ǝs jǝkkad-net. Amaran amadray-net Lazarǝs a irinan den.
Ǝssokanat tǝmǝdrayen-net Ɣaysa ǝmazal as: «Ǝmǝli, ǝmǝri-nak irîn.»
As isla Ɣaysa i salan win den, inna: «Tǝsǝlkamt ǝn tǝwǝrna ten, wǝr za tǝqqǝl tǝmattant ǝn Lazarǝs, arat a tǝmos a zʼassaknin tanaya ǝn Mǝššina, isǝnnǝfilǝl-du ǝntada tanaya ta ila Barar ǝn Mǝššina.»
Ɣaysa ira Marta wǝllen, ǝnta ǝd tǝmadrayt-net, ǝd Lazarǝs.
Isla tǝwǝrna-net, mišan iga dǝffǝr awen ǝššin adan wǝr igmed edag wa iha.
Dǝffǝr adi inna i nǝttulab-net: «Ǝndawat ad nǝqqǝl Yahudǝyya.»
Ǝnnan-as nǝttulab-net: «Ǝššex-nana, imuzaran-nana wǝrge edes-nasan sǝket dâ da dă gammayan ǝd tanaɣay-nak, kay amaran tareɣ tewaɣlay n akal wen?»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝzǝl wǝrgeɣ maraw alwaqan d ǝššin a imos? As ijawankat awedan ezal, wǝr zʼinǝgǝrtǝttǝf, fǝlas ihannay dat-ǝs.
Mišan as ijawankat awedan ehad, ad inǝgǝrtǝttǝf, fǝlas wǝr t-iha ǝnnur.»
As iga batu ta inna tolas: «Ǝmidi-nana Lazarǝs insâ, ad aglaɣ a t-id-ǝssǝnkǝra.»
Ǝnnan-as nǝttulab-net: «Ǝmǝli, dad zamas insâ, wǝdi ǝngǝm ad izzǝy.»
Ǝnta Ɣaysa tǝmattant ǝn Lazarǝs as dasan-immǝgrad den, mišan ǝntanay a ɣilan etǝs wa n alɣadat as igannu.
Adi a fǝl d-izalalaɣ Ɣaysa inn-asan: «Lazarǝs aba-tu.
Amaran isidawat-i as wǝr ǝlle den alwaq wǝdi, fǝlas arat wa ǝnta sǝr-wan du-z-awǝyan a sǝr-i tǝzzǝgzǝnam. Ǝmǝrǝdda ǝndawatanaq-qu.»
Inkar Tuma was gannin Eknay, inna i nǝttulab win hadatnen: «Ǝndawat nakkanay da a danaɣ-iba nǝddew dǝr-ǝs.»
As din-osa Ɣaysa ittǝmal-as as Lazarǝs iga ǝkkoz adan daɣ ǝzǝkka.
Betanǝy tǝhoz Yerusalam. Edag ǝn karad kilawtan ɣas a illan gar-essanat.
Osan-in Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud aggotnen Marta ǝd Maryama fǝl a dasnat-in-šǝwwǝškǝnan daɣ adag n amadray-nasnat.
As tǝsla Marta as Ɣaysa ihoz-du taɣrǝmt, tǝssǝlkad-as. Maryama ǝnta tǝqqim-in daɣ aɣaywan.
Tǝnna Marta i Ɣaysa: «Ǝmǝli, ǝnnar tǝlle da, wǝr zʼiba amadray-nin.
Mišan ǝmǝrǝdda da ǝssanaɣ as arat kul wa tǝgmaya daɣ Mǝššina a dak-k-agu.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Amadray-nam a d-inkǝr daɣ tǝmattant.»
Tǝnn-as Marta: «Ǝssânaɣ as amadray-nin a d-inkǝr ɣur tanakra n aytedan ǝzǝl wa ilkaman.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Nak a imosan wa d-isankaran daɣ tǝmattant, ǝmosa tǝmǝddurt. Awedan wa sǝr-i izzǝgzanan, wǝdi kud t-aba da a d-iddǝr.
Amaran awedan kul wa iddaran izzigzan sǝr-i, wǝdi wǝr ilkem ad t-aba. Tǝzzigzanaɣ adi?»
Tǝnn-as: «Awalla, Ǝmǝli, ǝzzigzanaɣ as kay a imosan Ǝlmǝsix, tǝmosa deɣ Barar ǝn Mǝššina, as ittimal as a d-asu ǝddǝnet.»
As tǝga Marta batu ta, tǝkka tǝmadrayt-net Maryama, tǝwat-tat s ahal tǝnn-as: «Ǝššex illa-da, isastan dǝr-ǝm.»
As tǝgraw Maryama isalan win, tǝggad-du, tǝssǝlkad i Ɣaysa.
As itaggu awen harwa da wǝr d-iggez taɣrǝmt, wǝr igmed edag wa daq-q in-tosa Marta.
Ǝllân Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ɣur Maryama a das-du-šiwaškannen. As tat-ǝnayan as du-tǝggad tarmad tǝqqab, ǝlkaman-as ǝɣilan ǝzǝkka a tǝkka y a fall-as tǝhallu.
As din-tosa Maryama edag wa iha Ɣaysa togg-ay ɣas tǝfataqqat ɣur daran-net, tǝnn-as: «Ǝmǝli, ǝnnar tǝlle da, wǝr zʼiba amadray-nin.»
As tat-inay Ɣaysa tǝhallu, inay Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win dǝr-ǝs d-ǝddewnen ǝntanay da ǝhallin, ikna tǝrǝmmeq, ǝɣšadan man-net.
Inn-asan: «Mǝni tu-tǝgam?» Ǝnnan-as «Ǝmǝli, ayaw tǝnǝya.»
Ad ihallu Ɣaysa.
Ǝnnan aytedan: «Ǝnawat awa dǝr togda tara ta iga y alǝs wa.»
Tǝzzar ǝnnan wiyyad daɣ-san: «Alǝs wa issǝswadan ǝmǝdderɣǝl, wǝrgeɣ ifrâg a ad igdǝl i Lazarǝs tǝmattant?»
Ilas Ɣaysa tǝrǝmmeq, tǝzzar ikka ǝzǝkka imosan akazam, tǝdbâɣ tǝhunt zǝwwǝrat.
Inna Ɣaysa: «Ǝkkǝsat tǝhunt!»
Tǝnn-as Marta ta n tamadrayt n alǝs wa aba da: «Ǝmǝli, alǝs di ǝmǝrǝdda ila aḍu, fǝlas ǝzǝl-net wa n ǝkkoz d anabal awa.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Wǝrgeɣ ǝnneɣ-am as tǝzzǝgzana ad tǝnǝyaɣ tanaya ǝn Mǝššina?»
Tǝtawakkas-du tǝhunt. Iswad Ɣaysa daɣ jǝnnawan inna: «Abba, ǝggodayaɣ-ak as di-tǝqbala tǝwatray-nin.
Nak iman-in ǝssânaɣ as faw da tǝqqabbala šiwatriwen-in. Ǝddǝlil ǝn tamattay ta di-tǝɣalayɣalayat da a fǝl dak-ǝššewala fǝl ad tǝzzǝgzǝn as kay a di-d-izammazalan.»
As iga tǝwatray ta, idkal ǝmǝsli-net inna: «Lazarǝs, ǝgmǝd-du!»
Igmad-du ǝnǝmmettǝn wa nad, ǝttâlan fassan-net ǝd daran-net ǝs tǝsǝwad, tǝlsa deɣ tǝbdoq udǝm-net. Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝkkǝsat-as itul tayyim-tu ad ijǝwǝnkǝt.»
Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud aggotnen a d-osânen Maryama, ǝnayan arat wa, ǝzzǝgzanan ǝs Ɣaysa.
Wiyyad daɣ-san amaran ǝkkan Farisaytan ǝmalan-asan awa iga Ɣaysa da.
Tǝzzar sassagan limaman win zawwarnen, ǝd Farisaytan ǝmǝnǝy ǝn muzaran ǝnnan: «Ma za nagu? Alǝs wa itaggu alɣalamaten aggotnen.»
As tu-noyya itaggu aratan win, a sǝr-ǝs ǝzzǝgzǝnan aytedan kul, tǝzzar asin-du sojitan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝrrum a dana-sitaɣmarnen, addagdagan Ehan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, ǝɣrǝdan deɣ tenaɣay ǝn tamattay-nana.
Inkar-du iyyan daɣ-san igân esǝm Kayif, imosan Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran daɣ awatay wen, inn-asan: «Kawanay wǝr tǝgrem wala.
Wǝr din-tǝgrem as ofa ad ammat awedan iyyanda daɣ adag ǝn tamattay n Israyil ketnet?»
Batu ta iga da wǝr tat-iga gar-es ǝd man-net, kalar tišit-net Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran daɣ awatay wen, a fǝl igraw ǝlwǝlayat n as Ɣaysa kundaba immut daɣ adag ǝn tamattay ketnet.
Amaran wǝrge tamattay n Israyil ɣas as tu-z-iba daɣ adag-net, kalar bararan ǝn Mǝššina kul win wazawaznen gǝr kallan a du-z-iššidǝw ǝqqǝlan tǝɣǝssa iyyadda.
Ǝzǝl wen da daɣ ǝgan muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud tanat ta n tanaɣay-net.
Awen da fǝlas abʼas itallam Ɣaysa dad ira daɣ Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud. Igmad akal wen, ikka ǝɣrǝm igân esǝm Efrayim inimahazan ǝd taneray, iqqim daɣ-as ǝnta ǝd nǝttulab-net.
Azzaman en amud ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud wa n Akkay ihoz-du. A du-gammadan aytedan idaggan aggotnen takkin-du Yerusalam, fǝl ad ǝzzǝzdǝgan dat ǝmud.
Saggadan i Ɣaysa tinǝmǝnnin gar-essan daɣ Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada: «Kawanay ak ma tǝnnam, tordâm as a d-asu amud a meɣ?»
Ǝnta ilimaman win zawwarnen ǝd Farisaytan omâran aytedan s âs i issanan edag wa iha Ɣaysa isaffagget-tu fǝl ad attarmas.
Sǝdis adan dat Ǝmud wa n Akkay ikka Ɣaysa Betanǝy, s ǝnta daɣ ixsar Lazarǝs wa d-issodar daɣ tǝmattant.
As din-osa Ɣaysa tawaggan-as mǝgura olaɣnen. A du-tǝtaway Marta imensewan, Lazarǝs amaran iha aytedan win naɣamanen ǝd Ɣaysa ǝdrâwan dǝr-ǝs.
Tǝzzar tǝdkal-du Maryama aganna ǝn litǝr n alwardi iknan šizada d əzzəwi as itawannu nar, a tu-tǝnaqqal fǝl daran ǝn Ɣaysa, tǝmmas-tan ǝs jǝkkad-net, idnay ahan aḍu n alwardi.
Inkar Yahuza Isxarǝyuti wa n iyyan daɣ nǝttulab ǝn Ɣaysa was ǝnta tu-z-agin daɣ fassan inna:
«Mafel wǝr din-nǝzzǝnza alwardi wa azrǝf a zʼawǝdan karadat tǝmad n ǝzǝl n ǝššǝɣǝl nakf-ay i tǝlǝqqawen?»
Arat wa wǝr t-inna fǝl tǝhanint i tǝlǝqqawen, kalar abaydag a imos, amaran ǝnta a ittafan ǝssǝnduq wa itaggaz ǝzrǝf ǝn nǝttulab, idakkal daɣ awa t-ihan.
Eges ya inna Ɣaysa: «Ayy-et! Alwardi wa kala da togâz-tu y ǝzǝl wad za tǝwǝga daɣ ǝzǝkka.
Šiləqqawen faw da əllânat ɣur-wan, nak amaran wǝrgeɣ faw ǝlle ɣur-wan.»
Tǝsla tamattay tagget ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud as illa Ɣaysa den tǝzzar ǝkkan ehan wen, mišan wǝrge Ɣaysa ɣas din-ǝkkan, kalar awnaf a tan-ihan ǝn Lazarǝs wa d-issǝnkar daɣ tǝmattant.
Tǝzzar ǝkkasan-du limaman win zawwarnen tanat n ad anɣin Lazarǝs ǝnta da,
fǝlas ǝddǝlil-net a fǝl dǝffǝr-san ǝfalan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud aggotnen ǝzzǝgzanan ǝs Ɣaysa.
As affaw ǝslan aytedan aggotnen a d-ǝkkanen amud, as Ɣaysa iggaz-du aɣrǝm wa n Yerusalam.
Ǝdkalan-du ilǝdlad ǝn tagayt ǝglan ǝssǝlkadan-as gannin s afalla:
«Ozana! Tǝmmal i Mǝššina!
Iga Mǝššina albaraka daɣ
wa d-osan s esǝm n Ǝmǝli!
Kay ǝmǝnokal n Israyil!»
Igraw Ɣaysa ǝhulel, iwan-tu, s ǝmmǝk wa ǝmalan Ǝlkǝttaban as ǝnnan:
«Ad wǝr tǝššǝwǝša ya wǝlǝt Sǝyon, ǝmǝnokal-nam ǝddi a din-izayan ǝddi, iwân ǝhulel.»
Arat wa wǝr t-ǝgren nǝttulab-net daɣ tizarat, mišan as igraw Ɣaysa adkul-net, ǝktan-du as aratan win ǝmâlan-tan Ǝlkǝttaban, amaran kul ǝndan fall-as.
Tamattay ta tǝmmǝgnet assaɣa wa daɣ d-iɣra Ɣaysa Lazarǝs daɣ ǝzǝkka issǝnkar-t-idu daɣ tǝmattant, tǝgǝyyat-as.
Awen da fǝl das-du-tǝssǝlkad tamattay, fǝlas ǝslân alɣalamat ta iga.
Tǝzzar ad tinǝmǝnnin Farisaytan gar-essan: «Toggâm-tu? Indar-awan a dǝr t-in-tǝkkam, har as aytedan kul ǝlkaman-as.»
Ǝllan-tu arat ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyunan ǝhanen aytedan win d-ǝkkanen Yerusalam y a daɣ-as ǝɣbǝdan Mǝššina daɣ adan en da n ǝmud en.
Ǝkkan iyyan daɣ nǝttulab ǝn Ɣaysa igan Filibus wa n tǝɣrǝmt ǝn Betsayda ta n akal ǝn Galilaya, ǝnnan-as: «Nǝgmay daɣ-ak a dana-tassakna Ɣaysa.»
Igla Filibus imal y Andrawǝs, iddew dǝr-ǝs Andrawǝs ǝmalan i Ɣaysa.
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Alwaq ewad-du ǝmǝrǝdda wa daɣ zʼǝgrǝwa nak Ag Aggadǝm adkul-in.
Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as tablalt n alkama as wǝr tǝrtek daɣ amaḍal tǝmmut, ad taglu tǝmos iyyadda, mišan as tǝmmut a du-tǝdwǝl, tagu ara aggen.
Awedan wa iran iman-net daɣ ǝddǝnet ta ad affatu daɣ alaxirat. Amaran wa irdan ad isaffatu iman-net daɣ ǝddǝnet ta, wǝdi wǝr tu-z-ǝgmǝdan, kalar ad igrǝw tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat.
Awedan kul wa iran a di-išɣǝl, ilkǝmet-i, as iga adi edag wa ǝheɣ ǝnta a zʼiggǝz, akf-ay deɣ Abba-nin almaqam.
Ǝmǝrǝdda ǝɣšâdan man-in. Ma zʼanna? Awak ad anna: "Abba safs-i daɣ assaɣat ta? Mišan wǝr d-ewedaɣ alwaq wa, âr y a fall-i agu.
Abba, sǝnnǝfilǝl tǝla-nak tanaya."» Tǝzzar igmad-du ǝmǝsli ijǝnnawan inna: «Tǝla-nin tanaya ǝsinafalalaq-qat, amaran a tat-ǝlǝsaɣ ǝsǝnnǝfilǝl.»
Tamattay ta tǝllat den, tǝsla y ǝmǝsli wa, a tǝɣil eggag. Ad ǝgannin wiyyad: «Angalos das-iššewalan den.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝmǝsli wa wǝrgeɣ ǝddǝlil-in a fǝl d-iga, kalar ǝddǝlil-nawan kawanay.
Ǝmǝrǝdda ad za tǝtǝwǝxkǝm ǝddǝnet ta, itǝwǝstǝɣ ǝmǝnokal-net Iblis.
Amaran nak as tawasahake fǝl amaḍal ǝwara tǝgǝttawt, a d-aɣraɣ aytedan kul ǝs man-in.»
Batu ta isidagan sǝr-ǝs tǝmǝwit tas tu-z-iba.
Tǝnn-as tamattay: «Nǝnây daɣ Awal ǝn Mǝššina as Ǝlmǝsix ad agu tǝmǝddurt tǝɣlalat. Manǝmmǝk amaran as dana-za-tannaɣ Ag Aggadǝm ad itǝwǝsǝhukǝt fǝl amaḍal? Ma imos Ag Aggadǝm was tǝgannaɣ ǝddi?»
Tǝzzar inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ǝnnur harwa da illa ɣur-wan, har agin arat n azzaman. Jǝwǝnkǝtat iket di ad t-illa fǝl a kawan-wǝr-ǝɣdǝrnat šiyyay, fǝlas wa ijawanken daɣ šiyyay, adi wǝr issen sas idag.
Zǝgzǝnat s ǝnnur harwa togazam, fǝl ad tǝqqǝlam kǝl ǝnnur.»
As iɣrad Ɣaysa igi ǝn batu ta igguk-kan, ikka edag wǝr ǝssenan.
Alɣalamaten aggotnen šin iga Ɣaysa dat-san, wǝr sǝr-san d ewaynat as sǝr-ǝs ǝzzǝgzǝnan,
fǝl ad tandu batu ta iga ǝnnǝbi Isayas as inna:
«Ǝmǝli, ma imos wa izzǝgzanan s arat wa nǝmal? Ma imos was tǝnafalal tarna n Ǝmǝli?»
Ǝddǝlil wa fǝl wǝr ǝfregan ad ǝzzǝgzanan da imal-tu ǝnnǝbi Isayas as inna:
«Mǝššina a tan-isaddarɣalan, issǝɣar iwallan-nasan, fǝl ad ibʼas hannaynat šittawen-nasan, ibʼas garrin wallan-nasan, fǝl ad wǝr utaban, izzuzǝy-tan.»
Aratan win inn-en Isayas fǝlas inây tanaya ǝn Ɣaysa, immigrad deɣ daɣ batu ǝn Ɣaysa.

As iga awen imuzaran iman-nasan da a daɣ-san aggen ǝzzigzanan ǝs Ɣaysa, mišan wǝr ǝhelan emel n awen fǝl tǝksǝda ǝn Farisaytan, fǝlas wǝr aren ad tǝwǝkkǝsan daɣ ǝljǝmaɣat n ahan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.
Amaran ǝssofan saɣmar wa n aytedan tanaya ta ihakku Mǝššina.
Idkal Ɣaysa ǝmǝsli-net inna: «Awedan wa sǝr-i izzǝgzanan, wǝrge nak ɣas as izzǝgzan, kalar wa di-d-izammazalan da izzigzan sǝr-ǝs.
Amaran wa daɣ-i iswadan, adi wa di-d-izammazalan a daɣ iswad.
Nak zun ǝnnur a mosa, ǝkke-du ǝddǝnet y âs i sǝr-i izzǝgzanan wǝr zʼaqqam daɣ šiyyay.
As isla awedan i batuten-in iqqim wǝr tanat-ittef, wǝrge nak a tu-z-awwaddaban, fǝlas nak efsan n aytedan a d-ǝkke s ǝddǝnet, wǝrgeɣ attadib-nasan.
Daɣ adi awedan kul wa di-olkan, iqqim wǝr iga tenbay daɣ batuten-in, wǝdi ill-ay wa tu-z-awwaddaban. Awal iman-net wa da ǝge da, a das-z-išrǝɣan ǝzǝl wa ilkaman.
Fǝlas aratan win dawan-ǝmala da, wǝrgeɣ nak a tan-d-inzaman gǝr-i ǝd man-in, kalar Abba wa di-d-izammazalan iman-net as di-omar s arat was di-iwar ad t-anna, ǝd was di-iwar a fall-as ammagrada.
Ǝssânaɣ as arat was omar ǝnta a itawayan ǝs tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat. Daɣ adi arat was ǝmmǝgrada, ǝmmǝk wa daɣ as di-t-imal Abba ǝnta as sǝr-ǝs ǝmmǝgrada.»
Ahad wa oggan amud wa n Akkay, issân Ɣaysa as alwaq-net osa-du wa daɣ zʼigmǝd ǝddǝnet iqqǝl Abba. Ɣaysa faw da isaknu inǝttulab-net tara, amaran ǝmǝrǝdda isannahal-tan ǝsǝkni ǝn tara ta dasan-iga.
Itamansaw Ɣaysa ǝd nǝttulab-net ehad, as itaggu awen da Iblis igâ daɣ ǝwǝl ǝn Yahuza wa n ag Simɣon Isxarǝyuti tǝkaddilt-net.
Issân Ɣaysa as Mǝššina di n Abba igâ arat kul daɣ ǝfus-net, issân deɣ as igmâd-du Mǝššina amaran ad t-iqqǝl.
Ibdad fǝl mensewan, ikkas takadkat-net ta n afalla, idkal afǝr igbas-tu,
tǝzzar iga aman daɣ ǝɣlal, ad išarad idaran ǝn nǝttulab-net, immas-tan s ǝfǝr wa igbas da.
As d-ewad Ɣaysa Simɣon Butros inn-as: «Ǝmǝli, kay, a zʼišširǝdan idaran-nin?»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Awa tagga da wǝr tǝfrega ǝgǝrri-net ǝmǝrǝdda mišan a tu-tagra dǝffǝr awa.»
Inn-as Butros: «Kay, ad tǝšširǝda idaran-in? Wala ǝnǝmihaz!» Inn-as Ɣaysa: «As dak-kan-wǝr-ǝššorada nak dǝr-ǝk nǝmmizzay.»
Inn-as Simɣon Butros: «Daɣ adi Ǝmǝli, wǝrge idaran-nin ɣas, širǝd harkid fassan-in d aɣaf-in.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Awedan iššoradan, wǝr iddarar ar ǝširǝd ǝn daran fǝl ad izdag ketnet, amaran kawanay, tǝzǝddigam, mišan wǝrge ketnawan.»
Ɣaysa issân wa tu-z-akkaddalan; adi a fǝl inna: «Wǝr tǝzǝddigam ketnawan.»
As iɣrad Ɣaysa ǝširǝd ǝn daran-nasan, izlag takadkat-net, iqqal edag-net, inn-asan: «Awak tǝgrâm awa dawan-ǝge da?
Tǝgannim-i "Amǝsǝsseɣri" d "Ǝmǝli", tǝgannim a olaɣan, fǝlas ǝmosaq-qan.
Daɣ adi dad zamas nak imosan Ǝmǝli d Ǝmǝsǝsseɣri, ǝššorada idaran-nawan, iwâr-kawan, kawanay da, daɣ ilkam a, ad tǝtimaširidam idaran.
Ǝsǝknaq-qawan arat wa fǝl a tu-tǝtaggim kawanay da s ǝmmǝk was dawan-t-ǝge.
Ǝggǝyyeɣ silakanaɣ-awan as, akli wǝr oger mǝššis, anammazal deɣ wǝr oger wa t-id-izammazalan.
Dad zamas tǝssânam aratan win, wǝdi tǝbbilalam kudis tǝtamazalam-tan.
Wǝr dawan-ganna ketnawan; win sannafrana kul ǝzdâyaq-qan amaran kundaba inda awa imal Awal ǝn Mǝššina as inna:
"Wa dǝr ǝdrawa, iqqal amaksan-in."
Arat wa, as igâ ad tǝzzǝgzǝnam as nak a imosan "Wa Illan da." Adi da a fǝl dawan-t-ǝnneɣ ǝmǝrǝdda harwa wǝr iga.
Ǝggǝyyeɣ silakanaɣ-awan as wa iqbalan iyyan daɣ nǝmmuzal-in, nak iman-in a iqbal. Harwa wa di-iqbalan, wa di-d-izammazalan a iqbal.»
As inna Ɣaysa awen, ǝɣšadan man-net, tǝzzar inna: «Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as iyyan daɣ-wan a di-z-aggin daɣ fassan.»
Ad tinǝmǝswidan nǝttulab-net, ǝqqânan ɣafawan-nasan i was igannu.
Iyyan daɣ nǝttulab-net, wa isannahal Ɣaysa tara, isiɣamar daɣ ihǝz n ǝdmaran ǝn Ɣaysa.
Isaddagan-as Simɣon Butros ad issǝstǝn Ɣaysa ǝd was igannu.
Tǝzzar inaz-in ǝnattalib wen fǝl ǝdmaran ǝn Ɣaysa, inn-as: «Ǝmǝli, ma zʼiqqǝl?»
Ijjǝwwab-as Ɣaysa inn-as: «Wa ǝkfe akarammu ǝn tǝgǝlla wa zʼǝssǝlmǝɣa daɣ ǝdrǝz a.» Tǝzzar issǝlmaɣ akarammu ǝn tǝgǝlla ikf-ay i Yahuza ag Simɣon Isxarǝyuti.
As igraw Yahuza akarammu wen, iggaz-tu Aššaytan. Tǝzzar inn-as Ɣaysa: «Tagaɣet tarmad awa kay-iwaran.»
Awa fǝl inna Ɣaysa awen i Yahuza, wǝr iha inǝttulab-net win hadatnen siɣamarnen den tattin i t-igrân.
Wiyyad ordân as, iduf wa iga Yahuza azrǝf ǝn nǝttulab a fǝl das-inna Ɣaysa: «Zanza-du arat was za naddarar y ǝmud; madeɣ akfu šilǝqqawen arat iyyan.»
Ibaz Yahuza akarammu ǝn tagǝlla, igmad tarmad, as itaggu awen da ehad igâ.
As igmad Yahuza, inna Ɣaysa: «Ǝmǝrǝdda tanaya-nin nak Ag Aggadǝm tǝnîfalal, tǝnifalal daɣ-i deɣ tanaya ǝn Mǝššina.
Dad zamas tanaya ǝn Mǝššina tǝnifalal daɣ-i, Mǝššina da ad isǝnnǝfilǝl daɣ man-net tanaya-nin nak Ag Aggadǝm daɣ alwaq ihozan wǝllen.
Imaran-in, alwaq wǝr nǝggǝt a ɣur-wan zʼaga. A di-tǝgmǝyam mišan edag wa ǝkkeɣ wǝr tǝfregam a t-in-tawǝdam. Kala ad ǝnneɣ adi i Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, amaran kawanay da ǝmǝrǝdda ǝnneɣ-awan-tu.
A kawan-akfaɣ alwajib aynayan, a t-imosan as namariwat. Namariwat kawanay da s ǝmmǝk was kawan-are.
As tǝnamaram, ad issusǝn adi aytedan kul as kawanay inǝttulab-in.»
Inn-as Simɣon Butros: «Ǝmǝli, mǝnid tǝkke.» Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Edag wa ǝkke, wǝr tǝfrega a di-sǝr-ǝs-tǝlkǝma ǝmǝrǝdda, eges a din-tǝlkǝma dǝffǝr awa.»
Inn-as Simɣon Butros: «Ǝmǝli, mafel as wǝr ǝfrega a dak sǝr-ǝs ǝlkǝma ǝmǝrǝdda. Ǝgaraɣ iri y a fall-ak akfa iman-nin.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Adis a fall-i takfaɣ iman-nak? Ǝggǝyyeɣ silakanaɣ-ak as wǝr zʼaɣru ǝkǝji aɣora wǝr di-tǝggeda har karadat tăklaten.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ad wǝr tǝššǝwǝšam, zǝgzǝnat ǝs Mǝššina, tǝzzǝgzǝnam sǝr-i nak da.
Ehan n Abba-nin ahân-tu daggan aggotnen ǝn tǝmǝxsurt. Awak ǝnnar wǝr iga adi manǝmmǝk as dawan-z-anna ad agla sǝmmutǝgaɣ-awan edag tǝzdaɣam?
As tu-sammataga, ad d-ǝqqala, idawaɣ-in dǝr-wan fǝl ad tǝggǝzam edag wa ǝhe.
Edag wa ǝkke tǝssânam tarrayt-net.»
Inn-as Tuma: «Ǝmǝli wǝr nǝssen dad tǝkke, manǝmmǝk as za nǝssǝn tarrayt-net?»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Nak a imosan tarrayt id ǝmosa tidǝt ǝmosa ǝntada wa ihakkan tǝmǝddurt. Awedan waliyyan wǝr in-z-awǝd Abba, ar ǝs tarrayt-in.
Ǝnnar tǝssânam awa mosa, tǝssǝnam awa imos Abba-nin da. Ǝmǝrǝdda tǝssânam awa imos, amaran tǝnayam-tu.»
Inn-as Filibus: «Ǝmǝli, susǝn-anaɣ awa imos Abba, igd-ana adi.»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Filibus, ǝruwaɣ as dǝr-wan ǝddewa, eges harwa da wǝr tǝssenaɣ awa mosa? Wǝr tǝssenaɣ as wa di-inayan inây Abba! Daɣ adi manǝmmǝk as tǝganna: "Susǝn-anaɣ awa imos Abba?"
Wǝr tǝzzǝgzanaɣ as, nak d Abba arat iyyanda a nǝmos? Aratan win dawan-ǝmala da wǝrgeɣ nak a tan-d-inzaman gǝr-i ǝd man-in, kalar Abba dǝr ǝmosaɣ arat iyyanda a isandan igitan-net.
Zǝgzanat-i, nak d Abba arat iyyanda a nǝmos; kud ǝzǝgzan a wǝr tǝgem s awa ǝnne, zǝgzǝnat fǝl ǝddǝlil ǝn mazalan win as di-tǝnayam taggaq-qan.
Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-awan as wa sǝr-i izzǝgzanan, ad agu imazalan win tagga. Fadda ad agu win tan-ogarnen, fǝlas nak abba a zʼakka.
Amaran a iqqal arat wa tǝgmayam s esǝm-in ad t-aga, fǝl ad tǝtǝwǝnǝy tanaya n Abba daɣ Barar.
As daɣ-i tǝgmayam arat a iqqal s esǝm-in, ad t-aga.
Kud tara a di-tǝgam, tǝttǝfam alwajiban-in.
Amaran ad ǝgmǝya daɣ Abba a kawan-akfu ǝmadhal iyyan a ɣur-wan zʼimǝlan har faw.

Ǝnta a imosan Infas wa isinǝfililan tidǝt, as wǝr tǝfreg ǝddǝnet ǝlqǝbulat-net, fǝlas wǝr tu-tǝhǝnnǝy wala da tǝzday-tu; eges kawanay tǝzdâyam-tu fǝlas ihoz-kawan amaran ad iggǝz iwallan-nawan har faw.
Wǝr kawan-z-ayya daɣ ǝddǝnet tǝmosam šilat ǝn gugelan, a kawan-d-ǝqqǝla.
Dǝffǝr alwaq wǝr nǝggǝt, ǝddǝnet wǝr di-za-tǝlǝs anay; eges kawanay a di-tǝlǝsam anay fǝlas ǝddâra, kawanay da ad tǝddǝram.
Alwaq wǝdi ad tǝssǝnam as nak d Abba-nin arat iyyanda a nǝmos, tǝssǝnam deɣ as tǝhâm ǝwǝl-in, nak da aheɣ win-nawan.
Wa ittafan alwajiban-in, ǝnta a di-iran. Wa di-iran ad t-iru Abba-nin, ireq-qu nak da, sǝnnǝfilǝlaɣ-as iman-in.»
Inn-as Yahuza wa wǝr nǝmos ag Isxarǝyuti: «Ǝmǝli, manǝmmǝk as dana-za-tǝsǝnnǝfilǝlaɣ iman-nak nakkanay ɣas, wǝr tan-tǝssosana y ǝddǝnet?»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Awedan wa di-iran, ad ittǝf awa ǝnne, ir-ay Abba-nin, nas-ay-du nǝmǝl ɣur-ǝs.
Wa di-wǝr-nǝra, wǝdi wǝr ǝttef batuten-in; amaran batu tas tǝsallim da, wǝrge nak a tat-igan kala ar šin Abba s ǝnta a di-d-izammazalan.
Ǝgeɣ-awan-tat harwa kawan-ǝhe.
Amaran ǝmadhal imosan Infas wa Zǝddigan wa dawan-du-z-assaglu Abba s ǝsǝm-in, a kawan-isassaɣru aratan kul, assakt-iwan-du arat kul wa dawan-ǝnne nak iman-in.
Oyyeɣ-awan-du alxer, ǝkfeq-qawan alxer wa-nin; nak wǝr dawan-t-ǝkfeɣ ǝs tǝmǝwit tas tu-tǝhakku ǝddǝnet; ad wǝr tǝššǝwǝšam wala tǝggǝz-kawan tasa.
Tǝslâm-i as dawan-ǝnne: "Teklay a ǝgeɣ", ǝnneɣ harwa: "A kawan-d-ǝqqǝla." Ǝnnar ixsâl as di-tǝrâm, tǝsǝffǝliwǝset-kawan tǝnna ta ǝgeɣ: "Ǝqqalaɣ Abba", fǝlas Abba ogar-i.
Amaran aratan win, ǝmâlaɣ-awan-tan ǝmǝrǝdda harwa wǝr ǝgen, fǝl a sǝr-i tǝzzǝgzǝnam alwaq wad zʼagin.
Wǝr dǝr-wan zʼǝlǝsa igi ǝn batu tagget, fǝlas ǝmǝnokal n ǝddǝnet izay-du. Wǝr di-in-ikka d arat,
mišan kundaba ǝgeɣ awas di-omar Abba, tǝssǝn ǝddǝnet deɣ as areɣ Abba.» As iɣrad batu ta inn-asan: «Ǝnkǝrat ǝgmǝdatana edag a.»
Inna Ɣaysa i nǝttulab-net: «Nak a imosan esab n alɣanab wa olaɣan, Abba-nin imos mǝššis.
Alǝdlid-in kul wa wǝr nǝtirǝw ad t-ixtǝs, wa itarawan ad t-ifnǝz fǝl ad d-inzǝr agu ara aggen.
Zun d adi da, kawanay da eway-du sǝr-wan awal-in tazdak;
agiwat dǝr-i tartǝyt šilat ǝn ta dǝr-wan ǝge, aẓǝl wǝr zʼarǝw ɣas-net as d-iqqǝtas daɣ ašǝk; kawanay da ǝlmital di da a tǝham as dǝr-i wǝr tǝrtayam.
Nak a imosan esab n alɣanab, kawanay ilǝdlad-net. Wa dǝr-i igan tartǝyt ta dǝr-ǝs ǝge, a t-idu-tǝgmǝd tǝnfa tagget fǝlas as daɣ-i in-tǝqqǝtasam wǝr tǝfregam wala.
Wa dǝr-i wǝr nǝrtay, a din-itǝwǝgǝr šilat n ǝlǝdlid iqqitasan, aqqar, itǝwǝkǝmmǝd-du, itǝwǝgǝr daɣ tǝmsay, ibǝlǝglǝg.
As dǝr-i tǝrtayam, tǝttafam batuten-in, ǝgmǝyat daɣ Mǝššina di n Abba arat kul wa tǝram, a tu-tǝgrawam.
Ǝnta da awas tǝtâwanay tanaya n Abba-nin: a du-tarǝwam tǝnfa tagget, assaknu adi as tǝmosam inǝttulab-in.
Tara ta di-iga Abba, ǝnta a dawan-ǝge; ǝttǝfat-tat.
As imos as tǝttâfam alwajiban-in, wǝdi tǝhâm tara-nin zund ǝmmǝk as nak da ǝttafa win Abba, ǝhe tara-net.
Ǝnneɣ-awan adi fǝl ad tagim tǝfalawist zun ta ǝgeɣ, tagim deɣ tǝfalawist tǝkmâlat.
Ǝnta da alwajib wa-nin: "Namariwat s ǝmmǝk was kawan-are."
Wǝr tu-tǝlla tara togarat ad akfu awedan iman-net fǝl midawan-net.
As imos as tǝtaggim awas kawan-omara, wǝdi kawanay imidawan-in.
Wǝr dawan-gannaɣ eklan, fǝlas akli wǝr itǝssǝn arat wa itag mǝššis. Kala kalar a dawan-gannaɣ imidawan-in, fǝlas awas ǝsleɣ ɣur Abba-nin kul ǝssosanaɣ-awan-tu.

Wǝr di-tǝsannafranam, kawanay amaran, nak a kawan-isannafranan; ǝssiwaraq-qawan ad taglim, tammazalam awa tǝha tǝnfa tagget ɣur Mǝššina. Tǝnfa di da ta za tahagit. A tǝgmayam deɣ daɣ Abba s ǝsǝm-in a dawan-t-agu.
Omâraq-qawan s ad tǝnǝmǝrim.
Kud gezzar a kawan-tǝga ǝddǝnet, ǝssǝnat as tǝgzâr-i dat-wan.
Kud kawanay ǝddǝnet kawan-tǝlat, wǝdi ǝddǝnet tǝrâ wa tǝla; mišan wǝr kawan-tǝla, fǝlas nak kawan daɣ-as d-isannafranan, adi a fǝl kawan-tǝgzar.
Aktiwat-du awa dawan-ǝnneɣ, as: "Akli wǝr oger mǝššis." Kud ǝsǝkni a di-ǝgan alɣazab, a dawan-t-assaknin kawanay da; kud tǝrǝddawt a ǝgan s awal-in, wǝdi kawanay da, ad ardin ǝs wa-nawan.
Adi kul, ǝddǝlil-in a fǝl dawan-tu-z-agin; fǝlas wǝr ǝssenan wa di-d-izammazalan.
Ǝnnar du-wǝr-ose, ǝššewalaɣ-asan, wǝr zʼattarmasan ǝs bakkadan-nasan, eges ǝmǝrǝdda wǝr t-illa ǝsaru waliyyan a dasan-z-igdǝlan a sǝr-san attarmasan.
Wa di-igzaran, igzâr Abba-nin ǝnta da.
Ǝnnar wǝr ǝge gar-essan imazalan ǝs wǝr t-illa awedan as kala tan-iga, wǝr zʼattarmasan ǝs bakkadan-nasan. Ǝnayan-tan eges ǝglan ǝgzâran-ana nak d Abba-nin.
Mišan adi igâ fǝl ad tandu batu ta tǝtawaktabat daɣ Ǝttawret, tǝnnât:
"Ǝgzaran-i bannan."
As d-osa ǝmadhal wa dawan-du-z-assagla ɣur Abba, imosan Infas wa isinǝfililan tidǝt a sǝr-wan du-z-igmǝdan Abba, a fall-i aggayyat.
Kawanay da, a fall-i taggayyem, fǝlas tǝddewam dǝr-i harwa ɣur tizarat.»
«Ǝmâlaɣ-awan adi fǝl a kawan-wǝr-igmǝd ǝzǝgzan-nawan.
Ad tǝtǝwǝkkǝsam daɣ ǝljǝmaɣat ǝn nan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, fadda ilkâm alwaq daɣ-as wa daɣ-wan ikkasan iman, illa ɣur-ǝs as tara ǝn Mǝššina a immozal den.
Adi a dawan-z-agin aytedan fǝlas wǝrmad a di-ǝzdayan wala ǝssânan Abba.

Ǝmâlaɣ-awan aratan di ǝmǝrǝdda, fǝl a tan-du-taktim as d-ewad alwaq wa daɣ zʼagin aytedan tara-nasan. Aratan win wǝr dawan-tan-ǝmela daɣ tizarat n ǝššǝɣǝl-in ɣur-wan, fǝlas alwaq wǝdi harwa da ǝddewa dǝr-wan.»
«Ǝmǝrǝdda ad ǝqqǝla wa di-d-izammazalan, mišan wǝr kawan-iha i di-issistanan ǝd dad ǝkke.
Eges ǝknân man-nawan aɣšud fǝl as dawan-ǝnneɣ adi.
Dǝr iga adi da ya, a dawan-ǝmǝla tidǝt: of-awan ad agla, fǝlas as wǝr ǝgle wǝr kawan-du-z-asu Ǝmadhal, as ǝgle amaran a dawan-t-id-assagla.
As d-osa ad issusǝn aytedan n ǝddǝnet as ǝxrâkan daɣ batu n awa imosan abakkad, d awa imosan taqqat ǝn Mǝššina d awa imosan ǝššǝriɣa-net.
Issusǝn-tan as ǝxrâkan daɣ batu n awa imos abakkad fǝlas tugǝyt a ǝgan a sǝr-i ǝzzǝgzǝnan.
Issusǝn-tan as ǝxrâkan daɣ batu n awa imosan taqqat fǝlas tewaɣlay a ǝgeɣ Abba amaran wǝr zʼǝlǝsaɣ ǝtǝwǝnay.
Issusǝn-tan as ǝxrâkan daɣ batu n awa imosan ǝššǝriɣa ǝn Mǝššina fǝlas ǝmǝnokal n ǝddǝnet, a t-imosan Iblis, ibâz-tu ǝššǝriɣa.
Harwada ǝle batuten aggotnen as are a dawan-tanat-aga eges wǝr dasnat-tǝzmeram ǝmǝrǝdda.

As d-osa Infas wa Zǝddigan isinifililan tidǝt, a kawan-issǝlkǝm i tidǝt kul ta du-tǝfalat Mǝššina fǝlas batuten-net wǝrgeɣ ǝnta a du-z-ǝgmǝdnat, awa as zʼaslu ɣas a daɣ dawan-z-iššiwǝl ketnet, imǝl-awan aratan win d-ǝzaynen,
issǝɣmǝr-i fǝlas awa zʼigrǝw daɣ awa ǝle a dawan-z-imǝl.
Awa ila Abba ketnet i-nin nak da; adi a fǝl dawan-ǝnne, awa igraw Infas wa Zǝddigan daɣ awa ǝle a dawan-z-imǝl.»
«A dawan-ǝgmǝdaɣ anay dǝffǝr alwaq wǝr nǝggǝt, mišan a di-tǝlǝsam anay daɣ adan wǝr nǝggǝt dǝffǝr adi.»

Tǝzzar namannan wiyyad daɣ nǝttulab-net: «Ma imos almaɣna n awa danaɣ-inna da: "A dawan-ǝgmǝdaɣ anay dǝffǝr alwaq wǝr nǝggǝt, mišan a di-tǝlǝsam anay daɣ adan wǝr nǝggǝt dǝffǝr adi?" Ma imos deɣ almaɣna n "Abba a ǝkke"?
Ma imos almaɣna ǝn "daɣ alwaq wǝr nǝggǝt" wa imal da? Arat wa daɣ iššewal da wǝr tu-nǝgra.»
Issan Ɣaysa as ǝrân ad t-ǝsǝstanan. Inn-asan: «Tǝtinamasǝstinam fǝlas ǝnne: "A dawan-ǝgmǝdaɣ anay dǝffǝr alwaq wǝr nǝggǝt, mišan a di-tǝlǝsam anay daɣ adan wǝr nǝggǝt dǝffǝr adi."
Ǝggǝyyeɣ silakanaɣ-awan as ad talim, tǝsǝkkǝlǝlam mišan aytedan n ǝddǝnet ǝntanay ǝddǝwen. Ad ǝɣšǝdan man-nawan eges aɣšud di a tu-tǝzrǝy tǝdǝwit.
Tantut as tǝtaggaz amaḍal, ad ǝɣšǝdan man-net fǝl aggad wa du-tǝga alwaq-net; mišan as d-ihu barar-net, ad tammazzay d ǝsǝmmǝdrǝn daɣ arkanay wa tǝnay, isǝddǝwat-tat as du-tǝga awedan daɣ ǝddǝnet.
Kawanay da zun d adi da, ǝmǝrǝdda ǝɣšâdan man-nawan, mišan a kawan-ǝlǝsaɣ anay, ǝzǝl wǝdi ad tagim tǝdǝwit as tu-wǝr-illa i daɣ-wan tat-z-ikkǝsan.
Wǝr di-za-tǝssǝstanam d arat waliyyan ǝzǝl wǝdi. Ǝggǝyyeɣ silakanaɣ-awan as, a tǝgmayam daɣ Abba s esǝm-in a dawan-t-agu.
Harwada wǝr t-illa a tǝgmâyam s esǝm-in. Ǝgmǝyat ad tǝgrǝwam fǝl ad tagim tǝdǝwit tǝkmâlat.»
«Ǝmâlaɣ-awan adi s ǝlmital, mišan ilkâm alwaq daɣ awan-wǝr-z-ǝlasaɣ emel n arat waliyyan iqqâlan Abba s ǝlmital, kalar a dawan-t-ǝmǝla s awa imos.
Alwaq wǝdi ad tǝgmǝyam daɣ Abba s esǝm-in. Wǝr dawan-ǝnne a dawan-t-ansǝya,
fǝlas Abba iman-net ir-iwan fǝl as di-tǝram, tǝzzigzanam deɣ as ɣur-ǝs d-ǝgmâda.
Abba a ɣur d-ǝgmada, ose-du ǝddǝnet amaran ǝmǝrǝdda a tat-ǝgmǝda ǝqqǝlaq-qu.»
Tǝzzar ǝnnan-as nǝttulab-net: «Ǝnǝy, ǝmǝrǝdda tǝmmalaɣ-anaɣ aratan s awa mosan, wǝrge s ǝlmital.
Nǝssăn as tǝssâna daɣ arat kul, wǝr t-illa arat a iqqal a dak-iɣbaran; adi da a fǝl nǝzzǝgzan as Abba a ɣur du-tǝgmada.»
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Adis ǝmǝrǝdda tǝzzǝgzanam?
Ǝnǝyat, alwaq ihoz, fadda iga, wa daɣ za tǝtǝwǝzǝwǝziwizam, akkiyyan ikka aɣaywan-net, tayyim-i-d ɣas-in; mišan ya wǝr ǝmosa ɣas-in fǝlas illa ɣur-i Abba.
Ǝmâlaɣ-awan arat wa fǝl ad tǝgrǝwam alxer daɣ tǝrtǝyt ta dǝr-i tǝgam. Ad tǝnǝyam arkanay daɣ ǝddǝnet, ad wǝr tiksadam wala, fǝlas ǝddǝnet ǝrzêq-qat.»
As inna Ɣaysa awen, idkal asawad-net iggǝzzay ijǝnnawan, ittar inna:
«Abba, alwaq ewad-du, saknu tanaya ǝn Barar-nak fǝl ad assaknu ǝnta da ta nak,
id tǝzzozaraq-qu y aytedan kul fǝl ad akfu tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat i win tu-tǝkfe.
Amaran tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat awa tat-imosan, ad inǝfilǝl y aytedan awa tǝmosa, kay a imosan Mǝššina wa n tidǝt; inǝfilǝl-asan ǝntada as Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix a du-tǝzammazala.
Ǝssikna tanaya-nak fǝl amaḍal s ǝsǝndi wa ǝge ǝššǝɣǝl was di-tǝssǝwaraɣ igi-net.
Amaran ǝmǝrǝdda kay Abba, akf-i ɣur man-nak tanaya ta ɣur-ǝk ǝleɣ harwa dat ǝxluk n ǝddǝnet.
Sinafâlalaɣ awa tǝmosa y aytedan win du-tǝsannafrana tǝskataq-qan-du daɣ ǝddǝnet, tǝgeq-qan daɣ ǝfus-in ǝttafan awal-nak.
Ǝmǝrǝdda ǝssânan as arat kul wa di-tǝkfe, kay a ɣur d-igmad.
Fǝlas ǝmâlaɣ-asan awa di-tǝnne, ǝqbalan-tu, amaran silakanan as kay a ɣur d-ǝgmada, ǝzzigzanan deɣ as di-du-tǝzimazala.
Wǝr kay-tinsǝya y aytedan win ǝddǝnet, kalar aytedan win di-tǝkfe as kay-tansayaɣ fǝlas ǝntanay a tǝleɣ.
Awa ǝle kul i-nak, kay da awa tǝle kul i-nu; amaran ǝntanay en da a daɣ tǝnafalal tanaya-nin.
Nak, abʼas aheɣ ǝddǝnet, kay a din-ǝkke, ǝntanay amaran ǝhân-tat. Ya Abba di zǝddigan, agǝz-tan s esǝm-nak wa di-tǝkfeɣ, fǝl ad ǝqqǝlan arat iyyanda šilat ǝn wa dǝr-ǝk ǝmosa.
Harwa tan-ǝhe, ogâzaq-qan s esǝm-nak, a di-tǝkfê, wǝr daɣ-san ixrek waliyyan ar wa ixrakan fǝl ad andu awa ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban.
Ǝmǝrǝdda kay a din-ǝkke, gannaɣ awa harwa ǝheɣ ǝddǝnet fǝl ad agin tǝfalawist tǝndât ta da ǝgeɣ.
Ǝmâlaɣ-asan awal-nak tǝgzar-tan ǝddǝnet fǝlas wǝr tan-tǝla zun d as nak iman-in da wǝr di-tǝla.
Wǝr daɣ-ak ǝgmaya a tan-tǝkkǝsa daɣ ǝddǝnet, mišan ǝgmâya daɣ-ak a tan-tagǝza daɣ Iblis.
Wǝr tan-tǝla ǝddǝnet, zun d as nak iman-in da wǝr di-tǝla.
Zǝzdǝg iwallan-nasan s awal-nak imosan tidǝt.
Ǝzǝmmizǝl wa di-du-tǝge s ǝddǝnet, ǝnta a tan-sǝr-ǝs-ǝge nak da.
Amaran ǝkfeq-qay iman-in fǝl ǝddǝlil-nasan fǝl ad akfin win-nasan ǝntanay da ǝs tidǝt.
Wǝrgeɣ inǝttulab-in ɣas as kay-tansaya, kalar tansayaq-qay y aytedan win sǝr-i zʼǝzzǝgzǝnnen s ǝssǝbab n as ǝslan y awal-nasan.
Ǝgmâya daɣ-ak a tan-igan ketnasan arat iyyanda s ǝmmǝk was dǝr-ǝk t-ǝmosa; nǝqqǝl-tu dǝr-san nakkanay da fǝl ad tǝzzǝgzǝn ǝddǝnet as kay a di-d-izammazalan.
Ǝkfêq-qan tanaya ta di-tǝkfe, fǝl ad ǝqqǝlan arat iyyanda s ǝmmǝk was tu-nǝmos nak dǝr-ǝk.
Nak ǝrtâya dǝr-san, kay tǝrtâya dǝr-i. Ǝqqǝlanet arat iyyanda ǝs tǝmǝwit tǝndât fǝl ad tǝssǝn ǝddǝnet as kay a di-d-izammazalan tǝgeɣ-asan deɣ tara ta di-tǝge.
Abba, areɣ as win di-tǝkfe ad ǝggǝzan ǝntanay da edag wa ǝhe fǝl ad ǝhannayan tanaya ta di-tǝkfe fǝlas di-tare harwa dat ǝxluk n ǝddǝnet.
Abba, kay a oɣadan, ǝddǝnet wǝr kay-tǝssen eges nak ǝssânaq-qay amaran inǝttulab-in, ǝssânan as kay a di-d-izammazalan.
Ǝssôsanaq-qan awa tǝmosa amaran wǝr zʼammazzaya d igi n adi, fǝl a tan-tǝggǝz tara ta di-tǝgeɣ, ǝrtǝya dǝr-san.»
As iga Ɣaysa batu ta, ikka tama ta hadat n ǝgirer wa n Kedron. Iggaz afarag n eškan illân-den ǝnta ǝd nǝttulab-net.
Edag wen issân-tu Yahuza Isxarǝyuti wa zʼakkaddalan Ɣaysa, fǝlas faw da itakk-ay Ɣaysa ǝnta ǝd nǝttulab-net.
Azzar-du Yahuza y agan ǝn sojitan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝrrum, ǝd magazan n Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada a d-ǝssîglan muzaran ǝn limaman, ǝd Farisaytan, ewâyan fǝtǝlaten, ǝd belan, ǝd tǝzoli-nasan.
As din-ewadan ihoz-tan-in Ɣaysa issânan daɣ arat kul wa tu-z-igrǝwan, issǝstan-tan inn-asan: «Ma imos was tǝsaggadam?»
Ǝnnan-as: «Ɣaysa wa n Nazaret as nǝsaggad.» Inn-asan: «Nak da da.» Ibdâd gar-essan Yahuza wa t-ikkǝddalan.
Amazay wa da daɣ dasan-inna Ɣaysa: «Nak da da» ǝnta a daɣ ǝrmaɣan ǝqqalan dǝffǝr-san har udan.
Ilas Ɣaysa inn-asan: «Ma imos was tǝsaggadam?» Ǝnnan-as: «Ɣaysa wa n Nazaret as nǝsaggad.»
Inn-asan: «Wǝrgeɣ ǝnneɣ-awan nak da da. Daɣ adi kud nak as tǝsaggadam, tayyim aytedan win da ad jǝwǝnken.»
Ǝmmǝk wen da as inda awal wa iga dat awen as inna: «Wǝr daɣ-i zʼixrǝk waliyyan daɣ win di-tǝkfe.»
Ihâd-du Simɣon Butros ilbây-du takoba-net iwat sǝr-ǝs akli n Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran, ifras-du tǝmǝzzuk-net ta n ǝɣil. Akli wa esǝm-net Malxus.
Tǝzzar inna Ɣaysa i Butros: «Suɣǝl takoba-nak tǝtǝrut! Awak ad aqqama wǝr ǝgeɣ alɣazab wa di-ixkam Abba?»
Tǝzzar obazan Ɣaysa, ǝkradan-tu, ǝmosan egan ǝn sojitan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝrrum d ǝmuzar-nasan, ǝd magazan n Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada a d-ǝssiglan muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.
Ewayan-tu azzaran dǝr-ǝs s aɣaywan ǝn Xânan wa n ǝdaggal ǝn Kayif wa imosan Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran daɣ awatay wen.
Amaran Kayif ǝnta a igan i muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud tanat ta n as ofa ad ammat awedan iyyanda daɣ adag ǝn tamattay.
Ilkam Simɣon Butros i Ɣaysa ǝnta d ǝnattalib iyyan. Ǝnattalib wa izdây Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran iman-net, tǝzzar iggaz afarag wa iɣlayan aɣaywan n Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran daɣ amazay wa da daq-q iggaz Ɣaysa.
Butros ǝnta iqqim-du dat ahan, ɣur ǝmi n aɣalla. Irdaɣ-du ǝnattalib wen, igraw ɣur tǝntut ta togazat tǝsǝhǝrt ad tayyu Butros iggǝz aɣaywan.
Tǝzzar tǝnna tǝmaššaɣalt ta togazat imi n ahan i Butros: «Wǝrge kay da iyyan daɣ nǝttulab n alǝs wa a tǝmosa?» Inn-as: «Wǝr t-ǝmosa.»
Asamed igâ. Ɣilayɣalayan eklan ǝd magazan n Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada temsay ǝn tǝmakaten ǝsukusan sǝr-ǝs. Ik-en-in Butros ǝnta da ad isukus.
As itaggu awen isastan Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran Ɣaysa daɣ talɣa ǝn nǝttulab-net, d ǝsǝssǝɣri wa itaggu.

Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Awal wa ǝge y ǝddǝnet, wǝr imos arat iɣbâran. Faw da inan ǝn taɣaray ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud d Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada a daɣ sasaɣra dad ǝddewan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud kul, daɣ adi wǝr t-illa awal ǝge daɣ ǝssir.
Mafel as di-tǝsastana? Sǝstǝn aytedan win di-ǝslanen d aratan win daɣ dasan-ǝmmǝgrada; ǝntanay ǝssânan daɣ arat wa ǝnne.»
As inna Ɣaysa arat wa, iqqas-as iyyan daɣ magazan n Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada ibdâdan den, inn-as: «Ma kay-issǝhalan igi n aljawab wa y Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran?»
Ijjǝwwab-as Ɣaysa inn-as: «Kud arak batu a ǝge, ǝmǝl-i edag wa daq qat-ǝge. Kud amaran ǝgeɣ batu tolaɣat, ma imos ǝddǝlil wa fǝl di-tǝggata?»
Issǝrdaq-qu Xânan da ikrad, issok-ay Kayif wa n Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran.
As itaggu awen, Simɣon Butros illa den isukus ǝs tǝmsay en da. Itawann-as: «Wǝrge kay da arat daɣ nǝttulab n alǝs wa a tǝmosa?» Ilas Butros šigget ǝn Ɣaysa, inna: «Kala kala wǝr t-ǝmosa.»
Inkar-du iyyan daɣ eklan n Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran, imosan ǝšǝqqaɣ n alǝs was d-ifras Butros tǝmǝzzuk-net, inna i Butros: «Wǝrgeɣ ǝnâyaq-qay tǝddewa dǝr-ǝs daɣ afarag?»
Ilas Butros šigget ǝn Ɣaysa. Amazay wen da daɣ iɣra ǝkǝji aɣora.

Immeway Ɣaysa ɣur Kayif s aɣaywan n ǝnaxkim. Itaggu awen ɣur ǝfǝrirǝy n anay. Aytedan win dǝr-ǝs d-ǝddewnen wǝr dǝr-ǝs ǝggezan aɣaywan wa n ǝnaxkim, fǝl ad ǝttǝfan tazdak-nasan har atšin amensay wa n Akkay.
Awen da fǝl sǝr-san d-igmad Bilatǝs wa n ǝmuzar n akal ehan-net, ikk-en-du inn-asan: «Ma imos lahan wa fǝl tǝbazam alǝs wa?»
Ǝnnan-as: «Ǝnnar wǝr imos ǝmǝggi ǝn tǝkma, wǝr dak-k-idu-za-nawǝy».
Inn-asan Bilatǝs: «Awǝyat-tu tǝxkǝmam-as s ǝššǝriɣa wa-nawan.» Ǝnnan-as Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud: «Nakkanay wǝr nǝla turagat ǝn tanaɣay n awedan.»
Arat wa igâ fǝl ad andu awal wa iga Ɣaysa assaɣa wad imal ǝnnuɣ ǝn tǝmattant ta zʼagu.
Tǝzzar iqqal Bilatǝs ehan-net iɣr-in Ɣaysa issǝstan-tu inn-as: «Awak kay daɣ a imosan ǝmǝnokal ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud?»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Arat wa kay iman-nak as tu-tǝnne, meɣ ak aytedan wiyyad a dak-k-ǝnnanen sǝr-i?»
Inn-as Bilatǝs: «Un nak iyyan daɣ Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud a mosa? Tamattay-nak, ǝd limaman win zawwarnen a kay-d-ewaynen sǝr-i, ma imos arat wa tǝɣšada?»

Ijjǝwwab-as Ɣaysa inn-as: «Taɣmar-in wǝr tat-tǝla ǝddǝnet ta da. Ǝnnar taɣmar-in tǝll-et ǝddǝnet a, ǝnkǝrnat-du tǝɣurad-in ǝknǝsnat fǝl ad wǝr ǝggǝzaɣ ifassan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud. Kala kala, igmâd aššak as taɣmar-in wǝr tat-tǝla ǝddǝnet ta da.»

Inn-as Bilatǝs: «Ak tidǝt as kay a imosan ǝmǝnokal ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud?» Ijjǝwwab-as Ɣaysa inn-as: «Kay da tǝnneɣ adi. Awalla ǝmǝnokal a mosa. Arat da wa fǝl d-ǝhǝwa amaran ǝnta fǝl d-ǝggazaɣ ǝddǝnet a t-imosan as assa a d-ǝge y ad aggayyeɣ i tidǝt. Awedan wa ilkaman i tidǝt, kul issisam y awal-in.»
Inn-as Bilatǝs: «Tidǝt za ma tǝmos?»
Tǝzzar iqqal-du Bilatǝs Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud inn-asan: «Fǝl aganna za wa di-iqqalan nak, wǝr ǝhǝnnǝya lahan waliyyan iga alǝs wa.
Mišan ya, daɣ arat wa imosan alɣadat âs id d-iɣlay ǝmud wa n Akkay a dawan-d-ǝkkǝsaɣ iyyan daɣ mǝskǝsa-nawan. Meqqal tarâm a dawan-sassayya ǝmǝnokal ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud?»
Ǝlasan adakal ǝn maslan-nasan wǝllen ketnasan ǝnnan-as: «Kala, kala, wǝrgeɣ ǝnta! Barɣabbas as nǝra danaq-q-idu-tǝkkǝsa.» Barɣabbas wa ǝjajǝb n ǝnǝffellǝg a imos.
Tǝzzar omar Bilatǝs s ad tǝwǝgginat tǝwit n ǝlǝkkud i Ɣaysa; itawagg-as awen da.
Ǝzdăn sojitan tǝkǝbbut tǝgât ǝs šǝnnanan ǝssǝwaran-tat eɣaf-net, ǝzzǝzlagan-tu deɣ ǝbǝrnuz zaggaɣan.
Tihazan-t-in gannan-as: «Oyy-ik! Ǝmǝnokal ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud!» Taqqasan-as sa ǝd sa.
Ilas-du Bilatǝs aradaɣ, inna i Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud: «Ǝnǝyat! A dawan-t-id-ǝssǝrdǝɣa, ad tǝssǝnam as wǝr fall-as ǝnaya lahan waliyyan fǝl iwwǝddab.»
Tǝzzar irdaɣ-du Ɣaysa tǝwâr-tu tǝkǝbbut ǝn šǝnnanan, izlâg ǝbǝrnuz zaggaɣan, inn-asan Bilatǝs: «Alǝs-nawan ǝddi.»

As t-oggan muzaran ǝn limaman ǝd magazan n Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, ǝdkalan imaslan-nasan gannin: «Taytay-tu fǝl tǝgǝttawt! Taytay-tu fǝl tǝgǝttawt!» Inn-asan Bilatǝs: «Abǝzat-tu kawanay iman-nawan tattaytayam-tu, nak wǝr hǝnnǝyaɣ ǝddǝlil waliyyan a t-issiwaran tǝmattant.»
Ǝnnan-as muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud: «Nakkanay nǝla ǝššǝriɣa, amaran ǝššǝriɣa wa, ih-ay as alǝs wa ihor ǝd tǝmattant, fǝlas a inna ǝnta Barar ǝn Mǝššina a imos.»
Batu ta tǝga tasa wǝllen daɣ Bilatǝs,
iqqal ehan-net, iggaz edag wa n ǝššǝriɣa, inna i Ɣaysa: «Mǝnis du-tǝhe?» Mišan wǝr das-iga Ɣaysa aljawab waliyyan.
Amazay wen da das-inna Bilatǝs: «Nak as tugaya s a di-tǝššiwǝla? Wǝr tǝssenaɣ as ǝle fǝrregat n a kay-sassayya, ǝleɣ ǝntada fǝrregat n a kay-attaytaya fǝl tǝgǝttawt?»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Wǝr fall-i tǝle tarna waliyyat ar ta sǝr-ǝk du-tǝfalat Mǝššina. Adi da fǝlas awedan wa di-igan gǝr fassan-nak, ogar-kay igi n abakkad.»

Amazay wen da daɣ iggaz Bilatǝs šin agamay n asaway was zʼayyu Ɣaysa. Mišan ǝnkaran-du Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ad gannin s afalla: «Alǝs di as tu-tǝsassayya, wǝdi wǝr tǝmosaɣ ǝmidi ǝn Qaysara, ǝmǝnokal ǝn Kǝl-Ǝrrum, fǝlas awedan wa innan imos ǝmǝnokal, wǝdi azangaw ǝn Qaysara a imos!»
As isla Bilatǝs i batu ta, issǝrdaɣ-du Ɣaysa, tǝzzar iqqim daɣ tǝxawit ta n adag n ǝššǝriɣa. Edag wa esǝm-net «Aɣarɣar ilsân tǝsǝlit» itawann-as daɣ tǝlɣibrit «Gabbata».
Itaggu awen ammasnazal n ǝzǝl wa oggan amud wa n Akkay, simutugan aytedan y ǝmud. Inna Bilatǝs i Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud: «Ǝmǝnokal-nawan ǝddi!»

Iqqal-asan awen as sahhaken imaslan-nasan wǝllen gannin: «Ammatet! Ammatet! Taytay-tu fǝl tǝgǝttawt!» Inn-asan Bilatǝs: «Daɣ adi ad attaytayaɣ ǝmǝnokal-nawan fǝl tǝgǝttawt?» Ǝnnan-as muzaran ǝn limaman: «Ǝmǝnokal-nana wǝr t-imos ar Qaysara.»
Tǝzzar ikf-en Bilatǝs Ɣaysa y ad itǝwǝtǝytǝy fǝl tǝgǝttawt.
Ǝzzǝrgazan sojitan Ɣaysa.
Igmad aɣrǝm ewây ǝnta iman-net tǝgǝttawt ta fǝl zʼitǝwǝtǝytǝy. Ǝkkan dǝr-ǝs edag as itawannu «Tǝkǝyya», itawann-as deɣ daɣ tǝlɣibrit «Golgota».
Den da ad ǝttǝytayan sojitan Ɣaysa fǝl tǝgǝttawt. Tawataytayan ǝššin meddan wiyyad ǝntanay da fǝl tǝgǝttawen dǝgma-net, a daɣ illa Ɣaysa gar-essan.
Omar Bilatǝs s ad ammadkal ǝsǝllum itǝwǝktǝb fall-as:
, itǝwǝtǝytǝy daɣ afalla ǝn tǝgǝttawt. Itawagga awen da.
Ǝɣran Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud aggotnen ǝsǝllum wa. Ǝnta edag wa daɣ itawataytay Ɣaysa fǝl tǝgǝttawt ihoz aɣrǝm, amaran ǝsǝllum wa iktâb daɣ awal wa n tǝlɣibrit, ǝd wa n tǝlatint ǝd wa n tǝlyunant.

Ǝnnan limaman win zawwarnen ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud i Bilatǝs: «Ad wǝr tayyaɣ ǝsǝllum wa tǝssǝltaɣa tǝgǝttawt iktâb fall-as âs: "Alǝs wa ǝmǝnokal ǝn Kǝl-ǝlyǝhud", kalar ǝktǝb fall-as âs: "Alǝs da wa innan ǝnta a imosan ǝmǝnokal ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud."»
Inn-asan Bilatǝs: «Arat wa ǝktaba, wǝr-tu-za-sǝmmǝttǝya.»

As ǝttǝytayan sojitan Ɣaysa fǝl tǝgǝttawt, ǝdkalan isǝlsa-net, ǝgan-asan ǝkkozat tǝzunen, ǝkkulluk n iyyan daɣ-san igrâw iyyat. Ǝdkalan ǝntada tǝkadkat-net ta zǝwwǝrat, tǝgât daɣ tǝbdoq wǝr iha a imosan azamay, tosâɣ-du ɣur afalla har eres.
Ǝnnan gar-essan: «Ad wǝr nǝzǝzzǝrrǝt tǝkadkat ta, ofa ad nagu šišaɣeren fǝl ad nǝssǝn wa tat-z-ilen.» Arat wa ǝnnân-tu fǝl ad tandu batu tǝhât Ǝlkǝttaban ta tǝnnat:
«Ǝzunan tabdoq-in, tǝzzar ǝgan šišaɣeren fǝl tǝkadkat-in.»
Arat wen ǝnta iman-net a ǝgan sojitan win den.
Tǝgǝttawt ta fǝl ittǝytay Ɣaysa, ǝbdâdnat dagma-net tǝdoden ǝmosnen anna-net, ǝd Maryama ta n tamadrayt n anna-net, tǝmosat taɣur Klobas, ǝd Maryama Madǝl.
Ogga Ɣaysa anna-net, inay ǝnattalib-net wa n ǝmǝri-net ibdâd dagma-net, inn-as: «Anna, barar-nam ǝddi.»
Tǝzzar inna y ǝnattalib-net wen: «Anna-nak ǝddi.» Amazay wen da daɣ dǝr-ǝs iddew ǝnattalib wen s aɣaywan-net issan daɣ-as.
Dǝffǝr awen inna Ɣaysa: «Ih-i fad», fǝlas issân as arat kul ikmal, amaran arat wa wǝr t-inna ar fǝl ad andu awa ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban.
Edag en insa daɣ-as ǝɣǝzu iha bǝnegǝr, tǝmmǝdkal-du tǝduft tǝtawattal d ǝmi n agabal n ǝzzǝnǝf n ǝnniɣnaɣ iyyan idwâlan as itawannu xisof, tǝtawasalmaɣ-du daɣ bǝnegǝr wa, tǝtawazzal-in s ǝmi-net.
As izannalmaz Ɣaysa bǝnegǝr, inna: «Arat kul ikmal.» Tǝzzar issǝras eɣaf-net, ǝgmadan-tu man.

Ǝzǝl wen simutugan aytedan y ǝmud wa n Akkay. Wǝr ǝren Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ad aqqaminat alzanazaten n aytedan ǝwârnat šigǝttawen daɣ ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt-nasan. Ǝnta ǝzǝl wen, wǝr ogda ǝd win hadatnen tǝzzǝwwǝrt. Ǝkkan muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud Bilatǝs ǝnnan-as: «Amǝr s ad tawarzin daran-nasan, fǝl a tan-iba tarmad, tǝssukǝsa-du alzanazaten-nasan!»
Ǝkkan-du sojitan meddan win tawataytaynen dagma ǝn Ɣaysa. Ǝrzan idaran ǝn wa azzaran, okayan ǝs wa n ǝššin ǝgan-as awen da.
As d-ewadan Ɣaysa ǝnayan âs as d-osan da aba-tu. Ǝqqiman da wǝr ǝrzen idaran-net,
Mišan idag iyyan daɣ sojitan win tasaga ǝn Ɣaysa s allaɣ-net, iffay-du daɣ-as ǝzni d aman.
Awedan wa igan isalan win, inay-tan ǝs šittawen-net, amaran tǝgǝyya-net tidǝt a tǝmos. Issân as tidǝt ta tǝzdarat as iššewal da, fǝl ad tǝzzǝgzǝnam kawanay da.
Ǝnta aratan win kul wǝr ǝgen ar fǝl ad tandu batu tǝhât Ǝlkǝttaban ta tǝnnat:
«Eɣas-net waliyyan wǝr zʼarraz.»
Ǝlkǝttaban ih-en ǝntada as:
«Ad ǝssǝdǝgan isawadan-nasan sa sǝr wa saxxarabben.»

Dǝffǝr adi osa-du Yusǝf wa n ǝɣrǝm n Arimatay, imosan iyyan daɣ nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa, eges daɣ ǝssir, fǝlas iksud Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud. Ikka Bilatǝs igmay daɣ-as ad awǝy taɣǝssa ǝn Ɣaysa. Ikf-ay Bilatǝs turagat n awen, tǝzzar igla eway-tat.
Osa-du Nikodemos ǝnta da, s ǝnta as kala din-osa Ɣaysa ahad iyyan. Eway-du tǝfaršit daɣ ǝnɣâlan alwarditan tǝmosat amaḍal ǝn karadat tǝmǝrwen ǝn kilaw.
Idkal-du Yusǝf ǝd Nikodemos taɣǝssa ǝn Ɣaysa ǝgan-tat daɣ šifit tǝgât daɣ tǝsǝwad, ǝssǝlalan-tat aḍutan ǝzodnen win. Arat wa imos alɣadat ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud daɣ anabal ǝn nǝmmǝttan.
Edag wa daɣ itawataytay Ɣaysa fǝl tǝgǝttawt ih-ay afarag. Amaran afarag wen ih-ay ǝzǝkka imosan akazam as wǝr kala a daɣ-as itawagga ǝnǝmmettǝn.
Ǝzǝl wen ǝnta daɣ simutugan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud y ǝzǝl-nasan wa n tǝsanfawt, awen da fǝl iga Yusǝf ǝd Nikodemos Ɣaysa daɣ ǝzǝkka wa, fǝlas ǝnta a ihozan.
As affaw ǝzǝl wa n alxad, harwa da wǝr ifarayray anay, as tǝkka Maryama Madǝl ǝzǝkka. As din-tosa tǝnay as tǝhunt ta tǝharat ǝzǝkka tǝtiwakkas-du.
Tozal tǝkka Simɣon Butros d anattalib wa isannahal Ɣaysa tara tǝnn-asan: «Ǝmǝli itawakkas daɣ ǝzǝkka amaran wǝr nǝssen edag wa daɣ itawagga.»
Irdaɣ-du Butros d anattalib wa hadan ǝkkan ǝzǝkka.
Ozalan, azzar-in ǝnǝttalib wa hadan fǝlas orna Butros daɣ azzal.
Iššǝgga inay šisǝwad šin šifit ǝnsânat den, mišan wǝr iggez.
As d-ewad Simɣon Butros wa das-d-ilkaman, iggaz ǝzǝkka, inay ǝntada šisǝwad šin ǝnsânat den.
Inay asalsaw wa iwaran eɣaf ǝn Ɣaysa wǝr irtay ǝd šifit, ittâl insa s aganna.
Tǝzzar iggaz-du anattalib wa hadan, s ǝnta a d-azzaran, inay arat wa izzǝgzan-tu.
Ǝnta harwa da wǝr ǝgren batu ta tǝnnat daɣ Ǝlkǝttaban, Ǝlmǝsix kundaba inkar-du daɣ tǝmattant.
Tǝzzar ǝqqalan nǝttulab win den aɣaywan.
Tǝqqim-du Maryama tǝhallu dagma n ǝzǝkka. Tǝššǝgg-in daɣ-as,
tǝnay ǝššin angalosan ǝssimlalnen, ǝqqiman daɣ adag was kala a tu-tǝha tǝɣǝssa ǝn Ɣaysa. Iyyan illa ɣur anamod n aɣaf-net, wa hadan illa ɣur daran-net.
Ǝnnan-as: «Ma kam-isâlan, tantut?» Tǝnn-asan: «Wǝr di-isǝlu ar as immeway Ǝmǝli-nin, amaran wǝr ǝssena dad itawagga.»
As tǝnna arat wa, tǝswad dǝffǝr-ǝs, togga Ɣaysa ibdâd. Mišan wǝr tǝssen as ǝnta awen.

Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Ma kam-isâlan tantut? Ma imos was tǝsaggada?» Tǝnn-as Maryama: «Ya alǝs, kud kay a t-ewayan, tǝmǝlaɣ-i dad illa, a t-id-awǝya.» Arat wa, as das-tu-tǝnna a tǝɣil ǝmagyak n afarag wa iha ǝzǝkka a das-iššewalan den.
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Maryama!» Tǝzzar tǝmalallay-t-in tǝnn-as daɣ awal wa n tǝlɣibrit: «Rabbuni!» (Almaɣna n awen Ǝššex-in.)

Inn-as Ɣaysa: «A di-wǝr-tǝgdǝla teklay, fǝlas harwa da wǝr ǝggǝzzaya s Abba, kalar aglu ǝmǝl i mǝdrayan-in as nak ad aggazzaya s Abba-nin, s ǝnta a imosan Abba-nawan kawanay da, aggazzaya s Ǝmǝli-nin s ǝnta a imosan Ǝmǝli-nawan kawanay da.»
Tǝgla Maryama Madǝl tǝmal i nǝttulab as tǝnây Ǝmǝli, tǝmal-asan deɣ awa das-inna.
Tadwit n alxad wen da iman-net, ǝddewan nǝttulab, ǝɣfalan-du ehan fǝl man-nasan, fǝlas ǝksudan imuzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud. Osa-du Ɣaysa ibdad gar-essan inn-asan: «Alxer fall-awan!»
As dasan-inna awen issǝkn-en ifassan-net, ǝd tasaga-net. Falawasan nǝttulab fǝl anay wa ǝgan Ǝmǝli.
Ilas inn-asan: «Ig-awan Mǝššina alxer! Ǝzimazalaq-qawan s ǝmmǝk was di-d-izammazal Abba.»
As dasan-iga batu ta, issǝwad-du fall-asan s ǝmi-net, inn-asan: «Tǝgrǝwamet Infas wa Zǝddigan!
Win as tǝssorafam ibakkadan-nasan za, a dasan-tǝwǝsurǝfan, amaran win as tan-wǝr-tǝssorafam, wǝr zʼǝgrǝwan tǝsureft-nasan.»
Tuma was tǝsǝmmadǝq-net Eknay imosan iyyan daɣ nǝttulab win maraw d ǝššin, wǝr illa den as ǝnayan Ɣaysa.
As das-ǝnnan nǝttulab win: «Nǝnây Ǝmǝli!» Inn-asan: «Wǝr zʼǝzzǝgzǝnaɣ iket wǝr ǝnaya šimijar ǝn nǝsmar daɣ fassan-net, ǝdǝsaɣ idaggan-nasan s adad-in, ǝdǝsa deɣ tasaga-net s ǝfus-in.»

As ǝgan ǝttam adan dǝffǝr awen, ǝddewan-du nǝttulab ǝn Ɣaysa daɣ ahan iyyan amaran taklat ten ih-en Tuma. Iggaz-du fall-asan Ɣaysa da ǝharnat tǝsǝhar n ahan, ibdad gar-essan, inn-asan: «Ig-awan Mǝššina alxer!»
Dǝffǝr adi inna i Tuma: «Agu adad-nak da, tǝswǝda daɣ fassan-in, tǝdǝsa deɣ tasaga-nin s ǝfus-nak, tǝzzǝgzǝna taqqama da wǝr tǝqqelaɣ awedan wǝr nǝssen Mǝššina!»
Inn-as Tuma: «Ya Mǝššina di n Ǝmǝli-nin!»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Kay wǝr tǝzzǝgzana har di-tǝnaya. Ǝbbilalan aytedan win di-wǝr-nǝnay mišan ǝzzigzanan!»
Immozal Ɣaysa alɣalamaten šiyyad aggotnen dat nǝttulab-net, mišan ya wǝr sǝr-ǝsnat immǝgrad ǝlkǝttab wa.
Eges arat wa t-ihan, itiwaktab fǝl ad tǝzzǝgzǝnam as Ɣaysa ǝnta a imosan Ǝlmǝsix, imos deɣ Barar ǝn Mǝššina, amaran, as sǝr-ǝs tǝzzǝgzanam ad tǝgrǝwam tǝmǝddurt s esǝm-net.
Dǝffǝr awen ilas Ɣaysa ǝnǝfilal i nǝttulab fǝl tǝgadamayt n agaraw wa n Tiberǝyad. Ǝmmǝk da was dasan-inafalal:
Simɣon Butros, ǝd Tuma was tǝsǝmmadǝq-net Eknay, ǝd Natanǝyel wa n Kâna daɣ amaḍal ǝn Galilaya, ǝd bararan ǝn Zabaday, d ǝššin nǝttulab wiyyad, ketnasan ǝddewan.
Inn-asan Simɣon Butros: «Nak ad akkaɣ edag n abbaz ǝn kifitan.» Ǝnnan-as: «Nakkanay da nǝddew dǝr-ǝk.» Ǝglan, ǝggazan aɣlal n aman. Ahad wen wǝr obezan wala.
As affaw iwar-in Ɣaysa tǝgadamayt n agaraw, mišan wǝr ǝssenan nǝttulab-net as ǝnta awen.
Inn-asan: «Imaran-in, awak abbaz a wǝr tǝgem wala daɣ kifitan?» Ǝnnan-as: «Kala».

Inn-asan: «Ǝgǝrat ǝmǝzzezdǝr-nawan wa n abbaz ǝn kifitan fǝl aganna n ǝɣlal wa n ǝɣil, a tan-tǝgrǝwam.» Ǝgaran ǝmǝzzezdǝr-nasan daɣ agaraw, tǝzzar indar-asan a t-id-ǝdkǝlan, fǝl awa ǝgan kifitan win t-ǝhanen daɣ igǝt.
Inkar ǝnǝttalib wa isannahal Ɣaysa tara inna i Butros: «Awen Ǝmǝli!»
Da daɣ ad isla Simɣon Butros as Ǝmǝli awen, ǝnta ad iqqan asalsaw-net wa n afalla, fǝlas izzâf, tǝzzar itaraggat daɣ agaraw.
Amaḍal ǝn sanatat tǝmad n ǝɣil a ǝllanen gar-essan ǝd tǝgadamayt n agaraw. Ǝqqiman-du nǝttulab win hadatnen daɣ ǝɣlal ǝrkâban-du dǝffǝr-san ǝmǝzzezdǝr-nasan, idnây kifitan.
Ǝzzǝbben-du ɣas oggan temsay ǝn tǝmakaten fǝl naŋŋin kifitan, tǝnsa deɣ tǝgǝlla den.
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Awǝyat-du arat daɣ kifitan win du-tobazam ǝmǝrǝdda.»
Igmad-du Simɣon Butros aman illil-asan s arakab n ǝmǝzzezdǝr wa ǝhan kifitan. Temeday ǝd sǝmmosat tǝmǝrwen ǝn kifi ǝd karad ǝs kul win zawwarnen a t-ǝhanen mišan wǝr izzǝrrat.
Inn-asan Ɣaysa: «Ayewat tatšim.» Wǝr iha inǝttulab i ihalan ad issǝstǝn Ɣaysa ann-as: «Ma tǝmosa?» Fǝlas ǝssânan as Ǝmǝli awen.
Ihoz-tan-in Ɣaysa, obaz-du tagǝlla ikf-asan-tat, ikf-en ǝntada kifitan.
Taklat ta ǝnta a tǝmosat ǝnǝfilal wa n karad a d-iga Ɣaysa i nǝttulab-net dǝffǝr tanakra-net daɣ tǝmattant.

As ǝtšan inna Ɣaysa i Simɣon Butros: «Simɣon ag Yaxya, awak tidǝt as tara ta di-tǝge togar ta di-ǝgan nǝttulab win hadatnen?» Inn-as Simɣon: «Ayew Ǝmǝli, tǝssâna daɣ tara ta dak-ǝge.» Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Agǝz za ijamaran-in.»
Ig-as y ǝsǝstan wa igi wa n ǝššin inn-as: «Simɣon ag Yaxya, awak tǝreɣ-i?» Inn-as Butros: «Ayew Ǝmǝli, tǝssâna daɣ tara ta dak-ǝge.» Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Ǝqqǝl za amadan n ayfǝd-in.»

Ig-as y ǝsǝstan wa igi wa n karad inn-as: «Simɣon ag Yaxya, awak tǝreɣ-i?» Ǝɣšadan man ǝn Simɣon Butros fǝlas karad igitan das-iga Ɣaysa y ǝsǝstan wa. Inn-as: «Ǝmǝli, kay a issanan daɣ arat kul, tǝssânaɣ as ǝreq-qay.» Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Ǝssǝn za daɣ ayfǝd-in.

Ǝggǝyyeɣ ǝsilakanaɣ-ak as harwa taynaya, iman-nak as tǝlassa tabdoq-nak, tǝtakkaɣ edag was tare, mišan as tǝqqalaɣ aɣmar, ad tǝzzǝlaɣ ifassan-nak, assals-ik awedan iyyan tabdoq-nak, awǝy-kay s adag as wǝr tareɣ iki-net.»
Batu ta issoka sǝr-ǝs Ɣaysa ǝnnuɣ ǝn tǝmattant ta zʼagu Butros s ǝnta as zʼassaknu adkul wa iga i Mǝššina. As iga Ɣaysa batu ta inn-as: «Ǝlkǝm-i»

Iswad-in Butros dǝffǝr-ǝs ogga anattalib wa isannahal Ɣaysa tara ilkâm-asan-du. Anattalib wa ǝnta a isaɣɣamaran daɣ ihǝz n ǝdmaran ǝn Ɣaysa ahad wad tattin imensewan n ǝmud wa n Akkay, ǝnta deɣ as kala ad issǝstanan Ɣaysa inn-as: «Ǝmǝli, ma imos wa kay zʼakkaddalan.»
As t-ogga Butros issǝstan Ɣaysa inn-as: «Ǝnta za Ǝmǝli, ma daɣ-as ilkaman?»
Inn-as Ɣaysa: «Kud tara a ǝgeɣ ad iddǝr har d-ǝqqǝla, tǝdi wǝr kay-tǝqqel. Kay ǝlkǝm-i ɣas!»
Wazawazan salan daɣ mǝzzǝgzan ǝs Ɣaysa as anattalib wa wǝr tu-z-iba. Ǝnta Ɣaysa wǝrgeɣ a inna wǝr tu-z-iba, tǝnna ɣas a iga: «Kud tara a ǝgeɣ ad iddǝr har d-ǝqqǝla tǝdi wǝr kay-tǝqqel.»
Anattalib wa ǝnta iman-net as iggǝyyat fǝl igitan win, iktab-tan. Nǝssân as tǝgǝyya-net tidǝt a tǝmos.
Ɣaysa iga aratan wiyyad aggotnen. As igmay awedan d a sǝr-san ammagrad s iyyan-iyyan, ordeɣ as ǝddǝnet ketnet da wǝr za tawǝy ǝlkǝttaban win zʼiktǝb.
Acts: Ya Tayofil, ǝlkǝttab-in wa azzaran ǝktâbaɣ daɣ-as aratan kul win as issǝnta Ɣaysa igi-nasan d ǝsǝssǝɣri-nasan,
har ǝzǝl wa d immǝdkal ǝs jǝnnawan dǝffǝr as iga ammaran-net ǝs tarna n Infas wa Zǝddigan i nǝmmuzal-net win isannafran.

Ǝntanay en da a issǝkna iman-net dǝffǝr alɣazab-net. Isattad-asan ǝs tǝmǝwiten aggotnen tanakra-net daɣ tamattant. Ǝkkozat tǝmǝrwen n ǝzǝl a iga itinǝfilil-asan, itagg-asan isalan ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina.
Ǝzǝl iyyan idrâw dǝr-san imensewan as tan-omar, inn-asan: «Ad wǝr tǝgmǝdam aɣrǝm ǝn Yerusalam. Ǝqqǝlat y arkawal n Abba wa dawan-ǝmala,
fǝlas Yaxya aman a daɣ issǝlmaɣ aytedan mišan kawanay, ɣur adan wǝr nǝggǝt, Infas wa Zǝddigan a daɣ za tǝtǝwǝsǝlmǝɣam.»
Ǝddêwan ɣur-ǝs nǝmmuzal-net as t-ǝssǝstanan, ǝnnan-as: «Ǝmǝli, awak ǝmǝrǝdda ad za tǝssuɣǝla tǝmǝnukǝla y Israyil?»
Inn-asan: «Wǝr kawan-tǝwer masnat n alwaq wala tamert win otas Abba ǝs tanaya-net.
Mišan ya a fall-awan d-azzabbat Infas wa Zǝddigan, tǝgrǝwam tarna, tǝqqǝlam šigǝyyawen-in daɣ ǝɣrǝm wa n Yerusalam, d akal kul wa n Yahudǝyya ǝd wa n Samarǝya, taglim har da d-iraz amaḍal.»
As inna awen, immǝdkal ǝs jǝnnawan. Ǝswâdan daɣ-as har dasan-tu-tǝlsa tagarak.
Harwâda ǝggizzayan ijǝnnawan assaɣa wad itagazzay Ɣaysa as nafalalan ǝššin meddan ǝn samlalan dǝgma-nasan.
Ǝnnan-asan: «Ya meddan ǝn Galilaya, mas tǝbdadam, tǝswâdam daɣ jǝnnawan? Ɣaysa wa immǝdkalan gar-ewwan da ǝs jǝnnawan, ilkâm a d-iqqǝl s ǝmmǝk wa da as tu-tǝnayam ikk-en.»

Tǝzzar ǝfalan nǝmmuzal adɣaɣ was itawannu wa n Eškan ǝn Zaytun, ǝqqalan aɣrǝm ǝn Yerusalam a das-ihân edag ǝn teklay tas tǝtawala turagat-net daɣ ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, almaɣna edag ǝn kilaw iyyanda ǝn teklay.

As din-osan, ǝggazan ehan wa n afalla daɣ suru wa daɣ saganan. Ǝmosan Butros, Yaxya, Yaqub, Andrawǝs, Filibus, Tuma, Bartulamawǝs, Matta, Yaqub wa n ag Alfay, Simɣon was itawannu wa Isaggatakken ǝd Yahuza wa n ag Yaqub.
Ketnasan tiddawan-du y igi ǝn tǝwatriwen s ǝwǝl iyyanda, ǝntanay ǝd mǝdrayan ǝn Ɣaysa ǝd tǝdoden tǝha Maryama ta n anna-net.
Adan en da a daɣ ibdad Butros gǝr nǝlkiman ǝn Ɣaysa, ǝmosnen temeday n awedan ǝd sanatat tǝmǝrwen, inn-asan:
«Imǝdrayan-in, ǝššil ad andu awa inna Infas wa Zǝddigan daɣ Ǝlkǝttaban irǝw s ǝmi n ǝnnǝbi Dawǝd daɣ salan ǝn Yahuza wa d-issǝlalan aytedan win ǝbaznen Ɣaysa.
Fǝlas kala daɣ-naɣ iddun nakkanay inǝmmuzal, amaran igrâw adagar-net daɣ ǝššǝɣǝl wa dǝr-naɣ isanattaf Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix.
Alǝs za wa, izzǝnza tawagost daɣ azrǝf wa igraw daɣ abakkad-net, dǝffǝr awen uda daɣ-as ǝs tǝdist-net, ibbǝqqat, iffǝzzat awa ihan tadist-net kul.
Aytedan kul win ǝxsarnen daɣ Yerusalam ǝslân awen, har as tawagost ten ǝgan-as esǝm daɣ awal-nasan "Akaldama", alamaɣna tawagost ta n ǝzni.
Amaran iktâb daɣ ǝlkǝttab wa n Ǝzzǝbur as: "Iqqǝlet ahan-net ǝmǝjir, a tu-wǝr-ilǝs awedan iguz." Iktâb daɣ-as deɣ as: "Iggǝzet awedan iyyan edag-net daɣ ǝššǝɣǝl."
Daɣ adi ilzâm-ana ad nǝsǝnnǝfrǝn iyyan daɣ meddan win dǝr nǝtidaw faw daɣ šikilan n Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa,
a d-ibazan ɣur ǝzǝl wa t-issǝlmaɣ Yaxya daɣ aman har ǝzǝl wa ɣur-naɣ immǝdkal ǝs jǝnnawan. Alǝs wa za nǝsǝnnǝfrǝn da, ad iqqǝl tǝgǝyya ǝn tanakra ǝn Ɣaysa daɣ tamattant.»
Ǝssǝbdadan ǝššin meddan ǝmosnen Yusǝf was itawannu Barsabbas, gannin-as deɣ Yustus, ǝd Matǝyyas.
Tǝzzar ǝttaran, ǝnnan: «Ya Ǝmǝli, kay a issanan awa ihan iwallan n aytedan kul, sakn-ana wa tǝsannafrana gǝr meddan win ǝššin a,
fǝl ad iggǝz ǝššǝɣǝl n anammazul wa igmad Yahuza ikka edag wa imosan wa-net.»
Ǝgan šišaɣeren, ǝbaznat Matǝyyas, iddun daɣ nǝmmuzal win maraw d iyyan.
As d-iɣlay ǝzǝl n ǝmud ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud was itawannu Fantǝkawt, ǝddêwan nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa ketnasan daɣ adag iyyanda.
Wala a ihogan igmad-du ǝjit iyyan ijǝnnawan olân d in aḍu issohen, itkar ehan ketnet wa daɣ ǝqqiman.
Nafalalan-asan d ilsawan olanen d in abalagleg ǝn tǝmsay, ǝmmǝzzayan ilsawan en; ǝkkulluk n iyyan iwar iyyan daɣ-san,
Idnay-tan Infas wa Zǝddigan ketnasan, tǝzzar ǝssǝntan awal daɣ awalan wǝr nǝmos win-nasan, s ǝmmǝk was tan-ikfa Infas wa Zǝddigan fǝrregat n awen.
As itaggu awen, aɣrǝm ǝn Yerusalam ǝɣsâran daɣ-as Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud zizawatnen daɣ ǝddin a d-ǝgmâdnen ikallan n ǝddǝnet kul.
As ǝslan y awal wen, tǝddew-du tamattay tagget, tǝzzar isammaklal sǝr-san awen fǝlas akkiyyan daɣ-san isallu i nalkiman ǝššewalan daɣ awal n akal wa d-igmad.
Iga sǝr-san awen ǝsǝmmǝklǝl labasan, gannin: «Xa! Aytedan a ǝššewalnen da, awak wǝrgeɣ ketnasan Kǝl-Galilaya?
Mas za, akkiyyan daɣ-na isall-asan ǝššewalan awal ǝn marwan-net?

Ǝnta nakkanay ǝhân-anaɣ aytedan a d-ǝgmadnen amaḍal ǝn Bartǝya, d akal wa n Medǝya, ǝd wa n Aḷam, d aytedan ǝxsârnen daɣ akal wa n Mezobotamǝya, ǝd wa n Yahudǝyya, ǝd wa n Kabadokǝya, ǝd wa n Fontǝs ǝd wa n Asǝya,
ǝd wa n Frijǝya, ǝd wa n Banfilǝya ǝd wa n Masar. Wiyyad ǝgmâdan-du akal ǝn Libǝya daɣ ɣǝlǝyɣǝlayan n ǝɣrǝm wa n Qǝrwan, wiyyad aytedan n Ǝrrum,

wiyyad aytedan ǝn Kǝret ǝd win Arabǝya. Gǝr za win daɣ-na ǝmosnen Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud wala deɣ aytedan a d-ǝhdânen s ǝddin wa n Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, ketnana nǝsall-asan ǝmmâlan daɣ awalan-nana igitan ǝn tarna ǝn Mǝššina.»
Ketnasan isimaklal sǝr-san awen, wǝr ǝssenan a ǝnnan, tinǝmǝnnin: «Ma imos almaɣna n awa?»
Mišan ya wiyyad daɣ-san ǝgan daɣ nǝlkiman tamakkakkayt, gannin: «Awen esmad n alɣanab a tan-isammaswadan.»

Tǝzzar ibdad Butros ǝnta ǝd nǝmmuzal win maraw d iyyan, idkal ǝmǝsli-net iššewal i tamattay, inna: «Meddan ǝn Yahudǝyya ǝd kawanay ketnawan win ǝxsarnen daɣ Yerusalam, agriwat awa igan da, tǝssǝsǝmam wǝllen y awa dawan-z-anna da.
Meddan win wǝr ǝmmǝswadan, arat wa tǝɣilam ǝddi, fǝlas taza alwaqan win aɣora awa harwa da.
Kala kalar arat wa imal ǝnnǝbi Yowǝl a d-osan, as inna:

"Inna Mǝššina: 'Ǝnta da awa du-z-asin daɣ adan n ǝddǝnet win ǝlkamnen: a du-zǝzzǝbbeɣ Infas-in fǝl i t-illa awedan, ǝssuɣǝlan maddanǝwan d aššekkawan awa dasan-z-ǝmǝla; sǝnnǝfilǝlaɣ aratan ǝttinkalnen i mawadan-nawan, sǝssuga iɣmaran-nawan targǝten.
Awalla, a du-zǝzzǝbbeɣ daɣ adan win den Infas-in fǝl naɣbidan-in ǝd tǝnaɣbiden-in tǝzzar ǝssuɣǝlan awa dasan-z-ǝmǝla.
Ad agaɣ tǝlmǝɣjujaten daɣ jǝnnawan, agaɣ aratan ǝmosnen alɣalamaten fǝl amaḍal: Inɣǝl ǝzni, tarɣu tǝmsay, akku ǝhu ijǝnnawan.
Tǝfuk ad tamattay, tǝqqǝl šiyyay; tizwaɣ tǝllit šilat n ǝzni; izar-du adi kul y assa n ǝzǝl zǝwwǝran ilân ǝlxurma wa issǝbdad Ǝmǝli.
Amaran i igmayan daɣ Ǝmǝli ǝlɣillas ad t-igrǝw.'"

Ya meddan n Israyil, sǝsǝmat i salan win: Ɣaysa wa n Nazaret, alǝs a imos as kawan-issîkna Mǝššina ǝs tǝlmǝɣjujaten d aratan ǝmmittaynen, ǝd wiyyad ǝmosnen alɣalamaten win as t-ikfa igi-nasan gar-ewwan as ǝnta a isannafran. Kawanay iman-nawan tǝssânam daɣ adi.
Alǝs di, Mǝššina di as tu-wǝr-illa a das-idrâgan a t-igan daɣ fassan-nawan, imos awen arat ixtâs irǝw, tǝgam iman-net s ǝtǝwǝsǝtǝytǝy wa tu-tǝsassagam i nǝzzulam fǝl tǝgǝttawt.
Mišan isǝnkar-t-idu Mǝššina, ikkas-t-idu daɣ tarna ǝn tamattant fǝlas wǝr t-illa ǝmmǝk as t-in-tǝttǝf tamattant.
Batu-net a daɣ inna ǝnnǝbi Dawǝd irǝw: "Hannaya Ǝmǝli dat-i faw, iha aɣil-in fǝl ad wǝr ǝɣšǝdan man-in.
Adi fǝl falawasan man-in, tǝkna tǝdǝwit iguz n awal-in, wala taɣǝssa-nin wǝr nǝmos tamaɣlolt da ad tagu attama,
id wǝr za tayyaɣ iman-in daɣ alaxirat, wala deɣ tayyaɣ Ǝmizdag-nak tarḳu tǝɣǝssa-net.
Kay a di-issǝknan tarrayt ta tǝha tǝmǝddurt. A di-tǝsǝffǝliwǝsa wǝllen ǝs tassaq ta dǝr-ǝk ǝgeɣ."
Imǝdrayan-in, ǝleɣ tarrayt n a dawan-agaɣ isalan daɣ ǝkkâsaɣ aššak n ǝmaraw-nana Dawǝd n as, aba-tu, itawanbal-in. Ǝzǝkka-net, har azalada illa gar-ena.
Ǝnnǝbi a imos, issân deɣ fǝl arkawal wa fǝl das-ihad Mǝššina n as, ilkâm ad agu daɣ taɣmar-net iyyan daɣ hayawan-net.
Daɣ adi Dawǝd inây dat alwaq tanakra n Ǝlmǝsix daɣ tǝmattant, amaran isalan ǝn tanakra-net a daɣ inna: "Wǝr din-itawayya daɣ alaxirat, wala deɣ tǝrḳa tǝɣǝssa-net."
Ɣaysa za wa, issǝnkar-t-idu Mǝššina gǝr nǝmmǝttan, nakkanay nǝggǝyat adi.
Idkal-tu Mǝššina di n Abba-net ig-ay daɣ ǝɣil-net, ikf-ay Infas wa Zǝddigan was iga arkawal-net, ǝnta amaran izazzabbat-t-idu fall-ana. Adi a imos arat wa tǝhannayam da, tǝsallim-as.
Wǝrgeɣ ǝnnǝbi Dawǝd a ikkan ijǝnnawan, kalar ǝnta iman-net a innan: "Inna Ǝmǝli Mǝššina y Ǝmǝli-nin: 'Ɣam daɣ ǝɣil-in,
iket di ad taggaɣ izǝnga-nak daw daran-nak.'"
Daɣ adi akninet Kǝl-Israyil kul masnat daɣ as, Ɣaysa wa tǝttǝytayam fǝl tǝgǝttawt, ǝnta a iga Mǝššina Ǝmǝli d Ǝlmǝsix.»
Idas awal wa iga Butros den iwallan n aytedan wǝllen, ǝnnan-as ǝnta ǝd nǝmmuzal win hadatnen: «Imǝdrayan-nana mas danaɣ-ilzam igi-net?»
Inn-asan Butros: «Utabat. Akkiyyan daɣ-wan itǝwǝsǝlmǝɣet daɣ aman s esǝm ǝn Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix fǝl ad tǝgrǝwam tǝsureft ǝn bakkadan-nawan, tǝgrǝwam tǝhǝkkut ǝn Mǝššina tǝmosat Infas wa Zǝddigan,
ǝnta arkawal wa iga Mǝššina, kawanay as t-iga, kawanay ǝd hayawan-nawan d aytedan kul win ǝxsarnen daɣ igǝg, almaɣna aytedan kul win du-z-aɣru Ǝmǝli-nana Mǝššina ǝs man-net.»
Har irǝw Butros itagg-asan tǝlxutbat idgâz wǝllen igann-asan: «Agǝzat iman-nawan daɣ aytedan ǝxrâknen ǝn nǝllubas win azzaman a.»
Aytedan win ǝzzǝgzannen s awa inna, tawasalmaɣan daɣ aman, tǝzzar tǝttǝy tiddawat ǝn mǝzzǝgzan ǝzǝl wen s adag ǝn karad gim n awedan.
Wǝr ǝgmedan ar ǝs taɣaray daw nǝmmuzal, ǝmosan arat iyyanda ketnasan, darrawan imensewan-nasan, tuzanan amensay wa n saktan, taggin šiwatriwen.
Tǝkna tasa ǝn Mǝššina igguz n awedan kul, inǝmmuzal deɣ taggin s ǝlqudrat ǝn Mǝššina tǝlmǝɣjujaten aggotnen d aratan ǝmosnen alɣalamaten.
Ǝrtâyan mǝzzǝgzan ketnasan, ǝdrâwan deɣ arat kul wa ǝlan.
Zanzin-in daɣ ǝrrǝzǝɣ-nasan, tuzanan attaman-net, ewal awen s awa dǝr togdâ addararat n akkiyyan daɣ-san.
Ǝzǝl kul tamanayan daɣ Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, nimannakan s awen. Tuzanan amensay wa n saktan daɣ nan-nasan, darrawan deɣ imensewan-nasan daɣ tǝfalawist ǝd tazdak n ǝwǝl.
Ǝmmâlan Mǝššina, ǝssiɣmaran-tan aytedan kul. Akk ǝzǝl iššota Ǝmǝli ǝljǝmaɣat-nasan s aytedan win iɣlas.
Ǝzǝl iyyan iggǝzzay Butros ǝd Yaxya s Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada y ad agin šiwatriwen šin tazzar.

Alwaq wen da a daɣ d-immeway alǝs iyyan a d-ihǝwan ǝd bǝddǝn s ǝmi n Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada was itawannu: «Imi wa Ihossayan» itawasansa fǝl ad igmǝy takutay daɣ aytedan win tu-tagaznen. Akk ǝzǝl itawasansu den.
As inay Butros ǝd Yaxya ǝbukan y iguz n Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, a tan-itansay.
Idak-ku Butros ǝd Yaxya s asawad, inn-as Butros: «Ǝswǝd daɣ-na.»
Ikna daɣ-san asawad, iga attama n ad t-akfin arat iyyan.
Tǝzzar inn-as Butros: «Urǝɣ wala azrǝf, wǝr tan-ǝleɣ, mišan a kay-akfa awa ǝleɣ: Ǝs tarna n esǝm ǝn Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix wa n ǝɣrǝm ǝn Nazaret, ǝbdǝd jǝwǝnkǝt!»
Tǝzzar ibaz Butros ǝfus-net wa n ǝɣil, issǝbdad-tu. Ǝddaran-du daran-net ǝd tǝlaẓẓen-net alwaq wen da.
Innad-du zǝllat ibdad, ijawankat. Iddew dǝr-san, ǝggazan Ehan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, ijiwankat itaggad fǝl tǝdǝwit immâl Mǝššina.
Hannayan-tu aytedan kul ijiwankat immâl Mǝššina.
As din-ǝgran as, ǝnta a itaɣamin ɣur ǝmi n Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada was itawannu: «Imi wa Ihossayan», itânsay, ǝhagan, isammaklal sǝr-san awa t-igrawan.
Igla alǝs wa itawazozayan da iltâɣ daɣ Butros ǝd Yaxya. Jiwanken daɣ tarrayt tǝfâlat as itawannu «ta n Suliman» as sǝr-san du-tozal tamattay ketnet. Igâ awen s aytedan ǝsǝmmǝklǝl labâsan.

As inay Butros awen, inna y aytedan: «Meddan n Israyil, mafel ikna sǝr-wan awa ǝsǝmmǝklǝl? Tǝgâram daɣ-na šittawen, tǝgâm daɣ-na asawad n as nakkanay a izzozayan alǝs wa ǝs fǝrregat-nana nakkanay iman-nana, madeɣ nǝzzozay-tu fǝl aššaddat ǝn tǝksǝda-nana Mǝššina?
Ǝmǝli n Ibrahim d Isǝhaq ǝd Yaqub, Ǝmǝli ǝn marawan-nana, ǝnta a ikfan akli-net Ɣaysa ǝlxurma. Kawanay iman-nawan a t-igan daɣ fassan, tǝnkuram-tu dat Bilatǝs s ǝnta ikus-net a otas.
Awalla tǝnkuram Alɣadil di n Ǝmizdag, tǝgmǝyam a dawan-d-itǝwǝkkǝs alǝs n ǝmǝggi ǝn man.
Tǝgam iman ǝn wa ihakkin tǝmǝddurt. Ǝnta a d-issǝnkar Mǝššina daɣ tamattant, nakkanay nǝggǝyat adi.
Ǝzǝgzan-nana ǝs tarna n esǝm ǝn Ɣaysa a ikfan alǝs a tǝhannayam da, tǝzdâyam-tu šiɣurad-net. Illikan as ǝzǝgzan ǝs Ɣaysa a ikfan alǝs di šiɣurad-net kul dat-wan ketnawan.
Amaran imǝdrayan-in, ǝssânaɣ as ǝljǝhǝl a daɣ tǝgam adi kawanay ǝd muzaran-nawan.
Mišan ǝssǝnat as irǝw as imal Mǝššina daɣ mawan n ǝnnǝbitan kul as Ǝlmǝsix ilzâm-tu ad inǝy alɣazab, amaran issǝnda adi ǝs tǝmǝwit tǝdi da.
Daɣ adi utabat tiksadam Mǝššina fǝl ad imǝs ibakkadan-nawan,
izǝzzǝbbǝt-du fall-awan šimeren ǝn tǝsasmit, issuɣǝl-du Ǝlmǝsix a dawan-isinafran dat alwaq, almaɣna Ɣaysa.
Ilzâm-tu ad aqqam daɣ jǝnnawan har d-asu alwaq wa daɣ zʼissuɣǝl Mǝššina arat kul ǝmmǝk-net wa azzaran, imâl awen irǝw ǝs mawan n ǝnnǝbitan-net di zaddognen.
Awalla a inna ǝnnǝbi Musa: "Mǝššina, Ǝmǝli-nawan a dawan-d-isǝnnǝfilǝl iyyan ǝnnǝbi ǝn šilat-in daɣ mǝdrayan-nawan amaran ad tǝsǝsǝmam y awa dawan-z-annu kul.
Awedan kul wa wǝr nǝbbǝrdag y ǝnnǝbi wǝdi, ad itǝwǝkkǝs daɣ tamattay ǝn Mǝššina, ihlǝk."
Ǝnnǝbitan kul win hadatnen, a d-ibazan ɣur ǝnnǝbi Samǝwel ǝd win t-ǝzraynen ketnasan, ǝmâlan arat wa igan daɣ adan win.

Kawanay a imosan imǝkkusa n ǝnnǝbitan win den, tǝkkosem deɣ arkawal ǝn tassaq wa idkal Mǝššina i marawan-nawan as inna y Ibrahim: "Tawšeten n ǝddǝnet kul ad ǝgrǝwnat albaraka s ǝssǝbab n ǝzzurrǝyya-nak."
Kawanay as d-isannafalal Mǝššina Akli-net Ɣaysa daɣ tizarat, issok-awan-t-id, fǝl a kawan-akfu albaraka-net ikkǝs akkiyyan daɣ-wan daɣ tarrayt ta n ǝššur.»
