Harwada iššewal Butros ǝd Yaxya i tamattay as fall-asan ǝhan limaman ǝddewan d ǝmuzar n aytedan win tagaznen Ehan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada ǝd Sadusaytan;
ih-en alham n ǝsǝssǝɣri wa taggin tamattay, ǝmmâlan âs dad zamas Ɣaysa inkar-du daɣ tǝmattant, wǝdi inǝmmǝttan da a daɣ-as d ǝnkaran.
Sattarmasan-tan ǝgan-tan daɣ kasaw har ifaw fǝlas ehad a igan.
Mišan ya ǝzzǝgzanan aytedan aggotnen daɣ win ǝslanen i tǝlxutbat ten, tǝzzar ǝqqalan mǝzzǝgzan edag ǝn sǝmmos gim n alǝs.
As affaw ǝmmǝnayan muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, d ǝmɣaran-nasan ǝd musanan n Ǝttawret daɣ Yerusalam.
Ih-en Xânan wa n Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran ǝd Kayif, ǝd Yaxya d Alaskandǝr d aytedan n aɣaywan n Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran ketnasan.
Ǝssǝbdadan Butros ǝd Yaxya gar-essan, ǝsǝstanan-tan ǝnnan-asan: «Ma ilan tarna madeɣ esǝm was tǝgam adi?»
Tǝzzar inn-asan Butros idkâran Infas wa Zǝddigan: «Ya imuzaran ǝn tamattay-nana d ǝmɣaran n Israyil,
azalada nǝbdâd dat asaggawar wa fǝlas nǝga ǝmazal olâɣan imosan tilalt y awedan ibdânan, amaran ilzâm-ana ad nǝmǝl ǝmmǝk was itawazozay.

Ǝssǝnat za ketnawan, kawanay d aytedan n Israyil kul as, alǝs wa ibdadan dat-wan da wǝr ila malad waliyyan, tarna n esǝm ǝn Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix wa n Nazaret a t-izzozayan, wa tǝttǝytayam fǝl tǝgǝttawt, issǝnkar-t-idu Mǝššina daɣ tǝmattant.
Ɣaysa, ǝnta a imosan "tǝhunt ta din-tǝgaram kawanay win makrasan, amaran ǝnta a tǝqqalat tǝhunt ta tǝkbalat ehan."
Ǝnta ɣas a iɣallasan, amaran wǝr ikfa Mǝššina gǝr jǝnnawan d amaḍal esǝm n awedan iyyan was za nǝɣlǝs ar wa-net.»
As ǝnayan taholat ǝn Butros ǝd Yaxya awal isammaklal sǝr-san awen fǝlas ǝgran as aljahilan a ǝmosan, ǝssânan deɣ as aytedan a ǝmosan as kala tiddawan ǝd Ɣaysa,
mišan wǝr t-illa as ǝfrâgan a dasan-t-annin fǝlas hannayan alǝs wa itawazozayan ibdâd den ɣur-san.
Tǝzzar ǝkkasan-tan daɣ ahan wa daɣ immǝnay asaggawar, amaran ad tinǝmǝggin šinaden.
Gannin: «Ma za nagu y aytedan a? Illikan as ǝnâyan Kǝl-Yerusalam kul tǝlmǝɣjujat zǝwwǝrat ta ǝgan, amaran wǝr nǝfreg ǝsǝbbǝhǝw-net.
Mišan ya fǝl ad wǝr wǝziwǝzan salan n awen daɣ tamattay kul, daɣ adi agiwatana y-asan šisǝksǝdawen fǝl a du-wǝr-ǝlǝsan adakal n esǝm ǝn Ɣaysa dat awedan waliyyan.»
Tǝzzar sassaɣran-tan-du, ǝrɣaman-asan fǝl a du-wǝr-ǝlesan adakal n esǝm ǝn Ɣaysa wala deɣ ǝsǝssǝɣri n arat a t-iqqâlan.
Mišan inn-asan Butros ǝd Yaxya: «Kawanay iman-nawan ma tǝnnam: Mǝni daɣ aratan win wa oɣadan dat Mǝššina: awak ǝbǝrdǝg y-awan meɣ ǝbǝrdǝg i Mǝššina?
Nakkanay za, wǝr nǝfreg ad nayyu emel n aratan win nǝnay ǝd win as nǝsla.»

Ilas-asan asaggawar igi n tǝsǝksǝdawen, amaran oyyan-tan, id wǝr ǝgrewan ǝsaru fǝl tan-ǝwwǝddaban. Ǝgân awen fǝl ǝddǝlil n aytedan, fǝlas aytedan en ketnasan taggin i Mǝššina tǝmmalen fǝl awa igan den.
Ǝnta alǝs wa igan tǝmǝzzǝyt tǝmosat tǝlmǝɣjujat ten, elan-net ogaran ǝkkozat tǝmǝrwen n awatay.
Itawayya Butros ǝd Yaxya ɣas, ǝkkan imidawan-nasan, ǝssoɣalan-asan awa dasan-ǝnnan muzaran ǝn limaman d ǝmɣaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.
As ǝslan i salan win, jajjayen daɣ tǝwatray ta, s ǝwǝl iyyanda, ǝnnan s afalla: «Ya Ǝmǝli, kay a d-ixlakan ijǝnnawan d amaḍal, ǝd gǝrwan d awa tan-ihan kul,
kay a innan ǝs tarna n Infas wa Zǝddigan s ǝmi n amaraw-nana akli-nak Dawǝd: "Mafel ɣišašatnat addawlaten n ǝddǝnet, tagginat tǝmattiwen šinaden wǝr nǝnfa wala?
Ǝbdadan mǝnokalan n ǝddǝnet, ǝddewan deɣ muzaran daɣ adag iyyanda, fǝl ad ammaddin Ǝmǝli d Ǝlmǝsix-net."
Id illikan as, aɣrǝm wa da, a daɣ immǝnay Herod ǝd Fons Bilatǝs ǝntanay ǝd tǝmattiwen šin nǝzzulam ǝd šin Israyil, ǝmmǝddan Ɣaysa, imosan Akli-nak zǝddigan, wa tǝgeɣ Ǝlmǝsix.
Imos awen igi n arat ketnet was tǝxtasa fǝl igi-net dat alwaq ǝs tarna-nak ǝd tara-nak.
Amaran ǝmǝrǝdda Ǝmǝli, ǝswǝd daɣ tǝsǝksǝdawen šin dana-taggin, tǝzzar tǝssǝhǝlaɣ-ana wǝllen nakkanay an eklan-nak emel n awal-nak,
tilalaɣ-ana ǝs tarna n ǝfus-nak fǝl ad nǝzzuzǝy aytedan, nagu tǝlmǝɣjujaten d aratan ǝmosnen alɣalamaten s esǝm ǝn Ɣaysa, Akli-nak Zǝddigan.»
As ǝɣradan tǝwatray-nasan inagaynagay adag wa daɣ ǝddewan, idnay-tan Infas wa Zǝddigan ketnasan, tǝzzar ad ǝmmâlan awal ǝn Mǝššina ši wala tasa.
Ǝljǝmaɣat ta n mǝzzǝgzan ketnet tǝnimannak tǝmos arat iyyanda. Wǝr tan-iha i igannin awa ila, i-net ɣas-net, kalar ǝdrâwan arat kul wa ǝlan.
Tagayyen nǝmmuzal ǝs tarna zǝwwǝrat fǝl tanakra n Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa daɣ tǝmattant, ikf-en deɣ Mǝššina ketnasan arraxmat-net s igǝt.
Ǝljǝmaɣat en wǝr tat-iha i iddiraran ǝs wala, fǝlas win daɣ-san ǝlanen inan madeɣ šiwǝgas zanzan-tan-in, tawayan-du attaman-nasan,
hakkin-tu i nǝmmuzal, amaran itǝwizǝn gǝr mǝzzǝgzan ewâlan dǝgran-nasan s awa dǝr ogdanat tǝmǝɣutar-nasan.
Awen da a iga alǝs iyyan igân Yusǝf imosan iyyan daɣ Kǝl-Lebi n akal ǝn Qibrus. Ǝnta as ǝgan nǝmmuzal tǝsǝmmadǝq Barnabas, almaɣna «Ǝnalam fǝl man»
Izzǝnz-in tawagost tǝhat tǝla-net, eway-du attaman-net ikf-ay i nǝmmuzal.
Ill-ay alǝs iyyan igân esǝm Ananǝyâs a din-izzinzan, ǝnta ǝd tǝntut-net Safira, tawagost-net,
tǝzzar inamarda ǝd tǝntut-net fǝl a din-ittǝf arat daɣ ǝzrǝf wa din-tǝnza, eway-du awa hadan, ikf-ay i nǝmmuzal.
Inn-as Butros: «Ananǝyâs, mafel as toyyeɣ Aššaytan iga y ǝwǝl-nak iguz ogdân d awa, ewad daɣ-ak ad taga y Infas wa Zǝddigan bahu s iduf wa din-tǝgeɣ arat daɣ ǝzrǝf wa din-tǝnza tawagost-nak?

Harwa tat-in-wǝr-tǝzzǝnza, wǝrgeɣ tǝla-nak a tǝha? As tat-in-tǝzzǝnza deɣ, wǝrgeɣ azrǝf wa tat-in-tǝzzǝnza kay a ittafan tanat-net? Daɣ adi, mafel tǝsamarkasa daɣ ǝwǝl-nak igi n ǝmazal ogdân d awa? Wǝrgeɣ aytedan as tǝgeɣ bahu, kalar Mǝššina ǝs tu-tǝgeɣ.»
As isla Ananǝyâs i batu ten, ifataqqat, ǝgmadan-tu man. Tǝggaz tasa zǝwwǝrat aytedan kul win ǝslanen awen.
Tǝzzar osan-t-idu meddan ǝn mawadan, ǝgan-tu daɣ šifit, ǝglan dǝr-ǝs ǝnbalan-t-in.
Edag ǝn karadat assaɣaten dǝffǝr awen, tosa-du tǝntut n Ananǝyâs, wǝr tǝssen fǝl awa igan.
Issǝstan-tat Butros, inn-as: «Safira, ǝmǝl-i, awak tawagost-nawan azrǝf wa tat-in-tǝzzǝnzam, ǝnta da da ketnet?» Tǝnn-as: «Awalla, ǝnta ǝddi da.»
Tǝzzar inn-as Butros: «Manǝmmǝk ǝs tǝnamannakam fǝl igi ǝn taremt y Infas wa Zǝddigan? Sǝsǝm, meddan win din-ǝnbalnen alǝs-nam ǝllân dat ǝmi n ahan; a kam-awǝyan kam da.»
Tǝfataqqat tamazayt ten da ɣur daran ǝn Butros, ǝgmadan-tat man. Ǝggazan-du meddan winad ǝn mâwadan a, osan-tat-du wǝr tǝdder, ewayan-tat ǝnbalan-tat-in dǝgma n alǝs-net.
Eway-du awen as tǝggaz tasa labasat Ǝlkǝnisat ketnet d aytedan kul win ǝslanen awen.

Taggin nǝmmuzal tǝlmǝɣjujaten aggotnen ǝmosnen alɣalamaten d aratan aggotnen simaklalnen daɣ aytedan. Tamanayan faw mǝzzǝgzan ǝs Ɣaysa ketnasan, daw tafala n Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada tas itawannu «ta n Suliman».
Ǝssiɣmaran-tan aytedan mišan wǝr-t-illa i ihalan a tan-in-ihaz.
Dǝr iga awen da ya, tittǝyan s aytedan ǝknanen igǝt ǝgânen daɣ meddan ǝd tǝdoden win zagzannen s Ǝmǝli.
Har as, tamawayan-du miranan tawasansin daɣ tessaten madeɣ šisalaten fǝl afay ǝn tarrayen ǝn Yerusalam, fǝl a din-tawǝd kuddeɣ telay ǝn Butros wiyyad daɣ-san as d-illam den.
Tazalan-du deɣ aytedan ǝknanen igǝt ǝn ɣǝrman win ǝhoznen Yerusalam, ǝs Yerusalam ewâyan imiranan-nasan d aytedan-nasan win ǝssǝranan kǝlǝsuf. Ketnasan deɣ tiwǝzuzǝyan.
Ǝggaznat tǝsmiten labasnen Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran ǝnta d aytedan kul win tǝɣimit-net, ǝn taggayt ta n Sadusaytan,
tǝzzar ǝnkaran sattarmasan inǝmmuzal ǝgan-tan daɣ kasaw dat awedan kul.
Mišan osa-du angalos n Ǝmǝli ehad, olam šisǝhar ǝn kasaw, ikkas-tan-du, inn-asan:
«Akkiwat Ehan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, tǝmǝlam y aytedan isalan kul win tǝmǝddurt ta taynayat.»
Ǝgan nǝmmuzal awa dasan-itawannan, ǝnzayan s Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, a daɣ-as sasaɣrin aytedan.
As d-osa Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran ǝnta d aytedan win tǝɣimit-net, sassaɣran-du Asaggawar wa Zǝwwǝran almaɣna iɣmaran kul win ǝmosnen šiggǝtawen ǝn Kǝl-Israyil, amaran ǝssǝgmayan inǝmmuzal ǝs kasaw.
Osan-in maššaɣalan win tan-ǝgmaynen ehan ǝn kasaw, mišan wǝr tan-in-ogezan daɣ kasaw, tǝzzar ǝqqalan ǝgan isalan,
ǝnnan: «Nos-in kasaw ketnet itimantammat, ǝbdâdan sojitan win t-ogaznen dat mawan-net, mišan as nolam tǝsǝhǝrt ǝn kasaw, wǝr daɣ-as in-nosa awedan waliyyan.»
As isla kabtan ǝn sojitan win tagaznen Ehan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, ǝd muzaran ǝn limaman i salan win den, ǝqqanan ɣafawan-nasan, ad samadranan daɣ awa zʼiqqǝl awen.
Ǝhân ten da as tan-d-osa awedan, inn-asan: «Sǝsǝmat! Meddan win tǝgam daɣ kasaw, ǝbdâdan daɣ Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada, sasaɣrin daɣ-as tamattay.»
Tǝzzar igla kabtan alwaq wen da iddêw ǝd sojitan-net ǝbazan-du inǝmmuzal, mišan wǝr tan-ǝdesan fǝlas ǝksudan a sǝr-san du-tǝggǝd tamattay ǝntanay en da, tanɣ-en ǝs zabaw ǝn tǝgur.
As tan-d-ewayan, zazzakken-tan dat Asaggawar wa Zǝwwǝran, tǝzzar issǝstan-tan Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran,

inn-asan: «Wǝrgeɣ nǝrɣâm-awan wǝllen fǝl a imosan ǝsǝssǝɣri n awedan waliyyan daɣ batu n esǝm di? Mišan ǝnǝyat awa tǝgam! Tǝzawwazawazam daɣ Yerusalam ketnet ǝsǝssǝɣri-nawan, tǝrâm a dana-tǝssǝwaram tamattant n alǝs di.»
Inn-asan Butros ǝd nǝmmuzal win hadatnen: «Mǝššina as danaɣ-ilzam a das-nabbardag, wǝrgeɣ aytedan!
Mǝššina, Ǝmǝli ǝn marawan-nana a d-issǝnkaran Ɣaysa was tǝgam iman-net s ǝtǝytǝy wa tu-tǝgam fǝl tǝgǝttawt.
Ǝnta a da, a idkal Mǝššina ig-ay daɣ ǝɣil-net, ig-ay Ǝmuzar d Ǝmaɣlas y ad igrǝw i Kǝl-Israyil tarrayt ǝn tǝtubt, ǝgrǝwan tǝsureft ǝn bakkadan-nasan.
Nǝmos šigǝyyawen n awen, nakkanay d Infas wa Zǝddigan ihakku Mǝššina y aytedan win ǝlkamnen i tara-net.»
As ǝslan muzaran n Asaggawar wen i batu ten, iggaz-tan alham labasan, ǝran a daɣ-san ǝkkasan iman.

Mišan ibdad iyyan daɣ-san ǝn taggayt ta n Farisaytan igân esǝm Gamalǝyel imosan ǝmusan zǝwwǝran n Ǝttǝwret, ǝssiɣmaran aytedan kul, omar s ad tǝwǝkkǝsan nǝmmuzal daɣ ahan wa daɣ iga ǝmǝnǝy har din-agin arat n amazay,
amaran inn-asan: «Kǝl-Israyil, ǝnkǝdat y a was tǝram a tu-tagim i meddan en.

Wǝr irǝw adi as d-inkar alǝs igân Tedas inna ǝnta imos arat, tǝzzar ǝlkaman-as meddan ewâdnen ǝkkozat tǝmad n alǝs. Ǝnta za iman-net itawanɣa kǝrǝz, meddan win das-ǝlkamnen wazawazan, ibǝnnan awen ketnet.

Dǝffǝr-ǝs, daɣ azzaman win tuddant, inkar-du iyyan alǝs igân esǝm Yahuza wa n Galilaya, isaffallag aytedan aggotnen, ǝlkaman-as. Ǝnta da za, itawanɣa kǝrǝz, tǝzzar wazawazan aytedan kul win das-ǝlkamnen.
Daɣ adi daɣ talɣa ta, ǝnnǝsixa wa dawan-z-aga: Ǝgmǝdat batu ǝn meddan en, tayyim-tan ad aglin; fǝlas kud arat wa ǝnnǝyen madeɣ wa taggin wǝr imos ar arat ǝrân aytedan a, wǝdi ad ibǝrǝjjǝt.
Mišan kud arat a imos as Mǝššina a t-iran, wǝdi wǝr tǝfregam ǝzǝrǝz-nasan. Ǝnkǝdat, a din-wǝr-tagrim iman-nawan tǝmosam ǝllid ǝn Mǝššina.» Tǝzzar ǝttafan ǝnnǝsixa-net.
Sassaɣran-du inǝmmuzal, sassagan-asan šiwwit labasnen s ǝlǝkkud. Dǝffǝr awen ǝrɣaman-asan fǝl a du-wǝr-ǝlesan adakal n esǝm ǝn Ɣaysa, amaran oyyan-tan.
Ǝfalan nǝmmuzal ehan wa daɣ itamanay Asaggawar wa Zǝwwǝran, ǝknân tǝdǝwit id Mǝššina a tan-issǝharan d ad tawasaknin mǝlka fǝl ǝddǝlil ǝn Ɣaysa.
Akk ǝzǝl, gǝr za daɣ Ahan wa Zǝwwǝran n Ǝlɣibada wala deɣ daɣ nan n aytedan, wǝr kala ǝmmǝzzayan d ǝsǝssǝɣri d igi ǝn salan n Ǝlinjil a tan-imosan âs Ɣaysa ǝnta a imosan Ǝlmǝsix.

Azzaman en, inalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa tittǝyan wǝllen. Eway-du awen as gatantanan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win ǝššewalnen tǝlyunant fǝl Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win ǝššewalnen tǝlɣibrit fǝlas wǝr tǝtawagga masnat tolâɣat daɣ tǝdoden-nasan šin as aba meddan-nasnat ɣur tǝzunt ta tawaggin mensewan akk ǝzǝl.
Adi a fǝl sassagan nǝmmuzal win maraw d ǝššin ǝmǝnǝy tǝha ǝljǝmaɣat ǝn nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa kul, ǝnnan-asan: «Wǝr ihor ad nayyu emel n awal ǝn Mǝššina fǝl ad nannataf ǝd tǝzunt ǝn mensewan.
Daɣ adi imǝdrayan-nana, sǝnnǝfrǝnat daɣ-wan ǝssa meddan as tǝga masnat fǝl ǝlluɣ-nasan, idkâr-tan Infas wa Zǝddigan, ǝmosan imusanan, a tan-nǝsǝnnǝttǝf d ǝššǝɣǝl wǝdi.
Nakkanay amaran nǝgmǝd s igi ǝn tǝwatriwen d ǝššǝɣǝl wa n amel n awal ǝn Mǝššina ɣas.»

Tanat ten, toggam-tat aljamaɣat ketnet. Tǝzzar sannafranan Ǝstefanos imosan alǝs izzigzanan wǝllen, idkâr-tu deɣ Infas wa Zǝddigan, ǝd Filibus ǝd Frukurus ǝd Nikanor ǝd Timun ǝd Barmenas ǝd Nikolayos wa n ǝɣrǝm n Antǝyoxǝya as kala-net ǝddin wa n Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud a iha.
Tǝzzar ǝssǝbdadan-tan dat nǝmmuzal, ǝssǝwaran-tan nǝmmuzal ifassan, ǝttǝran-asan.

Ad itǝyttǝy ǝtǝwǝsǝɣmar wa itawaggan y awal ǝn Mǝššina. Tǝzzar ǝttǝyan nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa wǝllen daɣ Yerusalam, fadda ǝhdan-du limaman ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud aggotnen ǝs Ɣaysa, ǝzzǝgzanan as Ǝlmǝsix a imos, ǝlkaman y awas omar.
Ǝstefanos alǝs a imos iknân agaraw n arraxmat ǝd tarna ǝn Mǝššina. Itamazal dat aytedan aratan simaklalnen ǝd tǝlmǝɣjujaten ǝmosnen alɣalamaten zawwarnen.

Tǝzzar ǝnkaran-du aytedan wiyyad n ahan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud was itawannu «wa n Dǝrfan» âs wiyyad daɣ-san Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝn Qǝrwan, wiyyad in ǝɣrǝm n Alaskandrǝya, wiyyad in akal wa n Kilikǝya ǝd wa n Asǝya, ad tamazaɣan d Ǝstefanos.
Mišan wǝr t-illa a dǝr din-ǝkkân masnat ta t-ikfa Infas wa Zǝddigan.
Tǝzzar ǝrzaman i meddan wiyyad daɣ ǝssir fǝl ad ǝssǝwaran Ǝstefanos bahu, ann-in: «Nǝsl-âs itaggu batuten ǝmosnen ikus ǝn tarna i Mǝššina, ǝmosnat deɣ iba n safrar n ǝnnǝbi Musa.»
Ǝgan s awen alham daɣ tamattay ǝd muzaran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝd musanan n Ǝttǝwret. Wǝr isla Ǝstefanos wala as t-id-osan aytedan, ǝbazan-tu. Ewayan-tu s Asaggawar wa Zǝwwǝran ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.
Tǝzzar ǝssǝbdadan šigǝyyawen ǝn bahu, ǝnnanat: «Alǝs wa, wǝr itǝmǝzzǝy d abayak n ahan wa zǝddigan [wa] d Ǝttǝwret.
Igmâd aššak as nǝsl-âs as inna, ilkâm ad ijǝbbǝrǝjjǝt Ɣaysa di ǝn Nazaret di ehan wa, isǝmmǝttǝy alɣadaten šin dana-d-oyya Ǝnnǝbi Musa.»
Ǝgaran aytedan ketnasan win asaggawar šittawen daɣ Ǝstefanos, iqqal sǝr-san udǝm-net zun in angalos.
Tǝzzar issǝstan Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran Ǝstefanos, inn-as: «Awak aratan win tidǝt?»

Inna Ǝstefanos: «Kawanay imǝdrayan-in d abbatan-in, sǝsǝmat-i! Mǝššina di n ǝmǝli ǝn tanaya, ǝnta as kala a d-inafalal y amaraw-nana Ibrahim harwa iha akal wa n Mezobotamǝya, dat tǝmǝxsurt-net daɣ akal wa n Xaran.
Inn-as:
"Ǝgmǝd akal-nak ǝd marwan-nak, takkaɣ akal wa kay-z-assakna."
Tǝzzar igmad Ibrahim akal wa n Kasdaytan, ixsar daɣ wa n Xaran. Dǝffǝr iba n abba-net a t-id-isaggalat Mǝššina s akal wa da daɣ tǝxsaram da azalada.
Akal wa, wǝr daɣ-as ikfa Mǝššina Ibrahim edag as zʼiggǝzan tǝkasit-net, wala ɣas edag daɣ issǝnsa adar-net, mišan idkal-as Mǝššina arkawal n
a das-t-akfu ǝnta d ǝzzurrǝyya-net
, kuddeɣ as alwaq wen, wǝr ila Ibrahim ara waliyyan.
Ǝnta da awa inna Mǝššina:
"Ihayawan-nak ad ǝxsǝran daɣ akal a daɣ ǝmosan iɣǝrab, ǝqqǝlan daɣ-as eklan, ad tawazaɣazzaban har agin ǝkkozat tǝmad n awatay.
Mišan addawlat ta tan-tǝgat eklan, nak iman-in a tat-z-abǝzan s ǝššǝriɣa, dǝffǝr adi, ǝkkǝsaq-qan-du daɣ-as, ǝɣbǝdan-i daɣ adag wa da."

Tǝzzar inamagga Mǝššina d Ibrahim arkawal ǝn tassaq s ǝnta as imos ǝmǝnkǝd ejwal-net. Adi a fǝlas, as ihǝw barar-net Isǝhaq isammankad-tu ǝzǝl wa n ǝttam dǝffǝr tǝhǝwt-net. Iga Isǝhaq awen da i barar-net Yaqub, Yaqub deɣ iga awen da i bararan-net ǝmosnen maraw d ǝššin, win ǝmosnen aljadan-nana.
Ǝnkaran meddan win ǝmosnen aljadan-nana ǝmmǝnzaɣan amadray-nasan Yusǝf, tǝzzar ǝzzǝnzan-t-in, immeway s akal ǝn Masar; mišan issan daɣ-as Mǝššina.
Ikkas-t-idu Mǝššina daɣ tǝmǝɣutar kul šin iggaz. Ikf-ay masnat, d udǝm ɣur Firɣawna wa n ǝmǝnokal ǝn Masar, har as ig-ay Firɣawna daw-ǝs, izzozar-tu y akal ǝn Masar d aɣaywan-net ketnet.
Dǝffǝr awen, iga laz daɣ akal ǝn Masar ketnet, ǝnta ǝd wa n Kanan. Ad taɣazzaban aytedan wǝllen, aba i meddan win ǝmosnen aljadan-nana a ǝtšan.
As isla Yaqub as Masar tah-et tǝbzǝst, izammazal sǝr-ǝs meddan win dana-sahhayawnen, imos awen iki-nasan y-as wa azzaran.
Ɣur iki-nasan Masar wa n ǝššin, ad izzǝzday Yusǝf iman-net i mǝdrayan-net, ǝggazan deɣ salan Firɣawna n aɣaywan wa d-igmad Yusǝf.
Issǝgmay Yusǝf abba-net Yaqub ǝd marwan-net kul, ǝmosan ǝssayat tǝmǝrwen n awedan ǝd sǝmmos.
Tǝzzar iras Yaqub akal ǝn Masar, s ǝnta a daɣ t-aba, aba daɣ-as deɣ imarawan-nana.
Ǝmmewaynat tǝɣǝswen-nasan s ǝɣrǝm ǝn Šǝkem, tawanbalnat daɣ ǝzǝkka wa izzǝnza Ibrahim azrǝf wa ibalalaɣan ɣur maddanǝs ǝn Xamor daɣ Šǝkem, y ad iqqǝl tanbǝlt-net.
As d-ihoz alwaq wa daɣ zʼassandu Mǝššina arkawal wa fǝl ihad y Ibrahim, tamattay-nana tǝttǝy, tǝmôs taxlǝk tagget daɣ Masar,
har
"iggaz iyyan ǝmǝnokal wǝr nǝssen fǝl Yusǝf taɣmar [ǝn Masar]."
Ikkǝrras kǝl-tamet-nana, iga i marawan[-nana] ǝzǝɣǝzzǝb labâsan har âs išahhaššal-tan a din-tayyin bararan-nasan win ǝs sǝket ǝhǝwan daɣ ǝsuf fǝl ad wǝr ǝddǝran.
Azzaman en da a daɣ ihǝw Musa, imos barar ihossayan, igrâwan arraxmat ǝn Mǝššina. Ǝttafan-tu marwan-net daɣ ahan-nasan har iga karadat tǝlil.
Oyyan-t-in marwan-net ɣas fǝl afay n Ǝnnil, tǝnay-tu tabarart ǝn Firɣawna, tǝdkal-tu tǝg-ay barar-net, tǝg-as ǝsǝdwǝl wa za tagu i barar ǝn tǝdist-net.
Itawasasaɣru Musa masnat kul ta n Kǝl-Masar, iqqal alǝs ilân tǝnna daɣ awa igannu d awa itaggu.
As iga ǝkkozat tǝmǝrwen n awatay ǝd tǝhǝwt, iggaz-t-id a din-asu imǝdrayan-net Kǝl-Israyil inǝy awa dǝr t-ǝllan.
Inay iyyan daɣ-san tawagginat-as taršǝxšad, oɣ-as šinaɣen, iga iman n aw Masar wa das-itaggin ark aratan.
Iɣil ad agrin mǝdrayan-net Kǝl-Israyil as Mǝššina a t-id-izammazalan sǝr-san fǝl a tan-assafsu, mišan wǝr ǝgren awen.
Ǝzǝl wa ilkaman i wen, osa-du ǝššin daɣ-san ǝknâsan. Igmay d a tan-aknu, nǝmǝggin alxer, inn-asan: "Meddan, kawanay ǝmosnen imǝdrayan, mafel as tǝtinǝmǝnɣim?"
Mišan ibdaq-q-in alǝs wa itaggin taršǝxšad y ǝmidi-net, inn-as:
"Ma kay-igan ǝmuzar-nana wala ǝmašraɣ-nana?
Ǝngǝm a tareɣ a di-taga tenaɣay ta tǝgeɣ y aw Masar wa n ǝndazǝl?"
Isla Musa i batu ten ɣas, tǝggaz-tu tasa, igmad Masar ilɣas daɣ akal wa n Midǝyan, iqqal daɣ-as ǝɣǝrib, izlaf daɣ-as igraw ǝššin bararan.
As ǝganat ǝkkozat tǝmǝrwen n awatay dǝffǝr awen,
"inafalal-as-du angalos daɣ tǝfsǝq tǝbilaglagat daɣ taneray ɣur ǝdɣaɣ"
wa n Sinay.
Isammaklal ǝs Musa arat wa das-d-inafalal den. Itihaz-in za tafsǝq fǝl ad annaflay daɣ awen, as isla y ǝmǝsli n Ǝmǝli Mǝššina as das-inna:
"Nak a imosan Mǝššina ǝn marawan-nak, Ǝmǝli n Ibrahim, d Isǝhaq ǝd Yaqub."
Tǝndaw taysǝst Musa abʼas ihal ad ilǝs asawad daɣ tǝfsǝq en.
Inn-as deɣ Ǝmǝli: "Ǝkkǝs iɣateman-nak, fǝlas edag wa daɣ tǝbdadaɣ ǝddi amaḍal zǝddigan a imos.
Ǝɣɣǝyyanaɣ alɣazab wa tǝtaggu tamattay-nin daɣ Masar, ǝslêɣ deɣ i hǝrǝrrǝkitan-nasan. Ǝzzǝbbe-du fǝl a tan-assafsa. Ǝmǝrǝdda ihaz-du, a kay-zǝmmizǝla ǝs Masar."
Musa wen da, a ǝnkuran ǝs tǝnna ta das-ǝgan:
"Ma kay-igan ǝmuzar-nana wala ǝmašraɣ-nana?"
Ǝnta en da za, a d-izammazal Mǝššina y ad izar i Kǝl-Israyil, isǝddǝrfǝt-tan, ǝs tarna n angalos wa das-d-inafalalan daɣ tǝfsǝq.

Ǝnta en da, a tan-d-ikkasan daɣ Masar s aratan simaklalnen win itaggu ǝd tǝlmǝɣjujaten ǝmosnen alɣalamaten ǝn tarna ǝn Mǝššina. Iga aratan wiyyad simaklalnen ǝd tǝlmǝɣjujaten ǝmosnen alɣalamaten ɣur aradaɣ wa ǝgan daɣ Agaraw was itawannu wa Zaggaɣan, igla itaggu awen da daɣ taneray har iga ǝkkozat tǝmǝrwen n awatay.
Musa en da, a innan i Kǝl-Israyil:
"Ilkâm a sǝr-wan d-izǝmmizǝl Mǝššina ǝnnǝbi iyyan ǝn šilat-in, a kawan-du-z-igmǝdan."

As tǝddew tamattay n Israyil daɣ taneray ǝn Sinay, ǝnta en da a ibdadan gǝr marawan-nana win den d angalos wa das-iššewalan fǝl ǝdɣaɣ wa n Sinay, tǝzzar ikf-ay Mǝššina awalan hakkinen tǝmǝddurt y a dana-tan-imǝl.
Mišan ugayan marawan-nana s ad ǝlkǝman y awa inna Musa, ugayan sǝr-ǝs, saddaranan ad ǝqqǝlan Masar.
Ǝnnan i Harun:
"Ag-ana imalan a zʼǝmǝlnen dat-na, fǝlas Musa wa dana-d-ikkasan daɣ akal ǝn Masar da, wǝr nǝssen awa daɣ-as in-igan."
Adan en da a daɣ ǝgan ǝssǝnǝm igân tǝmǝwit a n abarkaw, ǝkatan fall-as. Isidawat-tan wǝllen arat wa ǝgan ǝs fassan-nasan.
Tǝzzar inamaggag dǝr-san Mǝššina, oyy-en ǝd man-nasan, ǝɣbadan tǝfuk ǝd tǝllit d etran, imos awen arat ǝnnân Ǝlkǝttaban, as ǝnnan:
"Ya Kǝl-Israyil, awak nak as tǝtaggim šizǝgzam ǝd tǝkutawen daɣ ǝkkozat tǝmǝrwen n awatay šin tǝgam daɣ teneray?
Wǝrgeɣ ahaket n ǝssǝnǝm wa igan Molox a tewayam, ǝd šaššelan n ǝtri wa igan Rǝmfan wa n ǝssǝnǝm-nawan, ǝmosnen ǝssǝnǝman win tǝgam"
fǝl a tan-tǝɣbǝdam!
"Adi fǝl kawan-z-ǝstǝɣa har takǝyam"
Babǝylon.
Amaran imarawan-nana win d-ikkas Mǝššina daɣ Masar ǝggazan teneray, ǝlân ǝhaket wa n ǝmǝnǝy ǝd Mǝššina, was omar Mǝššina Musa s ad t-agu s ǝmmǝk wa t-issǝkna.

Ahaket en, iggaz-du ǝs marawan-nana win dǝffǝr win den, azzaman win daɣ dasan-azzar Joswe, ewayan-tu s akal wa ǝbazan, s ǝnta a daɣ istaɣ Mǝššina tawšeten dat-san. Iggaz ahaket wen akal en da har azzaman n ǝnnǝbi Dawǝd.
Ǝnnǝbi Dawǝd igrâw arraxmat ɣur Mǝššina. Ǝnta a igmayan daɣ Mǝššina turagat n ad ikrǝs ehan y Ǝmǝli ǝn Yaqub.
Mišan ǝnnǝbi Suliman a igrawan turagat ten, ikras ehan y Ǝmǝli Mǝššina.
Dǝr iga awen da ya, Mǝššina di n Amadkol wǝr ixser daɣ a ǝkrasan fassan n aytedan. Adi a inna ǝnnǝbi Isayas as inna:
Inna Ǝmǝli Mǝššina:
"Ijǝnnawan a ǝmosnen tǝxawit-in ta n taɣmar, amaḍal wǝr imos ar arat illan daw daran-in. Daɣ adi ma imos ǝzzǝnǝf n ahan wa di-za-tǝkrǝsam? Madeɣ edag wa daɣ zʼassanfa?
Wǝrgeɣ ǝfus-in a d-ixlakan adi kul?"»

Harwa inn-asan Ǝstefanos: «Ya meddan win ǝqqǝssatnen, tǝxfâlam iwallan-nawan, tǝdbâɣam šimǝzzugen-nawan wǝr tǝzlayam d aytedan wǝr nǝksud Mǝššina, faw tugâyam s Infas wa Zǝddigan. Adi da a ǝgan marawan-nawan.
Mǝni daɣ ǝnnǝbitan wa wǝr zaɣɣazzaban marawan-nawan? Ǝgan iman ǝn nǝmmuzal ǝn Mǝššina win ǝmalnen dat alwaq assa ǝn Wa Oɣadan, as kawanay ǝmǝrǝdda a t-ikkǝddalan tǝgam iman-net.
Kawanay win d-issoka Mǝššina angalosan ewâynen ǝlqanun-net, mišan tugayam s a das-tǝlkǝmam.»
As ǝslan i batu ten, iggaz-tan alham labasan, ad samadadan fǝl alham n Ǝstefanos.
Mišan ǝnta idkâran Infas wa Zǝddigan, idkal asawad-net sa sǝr jǝnnawan, inay tanaya ǝn Mǝššina, inay deɣ Ɣaysa ibdâd daɣ ǝɣil ǝn Mǝššina.
Tǝzzar inn-asan: «Ǝnǝyat, ijǝnnawan ǝnnolaman! Hannayaɣ Ag Aggadǝm ibdâd daɣ ǝɣil ǝn Mǝššina.»
Ǝslan y awen ɣas, ad zayyakan ǝdbâɣan šimǝzzugen-nasan, ǝggadan-in ketnasan s Ǝstefanos, ǝbazan-tu.
Ǝkkasan-tu daɣ ǝɣrǝm, ad t-ǝggaran ǝs tǝhun. Amaran meddan win fall-as ǝgǝyyatnen, alǝs n ammas igân esǝm Talut a ɣur ǝssǝnsan ibǝrnaz-nasan.
Ǝggâran Ǝstefanos ǝs tǝhun as ittar inna: «Ya Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa, ǝqbǝl iman-in!»
Dǝffǝr awen, igaraffat, idkal ǝmǝsli-net s afalla, inna: «Ya Ǝmǝli, a tan-wǝr-tǝssǝwaraɣ abakkad wa!» As inna awen, ǝgmadan-tu man.
Amaran Talut ǝnta, iha win ǝrḍanen s ǝtǝwǝnɣa n Ǝstefanos.
Ǝzǝl wen da ad tǝnta tǝssust labasat fǝl Ǝlkǝnisat ta tǝhat Yerusalam; tǝzzar wazawazan ǝlmǝsixitan ketnasan daɣ kallan win Yahudǝyya ǝd Samarǝya. Wǝr d-iqqim daɣ Yerusalam ar inǝmmuzal.
Osan-du meddan ǝn miksadan ǝn Mǝššina, ǝnbalan-in Ǝstefanos. Ǝyyǝwanan fall-as tala.
Talut ǝnta, issǝnta daɣ ǝhluk n Ǝlkǝnisat. Irzag inan, ilabbay-du daɣ-san meddan ǝd tǝdoden, iggar-tan daɣ kasaw.
Amaran imǝzzǝgzan ǝs Ɣaysa win tǝwazawaznen den, ǝrzagan akal ketnet ǝmmâlan y aytedan isalan win ǝhanen Ǝlinjil.
Awen da a d-ewayan Filibus s ǝɣrǝm iyyan n akal ǝn Samarǝya a daɣ-as immâl y aytedan isalan n Ǝlmǝsix.
As tǝsla aljamaɣat tagget tǝnimannakat y awal ǝn Filibus, tǝnay deɣ tǝlmǝɣjujaten šin itaggu ǝmosnen alɣalamaten ǝn tarna ta igraw, tǝssoɣal-in ǝnnǝyat-net aratan win igannu.
Fǝlas aytedan aggotnen a ǝgmadan kǝlǝsuf. As tan-du-gammadan, takkasan imaslan labasnen. Tawazozayan deɣ nǝbdan ǝd mǝggudal aggotnen.
Eway-du awen tǝdǝwit agget daɣ ǝɣrǝm en.
Amaran aɣrǝm en, ih-ay alǝs iyyan n amassaxar igân esǝm Simɣon itaggin išaɣawan simaklalnen s aytedan ǝn Samarǝya. Igannu ǝnta awedan zǝwwǝran a imos.
Aytedan kul sasaman-as s ǝlluɣ, gǝr za win wǝr nǝla almaqam, wala win t-ǝlanen, gannin: «Alǝs wa, tarna n Ǝmǝli tas itawannu ta togarat a imos.»
Aytedan win sasaman-as s ǝlluɣ, fǝlas irǝw itagg-asan išaɣawan sǝr-san simaklalnen.
Mišan as ǝzzǝgzanan i Filibus a dasan-immâlan isalan ǝn taɣmar ta n Mǝššina ǝd tarna n esǝm ǝn Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix, tawasalmaɣan daɣ aman, meddan harkid tǝdoden.
Izzǝgzan Simɣon ǝnta da, itawasalmaɣ daɣ aman; iltaɣ daɣ Filibus. Ǝqqânnat alɣalamaten ǝn tarna ǝd tǝlmǝɣjujaten zawwarnen šin itaggu Filibus eɣaf-net.
As ǝslan nǝmmuzal daɣ Yerusalam as Kǝl-Samarǝya ǝqbalan awal ǝn Mǝššina, zammazalan sǝr-san Butros ǝd Yaxya.
As tan-in-osan, ǝttaran-asan a fall-asan d-izazzabben Infas wa Zǝddigan,
fǝlas harwa da wǝr tan-iha i fǝl d-izzibbat, ǝtǝwǝsǝlmaɣ ɣas a tawaggan daɣ aman s esǝm n Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa.
Tǝzzar a tan-isawar Butros ǝd Yaxya ifassan-nasan, garrawan Infas wa Zǝddigan.
As inay Simɣon as, Infas wa Zǝddigan ǝsǝwǝr ǝn fassan ǝn nǝmmuzal as itawagraw, igmay daɣ-san a tan-akfu azrǝf, inn-asan:
«Akfiwat-i nak da tarna tǝdi, tas i ǝssǝwara ifassan-in ad igrǝw Infas wa Zǝddigan.»
Inn-as Butros: «Tǝhlǝkaɣet kay d ǝzrǝf-nak, zama tǝɣila tǝfrâgaɣ a tazzanza tǝhǝkkut ǝn Mǝššina.
Batu ta, wǝrmad tat-tǝheɣ za wala tǝleɣ daɣ-as tanat fǝlas ǝwǝl-nak wǝr oɣed dat Mǝššina.
Daɣ adi utab daɣ ǝššur-nak, tansǝya Mǝššina a dak-issurǝf ark ǝnnǝyat ta tǝhat ǝwǝl-nak, kud immikkan adi.
Fǝlas hannayaɣ as, ǝwǝl-nak wǝr idker ar tara n ǝddǝnet labasat d iba n aqqad.»
Tǝzzar inn-asan Simɣon: «Ansǝyat-i Ǝmǝli kawanay iman-nawan fǝl a di-wǝr-abǝz s awa tǝnnam.»

Butros ǝd Yaxya win nǝmmuzal, as ǝmalan y aytedan awa ǝggǝyyen fǝl Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix, ǝmǝlan-asan deɣ awal n Ǝmǝli, ǝqqalan Yerusalam. Ǝmalan isalan n Ǝlinjil daɣ taɣarmaten aggotnen ǝn Samarǝya šin ǝhanen tarrayt-nasan.
Dǝffǝr awen iššewal angalos n Ǝmǝli i Filibus, inn-as: «Ǝnkǝr tawǝya ǝd tarrayt tǝkkât agala ta tǝgmadat Yerusalam tǝras tǝkka Gaza.» Tarrayt ten, tǝssuf.

Inkar Filibus, igla. Ijiwankat daɣ tarrayt as immǝnay d alǝs n ǝnazum n akal n Etǝyofǝya imosan awedan zǝwwǝran daɣ taɣmar ǝn Kandas ta n tǝmǝnokalt n Etǝyofǝya s ǝnta a innǝttafan d ǝrrǝzǝɣ kul wa n tǝmǝnokalt en. Osâ-du Yerusalam fǝl a daɣ-as iɣbǝd Mǝššina.
Iqqâl akal-net, iqqîm daɣ amalankay-net, iɣarru ǝlkǝttab n ǝnnǝbi Isayas.
Inna Infas wa Zǝddigan i Filibus: «Ihaz-in amalankay en, tǝmmudǝɣaɣ i mǝššis»
Ozal-in sǝr-ǝs Filibus. Isl-as iɣarru ǝlkǝttab n ǝnnǝbi Isayas, inn-as: «Awak tǝgreɣ almaɣna n awa tǝɣarra ǝddi?»
Inn-as alǝs wen: «Manǝmmǝk as tu-z-agra, wǝr t-illa awedan a di-t-iffǝssaran?» Tǝzzar igmay daɣ Filibus a d-iwǝn, aqqam dǝgma-net.
Edag wa iɣarru daɣ ǝlkǝttab en, ǝnta da awa inna:
«Ittilway zun tilay s adag n agazam, tǝfastit a itaggu ǝjaɣol y aytedan lazzinen tǝduft-net a iga, wǝr d-igmed ǝlxǝrǝf imi-net.
Itiwasaras, wǝr das-ǝgen ǝššǝriɣa wa dǝr ihor. Ma ifragan igi ǝn salan kul ǝn hayawan-net, id tǝtiwazaraz tǝɣrǝst-net daɣ ǝddǝnet?»
Tǝzzar issǝstan alǝs wa n Etǝyofǝya Filibus, inn-as: «Kay ak ǝmǝl-i, was iha ǝnnǝbi šin-net da. Ǝnta iman-net meɣ awedan iyyan?»
Ibaz Filibus ɣur batu ten da, imal-as isalan n Ǝlinjil ǝn Ɣaysa.
Ǝglân za, as d-osan edag ǝhân aman, tǝzzar inna alǝs wa n Etǝyofǝya: «Aman da, ma di-z-igdǝlan ad tǝwǝsǝlmǝɣ?»
[Inn-as Filibus: «wǝr t-illa, kud tǝzzigzana s ǝwǝl iyyanda.» Inn-as alǝs wen: «Ǝzzigzanaɣ as Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix Barar ǝn Mǝššina a imos.»]
Omar alwaq wen da s ad itǝwǝsǝbdǝd amalankay, ǝzzǝbben ǝnta ǝd Filibus, ǝggazan aman, issǝlmaq-qu Filibus.
Da da ɣas a d-ǝgmadan aman, ǝnta ad idkal Infas n Ǝmǝli Filibus, abʼas t-ihannay alǝs wen, mišan igla daɣ tarrayt-net, ikna tǝdǝwit.
Filibus ǝnta, as din-igra iman-net iha aɣrǝm n Azot. As t-igmad illil akal en itaggu daɣ ɣǝrman kul win ǝhanen tarrayt isalan n Ǝlinjil har osa aɣrǝm ǝn Qaysarǝya.
As itaggu awen, Talut harwada isamahad fǝl igi ǝn man ǝn nǝttulab n Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa. Ikka Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran,

igmay daɣ-as a das-agu šira ǝs nan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win ǝɣrǝm ǝn Damas ǝmosnen šira a t-ǝkfânen turagat s as, as igraw aytedan, gǝr za meddan wala šidoden, win ǝhanen tarrayt ta n Ɣaysa, a tan-ikrǝd ilwǝy-tan-du ǝs Yerusalam.
Ikkâ za aɣrǝm ǝn Damas, as t-in-ihoz, wǝr isla a igan as fall-as ibalazzat ǝnnur a d-igmâdan ijǝnnawan.
Ifataqqat, isla y ǝmǝsli wa das-innan: «Talut, Talut mafel as di-tǝzaɣazzaba?»
Inn-as Talut: «Ma tǝmosaɣ, Ǝmǝli?» Isla i wa das-innan: «Nak Ɣaysa wa tǝzaɣazzaba.
Ǝbdǝd ǝggǝz aɣrǝm a dak-attamal awas kay-iwar igi-net.»
Meddan win ǝddewnen ǝd Talut ǝbdâdan, tǝgdal-asan tǝrǝmmeq awal, sallan y ǝmǝsli mišan wǝr hǝnnǝyan awedan waliyyan.
Ibdad-du Talut, ora šittawen-net, mišan indar-as anay ǝn wala. Kundaba as ǝbazan midawan-net ǝfus-net, ǝlwayan-tu har dǝr-ǝs ǝggazan Damas.
Har iga karad adan wǝr ihǝnnǝy arat, wǝr itša za wǝr išwa.
Amaran Damas ih-êt ǝnalkim ǝn Ɣaysa igân esǝm Ananǝyâs. Iɣr-ay Ǝmǝli daɣ tǝrgǝt inn-as: «Ananǝyâs!» Ikkǝwan-as inn-as: «Nak da, Ǝmǝli!»
Inn-as Ǝmǝli: «Ǝnkǝr, tǝssǝwǝla ǝd tarrayt tas itawannu "ta toɣadat", takkaɣ ehan ǝn Yahuza, tǝssǝstǝnaɣ d alǝs n ǝɣrǝm ǝn Tarsa igân esǝm Talut, id itansay-i daɣ alwaq wa da.
Amaran inay [daɣ tǝrgǝt] alǝs igân esǝm Ananǝyâs as t-id-osa, issǝwar-tu ifassan-net fǝl a t-id-iqqal asawad-net.»
Tǝzzar inn-as Ananǝyâs: «Ya Ǝmǝli, aytedan aggotnen ǝgân-i isalan n alǝs di, ǝd talbast tagget ta issǝkna imizdagan-nak win ǝhanen Yerusalam.
Da da ila turagat n abbaz n aytedan kul win tattarnen s esǝm-nak, amaran imuzaran ǝn limaman a t-ǝkfanen turagat ten.»
Mišan inn-as Ǝmǝli: «Aglu, alǝs di nak a t-isannafran fǝl a di-imǝl y aytedan wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝd mǝnokalan-nasan, imǝl-i deɣ i Kǝl-Israyil.
Nak iman-in as das-z-agaɣ ǝzǝɣɣǝzzǝb kul wa t-iwaran fǝl ǝddǝlil-in.»

Tǝzzar igla Ananǝyâs har din-osa ehan, iggaz-tu, inay Talut, issǝwar-tu ifassan-net, inn-as: «Amadray-nin Talut, Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa wa dak-inafalalan daɣ tarrayt ta du-tǝgeɣ, ǝnta a di-d-izammazalan fǝl a kay-d-iqqǝl asawad-nak, idnǝy-kay Infas wa Zǝddigan.»
Tamazayt ten da a daɣ d-ǝrtakan aratan olanen ǝd tǝfǝrǝnkawen daɣ šittawen ǝn Talut, tǝzzar iqqal-t-id asawad-net. Ibdad, itawasalmaɣ daɣ aman.
Dǝffǝr awen itša, ǝqqalnat-t-idu tǝɣurad-net.
Iga arat n adan ɣur nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa win ǝhanen Damas.
Tarmâd as ikka Talut inan n ǝlɣibada win Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud a daɣ-san immâl as Ɣaysa Barar ǝn Mǝššina a imos.

Isammaklal awen s aytedan ad gannin: «Ak wǝrgeɣ ǝnta, as kala ibbǝnbay daɣ aytedan win tattarnen s esǝm ǝn Ɣaysa daɣ Yerusalam ihallak-kan? Wǝrgeɣ wǝr t-id-eway s ǝɣrǝm wa, ar a tan-abǝz, ilwǝy-tan ǝs muzaran ǝn limaman?»
Mišan Talut ǝnta itisuhit ǝzǝzgzan-net. Wǝr ǝssenan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win Damas a das-ǝnnan daɣ ǝsǝkni wa tan-itaggu as Ɣaysa ǝnta a imosan Ǝlmǝsix.
As irǝw Talut daɣ Damas, namaggan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud eɣaf fǝl ad agin iman-net,
mišan ittǝmal-as awen. Ewadan daɣ tara ǝn tǝnaɣay-net as das-ǝnkadan ehad ezal ɣur mawan n ǝɣrǝm.
As ahad iyyan, ǝnkaran nǝttulab-net ǝgan-tu daɣ ǝzmam zǝwwǝran, ǝrdafan daɣ-as aɣan, zazzabben-tu fǝl aganna wa hadan n aɣalla wa iɣlayan aɣrǝm.
As osa Talut Yerusalam, igmay d ad irtǝy ǝd nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa, mišan ǝwafan-tu ketnasan fǝlas harwa da wǝr ǝzzǝgzanan as iyyan daɣ-san a imos.

Ibaz-t-idu Barnabas ǝs man-net, iddew dǝr-ǝs ǝs nǝmmuzal, tǝzzar ig-asan isalan kul n ǝmmǝk was inay Talut Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa daɣ tarrayt ǝn Damas d awal wa das-iga, imal-asan deɣ igi wa iga isalan n Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa daɣ Damas wǝr t-illa i as tu-tǝha tasa-net.
Alwaq wǝdi a dǝr-san irtay, itidaw dǝr-san daɣ Yerusalam. Itaggu isalan n Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa ši wala tasa ǝn waliyyan.
Itimǝšiwil Talut ǝd Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win ǝššewalnen tǝlyunant, itamazaɣ deɣ dǝr-san; ad gammayan d igi ǝn man-net.
As ǝslan mǝdrayan-net daɣ ǝzǝgzan awen, ǝddewan dǝr-ǝs wiyyad daɣ-san s ǝɣrǝm ǝn Qaysarǝya, amaran ǝssokan-tu wa n Tarsa.

Azzaman en, ǝgrâwan daɣ-san nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa d Ǝlkǝnisaten alxer daɣ akal kul wa n Yahudǝyya ǝd wa n Galilaya ǝd wa n Samarǝya. Itasahat ǝzǝgzan n Ǝlkǝnisaten, tagginat imazalan ǝssiɣmarnen Ǝmǝli, tittǝynat deɣ ǝs tilalt n Infas wa Zǝddigan.
Illil za Butros akal ketnet har iras taɣrǝmt ta n Ludda fǝl ad inǝy imizdagan win daɣ-as ǝxsarnen.
Inay daɣ-as alǝs igân esǝm Enǝyas, igân ǝttam elan ǝd bǝddǝn, wǝr kala igmad tǝssut-net.
Inn-as Butros: «Enǝyas, ǝbdǝd tada tǝssut-nak, Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix izzozay-kay.» Ibdad Enǝyas tamazayt ten da.
Ǝnayan-tu aytedan kul win tǝɣrǝmt ǝn Ludda ǝd win azawaɣ wa n Šaron, tǝzzar ǝhdan-du s Ǝmǝli.

As itaggu awen aɣrǝm ǝn Yaffa tǝxsâr daɣ-as tǝnalkimt ǝn Ɣaysa tǝgât esǝm Tabita, almaɣna n esǝm wa daɣ tǝlyunant Dorkas, almaɣna «Tenert». Wǝr tǝgmed ar s igi ǝn mazalan olaɣnen ǝd tǝkutawen i maddararan.
Adan en da a daɣ tǝrin, aba-tat. Tǝtawašarad, tǝtawasansa daɣ ahan wa n afalla ǝn suru.
Dad imos as Ludda wǝr tǝggug Yaffa, as ǝslan nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa win ǝhanen Yaffa as Butros iha Ludda, zammazalan sǝr-ǝs ǝššin meddan fǝl ad t-ansǝyan a tan-d-akku tarmâd.

Inkar Butros iddew dǝr-san. As din-osa, ewayan-tu ǝs suru wa tǝha tǝɣǝssa ǝn tǝntut, ǝkkanat-idu tǝdoden šin as wǝr ǝdderan meddan-nasnat hallinat, sakninat-tu šikadkaden ǝd sǝlsa wiyyad a dasnat-tǝga Dorkas harwa tǝddâr.
Issǝrdaɣ Butros awedan kul, igaraffat ad itattar. As issǝnda tǝwatray-net, imalallay-du taɣǝssa ǝn tǝntut ta aba, inna: «Tabita, ǝnkǝr-du», tǝzzar tora šittawen-net, tǝnay Butros, tǝqqim-du.
Izzal-as-in ǝfus-net, illil-as ǝs tebadday, amaran iɣra-du imizdagan ǝd tǝdoden šin as wǝr ǝdderan meddan-nasnat, issǝkn-asan-tat tǝddâr.
Itawasla awen daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Yaffa ketnet, tǝzzar ǝzzǝgzanan aytedan aggotnen s Ǝmǝli.
Iha Butros Yaffa har irǝw, illa ɣur alǝs iyyan igân esǝm Simɣon as imos ǝššǝɣǝl-net ǝšifǝl ǝn gǝškan.
Aɣrǝm ǝn Qaysarǝya ih-ay alǝs iyyan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝrrum igân esǝm Kornilǝyas, imos iyyan daɣ kabtanatan win azzarnen y agan ǝn sojitan was itawannu «Italǝya».
Imos alǝs iksudan Mǝššina, iɣbâd-tu ǝnta d aytedan n ahan-net ketnasan, itaggu šikutawen aggotnen i Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, faw deɣ itattar ǝs Mǝššina.
As ǝzǝl iyyan ɣur amaḍal ǝn karad alwaqan win tazzar, inafalal-as-du angalos ǝn Mǝššina, inay-tu as d-iggaz ehan-net, inn-as: «Kornilǝyas!»
Irmaɣ Kornilǝyas, igar šittawen daɣ angalos, inn-as: «Ya Mǝšši, ma tareɣ?» Inn-as angalos: «Šiwatriwen-nak ǝd tǝkutawen-nak ǝggǝzzaynat ǝs Mǝššina, iqbâl-tanat.
Daɣ adi ǝmǝrǝdda, zǝmmizǝl meddan s ǝɣrǝm ǝn Yaffa a dak-d-idawan d alǝs iyyan igân esǝm Simɣon as itawannu Butros,
inniftaɣan i Simɣon wa išafalan igǝškan s ehan-net ihâ tagadamayt n agaraw.»
Ifal-tu angalos wa das-iššewalan ɣas, iɣra-du imaššaɣalan-net ǝššin d iyyan daɣ sojitan win išašɣal imosan awedan iksudan Mǝššina,
issoɣal-asan awa igan kul, amaran izammazal-tan ǝs Yaffa.
Ǝhôzan-in aɣrǝm ǝzǝl wa hadan, as iwar Butros afalla ǝn taɣazamt attayan n ammas n azal fǝl ad agu šiwatriwen.
Itattar den da as t-iggaz gǝlǝk, isaddaran a itša. Tawaggin-as-du mensewan as tu-tobaz tarna n Infas wa Zǝddigan.
Ogga ijǝnnawan as ǝmmoran, itawasaras-du daɣ-san arat olân d ǝfǝr zǝwwǝran itiwattafan s ǝkkozat tǝsǝlkad-net, har dat-ǝs imal.
Ǝhân-tu ǝzzǝnǝfan ǝn mudaran kul win jawankatnen fǝl amaḍal ǝd dǝmǝrdǝmaran ǝd gǝḍad.
Tǝzzar isla y ǝmǝsli iyyan as das-inna: «Butros, ǝnkǝr, tǝgzǝma, tatša!»
Mišan inn-as Butros: «Kala kala Ǝmǝli, id wǝr kala ad ǝtšeɣ a xaraman wala a immidasan.»
Ilas tesalay y ǝmǝsli en as inna: «Awa issǝxlal Mǝššina, wǝrgeɣ kay a tu-z-agin i xaraman!»
Har iga ǝmǝsli en y awen karadat tǝnnawen, amaran immǝdkal ǝfǝr en ǝs jǝnnawan.

Harwada iqqân awen eɣaf ǝn Butros, isamadran daɣ awa zʼiqqǝl almaɣna-net n awa das-d-inafalalan den, as d-ǝbdadan meddan win d-izammazal Kornilǝyas daɣ ǝmi n ahan ǝn Simɣon, dǝffǝr as ǝssistanan ǝd dad illa.
Ǝɣran-du mǝssawǝs n ahan, ǝssǝstanan-tan kud den da ad izzǝbbat Simɣon was itawannu Butros.
Harwada isamadran Butros daɣ awa zʼiqqǝl almaɣna n arat wa das-d-inafalalan as [das]-inna Infas wa Zǝddigan: «Ǝnǝy! Meddan den karad a dǝr-ǝk sastannen.
Ad wǝr tǝzlǝyaɣ aytedan, ǝbdǝd, tazzabbeɣ, tidawa dǝr-san; id nak a tan-d-izammazalan.»
Tǝzzar izzǝbbat-du sǝr-san Butros inn-asan: «Nak da as tǝsaggadam. Ma imos ǝddǝlil wa kawan-d-ewayan da?»

Ǝnnan-as: «Kornilǝyas wa n kabtan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝrrum a dana-d-izammazalan, imosan alǝs oɣâdan, n ǝmiksad ǝn Mǝššina, ǝssiɣmaran-tu Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ketnasan. Ǝnta as inafalal angalos zǝddigan ǝn Mǝššina omar-tu s a kay-issǝgmǝy, tasaɣ-in ehan-net fǝl ad aslu y awa za tanna.»
Amaran izzogaz-tan-du Butros, isammagarat-tan. As affaw, iddew dǝr-san. Ǝddewan dǝr-ǝs arat daɣ nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa win n ǝɣrǝm ǝn Yaffa.
As ǝzǝl wa hadan ewadan aɣrǝm wa n Qaysarǝya. As din-osan da, iqqâl-asan Kornilǝyas ǝnta ǝd marwan-net d aytedan win dǝr ikna tǝmmidwa s ǝnta a tan-d-iɣran.
As zama din-iggâz Butros ehan, issǝlkad-as-du Kornilǝyas, igaraffat ɣur daran-net, issǝjad-as.
Mišan issǝbdad-tu Butros, inn-as: «Ǝbdǝd! Nak aggadǝm ɣas a ǝmosa.»
Ǝggazan ehan mišawalan, os-in daɣ-as Butros aljamaɣat tagget.

Tǝzzar inn-asan: «Tǝssânam kawanay iman-nawan as issixram ǝlqanun ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud y iyyan daɣ-san tassaq madeɣ iguz n ahan n awedan wǝr nǝmos iyyan daɣ Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud. Mišan nak issosan-i Mǝššina daɣ as ad wǝr agaɣ y awedan waliyyan iduf n as i xaraman wala immidas.
Adi da fǝlas, as di-tǝssǝgmayam, ǝkkeq-qawan-du ǝddi da wǝr ǝgeɣ asarǝw waliyyan. Amaran ǝmǝrǝdda ǝmǝlat-i ǝddǝlil wa fǝl di-tǝssǝgmayam.»
Inn-as Kornilǝyas: «Ǝzǝl iyyan tattara daɣ ahan-in, ila adi ǝmǝrǝdda karad adan, wǝr ǝsleɣ a igan as dat-i ibdad alǝs ilsân isǝlsa bilazlaznen.
Tǝzzar inn-i: "Kornilǝyas! Tǝwatray-nak tǝqbâl, šikutawen-nak deɣ iqbâl-tanat Mǝššina.
Daɣ adi, zǝmmizǝl ǝs Yaffa, tǝssǝgmǝya Simɣon was itawannu Butros. Inniftaɣ y alǝs igân Simɣon wa išafalan igǝškan ihân tagadamayt n agaraw."
Tǝzzar ǝssǝgmayaq-qay tamazayt tǝdi da, olâɣ deɣ as du-toseɣ. Amaran ǝmǝrǝdda ketnana nǝlla da dat Mǝššina, fǝl ad nǝssǝsǝm y arat kul was kay-omar Ǝmǝli s a danaq-qu-tanna.»
Iššewal Butros inna: «Ǝmǝrǝdda ǝgreɣ as, tidǝt daɣ a imos as Mǝššina wǝr izlay aytedan.
Kalar awedan kul wa t-iksudan, itaggu awa oɣadan, awedan wǝdi, ad t-iqbǝl Mǝššina, a tǝqqal tawšet-net.
Issoka-du Kǝl-Israyil awal-net imosan isalan n Ǝlinjil, ǝmmâlnen isalan n alxer wa ihakku Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix, ǝnta wa n Ǝmǝli n awedan kul.
Tǝssânam daɣ awa igan daɣ akal kul ǝn Yahudǝyya, intâ-du adi daɣ wa n Galilaya dǝffǝr tǝlxutbat ta iga Yaxya y aytedan daɣ batu n alamaɣ daɣ aman;

d ǝmmǝk was issǝkna Mǝššina aytedan as Ɣaysa wa n Nazaret a issannafran ǝs tahakkay ta t-iga Infas wa Zǝddigan ǝd tarna. Tǝssânam deɣ daɣ tilalt ta iga akal itamazal ǝlluɣ, izuzǝy aytedan kul win daɣ innoda Iblis, id tarna ǝn Mǝššina a igraw.
Nakkanay inǝmmuzal nǝggǝyat awa iga ketnet daɣ ǝɣrǝm wa n Yerusalam d akal sa hadan wa n Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud. Ǝnta wa itawataytayan fǝl tǝgǝttawt, aba-tu;
issǝnkar-t-idu Mǝššina ǝzǝl wa n karad dǝffǝr iba-net, ikf-ay turagat n ad itǝwǝnǝy iddâr.

Wǝrgeɣ aytedan kul a t-ǝnaynen, kalar wǝr t-inay ar šigǝyyawen šin isannafran Mǝššina harwa dat alwaq, a tanat-imosan nakkanay win dǝr-ǝs ǝdrawnen tettay ǝd tassay dǝffǝr tanakra ta d-iga daɣ tamattant.
Tǝzzar omar-ana Ɣaysa s ad nǝmǝl Ǝlinjil y aytedan, naggayyat-asan as, ǝnta da, a isannafran Mǝššina ig-ay ǝmašraɣ n id t-illa awedan, gǝr za win ǝddarnen wala win aba.
Ǝnta en da as ǝggǝyyen ǝnnǝbitan kul as, i sǝr-ǝs izzǝgzanan ad igrǝw tǝsureft ǝn bakkadan-net s esǝm-net.»
Harwada iššewal Butros as d-izzǝbbat Infas wa Zǝddigan fǝl aljamaɣat ketnet ta tǝssǝsamat i tǝlxutbat-net.
Ikna awen ǝsǝmmǝklǝl ǝs nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa win Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win d-ǝddewnen ǝd Butros, âs, wala aytedan win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud da garrawan s igǝt tǝhǝkkut ta n Infas wa Zǝddigan.
Fǝlas sallan-asan ǝššewalan awalan wǝr nǝtawazday, ǝmmâlan adkul ǝn Mǝššina. Tǝzzar inna Butros:
«Awak ma zʼigdǝlan y aytedan ǝgânen y Infas wa Zǝddigan agaraw wa das-nǝga ad tǝwǝsǝlmǝɣan daɣ aman?»
Amaran omar s ad tǝwǝsǝlmǝɣan daɣ aman s esǝm ǝn Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix. Dǝffǝr awen ǝgmayan daɣ Butros a ɣur-san agu adan.
Ǝslan nǝmmuzal ǝd mǝdrayan daɣ ǝzǝgzan win ǝhanen akal wa n Yahudǝyya as, ǝllân-tu aytedan wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝzzigzannen ǝntanay da s awal ǝn Mǝššina.
Alwaq wad iggǝzzay Butros ǝs Yerusalam, ǝššewalan fall-as inalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa win Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win ǝttafnen alɣadat-nasan ta n ǝmǝnkǝd.
Ǝnnan-as: «Manǝmmǝk as tǝtaggaza ehan n aytedan wǝr nǝmmǝnkad, wala tǝdarraw dǝr-san imensewan.»
Tǝzzar issoɣal-asan Butros awa igan kul, wa n ǝnǝtti, inn-asan:

«Tattara daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Yaffa as di-tobaz tarna n Infas wa Zǝddigan, inafalal-i arat iyyan. Arat wa, itawasaras-du daɣ jǝnnawan, olâ d ǝfǝr zǝwwǝran itiwattafan s ǝkkozat tǝsǝlkad-net, har dat-i d-imal.
Ǝswada daɣ-as, zaggazdaq-qu, ǝnayaɣ daɣ-as eharay, ǝd tǝwaqqast ǝd dǝmǝrdǝmaran ǝd gǝḍad.
Tǝzzar ǝsleɣ y ǝmǝsli wa di-innan: "Butros, ǝnkǝr, tǝgzǝma, tatša!"
Mišan ǝnneɣ-as: "Kala kala Ǝmǝli, id imi-nin wǝr kala t-iggaz arat xaraman wala iyyan immidasan."
Ǝlasa tesalay y ǝmǝsli en as inna daɣ jǝnnawan: "Awa issǝxlal Mǝššina, wǝrgeɣ kay a tu-z-agin i xaraman!"
Har iga ǝmǝsli en y awen karadat tǝnnawen, amaran itawarkab-in awen ketnet ǝs jǝnnawan.
Tamazayt ten da a d-ǝbdadan karad meddan s ahan wa daɣ ǝssǝgana, sǝr-i d-ǝmmozalnen daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Qaysarǝya.
Tǝzzar inn-i Infas wa Zǝddigan a dǝr-san idawa ǝddi da. Ad wǝr ǝzlǝyaɣ aytedan. Ǝddewa deɣ ǝd mǝdrayan-nana sǝdis win, har nǝggaz ehan n alǝs wa di-d-issǝgmǝyan.
Issoɣal-ana ǝmmǝk was das-inafalal angalos daɣ ahan-net, ibdad dat-ǝs inn-as: "Zǝmmizǝl awedan s ǝɣrǝm ǝn Yaffa y a dak-d-idaw ǝd Simɣon was itawannu Butros.
A dak-agu amagrad a sǝr-ǝk du-z-awǝyan efsan kay d aɣaywan-nak ketnet."
Harwada wǝr ǝhoga ǝššewala as fall-asan d-iga Infas wa Zǝddigan ǝzǝbbi wa fall-ana d-iga nakkanay daɣ tizarat.
Tǝzzar ǝkteɣ-du tǝnna ta iga Ǝmǝli: "Yaxya, aman a daɣ issǝlmaɣ aytedan, mišan kawanay, Infas wa Zǝddigan a daɣ za tǝtǝwǝsǝlmǝɣam."
Daɣ adi, dad zamas ig-asan Mǝššina tǝhǝkkut zun ta danaɣ-iga as nǝzzǝgzan s Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix, ma ǝmosa nak as gaddala i Mǝššina igi n awa ira?»
As tǝsla aljamaɣat i salan win, tǝffǝsta, tǝzzar ad tǝmmal Mǝššina tǝgannu: «Daɣ adi aytedan win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, da issǝfrak-kan Mǝššina ad utaban, ǝgrǝwan tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat.»

Inalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa win izawwazawaz alɣazab wa d-izrayan ǝtǝwǝnɣa n Ǝstefanos, ǝglan wiyyad har osan akal wa n Fenisǝya, wiyyad osan akal imosan gǝrwǝtlan as itawannu Qibrus, wiyyad osan aɣrǝm wa n Antǝyoxǝya. Ǝmmâlan awal ǝn Mǝššina, eges i Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ɣas.

Dǝr iga awen da ya, wiyyad daɣ-san n akal wa n Qibrus ǝd wa n Qǝrwan, as din-osan aɣrǝm wa n Antǝyoxǝya ǝššewalan y aytedan win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win ǝššewalnen tǝlyunant, ǝmmâlan-asan isalan n Ǝlinjil n Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa.
Tǝdhal-tan tarna ǝn Mǝššina daɣ awa taggin, tǝzzar ǝzzǝgzanan aytedan aggotnen ǝs Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix, ǝtuban, ǝlkaman y Ǝmǝli imosan ǝmǝnokal-nasan.
Isalan n awen ewadan-in Ǝlkǝnisat ta tǝhat Yerusalam, tǝzzar tǝzammazal Barnabas s ǝɣrǝm n Antǝyoxǝya.
As din-osa inay arraxmat ǝn Mǝššina ta du-tǝzzǝbbet den, iddǝwat. Tǝzzar ig-asan ketnasan ǝnnǝsixa imosan ad ǝlkǝman y Ǝmǝli.
Ǝnta iman-net Barnabas, alǝs olâɣan a imos, itkâran Infas wa Zǝddigan, issohat deɣ ǝzǝgzan-net. Ǝzzǝgzanan aytedan wiyyad aggotnen s Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa.
Amaran ikka Barnabas aɣrǝm ǝn Tarsa, isaggad i Talut.

As t-igraw, iddew-du dǝr-ǝs s Antǝyoxǝya. Ǝgan daɣ-as awatay iɣrâdan osâɣan ǝd nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa win ǝhanen Ǝlkǝnisat ten, sasaɣrin aytedan aggotnen. Aɣrǝm wen da n Antǝyoxǝya en a daɣ ǝssǝntan aytedan teɣaray nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa s esǝm wa n «ǝlmǝsixitan».
Adan en da a daɣ ǝgmadan ǝnnǝbitan wiyyad Yerusalam, ǝrasan s ǝɣrǝm wa n Antǝyoxǝya.

Ibdad iyyan daɣ-san igân esǝm Agabus, imal dat alwaq ǝs tarna n Infas wa Zǝddigan as, ilkâm ad agu laz labasan daɣ ǝddǝnet ketnet. Laz en da deɣ osa-du s ǝmmǝk was t-imal daɣ azzaman n ǝmǝnokal Klawdǝyus Qaysara.
Tǝzzar namardan nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa win Antǝyoxǝya fǝl tanat tǝmosat ad irǝg akkiyyan daɣ-san awa ifrag sǝssiwǝyan tadhǝlt ta i mǝdrayan-nasan daɣ ǝzǝgzan win ǝhanen akal ǝn Yahudǝyya.
Ǝgan awen da, ǝgan širgitan-nasan daɣ ǝfus ǝn Barnabas ǝd Talut y a tanat-awǝyan i muzaran n Ǝlkǝnisat ta tǝhat Yahudǝyya.
Azzaman en da a daɣ issǝnta ǝmǝnokal Herod ǝzǝɣɣǝzzǝb n arat daɣ aytedan n Ǝlkǝnisat.
Isassanɣa ǝs takoba Yaqub wa n amadray ǝn Yaxya.
As inay as oggaman Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud awen, isattarmas Butros. Itaggu awen adan n ǝmud wa daɣ tattin aytedan šigǝlwen šin wǝr iha xamira.
Isassag-ay daɣ kasaw, issǝwǝq-qu i maraw sojitan ǝd sǝdis a tu-tinǝmǝzrǝynen s ǝkkoz ǝkkoz. Otâs a das-išrǝɣ dat awedan kul dǝffǝr ǝmud wa n Akkay.
A iha Butros kasaw den, Ǝlkǝnisat ǝnta tǝdgâz wǝllen tǝtansay-as Mǝššina.
As ahad wad zʼifaw išrǝɣ-as Herod, insâ Butros gǝr ǝššin sojitan a t-ǝttâfnen s ǝššin sassaran, ǝbdâdan deɣ magazan wiyyad dat ǝmi ǝn kasaw.

Wala a ihogan inafalal-du angalos iyyan n Ǝmǝli, imalawlaw adag wa daɣ insa Butros daɣ ammas ǝn kasaw. Tǝzzar idas angalos tasaga ǝn Butros, issǝnkar-tu inn-as: «Ǝbdǝd tarmâd!» Ǝrtakan sassaran win as ǝkradan fassan-net daɣ tamazayt ten.
Harwa inn-as: «Ǝzlǝg isǝlsa-nak, tǝsǝlaɣ iɣateman-nak.» Iga Butros awen da. «Ǝmǝrǝdda ǝzlǝg ǝbǝrnuz-nak, tǝlkǝmaɣ-i-du.»
Igmad-du Butros ilkâm y angalos, wǝr issen as awa itaggu angalos den tidǝt a imos, iɣil targǝt awen.

Okayan fǝl magazan win azzarnen ǝd win ǝllanen dǝnnǝg-san, amaran osan-du tǝsǝhǝrt ǝn tǝzoli tǝswâdat sa sǝr ǝɣrǝm. Tǝnnolam dat-san šin man-net, ǝrdaɣan. Ǝssǝwalan ǝd tarrayt iyyat, wala a ihogan ifal-tu angalos.

Tǝzzar iggaz Butros annawalat n aɣaf-net, inna: «Ǝmǝrǝdda ǝkkasaɣ aššak daɣ-as, Ǝmǝli Mǝššina a d-izammazalan angalos-net, ikkas-i-du daɣ fassan n ǝmǝnokal Herod ǝd talbast kul tas ǝran Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud a di-tǝgrǝw.»
Amaran igra taɣara-net, ikka ehan ǝn Maryama ta n anna ǝn Yaxya was itawannu Markus. Ǝmminayan ɣur-ǝs aytedan aggotnen tansayan Mǝššina.
Ikawkaw imi n aɣalla, tǝgla-du tamaššaɣalt tǝgât esǝm Ɣoda y ad tǝssǝn awa imos awedan.
As tǝzday ǝmǝsli ǝn Butros, awa tǝga daɣ tǝdǝwit, edag n a das-talǝm, tozal tǝqqal ammas n ahan, tǝmal as Butros illa dat ǝmi n aɣalla.
Ǝnnan-as: «Kam, ǝmmǝskǝl a tǝgeɣ!» Mišan tǝzazzayyar-asan daɣ-as ǝnta daɣ awen. Amaran ǝnnan-as: «Daɣ adi angalos-net adi.»
A ǝgannin awen, Butros ǝnta itakawkaw-asan imi n aɣalla. As olaman, ǝnayan-tu, iga sǝr-san awen ǝsǝmmǝklǝl labasan.

Isaddagan-asan s ǝfus-net ad affastin, tǝzzar imal-asan tǝmǝwit kul tas t-id-ikkas Ǝmǝli Mǝššina daɣ kasaw. Inn-asan deɣ: «Ǝmǝlǝt adi i Yaqub ǝd mǝdrayan-nana win hadatnen.» Amaran ifal-tan, ikka edag iyyan.
As affaw, tǝga tǝnajarwayat labasat daɣ sojitan; akk iyyan isastan ǝmidi-net d awa iga Butros.

As t-id-aba y aytedan win as t-issǝswad Herod, issǝstan sojitan win t-ogaznen, amaran omar s ad tawanɣin kǝrǝz. Dǝffǝr awen igmad Herod akal wa n Yahudǝyya, izagaday ikka aɣrǝm ǝn Qaysarǝya y a daɣ-as agu tamert.

Awen as itaggu, Herod ih-ay alham labasan n aytedan n ǝɣrǝm wa n Tir ǝd wa n Sidon. Idhal-tan Blastus wa n ǝmǝššewwǝr ǝn Herod, namannakan zammazalan ǝs Herod almawakkilan-nasan, fǝl a dǝr-ǝs aknin, fǝlas akal-net a du-gammadan sudar-nasan.
As d-osa ǝzǝl wa itawasanafranan, izlag Herod isǝlsa-net win taɣmar tǝzzar iqqim fǝl tǝxawit-net ta n taɣmar, amaran iššewal i tamattay.
Ad saɣaren aytedan, gannin: «Ǝmǝsli wa in ǝmǝli iyyan, wǝrgeɣ in awedan!»
Wala a ihogan iwat-tu angalos n Ǝmǝli fǝlas igi a iga iman-net daɣ adag ǝn Mǝššina, wǝr iga y Ǝmǝli adkul wa dǝr ihor; tǝzzar ǝtšanat-tu tǝwakkawen, aba-tu.
Awal ǝn Mǝššina ǝnta, igla itiwǝzǝwiz, tigatan aytedan win sǝr ǝzzǝgzannen.
Amaran Barnabas ǝd Talut as ǝɣradan ǝššǝɣǝl wa tan-d-ewayan s ǝɣrǝm ǝn Yerusalam, ǝqqalan s as d-ǝhan, ǝddewan ǝd Yaxya was itawannu Markus.

Ǝlkǝnisat ta tǝhat aɣrǝm n Antǝyoxǝya ǝhân-tat ǝnnǝbitan ǝd mǝsǝssǝɣra ǝmosnen Barnabas ǝd Simɣon was itawannu "Akawel" ǝd Luqǝyus wa n akal ǝn Qǝrwan ǝd Manahin wa inamadwalan d ǝmǝnokal Herod daɣ ahan iyyanda amaran ǝd Talut.
Ǝzǝl iyyan ad ǝmminayan ǝɣbâdan Ǝmǝli ǝzuman deɣ, inn-asan Infas wa Zǝddigan: «Sǝwǝrat-i Barnabas ǝd Talut aganna fǝl ad agin ǝššǝɣǝl was tan-d-ǝɣreɣ.»
Ǝzuman ǝgan šiwatriwen tǝzzar, amaran ǝssǝwaran Barnabas ǝd Talut ifassan-nasan ǝgan-asan šiwatriwen, dǝffǝr adi ǝssǝglan-tan.
Issoka Infas wa Zǝddigan Barnabas ǝd Talut aɣrǝm ǝn Salukǝya. Ǝggazan daɣ-as aɣlal n aman ǝkkan akal imosan gǝrwǝtlan as itawannu Qibrus.
As osan aɣrǝm ǝn Salamin, ad ǝmmâlan awal ǝn Mǝššina daɣ nan n ǝlɣibada win Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud. Iddew dǝr-san Yaxya was itawannu Markus. Illil-asan idhâl-tan.
Ǝrzagan Qibrus, sannaqqaban-tu har osan aɣrǝm ǝn Bafus. Den da ad ǝmmǝnayan d alǝs iyyan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud igân esǝm Bar-Ɣaysa n amaššaɣaw, igannin ǝnta ǝnnǝbi.
Amaran osâɣ ǝd Sarjǝyus Bulǝs wa n ǝnaxkim n akal, imosan awedan ilân ǝgǝrri. Issǝgmay ǝmuzar wa Barnabas ǝd Talut fǝlas ikna ǝsǝnnǝhǝl ǝn tara n ad aslu y awal ǝn Mǝššina.
Mišan inkar Elǝymas wa n amaššaɣaw – awen da a imosan almaɣna n esǝm-net daɣ tǝlyunant – iqqal ǝllid-nasan, ad igammay d ad igdǝl y ǝnaxkim wen ǝzǝgzan.
Tǝzzar ijajjanɣal daɣ-as Talut, as itawannu deɣ Bulǝs, igrâwan s igǝt Infas wa Zǝddigan,

inn-as: «Agg Aššaytan, azangaw n arat kul wa oɣadan. Wǝr t-illa ǝzzǝnǝf ǝn tǝkǝrras a kay-wǝr-nǝha, ǝmǝkkerrǝs n ǝnallabus a tǝmosaɣ. Ǝmmay ad za tammazzayaɣ d agamay n ǝsǝfrǝɣ ǝn tarrayt toɣâdat n Ǝmǝli Mǝššina?

Ǝmǝrǝdda ǝnǝy, a fall-ak assansu Ǝmǝli ǝfus-net, taddarɣala. Ad tagaɣ azzaman wǝr tǝlesaɣ anay n ǝnnur ǝn tǝfuk.» Tamazayt ten da a fall-as ǝganat šiyyay, idalammat fall-as amaḍal, tǝzzar ad iddâz, igammay i t-ilwayan.
As inay ǝnaxkim wen awa igan den, izzǝgzan. Isimaklal sǝr-ǝs ǝsǝssǝɣri was isla daɣ batu n Ǝmǝli.
Iggaz Bulǝs aɣlal n aman ǝnta ǝd midawan-net daɣ Bafus, ǝkkan aɣrǝm ǝn Bǝrge ihân akal ǝn Banfilǝya. Den da a dǝr-san immǝzzay Yaxya was itawannu Markus, iqqal Yerusalam.
Ǝntanay amaran ǝgmadan Bǝrge, ǝkkan aɣrǝm n Antǝyoxǝya wa n akal ǝn Bissidǝya. As iga ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt, ǝggazan ehan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, ǝqqiman.
As tawaɣran daggan daɣ Ǝttǝwret d Ǝlkǝttaban win Ǝnnǝbitan sa hadan, ǝnnan-asan-in muzaran n ahan n ǝlɣibada wen: «Imǝdrayan-nana, kud tǝll-ay batu as za tǝsǝssuhet ǝzǝgzan n aytedan, tagim-tat.»
Ibdad Bulǝs, isaddagan-asan s ǝfus-net ad affastin, amaran inna: «Meddan win Kǝl-Israyil ǝd kawanay win miksadan ǝn Mǝššina, sǝsǝmat-i!

Mǝššina di n Ǝmǝli ǝn tamattay ta da n Israyil a isannafranan imarawan-nana, tǝzzar issǝgat-tan daɣ elan win daɣ ǝmosan inaftaɣan daɣ akal ǝn Masar, dǝffǝr adi ikkas-tan-du daɣ-as ǝs tarna n ǝfus-net.
Iga edag n ǝkkozat tǝmǝrwen n awatay, šin ǝgan daɣ taneray, izizaydar dǝr-san.
Ikf-en as ǝrzan ǝssayat tawšeten daɣ akal ǝn Kanan, ikf-en akal-nasan, iggaz tǝkasit-nasan.
Awen ketnet, edag n ǝkkozat tǝmad n awatay ǝd sǝmmosat tǝmǝrwen a daɣ iga. Dǝffǝr awen a dasan-izuzir ǝlqalitan taqqalan-asan imǝnokalan har azzaman n ǝnnǝbi Samǝwel.
Azzaman en da a daɣ ǝgmayan ǝmǝnokal, tǝzzar ikf-en Mǝššina Talut ag Kiš wa n tawšet ta n Benyamin. Iga ǝkkozat tǝmǝrwen n awatay ixkâm fall-asan.
Dǝffǝr adi ikkas-tu Mǝššina da taɣmar, iga Dawǝd daɣ adag-net s ǝnta a fǝl inna Mǝššina: "Ǝgrawa Dawǝd ag Yasay, imosan alǝs ilkâman i tara-nin, wa zʼammazalan ǝs tara-nin ketnet."
Ihayawan-net a daɣ d-ikkas Mǝššina Ɣaysa s ǝnta a imosan Ǝmaɣlas was iga arkawal-net i Kǝl-Israyil.
Dat assa-net ad iga Yaxya i tamattay n Israyil ketnet isalan ǝmosnen ad utaban, tǝwǝsǝlmǝɣan daɣ aman, assaknu adi tǝtubt-nasan.
As ibuk Yaxya y ǝsǝndi n ǝššǝɣǝl-net, ad igannu: "Ma tǝɣilam, ma ǝmosaɣ? Wǝr ǝmosaɣ za awedan was tǝɣilam. Kala, kala! Ilkâm-i-du, nak wǝr ǝweda wala arra ǝn suɣan ǝn ɣateman-net."
Imǝdrayan-in kawanay win hayawan n Ibrahim ǝd kawanay win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud tǝksudam Mǝššina, isalan n ǝlɣillas wa, nakkanay as tan-d-issoka Mǝššina.

Amaran aytedan ǝn Yerusalam ǝd muzaran-nasan wǝr ǝgren awa imos Ɣaysa, wǝr ǝgren deɣ wala daɣ awa ǝnnan ǝnnǝbitan daɣ Ǝlkǝttaban win tawaɣrinen akk ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt daɣ nan n ǝlɣibada, ǝssǝndan awa ǝnnan ǝnnǝbitan win di s abbaz wa t-ǝgan s ǝššǝriɣa.
Wǝr ǝgrewan arat waliyyan a t-issiwaran tamattant, mišan harkid awen, ǝgmayan daɣ Bilatǝs a daɣ-as tǝwǝkkǝsan man.
As ǝssǝndan arat kul awa fall-as ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban, ǝkkasan-t-idu fǝl tǝgǝttawt, ǝgan-tu daɣ ǝzǝkka.
Mišan issǝnkar-t-idu Mǝššina daɣ tamattant.
Iga adan aggotnen itinǝfilil y aytedan win dǝr-ǝs d-ǝddawnen daɣ akal ǝn Galilaya ǝgǝzzayyan s ǝɣrǝm ǝn Yerusalam. Ǝntanay a ǝmosnen ǝmǝrǝdda šigǝyyawen-net ɣur tamattay n Israyil.
Amaran nakkanay da, nǝtagg-awan isalan n Ǝlinjil, ǝmosnen isalan win as itawagga arkawal-nasan i marawan-nana.
Arkawal wen issǝnd-anaq-qu Mǝššina nakkanay win hayawan-nasan s ǝsǝnkǝr wa d-iga Ɣaysa s ǝmmǝk was iktab daɣ tǝsarnat ta n sanatat n Azzabur, as inna daɣ salan ǝn Ɣaysa:
"Kay Barar-in, ǝqqalaɣ azalada Abba-nak."
Ǝsǝnkǝr wa t-id-iga Mǝššina daɣ tamattant, da wǝr tǝrḳa tǝɣǝssa-net daɣ ǝzǝkka imâl-tu Mǝššina daɣ Ǝlkǝttaban ǝs tǝmǝwit ta, as inna:
"A kawan-akfa arraxmaten zaddognen, ǝtiddanen šin as ǝgeɣ arkawal-nasnat i Dawǝd."
Iktâb deɣ as:
"Wǝr za tayya Ǝmizdag-nak arḳu daɣ ǝzǝkka."
Dawǝd amaran, dǝffǝr as immozal daɣ azzaman-net s aratan win ixtas Mǝššina, aba-tu, itawanbal dǝgma ǝn marawan-net, tǝrḳa tǝɣǝssa-net;
mišan Ɣaysa, ǝnta a d-issǝnkar Mǝššina daɣ tamattant, wǝr tǝrḳa tǝɣǝssa-net.

Daɣ adi imǝdrayan-in ǝssǝnat as tǝsureft ǝn bakkadan, tǝttimal-awan ǝs tarrayt-net; amaran i sǝr-ǝs izzǝgzanan ad igrǝw tǝdarfit daɣ aratan kul win as wǝr ifreg tǝdarfit daɣ-san ǝs tarrayt ta n lǝkkum y ǝššǝriɣa wa d-izzǝbben fǝl ǝnnǝbi Musa.

Daɣ adi imǝdrayan-in ǝssǝnat as tǝsureft ǝn bakkadan, tǝttimal-awan ǝs tarrayt-net; amaran i sǝr-ǝs izzǝgzanan ad igrǝw tǝdarfit daɣ aratan kul win as wǝr ifreg tǝdarfit daɣ-san ǝs tarrayt ta n lǝkkum y ǝššǝriɣa wa d-izzǝbben fǝl ǝnnǝbi Musa.
Adi a fǝl za tǝnkǝdam y a kawan-igrǝw awa ǝmalan ǝnnǝbitan, as ǝnnan:
"Ǝnǝyat kawanay win nujaban; sǝmmǝklǝlat, tǝhlǝkam; fǝlas ad ammazala arat daɣ azzaman-nawan, as kud dawan-iga awedan isalan-net kul da, wǝr das-za-tǝzzǝgzǝnam."»
Igammad Bulǝs ǝd Barnabas as daɣ-san ǝgmayan aytedan ad d-ǝlǝsan tewaɣlay ǝzǝl ǝn tǝsanfawt wa d-izayan fǝl a dasan-ǝššitin daɣ igi ǝn salan win den.

As tǝwazawaz ǝljǝmaɣat, ǝddewan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud aggotnen d aytedan wiyyad ad d-ǝhdânen s ǝddin wa n Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝd Bulǝs ǝd Barnabas. Mašawalan dǝr-san, gammayan daɣ-san ad zǝzzǝwen daɣ arraxmat ǝn Mǝššina ta ǝgrawan.
As d-iɣlay ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt, tǝddew-du taššam n ǝɣrǝm ketnet y ad issǝsǝm y awal n Ǝmǝli.
As ǝnayan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud igǝt ǝn tamattay, ǝggaznat-tan tǝsmiten labasnen, ad sabahawan Bulǝs, rabbadan-tu.

Tǝzzar inn-asan Bulǝs ǝd Barnabas wǝr tǝha tasa ǝn wala: «Kawanay a iddǝraran s a dawan-attamal awal ǝn Mǝššina ǝs tizarat, mišan dad zamas tugayam sǝr-ǝs, wǝr tǝssǝharam iman-nawan ǝd tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat, wǝdi ad nǝmǝlǝllǝy s aytedan win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.
Fǝlas awen da as danaɣ-omar Ǝmǝli Mǝššina s ǝmmǝk was inna daɣ Ǝlkǝttaban as ǝnnan:
"Ǝgeq-qay ǝnnur i tawšeten šin wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud fǝl ad tawǝyaɣ isalan n ǝlɣillas har d a du-tǝraz ǝddǝnet."
As ǝslan aytedan win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud y awen, ǝddǝwen, ǝzzǝzwǝran awal n Ǝmǝli Mǝššina, ǝzzǝgzanan aytedan kul win as itawatas ad ǝgrǝwan tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat.
Ad itiwǝziwiz awal n Ǝmǝli daɣ akal ketnet.

Mišan ǝnkaran Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝgan ark-man daɣ tǝdoden šiyyad tiwasaɣmarnen ǝhânen ǝddin ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝd muzaran n ǝɣrǝm, ewayan-du ǝs Bulǝs ǝd Barnabas ǝtǝwǝdgaz labasan, tǝzzar ǝstaɣan-tan, ǝkkasan-tan daɣ akal-nasan.
Ǝbbǝkbakan aboqqa ǝn daran-nasan daɣ batu n ǝɣrǝm wen, tǝzzar ǝkkan aɣrǝm wa n Ikonǝyum.
Inalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa win d-oyyan dǝffǝr-san daɣ Antǝyoxǝya amaran, ǝknân tǝfalawist, idnay-tan deɣ Infas wa Zǝddigan.

Iga Bulǝs ǝd Barnabas daɣ ǝɣrǝm n Ikonǝyum arat wa da taggin fawda, a t-imosan iguz n ahan n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud; tǝzzar ǝgan daɣ-as awal a d-ewayan as ǝzzǝgzanan aytedan aggotnen daɣ Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝd Kǝl-Ǝlyunan ǝs Ɣaysa.
Mišan ǝnkaran Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win ugaynen s ǝzǝgzan ǝs Ɣaysa, ǝgan daɣ aytedan win hadatnen wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ark-man ǝs mǝzzǝgzan ǝs Ɣaysa.

Harkid awen iga Bulǝs ǝd Barnabas tamert tagget daɣ Ikonǝyum. Taggin awal a daq-qan wǝr tǝha tasa, tagayyen fǝl Ǝmǝli. Ikf-en Ǝmǝli fǝrregat n igi ǝn tǝlmǝɣjujaten ǝmosnen alɣalamaten d aratan simaklalnen sataddinen tidǝt a mosan salan win ǝqqalnen arraxmat-net.
Mišan tǝzun tamattay n ǝɣrǝm. Wiyyad ǝwaran aganna wa n Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, wiyyad aganna wa n nǝmmuzal.
Ǝnkaran aytedan win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝd Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝd muzaran-nasan sammarkasan ad agin taršǝxšad labasnen i Bulǝs ǝd Barnabas, anɣin-tan kǝrǝz ǝs tǝgur ǝn tǝhun.
As isla Bulǝs ǝd Barnabas awen, ǝgmadan aɣrǝm wen, ǝkkan Lustra ǝd Derbe ǝmosnen iɣǝrman n akal wa n Lukawnǝya ǝd kallan win tan-ǝɣlaynen,
a daɣ-san ǝmmalan isalan n Ǝlinjil.
Aɣrǝm ǝn Lustra ih-ay alǝs n anabdon s as d-ihǝw da, ǝmmutan daran-net, wǝr kala tǝwer takkolt-net amaḍal.
As ǝzǝl iyyan ad issisam i Bulǝs iššewal, idak-ku Bulǝs s asawad, inay daɣ-as as, ila ǝzǝgzan a t-izzozayan;
tǝzzar inn-as s afalla: «Ǝnkǝr, taɣǝda tebadday-nak!» Iggad alǝs, iggaz šin teklay.
As tǝnay tamattay tǝgget awa iga Bulǝs den, ad gannin aytedan s afalla daɣ awal wa n tǝlukawnǝysat: «Imalan ǝhânen šaššelan an aytedan, a fall-ana d-ǝzzǝbbatnen.»
Ǝgan i Barnabas esǝm n iyyan daɣ ǝssǝnaman-nasan as gannin «Zus», Bulǝs ǝgan-as esǝm n iyyan as gannin «Hǝrmes» fǝlas ǝnta a imosan ǝmǝššewǝl.

Inkar ǝlimam n ǝssǝnǝm wa igan «Zus» âs ehan n ǝlɣibada-net iha imi n ǝɣrǝm, isassalway-du ǝs mawan n ǝɣrǝm izǝgran ǝd tǝtǝltǝla ǝn tǝjigay, ira ǝnta ǝd tamattay tagget a tan-agin šizǝgzam i Bulǝs ǝd Barnabas.
Mišan as ǝslan nǝmmuzal win ǝganen Barnabas ǝd Bulǝs awen, zazzarren šikadkaden-nasan fǝl man-nasan, ozalan ǝs tamattay tǝgget ǝdkâlan imaslan-nasan s afalla gannin:

«Xa meddan! Ma tǝtaggim da? Nakkanay wǝr nǝmos ar aytedan ǝn šilaten-nawan. Isalan n Ǝlinjil a dawan-du-neway fǝl ad tammazzayam d ǝlɣibada n ǝssǝnǝman, tutabam ǝs Mǝššina di n Amaɣlol a d-ixlakan ijǝnnawan d amaḍal ǝd gǝrwan d awa tan-ihan kul.
Daɣ elan win ǝrǝwnen, oyya šimattiwen kul, ǝlkamnat i tara ǝn man-nasnat.
Mišan dǝr iga awen da ya, iga i man-net tǝgǝyya id issǝkna ǝlluɣ-net imosan: ǝsufǝy wa dawan-d-itaggu akonak daɣ jǝnnawan, ihakk-iwan šimeren olaɣnen ǝd sudar, isifǝliwis-kawan.»
Gǝrrid as sahhadarren aytedan ǝs batu ta ǝgan den, ǝgdalan-asan a dasan-agin šinagzamen.

Osan-du Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud wiyyad a d-ǝfalnen aɣrǝm n Antǝyoxǝya ǝd wa n Ikonǝyum, ǝššewalan y aytedan har tan-ǝssǝwaran aganna wa-nasan. Ad ǝggaran Bulǝs ǝs tǝhun, dǝffǝr adi zarorawan-tu har dǝr-ǝs ǝgmadan aɣrǝm, ǝɣilan aba-tu.
Mišan as sǝr-ǝs d-ǝddewan nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa, ɣalayɣalayan-tu, ibdad-du iqqal aɣrǝm. As affaw, iddew ǝd Barnabas ǝkkan aɣrǝm ǝn Derbe.
As ǝmalan isalan n Ǝlinjil daɣ ǝɣrǝm wen, ǝlkaman aytedan aggotnen i Ɣaysa; iqqal Bulǝs ǝd Barnabas aɣrǝm ǝn Lustra ǝd wa n Ikonǝyum ǝd wa n Antǝyoxǝya,

ad gammayan daɣ nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa win ɣǝrman win ad zǝzzǝwen daɣ tarrayt-nasan. Šâwalan-asan, talaman-asan fǝl man s ad zǝzzǝwen daɣ ǝzǝgzan-nasan, gannin-asan: «Illikan as, iguz ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina, iddew ǝd tǝssust tagget.»
Ǝkkulluk n Ǝlkǝnisat sinafranan-as imuzaran, ǝššedawan awen ǝd tǝwatriwen d ǝzum, amaran agin-tan daɣ tǝɣlift ǝn Mǝššina di as ǝzzǝgzanan.
Dǝffǝr awen ǝrzagan akal wa n Bissidǝya, okayan ǝs wa n Banfilǝya.
Ǝmalan isalan n Ǝlinjil daɣ ǝɣrǝm wa n Bǝrge, amaran ǝrasan ǝs wa n Attalǝya.
Ǝggazan aɣlal n aman daɣ Attalǝya, ǝnnǝmadan Antǝyoxǝya, aɣrǝm was ǝnta as kala daɣ-as tawaggan daɣ tǝɣlift ǝn Mǝššina y ǝššǝɣǝl wa ǝssǝndan den.

As din-osan, sassaɣran-du aytedan kul n Ǝlkǝnisat, tǝzzar ǝssoɣalan-asan isalan n arat kul was tan-ikfa Mǝššina turagat n igi-net, d ǝmmǝk was olam Mǝššina tarrayt n ǝzǝgzan i tǝmattiwen šin wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.
Dǝffǝr awen ǝmalan ɣur nalkiman win den har ǝgan tamert tagget.

Osan-du meddan wiyyad a d-ǝgmadnen akal ǝn Yahudǝyya aɣrǝm n Antǝyoxǝya ad sasaɣrin inalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa, gannin-asan: «As wǝr tǝlkemam y alɣadat n ǝmǝnkǝd ta d-oyya ǝnnǝbi Musa, wǝr za tǝgrǝwam ǝlɣillas.»

Wǝr irḍa Bulǝs ǝd Barnabas ǝs batu ten, eway-du awen tamazaq labasat gar-essan ǝd Bulǝs ǝd Barnabas. Tǝzzar tǝtawagga tanat n ad aggazzay Bulǝs ǝd Barnabas ǝd nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa wiyyad ǝs Yerusalam fǝl ad ǝnǝyan inǝmmuzal ǝd muzaran n Ǝlkǝnisat daɣ batu ten.

Tǝkf-en Ǝlkǝnisat ta n Antǝyoxǝya arat kul was ǝddǝraran, amaran ǝglan. Ǝrzagan akal wa n Fenisǝya ǝd wa n Samarǝya suɣulan isalan kul ǝn tǝtubt ta d-ǝganat tǝmattiwen šin wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝs Mǝššina. Isifilawas awen wǝllen inalkiman kul win kallan en.
As osan Yerusalam tǝg-asan Ǝlkǝnisat ketnet marxaba ǝd nǝmmuzal ǝd muzaran. Tǝzzar ǝgan daɣ-san isalan n arat kul was tan-ikfa Mǝššina igi-net.
Mišan ǝggadan-du meddan wiyyad ǝn nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa ǝhanen taggayt ta n Farisaytan ǝnnan: «Ǝmǝnkǝd ǝd lǝkkum y ǝlqanun wa n ǝnnǝbi Musa fǝrǝḍ a imos fǝl aytedan win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.»
Tǝzzar ǝmmǝnayan nǝmmuzal ǝd muzaran n Ǝlkǝnisat fǝl ad ǝssǝnan awa zʼagin daɣ batu ten.

As ǝrǝwan ǝmmizaɣan, ibdad Butros inn-asan: «Imǝdrayan-in, tǝssânam as irǝw as di-isannafran daɣ-wan Mǝššina fǝl ad aslin aytedan win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud isalan n Ǝlinjil daɣ imi-nin, ǝzzǝgzǝnan ǝs Mǝššina.
Mǝššina issânan awa ihan ǝwǝl n awedan kul, issikna tǝrǝddawt ta sǝr-san iga ǝs tǝhakkay ta tan-iga Infas wa Zǝddigan ǝs tǝmǝwit tas dana-t-ikfa nakkanay win Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.
Wǝr danaɣ-izannamazlay dǝr-san fǝlas Mǝššina a izazdagan iwallan s ǝzǝgzan sǝr-ǝs.
Daɣ adi ǝmǝrǝdda ma fel tǝtaggim tǝnagmayt i Mǝššina s igi wa tǝtaggim fǝl rawan ǝn nalkiman ǝzuk ǝs wǝrmad ǝfrâgan marawan-nana adakal-net wala deɣ nǝfrâk-ku nakkanay?
Wǝrgeɣ arraxmat n Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa as nǝzzǝgzan, tǝssǝfs-ana? Ǝntanay da za, ǝntanay win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, tǝmǝwit ta da as ǝfsan!»

Tǝzzar tǝffǝsta tamattay ketnet, ǝssǝsaman aytedan i Barnabas ǝd Bulǝs suɣulan isalan kul ǝn tǝlmǝɣjujaten ǝmosnen alɣalamaten d aratan simaklalnen win as tan-ikfa Mǝššina igi-nasan daɣ tǝmattiwen šin wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.
As iffǝsta Barnabas ǝd Bulǝs, iššewal Yaqub, inna: «Imǝdrayan-in, sǝsǝmat-i.
Simɣon Butros issôɣal-ana tǝmǝwit tas issǝnta Mǝššina harwa daɣ tizarat ǝsǝkni ǝn tara ta iga i tǝmattiwen šin wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud s ǝsǝnnǝfrǝn wa daɣ-asnat iga aytedan as zʼǝqqǝlnen tamattay-net.
Amaran inimannak awen d awa ǝnnan ǝnnǝbitan daɣ Ǝlkǝttaban as ǝnnan:
"Ad d-ǝqqǝla dǝffǝr awa, ǝlǝsaɣ i Dawǝd akaras n ahan-net ibirajjen, ǝkrǝsaɣ imǝggulaz-net, ǝssǝbdǝdaq-qu,
fǝl ad ǝgmǝyan aytedan win d-ǝqqimnen Ǝmǝli. Awalla šimattiwen kul šin wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, ad ǝqqǝlnat tamattay-nin, ǝɣbadnat-i. Adi a inna Ǝmǝli wa igan aratan di kul",
fǝl tǝga masnat harwa irǝw.
Awen da fǝlas nak Yaqub, ǝrḍêɣ s ad nayyu ǝsǝmmǝɣitǝr n aytedan win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win du-tutabnen ǝs Mǝššina.
Mišan ǝktǝbatana y-asan širawt, nann-asan ad ammazzayan d ǝsǝmmǝdǝs ǝn man-nasan s arat ad d-immâran ǝssǝnǝm, ammazzayan d igi n ǝzzǝna ǝd tattay ǝn ṣan n ǝmudar tǝnɣa tarzam ǝd tǝssay n ǝzni.
Fǝlas irǝw ad t-ǝmalan ǝlfǝqqitan sasaɣrinen Ǝttawret daɣ ǝkkulluk n ǝɣrǝm, itawaɣru deɣ akk ǝzǝl ǝn tǝsanfawt daɣ nan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win ǝlɣibada.»

Tǝzzar ǝrḍan nǝmmuzal ǝd muzaran d Ǝlkǝnisat ketnet s ad sǝnnǝfrǝnan wiyyad daɣ-san, zǝmmizǝlan-tan s ǝɣrǝm n Antǝyoxǝya, idawan ǝd Bulǝs ǝd Barnabas. Sannafranan Yahuza was itawannu Barsabbas ǝd Silas, ǝmosnen imuzaran daɣ mǝzzǝgzan ǝs Ɣaysa.

Ǝssǝwaran-tan ad awǝyan širawt s ǝnta da awa daɣ-as ǝktaban: «Awa nakkanay inǝmmuzal ǝd muzaran ǝn nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa win mǝdrayan-nawan. Nǝhul-in imǝdrayan-nana win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, win ǝhanen aɣrǝm n Antǝyoxǝya ǝd win ǝhanen akal ǝn Surǝya ǝd wa n Kilikǝya.
Nǝslâ assa wa kawan-in-ǝgan meddan danaɣ-in-ǝfalnen ši wala turagat-nana, ǝɣšadan iman-nawan, ǝššǝwašan-kawan s awa gannin.
Adi a fǝl nǝnamannak ketnana, nǝga tanat ad nǝsǝnnǝfrǝn meddan, nǝzǝmmizǝl-tan-in sǝr-wan, idawan-in ǝd maran-nana Barnabas ǝd Bulǝs,
ǝmosnen meddan ǝgânen iman-nasan daɣ alɣarar fǝl ǝddǝlil n esǝm n Ǝmǝli-nana Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix.
Adi da fǝl din-nǝzammazal Yahuza ǝd Silas fǝl a dawan-ǝlǝsan ǝsuɣǝl ǝn salan win imi s imi.
Fǝlas issîbdad Infas wa Zǝddigan ǝd nǝkkanay iman-nana tanat n as wǝr kawan-za-nǝssǝwǝr ǝzuk waliyyan ar wa n aratan win ǝwwǝjjabnen,

ǝmosnen: ad tammazzayam ǝd tattay n amensay itiwakfan y ǝssǝnǝman ǝd tassay n ǝzni ǝd tattay ǝn ṣan n ǝmudar tǝnɣa tarzam d igi n ǝzzǝna. As tǝttafam iman-nawan fǝl igi n aratan win di, ad tagim a olâɣan. Nǝhul-kawan-in wǝllen.»
Dǝffǝr awen tawasallaman, ǝzagadayyan, ǝqqalan Antǝyoxǝya, ewâyan širawt. As din-ewadan ǝššedawan-du inalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa, ǝkfan-tan širawt ten.
Tǝtawaɣra, tǝzzar saddawen-tan salan talamnen fǝl man win ǝgrawen den.
Amaran iššewal Yahuza ǝd Silas ǝmosnen ǝntanay iman-nasan ǝnnǝbitan ad taggin ǝnnǝsixa aggen i mǝdrayan talaman-asan fǝl man, sisuhen ǝzǝgzan-nasan.
As iga Yahuza ǝd Silas tamert den, ǝssǝllaman-tan mǝdrayan win Antǝyoxǝya fǝl ad ǝqqǝlan Ǝlkǝnisat ta tan-du-tǝzammazalat. [
Mišan issof Silas ad aqqam den da, iqqal âs Yahuza ɣas a iqqalan Yerusalam.]
Ixsar Bulǝs ǝd Barnabas daɣ Antǝyoxǝya, xattaban ǝntanay ǝd wiyyad imǝdrayan aggotnen y aytedan Ǝlinjil n Ǝmǝli, sasaɣrin-asan-tu deɣ.
As ǝgan tamert dǝffǝr awen, inna Bulǝs i Barnabas: «Ǝqqǝlana imǝdrayan-nana daɣ ǝzǝgzan win ǝhanen iɣǝrman kul win daɣ nǝmal awal n Ǝmǝli, ad nǝssǝn awa daɣ-san in-igan.»
Ira Barnabas ad idawan ǝd Yaxya was itawannu Markus.
Mišan inna Bulǝs wǝr ihor ad idawan d alǝs as dat awen a daɣ-san ixtas iman-net daɣ Banfilǝya, wǝr ɣur-san iqqim har sǝkkǝsǝwan ǝššǝɣǝl-nasan.
Tǝkkus talɣa gar-essan har d-eway awen as ǝmmǝzzayan. Iddew Barnabas ǝd Markus ǝggazan aɣlal n aman ǝkkan Qibrus.
Bulǝs ǝnta isannafran Silas, iddew dǝr-ǝs. As t-ǝgan mǝdrayan daɣ tǝɣlift ǝn Mǝššina, igla.
Illil Bulǝs akal wa n Surǝya ǝd wa n Kilikǝya isisuhit ǝzǝgzan n Ǝlkǝnisaten.
Osa Bulǝs aɣrǝm ǝn Derbe, as t-ifal ikka wa n Lustra. Amaran Lustra ih-et ǝnalkim ǝn Ɣaysa igân Timotay s anna-net iyyat daɣ Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud tǝzzigzanat ǝs Ɣaysa, mišan abba-net iyyan daɣ Kǝl-Ǝlyunan.
Ǝmmâlan-tu mǝdrayan daɣ ǝzǝgzan win Lustra d Ikonǝyum ǝlluɣ.
Ira Bulǝs tidawt-net, inkar isammankad-tu fǝl ǝddǝlil ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win ǝhanen akal wen, fǝlas ǝssânan ketnasan as abba-net iyyan daɣ Kǝl-Ǝlyunan a imos.
Aɣrǝm a d-osa Bulǝs ǝd Silas a daɣ-as ǝmǝlan i nalkiman win t-ǝhanen šinaden šin ǝgan nǝmmuzal ǝd muzaran n Ǝlkǝnisat ta n Yerusalam, ǝgmǝyan daɣ-san a dasnat-ǝlkǝman.
Ad itasahat ǝzǝgzan n Ǝlkǝnisaten, tǝyttǝynat akk ǝzǝl.
Irzag Bulǝs ǝd Silas akal wa n Frijǝya ǝd wa n Galatǝya ǝglan okâyan, fǝlas Infas wa Zǝddigan a dasan-igdalan emel n awal ǝn Mǝššina daɣ akal wa Asǝya.
As osan ǝgogas n akal wa n Mǝsǝya, ǝgmayan d iguz n akal wa n Bitinǝya, mišan igdal-asan-tu Infas wa Zǝddigan.
Tǝzzar ǝrzagan Mǝsǝya, ǝzagadayyan s ǝɣrǝm wa n Trowas.
As iga ahad orga Bulǝs: Inay alǝs iyyan n akal ǝn Masedonǝya ibdâd dǝnnǝg-ǝs, itansay-tu, igann-as: «Akka-du Masedonǝya, tǝdhǝlaɣ-ana.»
Iga Bulǝs targǝt ten ɣas, nǝsammatag y iki ǝn Masedonǝya fǝlas nǝkkâs aššak as Mǝššina a danaɣ-iɣran fǝl a daɣ-as nǝmǝl isalan n Ǝlinjil.
Nǝggaz aɣlal n aman daɣ Trowas, nǝnnǝmad akal imosan gǝrwǝtlan as itawannu Samotras. As affaw nǝkka aɣrǝm ǝn Neyabolis.
Ǝnta nǝgmad-tu ǝs wa n Filib imosan aɣrǝm fǝl tǝxkâm Ǝrrum; imos deɣ aɣrǝm wa azzaran daɣ akal ǝn Masedonǝya. Nǝga daɣ-as adan.

As d-ewad ǝzǝl wa n ǝssǝbǝt, ǝzǝl wa n tǝsanfawt ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, nǝgmad-in aɣrǝm ǝs tǝgadamayt ǝn tǝsǝssǝngǝyt iyyat as norda as, ih-et adag a daɣ taggin Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud šiwatriwen. Nogaz-in šidoden ǝmminaynen den, tǝzzar nǝqqim, nǝššewal-asnat, nǝg-asnat deɣ tǝlxutbat.

Tǝssǝsam-ana iyyat daɣ-asnat ǝn tǝmiksat ǝn Mǝššina tǝgât esǝm Lidǝya n ǝɣrǝm ǝn Tǝyatir tǝtaggit jola ǝn tǝbǝddaɣ zaggaɣnen hossaynen. Ora Ǝmǝli ǝwǝl-net, tǝga ǝsǝsǝm olâɣan y awa igannu Bulǝs, tǝzzar tǝzzǝgzan ǝs Ɣaysa.
As tǝtawasalmaɣ daɣ aman ǝnta d aytedan n aɣaywan-net, tonsay-ana, tǝnn-ana: «Zama tǝhannayam as ǝzzigzana s Ǝmǝli, wǝdi akkiwat-du ehan-in tazzabbem daɣ-as.» Tǝgraw-du daɣ-na as nǝrḍa.
Ǝzǝl iyyan nǝkkâ edag ǝn tǝwatriwen wen as nǝmmǝnay ǝd tǝmawat iyyat ǝn tǝklit iha aggǝsuf a das-immalan awa d-izayan, garrawan sǝr-ǝs mǝssawǝs tǝnfa tagget daɣ awen.
Tǝlkam-ana nakkanay ǝd Bulǝs tǝsiɣarat tǝgannu: «Meddan win, eklan ǝn Mǝššina di n Amadkol a ǝmosan. Isalan ǝn tarrayt ta n ǝlɣillas as d-osan y a dawan-tan-agin.»

Tǝga adan aggotnen tǝtaggu awen. Igla Bulǝs har t-išaɣaššašat awen, imalallay-tat-in inna y aggǝsuf wa tat-ihan: «Omaraq-qay ǝs tarna ta tǝhat esǝm ǝn Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix, ǝgmǝd-tat!» Tǝzzar igmad-tat aggǝsuf daɣ tamazayt ten da.
As ǝnayan mǝssawǝs as ab-as sǝr-san tat-du-tǝgammad tǝnfa, ǝbazan Bulǝs ǝd Silas, ǝlwayan-tan s asammanay n ǝɣrǝm, ǝssǝbdadan-tan dat naxkiman.
Ǝnnan i naxkiman: «Meddan win jannajarwayan aɣrǝm-nana. Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud a ǝmosan,
sasaɣrinen aytedan alɣadaten as nakkanay Kǝl-Ǝrrum wǝr nǝla turagat ǝn tǝrǝddawt sǝr-ǝsnat wala lǝkkum y-asnat.»
Tǝnkar tamattay ǝnta da tǝzzan ǝs Bulǝs ǝd Silas. Ǝnnan naxkiman a fall-asan tǝwǝzǝzǝrren sǝlsa, omaran s a dasan-tǝwǝgginat tǝwit.
As tan-ǝyyǝwanan šiwwit, ǝgaran-tan daɣ kasaw, omaran ǝmuzar ǝn kasaw s a dasan-agu aggaz olâɣan.
Ǝmuzar ǝn kasaw deɣ as das-itawanna awen, inkar ig-en daɣ adangaya ǝn kasaw, inday idaran-nasan daɣ šilǝlt.
As isaggaraygaray ahad, ad itattar Bulǝs ǝd Silas sihaken imaslan-nasan taggin deɣ tǝmmalen i Mǝššina, ǝssisaman-asan mǝskǝsa win hadatnen.
Wala a ihogan iga amaḍal ǝnǝgǝynǝgǝy s awa iga daɣ assahat har inagaynagay ahan ǝn kasaw ketnet, ǝnnolamnat tǝsǝhar ǝn kasaw kul tamazayt ten da, zalabben sassaran daɣ mǝskǝsa kul.
Inkar-du ǝmuzar n ahan ǝn kasaw daɣ etǝs. As inay šisǝhar ǝn kasaw ǝnnolamnat, ilbay-du takoba-net y sǝr-ǝs anɣu iman-net fǝlas a iɣil imǝskǝsa ǝddǝggagan.
Mišan isaɣarat-as Bulǝs inn-as: «Ad wǝr tanɣaɣ iman-nak, ketnana nǝlla da.»
Inna ǝmuzar ǝn kasaw ad d-ammawaynat fǝtǝlaten, iggaz ammas ǝn kasaw tarmad igla har ewad adangaya-net tǝndaw-tu taysǝst har issǝjad i Bulǝs ǝd Silas.
Tǝzzar ikkas-tan-du inn-asan: «Meddan, mas di-iwar igi-net ǝgrǝwaɣ ǝlɣillas?»
Ǝnnan-as: «Zǝgzǝn s Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa ad tǝɣlǝsa kay d aɣaywan-nak.»
Amaran ǝmalan-as awal n Ǝmǝli ǝnta d aytedan kul n aɣaywan-net.
Eway-tan alwaq wen da adawannay n ahad, iššorad ibusan-nasan. Den da ad itawasalmaɣ daɣ aman, ǝnta d aytedan n aɣaywan-net ketnasan.
Tǝzzar iddew ǝmuzar ǝn kasaw ǝd Bulǝs ǝd Silas s ahan-net, isammagarat-tan. Isidawat-tu wǝllen ǝnta d aɣaywan-net ketnet ǝzǝgzan wa ǝgan ǝs Mǝššina.
As affaw, zammazalan naxkiman sojitan s ǝmuzar ǝn kasaw y a das-annin ad ikkǝs Bulǝs ǝd Silas.
Imal ǝmuzar ǝn kasaw ǝmazal wen i Bulǝs, inn-as: «Inaxkiman n ǝɣrǝm ǝnnan-du ad tǝtǝwǝkkǝsam. Daɣ adi ǝgmǝdat, taglim daɣ alxer.»

Mišan inna Bulǝs i sojitan: «A danaɣ-agin šiwwit dat awedan kul da wala ǝššǝriɣa, ǝnta nakkanay nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝrrum; ǝgǝran-ana daɣ kasaw, amaran ǝmǝrǝdda iren a danaɣ-ǝkkǝsan wǝr t-illa i issanan! Kala kala! Asinet-du iman-nasan, ǝkkǝsan-ana.»
Ǝqqalan sojitan ǝssoɣalan batu ten i naxkiman. As ǝslan as Bulǝs ǝd Silas Kǝl-Ǝrrum a ǝmosan, ǝrmaɣan.
Osan-tan-du a tan-talaɣden, tǝzzar ǝkkasan-tan daɣ kasaw, a daɣ-san gammayan ad ǝgmǝdan aɣrǝm-nasan.
Ifal Bulǝs ǝd Silas kasaw, ǝkkan ehan ǝn Lidǝya. As ǝmmǝnayan ǝd mǝdrayan daɣ ǝzǝgzan, ǝššewalan-asan, olaman-asan fǝl man, amaran ǝglan.
Iga Bulǝs ǝd Silas tarrayt ta tǝrzagat Anfibolis d Abollonǝya har din-osan aɣrǝm ǝn Tesalonik a daɣ ǝlân Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ehan n ǝlɣibada.
Os-en-in Bulǝs, awa da itaggu fawda. Iga den karadat ǝssǝbǝten itimǝšiwil ǝd Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud daɣ salan n awa ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban.
Isassagr-asan-tan, issosan-tan âs, Ǝlmǝsix ilzâm-tu ad aɣɣazzab iba-tu, tǝzzar inkǝr-du daɣ tǝmattant. Igann-asan deɣ: «Ɣaysa wa dawan-ǝmmala da, ǝnta Ǝlmǝsix.»
Ǝzzǝgzanan wiyyad daɣ-san s awa igannu, tǝzzar ǝwaran aganna ǝn Bulǝs ǝd Silas, ǝntanay ǝd Kǝl-Ǝlyunan ǝknanen igǝt ǝn miksadan ǝn Mǝššina ǝd tǝdoden aggotnen ǝlânen esǝm daɣ ǝɣrǝm.

Mišan ǝggaznat tǝsmiten labasnen taššam ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, ǝššedawan-du ark aytedan win ǝssuk, ǝqqalan tiddawat tǝzzar jannajarwayan aɣrǝm. Ǝstaban y ahan ǝn Yason gammayan Bulǝs ǝd Silas fǝl a tan-ǝssǝbdǝdan dat aljamaɣat tǝšrǝɣ-asan.

Wǝr ɣur-ǝs tan-ǝgrewan, tǝzzar ǝlwayan Yason ǝnta d arat daɣ mǝdrayan daɣ ǝzǝgzan har tan-ǝssǝbdadan dat naxkiman n ǝɣrǝm, ad gannin s afalla: «Aytedan win, ǝddǝnet ketnet as sǝr-ǝs d-ewayan iba n alxer, ǝmǝrǝdda ǝntanay da.
Amaran Yason a tan-igan daɣ aɣaywan-net. Ketnasan tamazrayan ǝlqanun n ǝmǝnokal-nana Qaysara fǝlas tǝnna a taggin ill-ay iyyan ǝmǝnokal igân esǝm Ɣaysa.»
Isalan win den as dasan-tǝsla tamattay ǝd naxkiman n ǝɣrǝm ǝgan aššawaša labasan.
Ǝgan azrǝf daɣ Yason d aytedan win ɣur-ǝs ǝllanen, har t-ǝrzaman as tawayyan.
Tarmad as ǝssokan mǝdrayan daɣ ǝzǝgzan Bulǝs ǝd Silas aɣrǝm ǝn Berawya ahad wenda. As t-in-osan, ǝggazan ehan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud wa n ǝlɣibada.

Ǝssǝknan-tan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win Berawya ǝllǝllu ogaran wa tawasaknan daɣ Tesalonik. Ǝntanay ǝknân ǝlqǝbulat n awal ǝn Mǝššina. Ǝzǝl kul ɣarran Ǝlkǝttaban, tašaggaran kud awa igannu Bulǝs tidǝt a imos wala.
Eway-du awen as ǝzzǝgzanan wiyyad daɣ-san aggotnen, ǝntanay ǝd tǝdoden ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyunan tiwasaɣmarnen ǝd meddan aggotnen ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyunan.
Mišan as ǝslan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud win Tesalonik as aɣrǝm wa n Berawya ǝnta da immâl daɣ-as Bulǝs awal ǝn Mǝššina, ǝkkan-tu ǝnta da, ǝgan arak man daɣ aytedan, jannajarwayan aɣrǝm.
Den da ad ǝnkaran nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa ǝssǝglan Bulǝs, ǝssokan-tu tama n agaraw. Silas ǝd Timotay ǝntanay ǝqqiman-du daɣ Berawya.
Aytedan win mǝššidaw ǝn Bulǝs, ǝddewan dǝr-ǝs har tu-šaššawadan aɣrǝm n Atena, amaran ǝqqalan ewâyan ǝmazal ǝn Bulǝs i Silas ǝd Timotay n as, a das-d-ǝlkǝman tarmâd.
A iqqal Bulǝs i midawan-net daɣ ǝɣrǝm n Atena, tamatšin man-net fǝl alham n igǝt wa ǝgan ǝssǝnǝman daɣ ǝɣrǝm wen.
Tǝzzar ad itakku ehan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud wa n ǝlɣibada itimǝšiwil dǝr-san ǝntanay d aytedan wiyyad ǝn miksadan ǝn Mǝššina, itakku deɣ akk ǝzǝl asammanay n ǝɣrǝm, itimǝšiwil ǝd win dǝr itamanay.

Itimǝšiwil deɣ Bulǝs ǝd meddan wiyyad ǝn musanan ǝn taggayt ta n Efikurǝyan d Ǝstoyisǝyan. Tamazaɣan dǝr-ǝs wiyyad daɣ-san gannin: «Wa akk tawalaqqat, ma igannu?» Wiyyad gannin: «Ǝs tanna imalan wiyyad wǝr nǝzday as immâl isalan-nasan.» Wǝr tan-isassanna awen ar, a fǝl dasan-immâl Bulǝs isalan n Ǝlinjil, itagg-asan isalan ǝn Ɣaysa ǝd tanakra-net daɣ tǝmattant.
Tǝzzar ǝkkan dǝr-ǝs s asaggawar n ǝɣrǝm n Atena as itawannu Aryofagǝs, ǝnnan-as: «Ag-ana isalan ǝn masnat tǝzrâyat ta dǝr du-toseɣ da,
fǝlas tǝssislaɣ-ana aratan wǝr nǝzday, as nǝra ad nǝssǝn almaɣna-nasan.»
Ǝntanay Kǝl-Atena kul ǝd naftaɣan win tan-ǝhanen, wǝr ǝgmedan ar s awal d ǝsǝsǝm i salan win d-ǝzraynen.
Ibdad Bulǝs daɣ ammas n Aryofagǝs inna: «Hannaya wǝllen as, kawanay Kǝl-Atena tǝddinam wǝllen,

fǝlas ǝssiɣlaya daɣ ǝɣrǝm-nawan, zigazdaɣ idaggan win daɣ tǝɣabbadam imalan-nawan, ǝssiha fadda fǝl adag a daɣ tawakfinat tǝkutawen fǝl iktâb: "Edag n ǝlɣibada n ǝmǝli wǝr nǝtawassan". Ǝmǝli wa tǝɣbadam da wǝr tu-tǝssenam, ǝnta as dawan-ǝmmâla isalan-net da.
Mǝššina wa d-ixlakan ǝddǝnet d arat kul wa tat-ihan, ǝnta a imosan Ǝmǝli ǝn jǝnnawan d amaḍal, wǝr ixser daɣ nan n ǝlɣibada ǝkrâsan fassan n aggadǝm,
wala iddirar s a ikna aggadǝm fǝlas wǝr iddǝrar ǝs wala. Ǝnta a isuduran, ihakku infas, ihakku arat kul.
Ixlak-du tawšeten n ǝddǝnet kul daɣ awedan iyyanda, y ad ǝxsǝrnat fǝl ǝruru n amaḍal ketnet. Ixtas-asnat azzaman, iga deɣ šizǝraz i kallan win daɣ ǝxsaran.
Igâ Mǝššina awen fǝl ad t-ǝgmǝyan aytedan kuddeɣ s adez, mijas a t-ǝgrǝwan; kuddeɣ as wǝr danaɣ-iha i iggug,
fǝlas ǝnta a ittafan tǝmǝddurt-nana d ǝmǝtǝkwǝy n akk iyyan daɣ-na d awa nǝmos. Adi da a ǝnnan arat daɣ mǝssiway-nawan wiyyad ǝs tǝnna ta ǝgan: "Awalla, nakkanay da nǝmos bararan-net."
Daɣ adi dad zamas nǝmos bararan ǝn Mǝššina, wǝr immǝkkan ad narḍu as iha šaššelan n ǝssǝnam igân daɣ urǝɣ, wala azrǝf, wala tǝhunt, a d-inzâm awedan gar-es ǝd man-net.
Ǝljǝhǝl wa ǝgan aytedan daɣ aratan win di, wǝr fall-asan t-ixseb Mǝššina daɣ elan win tǝljuhǝla, mišan ǝmǝrǝdda omar aytedan kul, edag ǝhan, ǝs tǝtubt,
fǝlas ilkâm ǝzǝl igâ tǝmastant, wa daɣ zʼagu y ǝddǝnet ketnet ǝššǝriɣa oɣâdan. Isinafran alǝs wa zʼagu daɣ ǝššǝɣǝl wǝdi. Issikna adi y awedan kul s ǝsǝnkǝr wa t-id-iga daɣ tǝmattant.»
As ǝslan i Bulǝs iššewal daɣ batu ǝn tanakra daɣ tamattant, ǝgan daɣ-as wiyyad tamakkakkayt, wiyyad amaran ǝnnan-as: «Nǝra a dak-nǝlǝs ǝsǝsǝm daɣ batu tǝdi ǝzǝl iyyan.»
Den da a tan-ifal Bulǝs, igla.
Dǝr iga awen da osaɣan dǝr-ǝs wiyyad daɣ-san tǝzzar ǝzzǝgzanan. Aytedan win, ih-en Dǝyonusǝyǝs ihân asaggawar wa n Aryofagǝs ǝd tǝntut tǝgât Damaris ǝd wiyyad aytedan.
Dǝffǝr awen igmad Bulǝs aɣrǝm n Atena, ikka wa n Korent.

Den da ad immǝnay d alǝs ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud igân esǝm Akilas n akal ǝn Fontǝs, a d-osân sǝket ifâl-du akal wa n Italǝya ǝnta ǝd hannes Friska; fǝlas ǝmǝnokal Klawdǝyus Qaysara a omaran s ad tǝwǝstǝɣan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud kul daɣ ǝɣrǝm n Ǝrrum. Osaɣ dǝr-san Bulǝs.
Amaran dad imos as ola dǝr-san ǝššǝɣǝl – ketnasan ǝššǝɣǝl-nasan igi ǝn hǝktan – imal ɣur-san Bulǝs, išɣal.
Akk ǝzǝl ǝn tǝsanfawt, itaggu Bulǝs isalan daɣ ahan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud wa n ǝlɣibada, igammay d ad ǝzzǝgzǝnan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝd Kǝl-Ǝlyunan.
As d-osa Silas ǝd Timotay Bulǝs ǝfâlan-du Masedonǝya, igmad Bulǝs ǝnta s amel n awal ǝn Mǝššina ɣas, itagayyat i Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud as Ɣaysa a imosan Ǝlmǝsix.

Mišan ugayan sǝr-ǝs Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, a tu-rabbadan. Ibbǝkbak Bulǝs isǝlsa-net, almaɣna abʼas dǝr-san idraw wala. Inn-asan: «Tǝlmanam iman-nawan; iwǝret alxaq-nawan iɣafawan-nawan, nak abʼas di-iwar alxaq n iba n ǝlɣillas-nawan. A obazan ɣur ǝmǝrǝdda aytedan win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud a zʼakkaɣ.»
Tǝzzar ifal-tan, iggaz ehan n alǝs igân esǝm Titǝyus Yustus imosan ǝmiksad ǝn Mǝššina as illa ahan-net dǝgma n ahan wa n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.

Krisbǝs wa n ǝmuzar n ahan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud wa n ǝlɣibada ǝnta izzigzan s Ǝmǝli, ǝnta harkid aytedan n aɣaywan-net kul. Ǝslan Kǝl-Korent aggotnen i salan win itaggu Bulǝs, ǝzzǝgzanan ǝntanay da, tǝzzar tawasalmaɣan daɣ aman.
As ahad iyyan iga Bulǝs targǝt a daɣ das-inna Ǝmǝli: «A kay wǝr tǝggǝz tasa, kalar šawal ad wǝr taffasta,
ǝlleq-qu dǝr-ǝk, wǝr t-illa i zʼifrǝgan a dak-ixšǝd arat, fǝlas ǝleɣ aytedan aggotnen daɣ ǝɣrǝm wa.»
Ixsar Bulǝs daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Korent har iga awatay d aganna, isasaɣru aytedan awal ǝn Mǝššina.
Azzaman win daɣ imos Gallǝyyun ǝnaxkim n akal wa n Akayya, ǝnkaran Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud ǝgan eɣaf fǝl Bulǝs, ǝbazan-tu, ewayan-tu s adag n ǝššǝriɣa,
ǝnnan: «Alǝs wa, igammay d ad ǝɣbǝdan aytedan Mǝššina ǝs tǝmǝwit tǝmmizrayat ǝššǝriɣa.»

As zama issinta Bulǝs daɣ awal, inna Gallǝyyun i Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud: «Kawanay Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, ǝnnar assa a di-du-tǝgam daɣ batu n arat immizrayan ǝššǝriɣa madeɣ ark amazal labasan, imǝl-tu ǝddǝlil wa fǝl dawan-z-ǝssǝsǝmaɣ;
mišan zama awa tamazaq tǝgât fǝl tǝfir d ǝsmawan d ǝššǝriɣa-nawan, ǝšrǝɣat-tan kawanay iman-nawan, nak wǝr areɣ ad ǝqqǝla ǝmašraɣ n aratan zun win di.»
Amaran isassardaq-qan ehan wa n ǝššǝriɣa.
Tǝzzar ǝnkaran ketnasan, ǝbazan Sustinǝs wa n ǝmuzar n ahan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud wa n ǝlɣibada, ad t-ǝggatan da da dat ahan wa n ǝššǝriɣa; mišan wǝr izlay Gallǝyyun daɣ awen.

Igla Bulǝs ixsâr daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Korent har irǝw. Dǝffǝr adi inamagga ǝd nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa šiwatriwen, iggaz aɣlal n aman ikka Surǝya, iddew ǝd Friska d Akilas. Harwada wǝr iggez aɣlal n aman daɣ Qankrǝya inimahazan ǝd Korent akku Surǝya ad ilza eɣaf-net y ad assaknu s awen aḍḍawal wa iga.
As osan aɣrǝm n Efez, immǝzzay dǝr-san Bulǝs. Igla ǝnta iggaz ehan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud wa n ǝlɣibada imašawal dǝr-san.
Ǝgmayan daɣ-as a ɣur-san ihag, ugay-asan.
Mišan as tan-ifal inn-asan: «[Wǝr immǝkkan a di-wǝr-iga ǝmud wa d-izayan daɣ Yerusalam.] A kawan-d-ǝqqǝla kud Mǝššina irḍa.» Igmad Efez iha aɣlal n aman.
As izzǝbbat daɣ ǝɣrǝm wa n Qaysarǝya, iggǝzzay, ikka Yerusalam issǝslam Ǝlkǝnisat, dǝffǝr adi izagaday, ikka aɣrǝm n Antǝyoxǝya.
As daɣ-as iga tamert, igmad-tu, illil akal wa n Galatǝya ǝd wa n Frijǝya, isisuhit ǝzǝgzan ǝn nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa kul.
As itaggu awen, aɣrǝm n Efez os-ay-du alǝs ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud igân esǝm Abbolos n ǝɣrǝm n Alaskandrǝya, imosan alǝs issânan awal wǝllen, igân masnat tagget y Ǝlkǝttaban.

Itiwasasaɣra tarrayt ta n Ǝmǝli, amaran ikf-ay Infas wa Zǝddigan gǝlleyat daɣ igi ǝn tǝlxutbat, isasaɣru deɣ s ǝlluɣ daɣ batu ǝn Ɣaysa; dǝr iga awen da ya, isalan n ǝsǝlmǝɣ wa itaggu Yaxya aytedan daɣ aman ɣas a t-ǝhanen.
Ad itaggu awal daq-qu wǝr tǝha tasa daɣ ahan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud wa n ǝlɣibada. As das-tǝsla Friska d Akilas, ǝddewan dǝr-ǝs, sassaɣran-tu s ǝlluɣ, ǝššotan-as masnat ta iga tarrayt ta n Mǝššina.

Dǝffǝr awen isammarkas Abbolos iki n akal wa n Akayya, tǝzzar ǝdhalan-tu mǝdrayan-net daɣ ǝzǝgzan s awen. Ǝktaban širawt i nalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa win t-ǝhanen fǝl a das-agin tǝmǝwit tolâɣat as tan-in-osa. As din-osa, tǝggaz-tu tǝnfa zǝwwǝrat a du-tǝfâllat arraxmat ǝn Mǝššina y aytedan win ǝzzǝgzannen,
fǝlas isabbahaw s assahat dat tamattay iduf wa ǝgan Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud. Issǝkn-en daɣ Ǝlkǝttaban as, Ɣaysa a imosan Ǝlmǝsix.
Azzaman win daɣ iha Abbolos Korent, ad irzag Bulǝs akal n ǝdɣaɣan har iras fǝl aɣrǝm n Efez. Inay daɣ-as inalkiman ǝn Ɣaysa wiyyad,
inn-asan: «Awak kawanay, as tǝzzǝgzanam tǝgrâwam Infas wa Zǝddigan?» Ǝnnan-as: «Wǝr nǝsla fadda as t-illa Infas wa Zǝddigan.»
Inn-asan Bulǝs: «Daɣ adi ma imos ǝzzǝnǝf n ǝsǝlmǝɣ wa tǝtawaggam daɣ aman?» Ǝnnan-as: «Ǝsǝlmǝɣ wa n Yaxya.»
Amaran inn-asan Bulǝs: «Yaxya, aytedan win ǝtubnen daɣ bakkadan a isalmaɣ daɣ aman, assaknu adi tǝtubt-nasan, immâl-asan ad ǝzzǝgzǝnan ǝs wa du-z-asin dǝffǝr-ǝs, almaɣna Ɣaysa.»
As ǝslan y awen, tawasalmaɣan daɣ aman daɣ esǝm n Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa.
Tǝzzar issǝwar Bulǝs akk iyyan daɣ-san ifassan-net, ǝgrawan deɣ Infas wa Zǝddigan, ǝššewalan daɣ awalan wǝr nǝtawazday, ǝgrawan emel ǝn salan a d-izizabbat Mǝššina.
Meddan en, marawessan d ǝššin.

Amaran ad itakku Bulǝs ehan wa n ǝlɣibada ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, itaggu daɣ-as tǝlxutbat wǝr t-illa is tu-tǝha tasa-net har iga karadat tǝlil. Igammay d ad isǝttǝddu i Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud isalan win itaggu daɣ batu ǝn Taɣmar ta n Mǝššina.
