Imadhalan n Ǝlkǝnisat, ǝntanay da iwâr-tan ad ǝttafan ǝzzǝbun-nasan, tǝssiflas deɣ batu-nasan. Ad wǝr iqqǝl alxal-nasan tessay n esmad wala tattan alxaram.
Iwâr-tan ad zizawen daɣ tidǝt ta tǝnafalalat tǝhât ǝzǝgzan s Ǝlmǝsix, ilen ǝnnǝyaten zaddognen.
Tǝwǝjǝrrǝbanet tǝzzar, dǝffǝr adi kud wǝr t-illa i ifragan a daɣ-as d-inǝy ark arat, assantin ǝššǝɣǝl wa n tišit ǝn madhalan.
Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as šimadhalen n Ǝlkǝnisat da iwâr-tanat ad ǝlânat ǝzzǝbun, wǝr tizǝmnat, sammodnat, ǝɣdâlnat daɣ ǝkkulluk n arat.
Ǝmadhal n Ǝlkǝnisat iwâr-tu ad iɣdâl i tǝntut-net, iga ǝnǝttaf olaɣan i bararan-net d aɣaywan-net.
Imadhalan n Ǝlkǝnisat win tagganen ǝššǝɣǝl-nasan s ǝlluɣ garrawan almaqam d ikus n aššak ikmalan daɣ ǝzǝgzan s Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa.
Attama wa ǝgeɣ n a kay-ǝnǝya tarmad wǝr di-igdel a dak-in-ǝktǝba isalan win di

fǝl ad iqqal as kud fall-ak in-ǝlloleɣ, da ad tǝssǝnaɣ alxal was immǝkkan ad t-agin aytedan daɣ ahan ǝn Mǝššina di n Amaɣlol a t-imosan Ǝlkǝnisat. Ǝlkǝnisat ta ǝnta a tǝmosat tǝgǝttawt ta n tǝsǝkbǝlt ǝn tidǝt.
Igmâd aššak as ǝssir wa danaɣ-isannafalal Mǝššina a t-imosan Ǝlmǝsix, i zǝwwǝran:
Inafalal imos awedan.
Iggǝyyat Infas ǝn Mǝššina as oɣâd.
Ǝnâyan-tu angalosan.
Tiwaggan salan-net
y aytedan win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud.
Ǝzzigzanan sǝr-ǝs aytedan daɣ ǝddǝnet ketnet.
Immǝdkal ǝs jǝnnawan ǝs tanaya.
Dǝr iga awen da ya Infas imâl s ǝlluɣ as daɣ azzaman win ǝlkamnen, aytedan wiyyad ad ammazzayan d ǝzǝgzan s Ǝlmǝsix, ǝlkaman i kǝlǝsuf saxraknen, ǝd tǝssunen n Aššaytan.
Tǝssunen šin ǝfâlnat-du inǝsbuha n ǝlmunafiqan, ǝs ǝmmutan wallan-nasan,
ǝgdâlan azalaf, ǝrɣâman fǝl tattay ǝn wiyyad imensewan as Mǝššina a tan-d-ixlakan fǝl a tan-atšin aytedan win ǝzzǝgzannen ǝggodayan i Mǝššina, ǝntanay a ǝssanen tidǝt.
Fǝlas awa d-ixlak Mǝššina kul olâɣ. Wǝr t-iha a xaraman, iggudǝyet ɣas awedan i Mǝššina tǝzzar atšet awa ira.
Id izzizdak-ku awal ǝn Mǝššina ǝd tǝwatray.
As tǝmmâlaɣ isalan win dak-ǝge da i mǝzzǝgzan, ad tǝqqǝla amaššaɣal olâɣan n Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa, iddaran s Ǝlinjil imosan ǝnǝfilal ǝn Mǝššina daɣ Ɣaysa, ǝd tǝssunt tolâɣat tas tǝsle.
Ad wǝr tǝsasamaɣ i mayyan ǝn bannan ǝmmizraynen awal ǝn Mǝššina. Kalar sǝlmǝd iman-nak tǝmǝddurt ta daɣ tosaɣa ǝd Mǝššina.

Ǝšinǝn ǝn taɣǝssa wǝr tu-taha tǝnfa tagget, mišan ǝšinǝn n ǝwǝl lǝkkum y awal ǝn Mǝššina, tah-ay tǝnfa daɣ tarrayt kul, fǝlas nǝgarraw sǝr-ǝs ǝmǝrǝdda tǝmǝddurt tas iga Mǝššina arkawal-net, nǝgrǝw-tat deɣ dǝffǝr iba.
Batu adi igmâd aššak, tǝnnihat da sǝr-ǝs arḍin aytedan kul.
Nǝnnây arkanay, nǝbbillan fǝlas nǝgâ attama-nana daɣ Mǝššina di n Amaɣlol imosan Ǝnǝssefsi n aytedan kul, wǝllen win sǝr-ǝs ǝzzǝgzannen.
Aratan ǝddi da win as za tǝtamaraɣ aytedan tǝsasaɣraɣ-asan-tan.
Ad wǝr tayyaɣ awedan waliyyan alkik fǝl as wǝr tawaššera. Kalar ǝqqǝl almasal i mǝzzǝgzan s awa tǝganna d alxal-nak ǝd tara ta kay-tǝhat d ǝzǝgzan-nak ǝd tazdak n ǝwǝl-nak.
Ǝgmǝd ǝs taɣaray n Awal ǝn Mǝššina i mǝzzǝgzan, d ǝsǝhǝl-nasan d ǝsǝssǝɣri-nasan har din-asa.
Ad wǝr taqqama wǝr tǝššǝšɣala tǝhǝkkut ta tǝgrawa, ta kay-ikfa Mǝššina s awal wa sǝr-ǝk iga ǝlǝwli iyyan ǝs tarrayt n Infas ǝn Mǝššina, assaɣa wa kay-ǝssǝwaran muzaran n Ǝlkǝnisat ifassan.
Aratan win dak-ǝmǝla da, ǝdgǝz daɣ-san, fǝl ad ǝnǝyan aytedan kul ǝmǝttǝy wa tǝtagga.
Ǝssǝn daɣ man-nak, tǝssǝna ǝnta da daɣ aratan win tǝsassaɣra, ad wǝr tammazzaya d igi n adi. As tǝtaggaɣ adi, ad tassafsaɣ iman-nak, tassafsa deɣ aytedan win dak-sasamnen.
Ad wǝr tǝtihǝrǝššeɣ iɣmaran. Tagg-asan ǝnnǝsixa šilat ǝn wa za taga y abba-nak; tagaɣ i meddan win madrornen ǝnnǝsixa wa za tagaɣ i mǝdrayan-nak.
Šiɣmaren ag-asnat ǝnnǝsixa wa za taga y anna-nak. Taga deɣ i tǝdoden šin madrornen ǝnnǝsixa wa za tagaɣ i tǝmǝdrayen-nak, iga awen s ǝwǝl zǝddigan.
Sǝɣmǝr šidoden šin as aba meddan-nasnat wǝr ǝlenat ǝšǝqqaɣ a dǝr-ǝsnat inǝttafan, tǝssǝna daɣ-asnat.
Mišan kud ǝlânat bararan madeɣ ihayawan, wǝdi zǝmmizǝlanet tǝksǝda-nasan Mǝššina s ad ǝssǝnan daɣ marwan-nasan, ǝrzǝman-asan ǝsǝdwǝl wa tan-ǝgan fǝlas adi da igrazan i Mǝššina.
Amaran ta wǝr nǝla i dǝr-ǝs, tǝxsâr ǝd man-net ǝnta ǝddi tǝgat attama-net daɣ Mǝššina, tǝgammay daɣ Mǝššina a iknan tumǝɣlaten-net, tǝtattar ehad ezal.
Mišan as imos as tantut as wǝr idder alǝs-net, tǝga tǝmǝddurt a daɣ tǝlkâm i tara ǝn man-net, kud imos as taɣǝssa-net tǝddar, da fǝl aganna wa n tassaq-net ǝd Mǝššina šilat n as wǝr tǝdder.
Ǝnta ǝddi da awa as kay-iwar a tanat-tǝtamara sǝr-ǝs, fǝl a tu-wǝr-imǝl i ifragan a daɣ-asnat d-inǝy ark arat.
Amaran awedan wa wǝr nǝssen daɣ aytedan-net, wǝllen win nǝmmuray-net, wǝdi zun as oyya ǝzǝgzan-net, iššam-as fadda awedan wa wǝr nǝzzǝgzan.
Ad wǝr tǝktǝba tantut as wǝr idder alǝs-net daɣ šin as tǝtilal Ǝlkǝnisat ar s ad tǝga sǝdisat tǝmǝrwen n awatay madeɣ tokay-tanat, ǝnta da, wǝr tat-ides ar azalaf iyyanda.

Ǝggǝyyen deɣ aytedan as tǝtag imazalan olaɣnen, ǝmosnen ǝsǝdwǝl olâɣan ǝn bararan-net, d amagaru, wǝr tǝsassagar iman-net igi n ǝššǝɣǝl a iqqal i mǝzzǝgzan, ǝd tilalt y aytedan win maɣatarnen, d ǝmazal n arat kul wa olaɣan s ǝwǝl iyyanda.
Amaran šidoden šin aynaynen, šin as wǝr ǝdderan meddan-nasnat ad wǝr tǝqbǝla tilalt y-asnat fǝlas as daɣ-asnat d-inkar Iblis, ad usafnat azalaf ǝššǝɣǝl y Ǝlmǝsix.
Tǝzzar ibǝz-tanat ǝššǝriɣa ǝn Mǝššina s agamad wa tanat-iga ǝzǝgzan-nasnat s ǝnta arkawal-nasnat wa azzaran,
aqqaminat wǝr ǝlenat ǝššǝɣǝl waliyyan ar ilum gǝr nan. Adi ogar-tu âs, a tanat-tǝggǝz šizmit; ǝššiwǝlnat daɣ taɣawšiwen n aytedan, d aratan as wǝr immǝkkan a daɣ-san šawalnat.

Daɣ adi šidoden šin aynaynen, šin as wǝr ǝdderan meddan-nasnat, ǝssofaɣ ad ǝzlǝfnat, ilenat bararan, ǝssǝnnat daɣ ɣawnatan-nasnat fǝl ad wǝr ǝgrǝwnat i maksanan-nanaɣ tarrayt n a daɣ-na d-ǝnǝyan ark arat a sǝr-naɣ ǝnnan,
fǝlas šiyyad daɣ-asnat har âs ǝxraknat, ǝlkamnat y Aššaytan.
Kud tǝll-ay tǝlmǝsixit tǝlât šišǝqqaɣen as wǝr ǝdderan meddan-nasnat, tǝssǝnet daɣ-asnat, aqqaminat wǝr ǝmosnat ǝzuk y Ǝlkǝnisat, fǝl ad tilal i šin wǝr nǝla i dǝr-ǝsnat.
Imuzaran n Ǝlkǝnisat win tagginen tizart tolaɣat ǝhoran d ǝtǝwǝsǝɣmar imosan ǝnǝtfus, wǝllen win tagganen tǝlxutbat sasaɣrin Awal ǝn Mǝššina.
Fǝlas a ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban:
«Ad wǝr tǝdbǝɣa y azgar wa tǝššǝšɣala».
Ǝnnân deɣ:
«Amaššaɣal ihor d alxaq-net».
Ad wǝr tǝtattafa taɣtǝst tǝtiwaggat y ǝmuzar n Ǝlkǝnisat ar s a
tat-ǝggǝyyen ǝššin aytedan madeɣ karad.
Imuzaran n Ǝlkǝnisat win tagginen ibakkadan, raqqam-asan dat Ǝlkǝnisat ketnet, fǝl ad tǝggǝz tasa ǝlmǝsixitan win hadatnen.
Onsayaq-qay fǝl Mǝššina d Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa d angalosan win isannafran ad tǝlkǝma y aratan win as kay-omara da, daɣ wǝr tǝgeɣ arak torda waliyyat, wala tǝmǝrit.
Ad wǝr tǝrrurǝda ǝsǝwǝr ǝn fassan-nak awedan, wala deɣ tileɣ adagar daɣ bakkadan n awedan waliyyan. Agǝz iman-nak, tǝttǝfa tazdak-nak.
Mazzay ǝd tassay n aman ɣas, kalar sassu arat n esmad n alɣanab ad anfu adi tadist-nak, anf-ik daɣ tǝfrǝyt ta sǝr-ǝk du-tǝsaɣlayat.
Ǝllan-tu aytedan as ibakkadan-nasan wǝr tan-iqqǝrat arat, tiwassanan harwa dat ǝššǝriɣa, mišan wiyyad dǝffǝr tǝrut ad tawanayan win-nasan.
Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as, imazalan win olaɣnen wǝr tan-iqqǝrat arat, amaran wala win iqqǝrat arat da wǝr tǝhigin ǝɣbâran.
Ǝlmǝsixitan kul win ǝmosnen eklan, iwâr-tan saɣmar ǝn mǝssawsan wǝllen fǝl ad wǝr ǝkkesan aytedan tarna i Mǝššina, wala deɣ alkin tǝssunt ta nǝsassaɣru.

Amaran win daɣ-san ǝlan ǝlmǝsixitan, ad wǝr assaknin mǝssawsan iba ǝn saɣmar fǝlas dǝr-san ǝmosan arat iyyanda daɣ ǝddin. Kalar aginet-asan ǝššǝɣǝl ofân was kala a dasan-tu-taggin, fǝlas aytedan win garrawnen tǝnfa n ǝššǝɣǝl-nasan ǝddi, ǝntanay da ǝlmǝsixitan a ǝmosan sinahalnen ǝtǝwǝra.
Adi a za tasassaɣraɣ aytedan tǝzzǝdgǝzaq-qan daɣ-as.
Awedan wa isasaɣran aratan wǝr nǝmos win dak-ǝmala da, harwa wǝr ilkem y awal wa isxan n Ǝmǝli-nana Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix d ǝsǝssǝɣri wa d-itawayan tǝlɣudǝla,
wǝdi awedan anasbarag a imos n aljahil tǝssiran tara ǝn tamazaq ǝd takat wǝr nǝga ar fǝl almaɣna n ǝlxǝrǝfan. Itaraw-du adi manjaɣ ǝd tamazaq d arak batuten d arak tordaten,
ǝd mǝzrǝyan wǝr nǝrriz gǝr aytedan as wǝr oɣednat ǝnnǝyaten-nasan, tǝgmad-tan tidǝt. Ǝgân iduf n âs a tan-isǝggǝrgǝs iguz n ǝddin.
Mišan illikan as, tǝksǝda ǝn Mǝššina tǝmos tǝgǝrgist zǝwwǝrat fǝlas tǝhakk-anaɣ tǝmǝddurt a daɣ nǝgda s awa nǝla.
Fǝlas wǝr neway wala as du-nǝggaz ǝddǝnet zund ǝmmǝk en daɣ as a tat-nǝgmǝd wǝr neway wala.
Daɣ adi, agdet-anaɣ as nǝla isudar ǝd talassay.
Amaran aytedan win ǝranen tǝgǝrgist, tifǝtǝqqen daɣ jarrabatan, ǝd taftawen d arak deranan aggotnen a tan-ǝkmanen, a du-wǝr-nǝtiwǝy s awedan ar ǝbǝrǝjji d ǝhluk.
Tara n ǝzrǝf a tǝmosat ǝlǝsǝl n ǝššur kul. Ǝllan-tu aytedan s awa das-ǝgan daɣ tara, ǝxrakan, igmad-tan ǝzǝgzan-nasan, ewayan-du ǝs man-nasan šimǝgraz aggotnen.
Amaran kay Timotay, imosan ǝmaray ǝs Mǝššina, darrag y adi ketnet. Ǝgmǝy taqqat, ǝd tǝksǝda ǝn Mǝššina, d ǝzǝgzan, ǝd tara, ǝd zǝmmerat, ǝd talmat.
Agu tǝbǝllant ta tolaɣat, tǝmosat aggaz n ǝzǝgzan. Ǝqbǝl tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat, fǝlas Mǝššina iɣr-ik y a tat-tǝgrǝwaɣ, amaran batu-net a daɣ tǝmalaɣ ǝzǝgzan-nak dat tǝgǝyyawen aggotnen.
Omâraq-qay fǝl Mǝššina a itaggin iman daɣ arat kul, d Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa a imalan s ǝlluɣ ǝzǝgzan-net dat Fons Bilatǝs,
ad tǝlkǝma y awas kay-omara, a daq-qay wǝr iwer lahan waliyyan, wǝr t-illa i ifragan a daɣ-ak d-inǝy ark arat, har d-inǝfilǝl Ǝmǝli-nana Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix.
Ǝnǝfilal-net ad agu daɣ alwaq wa issǝnsa Mǝššina y awen,
Ǝnta a ilan albaraka
Ǝnta ɣas ǝnaxkim wa n tidǝt
Ǝmǝnokal ǝn mǝnokalan,
Ǝmǝli ǝn malan
Wǝr itǝmǝttǝy har faw
Izdâɣ daɣ ǝnnur
Wǝr din-itǝwǝhiz
Wǝr t-illa awedan as kala ad t-inay
Wala ifrag anay-net
Ǝnta a ilan saɣmar ǝd tarna har faw.
Amin!

Amǝr win ǝggǝrgasnen daɣ ǝddǝnet s ad wǝr ǝdkelan iman-nasan dǝnnǝg aytedan wala agin attama-nasan daɣ tǝgǝrgist wǝr za nahag. Amǝr-tan s ad t-agin daɣ Mǝššina a danaɣ-ihakkin arat kul s igǝt fǝl ad nagu tǝmǝddurt a daɣ nǝddǝwat.
Amǝr-tan s ǝmazal n awa olaɣan, aggargasanet daɣ mazalan olaɣnen, tǝggǝzet-tan tahakkay, ardinet ǝs tǝdrǝwt d aytedan.
Ǝmmǝk di as zʼǝššidǝwan i man-nasan tǝgǝrgist a za tǝqqǝlat tǝsǝbdǝt tolaɣat y awa d-izayan ǝzǝl a ilkaman fǝl ad ǝgrǝwan tǝmǝddurt ta n tidǝt.
Ya Timotay, agǝz awa kay-issǝɣlaf Mǝššina. Nǝmǝggǝg ǝd batuten ǝn bannan ǝmmizraynen ǝddin, ǝd tamazaɣen ǝgânen daɣ tǝssunt ǝn bahu.
Wiyyad ǝlmǝsixitan ǝlkâmnen i tǝssunt tǝdi, ǝxrakan ǝmmǝzzayan d ǝzǝgzan.
Mǝššina ya tǝgeɣ-awan arraxmat-net.
II Timothy: Awa nak Bulǝs, anammazul ǝn Ɣaysa ǝs tǝrǝddawt ǝn Mǝššina. Iwâr-i amel ǝn tǝmǝddurt tas danaɣ-itawagga arkawal-net ǝs tarrayt ǝn tǝrtǝyt d Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa.
Ǝhulaɣ-in Timotay imosan zun barar-in ǝkneɣ tara: Onsaya Mǝššina di n Abba, d Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa Ǝmǝli-nana, a kay-ikfan arraxmat ǝd tǝhanint d alxer.
Nak ǝggodayaɣ i Mǝššina, s ǝnta a ǝɣbada s ǝwǝl iyyanda zund ǝmmǝk as t-ǝɣbadan marawan-in, amaran kittǝwaq-qay faw daɣ tǝwatriwen-in ehad ezal.
Kittǝwaɣ imǝttawan-nak ǝkneɣ tara n a kay-ǝlǝsaɣ anay fǝl ad aknin man-in tǝfalawist.
Kittǝwa deɣ ǝzǝgzan wa tǝgeɣ ǝs Ɣaysa s a wǝr nǝmos sokni, amaran ǝzǝgzan wa, ǝnta tǝga Lawisa ta kay-tǝsahhayawat, d anna-nak Anika. Ǝkkasaɣ aššak as kay da tǝgrâwaq-qu s ǝmmǝk en da.
Awen da fǝl kay-du-saktaɣ as: sudǝr tǝhǝkkut ta dak-iga Mǝššina, s ǝssǝbab n ǝsǝwǝr wa kay-ǝgeɣ ifassan.
Infas wa danaɣ-ikfa Mǝššina, wǝr imos Infas ǝn tasa, kalar Infas a imos ǝn tarna ǝd tara d iduf n ǝzzǝbun.

Daɣ adi a kay-wǝr-tǝggǝz tǝkarakit n ad tǝtagayye fǝl Ǝmǝli-nana, wala deɣ isǝkkǝrukǝd-kay iguz-in kasaw fǝl ǝddǝlil-net. Kalar nǝrtǝyet daɣ alɣazab wa tagga daɣ tarrayt n Ǝlinjil, iga awen ǝs tarna ǝn Mǝššina
s ǝnta danaɣ-issǝfsan,
ig-ana teɣaray zǝddigat,
wǝrgeɣ fǝl ǝddǝlil ǝn mazalan-nana,
kalar fǝl ǝddǝlil n awa issǝbdad Mǝššina ǝs tara-net,
d arraxmat ta dana-tǝtawakfat ǝs tarrayt n Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa
harwa dat axluk-net ǝddǝnet.
Arraxmat ta isannafalal-tat-du ǝmǝrǝdda
assa n Ǝnǝssefsi-nana Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa
s ǝnta a ikkasan tarna daɣ tǝmattant,
isammalawlaw tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat
tas itaggu Ǝlinjil isalan-net.
Ǝddǝlil n Ǝlinjil en da a fǝl di-isannafran Mǝššina ig-i ǝmǝggi ǝn salan, n anammazul n ǝmǝsǝsseɣri.

Amaran ǝddǝlil n aratan win da, a fǝl tawazaɣazzabaɣ ǝmǝrǝdda, mišan wǝr fall-i imos awen tǝkarakit, fǝlas ǝssana was ǝzzǝgzana, ǝkneɣ deɣ ikus n aššak as ifrâg ad agǝz taɣlift ta ɣur-ǝs ǝle har ǝzǝl a ilkaman.
Ǝlkǝm y almasal wa ihan isalan ǝn tidǝt win dak-ǝgeɣ, tǝzǝzzǝwe daɣ-as s ǝzǝgzan ǝd tara win du-tǝtaway tassaq n Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa.
Taɣlift tǝhossayat ta tǝgrawa ɣur Mǝššina, agǝz-tat ǝs tarna n Infas wa Zǝddigan a danaɣ-ihan.
Tǝssǝnaɣ âs aytedan kul win akal n Asǝya ǝfalan dǝffǝr-i, harkid Figelus, ǝd Hermogenus.
Ǝmǝli ya tǝzizabbe du tǝhanint-nak fǝl aɣaywan n Onesiforus, fǝlas faw italam-i fǝl man, amaran wǝr ikarakad y iguz-in kasaw.
Kalar assaɣa wa din-osa Ǝrrum, iswad-i ǝs tidǝt har di-igraw.
Ǝmǝli ya tǝhinatteɣ-as ǝzǝl a ilkaman. Kay iman-nak a issanan wǝllen daɣ tilalt ta di-igi daɣ ǝɣrǝm wa n Efez.
Daɣ adi kay barar-in sǝssuhǝt iman-nak s arraxmat ta tǝhat tartǝyt n Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa.
Amaran arat was di-tǝsle ǝnneq-qu dat tǝgǝyyawen aggotnen, sǝnnǝttǝf dǝr-ǝs aytedan ǝɣdâlnen, ǝfrâgnen a tu-sassaɣrin ǝntanay da i wiyyad.
Ǝzmǝr kay da i tadagart-nak daɣ alɣazab fǝlas adi da a itaggu anammagar wa n tidǝt n Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa.
Awedan imosan anammagar, wǝr izlay daɣ tǝɣawšiwen n ǝddǝnet sa hadan, fǝlas wǝr igǝmmǝy ar gǝrrezat y ǝmǝnokal-net.
Zund ǝmmǝk di daɣ as ǝnǝbbellen wǝr inǝjjǝx ar s ad ilkâm y ǝššǝrǝdan kul win tǝbǝllant.
Amaran ǝmagyak wa igan ǝššǝɣǝl olâɣan, ǝnta a itizaran agaraw ǝn ɣarat.
Ǝnẓǝr wǝllen daɣ awa dak-ganna da, fǝlas Mǝššina a kay-z-akfin ǝgǝrri daɣ ǝkkulluk n arat.
Kattǝw Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix, s ǝnta a d-itawasankaran daɣ nǝmmǝttan, imos arat daɣ ǝzzurrǝyya ǝn Dawǝd. Arat wa iššewal sǝr-ǝs Ǝlinjil wa ǝmmala.
Ǝddǝlil n Ǝlinjil en da, a fǝl taɣazzaba, har as ǝgan-i ɣunan iguz a taggin y ǝjajǝb n anasgafa. Mišan awal ǝn Mǝššina ǝnta wǝr t-ǝhen ɣunan.
Awen da fǝlas ǝddǝlil ǝn win isannafran Mǝššina a fǝl ǝzmara y arat ketnet, fǝl ad ǝgrǝwan ǝntanay da efsan ǝs tarrayt n Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa, ǝgrǝwan tanaya tǝɣlalat.
Illikan as awal wa tidǝt a imos:
As dǝr-ǝs nǝrtay daɣ tǝmattant ta iga,
a dǝr-ǝs nǝrtǝy deɣ daɣ tǝmǝddurt.
As nǝzmar, wǝdi a dǝr-ǝs nǝrtǝy daɣ taɣmar,
as tu-nǝnkur, wǝdi a danaɣ-unkar ǝnta da.
Kud nakkanay wǝr nǝɣdel, ǝnta faw iɣdâl,
fǝlas wǝr zʼunkar iman-net.

Aratan win as tǝsleɣ da, sakt-en-du i mǝzzǝgzan tǝzzar tǝgmǝya daɣ-san fǝl udǝm ǝn Mǝššina ad ammazzayan ǝd tamazaq ǝn tǝfir. Wǝr tat-tǝha tǝnfa waliyyat. Wǝr du-tǝtiwǝy ar ahluk n aytedan win das-sasamnen.
Gammay wǝllen d ad tagaɣ iman-nak alǝs isitaddan ǝzǝlulǝɣ-net dat Mǝššina, tǝqqǝlaɣ awedan wǝr nǝtǝkǝrukud daɣ ǝššǝɣǝl-net, tǝtaggaɣ igi oɣâdan i salan win tidǝt.
Nǝmǝggǝg d awalan wǝr nǝla almaɣna waliyyan, ǝmosan ǝllid n ǝzǝgzan, fǝlas win as ǝmosan awalan win ǝššǝɣǝl-nasan, iket tahagin kannin ǝnǝmǝggag ǝd tǝksǝda ǝn Mǝššina.
Awal-nasan iha ǝlmital an šiqqest labasat, a du-tǝjibǝrǝjjet elam. Aytedan win arat daɣ-san a imos Himani ǝd Filetos.
Ǝntanay a sannamaggagnen iman-nasan ǝd tidǝt, ǝnnan tanakra ǝn nǝmmǝttan wǝr tǝmos arat ilkâman, kalar arat okâyan a tǝmos, takkasan s awen ǝzǝgzan daɣ aytedan.
As iga awen šigǝttawen šin issǝbdad Mǝššina, arat a mosnat izizawen, iwâr-tanat ejwal ǝn Mǝššina imosan batuten šin:
«Ǝmǝli issan win-net.»
Iwâr-tanat deɣ as: «Awedan kul wa innan ǝnta in Ǝmǝli, wǝdi iwâr-tu ad ugag arat kul wa wǝr noɣed.»

Aɣaywan zǝwwǝran ihossayan wǝrgeɣ ikassan n urǝɣ d ǝzrǝf ɣas a t-ǝhanen, kalar ǝhan-tu win eškan, ǝd win talaq. Wiyyad za tiwasansan y ǝzǝl a sǝr-san iskatan, win hadatnen amaran tiwasataɣmalan ǝzǝl kul.
Daɣ adi as izzǝzdag awedan iman-net daɣ ark aratan win ǝmala da, ad immutǝg y ǝššǝɣǝlan a sǝr-ǝs ǝskâtnen, iqqǝl awedan zǝddigan tǝha tǝnfa i mǝššis, amaran igâr iri y igi ǝn mazalan kul win olaɣnen.
Darrag y arak deranan ǝn tǝmmǝdrǝyt, ad tǝgammayaɣ ǝd taqqat d ǝzǝgzan ǝd tara d alxer, tǝrtǝya d aytedan win tansaynen Mǝššina s ǝwǝl zǝddigan.
Nǝmǝggǝg ǝd tǝmazaɣen wǝr nǝla almaɣna, ǝmosnat ǝljǝhǝl, id tǝssânaɣ as ikǝnnasan a du-tawaynat.
Akli n Ǝmǝli wǝr ihor ad ikannas, kalar iwâr-tu ad sǝmmid y aytedan kul, imos awedan ifrâgan ǝsǝssǝɣri, tah-ay tazaydart,
iwâr-tu ad itaggu ǝsǝssǝgri lǝmmidan y aytedan win das-tamazaɣnen, daɣ igi n attama n a tan-akfu Mǝššina tǝtubt y ad ǝnǝyan tidǝt.
Ǝddi a tan-du-za-tǝqqǝl tayttay-nasan ta tolaɣat, ǝkkǝsan iman-nasan daɣ taftawen n Iblis a tan-ibâzan, ig-en daɣ agna-net.
Ǝssǝn Timotay as azzaman win ǝlkamnen, a daɣ-san agin jilan labasnen.

Ǝddi aytedan ad ibʼas kittǝwan ar iman-nasan, iren azrǝf, ǝqqǝlan inasbaragan, ǝzzǝzwǝran iman-nasan, taggin alfawaxišan, ibʼas ǝbbǝrdagan i marwan-nasan, ibʼas tan-iha agoda, amaran wǝr zʼǝssǝɣmaran aratan win ǝqqalnen ǝddin.
Ikwalan wallan-nasan, wǝr tan-tǝha tǝhanint, jiwanken daɣ šizmit, wǝr ǝlen ǝzzǝbun, ǝknân aššar, ǝgzaran arat kul olaɣan,
ǝqqǝlan imǝkkǝddal, ǝlkǝman y awa dasan-d-ewayan medranan-nasan, ih-en ǝttǝkǝbbur wǝllen, usafan deranan-nasan i talɣa ta n Mǝššina.
Ad ǝttǝfan ǝddin daɣ azzahir, mišan ad unkaran tarna-net. Aytedan win, nǝmǝggǝg dǝr-san!
Ǝhan-tan wiyyad as imos alxal-nasan ilum gǝr ɣawnatan, tabazan ǝs taftawen-nasan šidoden šin ǝrkamnen, ǝn tǝnasbakkaden. Šidoden šin den wǝr ǝlkemnat ar y arak deranan-nasnat ǝmosnen ǝzzǝnǝfan.
Faw da ǝgammaynat teɣaray mišan wǝr ǝfregnat masnat ǝn tidǝt.

Ǝmmǝk was ǝmmǝzrayan maššaɣawan ǝn Masar ǝmosnen Yanus ǝd Yanbres ǝnnǝbi Musa, ǝmmǝk wǝdi daɣ as ǝmmǝzrayan aytedan win di tidǝt. Meddan win taytwen-nasnat wǝr tanat-iha ar aɣšud, amaran ǝzǝgzan-nasan wǝr izmer i jarrabatan.
Mišan wǝr zʼǝgrǝwan tǝttǝyt waliyyat, fǝlas ǝmmǝskǝl-nasan ad inǝfilǝl y ǝkkulluk n awedan, zun awa igrawan Yanus ǝd Yanbres.
Kay amaran, tǝkneɣ lǝkkum y ǝsǝssǝɣri-nin d alxal-in, tǝssânaɣ wǝllen aratan win as ǝnnǝyyeɣ igi-nasan, tǝnâyaɣ wǝllen ǝzǝgzan-in ǝd tǝzaydart-in ǝd tara-nin ǝd zǝmmerat-in
d ǝtǝwǝdgaz-in d alɣazab-in. Tǝssâna daɣ arat kul wa di-igrawan daɣ ǝɣrǝm n Antǝyoxǝya ǝd wa n Ikonǝyum ǝd wa n Lustra. Mǝni-tu ǝtǝwǝdgaz wa wǝr ǝgeɣ? Mišan ikkas-i-du Mǝššina daɣ awen kul.
Amaran aytedan kul win miksadan ǝn Mǝššina ǝs tǝrtǝyt n Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa, win di ad tǝwǝdgǝzan.
Mišan aytedan win maksanan, n ǝlmunafiqan, ad šatin daɣ arak mazalan, saxrakan aytedan-nasan, saxrakan iman-nasan.
Kay amaran, aknu ǝsǝggǝtǝkki daɣ aratan win tǝssana, tǝkkâsa daɣ-san aššak. Tǝssânaɣ wa dak-tan-issosanan.
Harwa da tǝmosa barar as tǝssanaɣ Ǝlkǝttaban win Zaddognen, amaran ǝfrâgan a kay-akfin masnat ta tǝtawayat s agaraw n ǝlɣillas s ǝzǝgzan s Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa.
Ǝlkǝttaban win Zaddognen kul Infas wa Zǝddigan a d-ǝfalan amaran tǝh-en tǝnfa daɣ ǝsǝssǝɣri n aytedan d aqqad-nasan d ikus-nasan daɣ alxata d ǝsǝssǝɣri-nasan daɣ tarrayt ta toɣadat.
Ǝmmǝk di as awedan wa imosan ǝmaray ǝs Mǝššina ad ifrǝg, aknu deɣ ǝmutǝg y igi n ǝššǝɣǝl kul wa olaɣan.
Onsayaq-qay fǝl udǝm ǝn Mǝššina, d Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa, s ǝnta a zʼišrǝɣan win ǝddarnen ǝd win aba d udǝm n ǝnǝfilal n Ǝlmǝsix ǝd taɣmar-net as:

Ǝdgǝz daɣ amel n awal ǝn Mǝššina ǝs tǝmǝwit daɣ du-wǝr-tǝtǝqqǝla dǝffǝr-ǝk, gǝr za tǝgrawaɣ edag n igi n awen wala. Ǝqqǝl awedan a d-isarḍin aytedan âs wǝr ǝlen tidǝt, ad tǝraqqama y aytedan tǝtamaraq-qan, iga awen ǝs tǝzaydart tǝkmâlat d ǝsǝssǝɣri iknân.

Fǝlas ǝlkâman azzaman a daɣ wǝr zʼǝqbǝlan aytedan ǝsǝssǝɣri wa n tidǝt tǝzzar ǝlkǝman y arak deranan, ad šadawan fǝl man-nasan imǝssǝsǝɣra a dasan-ganninen aratan kul win as saddaranan tesalay y-asan.
Ad ǝdbǝɣan šimǝzzugen-nasan i tidǝt, usafan ǝsǝsǝm i mayyan.
Kay amaran ǝqqǝl awedan ilan ǝzzǝbun daɣ ǝkkulluk n arat, tǝzmǝra y alɣazab, iqqǝl ǝššǝɣǝl-nak emel n Ǝlinjil y aytedan.
Nak amaran alwaq ǝn teklay-nin ihoz-du, alwaq ewad-du wa daɣ zʼakfa tǝmǝddurt-in tǝmos takutay.
Ǝggâza s ǝlluɣ tǝbǝllant, ǝggâza tammazaga har tǝɣrad, ǝgleɣ ogâzaɣ ǝzǝgzan-in.

Daɣ adi, awa obazan ɣur ǝmǝrǝdda, tǝtiwasans-i tǝkǝbbut ta n aqqad tǝmosat aroz ǝn wa d-ornan, s ǝnta di-z-akfu Ǝmǝli imosan ǝmašraɣ wa oɣadan, ǝzǝl a ilkaman. Wǝrgeɣ nak ɣas as tat-z-akfu, kalar a tat-akfu y aytedan kul win ǝqqalnen ǝs tara y ǝnǝfilal-net.
Ǝdgǝz wǝllen daɣ a di-du-takka daɣ ǝtrub,
fǝlas Demas igmad batu-nin id issôf lǝkkum y ǝddǝnet, ikka aɣrǝm ǝn Tesalonik. Kreses amaran ikka akal ǝn Galatǝya, Titǝs deɣ ikka akal ǝn Dalmatǝya.
Wǝr ɣur-i d-iqqim ar Luqa. Idaw-du ǝd Markus fǝlas tah-i-tu tǝnfa daɣ ǝššǝɣǝl-in.
Zimazala Tišik s ǝɣrǝm n Efez.
As du-tǝgle tǝmmǝraɣ-i-du ǝbǝrnuz wa din-oyye ɣur Karfus daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Trowas, tǝmmǝraɣ-i-du deɣ ǝlkǝttaban-in, wǝllen win ǝganen daɣ agašek.
Alaskandǝr wa n anad issikn-i arak mazalan aggotnen labasnen. Ǝmǝli a das-z-ixkǝman ǝs mazalan-net.
Kay da ǝnkǝd-as, fǝlas ikna tišit n ǝllid n awa nǝsassaɣru.
Ɣur ǝššǝriɣa-nin wa azzaran wǝr t-illa awedan iwâran aganna-nin, kalar awedan kul igmad batu-nin. Mǝššina ya wǝr tan-tobeza s ǝmazal di.
Ǝmǝli a iwaran aganna-nin, isassahat-i, fǝl ad aslin aytedan kul win wǝr nǝmos Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud y ǝmazal-net, šišawadaɣ ǝs tǝmǝwit tǝkmâlat, ikkas-i-du daɣ ǝmi n ahar.
A di-agǝz Ǝmǝli daɣ i t-illa ǝššur ǝn maksanan, assafs-i y a di-agu daɣ taɣmar-net ta n jǝnnawan. Ǝnta a ilan tanaya ta tu-tǝllat daɣ ǝɣlul ǝn tǝmeren! Amin.
Tǝhulaɣ-in Friska d Akilas, ǝntanay harkid aɣaywan n Onesiforus.
Erastus ǝnta iqqim-in daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Korent. Trofimǝs, as t-id-ǝfalaɣ irin daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Miletǝs.
Ǝdgǝz wǝllen daɣ a du-tasa dat tǝgrǝst. Ǝhulan-kay-in id Ebulay ǝd Fudenǝs ǝd Linǝs ǝd Klawdǝya ǝd mǝdrayan-nana kul daɣ ǝzǝgzan.
Illil-ak Ǝmǝli, ikf-iwan arraxmat ketnawan! Amin!
Titus: Awa nak Bulǝs, imosan akli ǝn Mǝššina, ǝmosa deɣ anammazul ǝn Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix. Issiwar-i Mǝššina ǝzuk n a d-awǝyaɣ ǝs tarrayt ta n ǝzǝgzan aytedan win isannafran; ǝssusǝnaq-qan tidǝt ta tan-za-tassaknit anamod was zʼagin tǝmǝddurt tǝnimannakat ǝd tara ǝn Mǝššina.
Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as zʼagin attama ǝn tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat. Tǝmǝddurt ten, Mǝššina di wǝr nǝtǝggu bahu a igan arkawal-net dat ǝxluk n ǝddǝnet.
Amaran Mǝššina isinafalal awal-net daɣ alwaq was otas. Awal wen ǝnta a iha ǝlmaɣiza was du-tawaflasa s igi-net, daɣ ǝlkâma y awas omar Mǝššina di n Ǝnǝssefsi-nana.
Ǝhulaq-qay-in Titǝs. Tǝmosa zun barar-in wa n tidǝt a dǝr ǝdrâwaɣ ǝzǝgzan. Ǝgmâya daɣ Mǝššina di n Abba, d Ǝnǝssefsi-nana Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix, a fall-ak d-izazzabben arraxmat d alxer.
Oyyeq-qay-in daɣ akal ǝn Kǝret fǝl ad tǝsǝkkǝsǝwaɣ awa din-iqqiman daɣ ǝššǝɣǝl-nana, tǝzzar taga daɣ ǝkkulluk n ǝɣrǝm imuzaran y Ǝlkǝnisat ta tu-tǝhat. Aktǝw aratan win as kay-omara, a tan-imosan as:
Akkiyyan daɣ muzaran win, ihor a tu-wǝr-illa i ifragan a daɣ-as d-inǝy ark arat, izlâf tantut iyyadda, ila bararan ǝzzigzannen, as tu-wǝr-illa i zʼannin ǝlan arak aladab, madeɣ wǝr ǝbbǝrdagan.

Ǝnta amɣar n Ǝlkǝnisat Mǝššina a t-iflasan izzozar-tu i tamattay-net, daɣ adi ilzâm-tu ad imos awedan as tu-wǝr-illa i ifragan a daɣ-as d-inǝy ark arat: Wǝr idkel iman-net dǝnnǝg aytedan, wǝr ila tuksay n ǝwǝl, wǝr imos ǝmǝšwi n esmad, wǝr imos ǝmǝkkennǝs, wala deɣ itattu alxaram.
Kalar arat wa t-ilzaman ad imos alǝs iha amagaru, ira imazalan win olaɣnen, imos ag ǝlmǝxsud, n ǝmǝzzǝlelǝɣ, n ǝmizdag innodan daɣ ǝwǝl-net.

Isigatakkat wǝllen daɣ lǝkkum y awal wa ilan ǝlǝsǝl s ǝmmǝk was itawasasaɣra. As iga adi, ad igrǝw fǝrregat n ad itamar aytedan s ǝsǝssǝɣri wa n tidǝt itaggu, ifrǝg deɣ ad isattaddu y aytedan win das-ǝggewalnen as ǝntanay a ǝhanen alxata.
Ǝnta ǝllan-tu aytedan aggotnen, wǝllen win d-ǝgmadnen Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, ǝmosnen inǝffǝllag, ǝššewalnen ixǝrsan, saxrakan aytedan.
Aytedan win di ilzâm ad tǝwǝdbǝɣan mawan-nasan, fǝlas saxrakan iɣawnatan ǝɣrâdnen s ǝsǝssǝɣri n aratan wǝr nǝmmǝkkan. Tattin s awen alxaram.
Iyyan daɣ kǝl akal-nasan, imosan ǝnnǝbi a innan:
«Kǝl-Kǝret, har faw tǝmosam inǝsbuha,
tǝmosam šilan wǝxsan aššarnen,
ǝn nǝffǝrǝšša wǝr nǝsǝmǝdrin ar daɣ a ǝtšan.»
Amaran arat wa inna da, tidǝt a imos. Awen da fǝlas ag-asan ǝrruɣmatan ǝsăsnen, fǝl ad izǝlulǝɣ ǝzǝgzan-nasan,
aqqamin da wǝr ǝlkeman i mayyan ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud d idufan n aytedan win ǝmmǝzraynen tidǝt.

Arat kul zǝddig y aytedan win as zaddogan man-nasan. Mišan aytedan win as wǝr zaddogan man-nasan, ugâyan deɣ s ǝzǝgzan, ɣur-san wǝr t-illa a zǝddigan, fǝlas taytwen-nasan, d ǝnnǝyaten-nasan kul ih-enat iba ǝn tazdak.
Gannin ǝksudan Mǝššina, mišan imazalan win taggin sataddin as ǝnkuran-tu. Ǝmosan aytedan tagginen igitan ǝssiglafnen, ǝmosan inǝmmǝzray a fǝl tu-wǝr-illa igi n ǝmazal olaɣan.
Amaran kay, tamar s aratan win namannaknen ǝd tarrayt ta imal ǝsǝssǝɣri wa n tidǝt.
Tannaɣ i meddan win waššarnen ad ǝqqǝlan aytedan sammodnen, ǝttâfnen ǝzzǝbun, ǝnnodan daɣ wallan-nasan, issohat ǝzǝgzan-nasan, tǝh-en tara, ǝknan zǝmmerat.

Ǝmmǝk wen daɣ as ilzam ad t-aginat tǝdoden šin waššarnen. Amǝr-tanat s ad ǝttǝfnat ǝzzǝbun-nasnat dat Mǝššina. Ad wǝr taẓamnat wala iqqǝl alxal-nasnat tessay n esmad aggen. Ǝqqǝlnatet šidoden tamarnen s ǝmazal n awa olaɣan.
Ǝdgǝznatet daɣ ammar ǝn tǝdoden šin madrornen s ad irenat meddan-nasnat, ǝd bararan-nasnat.
Ǝqqǝlnat šidoden ǝnnodanen daɣ wallan-nasnat, aginat alxal zǝddigan. Annattafnat d ǝššǝɣǝlan ǝn ɣawnatan-nasnat, alǝɣnat, abbardagnat i meddan-nasnat. As iga adi, wǝr zʼitǝwǝlku Awal ǝn Mǝššina.
Tamar harwa s ǝmmǝk wen da meddan win madrornen s ad annadin daɣ wallan-nasan.
Kay iman-nak da ilzâm-kay ad tǝtaggaɣ imazalan olaɣnen daɣ ǝkkulluk n anamod fǝl ad tǝqqǝlaɣ almasal y aytedan. Taggu ǝsǝssǝɣri igân s ǝwǝl iyyanda, ilân almaɣna.
Taggu batuten oɣadnen as tu-wǝr-illa i dǝr-ǝsnat du-z-iqqǝlan. As iga adi inǝmmǝnkar-nanaɣ a dasan-iba a sǝr-naɣ ǝnnan tǝha tǝkma, tabǝz-tan tǝkarakit.
Amǝr eklan s ad abbardagan i mǝssawsan daɣ ǝkkulluk n arat, a dasan-taggin arat wa fǝl tan-z-irin, ayyin-tan tǝmazrǝyt,
amaran a daɣ-san wǝr takaran. Kalar ǝqqǝlanet aytedan ǝssiflasnen wǝllen. As iga adi a d-awǝyan ǝtǝwǝsǝɣmar igân daɣ ǝkkulluk n anamod y ǝsǝssǝɣri kul wa iqqalan Mǝššina di n Ǝnǝssefsi-nana.
Ǝnta arraxmat ǝn Mǝššina tǝnifalal, tewây-du efsan y aytedan kul.
Tǝsakn-anaɣ ǝmmǝk was za nammazzay ǝd mazalan win iba ǝn tǝksǝda ǝn Mǝššina ǝd tara n ǝddǝnet, fǝl ad nagu daɣ ǝddǝnet tǝmǝddurt a daɣ nǝnnoda daɣ wallan-nana, toɣâdat, tǝnimannak ǝd tara ǝn Mǝššina.
Arat wa a tu-nagu nǝssigad, nǝga attama n ǝzǝl isifalawasan, imosan ǝnǝfilal n ǝdkul ǝn Mǝššina di maqqaran, a t-imosan Ǝnǝssefsi-nana Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix.
Ǝnta a ikfan iman-net, fǝl a danaɣ-isǝddǝrfu daɣ id t-illa ǝššur, izzǝzdǝg-ana, nǝqqǝl tamattay-net a sǝr-ǝs tǝskâtat, tǝsigatakkat daɣ igi ǝn mazalan win olaɣnen.
Arat da da was kay-ilzam a tu-tǝsasaɣra, d anamod was ilzam a sǝr-ǝs tǝtamaraɣ aytedan, tǝsuɣulaɣ-asan-t-idu. Agu y ǝššǝɣǝl wa igi n alǝs ilân batu. A tu-wǝr-imǝl i kay-olkân.
Sakt-en-du as ilzâm-tan ad ǝbbirdagan y ǝlxǝkumat d almawakkilan-net, ǝkkiwanan-asan, ǝgǝran iri y id t-illa ǝmazal olaɣan.
Ad wǝr taggin arak batuten s awedan waliyyan, wala ǝqqǝlan inadlaman, ilen aladab, ǝqqǝlan aytedan zamazalnen talmat y ǝkkulluk n awedan.

Fǝlas nakkanay iman-nana da ǝstizarat wǝr nǝla almaɣna, nǝmos inǝmmǝzray ǝxrâknen. Nǝha ǝkkǝlu fǝlas nǝlkâm y ark ǝnnǝyaten d arak deranan, ǝmosnen ǝzzǝnǝfan. Nǝmos aytedan as kawalan wallan-nasan, ǝranen ǝddǝnet, nǝla alxal isinaglafan, nǝnimaksan gar-ena.
Mišan assaɣa wad tǝnafalal ǝnniɣmat ǝn Mǝššina di n Ǝnǝssefsi ǝd tara-net y aytedan,

issǝfs-ana ǝs tǝhanint-net. Wǝrgeɣ imazalan olaɣnen win nǝtaggu a fǝl nǝgraw efsan win. Kalar nǝgraw-tan s ǝširǝd wa danaɣ-iga Infas wa Zǝddigan. Ǝširǝd wa, ǝnta a danaɣ-ewayan ǝs tǝhǝwt ta taynayat, isammattay-ana nǝssǝnta tǝmǝddurt iyyat taynayat.
Infas wa izazzabbat-t-idu fall-ana Mǝššina s igǝt s ǝssǝbab n awa iga Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix imosan Ǝnǝssefsi-nana.
Arat wa ig-ay fǝl ad nǝqqǝl imǝkkusa ǝn tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat s ǝnta daɣ nǝga attama-nana, fǝlas ikkas-ana-du daɣ tišit ǝn nǝmmǝzray-net, s arraxmat-net.

Arat wa imos awal illikanan, amaran areɣ a daɣ-as tǝdgǝza fǝl ad awǝy adi s aytedan win ǝzzǝgzannen ǝs Mǝššina ad sǝggǝtǝkken daɣ igi ǝn mazalan win olaɣnen. Arat da da wa olaɣan, tǝh-ay tǝnfa y aytedan.

Nǝmǝggǝg ǝd takkayen wǝr nǝla almaɣna d agamay ǝn masnat n ǝsmawan n aljadan. Tǝnǝmǝggǝga deɣ d amel gǝr aytedan ǝmmizraynen, d ǝmǝstan igân daɣ talɣa n ǝššǝriɣa ǝn Kǝl-Ǝlyǝhud, fǝlas wǝr ǝlen alfaydat waliyyat, za wǝr tan-tǝha tǝnfa.
I igmayan d ǝzǝnnǝmǝzrǝy n aytedan, tǝrɣǝmaɣ-as har sanatat tăklaten. As ilas dǝffǝr adi tǝstǝɣaq-qu daɣ Ǝlkǝnisat.
Fǝlas tǝfragaɣ ad tǝkkǝsaɣ aššak as alǝs šilat ǝn wǝdi immizray tarrayt ta toɣadat, amaran itaggu ibakkadan, izabaz iman-net y ǝššǝriɣa.
As sǝr-ǝk în-zammazalaɣ Artemas madeɣ Tišik, tǝnǝmǝnɣa d a di-du-takka daɣ ǝɣrǝm ǝn Nikobolis, fǝlas ǝnta as otasa a daɣ-as ǝkkǝsa tamert ta daɣ gaddalan konakan d asamed ǝšikǝl.
Akn-in masnat daɣ ǝšikǝl ǝn Zaynas wa n ǝmusan n ǝššǝriɣa, d Abbolos. A tu-wǝr-imǝl as miɣataran.
Amaran aytedan win-nana dă iwar-tan ad ǝlmǝdan ǝsǝggǝtǝkki daɣ igi ǝn mazalan win olaɣnen, fǝl a d-ǝssǝxsǝlan aratan win as tǝkna addararat igi, wǝrgeɣ ad ǝgân tǝmǝddurt a daɣ wǝr ǝnfen wala.
Aytedan kul win dǝr namahaɣ edag, ǝhulan-kay-in. Tǝhulaɣ-in imaran-nana win dǝr nǝdraw ǝzǝgzan. Mǝššina ya tǝgeɣ-awan arraxmat ketnawan.
Philemon: Awa nak Bulǝs, imosan amaskasaw fǝl ǝddǝlil n Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa, nak d ǝmidi-nana daɣ ǝzǝgzan Timotay, ǝnnanen ǝhulan-in ǝmǝri-nana Filemona n ǝmadhal-nana, d Ǝlkǝnisat ta tǝtamanayat daɣ ahan-nak. Nǝhul-in deɣ tǝmidit-nana daɣ ǝzǝgzan Affǝya d Arxifus ǝmadhal-nana daɣ tǝbǝllant.

Awa nak Bulǝs, imosan amaskasaw fǝl ǝddǝlil n Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa, nak d ǝmidi-nana daɣ ǝzǝgzan Timotay, ǝnnanen ǝhulan-in ǝmǝri-nana Filemona n ǝmadhal-nana, d Ǝlkǝnisat ta tǝtamanayat daɣ ahan-nak. Nǝhul-in deɣ tǝmidit-nana daɣ ǝzǝgzan Affǝya d Arxifus ǝmadhal-nana daɣ tǝbǝllant.
Izazzabbat-du fall-awan Mǝššina di n Abba-nana ǝd Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix, Ǝmǝli-nana, arraxmat d alxer.
Ǝmidi-nin Filemona faw id ǝggaza šin igi ǝn tǝwatriwen a kay daɣ-asnat d-ǝkatta ǝtigudǝya y Ǝmǝli-nin.
Fǝlas ǝslêɣ tara ta tǝgeɣ y aytedan kul win ǝlkamnen y Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa, d ǝzǝgzan wa sǝr-ǝs tǝge.
Šiwatriwen-in ǝtaggaq-qanat fǝl ad tǝgrǝwa s ǝllǝllu-nak, wa d-igmadan ǝzǝgzan-nak, ǝgǝrri iknan tǝnǝddawt, n albaraka kul wa nǝla daɣ ǝnǝmǝnnak-nana ǝs lǝkkum y Ǝlmǝsix.
Tara ta kay-tǝhat amidi-nin teway-du sǝr-i tǝdǝwit agget d allam fǝl man, tǝssismada deɣ iwallan n aytedan kul win ǝlkamnen i Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix.
Awen daɣ a fǝlas kud imos as tartǝyt-in d Ǝlmǝsix tǝkf-i fǝrregat n a kay-amǝra s arat wa ihoran,
da ǝssofaɣ ad imos as agamay ɣas a daɣ-ak zʼaga a di-taga tǝnǝfust fǝl ǝddǝlil n ǝnǝmǝra wa nǝga. Nak Bulǝs imosan almawakkil n Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa ǝhe kasaw ǝmǝrǝdda fǝl ǝddǝlil-net,
ǝgmâya daɣ-ak a di-taga tǝnǝfust daɣ talɣa n Onesim, wa ɣur-ǝk d-iddǝrragan, imosan barar-in daɣ ǝzǝgzan fǝlas tarrayt ta n Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix a daɣ t-ǝge harwa a ɣur-i illa da da daɣ kasaw.
Kala a dak-ku-wǝr-tǝha tǝnfa mišan ǝmǝrǝdda tǝh-anaq-qu, gǝr za i kay wala i nak.
Ǝmǝrǝdda ǝssoɣalaɣ-ak-k-in imos aganna-nin.
Ǝsidarana a ɣur-i illa da da iket ǝhe kasaw fǝl ǝddǝlil n Ǝlinjil, a di-ilal daɣ adag-nak.
Mišan wǝr areɣ igi n adi ar ǝs turagat-nak fǝlas wǝr areɣ a kay-ǝšǝhhǝššǝla ǝmazal a, olaɣan a, ǝssofa a tu-taga gar-ek ǝd man-nak.
Mijas Onesim wǝr dak-iga arat n afel, ar fǝlas as kay-in-iqqal, a ɣur-ǝk aqqam har faw,

ǝmǝrǝdda wǝr imos akli ɣas, ogar akli, ǝmidi-nin daɣ ǝzǝgzan n ǝmǝri-nin a imos. Wala nak ǝknêq-qu tara wǝllen ǝngǝm za kay a das-issǝrtayan tara ta n as imos akli-nak imos deɣ ǝmidi-nak daɣ ǝzǝgzan s Ǝmǝli.
Daɣ adi kud amidi-nak daɣ ǝzǝgzan a ǝmosa wǝdi ǝqbǝl-tu tǝttǝfaq-qu daɣ adag wa daɣ-i tǝttafa.
As imos as iɣšâd-ak arat made tǝrwâsaɣ-as-tu wǝdi nak a daq-qu tǝssana.
Arat wa ǝfus wa-nu nak Bulǝs as t-ǝktaba: nak a dak-z-irzǝman. Kud ira wǝr kay-d-ǝssǝktaɣ as kay tǝmǝddurt-nak iman-net a daɣ-ak ǝle.
Ǝgmâya daɣ-ak ǝmidi-nin a di-taga tǝnǝfust ta fǝl udǝm n Ǝmǝli. As di-tǝgeɣ adi fǝl ǝddǝlil ǝn tartǝyt ta nǝga daɣ Ǝlmǝsix a di-talǝma fǝl man.
As dak-in-ǝkattaba širawt ta ǝkkasaɣ aššak as arat wa daɣ-ak in-ǝgammaya da a di-tu-taga ǝnta madeɣ a t-ogaran.
Ǝgmâya daɣ-ak deɣ a din-tǝsǝmmutǝga edag ǝn tǝɣimit fǝlas ordêɣ as a kawan-in-ǝtǝwǝsuɣǝla as iqbal Mǝššina šiwatriwen-nawan.
Ebafras wa n ǝmidi-nin daɣ kasaw fǝl ǝddǝlil n Ǝlmǝsix Ɣaysa, issislam-in fall-ak,
ǝnta ǝd Markus d Aristarxus ǝd Demas ǝd Luqa ǝmosnen imadhalan-in daɣ ǝššǝɣǝl.
Izazzabbat-du fall-awan Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix arraxmat-net.
Hebrews: Dǝffǝr as iššewal Mǝššina a irǝwan i marawan-nana ǝs tarrayt n ǝnnǝbitan, daɣ taklaten aggotnen ǝd tǝmǝwiten aggotnen,
iššewal-ana nakkanay da daɣ azzaman win ǝlkamnen a, ǝs tarrayt ǝn Barar. Barar wen iga Mǝššina arat kul daɣ ǝfus-net, ixlak-du deɣ ǝddǝnet ǝs tarrayt-net.

Tanaya ǝn Mǝššina kul tǝmilawlaw fall-as, amaran tǝnda-du daɣ-as tišit ǝn Mǝššina, awal-net deɣ ilân tarna, ǝnta as ittaf arat kul. Dǝffǝr as issinda ǝššǝɣǝl wa n ǝzǝzdǝg-nana daɣ bakkadan, ikka ijǝnnawan, iqqim daɣ ǝɣil ǝn Mǝššina di idkalan.
Almaqam-net ikna šigrat ǝn wa n angalosan, fǝlas esǝm wa t-ikfa Mǝššina ogar wǝllen win-nasan.
Amaran mǝni daɣ angalosan was kala a das-inna Mǝššina:
«Barar-in a tǝmosa, azalada, ad ǝqqalaɣ abba-nak.»
Mǝni deɣ daɣ angalosan was inna Mǝššina:
«Nak a das-ǝqqǝlaɣ abba, ǝnta deɣ iqqǝl barar-in.»
Amaran barar wa n aɣafadday en, as t-id-iga Mǝššina daɣ ǝddǝnet, omar angalosan kul s a das-ǝssǝjǝdan.
Daɣ batu ta tǝqqalat angalosan, inna Mǝššina:
«Angalosan-net, ig-en zun aḍu, inaɣbidan-net ig-en zun abalagleg ǝn tǝmsay.»
Daɣ batu amaran ta tǝqqalat Barar, a inna Mǝššina:
«Taɣmar-nak, ya Barar-in di n Amadkol, tǝll-ay har faw, ǝttǝbil-nak, ǝttǝbil n ǝššǝriɣa a imos.»
«Tareɣ taqqat, tǝkyâda tǝmazrǝyt. Awen da fǝlas ya Barar-in di n Amadkol, Ǝmǝli-nak Mǝššina a kay-igan ǝmǝnokal, isannafran-kay ikf-ik tǝfalawist tagget, togarat ta n midawan-nak.»
Innâ deɣ Mǝššina:
«Kay Barar-in di n Amadkol, ǝstizarat, kay a d-ixlakan amaḍal, ijǝnnawan deɣ kay a tan-d-ixlakan.»
«Ad ǝmǝsan kul, mišan kay tǝlleq-qu har faw. Ketnasan ad agin ǝmǝndi wa tǝtaggu tǝbdoq.»
«A dasan-tagaɣ aḍḍa wa itawaggin i tǝkadkat, itǝwagg-asan deɣ ǝsǝmmǝttǝy wa itawaggan»
i sǝlsa.
«Mišan kay, har faw wǝr tǝmmǝttaya, taɣrǝst-nak deɣ wǝr tǝla tǝzǝrǝst.»
Amaran, mǝni daɣ angalosan was kala a das-inna Mǝššina:
«Qamu daɣ ǝɣil-in, har daw-ǝk ǝssǝrǝsaɣ izǝnga-nak, ǝmǝlan daw daran-nak.»
Awak angalosan, wǝrgeɣ imǝttǝnkal a mosan s akkiyyan ila ǝššǝɣǝl-net, tiwazamazalan-du y ad ilalan y aytedan win zʼǝgrǝwnen ǝlɣillas?
Awen daɣ a fǝlas iwâr-anaɣ ǝnnǝkud wǝllen, nǝsǝssuhǝt aratan win as nǝsla, fǝl tǝksǝda n ad nǝgmǝd tarrayt ta tolaɣat.
Arat kul wa ǝmalan angalosan i marawan-nanaɣ ittidda, amaran abakkad kul ǝd tǝmazrǝyt kul n awal wǝdi itiwagg-asan attadib wa dǝr ǝhoran.

Manǝmmǝk as za naqqam wǝr nǝwwǝddab as imos âs wǝr nǝssǝfrar ǝlɣillas ogdân d awa tǝzzǝwwǝrt? Fǝlas ǝlɣillas wa, Ǝmǝli iman-net a t-id-imalan daɣ tizarat, win das-ǝslanen deɣ sitaddan-anaɣ as tidǝt a imos.

Mǝššina a isattaddan tǝgǝyya-nasan s alɣalamaten, d aratan simaklalnen, ǝd tǝlmǝɣjujaten ǝmosnen ǝzzǝnǝfan, ǝd tǝhǝkkuten a d-ǝfalnen Infas wa Zǝddigan. Aratan win kul ig-en ǝs tǝmǝwit tǝnimannakat ǝd tara-net.
Wǝrgeɣ angalosan a izzozar Mǝššina y ǝddǝnet ta du-tǝzayat, tas nǝššewal daɣ batu-net da.
Amaran tǝll-ay tǝgǝyya daɣ adag iyyan tǝnnât:
Ma imos aggadǝm as t-idu-tǝkatta? Ma imos ag aggadǝm as daɣ-as tǝtassana?
Tǝssǝrasaq-qu daɣ arat n azzaman, imal daw angalosan, dǝffǝr awen tǝkfeq-qu tanaya d ǝdkul.
Tǝssǝrasaɣ arat kul daw-ǝs.
Ǝzuzǝr wa t-iga Mǝššina y arat kul, ǝnta a d-ewayan as wǝr t-illa i ifragan tǝmazrǝyt-net. Amaran harwa da, wǝr nǝhǝnnǝy âs arat kul illa daw tanat-net.

Mišan nǝnây Ɣaysa as iga arat n azzaman illa daw angalosan, dǝffǝr awen igraw tanaya d ǝdkul fǝl ǝddǝlil n alɣazab wa iga ǝd tǝmattant ta iga. Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as iḳazankazat tǝmattant, imos awen arat iga fǝl ǝddǝlil n aytedan kul, s arraxmat ǝn Mǝššina.

Mǝššina a d-ixlakan aratan kul, amaran ǝddǝlil-net a fǝl t-ǝllan. Mǝššina amaran igrâz-as ad ǝgrǝwan aytedan aggotnen daɣ tanaya-net. Dad zamas Ɣaysa a imosan ǝssǝbab n ǝlɣillas-nasan, wǝdi ilzâm ad t-akfu Mǝššina alkamalat kul ǝs tarrayt n alɣazab wa iga.
Wa izazdagan, ǝd win tawazazdagnen, ketnasan iyyanda a d-ǝfalan, a t-imosan Mǝššina. Awen daɣ a fǝlas Ɣaysa wǝr fall-as imos tǝkarakit tǝnna ta dasan-itaggu: «Imǝdrayan-in»,
assaɣa wad inna:
Ad ǝmmâlaɣ esǝm-nak i mǝdrayan-in. A dak-agaɣ tǝmmalen daɣ ǝljǝmaɣat.
Inna deɣ:
A tu-sǝnnǝhǝlaɣ fǝllesat.
Inna harwada:
Nak da, nak ǝd bararan win di-ikfa Mǝššina.
Daɣ adi, dad zamas bararan win olân, ǝgân daɣ azni ǝd tǝɣǝssa, wǝdi, Ɣaysa da iggâz alxalat ta ǝhan. Arat wen ig-ay, fǝl ad attaftaf ǝs tǝmattant-net wa ittafan tarna ǝn tǝmattant, a t-imosan Iblis,
isǝddǝrfǝt deɣ aytedan win ǝhanen ǝkkǝlu daɣ tǝɣrǝst-nasan fǝl tǝksǝda ta ǝgan i tamattant.
Igmâd aššak as Ɣaysa wǝr d-osa fǝl ad issǝn daɣ angalosan. Kalar ǝzzurrǝyya n ǝnnǝbi Ibrahim a d-ikka y a daɣ-as issǝn.

Awen daɣ a fǝlas ilzâm ad alu ǝd mǝdrayan-net daɣ arat kul, fǝl ad iqqǝl ǝlimam wa zǝwwǝran, imosan ǝmǝhhenǝn n alɣadil daɣ ǝlɣibada ǝn Mǝššina. Ǝmmǝk en da as zʼigrǝw tǝsureft ǝn bakkadan ǝn tamattay.
Fǝlas, alɣazab wa iga assaɣa wad itawajarrab, ikf-ay fǝrregat n ad agǝz win tawajarrabnen.

Adi daɣ a fǝlas ya imǝdrayan-in kawanay a zaddognen iɣr-iwan Mǝššina y a tǝgrǝwam tadagart daɣ ǝššǝɣǝl-net, agiwat ǝnǝẓǝr-nawan daɣ anammazul s ǝnta a imosan ǝlimam wa zǝwwǝran ǝn tarrayt ta nǝha, a t-imosan Ɣaysa.
Iɣdâl i Mǝššina di a t-isannafranan, zun awa iga ǝnnǝbi Musa i tamattay ketnet ǝn Mǝššina.
Amaran, itiwaxkam-as âs ihor ǝd tanaya tǝknât šigrat ǝn ta n Musa, zund ǝmmǝk âs ǝmakras n ahan, ogar ehan iman-net almaqam.
Ehan kul ill-ay wa t-ikrasan, Mǝššina amaran, ǝnta a ikrasan ǝkkulluk n arat.
Musa iɣdâl i tamattay ketnet ǝn Mǝššina, amaran amaššaɣal a imos išewalan daɣ batu n aratan win zʼimǝl Mǝššina.
Ǝlmǝsix amaran barar n ahan ǝn Mǝššina a imos, iɣdâl i tamattay ǝn Mǝššina, imos ǝmuzar-net. Ehan wen amaran nakkanay a t-ǝmosnen as imos as nǝzazzawat daɣ tǝflǝst tǝglayat d attama was nǝsabarag.
Awen daɣ a fǝl inna Infas wa Zǝddigan:
«Azalada, as tǝslam y awal-net,
ad wǝr tǝsǝggǝrmǝmam iwallan-nawan zun alwaq wanad n ǝfǝllǝg ǝn marawan-nawan win ǝrǝwnen. Ǝzǝl wa di-ǝjjarraban daɣ taneray,
ǝgan-i tǝnagmayt tǝmosat jarraba-nin, ǝnâyan igitan-in
har ǝgan ǝkkozat tǝmǝrwen n awatay. Awen daɣ a fǝl di-iggaz alham wǝllen ǝn tamattay n azzaman win den. Tǝzzar ǝnneɣ: Aytedan win, iwallan-nasan faw ǝxrâkan, wǝr kala ad ǝssanan tarrayen-in.
Alham en daɣ a sǝr-i d-ewayan tahuday n âs wǝr ilkem ad ǝggâzan akal wa sammatagaɣ i tǝsanfawt-nasan.»
Ǝnkǝdat ya imǝdrayan-in! A kawan-wǝr-iggǝz i ilân ǝwǝl aššaran wǝr nǝzzǝgzan har awǝd awen ad ammazray šiyyat Mǝššina di iddaran.
Kalar tinǝmǝggiwat tǝlxutbat gar-ewwan akk ǝzǝl, iket ǝfragan aytedan ad annin: «azalada», fǝl a kawan-wǝr-iggǝz i udân daɣ jarraba n abakkad aggarmam ǝwǝl-net.
Nakkanay imidawan n Ǝlmǝsix daɣ ǝššǝɣǝl a nǝmos as imos as nǝzazzawat har tǝzǝrǝst daɣ gǝlleyat ta nǝga harwa daɣ tizarat.
Ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban:
«Azalada, as tǝslam y awal-net, ad wǝr tǝsǝggǝrmǝmam iwallan-nawan zun alwaq wanad n ǝfǝllǝg.»
Amaran ma mosan aytedan win ǝffǝllagnen fǝl Mǝššina dǝffǝr as ǝslân y awal-net? Awak wǝrgeɣ aytedan win d-ǝgmadnen Masar azâr-asan Musa?
Ma mosan za aytedan win as iga Mǝššina ǝkkozat tǝmǝrwen n awatay ih-ay alham-nasan? Awak wǝrgeɣ win ǝganen abakkad amaran ǝɣradan maxsay daɣ taneray?
Tǝzǝrǝst n awen âs ma mosan aytedan win as ihad Mǝššina âs wǝr ilkem ad ǝggâzan akal wa isammatag i tǝsanfawt-nasan? Awak wǝrgeɣ win ugaynen s a das-abbardagan?
Daɣ adi nǝhannay as wǝr ǝgrewan iguz n akal wa n tǝsanfawt fǝlas tugǝyt a ǝgan sa sǝr-ǝs ǝzzǝgzǝnan.
Daɣ adi, iket di ad t-illa arkawal ǝn Mǝššina wa n ad nǝggǝz akal ǝn tǝsanfawt wa imal, ǝnkǝdat wǝllen a kawan-wǝr-iggǝz awedan waliyyan igân iduf n as abʼas ogaz wala.
Fǝlas igmâd aššak as isalan n Ǝlinjil nǝg-asan agaraw zun wa dasan-ǝgan daɣ taneray. Mišan awal was ǝssǝsaman wǝr dasan-ikna wala fǝlas wǝr ǝgen ǝzǝgzan wa ǝgan aytedan win t-ǝqbalnen.
Nakkanay win sǝr-ǝs ǝzzǝgzannen, ad nǝggǝz akal ǝn tǝsanfawt was inna Mǝššina daɣ batu-net:
«Igaz-i alham-nasan. Alham en daɣ a sǝr-i d-ewayan tahuday n âs wǝr ilkem ad ǝggâzan akal wa sammatagaɣ i tǝsanfawt-nasan.»
As itaggu awen da Mǝššina iɣrâd arat kul harwa ɣur ǝnǝtti n ǝddǝnet.
Fǝlas ill-ay adag a daɣ innâ, daɣ batu n ǝzǝl wa n ǝssa:
Tǝzzar izzǝraz Mǝššina ǝššǝɣǝl-net kul wa n ǝxluk ǝn jǝnnawan d amaḍal, ǝzǝl wa n ǝssa.
Ǝnnân deɣ Ǝlkǝttaban:
Igmâd aššak as wǝr zʼǝggǝzan akal ǝn tǝsanfawt ta hakka.
Daɣ adi, dad zamas ǝgrâwan wiyyad iguz ǝn tǝsanfawt ten, amaran win ǝslanen isalan n alxer ǝstizarat wǝr ǝgrewan iguz n akal ǝn tǝsanfawt wen fǝl tišit-nasan inǝmmǝzray,
ikkas Mǝššina ǝzǝl iyyan aynâyan daɣ batu ten,
a t-imosan azalada,
ǝs tǝnna ta iga dǝffǝr awen wǝllen ǝs tarrayt n ǝnnǝbi Dawǝd, s ǝmmǝk was t-inna dat awen:
Azalada, as tǝslam y awal-net, ad wǝr tǝsǝggǝrmǝmam iwallan-nawan.
Awalla, ǝnnar iddew Joswe ǝd tamattay ten har tat-išaššawad edag ǝn tǝsanfawt wen, wǝdi wǝr zʼammagrad Mǝššina daɣ batu n ǝzǝl iyyan ǝn tǝsanfawt dǝffǝr awen.
Almaɣna n awen as harwada tǝll-ay tǝsanfawt i tamattay ǝn Mǝššina, tolât d ǝzǝl wa n ǝssa s ǝnta daɣ izzǝraz Mǝššina ǝššǝɣǝl-net kul wa n ǝxluk ǝn jǝnnawan d amaḍal.
Amaran awedan wa iggazan edag ǝn tǝsanfawt ta ihakku Mǝššina, wǝdi ad assanfu daɣ ǝššǝɣǝlan-net, zun awa iga Mǝššina daɣ win-net iman-net.
Daɣ adi ǝdgǝzatana wǝllen daɣ iguz n adag ǝn tǝsanfawt ta, fǝl ad wǝr ixrǝk waliyyan daɣ-na awa ǝgan marawan-nana a ǝmǝzraynen Mǝššina.

Fǝlas awal ǝn Mǝššina iddâr, ila tarna, amaran tăwala-net togar ta n takoba. Itaggaz iman n aytedan ǝd wallan-nasan, igallu har isǝmmǝɣras, d ǝkǝlkǝl ǝn ɣasan. Amaran awal ǝn Mǝššina ǝnta a ixakkaman y awas ifarray awedan daɣ man-net d awa isamadran daɣ ǝwǝl-net.
Wǝr tu-tǝlla tǝxlǝk as wǝrgeɣ ihannay-tat Mǝššina. Arat kul immun-as, inniflay daɣ-as. Amaran ǝnta a dat za nǝbdǝd fǝl mazalan-nana.
Dad zamas nǝla ǝlimam wa ogaran ilimaman kul, ihân ijǝnnawan, a t-imosan Ɣaysa, Barar ǝn Mǝššina, wǝdi zǝzzǝwǝtatana daɣ ǝzǝgzan-nana.
Fǝlas ǝlimam-nana wa zǝwwǝran en, ifrâg a danaɣ-ikbǝl daɣ rǝkkǝm-nana, id ǝgrâwan-tu jarrabatan zun win danaɣ-garrawnen daɣ anamod kul, eges kala wǝr iga abakkad.

Daɣ adi ihazatanaɣ-in ǝmǝnokal-nana a t-imosan Mǝššina di n ǝmǝggi n arraxmat, nǝgâ awen ǝs tǝflǝst, fǝl ad nǝgrǝw ǝhǝnǝtta, nǝgrǝw deɣ arraxmat s ǝnta dana-za-takfit tilalt daɣ alwaq wa daɣ nǝddǝrar s awen.

Ǝkkulluk n Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran, itiwasanafran daɣ aytedan, amaran tǝnfa n aytedan en da a fǝl itawazazar y ad agu ǝššǝɣǝl ǝn Mǝššina, agu šihǝkkuten ǝd tǝkutawen fǝl agamay ǝn tǝsureft ǝn bakkadan-nasan.
Ǝlimam wen, ifrâg ǝgǝrri n aljahilan d aytedan win ǝxraknen, id ǝnta iman-net da irkăm.
Rǝkkǝm-net en daɣ a fǝlas iwâr-tu ad agu šikutawen fǝl agamay ǝn tǝsureft ǝn bakkadan win-net, harkid win tamattay.
Amaran wǝr t-illa awedan ifrâgan ad akfu iman-net almaqam ǝn tišit n Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran. Kalar Mǝššina a sǝr-ǝs d-iɣarrin aytedan, zund ǝmmǝk as sǝr-ǝs d-iɣra Harun.
Ǝmmǝk en daɣ âs Ǝlmǝsix wǝrgeɣ ǝnta a ikfan iman-net tanaya ǝn tišit n Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran. Kalar Mǝššina a ɣur igraw tanaya ten s ǝnta a das-innan:
Barar-in a tǝmosaɣ. Azalada ǝqqalaɣ abba-nak.
Zund ǝmmǝk was inna Mǝššina daɣ Ǝlkǝttaban:
Ǝlimam a tǝmosa har faw, daɣ taggayt ta n Malǝk-Assaddeq.
Ǝlmǝsix harwa ad iha ǝddǝnet, ittâr ǝs tǝkalelt ǝd mǝttawan, onsay Mǝššina s ǝnta a ifragan ad t-iɣlǝs daɣ tamattant. Iqbal Mǝššina tǝwatray-net, fǝlas ǝmiksad ǝn Mǝššina a imos.
Ǝlmǝsix Barar ǝn Mǝššina a imos, mišan ilmâd ǝbǝrdǝg id alɣazab a iga.
Ǝmmǝk en da as igraw alkamalat kul, iqqal wa ihakkin ǝlɣillas iɣlâlan i win das-ǝbbǝrdagnen,
id Mǝššina a t-ikfan tišit n ǝlimam wa zǝwwǝran daɣ taggayt ta n Malǝk-Assaddeq.
Aratan aggotnen as nǝfrag a tan-nannu daɣ batu ta, as izzǝwat ǝsǝssǝgri-nasan id aytedan a tǝqqalam a fǝl izzǝwat ǝgǝrri.

Edag an âs tǝrǝwam as tǝqqalam imǝssǝsǝɣra, kalar har harwada tǝddiraram s ad tǝtawasasaɣrim aratan win tǝsǝntit n awal ǝn Mǝššina. Tǝhâm edag was wǝrgeɣ imensewan win ǝqqurnen as tǝddǝraram, kalar harwada tǝddiraram s ǝx.
Amaran awedan was harwada iddirar s ǝx, wǝdi harwada wǝr ifreg zǝlǝy gǝr awa olaɣan d awa wǝr noleɣ. Awedan wa, imos zun ajanɣay.
Imensewan win ǝqqurnen i n aytedan win ǝdwalnen. Aytedan win, ǝntanay a ǝgrawnen masnat ta tan-tǝkfat zǝlǝy n awa olaɣan d awa wǝr noleɣ fǝlas ǝjjirraban aratan win di.

Daɣ adi, akǝyatanaɣ edag wa n ǝsǝnti ǝn taɣaray daɣ batu n Ǝlmǝsix. Akkiwatana dat y ad nawǝd alkamalat da wǝr nǝles tewaɣlay n ǝsǝnti iyyan aynayan, almaɣna n awen: tǝtubt d ǝmǝzzǝy d arak mazalan tawaynen aggadǝm s ǝhluk d ǝzǝgzan ǝs Mǝššina
d ǝsǝssǝɣri igân daɣ batu n ǝzǝzdǝg d ǝsǝwǝr n aytedan ifassan d ǝsǝnkǝr ǝn nǝmmǝttan d ǝššǝriɣa wa n ǝzǝl wa n tabadday.
Amaran awen daɣ a za nagu, kud irda Mǝššina.

Aytedan win ǝjwarnen ǝgrawan ǝnnur ǝn Mǝššina, ǝsammatammen tǝhǝkkut ǝn Mǝššina, ǝgrawan Infas wa Zǝddigan, ǝnayan as awal ǝn Mǝššina ihôssay, ǝnayan deɣ tarna ta tǝsaknit ǝddǝnet ta du-tǝzayat, amaran ǝmmǝzrayan tarrayt ta tolaɣat, win di, wǝr t-illa ǝmmǝk as ǝlasan tǝtubt; fǝlas agamay ǝn tǝnfa ǝn man-nasan a fǝl ǝlasan ǝtǝytǝy ǝn Barar ǝn Mǝššina fǝl tǝgǝttawt, sammadrayan-tu dat awedan kul.

Aytedan win ǝjwarnen ǝgrawan ǝnnur ǝn Mǝššina, ǝsammatammen tǝhǝkkut ǝn Mǝššina, ǝgrawan Infas wa Zǝddigan, ǝnayan as awal ǝn Mǝššina ihôssay, ǝnayan deɣ tarna ta tǝsaknit ǝddǝnet ta du-tǝzayat, amaran ǝmmǝzrayan tarrayt ta tolaɣat, win di, wǝr t-illa ǝmmǝk as ǝlasan tǝtubt; fǝlas agamay ǝn tǝnfa ǝn man-nasan a fǝl ǝlasan ǝtǝytǝy ǝn Barar ǝn Mǝššina fǝl tǝgǝttawt, sammadrayan-tu dat awedan kul.

Aytedan win ǝjwarnen ǝgrawan ǝnnur ǝn Mǝššina, ǝsammatammen tǝhǝkkut ǝn Mǝššina, ǝgrawan Infas wa Zǝddigan, ǝnayan as awal ǝn Mǝššina ihôssay, ǝnayan deɣ tarna ta tǝsaknit ǝddǝnet ta du-tǝzayat, amaran ǝmmǝzrayan tarrayt ta tolaɣat, win di, wǝr t-illa ǝmmǝk as ǝlasan tǝtubt; fǝlas agamay ǝn tǝnfa ǝn man-nasan a fǝl ǝlasan ǝtǝytǝy ǝn Barar ǝn Mǝššina fǝl tǝgǝttawt, sammadrayan-tu dat awedan kul.
Amaḍal igarrawan akonak olaɣan, amaran itaraw-du annabatan tǝha tǝnfa i win tu-gayaknen, amaḍal wǝdi igrâw albaraka ǝn Mǝššina.
Mišan amaḍal wa d-erawan y aytedan annabatan aššarnen, wǝdi wǝr infa wala. Tulɣant a tu-za-tǝwǝrat, amaran tǝsǝlkamt-net ahluk igân ǝs tǝmsay.
Ya imaran-in, kud imos âs nǝššewal-awan s ǝmmǝk wa, da nǝkkâs aššak âs izay-kawan-du arat iknân ǝlluɣ a t-imosan ǝlɣillas.
Awalla, Mǝššina Ǝmǝli oɣadan a imos, daɣ adi wǝr din-z-attaw imazalan-nawan, wala tara ta tu-tǝssǝknam daɣ ǝššǝɣǝl wa tǝgam fǝl saɣmar n esǝm-net i mǝzzǝgzan âs harwada tǝtaggim-tu.
Mišan nǝsidaran âs akkiyyan daɣ-wan ad assaknu gǝlleyat tǝdi da har tǝzǝrǝst, fǝl ad tǝgrǝwam igi n attama indân.
As tǝgam adi wǝr za tǝqqǝlam imǝssǝndad, kalar ad tattalalam win ǝgrawnen arraxmat tas itawagga arkawal-net ǝs tarrayt n ǝzǝgzan-nasan ǝd tǝzaydart-nasan.
Amaran, assaɣa wad iga Mǝššina arkawal y ǝnnǝbi Ibrahim, wǝr t-illa esǝm iyyan ogaran wa n Mǝššina ǝngǝm ihǝd sǝr-ǝs. Awen daɣ a fǝl
ihad Mǝššina s azzat-net,
inna:
Illikan âs a kay sǝnnǝhǝlaɣ tehakkay n albaraka, akna deɣ ǝsǝgǝt n ǝzzurrǝyya-nak.
Ǝmmǝk en daɣ âs dǝffǝr as issikna Ibrahim tǝzaydart-net, igraw arat was das-itawagga arkawal-net.
Aytedan, tahuday a taggin s esǝm wa ogaran win-nasan, amaran tahuday ten, ǝnta a tǝsataddit batu-nasan, tǝgdǝl a dǝr-ǝs d-iqqǝl awedan waliyyan.
Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as Mǝššina, isigatakkat y ad issusǝn aytedan win as iga arkawal âs aratan win issǝbdad wǝr tǝmǝttǝyan. Awen daɣ a fǝl ihad Mǝššina daɣ batu ten.

Daɣ adi ǝššin aratan a t-ǝllanen wǝr nǝtǝmǝttǝy, amaran wǝr t-illa ǝmmǝk as daɣ-san iga Mǝššina bahu. Aratan win ǝntanay a dana-za-sǝssuhǝtnen wǝllen, nakkanay a oyyanen arat kul nǝgmay taggast s ǝzǝzzǝwi-nana daɣ attama wa danaɣ-itawakfan.
Attama wen, ǝnta a danaɣ-imosan šisǝttǝytay ǝssiflasnen, ǝssohatnat, amaran ǝnta a danaɣ-ewayan har dǝnnǝg anaɣer wa illan gǝr adag wa zǝddigan ǝd wa ogaran tazdak.
Edag wen ǝnta a iggaz Ɣaysa fǝl ǝddǝlil-nana, azzar-anaɣ-in sǝr-ǝs, iqqal ǝlimam wa zǝwwǝran har faw, daɣ taggayt ta n Malǝk-Assaddeq.
Malǝk-Assaddeq
wen, ǝnta as kala ad imos
ǝmǝnokal n ǝɣrǝm ǝn Salem, imos ǝlimam ǝn Mǝššina di n Amadkol. Ǝnta a issǝlkadan y ǝnnǝbi Ibrahim, assaɣa wad irza imǝnokalan, ittar y Ibrahim a das-igan albaraka.
Ǝnta en da a
ikfa Ibrahim tǝmǝssǝdǝk n awa ila kul
Almaɣna
n esǝm wa n Malǝk-Assaddeq:
Ǝmǝnokal ǝn taqqat, imosan deɣ ǝmǝnokal ǝn Salam,
almaɣna "ǝmǝnokal n alxer".
Wǝrmad ila abba, wala anna, wala aljadan. Tǝmǝddurt-net wǝr tǝla ǝnǝtti za wala tǝzǝrǝst. Itawašašala ǝd Barar ǝn Mǝššina, iqqal ǝlimam har faw.
Ǝnẓǝrat daɣ ǝdkul n ǝlimam wen, har âs Ibrahim iman-net wa n aljad-nanaɣ a t-ikfan tǝzunt ta n marawat n awa d-oɣa.
Ilimaman win Kǝl-Lebi, ikf-en alwajib ihân Ǝttawret alxaq n ad garrawan šimǝssǝdak ǝn tamattay n Israyil, ǝmosnen imǝdrayan-nasan, kuddeɣ âs ǝntanay da ihayawan n Ibrahim a mosan.
Malǝk-Assaddeq amaran, wǝr imos iyyan daɣ Kǝl-Lebi, mišan igraw tǝmǝssǝdǝk n awa ila Ibrahim. Tǝzzar ittar Malǝk-Assaddeq a igan albaraka y Ibrahim s ǝnta as iga Mǝššina arkăwalan!
Igmâd aššak âs wa ogaran adkul ǝnta a itattaran a igan albaraka i wa das-ǝndǝrran.
Ilimaman win garrawnen šimǝssǝdak ǝn tamattay, aytedan a mosan a zʼiba ǝzǝl iyyan, Malǝk-Assaddeq amaran, sitaddan Ǝlkǝttaban âs iddâr.
Xasil Kǝl-Lebi iman-nasan, s ǝntanay a garrawnen šimǝssǝdak, irzâm fall-asan Ibrahim tǝmǝssǝdǝk ǝs tahakkay ta tat-iga i Malǝk-Assaddeq.
Fǝlas as issǝlkad Malǝk-Assaddeq y Ibrahim, Lebi wǝr ihǝw.

Ǝnnar ikmâl ǝnnizam wa n limaman win Kǝl-Lebi, s ǝnta a isǝbdadan ǝlqanun wa issǝwar Mǝššina tamattay, wǝdi wǝr tu-z-imǝl ǝlimam ǝn taggayt ta n Malǝk-Assaddeq daɣ adag ǝn limaman ǝn taggayt ta n Harun.
Amaran dad zamas immǝttay ǝnnizam wa n limaman, wǝdi ǝlqanun da ilzâm ad ammattay.
Ǝlimam wa fǝl ǝmmǝgradan salan win, in tawšet iyyat. Tawšet ten amaran wǝr tat-iha awedan as kala ad iqqal ǝlimam.
Illikan âs Ǝmǝli-nana, tawšet ta n Yahuda a d-igmad, tawšet ta amaran wǝr d-idkel Musa batu-net fadda daɣ batu n ǝššǝɣǝl wa n tišit n ǝlimam.
Arat wen, isitadd-ay wǝllen as d-inafalal ǝlimam iyyan olân ǝd Malǝk-Assaddeq.
Ǝlimam wa, wǝr d-iga iguz n ǝnnizam wa n ǝnǝmǝkusa. Kalar iguz ǝn tarna ǝn tǝmǝddurt tǝɣlâlat a d-iga,
fǝlas ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban daɣ batu-net:
Ǝlimam a tǝmosa har faw, daɣ taggayt ta n Malǝk-Assaddeq.
Ǝlqanun wa t-illan kala da, itawakkas-in, fǝlas wǝr ila tarna waliyyat za wǝr infa wala.
Ǝlqanun wa, wǝr d-issǝxsal arat waliyyan ikmâlan. Attama amaran wa danaɣ-itawakfan ofâ wa n ǝlqanun wen. Attama wa, ǝnta a danaɣ-issǝfragan ǝnǝmihaz ǝd Mǝššina.
Arat wa kul Mǝššina a ihadan daɣ batu-net. Ilimaman win hadatnen wǝr ihed Mǝššina daɣ batu-nasan,
Ɣaysa amaran, Mǝššina a ihadan daɣ batu-net, id Ǝlkǝttaban a ǝnnanen:
Ǝmǝli a ihadan, amaran wǝr ilkem a d-iqqal daɣ batu-net. Ǝlimam a tǝmosa har faw.
Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as tarrayt ta n Ɣaysa a fǝl nǝkkas aššak âs nǝgrâw arkawal ǝn tassaq ǝd Mǝššina ofân wa irǝwan.
Ilimaman ǝknânen igǝt a t-ǝmalnen s ǝnǝmǝkusa, fǝlâs wǝr tan-toyya tǝmattant s ad t-ǝmǝlan har faw.
Ɣaysa amaran ill-ay har faw. Awen daɣ a fǝlas tišit-net ǝlimam wǝr tǝtǝmǝttǝy.
Daɣ adi ifrâg tehakkay n ǝlɣillas ikmâlan y aytedan win din-ǝzzǝhaznen iman-nasan Mǝššina ǝs tarrayt-net, id iddâr har faw, y ad iššâwal i Mǝššina s esǝm-nasan.
Ɣaysa ǝnta a imosan ǝlimam wa zǝwwǝran was nǝddǝrar, id zǝddig, wǝr t-iwer lahan waliyyan, wǝr kala ad iga abakkad, wǝr ola ǝd nasbakkadan alxal, immǝdkal imal dǝnnǝg jǝnnawan.

Ilimaman win hadatnen zawwarnen ilzâm-tan igi ǝn tǝkutawen akk ǝzǝl fǝl ǝddǝlil ǝn bakkadan win-nasan iman-nasan tǝzzar, dǝffǝr adi win tamattay. Ɣaysa amaran ǝnta wǝr iddǝrar s awen, fǝlas takutay iyyadda a iga, ig-et šiyyat ǝs tahakkay ta iga iman-net.

Ilimaman win zawwarnen isannafran Ǝttawret, aytedan a mosan ǝrkamnen. Mišan wa isannafran Mǝššina ig-ay ǝlimam wa zǝwwǝran ǝs tǝhuday ta iga daɣ batu ten, wǝdi Barar-net a imos, igrâwan alkamalat har faw. Tahudday ten ig-et Mǝššina dǝffǝr as iziraz ǝnnizam wa n Ǝttawret.
Amaran, ǝntada ǝlmǝxsud n awas nara tǝnna-net: Nǝla ǝlimam igân ta daɣ tǝzzǝwwǝrt, iqqiman daɣ ǝɣil ǝn Mǝššina daɣ taɣmar-net di maqqarat daɣ jǝnnawan,
iha ǝššǝɣǝl wa n adag wa zǝddigan, s ǝnta a imosan ahaket wa n tidǝt, ahaket was Ǝmǝli Mǝššina iman-net a t-ikrasan, wǝrgeɣ aggadǝm.
Ǝkkulluk n ǝlimam wa zǝwwǝran, ǝššǝɣǝl-net igi ǝn tǝhǝkkuten ǝd tǝkutawen. Daɣ adi ǝlimam wa-nana da iwâr-tu ad agu takutay ta-net.
Ǝnnar iha Ɣaysa ǝddǝnet dada, wǝdi wǝr zʼiqqǝl ǝlimam, fǝlas ǝššǝɣǝl wen ǝhân-tu limaman win tagginen šikutawen s ǝmmǝk wa imal Ǝttawret.
Ilimaman win, ɣabbadan Mǝššina s ǝmmǝk imosan ǝsǝkbar ǝd šaššelan n aratan win ǝhanen ijǝnnawan. Fǝlas assaɣa wad isimutug Musa y akaras n ahaket, omar-tu Mǝššina inn-as:
Ǝnǝy, arat kul ag-ay s ǝmmǝk iman-net wa kay-itawasaknan fǝl ǝdɣaɣ.

Amaran ǝmǝrǝdda, ǝššǝɣǝl ogaran wǝllen wa n limaman a itawakfan Ɣaysa s ǝnta a imosan ǝlimam-nana wa zǝwwǝran, fǝlas ǝnta a imosan almawakkil-nana daɣ arkawal ǝn tassaq ta tofat, tǝbdâdat fǝl arkăwalan win ofănen.
Amaran, ǝnnar ikmâl arkawal wa azzaran, wǝr za tagu addararat s ad iggǝz wa aynayan edag-net.
Tidǝt as Mǝššina issiwar tamattay-net lahan, assaɣa wad inna:
«Inna Ǝmǝli: Ǝnǝy! Ǝzayan-du adan a daɣ za nǝmǝggaɣ ǝd tamattay n Israyil ǝd ta n Yahuda arkăwal ǝn tassaq aynayan.

Arkawal ǝn tassaq wa, wǝr zʼalu ǝd wa namaggaɣ ǝd marawan-nasan, assaɣa wa tan-d-ǝdkalaɣ ǝkkasaq-qan-du daɣ Masar. Dad zamas wǝr ǝɣdelan daɣ arkawal ǝn tassaq wa dǝr-san namagga, wǝdi ǝgmada batu-nasan, inna Ǝmǝli.

Amaran ǝnta da arkawal wa aynayan ǝn tassaq wa za nǝmǝggaɣ ǝd maddanǝs n Israyil dǝffǝr adan win den, inna Ǝmǝli: Ad agaɣ ǝššǝrǝdan n ǝššǝriɣa-nin daɣ ǝgǝrri n akkiyyan daɣ-san, ǝktǝbaq-qan daɣ wallan-nasan, ǝqqǝlaɣ Ǝmǝli-nasan, ǝqqǝlan tamattay-nin.
Wǝr tan-iha i zʼilǝsan ǝsǝssǝɣri n ǝmidi-net, wala amadray-net ann-as: "Iwâr-kay ad tǝssǝna Mǝššina" fǝlas ketnasan a di-ǝssǝnan a d-ibazan ɣur wa ǝddarran-nasan, har wa waššaran-nasan.
Fǝlas a dasan-ǝhǝnǝtteɣ daɣ talbast ta ǝgan, ǝssurǝfaɣ-asan ibakkadan-nasan šiyyat.»
Dad zamas Mǝššina inna:
wa aynayan,
daɣ adi arkăwal wa azzaran iqqal arat waššaran. Amaran arat as waššar, wǝdi iha tarrayt n ad iba tamayyamayt-net.
Arkawal wa azzaran ila ǝššǝrǝdan win ǝlɣibada, ila deɣ edag n ǝlɣibada ihân ǝddǝnet dada.

Ahaket a itawakrasan, imosan ǝššin daggan. Edag wa azzaran ih-ay ǝsǝkbǝl ǝn fǝtǝlaten ǝd tabǝl ǝd tǝgǝlwen šin tat-ǝggarnen a d-ǝmmewaynen ǝmosnat šikutawen y Ǝmǝli. Edag wen esǝm-net Edag wa Zǝddigan.
Amaran dǝffǝr anaɣer wa n ǝššin illân den, ill-ay adag was itawannu Edag wa Ogaran Tazdak.

Edag wen ih-ay majmar n urǝɣ a fǝl tawasaqqadan aḍutan win ǝzodnen. Ill-ay deɣ ǝssǝnduq wa n tassaq ilsân urǝɣ. Ǝssǝnduq wen ih-ay ǝɣǝzu n urǝɣ ihâ amensay wa n Manna, tah-ay deɣ tallaq ta n Harun tǝnzârat, ǝd sǝlluman ǝššin win fǝl iktab arkawal ǝn tassaq.

Afalla n ǝssǝnduq wen, ǝbdâdan fall-as šaššelan n angalosan win Kǝruban ǝssiknanen tanaya ǝn Mǝššina ǝgân telay s ǝfrutan-nasan y ǝsǝhǝr-net s ǝnta a fǝl inaqqal ǝzni ǝn takutay ta tǝmmasat ibakkadan. Mišan ǝmǝrǝdda wǝr za nagu isalan kul daɣ batu ta.
Amaran Ahaket wa n ǝmǝnǝy imos ǝššin daggan, a tan-imosan Edag wa Zǝddigan d Adag wa Ogaran Tazdak. Edag wa Zǝddigan taggazan-tu limaman alwaq kul, agin daɣ-as ǝššǝɣǝl-nasan wa n ǝlɣibada.

Edag wa n ǝššin daɣ Ahaket amaran, Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran ɣas a das-itaggan iguz iyyanda daɣ awatay. Den daɣ ad itaway azni n ǝmudar ag-ay takutay dat Mǝššina fǝl ad igrǝw tǝsureft ǝn bakkadan win wǝr nǝga s ǝttǝnǝgmur gǝr za win-net wala win tamattay.
Infas wa Zǝddigan issikn-anaɣ s awen âs, tarrayt ta n Adag wa Ogaran Tazdak wǝr za tǝnǝfilǝl iket ǝšɣalan aytedan s ahaket wa azzaran n arkawal.
Arat wen, imos ǝlmital n azzaman win nǝha ǝmǝrǝdda. Almaɣna n awen as šihǝkkuten ǝd tǝkutawen wǝr ǝfregnat ad ǝzzǝzdǝgnat iwallan n aytedan win ɣabbadnen Mǝššina s ǝmmǝk wa.

Aratan win ǝmosan ǝššǝrǝdan ǝqqâlnen imensewan, d aratan win tamašwinen, d ǝzzǝnǝfan aggotnen n alwallatan. Ǝššǝrǝdan win den, ǝntanay as ǝšɣalan aytedan har d-ewad alwaq wa daɣ issǝbdad Mǝššina ǝnnizam wa aynayan.
Mišan Ǝlmǝsix osâ-du imos ǝlimam wa zǝwwǝran n aratan olâɣnen win t-ǝlanen. Iggaz ahaket wa ogaran tǝzzǝwwǝrt, ikmâlan, âs wǝrgeɣ ifassan n aytedan a t-ǝganen, almaɣna wǝr iha ǝddǝnet dada.
Ǝlmǝsix iguz iyyanda a iga šiyyat y Adag wa Zǝddigan. Amaran azni-net iman-net a ikfa imos takutay, wǝrgeɣ azni ǝn zulaɣ wala izǝgran. Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as dana-d-igraw ǝlɣillas iɣlâlan.
Fǝlas, dad zamas azni ǝn zulaɣ d ǝzni ǝn zǝgran d eẓǝd ǝn tǝharaten šin rakammatnen win tawanbasnen ǝfrâgan ǝzǝzdǝg ǝn tǝɣǝssa-nana,

ma dǝr zʼagdu ǝzǝzdǝg wa dana-z-agu ǝzni n Ǝlmǝsix, izzǝzdǝg iwallan-nana daɣ arak mazalan win tawaynen aggadǝm s ǝhluk, fǝl ad nǝɣbǝd Mǝššina di iddarăn, id Ǝlmǝsix a ikfan iman-net i Mǝššina ǝs tarrayt n Infas wa Zǝddigan di iɣlâlan, imos takutay wǝr nǝla a imosan ǝlɣib.

Awen daɣ a fǝlas Ǝlmǝsix a imosan almawakkil-nana daɣ arkawal ǝn tassaq wa aynayan. Dad zamas Ǝlmǝsix aba-tu fǝl ad ǝgrǝwan aytedan tǝdarfit daɣ bakkadan win ǝgan daɣ azzaman ǝn tassaq ta tǝrǝwat, aytedan win du-tawaɣranen, ad ǝgrǝwan tǝkasit tǝɣlâlat tas itawagga arkawal-net.
Amaṭer ilzâm as kundaba igmad aššak tǝmattant ǝn wa t-igan,
fǝlas amaṭer, wǝr sǝr-ǝs itǝwǝggu ǝššǝɣǝl iket wǝr aba wa t-igan, id wǝr zʼitǝwǝqbǝl iket iddâr mǝššis.
Awen daɣ a fǝlas arkawal wa azzaran, ǝnta da tanaɣla n ǝzni as inta.

Dǝffǝr as imâl ǝnnǝbi Musa alwajiban kul win Ǝttawret i tamattay, idkal-du azni ǝn zǝgran ǝd zulaɣ d aman, idkal-du tǝduft zaggaɣat d agabal ǝn xisof, infas sǝr-ǝs ǝlkǝttab iman-net ǝd tamattay ketnet,
igannu: Ǝnta da
azni n arkawal ǝn tassaq wa dawan-issǝbdad Mǝššina.
Dǝffǝr awen, infas Musa s ǝmmǝk wen da s ǝzni wen Ahaket ǝd mutag-net kul win ǝlɣibada.
Daɣ awa inna Ǝttawret, taššam n aratan azni as tawazazdagan, amaran wǝr tu-tǝlla tǝsureft ǝn bakkadan âr s ad inɣâl ǝzni.
Daɣ adi, ilzâm as šaššelan n aratan win ǝhanen ijǝnnawan ǝmmǝk wen daɣ den as zʼizdagan, aratan amaran iman-nasan win ǝhanen ijǝnnawan, ilzâm ad izdagan ǝs tǝkutawen ǝdkâlnen wǝllen.
Amaran Ǝlmǝsix, wǝrgeɣ Edag wa Ogaran Tazdak ǝkrâsan aytedan imos ǝlmital ǝn wa n tidǝt a iggaz, kalar ijǝnnawan iman-nasan a iggaz, fǝl ad imǝl dat Mǝššina har ǝmǝrǝdda, imos almawakkil-nana.
Wǝr iggez deɣ edag wen y a daɣ-as akfu iman-net imos takutay daɣ taklaten aggotnen, zun awa itaggu Ǝlimam wa Zǝwwǝran ǝkkulluk n awatay itaway-in azni wǝr ila.

Ǝnnar adi a igan, wǝdi Ǝlmǝsix a du-tǝnta ǝddǝnet itaɣazzab. Kalar ǝnǝfilal iyyanda šiyyat a iga Ǝlmǝsix, daɣ ǝlǝqqam n azzaman, fǝl ad imǝs ibakkadan n aytedan ǝs tahakkay ta iga iman-net imos takutay.
Zund ǝmmǝk âs aggadǝm tǝsǝlkamt-net tǝmattant iyyadda, dǝffǝr adi ibdǝd fǝl mazalan-net,

ǝmmǝk wen daɣ den âs Ǝlmǝsix da ǝtǝwǝkfa iyyanda a itawagga imos takutay, fǝl ad imǝs ibakkadan n aytedan aggotnen. Amaran assa-net wa n ǝššin, wǝr d-igla fǝl ames ǝn bakkadan, kalar fǝl ad iɣlǝs win das-ǝssǝgadnen ǝknân tara n a d-asu.

Ǝššǝriɣa wa n Ǝttawret šaššelan ɣas a imos ǝn tǝnfawen šin d-ǝzaynen. Ǝlmital-nasnat da wǝr t-ewed. Awen daɣ a fǝlas šikutawen šin izzǝlzam ǝnnizam wa n Ǝttawret, tawagginen har faw daɣ ǝkkulluk n awatay, wǝr ilkem ad ǝfragnat tehakkay n alkamalat i win ǝɣbadnen Mǝššina.

Ǝnnar ihakku ǝššǝriɣa wen alkamalat, wǝdi aytedan win ǝganen šikutawen šin den ad ammazzayan d igi-nasnat fǝlas irǝw as ǝgrawan tǝsureft ǝn bakkadan-nasan šiyyat, zaddogan wallan-nasan daɣ id t-illa abakkad.
Kalar šikutawen šin den, ǝkkulluk n awatay ǝssiktanat-du aytedan ibakkadan-nasan.
Fǝlas wǝr t-illa ǝmmǝk as ifrâg ǝzni ǝn zǝgran wala wa n zulaɣ emes ǝn bakkadan.
Awen daɣ a fǝlas assaɣa wa d-iggaz Ǝlmǝsix ǝddǝnet, inna i Mǝššina:
Wǝrmad tǝddiraraɣ ǝs tǝkutay za wala tǝhǝkkut, mišan tǝkfeɣ-i taɣǝssa.
Wǝrmad dak-ǝgraznat tǝkutawen šin tirǝkǝmmitnen za wala šin takkasnen ibakkadan.
Awen daɣ a fǝl ǝnne: Nak da a d-osan da, fǝlas batu-nin a daɣ ǝššewalan ǝlkǝttaban. Ose-du ya Ǝmǝli-nin y ad agaɣ tara-nak.
Inna:
Wǝrmad tareɣ šikutawen, wala šihǝkkuten, wala šikutawen šin tirǝkǝmmitnen, wala šikutawen šin takkasnen ibakkadan, wǝr dak-ǝgreznat wala andǝrran.
Dǝr iga awen da ya šikutawen šin den, tiwagganat s ǝmmǝk iman-net wa imal ǝššǝriɣa wa n Ǝttawret.
Dǝffǝr awen inna:
«Nak da a d-osan da y ad agaɣ tara-nak.»
Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as izzǝraz ǝnnizam wa azzaran, issǝbdad wa n ǝššin.
Tehakkay ta iga Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix taɣǝssa-net ǝs tara ǝn Mǝššina, ǝnta a danaɣ-takfat tazdak ǝs tarrayt ǝn tǝkutay iyyadda ta n tǝzǝrǝst ta tǝqqal tǝɣǝssa-net.
Ǝkkulluk n ǝlimam iha edag n ǝššǝɣǝl-net akk ǝzǝl y ad agu šikutawen aggotnen olânen, mišan wǝr ilkem ad ǝfragnat emes ǝn bakkadan n aytedan.
Ǝlmǝsix amaran, dǝffǝr as iga takutay iyyadda ta n tǝzǝrǝst fǝl bakkadan n aytedan, iqqim daɣ ǝɣil ǝn Mǝššina.
Illa den da iqqâl y ǝzǝl wad za tǝwǝggin zǝnga-net daw daran-net.
Takutay iyyadda wǝr nǝla tǝmidit as ikfa alkamalat har faw y aytedan win izzǝzdag daɣ bakkadan-nasan.
Infas wa Zǝddigan isitadd-anaɣ batu ta, id a inna:
Ǝnta da arkawal wa dǝr-san za nǝmǝgga dǝffǝr adan win den, inna Ǝmǝli: Ad agaɣ ǝššǝrǝdan n ǝššǝriɣa-nin daɣ wallan-nasan, ǝktǝbaq-qan daɣ ǝgǝrri n akkiyyan daɣ-san.
Dǝffǝr awen inna:
Wǝr ilkem a d-ǝlasa tǝkatawt ǝn bakkadan-nasan, wala talbast-nasan.
Amaran, dad zamas ibakkadan tawasarafan, wǝdi abʼas tǝga addararat ǝs tǝkutawen šin ǝmmasnen ibakkadan.
Daɣ adi imǝdrayan-in, nakkanay nǝkkâs aššak daɣ iguz n Adag wa Ogaran Tazdak, id Ɣaysa a inɣalan azni-net fǝl ǝddǝlil-nana.
Ɣaysa a danaɣ-olaman tarrayt ta taynayat, tǝddârat, issǝɣras-anaɣ anaɣer s Adag wa Ogaran Tazdak, almaɣna issǝɣras-anaɣ ǝs tǝɣǝssa-net iman-net.
Ǝmmǝk en daɣ âs nǝla ǝlimam wa zǝwwǝran s ǝnta a itawazazaran y ahan ǝn Mǝššina.

Daɣ adi, zǝnnǝmihǝzatanaɣ iman-nanaɣ ǝd Mǝššina ǝs wallan ǝɣdâlnen, d ǝzǝgzan ikmâlan, fǝlas ǝtǝwǝzǝzdag a ǝgan wallan-nana daɣ igi n id t-illa arak ǝmedran, tǝtawašarad tǝɣǝssa-nana s aman win zaddognen.
Zǝzzǝwǝtatana wǝllen daɣ ǝzǝgzan d attama win nǝga, nǝkkâs daɣ-san aššak, fǝlas wa danaɣ-igan arkăwalan issiflas wǝllen.
Akkiyyan daɣ-na issǝnet daɣ win hadatnen, fǝl ad nǝtinǝmǝggu aholan ǝn tara ǝd mazalan win olaɣnen, nǝga awen ǝs gǝlleyat.
Ad wǝr nǝgmǝd ǝljǝmaɣat ǝn mǝzzǝgzan ta nǝha, zun awa imosan alxal n aytedan wiyyad. Kalar tinǝmǝggiwatanaɣ ǝnnǝsixatan id tǝhannayam as ǝzǝl wa ilkaman ihoz.
Amaran as nǝtaggu abakkad igân s ǝttǝnǝgmur, dǝffǝr as nǝssân tidǝt, wǝdi wǝr tu-tǝlla tǝkutay iyyat a fall-anaq-qu za tǝmǝsat.
As iga adi, ad ibʼas tu-tǝlla tarrayt waliyyat âr ta n ǝsǝgǝd y ǝššǝriɣa labâsan ǝn Mǝššina ǝd tǝmsay ta za tǝsǝrrǝkǝmmet aytedan kul win ǝmosnen izǝnga ǝn Mǝššina.
As ugay awedan ǝs lǝkkum y ǝššǝriɣa wa n Ǝttawret, imos âs ǝllânat-tu sanatat madeɣ karadat tǝgǝyyawen a t-ǝnaynen, wǝdi wǝr das-tu-tǝlla tǝsureft waliyyat, kalar ǝššǝriɣa-net tǝmattant.
Daɣ adi, ma dǝr zʼagdu attadib wa dǝr ihor awedan wa issǝknan iba ǝn safrar i Barar ǝn Mǝššina, issǝkna mǝlka y ǝzni ǝn tassaq wa t-izzǝzdagan, isammadray Infas wa Zǝddigan ihakkin arraxmat?
Nakkanay nǝssân wa innan:
Nak a itabazan s ǝššǝriɣa, nak a zʼixkǝman y awedan kul awa dǝr ihor.
Innâ deɣ:
Ǝmǝli ad abǝz tamattay-net s ǝššǝriɣa.
Arat sǝksǝdan wǝllen a imos ad iggǝz awedan ifassan ǝn Mǝššina di iddaran.
Aktiwat-du azzaman win azzarnen, dǝffǝr as kawan-ikfa Mǝššina ǝnnur-net, tǝmmiqqasam d alɣazab labasan, ǝd tǝbǝllant tǝssohet,
fǝlas alwaq iyyan tǝtawakaggaram dat awedan kul, tǝtawasaknim arkanay, alwaq iyyan amaran tǝtawayam tadhǝlt-nawan y aytedan win tawasakninen alɣazab zun wen.
Tǝhinattem y aytedan win ǝhanen kasaw, tǝssânam daɣ-san, tǝqbalam ǝs man filawasnen a daɣ-wan attarmasan ǝrrǝzǝɣan-nawan, id tǝssânam âs tǝlâm ǝrrǝzǝɣan ǝdkâlnen, a t-ǝllânen har faw.
Daɣ adi, ad wǝr tammazzayam d ikus n aššak wǝdi, fǝlas ǝnta a kawan-z-akfin arozan zawwarnen.
Tǝddiraram ǝs zǝmmerat fǝl a du-tassandim tara ǝn Mǝššina tǝgrǝwam arat was iga arkawal-net.
Fǝlas inna Mǝššina:
Wǝr din-iqqim âr arat n azzaman, azzaman wǝr nǝggǝt ɣas, y a d-asu was ihor a d-asu. Wǝr din-z-ahag.
Fǝlas wa dat-i oɣadan, ad igrǝw tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat s ǝzǝgzan-net. Mišan as iqqal dǝffǝr-ǝs, wǝdi ad ibʼas t-ǝran man-in.
Nakkanay amaran, wǝr nǝha aytedan win taqqalnen dǝffǝr-san abǝzan tarrayt ta n ǝhluk. Kalar nǝha win ǝttafnen ǝzǝgzan-nasan y ad ǝgrǝwan ǝlɣillas.
Ǝzǝgzan almaɣna-net âs arat was nǝga attama-net, wǝdi nǝkkâs aššak as nǝgrâw-tu. Almaɣna-net ikus n aššak daɣ aratan kudde wǝr tan-nǝhǝnnǝy.
Ǝzǝgzan en daɣ a fǝl ǝgrawan marawan-nana ǝtǝwǝqbal ɣur Mǝššina.
Amaran ǝnta a danaɣ-isassagran âs ǝddǝnet awal ǝn Mǝššina as du-tǝxlak. Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as awa nǝhannay, igmâd-du a wǝr nǝtǝwǝhǝnnǝy.

Ǝzǝgzan, ǝnta a fǝl ikfa Habila takutay tofât ta ikfa Qayin. Ǝzǝgzan en daɣ a fǝl tǝtawaqbal tišit ǝn Habila alɣadil id Mǝššina iman-net a iggǝyyen as šikutawen-net tiwaqbalnat. Ǝzǝgzan a d-ewayan âs Habila aba-tu mišan har harwa iššewal.
Ǝzǝgzan, ǝnta a fǝl immǝdkal Xenok ǝs jǝnnawan, wǝr tu-tǝdes tamattant.
Wǝr kala ad ilas ǝtǝwǝnay dǝffǝr awen, fǝlas Mǝššina a t-idkalan.
Amaran dat ǝmǝdkǝl-net, igrâw ǝtǝwǝqbal ɣur Mǝššina id ǝnnan Ǝlkǝttaban:
Xenok igrâz i Mǝššina.

Ǝzǝgzan ǝnta ɣas a ihakkin aytedan ad ǝgrǝwan gǝrrezat i Mǝššina, fǝlas awedan wa iqbalan Mǝššina daɣ ǝwǝl-net, wǝdi kundaba izzǝgzan âs Mǝššina ill-ay, izzǝgzan deɣ âs itaggu arozan i win gammaynen masnat-net.

Ǝzǝgzan, ǝnta a fǝl ikras ǝnnǝbi Nux aɣlal n aman fǝl ad iɣlǝs aɣaywan-net, id ǝmiksad ǝn Mǝššina a imos ikkâs aššak daɣ arat wa das-isannafalal Mǝššina, kudde wǝr t-ihǝnnǝy. Ǝmmǝk en daɣ as obaz Nux ǝddǝnet s ǝššǝriɣa, iqbal Mǝššina tišit-net alǝs oɣâdan ǝs tarrayt n ǝzǝgzan-net.
Ǝzǝgzan a fǝl ibbǝrdag ǝnnǝbi Ibrahim i Mǝššina s iki wa iga akal was das-itawanna ilkâm ad iggǝz tǝla-net, assaɣa wa t-iɣra Mǝššina. Ifal akal-net, igla da wǝr issen id ikka.
Ǝzǝgzan a fǝl igla Ibrahim, ikka akal was das-iga Mǝššina arkawal-net, iqqal daɣ-as ǝnaftaɣ, ixsâr daɣ hǝktan ǝnta d Isǝhaq ǝd Yaqub âs ǝnta dǝr-san as iga Mǝššina arkawal wen.
Arat wen ig-ay Ibrahim fǝlas issigad y ǝɣrǝm wa wǝr nǝtǝbǝrǝjjit, aɣrǝm was Mǝššina iman-net a t-id-inzaman ikras-tu.
Ǝzǝgzan a ikfan Sarata barar daɣ tušaray-net. Sarata wǝr tǝtilu bararan, mišan tǝgraw ǝzzurrǝyya, id ǝzǝgzan a tǝga s arkawal ǝn Mǝššina di n alɣadil.
Awen daɣ a fǝlas alǝs iyyanda, ihân ǝlǝqqam ǝn tǝɣrǝst-net, a igrawan ǝzzurrǝyya igân igǝt wa ǝgan etran daɣ jǝnnawan, madeɣ šiblalen n amaḍal ǝs tu-wǝr-illa i ifrâgan ǝšidǝn-nasnat.

Ǝzǝgzan en daɣ a ǝgan aljadan win den, har tan-aba da wǝr ǝgrewan aratan win as dasan-itawagga arkawal-nasan, mišan awa sǝr-san ǝgan daɣ ǝzǝgzan zun as ǝnayan-tan daɣ igǝg, ǝgâran fall-asan assalam, ǝggiyyen dat awedan kul âs inaftaɣan ǝd ɣǝrab ɣas a mosan daɣ ǝddǝnet.
Amaran win ǝganen awal wa, sitaddan sǝr-ǝs âs gammayan akal ǝn man-nasan.
Ǝnnar tan-iggâz ǝsuf n akal wa d-ǝfalan, wǝdi ad t-ǝqqǝlan, fǝlas ǝgrâwan edag n awen.
Mišan, akal idkâlan dǝnnǝg wen as ǝgan ǝnnǝyat-net, almaɣna ijǝnnawan. Awen daɣ a fǝlas, Mǝššina wǝr fall-as imos tǝkarakit tišit ta iga Ǝmǝli-nasan, fǝlas isimatag-asan aɣrǝm daɣ jǝnnawan.
Ǝzǝgzan ǝnta a fǝl ikfa Ibrahim barar-net Isǝhaq y ad iqqǝl tǝfaskay assaɣa wad ijjǝrrab Mǝššina ǝzǝgzan-net. Barar-net a n iyyanda a ikfa, ǝnta wa igrawan arkawal.
Amaran ǝnta en daɣ as inna Mǝššina:
Tarrayt n Isǝhaq as za tǝgrǝwaɣ ǝzzurrǝyya.
Daɣ iduf n Ibrahim, Mǝššina ila tarna n ǝsǝnkǝr daɣ tǝmattant. Awen daɣ a fǝl das-oyya Mǝššina barar-net, zun as issinkar-as-t-idu daɣ tamattant.
Ǝzǝgzan a fǝl ittar Isǝhaq i bararan-net Yaqub d Ezaw a dasan-igan albaraka daɣ azzaman win d-ǝzaynen.
Ǝzǝgzan a fǝl ittar Yaqub daɣ ǝlǝqqam ǝn tǝɣrǝst-net y akkiyyan daɣ bararan ǝn Yusǝf,
issǝjad issîdad s ǝmi ǝn tallaq-net.
Ǝzǝgzan a fǝl iššewal Yusǝf i Kǝl-Israyil dat tǝmattant-net, daɣ batu n agamad-nasan Masar, omar-tan s awa zʼagin i ɣasan-net.

Ǝzǝgzan ǝnta a fǝl itawaɣbar Musa ɣur tǝhǝwt-net har iga karadat tǝlil. Ǝɣbaran-tu marwan-net id ǝnâyan as barar ihossayan a imos, amaran ǝzǝgzan-nasan a dasan-igdalan a tan-tǝggǝz tasa n awas omar Firɣawna, imosan ǝmǝnokal ǝn Masar.
Ǝzǝgzan a fǝl ugay Musa dǝffǝr tadwala-net s ad iqbǝl tišit ǝn barar n elles ǝn Firɣawna.
Ǝzǝgzan en daɣ a fǝl issof Musa ad irtǝy ǝd tamattay ǝn Mǝššina daɣ alɣazab, iksan tǝnaflǝyt n ǝddǝnet ǝd bakkadan-net wǝr nǝmos âr arat n adan.

Musa issof ad itǝwǝsǝknu mǝlka wa itawasakna Ǝlmǝsix, fǝlas arozan win zʼigrǝw ǝs tarrayt ten, ogaran wǝllen ǝrrǝzǝɣan ǝn Masar; Musa iswâd daɣ aratan win d-ǝzaynen, a tan-imosan arozan win ihakku Mǝššina.
Ǝzǝgzan a fǝl igmad Musa Masar, wǝr tu-taha tasa n ǝmǝnokal iha alham labasan, fǝlas ǝsǝggǝtǝkki a iga id ihannay a wǝr nǝtǝwǝnǝy.
Ǝzǝgzan a fǝl iga Musa tǝfaskay ta n ǝmud wa n Akkay, infăs azni ǝn tǝfaskay ten i tamawen ǝn tǝsǝhar ǝn nan ǝn Kǝl-Israyil, fǝl ad wǝr idǝs ǝmahlak iɣǝfǝdda-nasan.
Ǝzǝgzan a tan-issǝɣrasan Agaraw was itawannu wa Zaggaɣan, jiwanken fǝl amaḍal iqquran, ilmaz agarew en Kǝl-Masar win ǝgmaynen d a tan-awǝdan.
Ǝzǝgzan a iggǝdlan afarag wa iɣlayan aɣrǝm ǝn Yerikaw, dǝffǝr as ǝgân Kǝl-Israyil ǝssa adan ɣallayan-t-id.

Ǝzǝgzan wa tǝga Rahab ta n tǝkarwat ǝnta a das-igdalan a tat-iba assaɣa wad ǝhlakan aytedan win ugaynen s ǝbǝrdǝg i Mǝššina, id Rahab a tǝqbalat a ɣur-ǝs ǝssǝgǝnan nassasaman n Israyil, tǝg-asan isǝxlak.
Ma dawan-z-anna dǝffǝr aratan win? Wǝr zʼǝgrǝwaɣ alwaq ewâdan a dawan-ǝššiwǝla daɣ batu ǝn Jedeyon d Ǝmbarǝk ǝd Samson ǝd Yeftay ǝd Dawǝd ǝd Samǝwel, d ǝnnǝbitan win hadatnen.
Ǝzǝgzan as obazan meddan win ikallan, ǝxkaman fall-asan s ǝššǝriɣa oɣadan, ǝgrawan arkăwalan win dasan-tawagganen, ǝdbaɣan imawan ǝn harran.
Ǝzǝgzan as ǝnɣan šimǝs zawwarnen, ǝɣlasan daɣ tǝkabiwen ǝknânen tawala, ǝgrawan tarna daɣ adag ǝn rǝkkǝm was kala t-ǝgan. Ǝssǝknan tišit-nasan inammagaran, ǝrzan igǝnan.

Ǝzzǝgzannat tǝdoden tawasankaran-asnat-du nǝmmǝttan-nasnat daɣ tǝmattant. Wiyyad amaran tawasaknan alɣazab sǝksǝdan, mišan ugayan s ad ǝgrǝwan tǝdarfit ɣur aytedan win tan-zaɣazzabnen. Arat wen ǝgân-tu fǝl ad ǝgrǝwan tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat dǝffǝr tanakra-nasan daɣ tamattant.
Wiyyad ǝgrawan-tan jarrabatan labasnen ǝgânen daɣ tǝmakkakkayt, ǝd tǝwit, ǝd tǝzabagawen, ǝd kasaw.

Wiyyad tawanɣan ǝs tǝgur ǝn tǝhun, wiyyad ǝmmolayan ǝs tǝkojaten, wiyyad tawanɣan ǝs tǝkabiwen. Wiyyad itâway-tan aɣaf wǝr ǝssenan is ǝdagan, ǝlsân igǝškan n ayfǝd ǝd win wǝlli, wǝr ǝlen a d-ixlâkan, irtây-asan awen d as tiwadgazan, tawasaknin arkanay.
Aytedan win, wǝr tǝhor ǝddǝnet d a tat-ǝhân, itâway-tan aɣaf daɣ tǝnariwen, d ǝdɣaɣan, ǝd kǝzman ǝd ɣaɣan.
Aytedan win kul iqbal-tan Mǝššina ǝs tarrayt n ǝzǝgzan-nasan, mišan wǝr tan-iha i inâyan arkawal wa dasan-itawaggan.
Mǝššina kala dâ issins-anaɣ arat idkâlan wǝllen fǝl ad wǝr ǝgrewan aytedan win den alkamalat iket wǝr dǝr-san nǝjjǝyat agaraw-net.

Awen daɣ a fǝlas nakkanay da, dad zamas ɣilayɣalayan-ana mǝzzǝgzan ǝgânen igǝt ogdân d awa, wǝdi ǝgǝratanaɣ-in ǝzuk kul wa danaɣ-iwaran, ǝd bakkadan ǝssirɣasnen alamaz-nana, naglu har tǝzǝrǝst ǝn tǝbǝllant ta danaɣ-issǝwar Mǝššina.

Ǝswǝdatana faw daɣ Ɣaysa s ǝnta a danaɣ-olaman tarrayt ta n ǝzǝgzan, tǝhakkit alkamalat. Ɣaysa iqbal alɣazab fǝl tǝgǝttawt imosan tǝkarakit zǝwwǝrat, id tǝkarakit ten wǝr ɣur-ǝs tǝmos wala, fǝlas ihannay tǝfalawist ta das-tǝqqalat. Dǝffǝr awen ikka ijǝnnawan, iqqim daɣ ǝɣil ǝn Mǝššina daɣ taɣmar-net.
Awalla, aktiwat was ǝgan nasbakkadan akyud ogdân d awa, fǝl ad wǝr tayyim iman-nawan tǝgmǝdam tarrayt.
Tǝbǝllant ta tǝgam d abakkad, wǝr tat-tǝgem har tamattant.
Tǝttǝwam-in ammar wa dawan-iga Mǝššina, olân d ǝnnǝsixa wa itaggu awedan i bararan-net, inna:
Barar-in, ad wǝr tǝsǝttǝlkǝkaɣ attadib n Ǝmǝli, ad wǝr tǝqqǝla dǝffǝr-ǝk as kay-issǝwar Ǝmǝli lahan.
Fǝlas Ǝmǝli itawaddab win ikna tara, iggât win iqbal daɣ tišit ǝn bararan-net.
Ǝqbǝlat alɣazab wa tǝtaggim. Mǝššina itawaddab-kawan fǝlas bararan-net a tǝmosam. Awak ill-ay barar wǝr itǝwǝddib abba-net?
As imos âs wǝr kawan-itǝwǝddib Mǝššina, zun awa itaggu i bararan-net kul, wǝdi wǝr tǝmosam bararan-net win tidǝt, kalar bararan ǝn bannan a tǝmosam.
Dad zamas ketnana nǝla abbatan daɣ ǝddǝnet a dana-tawaddabnen, nǝssiɣmar-tan, manǝmmǝk as wǝr za nabbardag i Mǝššina s ǝnta a imosan Abba-nana wa ihan ijǝnnawan, fǝl ad nǝgrǝw tǝmǝddurt ta tǝɣlalat?
Abbatan-nana win ǝddǝnet tawaddaban-ana daɣ arat n azzaman wǝr nǝggǝt daɣ batu n idufan-nasan, Mǝššina amaran, tǝnfa-nanaɣ a fǝl danaɣ-itawaddab, fǝl a danaɣ-iqbǝl daɣ tazdak-net.
Attadib wǝr imos arat izodan s awedan daɣ amazay wa das itawaggu, kalar arat a imos iɣaššadan iman. Mišan win tawawaddabnen, tǝsǝlkamt-nasan ad ǝgrǝwan alxer, ǝd tǝmǝddurt toɣâdat.
Awen daɣ a fǝlas: ifassan-nawan ǝrkaman, ifaddan-nawan deɣ ǝrkaman, daɣ adi sǝssuhǝtat-tan.
Ǝlkǝmat i tarrayen šin oɣadnen. As tǝgam adi, aytedan win ǝrkamnen, wǝr dasan-z-ittǝy rǝkkǝm, kalar ad ǝzzǝyan.
Agliwat daɣ igi n alxer d awedan kul, tagim tǝmǝddurt zǝddigat. Awedan wa wǝr nǝga tǝmǝddurt zun tǝdi, wǝdi wǝr zʼammanay d Ǝmǝli.

Ǝglǝyat wǝllen, fǝl a tu-wǝr-imǝl awedan issiban fǝl man-net arraxmat ǝn Mǝššina. A daɣ-wan tu-wǝr-imǝl awedan waliyyan a zʼiqqǝlan zun annabat sǝmǝman a du-z-idwǝlan awǝy-du iɣšudan a zʼǝgdǝlnen y aytedan aggotnen tazdak.
Ad wǝr ikkǝs waliyyan daɣ-wan tarna i Mǝššina, madeɣ isǝmmǝdrǝy aratan win zaddognen zun awa iga Ezaw a din-izzǝnzan alxaq-net wa n tišit n aɣafadday, isammaskal-tu amensay.
Tǝssânam âs dǝffǝr awen, igmay albaraka wa n tišit n aɣafadday, mišan igdal-as-tu abba-net. Iyyǝwan tala, mišan indar-as a d-issuɣǝl abba-net daɣ batu ten.
Amaran, wǝrgeɣ arat as ifrâg awedan edes-net a din-tǝhozam, zun tǝmsay tǝmihandarat, madeɣ šiyyay, madeɣ ǝhu, madeɣ tazǝkkay, zun awa ǝgan Kǝl-Israyil daɣ taneɣay.
Wǝrmad tǝslâm y anasaɣ n asak, wala tǝrmuq zun tas ǝslan Kǝl-Israyil, ǝgmayan a das-wǝr-ǝlǝsan tesalay,
fǝlas wǝr ǝqbelan tarɣǝmt ta dasan-tǝnnat:
Wa idasan adɣaɣ, gǝr iqqal awedan wala ǝmudar, wǝdi ad ammat ǝs tǝgur ǝn tǝhun.
Arat wa itawanayan den, i sǝksǝdan wǝllen, har âs idkal Musa ǝmǝsli-net inna:
«Tah-i tasa wǝllen, tǝga daɣ-i taysǝst.»
Kala kalar kawanay, tǝhozam-in adɣaɣ wa n Sǝyon, d ǝɣrǝm ǝn Mǝššina di iddaran, a t-imosan Yerusalam ta tǝhat ijǝnnawan, tǝhozam-in deɣ šimǝrwen ǝn giman n angalosan ǝmminaynen ǝknân tǝfalawist.
Tǝhozam-in deɣ tiddawat ǝn ɣǝfǝdda win as iktab Mǝššina esmawan-nasan daɣ jǝnnawan, tǝhozam-in Mǝššina s ǝnta ǝmašraɣ n aytedan kul, tǝhozam-in aytedan kul win oɣadnen, ǝgrâwan alkamalat ɣur Mǝššina.
Tǝhozam-in deɣ Ɣaysa, s ǝnta a imosan almawakkil-nana daɣ arkawal ǝn tassaq wa aynayan, d ǝzni-net wa inɣalan, ogaran wa n Habila tǝla n ǝmǝsli daɣ jǝnnawan.

Daɣ adi ǝnkǝdat y ad tǝzǝmmǝẓǝgam i wa iššewalan. Dad zamas Kǝl-Israyil win ugaynen s ad ǝqbǝlan awa dasan-itawaggan daw aɣaf daɣ ǝddǝnet da da, ketnasan ǝwwǝddaban, wǝdi ma dǝr zʼagdu attadib wa dana-z-itǝwǝggin as nǝzammazag i wa dana-d-iššewalan daɣ jǝnnawan?
Ǝmǝsli-net isannagaynagay amaḍal daɣ azzaman win okaynen, amaran ǝmǝrǝdda arkawal da wa iga:
«Taklat ta du-tǝzayat, wǝrgeɣ amaḍal ɣas a za sǝnnǝgǝynǝgǝya, kalar ijǝnnawan da a tan-sǝnnǝgǝynǝgǝya.»
Batu ta n «taklat ta du-tǝzayat» almaɣna-net âs arat kul ad iba tamayyamayt-net, fǝl a d-aqqamin aratan win as wǝr ilkem ad nigaynagayan.
Daɣ adi, dad zamas nǝgrâw taɣmar as wǝr ilkem ad tǝnigaynagay, sǝnnǝfilǝlatanaɣ agoda i Mǝššina, nag-as ǝlɣibada wa das-igrazan igân s ǝbǝrdǝg, ǝd saɣmar,
fǝlas, Ǝmǝli-nana, temsay da imos-tat tǝsirǝkǝmmet.
Ad wǝr tammazzayam d ǝnǝmǝra wa taggin mǝdrayan.
Ǝqqǝlat aytedan iha amagaru. Ad wǝr talkim adi fǝlas aytedan win iha amagaru, wiyyad daɣ-san simagaren angalosan da wǝr ǝssenan.
Aktiwat aytedan win ǝhanen kasaw, zun as tǝnimaham-tu dǝr-san. A din-wǝr-tǝtatawim aytedan win tâwasakninen arkanay, fǝlas kawanay da tǝlâm taɣǝssa zun tada-nasan.
Sǝɣmǝrat azalaf ketnawan. Alǝs ǝd tǝntut win ǝnnǝzlafnen, ǝɣdǝlanet gar-essan fǝlas Mǝššina ad awwaddab imaggan n ǝzzǝna.
Ad wǝr tǝqqǝlam aytedan ǝwwǝlatnen azrǝf. Agdiwat s awa tǝlam ǝmǝrǝdda, fǝlas Mǝššina iman-net as inna:
Wǝr ilkem a kay-oyye za wǝr ilkem ad ǝgmada batu-nak.
Awen daɣ a fǝlas nǝfrâg ad nannu, s ikus n aššak:
Ǝmǝli a imosan fella-nin, wǝr ǝksuda wala. Ma di-z-iɣšǝd aggadǝm?
Aktiwat imuzaran-nawan win ɣur tǝslam y awal ǝn Mǝššina. Ǝttǝfat awa dawan-d-oyyan, tattalalam ǝzǝgzan-nasan.
Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix iman-net awa imos ǝndazǝl ǝnta a imos azalada, imos-tu deɣ har faw.

Ad wǝr tarḍim ǝssǝxrǝkan-kawan sǝssǝɣritan wǝr nǝmos win as nǝzzǝgzan. Fǝlas aggadǝm, ofa ad igrǝw assahat ta tǝhakku arraxmat ǝn Mǝššina, wǝrgeɣ ta hakkin mensewan. Ǝššǝriɣa wa iqqalan batu ǝn mensewan, wǝr ikna wala i win das-ǝlkamnen.
Nǝla edag wa n ǝsǝqqǝd ǝn tǝkutawen, mišan ilimaman win ǝšɣalnen daɣ Ahaket wa n ǝlɣibada, wǝr ǝlen turagat ǝn tattay ǝn tǝkutawen šin daɣ-as tawakfinen.
Azni ǝn mudaran wa itawakfan wa d-immewayan y ames ǝn bakkadan, ǝlimam wa zǝwwǝran a t-itawayan s Adag wa Ogaran Tazdak, amaran šifǝkkawen ǝn mudaran win den, tǝwǝsǝqqǝdnat sǝdi y aɣaywan.
Awen daɣ a fǝlas Ɣaysa da, aba-tu dǝffǝr as itiwakkas daɣ ǝɣrǝm fǝl ad izzǝzdǝg tamattay s ǝzni wa-net iman-net.
Daɣ adi ǝgmǝdatanaɣ aɣaywan, nǝlkam-as, nǝgǝr iri y ad nǝtǝwǝsǝknu mǝlka wa itawasakna.
Fǝlas daɣ ǝddǝnet dada, wǝr nǝla edag ǝn tǝmǝxsurt iɣlâlan. Kalar aɣrǝm wa d-izayan a daɣ nǝgammay edag ǝn tǝmǝxsurt.
[Daɣ adi] iwâr-anaɣ ad nǝtaggu faw i Mǝššina šikutawen ǝs tarrayt ǝn Ɣaysa. Šikutawen šin ǝmosnat tǝmmalen, almaɣna šigaytalen a daɣ nǝqbâl dat awedan kul as ǝnta a imosan Ǝmǝli.
Ad wǝr tammazzayam d ǝmazal n awa olaɣan, d ǝsǝssuhi ǝn tassaq gar-ewwan, id awen daɣ a imosan šikutawen šin ǝgraznen y Ǝmǝli.

Bardagat i muzaran-nawan, takkawanam-asan. Ǝntanay a kawan-ogaznen, id ǝssânan âs ilkam ad ǝbdǝdan fǝl mazalan-nasan dat Mǝššina, daɣ batu n ǝššǝɣǝl wa tan-issǝwar. As dasan-tǝbbǝrdagam, ad agin ǝššǝɣǝl-nasan ǝs man filawasnen, fǝlas as t-ǝgan ǝs man ǝɣšâdnen ǝd tǝhǝnǝffa, wǝr dawan-tu-za-tǝggǝz tǝnfa waliyyat.
Agliwat daɣ igi y-anaɣ šiwatriwen, fǝlas nǝkkâs aššak âs iman-nanaɣ i zaddognen id ǝlqǝbulat a nǝga ǝzǝlulǝɣ daɣ ǝkkulluk n anamod.
Onsâyaq-qawan wǝllen ad taglim daɣ tǝwatriwen, fǝl a kawan-in-tǝwǝsuɣǝla tarmad.
Mǝššina di n Ǝmǝggi n alxer a d-issǝnkaran daɣ tǝmattant Ǝmǝli-nana Ɣaysa imosan amadan wa ofan imadanan, ǝs tarrayt n ǝzni n arkawal ǝn tassaq iɣlâlan,
ǝgmâya daɣ-as a kawan-issǝfrǝg igi n arat kul wa olaɣan y ad tammazalam tara-net. Agiwet sǝr-na Mǝššina arat kul wa das-igrazan ǝs tarrayt ǝn Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix s ǝnta a ilan tanaya har faw! Amin!
Širawt ta ǝzzigzala daɣ-as wǝllen, amaran ǝgmâya daɣ-wan imǝdrayan-in, ad tǝqbǝlam tǝlxutbat ta, tǝzǝzzǝwem daɣ-as.
Ǝssǝnat âs amadray-nana Timotay, igmad-du kasaw. As di-d-osa tarmad, a dǝr-ǝs in-idawa sǝr-wan.
Tǝhulam-in imuzaran-nawan kul, ǝd tamattay zǝddigat ǝn Mǝššina. Ǝhulan-kawan-in šǝqqaɣan-nana win akal n Italǝya.
Ig-awan Mǝššina arraxmat-net ketnawan.
James: Awa nak Yaqub, akli ǝn Mǝššina d Ǝmǝli Ɣaysa Ǝlmǝsix, a din-ihulan marawat tawšeten ǝd sanatat wizawaznen daɣ ǝddǝnet.
Ya imǝdrayan-in, as fall-awan d-osan jarrabatan ǝmosnen ǝzzǝnǝfan, ǝqqǝlanet arat a kawan-isifalawasan wǝllen.
Fǝlas tǝssânam as, ǝtǝwǝjǝrrab n ǝzǝgzan-nawan a sǝr-wan d-itarawan zǝmmerat.
Daɣ adi ayyat zǝmmerat tǝdi, a daɣ-wan tassǝndu ǝššǝɣǝl-net, fǝl ad tǝqqǝlam aytedan ǝndânen, ǝkmâlan.
Kud ih-iwan awedan iddiraran ǝs masnat, ansǝyet Mǝššina, a das-tat-akfu; fǝlas Mǝššina illillat, ihakku awedan kul, da wala tǝgna.
Mišan ansǝyet Mǝššina, izîgzan, wǝr iga aššak. Fǝlas awedan wa igan aššak wǝr izlay ǝd tanazzamaren n agaraw wa zǝwwǝran isaggâd aḍu, ibbât-tanat sa ǝd sa.
Awedan šilat ǝn wǝdi, ad wǝr agu attama n as ad igrǝw arat waliyyan ɣur Ǝmǝli,
id ǝwǝl-net a izunan, wǝr t-illa arat itaggu a daɣ ittâf edag iyyanda.
Amadray-nana wa n tǝlǝqqay addawatet, isǝbbǝrǝg fǝl adkul wa igraw ɣur Mǝššina ǝddi.
Amadray-nana deɣ wa n ǝmǝggergǝs addawatet, isǝbbǝrǝg fǝl ǝsǝmmǝdrǝy wa t-iga Mǝššina ǝddi; id taɣart a tǝtaggu takawkawt ǝn yel, iba tamayyamayt-net a zʼagu ǝnta ǝd tǝgǝrgist-net.
Yel, as du-tǝgmad tǝfuk, tǝga tuksay, a tu-tǝssǝɣǝr, tǝrtǝk takawkawt-net, iba šihussay-net. Adi da za a igarrawan awedan n ǝmǝggergǝs ozâlan daɣ taɣawšiwen-net.
Ibbilal awedan wa izmaran i jarrabatan, fǝlas as fall-as okayan ad igrǝw alak imosan tǝmǝddurt tǝɣlâlat, tas igâ Mǝššina arkawal-net y aytedan win t-ǝranen.
As itawajarrab iyyan daɣ-wan, ad wǝr annu: «Mǝššina a di-ijǝrraban», fǝlas Mǝššina iman-net wǝr t-igǝrrǝw jarraba n igi n ark ǝmazal, wala deɣ itajarrab awedan s igi-net.
Kalar akk awedan lǝkkum y arak deranan-net a tu-tawaynen, har tu-sǝffǝtǝqqen daɣ jarraba.
Arak deranan win, ǝntanay a du-tawaynen igi n abakkad. Abakkad amaran, as innoda daɣ ǝwǝl n aggadǝm, a d-awǝy tǝmattant ta tǝɣlalat.
Ya imǝdrayan-in ǝkneɣ tara, ad wǝr tǝtǝwǝsudǝfam alxata!

Ǝssǝnat as tǝhǝkkut kul ta tolaɣat ǝd ta n tǝfǝrǝnt, Mǝššina di n Abba s ǝnta a imosan ǝmaxlak ǝn tǝfuk ǝd tǝllit d etran a tat-d-izazabben fǝl aytedan. Wǝrmad itamattay, wala deɣ itaggu y edag-net agamad a das-tǝtaggu telay.
Arat irâ a tǝmos tahakkay ta danaɣ-iga tǝmǝddurt ta taynayat s awal-net imosan tidǝt, a t-imosan Ǝlinjil, fǝl ad nǝqqǝl šilat ǝn ɣǝfǝdda daɣ tǝxǝllak-net šin ikfa tǝmǝddurt ta taynayat.
